ŚVK_1.1^1	vārttika ārambhe śiṣṭa ācāram anuvidadhānaḥ maṅgalam tāvat karoti viśuddhā iti dṛṣṭā hi śiṣṭānām pravṛttiḥ sarva kāryeṣu maṅgala ācaraṇa pūrvikā maṅgalam ca devatā stuti namaskāra ādi asya ca niyogataḥ phalavat kārya antara ārambha saṃyogāt sākṣāt aphala tvāt ca phalavat sannidhau= aphalam tad aṅgam iti nyāyena kārya antara śeṣa tve avadhṛte satya ārambhasya samāpti paryanta tvāt apekṣita avighna parisamāptiḥ phalam apekṣita vidheḥ anapekṣita vidhānam durbalam iti nyāyena phala antara kalpanāyāḥ durbala tvāt atas yathā sāmpradāyikam adhyāyānadhyāya ādi svādhyāya avighna artham evam idam api tat ayam arthaḥ viśuddhau jñāna dehau yasya sa tathā uktaḥ 
ŚVK_1.1^2	 viśuddham ca bhagavataḥ jñānam rāga ādibhiḥ jñāna kāraṇānām adūṣita tvāt dehaḥ ca ayonija tvāt vividha garbha vedanā virahāt ca tri vedī ca tasya cakṣuḥ iti gauṇaḥ vādaḥ asandigdha aviparīta spaṣṭa veda artha prakāśaka tvāt divyam ca atīndriya artha gocara tvāt bhautikam hi cakṣuḥ pratyutpanna artha viṣayam idam tu anāgata ādi viṣayam divyam iti śreyasaḥ ca hita ahita prāpti parihāra ātmanaḥ bhagavān nimittam soma ardha dhāriṇe soma kalā dhāriṇe namaḥ iti yadi api vigraha ādi pañcakam devatā adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate tathā api ājya ādi stotra vat pradhāna karmaṇaḥ eva devatā stuteḥ evaṅkṛtāyāḥ phalam iti adoṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.2	 vidyā gurūṇām idānīm stuti namaskārau karoti abhivandya iti śiṣya dhī padminīnām ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūn ādau vande tatas vārttikam kariṣye teṣām eva prasādena dṛṣṭena artha tattva upadeśena adṛṣṭena ca stuti namaskāra bhuvā guru anugamana ādayaḥ api hi ācāra pramāṇakāḥ eva vārttika grahaṇena ca durukta bhaṅgam anukta vacanam ca samādhatte mīmāṃsā śabdena nyāya śāstram idam atas nyāya anusāreṇa adhikaraṇa bhaṅgāt yat ūṣaṇam iti darśayati śloka padena ca lāghava vikāsam kṣipāmaḥ iti darśayati tatas ca sūtrita prāyam imam artham avahitāḥ jijñāsavaḥ bhāvayiṣyanti iti tātparya arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.3–1.5	 samprati lokayātrām ādriyamāṇaḥ ye atyanta para arthāḥ sva upakāram agaṇayantaḥ api para upakārāya yatante santaḥ tān pratyāha tat vidvāṃsaḥ iti asūyavaḥ matsarāḥ tatas anye anasūyavaḥ iti ye tu madhyasthā guṇa doṣa nirūpaṇena doṣavantam apahāya guṇavantam upādadate tān prati parīkṣā viśeṣa artham arthayate na ca atra iti madīye prabandhe asmin guṇa doṣavati yugapad guṇa doṣau nirūpayantu bhavantaḥ anyathā guṇān upekṣya doṣeṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu doṣa nirbhāvana eka manasām asantaḥ doṣāḥ prakāśeran iti idānīm durjanān prati sa daṇḍam āha kutas vā iti ye vayam para sthān api doṣān na mṛṣyāmaḥ te katham sva grantheṣu doṣa anupādadīmahi na ca asmābhiḥ anupāttān doṣān sūrayaḥ grahītum arhanti iti 
ŚVK_1.6	 samprati matsarāḥ nūnam dūṣayiṣyanti mad nibandhanam atas tad doṣa udbhāvanena śuśrūṣūṇām utsāha bhaṅgaḥ mā bhūt iti evam artham āha nirdoṣa tva iti prasiddha atiśayau api mokṣa svargau prati nāstikāḥ vivadante vadanti ca sukha duḥkhe laukike svarga narakau iti mokṣe ca sadbhāvataḥ prabhṛti vivādaḥ eke hi na asti mokṣaḥ iti vadanti anye punar sakala viṣaya uparāga rahitam saṃvedana pravāham apavargam āhuḥ anye tad uparamam apare sakala vaiśeṣika ātma guṇa uccheda lakṣaṇam niratiśayam aviṣaya pariṣvaṅga jam anavasānam ānanda sandoham apare ca pūrve ca bhrānti samutthaiḥ nānā vikalpaiḥ pāramārthika mokṣa svarūpam apalapanti eva iti 
ŚVK_1.7	 api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavaḥ mad nibandhane doṣān upalabhante tathā api aham anapavādyaḥ na hi aham svatantraḥ kiñcid abhidadhe āgama anusāriṇaḥ tu me yathāgamam vartamānasya skhalitam api daivāt avarjanīyatayā āpannam iti upekṣaṇīyam eva na hi kim api abhimatam vastu nirdoṣam bhavati doṣān tu samādhāya guṇāḥ upajīvitavyāḥ iti āha āgama iti satām hi mārgaḥ ayam āgama anusāraḥ nāma tat iha bahulam guṇāḥ eva doṣāḥ tu kathañcid santaḥ api alpa tvāt asat kalpāḥ iti upekṣitavyāḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.8–1.10	 kiñcāḥ tu tāvat asmādṛśānām kavi pravīrāṇām āgama anusāriṇyaḥ vācaḥ śobhante iti anyasya api śraddadhānasya trayī mārga anusāriṇī yathākathañcit ārabdhā kliṣṭā alpasārā api vāc vṛttiḥ śobhate asmākam tu bahu sārāḥ akleśa nirmitā śobhata itarām iti āha yathā iti nanu kim aṅga bhūtāyām mīmāṃsāyām vārttikam praṇīyate vedāḥ eva sākṣāt vyākhyāyantām atas āha mīmāṃsā iti vedāḥ eva saṃśaya pūrva uttara pakṣa krameṇa vyākhyāyamānāḥ manaḥ harantitarām na tu mantra brāhmaṇa bhāṣya prasthānena mīmāṃsayā eva tu te tathā avyākhyāyante iti tatra eva vārttikam kartum me tṛṣṇā vardhate iti nanu mīmāṃsāyām api cirantana nibandhanāni santi iti kim mudhā prayasyate atas āha prāyeṇa iti lokāyatam nāma nāstikānām tantram tad bhāvam āpāditāḥ nānāpasiddhānta saṅgraheṇa tām āstika pathe kartum ayam yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti āśaṃsāyām vartamāne arthe vā ktaḥ varṇanīyaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.11	 iti upoddhātaḥ sūtra tātparyam idāṇīm darśayati atha iti idam hi sūtram dharma ākhyam asya śāstrasya pratipādyatayā viṣaya bhūtam prayojanam vaktum kṛtam ādyam iti prayojana abhidhāna sthānam iti darśayati yadi api dharmaḥ asya prayojanam iti na kaṇṭhena uktam tathā api jijñāsā karma bhūtaḥ dharmaḥ iti ācakṣāṇena apuruṣa artha jñānasya aniṣṭa tvāt puruṣa arthībhūtaḥ dharmaḥ prayojanam iti sūcitam iti sūtram iti uktam kṛta padena ca kṛtrimam idam atas pramāṇa antareṇa guru kula vāsa avasāna nivṛtti param api vyākhyāyamānam na doṣam āvahati iti darśayati nityehi yāvat vacanam vācanikam pauruṣeyam tu pramāṇa antara balena anya artham api pratibhāsamānam anya para tayā pratipādyate iti 
ŚVK_1.12^1	 nanu kim prayojana abhidhānena śāstram eva praṇīyatām prayojana abhidhānam hi śāstrāt bahis bhūtam śāstram praṇetu kāmasya na yuktam kiñ ca asya prayojanam prayojana viśeṣāt śāstreṣu śuśrūṣu pravṛttiḥ iti ced tat na na hi prekṣāvatām puṃvacanāt evam ayam arthaḥ iti viśvāsaḥ yuktaḥ viśeṣataḥ hetu darśanāt anya artham api śāstram dharma prayojana tayā śrotṝn pravartayitum ayam āha iti śaṅkamānāḥ na aśvaseyuḥ atas manda phalam prayojana vacanam atas āha sarvasya iti yat anyat alpāyāsa sādhyam api kiñcid śāstram laukikam vaudana pāka ādi karma tat api anukta prayojanam na ādriyante kim punar mīmāṃsām iti yuktaḥ śāstra ārambhe prayojana nirdeśaḥ yat tu puṃvacanāt anāśvāsaḥ iti tat na āpta anāpta viśeṣāt 
ŚVK_1.12^2	 vakṣyati hi tat ced pratyayitāt iti bhāṣya kāraḥ jaiminiḥ ca api vā kāraṇa agrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran iti yat tu vipralipsamānaḥ brūtaḥ iti tat na na hi asya mahā ṛṣeḥ anṛta vacanam sambhavati na ca asya vipralambhe prayojanam kiñcid upalabhyate yadi śrotāraḥ pravartantām iti kim asya taiḥ aphale adharma phale vā dharma= chalena pravartitaiḥ pratyuta adharmaḥ eva asya śiṣyān bhrāmayataḥ mahān doṣaḥ āpadyeta na ca parama dhārmikaḥ adharmam ācarati iti utprekṣitum api śakyam na ca tantra kāraḥ tantra prayojane bhrāmyati iti sambhāvyate atas eva asambhavat bhrama vipralambha tvāt ṛṣīṇām aṣṭaka ādi smaraṇāni śruti mūlāni iti smṛti adhikaraṇe vakṣyate sarva puruṣa vacanā viśvāse punar tat api bhajyeta iti yuktam prayojana abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_1.13	 sarvasya eva iti kākvā mīmāṃsāyām viśeṣaḥ yaḥ antarṇītaḥ tam abhidyotayati mīmāṃsā ākhyā iti śāstra antarāṇi hi vācya eka viṣaya nibandhanā nivyākaraṇa ādīni mīmāṃsā ākhyā tu iyam vidyā bahūni vidyā antarāṇi veda tad aṅga ādīni upāya bhūtāni āśritā na hi asyāḥ taiḥ yathāvat avijñātaiḥ arthaḥ śakya nirṇayaḥ tat iyam upāyatas svarūpataḥ ca pracitā śrotṝṇām śravaṇa icchām api kārayitum anukta prayojanā satī na śakyā iti yuktam prayojana abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_1.14–15	 api ca vidyā antarāṇi anukta prayojanāni niṣprayojanāni manyamānā jijñāsavaḥ yadi nāma na jānīran manda śraddhayā vā pravartamānāḥ na samyak vidyuḥ tathā api tebhyaḥ ajñāta durjñātebhyaḥ anartha prāptiḥ tāvat na sambhavati mīmāṃsāyām tu iha ajñāte durjñāte vā pūrva uttara pakṣa nyāya mārge viveka abhāvāt pūrva pakṣam eva siddhāntam manyamānāḥ tad anurūpam ceṣṭeran tatra nitya naimittikayoḥ akaraṇāt asamyak karaṇāt vā mahāntam anartham prāpnuyuḥ iti yatnena upacaritavyā mīmāṃsā iti śloka dvayena āha vidyā antareṣu iti nanu tathā vidyā antara anabhijñe api duṣyati eva tathā hi vyākaraṇa anabhijñaḥ api tāvat yajñe apaśabdam prayuñjānaḥ pratyavaiti śrūyate hi tasmāt brāhmaṇena na mlecchitavyam mlecchaḥ ha vai eṣa yat apaśabdaḥ iti ucyate kaḥ vā āha na śāstra antara anabhijñāne api doṣaḥ bhavet iti alpa bhūyaḥ tve tu viśeṣaḥ mīmāṃsā hi sarva śāstra gata ajñāna sandeha viparyaya vyudāsa kṣama nyāya nibandhana ātmikā tat asyām ajñātāyām na kiñcid api jñātam bhavati atas mahāntam anartham prāpnoti atas eva āha mahān doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.16	 yatas ca yatnena upacaritavyā mīmāṃsā tasmāt yuktam sūtra kṛtām svayam prayojana abhidhānam iti āha tasmāt iti nanu tathā api pāṇi nineva bhāṣya kāra ādibhiḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ yatnaḥ kasmāt na jaimininā upekṣitaḥ atas āha yat iti yat tena jaimininā uktam tat eva bhāṣya kāra ādayaḥ katham nāma vadeyuḥ iti itarathā svacchandāḥ kaḥ vetti kīdṛś prayojanam abhidadhyuḥ iti tathā hi vyākaraṇe sūtra kṛta upekṣitam prayojanam anekadhā vyākhyātṛbhiḥ vikalpitam tathā hi prathamam sādhu śabda jñāne dharmaḥ iti abhidhāya punar śāstra pūrve prayoge abhyudaya iti uktam iti satyam evam yuktam tāvat prayojana abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_1.17–1.18	 atha etena prayojanena asya śāstrasya ayam sambandhaḥ iti api sūtrakārasya yuktam vaktum ajñāta prayojanam iva avidita sambandham api śrotum na ādriyante śiṣyāḥ tasmāt saha prayojanena asya sambandhaḥ vācyaḥ iti codayati siddhārtham iti pariharati śāstram iti yadā eva asya śāstrasya idam prayojanam iti uktam tadā eva tayoḥ upāya upeya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ arthāt uktaḥ eva na ca evam artha prāptam artham sūtra kārāḥ akṣaraiḥ nibadhnanti asūtra tva prasaṅgāt iti 
ŚVK_1.19	 nanu yadi nāma sūtrakāreṇa prayojanāt bhedena sambandhaḥ na upāttas vyākhyātṛbhiḥ tu vyajyatām kathite hi vyaktam sambandhe śrotāraḥ pravartante atas eva śāstra antareṣu api sambandhaḥ sphuṭam upadarśitaḥ tathā hi śiṣya praśna anantaram kaṇabhujā tantram praṇītam iti artha mālāyām uktam iti āha siddhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.20–1.21	 avispaṣṭīkṛte tu sambandhe vyākhyātṛbhiḥ asambaddha pralāpī sūtrakāraḥ iti śaṅkamānāḥ śrotāraḥ asaṅgatim eva śāstra prayojanayoḥ manvīran iti āha yāvat iti pariharati iha iti evam hi manyate tatra nāma vārttikakārāḥ kliśnanti yat na bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam iha tu bhāṣya kāreṇa eva dharmaḥ prasiddhaḥ vā syāt aprasiddhaḥ vā iti ākṣipya sambandhaḥ vakṣyate athavā artha vat ityādinā iti na pṛthak sambandhaḥ abhidhānīyaḥ sambandha bhāṣya vivaraṇaḥ eva tu yatitavyam iti 
ŚVK_1.22	 kaścid punar atra evam āha yathārvācīnā vyākhyātāraḥ na pṛthak sambandham abhidadhati tathā bhāṣya kārasya api sambandha vacanam ayuktam sūtra kāreṇa eva atha śabdam prayuñjānena adhyayana kriyā nantarya lakṣaṇasya śāstra sambandhasya ukta tvāt yathā atha atas dharmam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti śiṣya praśna anantaram śāstram praṇayāmaḥ iti kāśyapena uktam iti tam pratyāha na ca api iti adhyayana jñāna icchā kriyayoḥ hi ānantarya lakṣaṇam sambandham atha śabdaḥ vadati te ca kriye śāstrāt barhiḥ bhūte san= anta sāmānya mātreṇa jijñāsāmīmāṃsayoḥ aikyam manvānānām ayam bhramaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.23–24	 na param anupāttaḥ sambandhaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ ca iti āha yaḥ api iti dvayena kāṇāde hi tantre kriyā ānantarya rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ evam hi tatra bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam kaḥ dharmaḥ iti ādikān śiṣyeṇa udīritān pañca praśna an apekṣya āha atha atas dharmam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti guru parva krama ātmakaḥ ca sambandhaḥ yathā iha eva kaiścid uktaḥ brahmā maheśvaraḥ vā mīmāṃsām prajāpataye provāca prajāpatiḥ indrāya indraḥ ādityāya iti evamādi parvāṇi avacchedāḥ gurūṇām parvāṇi guru parvāṇi guru parvaṇām kramaḥ guru parva kramaḥ iti vigrahaḥ na ca atra dvividhaḥ hi ayam sambandhaḥ upayujyate na hi tasya sambandhasya tad rūpa sat asadbhāvayoḥ satoḥ śrotuḥ śāstre pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate śāstra viṣaye vā jñānaḥ iti vidhi niṣedhayoḥ kārye pravṛtti nivṛttī tābhyām te lakṣayati iti 
ŚVK_1.25	 yatas ayam sambandhaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ tasmāt ye sūtra vyākhyāna aṅgam sambandham abhidhitsanti taiḥ sa upapattikaḥ sa prayojanaḥ ca sambandhaḥ vācyaḥ yathā atra śābare bhāṣye kṛtam iti āha tasmāt iti śāstram avatāryate anena iti akartari ca kārake saṃjñāyām iti karaṇe ghan śāstra avatāraḥ ca asau sambandhaḥ ca iti śāstra avatāra sambandhaḥ sa ca upāya upeya lakṣaṇaḥ iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_1.26^1	 bhāṣyam idānīm anusandhatte loke iti nanu yatra eva bhāṣyam saṅgacchate saḥ eva arthaḥ vyākhyātum ucitaḥ katham ṣaṣ arthān sampracakṣate atas āha bhāṣya kāra anusāreṇa iti etat uktam bhavati sarvatra bhāṣyam saṅgacchate iti katham punar aneka artham ekam vākyam artha eka tvena hi eka vākyatām vakṣyati artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam iti atas āha prayuktasya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ puruṣa prayuktam idam vākyam puruṣāḥ tu pramāṇa antareṇa artham viditvā bahu abhiprāyam api ekam vākyam prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante yathā śvetaḥ dhāvati alambusānām yātā iti vaidike tu ayam niyamaḥ ekam eka artham iti yathāśabdam hi tatra arthe sampratyayaḥ pramāṇa antara abhāvāt tat uktam bahu abhiprāyam api ekam puruṣāḥ tu prayuñjate iti 
ŚVK_1.26^2	 nanu ca sānnidhānāt prathama sūtra gata atha śabda dūṣaṇam eva asya bhāṣyasya arthaḥ yuktaḥ katham sarva śāstra gata sūtra vyākhyāna aṅga tvam atas āha āditas iti evam hi manyate sarva ādau prayuktam idam vākyam atas sūtra samudāyasya eva idamāt imam sthānam iti na sthānataḥ viśeṣa lābhaḥ pratyuta sūtreṣu iti bahuvacana sāmrthya svarūpa liṅga anurodhena sarva sūtra viṣaya tvam eva spaṣṭam prakāśate iti nanu tatra loke ayam atha śabdaḥ ityādi bhāṣya eka vākyatā āpannasya bhāṣyasya atha śabda dūṣaṇa artha tvam eva spaṣṭam prakāśate na hi anyathā tat eka vākyatā upapadyate atas āha pṛthak iti yatna gauravam prasajyeta iti evam antasya tatra iti ādikāt pṛthakkṛtasya pañca vyākhyā vikalpāḥ bhavanti tad eka vākyatā āpannasya atha śabda dūṣaṇam eva arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.27–1.28	 ṣaṣ arthān idānīm sukha grahaṇa artham uddiśati sarva vyākhyā iti te ca yathāsvam avasare vakṣyante iti sarva vyākhyām tāvat vivṛṇoti sādhāraṇi iti bhāṣya kāreṇa hi dvidhā sūtra vyākhyā kṛtā ekā sarva arthāḥ yā iyam lokaḥ iti ādikāḥ pratisūtra gatā tu viśiṣṭāḥ samāsa vyāsābhyām hi viduṣām arthau adhāraṇam iṣṭim iti 
ŚVK_1.29^1	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa loke yeṣu artheṣu prasiddhāni padāni tāni sati sambhave tad arthāni eva sūtreṣu iti avagantavyam iti pravṛttiḥ upadarśitā tathā na adhyāhāra ādibhiḥ ityādinā nivṛttiḥ tat iha pravṛtti nivṛttī tāvat svarūpataḥ darśite pravṛtti purassarī ca nivṛttiḥ tathā prasiddhāni padānīti padāni agre abhidhāya tad arthāni eva sūtreṣu iti paścāt sūtrāṇi darśitāni tat iha sarvatra vārttikakāraḥ pada vinyāsa viśeṣeṇa tātparyam āha pravṛttiḥ iti pravṛtti nivṛttī śabdau prayuñjānaḥ dvidhā eva pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām sūtrāṇi pravartante iti bhāṣya kṛta uktam iti darśayati tayoḥ ca krama viśeṣeṇa bhāṣya kārasya api pravṛtti pūrvikā nivṛttiḥ vyutpādya iti darśayati 
ŚVK_1.29^2	 tathā pada sūtrayoḥ paurvāparya vivakṣayā bhāṣya kārasya api padārtha pūrvakaḥ vākya arthaḥ abhimataḥ iti sūcayati tat ayam arthaḥ yā iyam prasiddha artha grahaṇam kartavyam iti pravṛttiḥ sā teṣu padeṣu prasiddha arthaḥ grahītavyaḥ iti yāvat yā ca vākya doṣāṇām adhyāhāra ādīnā nivṛttiḥ sā sūtreṣu na eṣām adhyāhāra ādibhiḥ artha varṇanam kāryam iti atra bhāṣyam sati sambhavaḥ iti tasya artham āha veda vākya aviruddheṣu iti veda vākya aviruddheṣu padeṣu sūtreṣu ca prasiddha artha grahaṇa pravṛttiḥ adhyāhāra ādi nivṛttiḥ ca na tu sarveṣu viruddheṣu api keṣucid padeṣu sūtreṣu ca tatra viparīte pravṛtti nivṛttī tat idam sati sambhavaḥ iti anena uktam evam veda avirodha sambhave kāryam idam na anyathā iti 
ŚVK_1.30^1	 nanu yuktam tāvat padeṣu pravṛttiḥ iti katham sūtra saṃśrayā nivṛttiḥ yāvatā padāni eva tu pradhāna tayā prakṛtāni eṣām iti sarva nāmnā parāmarśam arhanti pradhāna gocara tayā vyutpatteḥ na hi eṣa daṇḍaḥ iṣṭakā kūṭe tiṣṭhati praharānena iti ukte iṣṭakā kūṭena iti gamyate api tarhi daṇḍena iti daṇḍa viśeṣaṇa tayā upātta tvāt iṣṭakā kūṭasya tadvat iha api pada viśeṣāni sūtrāṇi na parāmarśa arhāṇi iti atas āha adhyāhārasya iti ayam arthaḥ yatra adhyāhāra ādayaḥ prasajanti tatra eva niṣedham arhanti prāpti pūrvaka tvāt prati ṣedhasya na ca iha tau padeṣu sambhavataḥ adhyāhāraḥ nāma nyūna vākya pūraṇa samartha adhika pada āharaṇa ātmakaḥ sa ca na padeṣu sambhavati apabhraṃśa tvena nyūna pada prayoga asambhavāt vyatyāsaḥ hi vyavahita kalpanā sā ca anyatra sthitasya anyatra sañcāraḥ na ca asau niyata paurvāparya prakṛti pratyaya ātmake pade sambhavati pada nāśa prasaṅgāt 
ŚVK_1.30^2	 atas sūtrāṇi eva sambhavat adhi āhāra ādikā nieṣām iti sarva nāmnā parāmarśam arhanti nanu vipariṇāma guṇa kalpane pada dharmau eva pade hi prakṛtiḥ pratyayaḥ vā vipariṇamati yathā pratigṛhṇīyāt iti pratigrāhayet iti bhavati viprakarṣaḥ iti ca viprakarṣāt iti bhavati guṇa kalpanā api pada gocarāḥ sā yathā autpattika ādi padeṣu vakṣyate vākyeṣu tu na anayoḥ sambhavaḥ na hi pada samudāyaḥ vipariṇamati na ca gauṇaḥ bhavati atas na pada sūtrayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ ucyate vākyam hi nāma na padebhyaḥ vyatiriktam anyat eva kim api tattvam api tarhi padāni eva eka kārya pariṣvaṅga samāsādita samanvayāni tat iha yuktam yat pada dharmaḥ api anveti iti atas prasajataḥ pada dvāreṇa vākyeṣu vipariṇāma guṇa kalpane iti pratiṣedha ādhāra tva upapattiḥ vākya dharmayoḥ tu pada mātre na kathañcid prasaktiḥ iti na tad niṣedhaḥ yuktaḥ tasmāt yuktam adhyāhāra ādi niṣedha artham eṣām iti sarva nāmnā sūtrāṇām abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_1.31^1	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa sarva vyākhyā prayojanam abhidadhata uktam evam veda vākyāni eva ebhiḥ vicāryante iti tasya arthaḥ sādhāraṇa vyākhyayā eva sūtrāṇām vyākhyāta tvāt na punar tāni vyākhyeyāni veda vākyāni eva taiḥ parijñāta arthaiḥ vyākhātavyāni iti tat ayuktam uktam hi sādhāraṇī viśiṣṭā ca sūtra vyākhyā dvidhā kṛtā iti atas viśiṣṭa vyākhyayā api sūtrāṇām spṛśyamāna tvāt katham veda vākyāni eva iti avadhāraṇa upapattiḥ iti atas āha eva śabdaḥ iti yatna gaurava parihāra arthaḥ hi viśeṣa vyākhyā pratyādeśaḥ gauravam ca pada= cheda ādi prapañcena tārkika vat kriyamāṇāyām vyākhyāyām āpadyate na ca iha tathā kariṣyate atas alpasya viśeṣasya sūtra gatasya vācya tvāt avadhāraṇam kṛtam iti adoṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.31^2	 aparam api itarathāḥ yatna gauravam prasajyeta iti bhāṣyam tasya ayam arthaḥ veda vākyāni eva tāvat vyākhyeyāni yadi tu idam vyākhyānam vedasūtra ubhaya gocara tayā varṇyate tatas yatna gauravam āpadyate iti tat āha asya iti bhāṣyam vyācakṣāṇaḥ vyākhyeyāḥ iti atas prakṛtam vyākhyānam asya iti parāmṛśati yadi iha vedāḥ ca sūtrāṇi ca vyākhyāyante tatas vyākhyāna āvṛttau yatna gauravam prasajyeta dravya bhede api hi kriyā vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā aṣṭa kṛtvas brāhmaṇāḥ bhuktavantaḥ iti atra codayati prasiddhā iti svatas siddham eva hi avirodhe prasiddha artha grahaṇam adhyāhāra ādi varjanam ca kim anena uktena iti pariharati na doṣaḥ iti na hi veda vat aprāpta viṣayam bhāṣyam iti 
ŚVK_1.32	 tathā api anukta su jñānasya arthasya punarvacanam prayojana apekṣam iva dṛśyate iti manvānam prati prayojanam āha vyākhyā aṅga tva iti yaḥ nāma tantra antare adhyāhāra ādi sva paribhāṣā vā guṇa vṛddhi ādikā dṛṣṭā iti atra api tat prayojayati tasya kṛte śāstra svarūpam anena nirūpyate adhyāhāra ādi varjitam eva vyākhyānam mīmāṃsāyām upapannam iti 
ŚVK_1.33	 yasya tu manda phala tvāt evam api aparitoṣaḥ tam pratyanyathā varṇayati vṛtti antareṣu iti keṣāñcid dhi bhavat āsa ādīnām vṛtti antareṣu śabdānām alaukikaḥ arthaḥ upavarṇitaḥ te anena bhāṣyeṇa upālabhyante yāvat dhi pūrva grantha doṣa udbhāvanena sva grantha guṇavattā khyāpanena vā viśeṣaḥ na pradarśyate tāvat na śrotāraḥ śrotum ādriyeran ati uta pūrva granthān eva ayam alpa antaram corayati iti vadadbhiḥ asūyakaiḥ śuśrūṣūṇām utsāha bhaṅgaḥ yujyeta atas prayojanavān eva para upālambhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.34	 kva punarbhava dāsena alaukika artha grahaṇam kṛtam yat evam upālabhyate atas āha atha atas iti śabda arthau iha lokyate iti vṛddha vyavahāraḥ lokaḥ tatra pṛthak pada tvam eva atha atas śabdayoḥ dṛṣṭam yathā bhuktavān ayam atha vrajati iti na bhukta vān atas na vrajati iti na tu anayoḥ ānantarya mātre dṛṣṭa caraḥ saṃsargaḥ yaḥ api ca atha atas śeṣa lakṣaṇam atha atas agnim agniṣṭomena anuyajati iti saṃsargaḥ tatra api kevalātas śabda vedanīyam eva ānantaryam bhava dāsena ca uktam atha atas iti ayam śabdaḥ ānantarye prayujyate iti tena asya pada samudāyasya tādarthyam na ṛte paribhāṣā ādibhiḥ sidhyati iti ādi śabdena paraiḥ saṅgānam lakṣaṇām ca aha iti 
ŚVK_1.35	 atra idānīm bhāṣyam yojayati prasiddhā iti bhava dāsena hi atas śabdasya hetu artha tvam prasiddham apalapitam aprasiddha anantari a gocara tvam ca kalpitam idam ca sati prasiddha artha sambhave na vṛtti kāreṇa kāryam iti lokaḥ ityādi granthena uktam sambhavati ca atra prasiddha artha grahaṇam na hi atra pāṇininā iva jaimininā vṛddhiḥ ādait iti vat sva saṃjñā praṇītā tat idam sati sambhavaḥ iti anena uktam iti veditavyam kim hi prasiddhena aparāddham yat svarasa siddham ullaṅghya aprasiddhaḥ arthaḥ kalpyate iti 
ŚVK_1.36	 api ca evam satya prasiddha kalpiteṣu sūtra padārtheṣu vyākhyāyamāneṣu punar ca veda vākyeṣu yatna gauravam prasajyate iti itaratha iti ādikena uktam iti āha sūtra arthe kliśyate iti sva manīṣā kalpiteṣu sūtra padārtheṣu vyākhyāyamāneṣu punar ca veda vākyeṣu vaktuḥ granthakārasya grantha sandarbha praṇayanena vyākhyātuḥ ca tad vyākhyānena śrotuḥ ca mahataḥ granthasya śravaṇa dhāraṇābhyām mahān yatnaḥ āpadyate iti 
ŚVK_1.37	 yaḥ tu manyate guṇavattara grantha nirmāṇe śravaṇāt eva śrotāraḥ śrotum ādriyante kim guṇa gaṇa hāriṇā daurjanyena iti tam pratyartha antaram avatārayati na vyākhyāsyati iti eṣa hi bhāṣya kāraḥ sūtra uccāraṇa anantaram veda vākyāni udāhṛtya saṃśaya pūrva uttara pakṣa vibhāgena artha nirṇaye yatnam kariṣyati na sūtra avayava vivaraṇa ādaram tatra śrotṝṇām āśaṅkā jāyeta kim svid ayam ajña tayā sūtrāṇi upekṣitavān āhosvit anarthaka tvāt uta prasiddha tvāt iti tat ayam akuśalaḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ yat sūtreṣu bhāṣyam kartum abhipravṛttaḥ tāni upekṣitavān iti imam doṣam vyākhyā pratyākhyānena pariharati na vayam anabhijñāḥ na ca etāni sūtrāṇi anarthakāni codanā artha paratantra tvāt na vyākhyeyāni iti upekṣitāni iti 
ŚVK_1.38–39^1	 kim punar codanā artha paratantra tve kāraṇam atas āha prayāsaḥ iti kim punar sūtreṣu na prayasyate atas āha phalavat tva iti tavya untena phalavanti hi veda vākyāni phalavat kratu pramiti pratyāsatteḥ aphalāni sūtrāṇi teṣām anāsatteḥ atas eva ca sūtraiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ codanā arthaḥ eva upetavyaḥ na punar upāya bhūtāni sūtrāṇi upekṣitavyāni tat idam veda vākyāni eva ebhiḥ iti bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam iti veditavyam iha hi veda vākyānām prādhānyam upadiśati yat pradhāna vibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati vicāryante iti sūtrāṇi karaṇa vibhaktyā tṛtīyaya ebhiḥ iti nanu mā nāma sākṣāt aphala tvāt kevalāni sūtrāṇi vyākhyāyantām 
ŚVK_1.38–39^2	 ubhayam tu vyākhyāyatām sūtrāṇi ca taiḥ ca veda vākyāni iti atas āha na ubhayam iti ubhaya vyākhyāyām mudhā yatna gauravam āpadyate iti idam tu itaratha iti ādikena utatam iti veditavyam nanu satyam yatna gauravam na tu mudhā na hi avyākhyātaḥ sūtra arthaḥ jñāyate na ca tad anabhijñaḥ veda artham jñātum īṣṭe tad upāya tvāt tasya atas āha padārthānām iti evam hi manyate satyam veda artha jñāna upāya bhūtāni sūtrāṇi na tu tāni avyākhyāta durjñāta arthāni padārthāḥ tāvat loka prasiddhāḥ eva tad prasiddhyā eva ca tad pūrvakaḥ vākya arthaḥ api prasiddhaḥ eva iti na kiñcid vyākhyeyam avaśiṣyate iti 
ŚVK_1.40	 atra ca pakṣe bhāṣyam saṅgacchata itarām iti āha evaṃśabda ādikaḥ iti sarva vyākhyāyām hi viśeṣa vyākhyāyāḥ alpa tvāt asattvam upacaritam iha tu sarvathā eva sūtra vyākhyā pratyākhyāyate iti avadhāraṇa yatna gaurava parihārayoḥ ubhayoḥ upapattiḥ iti pakṣa antara abhidhitsayā idānīm imam api pakṣam dūṣayati pada= cheda ādi iti yatas pada= cheda ādi na karoti tasmāt na ayam abhinavaḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ sūtra artham vijānīte iti bhava dāsa tantra upajīvibhiḥ eva etat pratyākhyāpitam bubhutsu jana utsāham apahantum iti 
ŚVK_1.41–42^1	 paramārthataḥ tu sūtrāṇām tātparyam bravīti eva nyūna adhika ādi pratyavekṣaṇam ca tatra tatra karoti eva iti āha bravīti eva iti kva punar atiriktāt i īkṣate atas āha nanu aśaktam iti codanā sūtraḥ eva tāvat nanu aśaktam idam sūtram imau arthau abhivaditum codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ na indriya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ ca dharmaḥ na anarthaḥ iti ubhaya vivakṣāyām vākya bhedaḥ āpadyate iti paricodya tat tu vaidikeṣu na sūtreṣu iti parihariṣyati tathā yajuḥ lakṣaṇa anantaram kiyat ekam yajuḥ iti yajuḥ parimāṇa jñāpana artham uktam artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam sa ākāṅkṣam ced vibhāge syāt iti 
ŚVK_1.41–42^2	 asya arthaḥ yāvanti padāni eka prayojanāni pravibhajyamānāni sa ākāṅkṣāṇi ca tāvanti ekam vākyam iti udāharaṇam tu devasya tvā savituḥ prasavaḥ iti mantraḥ atra hi sakala savitrādi viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa eka pradhāna bhūta nirvāpa prakāśanam prayojanam sarvāṇi ca devasya tvā ityādīni nirvapāmi iti atas vibhaktāni santi sa ākāṅkṣāṇi iti devasya tvā iti upakramya nirvapāmi iti antam ekam vākyam iti sthiteavayava prayojana abhidhitsayā bhāṣya kāreṇa pṛṣṭam atha kim artham ubhayam sūtritam ayam artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam iti vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam iti ca iti 
ŚVK_1.41–42^3	 tatra prayojanam uktam bhavati hi kiñcid eka artham na tu vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam yathā bhagaḥ vām vibhajatu pūṣā vām vibhajatu aryamā vām vibhajatu ityādi atra hi eka vibhāgam abhivadantaḥ sarve eka arthāḥ santaḥ api nānā vākya tvam pratipannāḥ asati tu vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam iti viśeṣaṇe eka artha tā mātreṇa eva sarveṣām aikamantryam āpadyate iti tathā vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam iti etāvatī ucyamāne syonam te sadanam karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā su śevam kalpayāmi iti tasmin sīdā amṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇām medha sumanasyamānaḥ iti anayoḥ eka vākyatā vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt āpadyate tasmin sīdā iti vibhaktam sat sākāṅkṣam tad vṛttasya pūrva prakṛta parāmarśa ātmanaḥ tena vinā anupapatteḥ sati api ca vibhakta sā kāṅkṣa tve prayojana bhedāt vākya bhedaḥ dve hi tatra prayojane pūrvasya sadana karaṇam uttarasya puroḍāśa pratiṣṭhāpanam evam ubhayoḥ prayojanam uktvā ante upasaṃhṛtam tasmāt samyak sūtritam iti tathā viśaye prāya darśanāt iti sūtram 
ŚVK_1.41–42^4	 tatra udāharaṇa aparijñānāt agamakam sūtram iti uktam iha hi saṃśaye prāya darśanam hetuḥ nirdiśyate tatra na vidmaḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ kutra vā saṃśayaḥ kasyām pratijñāyām prāya darśanam hetuḥ iti evam ākṣipya vṛtti kāra matena samāhitam vṛtti kāreṇa hi vatsam ālabheta vatsa nikāntā hi paśavaḥ iti udāhṛtya vicāritam kim yāga codanā iyam uta ālambha mātram vatsa saṃskāraḥ iti tat iha mandā śaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham sāmānyatodṛṣṭena pūrva pakṣitam ālabhatiḥ kila prāṇi dravya saṃyuktaḥ yāga saṅgataḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tat ayam api prāṇi dravya saṃyogāt yajimān iti bhavati manda āśaṅkā tām apanetum idam uktam viśaye prāya darśanāt iti asya arthaḥ vatsa saṃskāraiḥ samabhivyāhṛtaḥ ayam ālabhatiḥ tat ayam api sāhacaryāt vatsa saṃskāraḥ eva iti bhavati matiḥ yathā agrya prāye likhitaḥ agryaḥ iti nanu liṅgam idam liṅgam ca pramāṇa prāptam abhidyotayati na tu prāpayati tat kutas prāptasya idam liṅgam iti vaktavyam ucyate na tāvat iha somena yajeta iti vat yāgaḥ pratyakṣaḥ 
ŚVK_1.41–42^5	 na ca daikṣa paśu ādi vat anumīyate tatra hi dravya devatā sambandhāni atha anupapattiḥ yāga avagame hetuḥ iha tu na dravyam devatā saṃyuktam upalabhāmahe dravya mātra śruteḥ atas dṛṣṭa arthaḥ eva ayam vatsa saṃskāraḥ ālambhaḥ sa hi ālabhyamānaḥ gām prastāvayiṣyati iti bahu evan jātīyakam bhāṣya kāreṇa vyākhyātam iti ūhanīyam atas sūtra vyākhyā pratyākhyāne sakalam evamādi bhāṣya kārasya viruddham āpadyate iti yat tu pratyākhyāne kāraṇam uktam upāya bhūtāni veda artha jñāne sūtrāṇi atas kim ebhiḥ vyākhyātaiḥ upeyaḥ eva tu veda arthaḥ ebhiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ iti tat dūṣayati na ca iti yatas eva ca tāni upāya bhūtāni atas eva sutarām vyākhyeyāni na hi upāya anabhijñaḥ upeyam avadhāra yutum alam nanu ca tāni api vyākhyāyamānāni sādhyāni bhaveyuḥ na ca asiddham asiddhena eva sādhyate ucyate asiddham api sādhanam anya sādhitam kārye vyāpāryate yathā dravya devatā upapāditaḥ yāgaḥ phala bhāvanāyām yathā ca anyatara asiddhāni sādhanāni sādhana antara siddha anisādhyam sādhayanti eva iti 
ŚVK_1.42cd	 satyam upāya anabhijñasya upeya avadhāraṇā na asti upāya antarāt eva tu vidita veda arthasya kim sūtra vyākhyayā atas āha na anyatas iti ye hi anyatas eva vidita veda arthāḥ teṣām arthe na etāni sūtrāṇi jaimininā praṇītāni bhāṣya kāreṇa ca vyākhyātāni anyatas anabhijñān tu prati sūtrāṇi praṇītāni bhāṣya kāreṇa ca vyākhyātāni na ca te avyākhyātam eva sūtra artham unnayanti na ca anirṇīta sūtra arthāḥ veda artham avadhārayanti iti yuktaḥ tad arthaḥ vyākhyā prayāsaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.43	 yat uktam padārthānām prasiddha tvāt iti tat nirācaṣṭe pratyākhyānasya iti prasiddha padārthaka tvam hi veda vākyānām api avyākhyeya tvam āpādayati teṣu api hi loka prasiddhāni eva padāni padārthāḥ ca vakṣyati hi yaḥ eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaikikāḥ te eva teṣām arthaḥ iti tat idam uktam tulya artha tvāt iti tulyāḥ hi loka veda sūtreṣu api padārthāḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.44–1.45	 atha evam ucyate yat api veda vākyeṣu prasiddhāḥ eva padārthāḥ tathā api vākya artheṣu vacana vyakti viśeṣān avadhāraṇāt yathāyatham saṃśayāḥ samupanipatanti iti tad nirāsāya tatra vyākhyānam pravartate iti tat sūtreṣu api samānam iti tad vyākhyā pratyākhyānam ayuktam iti āha vākya arthaḥ iti api ca ayam bhāṣya kāraḥ sūtra vyākhyām pratyācakṣāṇaḥ spaṣṭam eva na vyākhyeyāni iti ācakṣīta etāvatā eva pratyākhyāne sidhyati yat ayam adhyāhāra ādi doṣa duṣṭa vyākhyā niṣedham karoti tat avagamyate doṣa apetā tu vyākhyānena na nivāryate iti āha na vyākhyātavyam iti 
ŚVK_1.46	 tat evam asya pratyākhyāna pakṣasya dṛṣṭa vyākhyā viruddha tvāt pūrvayoḥ ca sarva vyākhyā upālambhayoḥ phalgu tvāt anatiprayojana tvāt madhyamasya upālambhasya viśeṣataḥ daurjanya āpādanāt nyāya ābhāsa prāpta veda vākyān yathā karaṇa nirākaraṇena mahā phalā anukta durjñānā ca parisaṃkhyā eva asya bhāṣyasya arthaḥ iti āha asya iti 
ŚVK_1.47–48^1	 parisaṃkhyā viṣayam tāvat āha vaidikam iti arthe antena veda vākya vyākhyāna arthāni hi sūtrāṇi tat imāni prāyeṇa yathā śruta gṛhītāni api veda vākya artha nirṇaya samartha nyāya kalāpam samarpayanti eva kvacid eva teṣām pratīghāta ubhavati tat yatra veda sūtrayoḥ yathā śruta gṛhītayoḥ paraspara virodhaḥ bhavati tad viṣayā parisaṃkhyā iti evam avagate viṣaye svarūpam āha tatra itinā iyam antena virodha viṣaye api hi svarasataḥ yathā śruta gṛhīta sūtra grahaṇam prasaktam anayā vāryate yat idam prasiddha artha grahaṇa madhyāhāra ādi varjanam ca tat veda avirodhe 
ŚVK_1.47–48^2	 virodhe tu sūtra madhyāhāra ādibhiḥ vyākhyeyam vaidikam eva vākyam yathāśrutam na iyam iti idam atra upadiśyate iti atha kim sarvadā eva veda vākyam yathāśrutam na iyam na iti āha virodhaḥ iti yatra hi veda vākyayoḥ eva anyonyam virodhaḥ bhavati tatra tayoḥ ekamadhyāhāra ādibhiḥ nīyate eva yathā upakrama avagata dātṛ śruti virodhāt upasaṃhāra sthā pratigṛhītṛ śrutiḥ dātṛ gocarā darśitāḥ evam hi uktam yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhṇīyāt iti pratigrāhayet iti idam tu vipariṇāma udāharaṇam adhyāhāra ādayaḥ tu veda vākye vistara bhayāt na prapañcitāḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.49–50^1	 nanu ca ubhayatra prāptau parisaṃkhyā bhavati yathā uktam tatra ca anyatram ca prāptau parisaṃkhyā iti kīryateiti na ca iha virodha avirodhayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yathā śruta sūtra grahaṇam prasaktam na hi jātu pradhānān anuguṇam guṇam yathārtham upādāya pradhānam anyathā nīyate iti sambhavati api ca nityam veda vākyam anityam sūtram atas api ca na asya tena saha spardhā yuktāḥ tena veda virodhe yathā śruta sūtra grahaṇam na prasaktam iti kim tad nivṛtti arthayā parisaṅkhyayā iti atas āha yathā iti evam hi manyate satyam ayam nyāyaḥ yat veda virodhe sūtram anyathā kriyate iti 
ŚVK_1.49–50^2	 nyāya ābhāsena tu bhrāmyataḥ prati bhāṣya kāraḥ lokaḥ ityādi bhāṣyeṇa parisañcaṣṭe evam hi bhrāntāḥ śrotāroman vīran na sūtraiḥ saha veda vākyānām kaścid viśeṣaḥ yathā hi vedaḥ dharme pramāṇam evam veda artha nirṇayaḥ api na ṛte sūtrebhyaḥ sidhyati iti na asmān prati vedasūtrayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti na ca vedasūtra vākyānām anyaḥ svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ laukikāḥ tāvat pada padārthāḥ ubhayatra tulyāḥ vākyam api ākāṅkṣita yogya sannihita pada samanvaya ātmakam ubhayam vaidikam jaiminīyam ca na hi tayoḥ anyatarat api adhyāhāra ādikam apekṣate tat etat āha vākya sāmarthya iti 
ŚVK_1.51	 nanu na viruddha artham ubhayam sambhāvayitum śakyate atas anyatarat anyāyyam iti sthite guṇa tvāt sūtram anyathā kāryam iti prāk uktam atas āha asambhavāt iti vicitra āśayāḥ hi jijñāsavaḥ atas te kadācid pradhāna guṇa gocaram bala abalam jānantaḥ veda anurodhena sūtram anyathā nayanti kadācid udbhūta ācārya gauravāḥ evam ālocayanti katham hi nyāya sahasra vid jaiminiḥ asmad ādi gocarām anupapattim na akalayati iti sambhāvayāmaḥ yayā eva tu tena vyākhyātam tathā eva śruti arthaḥ yuktaḥ anyathā eka śruti anurodhena bahu śruti vināśaḥ eva āpadyate iti tat evam ālocanā bhedāt vikalpaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.52	 athavā sama sāmarthyayoḥ ubhayoḥ vikalpaḥ bhavati iha punar veda artha nirūpaṇa avasthāyām sūtrāṇi prathamam upanipatanti tāni anupajāta virodhīni tāvat yathā aśruta grāhyāṇi āpatanti taiḥ ca prāthamyena avaruddha buddhiḥ śrotā jaghanya sthāna upanipātinīm eva codanām bādheta mukhya anurodhena hi jaghanya bādhaḥ vakṣyate mukhyam vā pūrva codanāt loka vat iti tat āha prāthamyena iti nyāyyām iti parisaṃkhyāyāḥ prayojanam sūcayati asatyām hi parisaṅkhyāyām nyāya ābhāsena nyāyya codanā bādhaḥ prasajyeta katham punar nyāyyā codanā ucyate guṇa bhūtāni sūtrāṇi pradhāna bhūta aniveda vākyāni tad vyākhyāna arthāni hi tāni na ca guṇa anurodhena pradhānam anyathākartum ucitam pradhānam aviguṇam katham nirvartyeta iti hi guṇāḥ kriyante pradhāna vaiguṇye tu kim guṇaiḥ atas eva vakṣyati aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt iti eṣa ca nyāyaḥ pūrvasya mukhya anugraha nyāyasya apavādakaḥ atas eva mukhya dīkṣā kāla bādhaḥ pradhāna kāla anurodhena darśitaḥ uktam hi parvaṇi dīkṣā parvaṇi sutyā iti atas sūktam nyāyyām iti 
ŚVK_1.53^1	 evam vikalpa niyamābhyām ubhayatra prāptyā parisaṃkhyām prasādhya atra eva bhāṣyam yojayati tena iti veda avirodha grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham nyāya avirodham api upalakṣayati tat ayam arthaḥ yat idam prasiddha artha grahaṇam adhyāhāra ādi varjanam ca tad ucita prāptam anūdya satya virodha sambhavaḥ iti vidhīyate iti nanu ca atra api pakṣe trayaḥ doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti tathā hi sati sambhavaḥ iti vidhi mukhena pravartamānasya na āsati iti anya niṣedha artha tā vaktavyā tatra sva artha hāniḥ asva artha kalpanācā āpadyate tathā virodha avirodhayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yathā śruta sūtra grahaṇam prāptam tat bādhyate tatra prāpta bādhaḥ atas kena viśeṣeṇa iyam parisaṃkhā prastutā iti ucyate 
ŚVK_1.53^2	 yadi sati ca asati ca virodhe yathā śruta sūtra grahaṇam kāryam iti sāmānya vacanam abhaviṣyat tatas doṣatrayam paryahariṣyat yadā tu nyāya ābhāsena sāmānya vacanam kalpayitum abhipravṛttaḥ sati sambhavaḥ iti pratyakṣa upadeśam paśyati tadā sāmānya vacanam alabdha ātmakam eva iti na prāpta bādha ādi doṣatraya prasaṅgaḥ aprāpta vidhiḥ eva tadā sati sambhavaḥ iti vinā api vidhinā prāpsyataḥ kim vidhinā iti prayojana ālocanāyām anya nivṛttiḥ phalam vijñāyate paramārthataḥ tu aprāpta vidhiḥ eva ayam yathā raśanā mantre vakṣyati aprāpta vidhiḥ eva ayam atas mantrasya niścayaḥ parisaṃkhyā phalena ukta aiti tat idam vidhīyate arthaḥ iti anena uktam iti veditavyam iti 
ŚVK_1.54^1	 idānīm virodha viṣaye adhyāhāra ādi kalpanām sūtreṣu udāharaṇaiḥ darśayiṣyan adhyāhāra udāharaṇam tāvat āha śeṣabhājām iti vakṣyati hi jaiminiḥ api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt iti atra hi śeṣa kārya aṇīḍā prāśitra ādīni udāhṛtya vicārayiṣyate yadi eṣām arthena gṛhītasya haviṣaḥ daivāt apacāraḥ bhavati kim tadā haviḥ antaram āgamayitavyam śeṣāt vā avadeyam karma lopaḥ vā iti tatra uktam api vā śeṣa bhājā syāt iti na ca anena pūrva pakṣaḥ gṛhyate api vā śabda sambandhāt na ca siddhāntaḥ pūrva pakṣa abhāvāt api ca anantara adhikaraṇe pradhāna artha avat tahaviḥ nāśe śeṣāt avadānena pūrva pakṣam parigṛhya siddhāntitam nirdeśāt vā anyat āgamayet iti 
ŚVK_1.54^2	 dravya antara upādānena tat yadi dravya antara āgamaḥ eva ānantaryāt atra anuṣajyate tatas nyāya antara virodhaḥ āpadyate śeṣa kāryāṇām eka deśa dravyaḥ ca utpattau vidyamāna saṃyogāt iti anena adhikaraṇena aprayojaka tvasya sthita tvāt atha uttara pakṣa atikrameṇa śeṣāt avadānam śeṣabhājām arthena syāt iti sambandhaḥ tat api ayuktam śeṣasya pratipatti antara sambandhāt naṣṭa avayava pratipatti sambandha abhāvāt ca tena utsūtram eva dravya antara āgamena pūrva pakṣam parigṛhya rāddha antitam api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt lopaḥ iti lopa pada adhyāhāram darśayiṣyati tat eṣa sūtra arthaḥ bhavati śeṣam bhajante yānīḍā prāśitra ādīni teṣām dravya antara prayukti śakteḥ abhāvāt vidyamāna śeṣasya pratipatti antara sambandhāt lopaḥ akaraṇam eva syāt iti 
ŚVK_1.55A^1	 vipariṇāmam udāharati viprakarṣāt iti asti hi savanīyaḥ paśuḥ āśvinam graham gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya āgneyam savanīyam paśum upākaroti iti anusavanam savanīyāḥ puroḍāśāḥ nirupyante iti santi ca savanīyāḥ paśu puroḍāśāḥ tatra tantriṇaḥ dharmāḥ prasaṅginaḥ upakurvanti iti sthite paśu tantra madhya pāti tvam puroḍāśānām pratipādayitum sūtram paśoḥ ca viprakarṣaḥ tantra madhyevidhānāt iti tat ca etat yathāśruta gṛhītam na vivakṣita artha ākhyānakṣamam viprakarṣaḥ hi atra prathama antaḥ sādhya bhūtaḥ avagamyate tantra madhye vidhānāt iti pañcamī antam hetu bhūtam tat ca ayuktam viprakarṣaḥ hi paśoḥ prātarādi kāla traya sambandhaḥ sa ca pratyakṣa vacana siddhaḥ na sādhyaḥ evam hi śrūyate vapayā prātassavane caranti puroḍāśena mādhyandine savane aṅgaiḥ tṛtīyasavane iti tantra madhya vidhānam api sādhyam na hetu nirdeśa arham atas prathamāpañcamyoḥ vipariṇāmaḥ vakṣyate paśoḥ viprakarṣāt prātarādi kāla traya vyāpi tvāt puroḍāśānām paśu tantra madhye vidhānam 
ŚVK_1.55A^2	 paśuḥ hi puroḍāśa kālam api vyāpnoti puroḍāśāḥ tu sva savana samāpteḥ avyāpakāḥ atas paśu tantra madhya patitāḥ puroḍāśāḥ iti paśu artham anuṣṭhānam puroḍāśeṣu prasajyate iti idam ca vārttikakāreṇa vipariṇatam eva udāhṛtam viprakarṣāt iti vyavahita kalpanām udāharati padena iti veda adhikaraṇe hi evam vakṣyati pada saṅghāta ātmānaḥ vedāḥ pada saṅghātāḥ ca puruṣa kṛtāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā nīlotpala vana ādi artha viṣayāḥ atas ete api kṛtrimāḥ iti tad viśeṣa pradarśana artham ca idam sūtram loke sat niyamāt prayoga sannikarṣaḥ syāt iti atra ca sat niyamāt iti pada vyavahitaḥ prayoga śabdaḥ lokaḥ iti asya anantaram sambandhanīyaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ loke śabda prayogaḥ sat niyamaḥ samyak nibandhana ātmakaḥ yuktaḥ arthasya cakṣuḥ ādi sannikarṣāt na tu vede atīndriya artha tvāt iti idam ca vipariṇāma vyavahita kalpanayoḥ sādhāraṇam api udāharaṇam vipariṇāmasya ukta tvāt vyavadhāna mātra udāharaṇa tvena uktam iti veditavyam iti 
ŚVK_1.55B^1	 sūtra vyavadhānam udāharati sūtreṇa iti idam hi samāmanānte somendram carum nirvapet śyāmakam soma vāminaḥ iti tatra sandehaḥ kim laukike soma vamane soma indraḥ caruḥ uta vaidikaḥ iti tatra pāna vyāpad ca tadvat iti aśva pratigraha iṣṭi vākya gata ādi avicāra pūrva pakṣa atideśaḥ kṛtaḥ tatra yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataḥ vāruṇān catuṣkapālāt nirvapet iti udāhṛtya vicāritam kim laukika aśva pratigraha eṣṭiḥ iyam uta vaidikaḥ iti tatra pūrva pakṣa sūtram doṣāt tu iṣṭiḥ laukike syāt iti doṣa nirghāta arthā hi iyam iṣṭiḥ doṣa saṃyogena śravaṇāt evam hi samāmananti varuṇaḥ vai etam gṛhṇāti yaḥ aśvam pratigṛhṇāti iti sa ca ayam doṣaḥ loke sambhavati na vede vihita tvāt aśva dakṣiṇāyāḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādau 
ŚVK_1.55B^2	 atas laukikaḥ iti prāptaḥ uktam artha vādaḥ vā anupapātāt tasmāt yajñe pratīyeta iti asya arthaḥ na iyam doṣa nirghāta artha iṣṭiḥ doṣa abhāvāt na hi aśva pratigrahāt varuṇa grahaṇa ātmanaḥ doṣasya upapātaḥ pratyakṣa ādinā avagamyate tatas arthavāda mātram doṣa saṅkīrtanam iti phala kalpanāyāḥ abhāvāt vaidika tva sāmānyāt ca vaidikaḥ iti sthite punar vicāritam bhavatu vaidike sā tu kim dātuḥ uta pratigrahītuḥ iti tatra pūrva pakṣa sūtram acoditam ca karma bhedāt iti asya arthaḥ dāna pratigraha karma bhedāt iha ca yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhṇīyāt iti pratigrahītṛ śravaṇāt acoditam iṣṭi karma dātuḥ atas pratigrahītuḥ ṛtvijaḥ iṣṭiḥ iti prāpte uktam sā liṅgāt ārtvije syāt iti 
ŚVK_1.55B^3	 asya arthaḥ ṛtvijām ayam ārtvijaḥ yajamānaḥ yaḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ dātā tatra dātuḥ iyam iṣṭiḥ bhavati kutas liṅgāt kim liṅgam aśva pratigraha iṣṭi vākya gata pūrva uttara pada sāmarthyam tatra hi prajāpatiḥ varuṇāya aśvam anayat iti dātāram saṅkīrtyā ante pratigṛhṇīyāt iti śrutam tat ca prathama avagata anupajāta virodhi dātra varuddhāyām buddhau upanipatitam dātṛ gocaram eva avagatam atas pratigrāhayet iti vipariṇamati tat iha pāna vyāpad ca tadvat iti sūtre sā liṅgāt ārtvije syāt acoditam ca karma bhedāt artha vādaḥ vā anupapātāt tasmāt yajñe pratīyeta iti sūtra traya vyavahitaḥ doṣāt tu iṣṭiḥ laukike syāt iti pūrva pakṣaḥ atidiṣṭaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ pāna vyāpad api tadvat bhavitum arhati yathāśva pratigraha iṣṭi ādi apūrva pakṣe abhihitam 
ŚVK_1.55B^4	 kutas doṣa śruteḥ evam hi śrūyate indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vṛdhyate yaḥ somam vamati iti sa ca ayam indriya vīrya samṛddhi vigamaḥ laukike rasāyana artham pīte vānte sambhavati na vaidike sarva prakṛti vikṛti someṣu pāna mātreṇa soma pratipatteḥ siddha tvāt iti pūrva pakṣite prativihitam doṣāt tu vaidike syāt iti rasāyana artham hi vamanāya eva pānam vamanena hi śuddha kāyasya samyak āhāra pariṇāma paramparayā sthairyam bhavati soma pratipattiḥ tu samyak jaraṇa antāḥ iti mām eva aṅgābhim ati gāḥ iti mantra varṇanāt avagatam atas tatra eva vamanena pāna vyāpadi jātāyām tad nibarhaṇa arthaḥ caruḥ tat idam sūtra traya vyavadhāne api sūtreṇa iti samudāya apekṣayā eka vacanam iti 
ŚVK_1.56^1	 sūtrān yatha akaraṇam udāharati paśu iti jyotiṣṭome hi agnīṣomīyasavanīya anubandhyāḥ paśavaḥ santi santi ca upākaraṇa ādayaḥ paśu dharmāḥ te kim aviśeṣeṇa sarva paśu arthāḥ uta agnīṣomīyasya savanīyasya vā iti sandehaḥ tatra aviśeṣāt sarva artha tve prāpte viśeṣa pradarśana artham sūtram tulyaḥ sarveṣām paśu vidhiḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt iti idam ca yathāśruta gṛhītam vivakṣita viparīta artham iti āpītena vyākhyātam tulyaḥ sarveṣām paśu vidhiḥ syāt yadi prakaraṇa aviśeṣaḥ bhavet 
ŚVK_1.56^2	 asti tu prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ āgnyeyaḥ paśuḥ agniṣṭomaḥ ālabdhavyaḥ ityādibhiḥ hi savanīyam prakṛtya dharmāḥ vihitāḥ atas savanīya prakaraṇa āmnātā iti savanīya arthāḥ iti pakṣam parigṛhya sthānāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ iti siddhāntitam agnīṣomīyasya hi sthāne aupavasathye ahni dharmāḥ vihitāḥ atas tad arthāḥ eva yat tu savanīyānām prakaraṇam iti tat na jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇe hi paśavaḥ tad dharmāḥ ca āmnātā iti na prakaraṇataḥ viśeṣa lābhaḥ uttaredyus āśvinam graham gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya āgnā iyam savanīyam paśum upākaroti iti savanīyānām utpattiḥ pūrvedyus utpattau iha tad anuvādena aśvinā uttara kāla vidhāna asambhavāt kālasya anupādeya tvāt kāle hi karma codyate na karmaṇi kālaḥ 
ŚVK_1.56^3	 tatra prakaraṇa antara adhikaraṇa nyāyena karma bhedaḥ bhavet evam ca adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravam syāt syāt etat vapayā prātassavane caranti iti pūrvedyus utpanna karma utkarṣāt iha tad viparivṛttau na karma antara codanā sambhavati iti anupādeya guṇa paratvam adhyavasīyate iti tat na aṅga bhūtaḥ hi vapā pracāraḥ na asau pūrvedyus utpannam sāṅgam pradhāna karma utkraṣṭum arhati pradhānānām anaṅga vaśa varti tvāt atas āśvinam graham iti eva utpatti vākyam evam ca tad anuvādena āgneyam ajam ityādinā upādeya guṇa vidhānam sambhavati iti vākya dvayam api sambhavati iti siddham eva uttaredyus savanīya vidhānam 
ŚVK_1.56^4	 pūrvam tu guṇa vidhāna artham iti āha ca guṇa artha aupavasathye ahni savanīya punar śrutiḥ utpattiḥ prakriyā ca eṣām āśvina grahaṇa uttarāḥ iti atas siddham sthānāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ dharmāḥ iti kim idam sūtrān i athākaraṇam nāma ucyate vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā iyam yatra anyathā pratibhāsamānaḥ arthaḥ prakaraṇa balena anyathā varṇyate sā vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā nanu na iyam adhyāhāra ādiṣu sanniviṣṭāḥ ucyate na ayam ādi śabdaḥ vyavasthita vacanaḥ prakāra vacana tvāt adhyāhāra prakārāṇām vākya doṣāṇām evamādīnām api yuktam eva upavarṇanam iti 
ŚVK_1.58^1	 vākya bhedam udāharati agnayaḥ iti pāda trayeṇa vakṣyati hi te sarva arthāḥ prayukta tvāt agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt iti iha ca varaṇa bharaṇa upāttānām ṛtvijām laukika vaidika sarva karma artha tvena pakṣam gṛhītvā nirdeśāt vā vaidikānām syāt iti atra yathā viniyogam kārya vyavasthā uktāḥ tad eka vākya tayā agniṣu api tat eva vicāryate iti bhavati matiḥ tat ayuktam vihāraḥ laukikānām artham sādhayet prabhu tvāt iti atra laukika vaidika sarva karma artha tvena pūrva pakṣam gṛhītvā nirdeśāt vaidikānām syāt iti atra yathā nirdiṣṭa vaidika karma artha tvasya pratipādita tvāt atas te sarva arthāḥ prayukta tvāt iti atas vicchidya agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt iti anyatra vyākhyātam evam hi tatra pūrva pakṣitam yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati iti sruvasya khādira tāna ārabhya adhītā prakṛtau vā dvis ukta tvāt iti atra prakṛti artha iti varṇitā evam agnayaḥ api te ca prakṛti arthāḥ eva iti 
ŚVK_1.58^2	 atra uttaram agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt iti asya arthaḥ agnayaḥ prakṛti vikṛti arthāḥ kutas sva kāla tvāt na hi te prakṛtim vikṛtim vārabhya āmnātāḥ anārabhyāmnānāt atas agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tvāt ubhaya arthāḥ eva iti yuktam yat ca agnīnām sambandhe homa haviḥ śrapaṇa ādi dvāra bhūtam tat prakṛti vikṛtyārubhayoḥ api pratyakṣa śrutam atas dvāra aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca sarva arthāḥ eva agnayaḥ iti yuktam tathā abhyudaye doha apanayaḥ svadharmā syāt apanayaḥ vā artha antare vidhānāt iti sūtra dvayam eka vākyatayā pratibhāsamānam bhittvā vyākhyātam tathā hi darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ dadhi payasī pradhāna bhūte pradeya tayā āmnāte aindram dadhi amāvāsyāyām aindram payaḥ amāvāsyāyām iti tatra tāvat deya dhamīḥ kartavyāḥ 
ŚVK_1.58^3	 punar ca naimittika anuṣṭhāna antaram āmnātam yasya haviḥ niruptam purastāt candramāḥ abhyudiyāt sa tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet ye madhyamāḥ syuḥ tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ tān indrāya pradātre dadhani carum ye aṇiṣṭhāḥ tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum iti tat iha dadhi payasī deya dharmān arhataḥ na vā iti vicāre na arhataḥ caruḥ atra deyaḥ ca dadhi payasī atas eva hi dadhani carum śṛte carum iti adhikaraṇa tvena guṇa bhāvaḥ carum prati dadhi śṛtayoḥ āśritaḥ iti prāpte uktam doha apanaye dadhi payasī abhyudaye api svadharma yukte syātām pūrva avagata prakrānta deyā parityāgāt adhikaraṇa tvam tu tayoḥ sampratipanna devatāka tvena taṇḍulaiḥ saha śrapyamāṇayoḥ arthāt jñātam na tad guṇa bhāvam āpādayitum kṣamate dṛṣṭaḥ ca pradhāna bhūtasya api adhikaraṇa tayā nirdeśaḥ 
ŚVK_1.58^4	 yathā rukma pātryām mahārhāmaṇayaḥ ekaḥ bhāgaḥ sa devadattasya rajata pātryām prabhūtam suvarṇam yajñadattasya iti saha eva pātryāḥ bhāgaḥ avagamyate evam iha api saha eva dadhi payobhyām caruḥ devatā bhāgaḥ iti sthitam dadhi payasoḥ deya dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ iti apanayaḥ vā artha antare vidhānāt iti tayoḥ eva abhyudaye doha apanayaḥ iti sūtreṇa pratijñātān deya dharmān vā śabdena vārayati iti sambhāvyamāne nyāya virodhāt anyatra vyākhyātam paśu kāma iṣṭyām abhyudaya iṣṭi vākya sadṛśa śabda antara vihitayoḥ dadhi payasoḥ deya dharmāṇām apanayaḥ vā artha antare caru śrapaṇa arthe vidhānāt iti guṇa kalpanām udāharati guṇa kalpāḥ tu amī kṛtāḥ autpattikaḥ tu iti guṇa kalpāḥ iti kalpanam kalpaḥ guṇānām kalpaḥ guṇa kalpaḥ gauṇaḥ hi guṇāt eva anya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ anyatra kalpyateyatha agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti jvalana jāti vacanaḥ agni śabdaḥ tad jātīyām vyaktim lakṣayati tatas tad samaveta paiṅgalyādi guṇa lakṣaṇayā tad guṇa yogini māṇavake vartate 
ŚVK_1.58^5	 āha ca abhidheyāvinābhūta pratītiḥ lakṣaṇa iṣyate lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt vṛtteḥ iṣṭā tu gauṇa tā iti tat iha autpattika sūtre hi autpattika śabdaḥ utpattau bhavaḥ iti anayā vyutpattyā śabda artha sambandhānām trayāṇām anitya tā abhidhānāt vivakṣita nitya tva viparīta vacanaḥ iti vivakṣita asambhavena gauṇaḥ gṛhītaḥ utpatti śabdaḥ hi utpatti lakṣita utpadyamāna samaveta sattā guṇa yogāt śabda arthayoḥ vartamānaḥ gauṇaḥ bhavati atas ca śabda artha svarūpa adhīnaḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam bhavati tad svarūpa nitya tvāt ca sambandhaḥ api nityaḥ iti vivikṣita siddhiḥ tathā ādityān ām ayana ādiṣu satreṣu kim dvādaśa ahikaḥ vidhyantaḥ uta yāvāmayanikaḥ iti sandehe ahar gaṇa sāmānyāt dvādaśa āhikaḥ iti pratijñāya gavyasya ca tad ādiṣu iti gavyasya vidhyantaḥ darśitaḥ na ca ayam gavya śabdaḥ kvacid kratu bhede prasiddhaḥ 
ŚVK_1.58^6	 na ca vivakṣita gavāmayana arpaṇa kṣamaḥ iti vivakṣita asambhavāt gauṇaḥ vyākhyātaḥ eṣa ca goḥ avayave tad vikāre vā mukhyaḥ tatra eva go payasoḥ yat iti smaraṇāt tat ayam sambandha viśeṣa vacanaḥ tad antargata lakṣita sāmānya sambandha guṇa yogini gavāmayane prayuktaḥ gauṇaḥ jāyate gavāmayane hi gāvaḥ vai etat satram āsatā iti artha vāda udita gokartṛka tva avagamāt bhavati go sambandhaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ ādityān ām ayana ādiṣu gavāmayanasya vidhyantaḥ ayana sāmānya atirekāt iti tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ santi kāmyāḥ sāmidhenī kalpāḥ ekaviṃśatim anubrūyāt pratiṣṭhā kāmasya ityādayaḥ tatra āgamena saṅkhyā pūraṇam iti sthite ānīyamānāsu ṛkṣu sandehaḥ kim tāḥ ante niviśantām uta samidhyamānavatī samiddhavatyoḥ madhye iti tatra yathā avagata krama anurodhena āgantūnām ante niveśaḥ iti prāpte uktam samidhyamānavatī samiddhavatyoḥ madhye iti kutas 
ŚVK_1.58^7	 evam hi āha iyam samidhyamānavatī asau samiddhavatī yad antarā tad dhāyya iti dhāyyānām sāmidhenīnām antarāla tvena saṃstavāt antarāle vidhānam avasīyate tathā uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ante darśanāt iti liṅgam upadiṣṭam tat ca ayuktam uṣṇikkakubhoḥ mukhyayoḥ ante abhāvāt triṣṭubhā paridadhāti iti triṣṭubhaḥ ante darśanāt tat abhiprāyam idam ānīyamānāsu ca madhye satīṣu samiddhavatyāḥ juhotente bhavataḥ te ca samāhṛte triṣṭubhā sama saṅkhye iti saṅkhyā sāmānyāt triṣṭubh ante bhavati evam api triṣṭubhaḥ ante darśanāt iti vaktavyam satyam tathā api triṣṭubhaḥ vai etat vīryam yat uṣṇih kakubhau iti artha vāda avagata triṣṭubh kārya tvāt uṣṇih kakubhoḥ kāraṇe kārya upacārāt uṣṇih kakubh chabdaḥ triṣṭubhi prayuktaḥ tathā jyotiṣṭome dvādaśa śatam dakṣiṇā iti samadhigate ṣoḍaśānām ṛtvijām samaḥ vibhāgaḥ uta viṣamaḥ iti saṃśaye viśeṣa aśruteḥ bhāga sāmyam uktvā karma parimāṇāt dakṣiṇā parimāṇam loke tathā darśanāt iti viśeṣaḥ darśitaḥ 
ŚVK_1.58^8	 punar ca darśanāt ca viśeṣasya tathā abhyudaye iti liṅgam upadiṣṭam atra ca abhyudaya śabdena abhyudaya sādhana tvāt dvādaśa ahaḥ lakṣyate tatra hi dīkṣā krama pare vacane adhvaryuḥ grahapatim dīkṣayitvā iti ādike ardhinaḥ dīkṣayati tṛtīyinaḥ dīkṣayati ityādibhiḥ samākhyābhiḥ ṛtvijāmrdhi ā ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ anūditaḥ sa ca ayam jyotiṣṭoma vikāra tvāt dvādaśa ahasya prakṛtau bhāga vaiṣamyam antareṇa anupapadyamānaḥ vaiṣamye liṅgam iti nanu ca guṇa kalpāḥ iti uktam iha ca autpattikagavya śabdayoḥ evam kathiñcid guṇavādaḥ darśitaḥ uṣṇikkakubh śabde tu upacāraḥ abhyudaya śabde tu lakṣaṇāḥ atas katham guṇa kalpāḥ iti bahu cananam ucyate jaghanya vṛtti sāmānyāt liṅga samavāyāt vā prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti iti vat guṇa kalpāḥ iti uktam iti adoṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.59	 yaḥ tu ubhaya prāpteḥ manda tvāt parisaṃkhyām api na anumanyate tam pratyartha antaram āha sūtrakāra iti bhāṣya kāraḥ ho śiṣyān ātmānam ca sūtrakāra praśaṃsayā prarocayati anena khalu sūtrakāreṇa prasiddhaiḥ eva padaiḥ padārthāḥ abhihitāḥ na tu guṇa vṛddhi ādi vat paribhāṣā kācid kṛtā atas akleśena gamya artha tvāt etāni eva śrotum vyākhyātum ca yuktāni iti 
ŚVK_1.60–1.62	 ye tu stutau vāstutau vā tāvān eva arthaḥ iti na stutau ādriyante tān pratyatha śabda dūṣaṇa param idam bhāṣyam iti āha bhavitavyam iti bhavitavyam tu tena iti atas prāc eka vākyatām āpannena tat tu veda adhyayanam iti atas vā pūrvam eka vākyatām āpannena atha śabda dūṣaṇam anena bhāṣyeṇa kriyate iti prathama avadhinā bhāṣyam yojayati prasiddha artha padaiḥ iti dvitīya avadhinā bhāṣyam yojayati prasiddha artham iti bhavitavyam tu tena iti prasiddha artham padam yuktam iti arthaḥ nanu atha śabda dūṣaṇa vyatirikteṣu prasiddha artha parigrahasya ukta tvāt atha ādi śabda vyākhyānam ayuktam iti codayati prasiddhaḥ api iti 
ŚVK_1.63–64	 pariharati pradarśana artham iti eke iti anye tu vadanti yat anyat bhāṣya kāra antaraiḥ avyāmohitam prasiddha artham padam tat na nāma vyākhyāyatām idam tu atha atas iti pada dvayam bhava dāsena ānantarya artha tayā kalpitam atas avacchidyātha śabda mātrasya ānantarya artha tvam vacanīyam yathā aṣṭama ādau= atha śabdasya ānantarya artha tā prasiddhāḥ atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti tat āha kecid iti vadantena api ca yatna gaurava bhayena ubhayatra vyākhyā pratyākhyātāḥ atra ca na adya api veda vākyāni vyākhyāyante yadi atra sūtrāṇi uprekṣyeran nirviṣayam eva bhāṣyam syāt iti yuktā eva sūtra vyākhyā iti āha na ca iti 
ŚVK_1.65	 athavā yat prasiddha artha grahaṇam uktam tat eva vṛtta abhāvāt atha śabdasya ānantaryārtha tva asambhavāt ākṣipyate iti āha yat vā iti atra eva bhāṣyam yojayati yadi iti tatra ityādinā bhāṣya kāraḥ prasiddha artha grahaṇam ākṣipati prasiddha artha grahaṇe hi ānantaryam atha śabda arthaḥ na ca tat vṛtta mantreṇa sambhavati iti prasaktam adhyāhāra ādi kalpanam iti atra ca pakṣe bhavitavyam ityādi sāmānya viśeṣa uttara tayā atha śabda dūṣaṇa vat vyākhyeyam iti 
ŚVK_1.66	 anyathā pariharati veda adhyayanā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na avyākhyāta durjñāna tvāt atha śabdaḥ vyākhyāyate kin tu atha śabda vyākhyāna miṣeṇa anyat eva bhāṣya kārasya vivakṣitam tat ca etat atha śabda arthe kathite codya parihāra krameṇa śakyate darśayitum tathā hi veda adhyayana anantara upanipātinaḥ snānasya adhītya snāyāt iti smārtasya adhyayana vidhi dṛṣṭa artha tā balena utkarṣa kalpa nātha śabda vyākhyāne sati upapatti krameṇa avatarati iti yuktam atha śabda upavarṇanam iti 
ŚVK_1.67	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa bhavitavyam tu tena iti anena aśabdaḥ ānantarya arthaḥ iti pratijñāya tathā hi iti prasiddha padārthaka tvam hetuḥ uktaḥ tat vyācaṣṭe anarthakaḥ iti ānantarye hi atha śabda arthe bhavati prasiddha artha tā ānarthakya anyārtha tvayoḥ tu prasiddhi bādhaḥ atas śruta ānantarya upapādanāya kim api vṛttam gamyate nanu adhikāra arthaḥ api atha śabdaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā atha śabda anuśāsanam iti atas katham anya artha tve prasiddhi bādhaḥ ucyate tatra hi śabda anuśāsanam eva upariṣṭāt adhikariṣyate iti yuktam adhikāra artha tvam iha tu jijñāsā adhikāra abhāvāt sūktam anya artha tve prasiddhiḥ bādhyate iti 
ŚVK_1.68–1.69	 atra bhāṣyam anyasya api karmaṇaḥ anantaram dharma jijñāsā prāpnoti iti tat ākṣipya samādadhāti viśiṣṭa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi api veda artha vicāra ātmaka viśiṣṭa liṅga vijñānāt viśiṣṭaḥ veda adhyayana ātmakaḥ liṅgī vijñāyate anantara vṛttaḥ tathā api sūtreṇa sākṣāt anupādānāt idam ca uditam iti punar ākṣipati ānantaryā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na hi manu ādi vat adṛṣṭa artha upadeśī jaiminiḥ anena ca ānantaryam upadiṣṭam tat yasya ānantaryam dṛṣṭa artham bhavati tat ā ānantaryam iti gamyate veda adhyayanam eva veda artha vicāra ātmikāyām dharma jijñāsāyām dṛṣṭa artham tena vinā tad anupapatteḥ atas tadā ākṣiptam atas asūtrita upālambhaḥ na yuktaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.70–1.73	 katham punar dṛṣṭa artha tayā veda adhyayanam ākṣipyate atas āha yena iti na ca yat kiñcitkriyā ānantarya artham upadeśaḥ tasya āvarjanīya tvena nitya prāpteḥ iti āha kriyamāṇā iti nanu saṅkalpa prayatna ādibhiḥ api vinā sā na upapadyate eva iti dṛṣṭa artha tvena veda adhyayanam ākṣipyate iti āśaṅkya āha saṅkalpa ādibhiḥ iti evam veda adhyayana ānantaryam upapādya upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_1.75	 aparam api prāk api ca veda adhyayanāt iti bhāṣyam tadā ākṣipati anyasya api iti yadā eva na etat evam ityādinā veda adhyayanam atantrīkṛtam tadā eva adhyayanāt prāk ūrdhvam vā anyasya api karmaṇaḥ anantaram dharma jijñāsā prāpnoti eva iti vyartham prāk iti punarvacanam iti atra parihāra bhāṣyam tādṛśīm ityādi tadā ākṣipati pūrveṇa iti tat tu veda adhyayanam tasmin hi sati sā avakalpate iti anena eva veda adhyayana prāpteḥ ukta tvāt kim anuktam vaktum punar idam uktam iti 
ŚVK_1.77–1.79	 evam ākṣipya ādya codya parihāram tāvat āha vakṣyamāṇam iti sārdha dvayena atra hi na adya api veda vākyāni pramāṇam iti sādhitam tāni ca vākyāni vivariṣyati jaiminiḥ iti api na avagamyate tatas buddha ādi vacana pāṭhā anantaram caitya vandana ādi dharma jijñāsā prasakteḥ paricodanā yuktā eva iti evam anabhijñasya paricodana iti samādhāya anyathā samādhatte yat vā iti dvayena asya arthaḥ vedam adhītya atha dharma jijñāsā iti īdṛśe api sūtre paricodana avakāśaḥ asti eva ubhayam hi vicakṣitam na anadhītya anantaram na anyat kṛtvā iti tat ca vacaḥ bhaṅgi bhedena vākya bhedāt ayuktam iti 
ŚVK_1.81	 vākya bhedam eva prapañcayati adhītya eva iti dvayena ekam hi vedam adhītya atha dharma jijñāsā iti vākyam tat yadi vedam adhītya eva iti vidadhāti tad ānantaryā vidhānāt anyasya api snāna saha dharma cāriṇī saṃyoga ādi karmaṇaḥ anantaram dharma jijñāsā prāpnoti atha etat bhayāt ānantaryam āśrīyate tatas yaḥ adhītya jijñāsate tam pratyānantarya mātra vidhānāt anadhīta vedasya dharma jijñāsā na vāryatas iti prāk api prasajyeta ubhaya vivakṣā tu vākya bheda prasaṅgāt ayuktā eva iti vakṣyamāṇā locanena tu na etat evam iti paricodanāyām prāk api ca veda adhyayanāt iti bhinnakramam yojanīyam api ca prāk veda adhyayanāt iti ayam arthaḥ yadi api veda arthaḥ vicārayitavyaḥ tathā api prathamam eva vicārayitum ucitaḥ sarvam hi hāna upādāna artham vastu prathamam eva jijñāsyate tatas hīyeta upādīyeta vā yat tu avicārita asiddham artham prathamam eva upādāya bhraṣṭa avasaram jijñāsyate tad abuddhi pūrvakam āpadyeta asya api ca udyasya tādṛśīm iti etat eva uttaram iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_1.82^1	 parihāra bhāṣyam idānīm samarthayate buddha vākya ādi iti tat tu veda adhyayanam iti vakṣyamāṇa ālocanena veda adhyayanam vṛttim iti uktam tat anākalayya vakṣyamāṇān ālocanena na etat evam iti paricoditam tādṛśīm iti anena pravartiṣyamāṇā anekavidha veda artha vicāra ātmikā dharma jijñāsā iyam iti jijñāsā svarūpa upavarṇanena parihṛtam atas paricodanā parihāra tvena apunarukta tvam iti evan ca vakṣyamāṇān ālocanena codya uttara tayā bhāṣyam vyākhyāya ālocana paricodanāyām api etat eva uttaram iti yojayati prāk iti yat tāvat ubhaya pratipādanena vākya bheda prasañjanam kṛtam tad ānantarya mātra paratvena parihriyate tad paratve adhyayana vidhāna asambhavāt prāk api iti ca codyam pariśiṣyate tasya api tādṛśīm iti anena apākriyā jijñāsā sāmarthyena pūrva vṛtta veda adhyayana lābhāt nahīyam anupātta vedena śakyā kartum atas eva yat uktam adhyayanāt prāk eva dharma jijñāsā yuktā iti tat api anena parihṛtam bhavati 
ŚVK_1.82^2	 tādṛśī iyam anekavidha vicārāyat tāḥ yā vicāra siddham adhyayanam antareṇa kartum aśakyā vicārya tu adhīyānaḥ vicārasya aneka kāla sādhya tvāt adhyayana kāla atipātāt vrātyatām āpadyeta na ca evam anadhīta vedaḥ tad artham yāvat avadhārayitum alam iti avicārita upātta veda adhyayana pūrvaka tvam dharma jijñāsāyāḥ yat tu uktam avicārita upādāne abuddhi pūrvakam upādānam iti kena vā uktam buddhi pūrvakam upādānam iti hita eṣiṇaḥ pitṛ ādayaḥ eva enam kumāram anākalita pāralaukika kalyāṇam pravartayanti api ca sajātī yānaharahar avirata pravṛtta svādhyāya adhyayana anupalabhamānaḥ sāmānyatas jānāti nūnam asmāt karmaṇaḥ kaḥ api abhyudaya eṣām bhavitā katham aparathā śrāmyadbhiḥ hita kāmaiḥ pitṛ ādibhiḥ amī pravartyante iti evam viditavataḥ aham api anutiṣṭhan śreyaḥ prāpsyāmi iti cintayataḥ svayam api pravṛttiḥ upapadyate eva iti 
ŚVK_1.83	 atra aparam api ca na eva vayam iha veda adhyayanāt pūrvam dharma jijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ iti bhāṣyam tasya artham āha na eva iti ye ete pūrva kalpite vacaḥ bhaṅgī tayoḥ ekaḥ api arthaḥ na anena sūtreṇa vivakṣyate kin tu veda adhyayanam anantaram ubhayam upanipatati yad arthaḥ vicārayitavyaḥ yat ca adhītya snāyāt iti smṛti vacana balena guru kula sakāśāt apavartanam tatra asamāvṛttaḥ katham nāma veda artham vicārayet iti evam artham idam sūtram iti apicā iti ādikena uktam iti 
ŚVK_1.84	 idam ca bhāṣyam nyūnam manyamānaiḥ kaiścid adhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam tatas tam upanyasyati ānantaryam iti asya hi sūtrasya guru kula vāsa avasāna nivṛtti paratvāt adhyayanam ānantaryam ca ubhayam api na vivakṣitam bhāṣyam tu yathāśrutam adhyayana vidhāna niṣedha mātra param upalabhyate atas na api parastāt ānantaryam śiṣmaḥ iti adhyāhṛtya ubhaya vacana vyakti niṣedha artha tayā vyākhyeyam iti 
ŚVK_1.85	 nanu na ananvita padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ na ca iha sūtre tādṛśānām padārthānām anvayaḥ dṛśyate yena guru kula vāsa avasāna nivṛttiḥ pratīyeta pratyuta adhyayana ānantaryayoḥ eva śrutyā vidhānam upalabhyate tatas tat eva yuktam atas āha na vāryatas iti anadhīta vedasya sarva kriyāsu aśaktasya anadhikārāt dharma jijñāsā daivāt eva vāritā kim tad nivṛtti arthena adhyayana vidhānena ānantaryam api na manu ādi vat adṛṣṭa artham upadiśyate naca adṛṣṭa artha upadeśī jaiminiḥ iti uktam atas dṛṣṭa artha adhyayana ānantarya balena guru kula vāsa avasāna nivṛttiḥ lakṣaṇayā śrīyate iti 
ŚVK_1.86	 evam adhyāhāra pakṣam upanyasya dūṣayati ānantaryā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ śruta artha anupapattyā eva hi lakṣaṇā bhavati yadi ca anantarya vacana vyaktiḥ na āśritāḥ kim lakṣaṇāyāḥ bījam tasmāt ānantarya vacana vyaktim āśritya eva śrauta artha parigrahe dṛṣṭa artha tva prasakteḥ lakṣaṇa arthaḥ lakṣaṇayā viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ snāna abhāvaḥ vidhīyate yathā śruta bhāṣya svarasa bhaṅgaḥ ca evam sati na bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_1.87	 kena punar sambandhena ānantaryam upadiṣṭam snāna abhāvam lakṣayati iti atas āha pratītā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ virodhisadbhāvaḥ ho virodhi antara nivṛttyā vyāptaḥ tat yadā eva veda adhyayana anantarā dharma jijñāsā prāptā bhavati tadā eva adhyayana anantara kālasya tayā vyāpta tvāt tad paripanthi snānam nivartate na hi guru gṛhāt anāvṛttaḥ snāti na ca samāvṛttaḥ dharmam jijñāsitum īṣṭe yathā eva guruṇā vinā adhyayanam na sidhyati tathā eva artha jñānam api atas adhyayana anantaram dharma jijñāsā kāryā iti ukte sati ānantarya svarūpe dṛṣta artha tva prasakteḥ snāna abhāva lakṣaṇā yuktā iti 
ŚVK_1.88.1	 nanu satyam virodhinoḥ ekena avaruddhe param nivartate virodhaḥ eva tu kutas adhyayana anantaram hi adhītya snāyāt iti smṛti anumita śruti balena snāsyati tatas sandigdha prayojana vat veda artha gocaram vicāram ārapsyate atas āha virodhaḥ yugapad iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ dṛṣṭa artha adhyayana vidhi balena hi adhyayane pravṛttaḥ na prāc mīmāṃsā śravaṇāt virantum arhati ekaḥ hi upanītasya māṇavakasya praṇava ādiḥ ārtvijya vicāra avasānaḥ śāstra arthaḥ atas yugapad ubhayam upanipatitam iti yuktaḥ virodhaḥ iti nanu virodhinoḥ saha asambhavāt ekaḥ bādhyatām adhītya snāyāt iti smṛti anumita śruti balena nyāya prāpta durbala dharma jijñāsā bādhaḥ yuktaḥ atas āha daurbalyam veda bādhanāt iti evam ho manyate svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti adhītena svādhyāyena artham jānīyāt iti vidhi arthaḥ tat yadi adhyayana anantaram snāyāt iti imam āmnāyam atikrāmet tat ca ayuktam smṛti anurodhena pratyakṣa śruta veda bādha prasaṅgāt mūla mūli bala abala viparyaya prasaṅgāt ca atas balavat dharma jijñāsā anurodhena durbala snāna bādhaḥ yuktaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.88.2^1	 kaḥ punar vedaḥ yaḥ adhītya snānam bādhate nanu uktam svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti artha jñāna paryantaḥ śāstra arthaḥ anantara snāna anuṣṭhānena bādhitaḥ bhavati iti syāt etat evam yadi artha jñāna artham adhyayanam bhavet idam tu ācārya karaṇa vidhi aupayikam adhyayana vidhau= adhikāra aśravaṇāt ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayuktyā ca anuṣṭhāna lābhe viśva jit ādi vat kalpanā anupapatteḥ atas svayam adhikāra vidhuraḥ api vidhiḥ adhikāravantam ācārya karaṇa vidhim anurudhya sidhyati ācārya karaṇa vidhau tu ācāryakam eva kāmayamānasya adhikāraḥ katham punar ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ anaṅga bhūtam eva adhyayanam prayoktum utsahate prayāja ādayaḥ hi darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa adhītāḥ tad aṅga bhūtāḥ iti yuktam yat tābhyām prayujyante iti 
ŚVK_1.88.2^2	 adhyayanam tu anārabhya adhītam na śruti ādibhiḥ kasyacid aṅgatayā śakyam avadhārayitum satyam evam eva etat anaṅga bhūtam eva tu upakārakam adhyayanam ācāryaka niyogasya atas tat tena prayujyate kratu niyogaiḥ iva ādhānam kaḥ punar ācārya karaṇa vidheḥ adhyayanena upakāraḥ śrūyatām upanīya adhyāpanāt ācāryaḥ bhavati na ca adhyāpanam adhyayanam antareṇa sambhavati atas adhyāpana param adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ api bhūta bhavya samuccāreṇa bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti adhyayana niṣpatti arthaḥ atas ca anya paratvāt svādhyāya akṣarāṇām avivakṣitaḥ pratīyamānaḥ api arthaḥ na ca avivakṣitaḥ arthaḥ vicāram prayuṅkte atas svādhyāya adhyayana mātreṇa ācāryaka niyoga niṣpatteḥ anārabhyāḥ mīmāṃsāḥ iti na snāna smṛteḥ kenacid virodham upalabhāmahe 
ŚVK_1.88.3^1	 atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayuktam adhyayanam iti tatra na vidmaḥ kaḥ ayam ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ iti yadi matam aṣṭa varṣam brāhmaṇam upanayīta tam adhyāpayet iti avidhi jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ na anena ācāryakam bhāvayet iti vidhīyate api tu adhyayane aṣṭa varṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ adhikārī iti bodhyate nanu ca na atra aṣṭa varṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ adhīyīta iti śrūyate kin tu aṣṭa varṣam adhyāpayīta iti satyam prayojaka vyāpāra parāḥ api vidhayaḥ prayojya vyāpāra parāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathāva iṣṭau etayāt nādya kāmam yājayet iti atirātreṇa prajā kāmam yājayet iti ca nanu ca upanayīta iti ācārya karaṇe nayateḥ ātmanepadam iti upanayanena ācāryakam nirvartayet iti pratyeṣyate 
ŚVK_1.88.3^2	 na evam na atra ācāryaka artham upanayanam ātmanepadāt avagamyate api tu māṇavaka arthāt upanayanāt ānuṣaṅgikam ārcāya tvam vaiśvadevyām ikṣa artha ādi vat dadhi ānayanāt vājinā ijyā akartṛ abhiprāya artham hi nayateḥ ātma nepada vidhānam ācāryaka artha tve tu upanayanasya kartāram eva kriyā phalam abhipreyāt atas aṣṭa varṣam iti na ayam ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ atha matam anumāsyāmahe vayam ācārya karaṇa vidhim smaryate hi upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyam vedam adhyāpayet dvijaḥ sa kalpam sa rahasyam ca tam ācāryam pracakṣate iti tat asyāḥ smṛteḥ mūla bhūtāḥ upanīya adhyāpanena ācāryakam bhāvayet iti śrutiḥ anumāsyate 
ŚVK_1.88.3^3	 tat na smārta vākya sadṛśam hi mūlam anumīyate yathā aṣṭaka ādi gocaram kartavyatā vacanam upalabhya aṣṭakā kartavyā iti śrutiḥ api kartavyatā viṣayā eva anumīyate na ca iha upanayana ādinā ācāryakam kuryāt iti smṛti vacanam api tarhi upanīya adhyāpayitari laukikāḥ ācārya śabdam upacaranti iti loka siddham eva ācārya padārtham darśayati tat katham itas siddha anuvādāt kartavyatā śrutiḥ anumātum śakyate na ca āhavanīya ādi vat alaukikam ācāryakam āhavanīya śabdaḥ hi ādhāna pavamāna haviḥ ādi janyam alaukikam atiśaya viśeṣam abhiniviśamānaḥ alaukika arthaḥ iti yuktam ācārya śabdaḥ tu upanīya veda dātari upacaritaḥ 
ŚVK_1.88.3^4	 upanīya dadat vedam ācāryaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ iti smṛteḥ evam tu sāndṛṣṭikam eva śiṣya upādhyāya vat na alaukikam ācāryakam api ca apravṛtta pravartanam hi vidheḥ arthaḥ svayam eva ca ācāryake dhanāyan yaśasyan vā pravartate iti kim tad vidhānena atas śūnya hṛdayaiḥ vyavahṛtam eva idam ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayuktam adhyayanam iti kathan ca eṣa vrata niyama ādi iti kartavya tāvataḥ adhyayana vidheḥ prayojakaḥ adhyāpanam hi adhyayanam antareṇa anupapadyamānam laukikena rūpeṇa adhyayana mātram prayuṅktām atas ananya paratvāt svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ na avivakṣita artha tayā śakyam pūrva pakṣayitum 
ŚVK_1.88.4	 yat api uktam upanayanam ācāryakaniyoga aṅgam iti upanīya adhyāpanena ācāryakam bhāvayet iti śrutiḥ anumitāḥ atra ca katvā śruteḥ ācāryaka bhāvanā samāna kartṛkam upanayanam avagamyate na ca prayoga aikyāt ṛte samānaḥ kartā bhavati na ca tad aṅga aṅgi bhāvāt ṛte sambhavati iti ācārya karaṇa vidhau saha aṅgaiḥ aṅgam upanayanam tat ca kena dvāreṇa upakuryāt iti cintāyām upaneya āsādanam eva upanayana svabhāva ālocanayā dvāram avadhāritam upaneyaḥ api na akiñcitkaraḥ aṅgam ititadvyāpāra apekṣāyām upanayanam prakrasya adhyayanam āmnātam upakārakam ca tad adhyāpanāvidheḥ atas tat eva upanayana dvāreṇa adhyāpana vidhinā prayujyate uktam ca katham ācārya karaṇa vidheḥ prayojaka tvam upanayana dvārakam hi tat iti 
ŚVK_1.88.5^1	 atra ucyate na evam adhyayana vidhiḥ śakyate prayoktum anaṅga tvāt anupakāraka tvāt ca yat ca samāna kartṛka tvāt upanayanam adhyāpana aṅgam iti uktam tat na vispaṣṭam hi vayam aṣṭa varṣam brāhmaṇam upanayīta iti dvitīyā saṃyogāt upanīyamāna dvija kumāra aṅgam upanayanam avagacchāmaḥ tasya ca tam adhyāpayet iti adhyayana sambandhāt yuktam eva saṃskāra arha tvam atas māṇavaka dvāreṇa adhyayana vidhi aṅgam upanayanam iti sati api upanīya adhyāpanena ācāryakam bhāvayet iti vidhau anaṅgam eva upanayanam kṛtārtha saṃyogeṣu kāla upalakṣaṇa artha tvasya sthita tvāt 
ŚVK_1.88.5^2	 yathā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti na hi tayoḥ anyonyam aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ ubhayoḥ api kṛtārtha tvāt evam iha api bhavitum arhati astuva adhyāpana aṅgam upanayanam tat tu samīpa prāpaṇa mātram atas tāvat mātram ācārya karaṇa vidhinā prayujyatām adhyayana aṅgam tu viśiṣṭa mantra ādi upetam anena prayuktam iti na pramāṇam kramate na ca phala camasa vat adhikārataḥ viśeṣa lābhaḥ tatra hi yāga aṅga soma bhakṣaṇa prakaraṇa āmnātaḥ bhakṣayatiḥ tad aṅgam eva bhakṣaṇam vigāhate 
ŚVK_1.88.5^3	 na ca iha tathā adhikāra abhāvāt na ca juhū vat etat bhavitum arhati sā hi anujjhita kratu sambandha iti dūre api uddiṣṭa mātrā sā eva pratīyate upanayanam tu samīpa prāpaṇam anekadhā bhinnam iti na viśiṣṭa avagatau kiñcid kāraṇam astu vā viśiṣṭa upanayanam ācārya karaṇa vidheḥ aṅgam prayujyatām ca tat tena na ca tad dvāreṇa adhyayana prayuktiḥ sambhavati aṅgam hi tat adhyayanasya iti uktam na ca aṅgam ākṛṣyamāṇam pradhānam ākarṣati pradhānānām anaṅga vaśa varti tvāt tasmāt na kathañcid ācārya karaṇa vidheḥ prayojaka tvam 
ŚVK_1.88.5^4	 kasmāt ca adhyayana vidhiḥ ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayuktyā sidhyati kaścid kvacid niyuktaḥ iti hi niyogasya sva rūpam tat ayam svayam aniyuñjānaḥ niyoga tvāt eva hīyeta anadhikāra tvāt anyam upajīvati iti ced na ukta adhikāra tvāt uktam aṣṭa varṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ adhikārī iti yad artham hi yat karma sa tatra adhikārī māṇava kāryam ca adhyayanam iti tam adhyāpayet iti vidhānāt avagamyate ananya para tvāt asya na hi idam adhyāpana svarūpa vidhāna param antareṇa api vidhānam vṛtti artham eva tu tatra pravṛtteḥ 
ŚVK_1.88.5^5	 adhyayana vidhiḥ ca aśruta adhikāraḥ adhikāriṇam apekṣate na hi jñāyate kena svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti atas apekṣita vidhi balāt adhyayana adhikṛta puruṣa upadeśaḥ eva ayam tam adhyāpayet iti tat ayam arthaḥ aṣṭa varṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ adhīyīta iti atas prayojaka vyāpāra dvāreṇa prayojya vyāpāra param idam iti varṇitam eva iti atha matam ātma artham adhyayanam na māṇavakaḥ budhyate iti na pravartate iti yadi evam ācārya artham api na budhyate iti na pravarteta eva ācāryaḥ eva ātma artham pravartayati iti ced tulyam asya māṇavaka artha tve api pravartaka tvam 
ŚVK_1.88.5^6	 sa hi asya hita kāmaḥ jānāti ca asya iyam abhyudaya kāriṇī kriyā iti tam imam avidvat tvāt svayam apravṛttam anyaḥ hita kāmaḥ pravartayiṣyati striyam iva sva adhikāre niṣādam iva sthapati iṣṭyām api ca ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayukta tve adhyayanasya na artha avivakṣāyām kiñcid kāraṇam upalabhyate tat yadi adhyayana mātram ātma anuguṇa tayā prayuṅkte na tu svābhāvikam śabdānām artha para tvam vihanti svādhyāya adhyayana svarūpa mātreṇa ca ācāryaka niyoga niṣpatteḥ abhidhā vya apārasya ananya paratvāt 
ŚVK_1.88.5^7	 atas na artha avivakṣāyām kiñcid kāraṇam asti astu vā ācārya karaṇa vidhi aupayika tvena vidhi antarāṇām artha avivakṣāḥ tathā api na mīmāṃsā anārambheṇa pūrva pakṣa varṇanā śakyā kartum ācārya karaṇa vidhi artha mātra nirūpaṇasya api mīmāṃsā gata nyāya kalāpa adhīna ātma lābha tvāt tasya api svādhyāya śabda vācya tvāt avivakṣita artha tvam iti ced na kalpitasya vidheḥ anadhītasya asvādhyāya śabda vācya tvāt tasya ca avivakṣita artha tve anya artha vivakṣā anya artha vivakṣāyām punar tat vivakṣā iti anavasthā syāt na ca vyavasthā sambhave avyavasthitaḥ śāstra arthaḥ yuktaḥ varṇayitum tat varam svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ adṛṣṭa artha tvam na tu ācārya karaṇa vidhi artha tvena avyavasthā evam hi svābhāvikam artha para tvam śabdānām apalapitam na bhavati na ca eka vidhi anurodhena kṛtsna svādhyāya aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ bhūyas virodhe hi alpam anyāyyam iti vakṣyati vipra tiṣiddha dharma samavāye bhūyasām syāt sadharma tvam iti tyajet ekam kulasya arthe iti nyāya vidaḥ vadanti iti na avivakṣita artha tayā pūrva pakṣaḥ yuktaḥ 
ŚVK_1.88.6^1	 yat api ca atra rāddha antitam sati api ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayukta tve adhyayanasya na tad nivṛttiḥ eva prayojanam bahis aṅga tvāt yat etat adhyetari artha jñānam jāyamānam upalabhyate tat eva tasya prayojanam nyāyyam yat kartṛkā hi yā kriyā sā tad arthā eva iti yuktam tathā adarśanāt nanu prathama bhāvī prayojaka vidhi adhikāra anupraveśaḥ carama bhāvi artha jñānāt balīyān atas na adhyetrartha tām adhyayanasya āpādayitum utsahāmahe kim hi prathama avagata ācārya karaṇa vidhi artha tve paścāt bhāvini antara āgatā kariṣyati na evam prāk api adhikāra antara sambandha an avagamāt aśravaṇāt 
ŚVK_1.88.6^2	 anya prayuktayā ca anuṣṭhāna upapattau viśva jit ādi vat kalpanā anupapatteḥ atas ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayuktam adhyayanam asati prayojana sambandhe duḥsthitam eva sarva vidhīnām adhikāra paryavasāyi tvāt saḥ ayam adhīta sāṅga vedasya antarā mīmāṃsā adhyayanam ca adhikāraḥ niṣpadyate sa hi tadā vidita padārthaḥ vākya artham budhyamānaḥ mad artham idam karma iti jānāti yuktam ca etat yat kratu apekṣitam artha jñānam prayojana tayā sambadhyate iti evam ca para prayuktau api artha paratva avighātāt yuktā eva tad vicāra arthā mīmāṃsā iti tat idam anupapannam 
ŚVK_1.88.6^3	 na hi niyoga artha nirvṛtteḥ anyat asti prayojanam sarva vidhīnām yena para prayukta anuṣṭhānaḥ api vidhiḥ prayojanam apekṣate itarathāḥ hi nitye api tad kalpanā prasaṅgāt syāt etat asatyām api vidhi apekṣāyām arthāt jātam artha jñānam na hīyeta iti artha jñānam arthāt jātam na niyogataḥ pratipannam iti tat na homāt api arthāt jātasya haviḥ vikāra ādeḥ prayojana tva āpatteḥ kratu apekṣitam artha jñānam na evam haviḥ vikāra ādi iti ced tat na asati artha paratve kratu anuṣṭhāna abhāvāt kim kena apekṣyeta kartṛ phala prada tvam api kriyāṇām na aikāntikam ṛtvij karbhasu vyabhicārāt 
ŚVK_1.88.6^4	 atas prayojaka vidhi arthaḥ sva arthaḥ vā adhyayana vidhiḥ iti na artha paratve pramāṇam paśyāmaḥ madhye ca adhikāra kalpanā vṛthā eva pravṛtti anaṅga tvāt bhavantī va sva niyogaḥ eva paryavasyet evam hi tat ādhyeta jānāti nityaḥ hi vidhi arthaḥ sampādyaḥ mama iti evam ca niyoga nirvṛtti artham adhyayanam tad arthaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ iti na artha paratvam arthaḥ tu pratīyamānaḥ api pūrvāt iva aparaḥ na vivakṣitaḥ iti avicāraṇīyaḥ eva tasmāt avicārita manohara tvāt asya pakṣasya yathāvārttikam eva adhyayana vidhi vicāraḥ vācyaḥ saḥ ucyate 
ŚVK_1.88.6^5	 svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyītaḥ iti ca vidhiḥ atra śrūyate phalavat vyāpāra gocara tvam ca svābhāvikam sarva vidhīnām iti apuruṣa artha ātmanaḥ adhyayanāt uttīrya puruṣa artha ātmakam phalam abhilaṣati adhyayanam api sādhya tva adhīnam sādhana tve nikṣipyate tat ayam arthaḥ jāyate adhyayanena kim api puruṣa abhilaṣitam kuryāt iti na ca tad upāttam iti āmnāna sāmarthyāt viśva jit ādi vat svargaḥ eva sakala adhyetṛ jana samīhitam phalam kalpyate nanu ca dvitīya anta svādhyāya pada samabhivyāhṛtam adhyayanam tad pradhānam eva avagamyate 
ŚVK_1.88.6^6	 tatas ca adhyayanena svādhyāyam saṃskuryāt iti vākya arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate na ca saktu vada saṃskāryaḥ svādhyāyaḥ phalavat kratu jñāna upāya bhūta tvāt atas na phala antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ na aviniyogāt na khalu svādhyāyasya artha jñāne viniyojikā śrutiḥ upalabhyate atas na tādarthye pramāṇam iti na saṃskāra arha tvam bhūtaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ bhavyam adhyayanam bhūtasya bhavya artha tāyām dṛṣṭa artha tā itarathā kalpyam adṛṣṭam na ca tat yuktam atas viniyoga bhaṅgena svādhyāyena adhyayanam saṃskuryāt iti śāstra arthaḥ yuktaḥ huṃphaḍa ādīnām ca anarthakānām adhyayanāt avyāpakam artha jñānam 
ŚVK_1.88.6^7	 teṣām adṛṣṭa artham adhyayanam bhavati iti ced tad ardha jaratīyam ekasya eva vidheḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tva kalpanāt atas eka rūpeṇa adṛṣṭa artha tā eva yuktāḥ nanu ca rātri satra vadārtha vādikam eva phalam śrutatvāt yuktam āśrayitum śrūyate hi yam yam kratum adhīte tena tena asya kratunā iṣṭam bhavati iti kratu phala prāptiḥ adhyayanasya phalam atha ucyeta na prathame guru sakāśāt adhyayane phalam idam api tarhi dhāraṇa ādi arthaḥ iti tat na dhāraṇa ādi artha artha vādasya atideśataḥ prathama adhyayana sambandhāt atas rātri satra nyāyena arthavāda gatam eva vipariṇāmena phalam upakalpayitum ucitam 
ŚVK_1.88.6^8	 syāt etat evam yadi artha vādāḥ svarūpataḥ atidiśyeran na tu etat evam śāstra atideśa nirākaraṇāt prarocanā mātram iha artha vāda utthāpitam adhyayana vidhinā apekṣitam sambandhum iti nānā āśraya phala pada vipariṇāmaḥ śakyate kalpayitum atas na eṣā api kalpanā yuktā iti viśva jit ādi vat svarga phala tā eva yuktā kalpayitum atas svarga artham guru sakāśāt adhītya snāna smṛti balena anantaram snātvā paścāt sandigdham prayojanavantam veda artham vicārayatu mā vā sarvathā tāvat adhyayana vidhi arthaḥ niṣpannaḥ iti na kathañcid veda virodham upalabhāmahe 
ŚVK_1.88.7^1	 atra ucyate svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyīta iti ca vispaṣṭam svādhyāyasya adhyayana karma tvam avagamyate na ca saktu vat viniyoga bhaṅgaḥ yuktaḥ saktavaḥ hi bhūta bhāvi upayoga rahitā na saṃskāram arhanti na ca tathā svādhyāyaḥ bhāvi upayogi tvāt iha hi adhyayana anantaram akṣara grahaṇam tatas pada avadhāraṇam tatas padārtha smaraṇam tatas vākya artha jñānam tatas anuṣṭhānam tatas abhyudaya iti paramparayā puruṣa artha prayojana pratilambhena viparivṛttyā adhyayana mātrāt na adṛṣṭa kalpanā avakāśaḥ yāvat dhi viprakṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭam upalabhyate tāvat tat eva anusaraṇīyam 
ŚVK_1.88.7^2	 tat iha brāhmaṇa vākyeṣu pradhāna vākyānām phalavat karma avabodhanam phalam aṅga vākyānām tu sannipatya upakāra kārāt upakāraka dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha iti kartavya tā prakāśanam artha vādānām ca vidhi apekṣita viṣaya prāśastya pratipādanam udbhida ādīnām ca nāmnām guṇa phala vidhānam upaniṣadām tu sāmparāyika phala upabhoga ucita cetana kartṛ pratipādana dvāreṇa sakala veda prāmāṇya pratipādanam iti ūhanīyam mantrāṇām ca keṣāñcid anuṣṭhīyamāna padārtha prakāśanam yeṣām tu na dṛṣṭam prayojanam teṣām kratu puruṣa artha adṛṣṭa kalpanā na ca tad adṛṣṭa artha tvena anyatra api dṛśyamāna prayojana parityāgaḥ yuktaḥ 
ŚVK_1.88.7^3	 svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi adhyāpitasya mantra brāhmaṇasya prayojana kalpanā avasare yathāśakti prayojana kalpanā eva yuktāḥ tatra huma ādīnām dṛṣṭa prayojanā sambhave japa brahma yajña ādau adṛṣṭa artha tā dṛṣṭam ca eka prayoga vidhi gocarāṇām dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojana tvam prokṣaṇa avaghāta ādīnām atas na avaśyam aika rūpyam eva sarvatra eva āstheyam tat eṣa pūrva uttara pakṣa saṃkṣepa arthaḥ pāralaukikā dṛṣṭa phala tvāt adhyayanasya na artha jñāna paryantaḥ adhyayana vidhi arthaḥ iti na avaśyam anantaram veda arthaḥ mīmāṃsitavyaḥ atas na snāna smṛti adhyayana vidhyoḥ virodhaḥ 
ŚVK_1.88.7^4	 aviruddham ca na durbalam api bādham arhati iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu svādhyāyasya adhyayana saṃskāryatva avagamāt adhītena svādhyāyena kim kuryāt iti apekṣite yogya tvena artha jñāne svādhyāyasya viniyogāt tasya ca aihika tvāt anantaram dṛśyamāna tvāt ca na vyavahitā muṣmikā dṛṣṭa svarga phala kalpanā yuktā iti adhītena svādhyāyena artham jānīyāt iti karaṇībhūtasya vedasya anugrāhaka apekṣāyām yogya tvena iti kartavyatā aṃśa upanipātinī mīmāṃsā adhyayana anantaram upanipatantī sva kāla upanipātinā snānena virudhyate iti śruti balīyaḥ tvena yuktaḥ snāna smṛteḥ bādhaḥ iti sūktam snānasya tena bādhaḥ syāt iti 
ŚVK_1.90	 atra bhāṣyam dṛṣṭa artha tā ca adhyayanasya ānantarye vyāhanyeta lakṣaṇayā tu eṣaḥ arthaḥ syāt iti tad adhyayana dṛṣṭa artha tā pratipādanasya punarukta tvāt lakṣaṇayā tu eṣaḥ a rthaḥ syāt iti ca avijñāyamāna artha tvāt kaiścid vyākhyātṛbhiḥ tyaktam tat tāvat āha dṛṣṭa artha iti kaiścid antena svayam tu cirantana lekhyeṣu vidyamāna tvāt samādhatte tat ucyate iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pūrvam hi na ca adhīta vedasya ityādi bhāṣyeṇa pūrva kālatā mātram ktvā apratyayena ucyate na anantaryam na ca tad adhyayana dṛṣṭa artha tve virudhyate iti smṛtyā saha avirodhaḥ darśitaḥ idānīm tu yadi api ānantarya vacanaḥ ktvā śabdaḥ tathā api samasta smṛti artha parigrahe veda virodhāt varam lakṣaṇa iti paurvāparya viśeṣaḥ ānantarye ukte tad antargata pūrva kālatā mātram adhyayanasya lakṣyate evam hi dṛṣṭa artha adhyayanena saha avirodhaḥ bhavati iti 
ŚVK_1.91	 aparam api smṛtyā saha avirodha prakāram āha grantha iti adhītya iti iṅaḥ rūpe virodhaḥ neṇa iti idam ca anvāruhya vacanam iti na atīva ādaraṇīyam iṅaḥ hi nitya sahacaritaḥ adhi śabdaḥ eka deśa bhūtaḥ na hi tasya kevalasya prayogaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ atas iṅaḥ rūpe samudāya prāsiddhiḥ iṇaḥ tu avayava prasiddhiḥ sā ca samudāya prasiddheḥ durbalāḥ svādhyāya adhyayana adhikāre ca adhītya iti śrutam tat viṣayam eva avagamyate iti atas api na adhigama artha kalpanā yuktā iti 
ŚVK_1.92	 atra bhāṣyam na ca idam snānam adṛṣṭa artham vidhīyate iti tat vyācaṣṭe yaḥ tu iti yaḥ hi śruti smṛtyoḥ evam avirodhaḥ bhavati iti guru gehāt anāvṛttasya āplavana mātram adhītya snāyāt iti prayāja ādi vat pradhānam adṛṣṭa artham vidhīyate athavā mantra ādi upetam adhyayanasya pradhāna karmaṇaḥ prokṣaṇa ādi vat adṛṣṭa artham nara saṃskāra rūpam snānam vidhīyate iti manyate tasya vakṣyamāṇam uttaram iti
