ŚVK_1.94^1	 tat idānīm uttaram āha iha iti dvayena brahmacāriṇaḥ hi na snāyāt iti asnāna ādi niyamaḥ uktaḥ na ca tatra kasyacid avadhi tvam āśritam atas asau kiyantam kālam iti bhavati avasāna apekṣā iti yadi evam tatas kim atas āha tatas iti apekṣita vidhau dṛṣṭa artha tvam itaratha adṛṣṭa artham snāna vidhānam na ca dṛṣṭe sambhavati tat yuktam atas apekṣa avaśāda snāna ādi niyama nivṛttim eva adhītya snāyāt iti snānam lakṣayati tat dhi asnāna virodhi snānam virodhi sattā ca virodhi antara nivṛttyā vyāptā atas snānena asnāna niyama nivṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ yuktā eva tad sahacaritāḥ ca guru kula vāsa ādayaḥ iti tad nivṛttyā teṣām api nivṛttiḥ lakṣyate iti nanu yuktam virodhinoḥ saha asambhavāt snānena asnāna nivṛttiḥ lakṣyate iti guru kula vāsa ādi dharma nivṛttau kutas hetuḥ 
ŚVK_1.94^2	 yat ca āsnānā ādi niyama sahacaritaḥ guru kula vāsa ādiḥ tad nivṛttyā nivartyate iti uktam tat ayuktam pramāṇa antara gocare hi viṣaye tat yuktam yathā loke bhojana kāle kevala sthala parimārjana upadeśe sthala ādīni parimṛjyantām iti bhavati tad saha carita nikhila bhojana upakaraṇa śaṅkha śuktikā ādi parimārjana upadeśaḥ śruti smṛtyoḥ tu yāvat upātta mātra viṣaya tvāt sahacarita ādi grahaṇam anyāyyam ucyate syāt evam yadi śruti mūlā iyam adhītya snāyāt iti smṛtiḥ syāt iyam tu nyāya mūlāḥ nyāyaḥ ca sakala brahmacāri dharma nivṛttau samānaḥ kaḥ punar asau śrūyatām brahmacāri dharmā hi guru kula vāsa ādayaḥ adhyayana aṅgam adhyayana samāptau samāpyante iṣṭi samāptau iva vratam iti nyāyaḥ atas asnāna niyama nivṛtti mūlena sakala agni in dhana ādi brahmacāri dharma paryavasāna lakṣaṇā yuktā iti idam tu kin tu lakṣaṇayā ityādi bhāṣyeṇa uktam iti veditavyam 
ŚVK_1.95	 prakaraṇa artham idānīm upasaṃharati tasmāt iti ayam arthaḥ yat adhyayana śabdaḥ adhigama arthaḥ iti vyākhyātam yat ca snāya āditya snāna ādi niyama nivṛtti lakṣaṇa arthaḥ snāna śabdaḥ iti tathā atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti dharma jijñāsā krama vacanaḥ atha śabdaḥ a dhyayana anantara upanipāti smārta snāna abhāva lakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti yat uktam tatra ca sarvatra dṛṣṭa artha tvam hetuḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.98^1	 atra codayati snātvā iti iti antena evam hi uktam daurbalyam veda bādhanāt iti evam ca veda bādhaḥ bhavati yadi veda arthaḥ sarvathā eva upekṣyeta yadi tu smṛti anurodhena adhyayana anantaram snātvā sandigdham prayojanavantam veda artham budhyamānaḥ jijñāsate tatas na kaścid veda virodhaḥ dṛśyate iti avirodhitā snānasya iti evaṃvādinaḥ uttaram āha evam iti snāna bādhanam antena ayam arthaḥ bhavet api smṛti anurodhena anantaram snānam yadi tāvat mātram eva smṛtam syāt iha ca snānāt uttara kālam api nānāvidhāni nityāni naimittikāni ca karmāṇi smaryante tat yadi tāni api anurudhyante tatas atyantāya veda bādhaḥ na ca tāni api avicārita veda arthaḥ yathāvat anuṣṭhātum īṣṭe na ca aviduṣaḥ adhikāraḥ asti vakṣyati hi na ca avidvān vihitaḥ asti iti 
ŚVK_1.98^2	 tat avaśyam anurudhya api smṛtim kiyati api adhvani gatvā punar tad bādhaḥ vaktavyaḥ tat varam adhīta veda tvena vicāra yogya tvāt māṇavakasya adhyayana anantaram āgate kāleprathama upanipātinaḥ virodhinaḥ snānasya eva bādhanam atas anadhīta veda tvena yāvat nitya naimittika karmaṇaḥ anuṣṭhāna ayogyaḥ tāvat akurvan api tāni na pratyavaiti adhīta veda tayā yogyaḥ akurvan pratyaveyāt na ca avidvān kartum śaknoti na ca avicārayan jānāti iti adhyayana anantaram eva dharma jijñāsā yuktā iti idam ca uttara vibhavāt uktam paramārthataḥ tu adhyayana vidhi artha sampādanāya pravṛttaḥ na prāṅ mīmāṃsā śravaṇāt virantum arhati iti adhyayana vidhi bala prabhāvitaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ na hi pradhānam anaṅgam anuṣṭhitam paryavasyati vakṣyati hi sāṅgam pradhānam aika śabdyāt iti 
ŚVK_1.99^1	 evam smṛti bādham upapādya atra eva adhikaraṇam udāharati saḥ ayam iti itiḥ iva arthe pāṭha kramasya iva śruti kramasya ayatham arthāt bādhaḥ avagamyate iti arthaḥ uktam hi kramaka upa adhikaraṇe krama kopaḥ artha śabdābhyām iti atra hi agnihotram juhoti yavāgūm pacati iti udāhṛtya vicārayiṣyate kim hutvā paktavyam uta paktvā hotavyam iti atra pāṭha prāmāṇyāt hutvā paktavyam iti pūrva pakṣitaḥ uktam pāṭha kramasya artha kramāt kopaḥ bādhaḥ artha vaśena hi atra pāṭha kramaḥ atikramitavyaḥ yathā pāṭha krama anuṣṭhāne hi arthaḥ na saṃvarteta homa arthaḥ hi pākaḥ sa homāt uttaram anuṣṭhitaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt homaḥ ca havanīyāt ṛte na sidhyet tasmāt ādau śrapaṇam tatas homaḥ iti tadvat iha api yadi api adhyayana anantari a rūpaktvā śrutyā snānasya kramaḥ avagataḥ tathā api adhyayana dṛṣṭa artha tā sāmarthyena bādhitavyaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.99^2	 tad parigrahe adhyayana vidhi arthaḥ eva bādhitaḥ syāt śruti kramaḥ api artha anusāreṇa bādhyataḥ eva artha artha tvāt sarvasya iti kramaka upa adhikaraṇe ṭīkākāreṇa uktam iti adhikaraṇa antaram atra eva udāharati guṇa pradhānayoḥ iti vakṣyati aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt iti atra ca pradhāna bhūta sutya akāla anurodhena aṅga bhūta dīkṣaṇīya akāla bādhaḥ vakṣyate pradhāna artha tvāt aṅgānām pradhāna virodhe satya anarthakyāt evam iha api adhyayana snānayoḥ kramam adhīti asnāyāt iti smṛtiḥ upadiśati kramaḥ ca kramavatām aṅgam iti avivādam sarva vādinām tat yadi eṣa kramaḥ anurudhyeta tatas pradhāna bhūtam dṛṣṭa artham adhyayanam eva bādhitam bhavet na ca guṇa anurodhena pradhāna bādhaḥ yuktaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.100–1.101	 evam tāvat smṛteḥ atyanta bādhaḥ bhaṇitaḥ idānīm virodha anusāri tvāt bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya yāvat mātram eva virudhyate tat bādhitavyam guru kula vāsa parityāga mātram ca dharma jijñāsā paripanthi tad āyatta tvāt tasyāḥ na madhu māṃsa ādi sevā iti na te bādhitavyāḥ iti āha snānā iti tasmāt smṛti eka deśa bādhaḥ ayam na samasta smṛteḥ bādhaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_1.102	 nanu evam parityakta agni in dhana ādi brahmacāri dharmaḥ snātakaḥ jātaḥ iti snātakaḥ nityam śuciḥ sugandhiḥ snāna śīlaḥ iti vidhi prāptam madhu ādi sevana vat dharma jijñāsāyām avirodhi yat snānam tat api kriyatām atas āha guru geha iti sakala brahmacāri dharma nivṛttau hi snātaka śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ na agni indhana ādi kati paya dharma nivṛttau atas yāvat guru geha nivṛttiḥ madhu ādi sevā samudāyasya aṃśaḥ na samāpyate tāvat snātakaḥ eva na bhavati iti na snānam asnāna ādi niyama nivṛttiḥ paryavasyati snānam na prāpnoti iti arthaḥ sakala brahmacāri dharma nivṛtti vācī snātaka śabdaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.103	 vyākhyāya tat eva prayoga anusāreṇa āha guru gehāt iti yāvat dhi guru gehāt na nivartate na niṣkrāmati tāvat snātakaḥ na kathyate atas na snātaka dharmam labhate iti yadi evam tarhi mā snātu dāra parigraham kin tu na karoti upātta dāraḥ api gurau nivasan dharmam jijñāsate eva atas āha tat iti guru gehāt niṣkrāntasya kṛta mantra ādi upeta snānasya tatra snānāt paraḥ dāra saṅgrahaḥ vihitaḥ snātakaḥ sadṛśīm bhāryām vindeta iti tat katham akṛta snānasya bhavet iti 
ŚVK_1.104–1.105	 atra bhāṣyam vedam adhītya snāyāt guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa iti tad asaṅga tā artham iva lakṣyate katham hi vedam adhītya snāyāt guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa iti tat vicchidya yojayati vyākhyāya iti pūrvam hi na ca idam snānam adṛṣṭa artham ityādinā bhāṣyeṇa smṛti vākyam vyākhyāya punar tat eva kīrtitam asyāḥ smṛteḥ ayam arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati nanu ānantaryāt guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa iti anena eka granthaḥ avagamyate kim tad parityāge kāraṇam atas āha samāvartiṣṭa iti na hi ānantaryam eva sambandhe kāraṇam api tarhi yogyatā api iha ca virodhāt ānantarye api asambandhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.106	 atha apanītam katham vyākhyeyam atas āha athaśabdena iti pūrvam hi guru kula vāsa avasāna bādhana arthaḥ atha śabdaḥ iti vyākhyātam guru kulān māsam āvartiṣṭa katham veda vākyāni vicārayet ityādinā bhāṣyeṇa na ca tatra hetuḥ uktaḥ iti smṛti dṛṣṭa artha tā prasaṅgena manasi viparivartamānaḥ abhihitaḥ atha śabdaḥ hi ānantarya paratve adṛṣṭa arthaḥ syāt iti tad parihārāya guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa iti evaṃaparaḥ vyākhyāyate iti yat vā guru kula vāsa nivṛtti mātram bādhyate na kṛtsna smṛti arthaḥ iti tatra ayam hetuḥ iti āha tanmātrasya iti 
ŚVK_1.107–1.108	 etat eva vivṛṇoti smṛti prāptam iti idānīm adhīte vede adhītya snāyāt iti smṛti prāptam madhu ādi sevanam pratiṣedhayan sūtrakāraḥ adṛṣṭa artha upadeśī syāt teṣām dharma jijñāsāyām avirodhāt na ca tat yuktam iti yaḥ tu smṛteḥ avirodham vadan evam āha smṛti vaśāt anantaram snātvā guru geham praviśya dharmaḥ vicārayiṣyate tat na kaścid virodhaḥ syāt iti tam pratyāha nivṛtya iti nirgatya hi punar praveśaḥ adṛṣṭa arthaḥ syāt iti pūrvam ca idam udbhāṣyam eva paricodya anyathā parihṛtam idānīm bhāṣya anusāreṇa adṛṣṭa artha tayā parihriyate iti apaunaruktyam 
ŚVK_1.109–1.110	 nanu katham praveśaḥ adṛṣṭa arthaḥ syāt tasya hi vicāraḥ dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam atas āha nirgamaḥ iti kṛtārthasya nirgamaḥ nissaraṇam dṛṣṭa artham syāt itaratha adṛṣṭa artham atas nirgatya praveśaḥ adṛṣṭa arthaḥ iti vadatā nivṛtteḥ adṛṣṭa artha tvam uktam bhavati atas śabdam idānīm anusandhatte atha iti yadā eva atha śabdena dṛṣṭa artham ānantaryam upadiṣṭam tadā eva kriyā mātra ānantaryasya adṛṣṭa artha tvāt veda grahaṇam veda artha nirṇaye hetuḥ iti uktam eva iti kim atas śabdena iti 
ŚVK_1.111–1.112	 pariharati yogya tvam iti ānantarya upadeśāt veda adhyayanena dharma jñāne yogyaḥ bhavati iti jñāyate na tu tad hetukā eva dharma jijñāsā iti atas ca evaṃvidhaḥ puruṣaḥ dharma jñāne yogyaḥ iti etāvat eva atha śabdena uktam syāt na hetu viśeṣaḥ iti āha lakṣaṇam iti na ca hetu antara abhāvāt pāriśeṣya siddham adhyayanam śakyam vaktum iti āha jijñāsāyāḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.113	 dharma phala arthi tva ācāryaka yaśaḥ prabhṛti jijñāsāyāḥ hetu tvena sambhavati tad hetu tve ca dharma jijñāsāyāḥ śūdra adhikāraḥ doṣaḥ iti parihāra antaram āha atas śabdaḥ iti atha śabdaḥ hi ānantaryam upadiśan yat veda adhyayana ānantaryam upadiśati iti uktam tat vakṣyamāṇātas śabda pratipādya hetu tva balena itarathā tu artha antara vacanaḥ ayam atha śabdaḥ sambhāvyeta iti 
ŚVK_1.114	 anyathā paunaruktyam āha snāna bādhasya iti yadi api atha śabdena veda adhyayanam dharma jijñāsāyāḥ hetuḥ iti pratipāditam tathā api hetu antara vacana tvāt atas śabdaḥ na punaruktaḥ snāna bādhasya hetu tvam atas śabdaḥ vadati snāna bādha hetum āviṣkaroti yogyasya iti adhīta vedaḥ hinitya naimittika anuṣṭhāna yogyaḥ jātaḥ yadi avidvat tayā na anutiṣṭhet pratyaveyāt atas adhīta veda tvāt na avasthātum labhyate jhaṭiti vidvattāyām yatitavyam iti 
ŚVK_1.115–117^1	 atra bhāṣyam dharmam jijñāsitum icchet iti tatra sandhātu liṅtu munām icchā artha tvāt paunaruktyam āśaṅkya viṣaya bhedāt pariharati san vācyā iti san vācyā tāvat icchā āntaram samāna pada upāttam jñānam eva karma vyāpnoti tad karmikā iti yāvat tāvatā ca bhāgena sā eva gamyate na liṅa ādeḥ arthaḥ vidhi ādiḥ iṣiḥ tu yadi api icchā vacanaḥ tathā api icchā antara vacana tvāt apunaruktaḥ tathā hi san vācyā icchāyā bāhyaḥ pada antara upāttaḥ vā dharmaḥ karma jñāna icchā vā dharma jñāna icchā dvayam vā karma bheda prakaṭanam icchā bheda sphuṭīkaraṇa artham liṅtumunoḥ tu vidhi samāna kartṛka tva vacana tvāt spaṣṭaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ iti apunarukta tā iti 
ŚVK_1.115–117^2	 kim punar atra asūtrita dvitīya icchopādāne bhāṣya kārasya prayojanam dharmam jijñāseta iti evam hi vacanīyam atas āha sūtrita icchā iti evam hi manyate yathā śiṣyaḥ bālaḥ preṣaṇāyām ayogya tvāt dharma jñāne pravartayitum sūtrakāreṇa adhyeṣitaḥ dharma jijñāsā iti vadatā tathā tad gatim anuvidadhānena bhāṣya kāreṇa sūtrita icchā katham nirvartyeta iti dvitīya icchā asūtrita uktāḥ atas icchā upadeśena api kartavyatā upadiṣṭā bhavet tad pūrva bhāvi tvāt icchāyāḥ na ca icchā na iṣyate bubhukṣā vat tathā hi ekaḥ bubhukṣamāṇaḥ bhuṅkte anyaḥ tu manda anala tvāt abubhukṣuḥ tām api kāmayataḥ eva iti 
ŚVK_1.118^1	 tatra dharma jijñāsā samāsapadam vigṛhṇatā bhāṣya kāreṇa dharmāya jijñāsā dharma jijñāsā sā hi tasya jñātum icchā iti uktam tadā ākṣipati prakṛtyā iti yatra hi tādarthye caturthī samāsaḥ bhavati tatra prakṛtyā vikṛtiḥ samasyamānā dṛṣṭāḥ yathā yūpāya dāru yūpadāru iti aprakṛti vikārayoḥ tu na samāsaḥ yathā randhanāya sthālī avahana nāya ulūkhalam iti tathā aprakṛti vikṛti grahaṇam kartavyam iti tādarthya samāse vārttikakāreṇa uktam na ca sāmarthya pradarśana artham tat atas aprakṛti vikārayoḥ api yatra sāmarthyam tatra samāsaḥ bhavati eva atas dharma jijñāsā pade api sāmarthyasya vidyamāna tvāt yuktaḥ tādarthya samāsaḥ iti vacanīyam sāmarthyasya eva prakṛti vikāra bhāvam antareṇa anupapatteḥ vigraha vākya artha abhidhāna śaktiḥ hi sāmarthyam 
ŚVK_1.118^2	 na ca yathā randhanāya sthālī iti śrūyamāṇā caturthī bāhya nimitta bhūtāyā arandhana prakṛteḥ api sthālyāḥ tādarthyam abhidyotayati tathā arandhana sthālī iti samāsaḥ manda tvāt tādarthyasya prakṛteḥ eva tu dāru ādeḥ yūpa ādi vikṛti bhāva āpatteḥ vyaktam tādarthyam iti yūpāya dāru iti vigṛhya kathitam yūpa dāru samāsāt api su jñānam atas eva samāsa vidhau tādarthya grahaṇam prakṛti vikṛti gocaram vyākhyātam tatra eva tādarthyasya spaṣṭa tvāt āha ca bāhyasya hi nimittasya tādarthyam na eva tādṛśam yādṛśam prakṛteḥ spaṣṭam vikāram prati dṛśyate iti tathā ca na aprakṛti vikṛtyoḥ tādarthya samāsaḥ dṛṣṭa caraḥ aśvadhāsa ādiṣu ṣaṣṭhī samāsa āśrayaṇāt vaiyākaraṇa ākhyāyām tu sati api samāse alugvidhānāt vibhaktiḥ śrūyate iti yuktam eva vṛtti vigrahayoḥ aikyārthyam asati api prakṛti vikṛti bhāve dharma jijñāsā pada samāsaḥ tu vivāda āspadībhūtaḥ eva tasmāt asamāsaḥ ayam 
ŚVK_1.119	 evam ākṣipya samādadhāti sā hi iti na ayam caturthī samāsaḥ kin tu aśva dhāsa ādi vat ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ eva ayam tathā hi sā hi tasya jñātum icchā iti ṣaṣṭhī antena tadā vigṛhṇāti iti nanu dharmāya jijñāsā iti vigraha vacanam tat katham vyākhyeyam atas āha dharmāya iti na idam vigraha vacanam kin tu ṣaṣṭhī artha viśeṣa pradarśanam iti 
ŚVK_1.120–1.121	 atha codayati prāpnoti iti tādarthya rūpa artha vivakṣāyām hi caturthī eva prāpnoti sambandha sāmānya vivakṣāyām tu tādarthya vacanam katham iti pariharati sambandha mātrā iti sūtrakāreṇa hi sambandha sāmānya vivakṣāyāḥ dharma jijñāsā iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ prayuktaḥ nirviśeṣa sāmānya anupapatteḥ tu viśeṣa ākāṅkṣāyām bhāṣya kāreṇa eva tasya sāmānyasya tādarthya rūpa viśeṣa niṣṭhatā varṇyate tena ayam api na doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_1.122	 atra aparam dharma jijñāsā svarūpa pradarśana artham kānyasya sādhanāni kāni sādhana ābhāsāni iti bhāṣyam tatra sādhana ābhāsa padam vyācaṣṭe sādhana abhāsa ta iti pūrva pakṣasya arthaḥ dharmasya sādhana ābhāsam iti katham punar pūrva pakṣasya arthaḥ sādhana ābhāsaḥ atas āha anya sādhanam iti anyasya hi sādhanam anyasya sādhana vat avabhāsamānam sādhana ābhāsam bhavati iti 
ŚVK_1.123	 etat eva abhivyanakti kratu artham iti kratu artham hi parṇa mayī ādi puruṣa arthasya apāpa śloka śravaṇa ādeḥ ucyamānam sādhana ābhāsam bhavati puruṣa artham ca go dohana ādi kratoḥ ucyamānam tad ābhāsam bhavati iti atra bhāṣya kāreṇa kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti codanā sūtreṇa vyākhyātam iti uktvā kānyasya sādhanāni ityādi śeṣa lakṣaṇena vyākhyātam iti uktam tat ayuktam iva dṛśyate śeṣa lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ hi tṛtīyā adhyāye prasiddhaḥ na ca tatra sādhana ādi sarvam vyākhyāyate atas katham iti āśaṅkya āha śeṣa lakṣaṇa iti na ayam tṛtīyā adhyāya vivakṣayā śeṣa lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ kin tu pariśiṣṭa sakala śāstra vivakṣayā atas eva eka vacanam iti 
ŚVK_1.124–1.125	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa śāstra ārambham ākṣipatā uktam dharmaḥ prasiddhaḥ aprasiddhaḥ vā syāt yadi prasiddhaḥ na jijñāsyaḥ atha aprasiddhaḥ natarām iti tatra abhāva vacana tvāt nañaḥ kaḥ ayam ātiśāyanikaḥ pratyayaḥ na hi niṣedhasya svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti iti āśaṅkya āha prasiddhaḥ iti satyam na abhāvasya svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ tathā api niṣedhya tantra tvāt niṣedhasya tad atiśayāt saḥ api atiśete iti tat iha prasiddhe jñāna icchā mātrasya eva abhāvaḥ na jñānasya aprasiddhe tu na jñānam na ca icchā iti dvaya niṣedhāt atiśayaḥ yuktaḥ aśakya tvāt na iṣyate na jñāyate ca iti arthaḥ iti atra parihāra bhāṣyam dharmam prati vipratipannāḥ bahu vidaḥ sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣam saṃyunakti iti tat vyācaṣṭe jijñāsyaḥ iti sandigdhasya hi prayojanavataḥ nirṇayāya matimantaḥ yatante tathā ca dharmaḥ tasmāt ayam api jijñāsyate iti 
ŚVK_1.126	 kīdṛśaḥ punar dharme saṃśayaḥ kinnimittaḥ vā atas āha sva rūpa ādiṣu iti pūrvam tāvat dharmasya sva rūpa ādiṣu madhye pramāṇa svarūpābhyām dvedhā vipratipadyate vipratipattiḥ kriyate iti bhāve pratyayaḥ vādi vipratipattiḥ ca saṃśaye nimittam iti naiyāyikāḥ tasmāt eṣa saṃśayaḥ bhavati kim khalu dharme pramāṇam kiṃsvid yogi pratyakṣam uta codanā iti pramāṇa saṃśayāt eva tu svarūpa saṃśayaḥ kim yāga ādiḥ dharmaḥ uta caitya vandana ādi iti tat atra ādyasya adhyāyasya prathama pāde nirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ iti āha pādena iti atra hi sambhāvita itara pramāṇa niṣedhena sambhāvitā prāmāṇya niṣedhena ca prāmāṇyam upapādayiṣyate tad upapādanāt ca svarūpa upapādanam api kṛtam bhavati tripādyām tu kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti amunā pratijñātaḥ pramāṇa prakāraḥ nirūpyate prāmāṇyam tu iha eva upapāditam atas eva pāda avasāne iti pramāṇa tvam idam prasiddham iti vadati arthavāda adhikaraṇe ca siddha pramāṇa bhāvasya iti prakārasya tu tadvatas pramāṇāt anatibhedāt kṛtsnaḥ adhyāyaḥ pramāṇa lakṣaṇam iti ākhyāyate iti 
ŚVK_1.128	 evamādya pāda prayojana muktvā uparitana tantra prayojanam āha sthitaḥ iti dvayena ajñānām eka mārga dṛśvanām ca asaṃśayāt bahu vidām vākya artha nirṇaye saṃśayāt na matiḥ upajāyate prathamam tāvat vidhi artha vāda mantra nāmnām arthe prayojane saṃśayaḥ stuti a ādi upayoga pratipādanena artha vāda adhikaraṇa ādyaiḥ apaneṣyate punar ca dvitīye yajati dadāti juhoti ityādinām ca artha bheda abhāvāt bheda saṃśayaḥ śabda antara adhikaraṇa ādibhiḥ iti eṣā diś atas sandigdha prayojanavat tvāt param api śāstram praṇetavyam iti 
ŚVK_2.1^1	 codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti śāstra ārambha sūtram tat vyācaṣṭe dharmaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ prathama sūtre hi viśeṣa dharma jijñāsā pratijñātā tad abhiprāyeṇa kaḥ dharmaḥ iti pṛṣṭam viśeṣaḥ ca pramāṇa viśeṣāt sidhyati pāṣaṇḍa āgame hi pramāṇe caitya vandana ādayaḥ kriyā viśeṣāḥ dharmāḥ bhavanti veda āgame tu yāga ādayaḥ tat iha sāmānyatas siddha dharma uddeśena pramāṇa viśeṣaḥ codanā vidhīyate tatas ca dharma viśeṣa siddhiḥ yaḥ tu sāmānya ātmā dharmasya prīti sādhana tvam saḥ avivāda siddhaḥ eva sarva vādinām na hi iha kecid vivadante yaḥ prīti sādhanam dharmaḥ iti tathā ca nṛ guṇa vādinaḥ yatas abhyudaya niḥśreyasa siddhiḥ sa dharmaḥ iti āhuḥ śubhā citta vāsanā iti saugatāḥ puṇyāḥ pudgalāḥ iti ārhatāḥ 
ŚVK_2.1^2	 sarve ca ete prīti sādhana tayā eva taiḥ dharmāḥ iṣyante atas eva ca asyām vacana vyaktau artha śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ iti vakṣyati labhyate artha anuvādena iti eṣā eva ca atra vacana vyaktiḥ vārttikakārasya abhimatā itarathāḥ artha śabdasya vidhi anuvādayoḥ asambhavaḥ iti vakṣyati nanu ca sva rūpa viśeṣe apekṣite pramāṇa viśeṣa vidhānam asaṅgatam atas āha sva rūpa ādeḥ iti dharma padārthasya idam pramāṇam iti ukte pramāṇa adhīna tvāt prameya siddheḥ arthāt idam uktam bhavati yat codanā praveditam tat dharma svarūpam iti ādi śabdena tad ābhāsam upādattaḥ iti yaḥ tu vivakṣita tirodhānam uktam iti manyate tam pratyāha sva rūpam iti sāmānyatas siddha dharmasya sva rūpa viśeṣaḥ iha sūtryate iti 
ŚVK_2.2	 nanu evam anyataravidhau anyatarasya aśrauta tvāt kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti ekena eva sūtreṇa vyākhyātam iti bhāṣyam na upapadyate atas āha dvayam iti ekatra śruti upātte aparam arthāt vyākhyātam bhavati iti pramāṇa vidhau arthāt svarūpa siddhiḥ uktāḥ sva rūpa vidhau api pramāṇam arthāt sidhyati iti āha svarūpaḥ iti yaḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ iti ukte arthāt codanā dharme pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati na hi apramāṇakam vastu svarūpa kptyai prabhavati iti 
ŚVK_2.3	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa codanā iti kriyāyāḥ pravartakam vacanam iti codanā padārthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tat ayuktam pravartakasya codanā tvāt pratyayasya liṅādeḥ tattvāt atas āha kim ādi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam pratyaya mātrasya pravartana ātmakaḥ vidhiḥ arthaḥ na tu tāvat mātrasya pravartaka tvam sva vyāpare hi puruṣaḥ kartṛ tvena niyujyate aṃśa traya ātmikā ca bhāvanā tad vyāpāraḥ atas samāna pratyaya upādāna śruti bala pratilabdha bhāvanā parirambhaḥ vidhiḥ ātadīya nikhila viśeṣaṇa lābhāt na naram pravartayitum utsahate sakala tad viśeṣaṇa lābhaḥ ca na ṛte vākyāt sidhyati iti yuktam uktam pravartakam vākyam codanā iti evam ca avayava arthaḥ kim iti sādhya ākāṅkṣām nirdiśyādi śabdena sādhana iti kartavyatā kāṅkṣe nirdiśati etat uktam bhavati kim kena katham iti anena ātmanā apekṣitaiḥ sādhya ādibhiḥ pūrṇaḥ pratyayaḥ pravṛtti paryante vidhau samarthaḥ tat rahitasya bhāvasya anuṣṭhāna ayogya tvāt tad pūraṇam ca idam anena ittham kuryāt iti vākyāt iti vākyam eva codanā iti 
ŚVK_2.4	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa codanāyāḥ tad itareṣām ca pramāṇānām dharme prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya pradarśana artham uktam codanā hi bhūtam ityādi tat ayuktam sūtrakāreṇa sadautpattika sūtrābhyām vakṣyamāṇa tvāt bhāṣya kārasya api tatra eva tad vivaraṇam ucitam atas kim atra ākṣetre kleśena atas āha codanā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti samāsapadam samāsaḥ ca sati sāmarthye bhavati viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya artha vacanam ca padānām sāmarthyam na ca vyavaccheda adṛtepadānām viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ atas codanā lakṣaṇa tvayoḥ itaretara vyavacchedāt codanā eva pramāṇam pramāṇam eva codanā iti avadhāraṇa dvayam atra vivakṣitam tat ca upapatti sākāṅkṣam iti mīmāṃsā gotra anusārī bhāṣya kāraḥ anupapatti kāryam vacanam kṣaṇam api akṣamamāṇaḥ pratijñā sūtraḥ eva sambhāvanā prasiddhi artham avadhāraṇa dvaye yukti leśam aspṛśat iti 
ŚVK_2.5	 tatra pramāṇam eta iti avadhāraṇāyām tāvat yukti leśam āha sambhāvyate iti evaṃvidheṣu atīndriyeṣu api artheṣu śabdasya prāmāṇyam sambhāvyate atas pratijñāyām sambhāvitam prāmāṇyam hetunā upapādayiṣyate iti codanā eva iti avadhāraṇe yukti leśam darśayati indriya ādeḥ iti vakṣyati hi sat sūtreṇa indriya ādeḥ asāmarthyam tad anāgata avekṣaṇena bhāṣya kṛtā iha kathitam iti 
ŚVK_2.6	 katham punar śabdasya prāmāṇyam sambhāvyate atas āha atyantā iti artha gocara jñāna janana śaktiḥ hi pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam sā ca evam nāma śabdānām vyāpinī yat atyanta asati api gagana kusuma saṃsarga ādau dhiyam upajanayati iti yuktā teṣu prāmāṇya sambhāvanā iti nanu evam tadvat eva apramāṇyam āpadyate iti prāmāṇyam sādhayataḥ aprāmāṇyam āpatitam atas āha tena iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ utsargaḥ hi jñāna jananena prāmāṇyam tat pauruṣeyeṣu śabdeṣu vandhyā sutaḥ yāti ityādiṣu tat doṣāt apodyeta api apauruṣeye tu śabde pundoṣa abhāvāt svayam aduṣṭa tvāt ca pramāṇa tā eva anapoditā setsyāti iti 
ŚVK_2.7–2.8	 atra codanā hi bhūtam ityādi bhāṣye codanāpadena śabda mātram vivakṣitam iti āha codanā iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti vidhāyakaḥ hi śabdaḥ mukhyaḥ codanā padārthaḥ na ca asau bhūta ādi viṣayaḥ sambhavati iti śabda sāmānyam lakṣayati iti itas ca etat evam iti āha indriya iti samāna jātīyayoḥ eva spardhā arha tvāt śabda mātram eva pratyakṣa ādi sāmānyena spardhām arhati na tad viśeṣaḥ bhavati hi sampradhāraṇā kim lauham ānīyatām uta dāravam iti na tu kim lauham uta khādiram iti 
ŚVK_2.10	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa lakṣyate yena tad lakṣaṇam iti lakṣaṇa padārthaḥ vivṛtaḥ tat idam nimitta abhiprāyam pramāṇa abhiprāyam vā iti āha nimitta mātram iti pramāṇam vā iti atra api pakṣe śiṣya buddhi prathimne pramāṇa vikalpān āha pramāṇam vā iti pramāṇam vā iti atra api pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ pramāṇam hi kāraka viśeṣaḥ vivakṣātaḥ ca kāraka pravṛttiḥ atas yat eva śabda ādīnām vākya artha jñāna avasānānām madhye prakṛṣṭa sādhaka tayā vivakṣyate tat pramāṇam iti pramāṇa prasaṅgena phalam api darśayati pūrveṣām iti śabda ādīnām prāmāṇye vākya artha jñānam phalam āntarālikam tu karaṇa vyāpāra tayā pratipādayitavyam vākya artha jñāne tu pramāṇe hāna ādi buddhiḥ phalam iti vivecanīyam iti 
ŚVK_2.11	 nanu pramāṇa pakṣe jñānam api lakṣaṇa padārthaḥ tat dhi pramāṇam atas katham śabda viśeṣa vācinā codanāpadena sāmānādhikaraṇyam atas āha jñānaḥ iti asya arthaḥ na tāvat jñānam eva pramāṇam iti niyamaḥ vivakṣā vaśena hi śabda ādīnām prāmāṇyam uktam eva api ca yadi jñānam eva pramāṇam tad vivakṣayā ca lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tathā api codanā śabdena tad gocaram jñānam tat kāryam lakṣyate yadi tad vivakṣayā lakṣaṇa śabda prayogaḥ atha tu padārtha jñāna ādi vivakṣayā tadā śabda kāryasya jñānasya yat aparam kāryam padārtha jñāna ādi tat codanāpadena lakṣyate asti hi kārya kāryasya api paramparayā sambandhaḥ lakṣaṇābījam iti 
ŚVK_2.12–2.13	 nimitta arthe tu lakṣaṇa pade śabde ca pramāṇe mukhya arthayoḥ eva dvayoḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti āha nimittā iti atra codanā eva iti avadhāraṇe dharmasya indriya ādi gocara tvam apākṛtam tat ayuktam dravya ādiḥ hi dharmaḥ sa ca aindriyikaḥ eva iti pratyakṣa sūtre vakṣyate atas āha dravya iti ayam arthaḥ satyam dravya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ na tu svarūpeṇa kin tu śreya ssādhana tā rūpeṇa atas na tat ā aindriyikam iti na dharmasya indriya gocara tva āpattiḥ ādi śabdena ākṛteḥ upādānam iti 
ŚVK_2.14	 kena tarhi rūpeṇa amī dharmāḥ yat veda vedyam iti tat darśayati śreyaḥ iti tvam antena śreyassādhana śakti ātmanā hi dravya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ na tad rūpam amīṣām vedāt ṛte śakyate avagantum na hi go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet ityādi śrutim antareṇa go dohana ādayaḥ śreya ssādhanāḥ iti pramāṇa antaram prakramataḥ iti prakṛtam anaindriyika tvam dharmasya upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_2.16	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa na anyat kiñ ca na indriyam iti indriya mātram aśaktam dharmaḥ iti uktam na ca etāvatā codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa upapattiḥ anumāna ādi śākti prasakteḥ anivārita tvāt atas āha pradarśana artham iti yathā hi sūtrakāreṇa sarva pramāṇa animitta tve vivakṣite tad pratyakṣam animittam iti pratyakṣa mātrasya animitta tvam uktam tathā tad śīlam anuvidadhānena bhāṣya kāreṇa pradarśana artham indriya mātrā śaktiḥ upavarṇitā iti na anyat kiñca iti vā pramāṇa sāmānya nirākaraṇāya bhāṣyam chettavyam iti āha na anyat iti katham pūrvasmāt vicchinnam na indriyam iti vyākhyeyam atas āha tat iti indriya pūrvakam hi sarvam itarat indriya aśaktau= aśaktam iti bhāvaḥ na anyat iti vā sarva artham chittvā kiñca iti hetum pṛṣṭvā na indriyam iti pūrvavat hetu tayā vaktavyam iti āha kiñca iti 
ŚVK_2.18–2.19	 nanu anumānam evan jātīyakeṣu samartham anumīyate khalu aṅgārebhyaḥ bhūtaḥ agni indhana saṃyogaḥ tathā ca indhana agni saṃyogāt bhaviṣyat aṅgāra avagamaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ ca dhūmāt agniḥ kuḍya ādi vyavahitaḥ ca svareṇa putraḥ gandhāt ca sūkṣma dravya avagamaḥ atas katham sarva niṣedha siddhiḥ atas āha yadi api iti dvayena satyam bhūta ādau anumānam samartham na tu tat vinā sambandha bodham ubhavati sambandhaḥ ca kvacid sāmānyatas avagamyate yathā agni sāmānyena dhūma sāmānyasya kvacid viśeṣataḥ yathā rohiṇīkṛttikayoḥ na ca dvidhā api kiñcid liṅgam nitya atīndriyeṇa dharmeṇa sambaddham upalabdham yena anumānam bhavet iti atra codayati nanu iti śabdaḥ api na agṛhīta sambandhaḥ pratipādakaḥ bālānām anavagateḥ atas katham śabda mayī codanā dharme pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti pariharati padam iti tatas kim atas āha na tu iti kaḥ tarhi asau atas āha vākya arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.20	 nanu ca na vākyam api sakala varṇa pada upasaṃhāra atikrameṇa kiñcid ati indriyam tattvam api tarhi saṃhatya artham abhidadhati padāni eva atas katham agṛhīta sambandham vākyam vākya arthasya vācakam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha vākyasya iti syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi vākyam vācakam iti abhyupeyate na tu etat evam iti kutas tarhi vākya artha avagatiḥ atas āha padārthānām iti te vā katham agṛhīta sambandhāḥ tam gamayiṣyanti na hi anyasya darśane anya kalpanā yuktāḥ atiprasaṅgāt anyam api tad pratibaddham vidvān anyam anuminoti iti pratibandha balāt ucitam atas āha sambandha iti sambandha darśana nirapekṣāṇām eva padārthānām vākya arthe jñātavye tad bhāva bhāvena tad bhūta adhikaraṇe hetu tvam upapādayiṣyate iti 
ŚVK_2.21.1^1	 atra aparam bhāṣyam nanu atathābhūtam api artham brūyāt codanā yathā yat kiñcana laukikam vacanam nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti evamādi tat ayuktam katham hi yādṛśa tādṛśa rathyā puruṣa vākyam upamānam codanāyāḥ apauruṣeyī hi sā puruṣa āśrayāḥ hi śabde doṣa āśaṅkā atas katham atatha abhāva śaṅkā atra kecid āhuḥ śabda śakti nirūpaṇa dvāreṇa pratijñā kṣepa artham idam bhāṣyam atra kila codanā sūtreṇa kārya rūpaḥ veda arthaḥ iti pratijñātam tat anena ākṣipyate artha asaṃsparśini hi śabde kā iyam artha viśeṣa pratijñā codanānām sarve śabdāḥ khalu na svabhāvataḥ artham spṛśanti yat eva hi yādṛśam ekadā ekena prayuktam vākyam arthavat āsīt tat eva hi tādṛśam apagata sakala kalā dhmāta ādi doṣam anyadā bhavati vitatham na ca etat availakṣaṇye yuktam yat āhuḥ lakṣaṇa yuktasya bādhā sambhave tad lakṣaṇam eva bādhitam bhavati iti na ca arthavatām pratyakṣa ādīnām eṣa dharmaḥ dṛśyate 
ŚVK_2.21.1^2	 na hi timira ādi doṣa rahitam cakṣuḥ samyak asamyak ca jñānam janayati iti dṛṣṭa pūrvam api ca svābhāvike artha sambandhe katham asati arthe jñānam janayati tathā hi bādhitaḥ api saṃsargaḥ śata kṛtvas śabdāt avagamyate aṅgulī agre hasti yūtha śatam iti na ca idam anyatra dṛṣṭam na hi cakṣuṣā śuktau rajatam iti veditāyām na idam rajatam iti bādhaka udaye cakṣuḥ eva punārajatam iti bodhayati śabdaḥ eva tu niraṅkuśaḥ sva gocaram anya gocaram vā pramāṇa antareṇa bādhitam api bodhayati iti nūnam asamīkṣita pārama arthika artha sadbhāvaḥ bodhayan api artham anarthakaḥ iti pratijānīmahe tat idam uktam artha asaṃsparśi yat pramāṇam tasya bādhaka utpattau satyām na punar pratipakṣa vijñānam tad nimittam eva upalabhyate śabde punar spaṣṭe api bādhaka jñāne punar śabda nimittam eva pratipakṣa vijñānam udeti aṅgulī agre hasti yūtha śatam iti  
ŚVK_2.21.2^1	 vatham tarhi śabdāt artha avagatiḥ sāmayikī iti vadanti yat āhuḥ anāgamaḥ ca saḥ abhyāsaḥ samayaḥ kaiścid iṣyate abhyāsāt pratibhā hetuḥ sarva śabdaḥ samāsatas iti imam ca ākṣepam apanetum idam bhāṣyam vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate bravīti ca vitatham ca ityādi tasya ca ayam arthaḥ artham avabodhayati artha asaṃsparśi ca iti citram na hi pratyāyya pratyāyaka bhāvāt anyaḥ śabda arthayoḥ asti sambandhaḥ sa ca idam artham avabodhayati katham artha asaṃsparśī syāt syāt etat bādhaka jñāna samadhigamyam artha asaṃsparśi tvam uktam ca idam sati api bādhaka jñāne laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śabdāt eva jñānam utpadyate aṅguli ādi vākyebhyaḥ iti mā evam anabhijñaḥ bhavān bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya 
ŚVK_2.21.2^2	 aṅgulī agre hasti yūtha śatam iti pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhitam na punar hasti yūtha śatam iti pramāṇa antara dṛṣṭam hi artham parasmai pratipādayitum puruṣāḥ prayuñjate vākyāni tatas ca pramāṇa antareṇa ayam anena dṛṣṭaḥ iti etāvat ca śabdāt avagamyate atas atra pramāṇa antareṇa tasya arthasya yat darśanam tat eva bādhitam bhavati hasti yūthe tu śabdaḥ na pramāṇam iti tad śabdāt aprasaktam eva iti na tat bādhyate katham tarhi hasti yūtha saṃsarga avagamaḥ padānām sannidhāna doṣāt padārtha viveka agrahaṇa nibandhanaḥ ayam bhramaḥ na punar ābhidhānikaḥ saṃsargaḥ yogya tā hi nibandhanam anvita abhidhāne abhihita anvaye vā na ca aṅgulī agrasya kari dhāraṇa yogya tā sambhavati tasmāt na artha asaṃsparśī śabdaḥ iti sūktam artha viśeṣa pratijñānam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.21.3^1	 imau tu ākṣepa parihārau na mṛṣyāmahe tatra yat tāvat uktam kārya rūpaḥ veda arthaḥ iti codanā sūtreṇa pratijñātam iti tat ayuktam bhāṣya virodhāt bhāṣya kāraḥ hi kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti ekena eva sūtreṇa vyākhyātam iti uktvā sūtram avatārayati tad pramāṇa svarūpayoḥ ekam śrautam anyadārtham iti eva vaktum yuktam uktam ca tat vārttika kṛtā kārya artha tā pratijñānam punar aśābaram ajaiminīyam ca iti na hi codanā sūtre tādṛśaḥ padārthānām anvayaḥ dṛśyate na ca padārtha anvaya nirapekṣaḥ vākya arthaḥ yuktaḥ katham ca pramāṇa lakṣaṇe kārya artha tā pratijñānam saṅgacchate 
ŚVK_2.21.3^2	 nanu ca prāmāṇyam eva kārya artha tām vinā na sambhavati iti pramāṇa lakṣaṇa anuguṇā eva kārya artha tā pratijñā na hi akārya artham vacaḥ prāmāṇyam arhati anapekṣā lakṣaṇam hi tat na ca siddhārtham vacanam anapekṣam bhavati tasya hi sādhaka bādhakayoḥ anyatara upanipātaḥ sambhavati tatra sādhaka sambhave anuvāda tvam itaratra bādhita viṣaya tvāt apramāṇa tvam atas eva ca apauruṣeya tvam api veda vākyānām pramāṇa antara pratipanna viṣaya tā hi pauruṣeya tā na punar pada varṇa ādi kārya tā na ca atīndriyam artham puruṣāḥ śaknuvanti avagantum atas katham atīndriya arthān śabdān nibandhīyuḥ iti prayojana vat artha viśeṣa pratijñānam iti 
ŚVK_2.21.4^1	 atra vadāmaḥ yat tāvat siddhārtha tvāt anuvāda tvam iti tat ayuktam yadi pramāṇa antara siddhaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti siddham artham bodhayati bhavatu tat sa apekṣa tvāt apramāṇam bhūta artham api tu yat jñāna antara agocara tayā sva gocaram avagamayati na tat sa apekṣam atha matam pariniṣpanna viṣayāṇi khalu pratyakṣa ādīni tāni tādṛśa viṣaya viśeṣe sambhavanti iti pramāṇam anuvādīkurvanti iti tat na na hi pramāṇa antara sambhauvanayā pramāṇam anuvādaḥ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt dūra sthaḥ hi vahniḥ anumānāt avagataḥ śakyaḥ āsīdatā pratyakṣayitum iti na tasya anuvāda tvam āpadyate yat tu bādhita viṣaya tvāt apramāṇa tvam iti tat astu yadā tu na etat evam iti viparyayaḥ abādhita artham tu siddhārtha gocaram api kim apramāṇam bhaviṣyati tat api bādhaka sambhā vanayā pramāṇam iti ced astu tāvat pauruṣeyeṣu apauruṣeyam tu siddhārtham api katham bādhya tayā sambhāvyeta 
ŚVK_2.21.4^2	 na hi aduṣṭa kāraṇa jam jñānam bādhyate śabde ca na svābhāvikāḥ doṣāḥ puruṣaḥ hi ayathārtha jñāna anurodhena śabdam dūṣayati nanu siddhārtham apauruṣeyam iti evam durbhaṇam iti uktam kim idānīm atīndriya artha tvam apauruṣeya tvam hanta evam surabhi gagana kusumam iti api vākyam apauruṣeyam āpadyeta tasya api na kenacid indriyeṇa arthaḥ avagamyate syāt etat asat artham eva idam vākyam sat artham ca atīndriya artham apauruṣeyam iti vaidikam vākyam kārya artham katham sat artham tasya api na pramāṇa antareṇa arthaḥ anubhūyate mā anubhāvi na tu pratikṣipyate śabdāt avagamyate ca gagana kusuma vākyam tu pramāṇa antara pratikṣipta artham eva na asti iti hi tad artham avagamayati kena punar pramāṇa antareṇa asya arthaḥ pratikṣipyate na tāvat bhāva pramāṇaiḥ bhāva viṣaya tvena abhāva anavabhāsanāt abhāvaḥ tu pramāṇam anabhimatam eva bhavatām nanu asti tāvat na asti iti jñānam tat pratikṣepsyati 
ŚVK_2.21.4^3	 tat bhoḥ kim pramāṇam apramāṇam vā na apramāṇam pratikṣepāya alam pramāṇa tve ca ṣaṣṭha pramāṇa āpattiḥ nanu ca gagana kusumam asti na asti iti ca vyāhanyate atas vyāghātāt gagana kusuma vākyam asat artham kim atra vyāhanyate sat asat tvam hi vastunaḥ siddhasya paraspara viruddham avagamyamānam vyāghāta saṃvidam upajanayati na ca iha paraspara viruddha sada sattva avagamaḥ nissvabhāva tvāt abhāvasya bhavat siddhānte nanu asti tāvat na asti iti śabda prayogaḥ mā bhūt jñānam atas sa nabhassumanaḥ sattām praṇotsyati na artha nibandhana tvāt śabdānāḥ virodhasya na ca na asti iti kaścid asya arthaḥ dṛśyate na ca anarthakaḥ śabdaḥ artha antaram viruṇaddhi nanu na ayam anarthakaḥ viviktam hi kusumena gaganam eva tasya arthaḥ viviktam iti avācyam anadhika artha tvāt gaganam tu gaganapada praveditam iti punaruktam na asti iti paryāyata āpattiḥ ca 
ŚVK_2.21.4^4	 dṛśyate pratiyogini kusume kevala gagana upalambhaḥ na asti iti ucyate iti ced sa tarhi na asti iti kusuma vat gaganam api na syāt eva na asti iti pada āspadam eva asat iti laukikāḥ manyante tasmāt na asti iti jñānam pramāṇam apramāṇam vā śabdaḥ vā na asti iti gagana kusumam na pratikṣipati iti tat api sva śabdāt avagatam sat eva syāt yadi tu tathāvidham eva na asti iti vaktum icchā na śabda prayogam vārayāmaḥ vastu sattā tu na nivārayitum śakyate iti uktam atas sat ati indriya artham gagana kusuma vākyam apauruṣeyam āpannam āyuṣmatām yathā ca idam asat artham tathā vaidikam api atīndriya kārya artham asat artham na hi pramāṇa agocaram vastu asti iti śakyate vaktum na ca kāryam pratyakṣa ādi gocaram na ca śabda gamyam apadārthasya avākya artha tvāt agṛhīta sambandhasya ca āpadārtha tvāt pramāṇa antara agocare ca sambandhasya grahītum aśakya tvāt prapañcayiṣyate ca etat aupattika sūtre iti alam anena ati parispandena 
ŚVK_2.21.5^1	 atas siddham idam na kārya artha tvāt apauruṣeya tvam iti katham tarhi pūrva apara koṭi virahāt yasya khalu na pūrva apara koṭī prasaṃkhyāyete tat nityam yathā gaganam evan ca vedāḥ iti nityāḥ kā punar iyam nityatā vedānām yadi nitya varṇa pada ārambhaḥ samānaḥ ayam laukika vākyeṣu atha ānupūrvi a nitya tvāt tāni anityāni tulyam tat anitya tvam veda vākyānām atas na puruṣa pramāṇa gocara agocara artha tvāt anyat pauruṣeya apauruṣeya tvam puṃveda vacasām vācyaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ saḥ ucyate kramavanti hi padāni vākyam ucyate tat yatra svatantraḥ eva puruṣaḥ kramam āracayati tat pauruṣeyam yatra tu krama racanāyām asvatantraḥ puruṣaḥ yathā eva pūrva pūrva adhyetṛbhiḥ uktaḥ kramaḥ tathā eva vivakṣati tad apauruṣeyam anitya tve api ca krama vyaktīnām avāntara jātitaḥ tattva anya tva vyavasthā śabda adhikaraṇe vakṣyate pada nitya tve ca eṣaḥ eva prakāraḥ tatra eva darśayiṣyate 
ŚVK_2.21.5^2	 pūrva apara koṭi virahaḥ eva vede api katham iti yaḥ manyatesa vaktavyaḥ na tāvat pūrva apara koṭī vedānām pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyete na ca anumīyete viparīta anumānāt evam hi atra anumīyate anāgataḥ kālaḥ na veda śūnyaḥ kāla tvāt idānīn tana kāla vat iti evam atīte api kāle prayogaḥ darśayitavyaḥ na ca prāgabhāvaḥ vedānām kaiścid upalabdhaḥ jagat ādau vedāḥ maheśvareṇa praṇītāḥ iti ced na jagat ādeḥ abhāvāt na cāru ācīnaḥ eva kāle kenacid vedāḥ sandṛbdhāḥ iti kartṛ smaraṇam asti naca asmaryamāṇaḥ api jīrṇa kūpa ādi vat āsīt kartā iti yuktam vaktum tatra hi prayojana abhāvāt upapadyeta api kartuḥ asmaraṇam adṛṣṭa artha nirmiteṣu vedeṣu pratyayitatara nirmātṛ smaraṇam antareṇa ke śraddadhīran vakṣyati ca vaidikaḥ vyavahāraḥ tu na kartṛ smaraṇāt ṛte iti tat evam pūrva apara koṭi virahāt eva apauruṣeya tvam na kārya artha tayā iti vyartham tad pratijñānam avyāpakam ca mantra artha vāda upaniṣadām atādarthyāt 
ŚVK_2.21.6^1	 nanu ca teṣām api kārya artha tā dvitīye pāde vakṣyate vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt iti iha api ca bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam codanā hi bhūtam bhavantam iti ādi śaknoti avagamayitum antena etat uktam bhavati kāryam eva pratipādayantī codanā bhūta ādikam api avagamayati na tu pratipādayati tat uktam śaknoti avagamayitum iti atra ucyate na tāvat artha vādānām kārya artha tāḥ artha vāda adhikaraṇe uktāḥ api tu bhūta arthānām eva stutyāḥ vidhi anvayaḥ darśitaḥ codanā hi bhūtam ityādi bhāṣya abhiprāyaḥ tu anantaram eva vārttikakāreṇa vyākhyātaḥ yaḥ tu ayam asya arthaḥ varṇyate codanā hi bhūta ādikam gamayati na tu pratipādayati iti tat na yadi bhūta ādikam gamayati katham na pratipādayati na hi gamaka tvāt anyat pratipādaka tvam atha kārya paratvam anena prakāreṇa varṇyate sarvam hi pada jātam kārya param na bhūta ādi svarūpe pramāṇam iti katham anādi anantam vijñānam ānandam brahma upaniṣadbhyaḥ setsyati kasmin ca kārya arthe prāmāṇyam upaniṣadām nanu tāsām api pratipatti kartavyatā para tvam eva 
ŚVK_2.21.6^2	 asti ca jñāna vidhānam ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti tat ayam arthaḥ bhavati vijñānam ānandam ātmānam jānīyāt iti nanu evam asvarūpa parāt śabdāt katham ātma rūpa siddhiḥ na hi anya paraḥ śabdaḥ artha antare pramāṇam pratyuta viparītam api sambhāvyeta atad rūpaḥ eva hi tad rūpa jñāna kartavyatā vacanam loke dṛśyate tathā apitari eva pitaram jānīyāt iti vede ca anudgīthaḥ eva uṅkāre udgītha upāsanā vidhānam om iti etat akṣaram udgītham upāsīta iti syāt etat pramāṇa antarāt eva ātma svarūpa siddhiḥ iti keṣām pramāṇa antarāt saṃsāriṇaḥ hi na tāvat kārya karaṇa saṅghāta atiriktam saccidānandam brahma aparokṣam īkṣante te hi deham eva ātmānam manyamānāḥ duḥkhinam anityam jaḍam ca puruṣam jānanti ye punar apavartita nikhila anādya vidyā anubandha upadarśita śarīra indriya ādi prapañcāḥ samutkhāta sakalam iti mātṛ meya māna vibhāgam aparispandam ānandam phala bhūtam brahma adhirūḍhāḥ te kim kena paśyeyuḥ atas na kathañcid ātma svarūpam sidhyet tasmāt upapattitaḥ granthataḥ ca na kārya artha tā pratijñātum śakyate 
ŚVK_2.21.7^1	 yat ca nanu atathābhūtam iti artha asaṃsparśi tayā śabdānām pratijñā ākṣipyate iti tat ayuktam tathā hi kaḥ ayam artha asaṃsparśaḥ yadi tāvat saṃyoga ādi anyatama sambandha abhāvaḥ saḥ anujñāyate eva na hi asau śabda arthayoḥ saṃyoga ādi lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ abhyupeyate atha artha an avabodhaka tvam kutas artha saṃvid samayāt iti ced nanu ayam sambandha parihāraḥ eva pratimarti ādi pakṣa asambhavāt samayaḥ nirākariṣyate kim tad nirākaraṇa artham atra prayasyate yat ca artha asaṃsparśita anirākaraṇa artham uktam pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhyate na punar hasti yūtham iti tasya kaḥ arthaḥ iti na vidmaḥ pramāṇa antara dṛṣṭa artha viṣayaḥ eva laukikaḥ śabdaḥ sa katham pramāṇa antara bādhena bādhyate syāt matam deśa kāla viśeṣa avacchinnam artham pramāṇa antarāṇi bodhayanti idam idānīm atra ca iti 
ŚVK_2.21.7^2	 atas nadī ādi viśeṣa phala saṃsarga bādhe tāni bādhitāni bhavanti śabdaḥ tu deśa kālān avacchinnam artham ācakṣāṇaḥ na saṃsarga viśeṣa bādhe bādhitaḥ bhavati iti tat ayuktam yaḥ eva saṃsargaḥ yadā vaktuḥ iṣṭaḥ tam eva tadānīm śabdaḥ abhidhatte na saṃsarga mātram na hi nānāvidha aneka nadī tīra phala saṃsarga viśeṣa varti sāmānyam asti yaḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt na ca avivakṣitaḥ eva saṃsargaḥ śabdena abhidhīyate iti sāmpratam vaktṛ vācakayoḥ asaṃpratipattyā vyavahāra asiddheḥ narmadā tīre phalāni santi iti vā viśeṣa vacane kaḥ parihāraḥ tatra api āsan bhaviṣyanti vā iti ced na santi iti vartamāna apadeśāt api ca atyanta asambhāvī vandhyā suta ādi saṃsargaḥ kadā kutra vā bhaviṣyati yaḥ śabda artha bādha parihārāya ghaṭiṣyate 
ŚVK_2.21.7^3	 saṃsarga avagamā palāpaḥ tu saṃvid viruddhaḥ eva yadi tu ucyate sarvam eva laukika vākyam arthe na pramāṇam vaktṛ jñāne aprāmāṇyāt eva hi āha api ca pauruṣeyāt vacanāt evam ayam puruṣaḥ veda iti bhavati pratyayaḥ na evam arthaḥ iti atas na kvacid śabda artha bādhaḥ iti sādhu parihṛtam evaṃvādinā śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam arthe na pramāṇam spṛśati ca artham iti api ca mā nāma bhavatu arthe pramāṇam vaktṛ jñāne tāvat pramāṇam eva atas saḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti tad bādhe api śabda artha bādhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ eva syāt matam na vaktṛ jñāne śabdaḥ vācaka tayā pramāṇam laiṅgika tvāt saṃvidaḥ saṃvid kāraṇakaḥ hi śabdaḥ kārya bhūtaḥ avagatḥ kāraṇa bhūtām saṃvidam anumāpayati kāryāt ca kāraṇa buddhiḥ anumānam iti avivādam 
ŚVK_2.21.7^4	 āha ca na prasiddha kāraṇa tvāt saṃvid iti idam tad artha asaṃsparśitā parihāra rahasyam kim atra vācyam aparam śabdaḥ na arthe na jñāne vā pramāṇam tasmāt na artha asaṃsparśī iti atha ucyeta na maḥ śabdaḥ na arthe pramāṇam iti svābhāvikaḥ hi vṛddha vyavahāre śabda arthayoḥ avadhṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ loke tu kvacid vyabhicāra darśanāt vaktṛ pramāṇa paratantra tvāt vākyānām vaktṛ jñāna paryavasānam na arthe niścaya janaka tvam vede tu vaktuḥ abhāvāt na arthe prāmāṇyam vihanyate na hi tatra pramāṇa antara paratantraḥ śabdaḥ vartate iti tat na na hi kvacid vyabhicāra darśanena pramāṇam anartha viṣayam bhavati na hi śuktau rajata jñānam bādhitam iti sva gocaram anya gocaram vā bhavati artham eva tu doṣāt anyathā sthitam anyathā bodhayati iti vṛtti kāra granthe vakṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_2.21.8^1	 tat iha api sarvam śābdam artha viṣayam eva kiñcid eva tu doṣa vaśāt viparyeti iti yuktam vaktum api ca yadi puṃgirām arthe na prāmāṇyam kutas tarhi viśiṣṭā vaktṛdhīḥ anumāsyate na hi anāsādita artha viśeṣa pariṣvaṅgāḥ svarasena saṃvidaḥ api anumīyante tad avaśyam āsām viśeṣam anumitsatāḥ artha viśeṣa parirambhaḥ vaktavyaḥ na ca anārūḍhaḥ buddhau arthaḥ vaktṛ buddhim viśinaṣṭi yat api eke manyante puṃvākyeṣu tāvat kvacid vyabhicāra darśanāt arthe niścayaḥ na jāyate na ca aniścitaḥ arthaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati na hi jñānam aniścaya ātmakam kiñcid asti 
ŚVK_2.21.8^2	 tasmāt ajñāte api vākya arthe śrotuḥ ayam vimarśaḥ bhavati ayam āptaḥ anyonya anvaya yogya artham eva pada jātam bravīti tena nūnam amunā am īṣām anvayaḥ jñātaḥ iti vaktuḥ eva anvaya jñānam anuminoti śrotuḥ tu vimarśa mātram iti tat ayuktam katham hi śrotā buddhau= anārūḍham eva anvaya viśeṣam vaktṛ jñāna viśeṣaṇa tayā kalpayati tālu ādi vyāpārāt eva āptasya pratītya anvaya mayam vākyam racayati iti anvaya dhiyam anuminoti iti ced na anvaya jñāna mātra anumānāt viśiṣṭa anvaya jñāna anumānam tu vaktari na ātmīya viśeṣa jñānam antareṇa upapadyate 
ŚVK_2.21.8^3	 yat tu katham aniścitaḥ arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ tredhā khalu api vaktāraḥ nirūpita āpta bhāvaḥ nirūpita anāpta bhāvaḥ anirūpita ubhaya rūpaḥ ca sarvatra ca śabdāt nirṇayaḥ eva param nirūpita āpta bhāve samyak etat avagatam anena iti vaktari niścayaḥ eva pratitiṣṭhati viparīte viparyeti anirūpita anyatara rūpe api śabdāt niścayaḥ eva kvacid vyabhicārāt tāvat āgantukaḥ sandehaḥ na kvacid api śabdaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ 
ŚVK_2.21.8^4	 nanu tathā api āpta pramāṇa anusārī śabdāt niścayaḥ iti pūrvam utpannam api jñānam vyabhicāra darśana bhūva saṃśayena pratibaddham na pramāṇam uttara kālam ca āpta pramāṇa anusāriṇi nirṇaye anuvādaḥ iti kadā pramāṇam bhaviṣyati sva kālaḥ iti brūmaḥ sva kāle ca tena utpattimatā saṃśaya ātmanā ca asau arthaḥ paricchinnaḥ etāvat ca pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam atas katham apramāṇam bhaviṣyati yadi param śāṅketavyabhicāra nivṛtti artham āpta tvena doṣa abhāva mātram āśrīyate sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇam ca idam śaṅkita doṣa nivṛttyā autsargikam prāmāṇyam iti na ca pramāṇa antara apratītam apūrvam artham prati yatas śrotuḥ anuvādaḥ śābdaḥ iti yuktam 
ŚVK_2.21.8^5	 na hi ārāt caitraḥ ayam iti niścite punar ca kutaścid maitra sādṛśyāt sandigdhe saḥ eva ayam iti niścite pūrvam caitra jñānam apramāṇam bhavati atas vaktṛ pramāṇa niścayena pramāṇam eva etat abhūt iti śrotā niścinoti tasmāt dvayam api etat pramāṇam yat ca śabdāt jñānam yaḥ ca vaktṛ pramāṇa anusārī niścayaḥ prathamam apūrva artha paricchedāt param tu śaṅkā nirākaraṇāt uktam ca vārttika kṛtā prāmāṇya sthāpanam tu syāt vaktṛ dhī hetu sambhavāt iti yat api na aniścaya ātmakam jñānam asti iti uktam tat api asmān parājitya vaktum ucitam 
ŚVK_2.21.8^6	 pramāṇam bhramaḥ saṃśayaḥ smaraṇam saṃvādaḥ iti pañcadhā jñānam vibhajāmahe tasmāt sarvam eva śābdam artha gocaram pramāṇam apramāṇam ca doṣa sadasadbhāva nibandhanaḥ ca pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ pratyakṣa ādi vat eva yat āha yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti bhavati pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ iti na hi idam akṣaja jñāna mātra abhiprāyam saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ iti pratyaya mātra parigrahāt pauruṣeyaḥ ca śabdaḥ svayam aduṣṭaḥ api vaktṛ doṣāt eva duṣyati nanu ca jñāna kāraṇam eva duṣṭam jñānam dūṣayati śabde ca śabdaḥ jñāna kāraṇam na vaktā 
ŚVK_2.21.8^7	 sa hi śabda vyaktau eva upayuktaḥ duṣṭena api vaktra abhivyaktaḥ śabdaḥ vigalita nikhila kalā dhmāta ādi doṣaḥ eva katham asamī cīna pratyaya utpāda kāraṇam bhaviṣyati na hi timira ādayaḥ iva cakṣuḥ ādīnām duṣṭena api vaktra uccaritānām śabdānām doṣāḥ upalabhyante na doṣa vaicitryāt na hi eka rūpāḥ eva sarve doṣāḥ kārya darśanāt tu kiñcid eva kvacid doṣa pakṣe nikṣipyate tat iha maṇeḥ iva aruṇya bodhe japā kusuma sannidhānam anākāṅkṣita ayogya pada sannikarṣaḥ eva śābde doṣaḥ tathābhūta uccāraṇena duṣṭaḥ pumān śabdam dūṣayati tatas siddhaḥ doṣa sadasadbhāva nibandhanaḥ śābde pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ 
ŚVK_2.21.8^8	 nanu aṅgīkṛte śabdāt artha bodhe yat tad artha asaṃsparśitā siddhi artham uktam bādhite api arthe śabda nibandhanam eva jñānam utpadyate iti tatra kaḥ parihāraḥ śabdāt artha bādha parihāreṇa tat asmābhiḥ parijihīrṣitam kim atra duṣpariharam na hi bādhita viṣayāḥ api dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra pīta śaṅkha pratibimba ādi vibhramāḥ na punar āvirbhavanti yāvat doṣa bhāvinaḥ hi te punar api cakṣuṣā eva upajanyante tat iha api yāvat ayogya anvaya pada sannidhānam ayathārtha jñāna udayaḥ iti kim anupapannam tasmāt etau ākṣepa parihārau iti 
ŚVK_2.21.9	 anyathā varṇayiṣyan= ākṣepa bhāṣya abhiprāyam tāvat āha nitya tva ādeḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ bauddha lokāyatikayoḥ idam pratyavasthānam na hi te nityān varṇān padāni veda vākyāni vā manyante na ca unmatta pralapita prāyāṇi prajāpati vapa utkhanana ādīni vākyāni vidhi eka vākya tayā prāśasti apratipādanena pramāṇam āhuḥ atas yuktam yādṛśa tādṛśa rathyā puruṣa vākya upamānam codanānām tat sādharmyāt vaitathya anumānam iti athavā nitya tvam abhyupetya prasaṅgam āpādayanti iti āha abhyupetya iti evam hi manyate yadi nityāḥ vedāḥ sutarām apramāṇam bhaviṣyanti pauruṣeya vākyam hi kadācid guṇavat vaktṛ praṇītam pramāṇam bhavati nityam tu kutas pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.22	 nanu pauruṣeyam api na vaktṛ guṇa apekṣayā pramāṇam api tu svabhāva ādave katham hi utpannam aviparyastam asandigdham ca jñānam apramāṇam bhaviṣyati atas kim apauruṣeya tayā sutarām aprāmāṇyam āpadyate atas āha pramāṇa antarā iti pramāṇa antara dṛṣṭa artha gocaram hi puṃvacaḥ katham sva mahimnā pramāṇam bhaviṣyati na hi pramāṇa antara paratantrā smṛtiḥ svatas pramāṇam bhavati bhavati ca atra prayogaḥ na svatas pramāṇam puṃvacaḥ pramāṇa antara prāpta artha prāpaṇāt smṛti vat iti 
ŚVK_2.23–2.24	 nanu ca nirapekṣaḥ eva āpta puruṣa vākya mātrāt vyavahāraḥ pratāyamānaḥ dṛśyate sa katham asvataḥ pramāṇāt utpatsyate atas āha nūnam iti evam hi manyate vaktṛ gocara artham hi puṃvacaḥ atas svayam adṛṣṭe api arthe nūnam ayam arthaḥ vaktṛ anubhūtaḥ iti vaktṛ anubhava purassaram eva āptokti nibandhanā prāmāṇikasya matiḥ yuktāḥ na punar āpta tvam adṛṣṭena rūpeṇa prāmāṇya kāraṇam yaḥ tu anapekṣita pramāṇa antaraḥ eva pauruṣeyāt vyavaharati sa pratihanyeta api iti kasmāt evam buddhiḥ yuktāḥ atas āha na ātmīyāt iti dṛṣṭāntena tat evam loka vākyeṣu pramāṇa antara paratantram pramāṇyam upapāditam codanāsu āpādayati tathā iti 
ŚVK_2.25	 katham punar utpannam asandigdham aviparyastam pramāṇa antareṇa jñānam apramāṇam bhaviṣyati atas āha tena iti yadā hi pramāṇa antara paratantram sarva śabdānām prāmāṇyam iti upapāditam vede ca abhyupeta nitya tve vaktṛ pramāṇa antara abhāvaḥ tadā katham pramāṇam bhaviṣyati na hi svatantram aniyata nimittam jñānam pramāṇam bhaviṣyati na hi pratibhā jñānam utpannam iti etāvatā pramāṇam iṣṭam atas vedāt utpannam jñānam apramāṇam svātantryāt pratibhā ādi vat iti 
ŚVK_2.26	 darśayitavyam prayoga antaram āha svarga iti pratyakṣa ādyagata artha tvāt iti hetu siddhi artham uktam svarga yāga ādi sambandha viṣayāḥ iti yaḥ hi manyate bhāvanā hi vākya arthaḥ sa ca spandaḥ vā prayatnaḥ vā sarvathā pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ avagamyate iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti tam pratyucyate kasyacid kenacid kriyā bhāvanā sā sva rūpeṇa pratyakṣā api sādhya sādhana sambandha ātmanā śabdāt eva avagamyate atas eva dharmasya atīndriya tvam api setsyati sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ eva śabdasya viṣayaḥ na hi anāsādita yāga svarga ādi sādhya sādhana sambandha viśeṣaḥ bhāvayet iti śabda arthaḥ atas siddham pratyakṣa ādya gata artha tvāt iti atra ca lokāyatika prayoge buddha vākyam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad prayoge lokāyatika vākyam iti draṣṭavyam iti 
ŚVK_2.27–2.28	 etasmin eva sādhye dṛṣṭānta hetu antaram āha yat vā iti siddham ca nityānām vedānām āpta apraṇīta tvam iti vedānām eva vā apramāṇa tvam nitva tvāt vyoma ādi vat iti ye ca bauddhā nityam vyoma iti saṅgirante teṣām ayam prayogaḥ iti idānīm śva varāha kalaha nyāyena naiyāyika ādi mata anujñayā tāvat nāstikamatasthaḥ eva vādī mīmāṃsakam prati prayogam āha yadi vā iti yadi avaśyam vedāḥ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam param yathā vaiśeṣikaiḥ uktam tad vacanāt āmnāyasya prāmāṇyam iti tathā ucyatām yat punar idam mīmāṃsakaiḥ uktam nityāḥ vedāḥ pramāṇam ca iti tad ati dūram apabhraṣṭam ca iti bhāvaḥ sarva śabdena ca dṛṣṭa artha puruṣa upadeśaiḥ manu ādi upadeśaiḥ ca siddha sādhana tā āśaṅkām nirākaroti tat ayam arthaḥ bhavati dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa arthāḥ api vaidikyaḥ codanāḥ dharmiṇyaḥ puruṣa adhīna prāmāṇyāḥ iti sādhyam vākya tvāt puruṣa ukti vat iti svatas vā na pramāṇam iti pratijñāya tau eva hetu dṛṣṭāntau iti āha svatas vā iti 
ŚVK_2.29–2.30	 prāmāṇyam vā dharmī iti pratijñāya nara apekṣam iti sādhayitavyam śabdaiḥ sambadhyamāna tvāt aprāmāṇya vat iti hetu dṛṣṭāntau vācyau iti āha prāmāṇyam vā iti atra api sarva śabdasya tat eva prayojanam nara apekṣa prāmāṇya vādinām ca aprāmāṇyam tad apekṣam iti siddham eva iti api ca yat eva yat kāraṇakam tasya eva tad viparyayāt viparyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā tejaḥ kāraṇakasya dharmasya tad viparyaye jale śaityam evam śabda prāmāṇyasya api vaktṛ guṇa viparyayāt viparyayaḥ dṛśyate tasmāt idam api tad kāraṇakam athavā yat na yat kāraṇakam tat na tad viparyayāt viparyeti āloka viparyayāt iva ghaṭaḥ na ca tathā vaktṛ guṇa viparyaye prāmāṇyam na viparyeti tasmāt tad kāraṇakam iti vītāvīta prayogau hṛdi nidhāya āha na syāt iti eṣā ca prayoga paramparā tārkikāṇām cittam anurañjayitum vārttika kṛtā praṇītā iti veditavyam sarvatra ca atra prayoga arthe nanu atathābhūtam ityādi bhāṣyam su vyākhyānam iti na pratiprayogam vivṛtam iti 
ŚVK_2.31	 yadi tu nirākṛta sva pakṣaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ sidhyatu tāvat nara apekṣam eva veda prāmāṇyam iti brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ na evam sidhyati prasiddhe hi vaktṛ guṇa bhāvaḥ sidhyati api na ca vedānām praṇetuḥ guṇa sadbhāve pramāṇam asti pratyakṣa ādi abhāvāt āgamasya ca tat praṇītatya tad guṇa sadbhāve aprāmāṇyāt nitya prāmāṇyasya ca anantaram eva nirākṛta tvāt sarvam ca idam abhipretya nanu iti coditam iti āha evam sthitaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.32	 evam ākṣepa bhāṣya abhiprāyam uktvā parihāra bhāṣya abhiprāyam vivariṣyan= ākṣipati tāvat tatra iti evam hi bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate bravīti ca vitatham ca iti tat ayuktam na hi pratyayaḥ utpannaḥ iti eva pramāṇam bhavati yadi hi tathā syāt buddha vākye api mṛṣā tvena mīmāṃsakaḥ pakṣīkṛte śakyam idam vaktum vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate bravīti ca vitatham ca iti tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ pratihanyeran tasmāt jāti uttaram idam jātiḥ nāma vādinā sthāpana ahetau pratyukte yaḥ prateṣedhāyāsam arthaḥ hetuḥ jāti uttaraṃca kecid kvacid viṣaya viśeṣe sādhu eva manyante evam hi āhuḥ duṣṭa sādhana prayoge duṣṭam eva uttaram deyam iti tat ca ayuktam nigraha sthāna dvaya āpatteḥ yaḥ hi santam doṣam anuktvā anyam asantam jalpati tasya paryanuyojya upekṣaṇa niranuyojya anuyoga ākhye dve nigraha sthāne syātām tasmāt anuttaram eva idam iti 
ŚVK_2.33^1	 atra anantaram ākṣipta bhāṣya samādhānam upekṣya eva tāvat aupoddhātikīm kathām avatārayati sarva vijñānam iti evam hi manyate yadā hi sarva saṃvidām autsargikam prāmāṇyam bādha kāraṇa doṣa adhīnam ca aprāmāṇyam iti siddham bhaviṣyati vede ca apauruṣeye tad ubhaya abhāvāt asandigdha artha pravedanāt ca prāmāṇye siddhe yadi param jñāna anutpattitaḥ vaitathyam āśaṅkyeta tatra vipratiṣiddham idam bravīti jñānam janayati vitatham na janayati iti samañjasam eva uttaram bhaviṣyati iti nanu tathā api para adhīnam śabda prāmāṇyam iti pūrva pakṣite tanmātrasya eva svatas prāmāṇya pratipādanena siddhāntayitum ucitam kim mahā viṣaya vicāreṇa ucyate prāsaṅgikam sarva vacanam 
ŚVK_2.33^2	 api ca yāvat jñāna svabhāva anubandhi prāmāṇyam iti sāmānyatas na sādhyate tāvat tad viśeṣe kvacid sādhitam api prāmāṇyam na pramāṇam svatas śābda jñānam jñāna tvāt jñāna antara vat iti abhibhūyeta api yat jātīya anubaddham hi yat rūpam tat jātīya antaram api na atikrāmati auṣṇyam iva agni jātīyam atas yadi jñāna jātyā anubaddham paratas prāmāṇyam tat katham śābdam api atikrāmet āha ca sāmānya anugatā śaktiḥ yā kācana nirūpitā tad anvitaḥ viśeṣaḥ api tad dvāra vyapadeśa bhāj iti sarva jñāna anubandhi svatas prāmāṇyam āgantunā prāmāṇyena apodyate iti sādhite nirapavādam vedānām pramāṇyam setsyati iti sūktam eva sarva vacanam eṣā ca atra mīmāṃsā kim pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tve dve api svatas siddhe api vā paratas aprāmāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam paratas viparyayaḥ vā iti pūrva pakṣa pratikṣepeṇa antya pakṣa parigraheṇa siddhāntaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.34^1	 tat evam vādi vipratipattyā saṃśayyādyapakṣam gṛhṇāti svatas asatām iti satkārya vādinaḥ hi sarvam eva kārya jātam sat utpadyate iti manyamānāḥ prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya ātmakam api dvayam svatas eva asthiṣata evam hi manyante yat svatas asat tat na sādhyam yathā śaśa viṣāṇam na ca ghaṭa ādayaḥ na sādhyāḥ tasmāt svatas santaḥ iti āvīta hetuḥ api ca upādāna niyama darśanāt kasyacid khalu ghaṭa ādeḥ vikārasya kiñcid eva mṛdā ādi upādāna kāraṇam iti niyamaḥ dṛśyate tat ca etat asat utpattau anyāyyam asattva aviśeṣeṇa hi sarvam sarvasmāt utpadyeta tatra upādāna niyamaḥ na syāt mṛdā iva ghaṭasya kaṭasya vīraṇam iti 
ŚVK_2.34^2	 tatra sarva arthī sarvatra pravarteta aviśeṣāt śaktitaḥ niyamaḥ iti ced na aviśeṣāt tatra etat syāt yasya bhāvasya yat utpatti śaktiḥ asti tām anvaya vyatirekābhyām niścitya yaḥ yat arthī sa tat upādattaḥ iti tat ca na evam aviśeṣāt vayam hi brūmaḥ śakti ātmanā vikāraḥ upādāne asti iti bhavantaḥ api vikāra utpatti śaktiḥ upādāne api asti iti tat atra vācaḥ yukti mātram bhidyate na artha viśeṣaḥ kaścid upalabhyate iti api ca upādāna niyama darśanāt upādāna nimitta asamavāyibhyaḥ tribhyaḥ khalu api kāraṇebhyaḥ bhavatām kāryam utpadyate triṣu api ca tat na asti 
ŚVK_2.34^3	 asat eva utpannam tat kutas ayam kāraṇa vidha ani yamaḥ idam upādānam idam na iti yatra kāryam vartate tad upādānam iti ced vṛtti niyama hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ tat khalu sarvasmāt asat eva jātam iti kiṃkṛtaḥ vṛtti niyamaḥ asti sa nāma upādānasya kaḥ api atiśaya viśeṣaḥ yat tatra eva kāryam vartate iti ced sa tarhi śakti bhedaḥ vaktavyaḥ nimittam asamavāyi ca na ubhayam anabhyupagamāt daṇḍa ādayaḥ hi ghaṭasya nimitta kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam mṛdavayava saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ saḥ upādānam iti ced na vyatireka avyatireka vikalpa anupapatteḥ syāt etat upādānakāraṇam śakti bhedaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.34^4	 mā evam sa hi upādānāt vyatiricyate na vā vyatireke upādānasya pūrvavat bhāvāt anupādāna tvam tasya api tatas bhinnasya tattvam durbhaṇam eva avyatireke tu vastu mātram anatiśayam upādānam iti vastu tva aviśeṣāt sarva upādāna tva āpātaḥ tasmāt vikāra utpatti śaktim upādāneṣu saṅgiramāṇaiḥ vikārāḥ eva upādane śakti ātmanā santi iti saṃgīryante vayam api ca avyaktān eva vikāra anupādāneṣu saṃgirāmahe na sthūlān iti na āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti sattve kāraka vyāpāra ānarthakyam iti ced na abhivyakti phala tvāt tatra etat syāt santi ced vikārāḥ upādāneṣu tad arthinām kāraka vyāpāraḥ anarthakaḥ syāt 
ŚVK_2.34^5	 te hi tadā satām eva utpādanāya na īheran tasmāt asantaḥ vikārāḥ iti tat ca na evam abhivyakti phala tvāt santaḥ api hi vikārāḥ pūrvam anabhivyaktāḥ kāraka vyāpāraiḥ abhivyajyante atas arthavat tvam kāraka vyāpārāṇām abhivyaktau utpatti śabdaḥ anarthakaḥ iti ced na abhivyakti bhedāt tatra etat syāt yadi pūrvam santaḥ eva mṛd ādiṣu ghaṭa ādayaḥ gṛhodareṣu iva dīpa ādibhiḥ kulāla ādi vyāpāraiḥ abhivyajyante kaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ dīpaḥ ghaṭam abhivyanakti kulālaḥ tu utpādayati iti tat ca na evam abhivyakti bhedāt dvedhā khalu abhivyaktiḥ 
ŚVK_2.34^6	 ekā apratibaddha ākārasya vastunaḥ bodha nimittasya tad nimitta bhāvaḥ yena pratibadhyate tad utsāraṇam yathā ghaṭasya andhaka ara tirohitasya tad utsāraṇam abhivyaktiḥ anyā tu pratibaddha ākārasya ākāra pratibandhaka utsāraṇam yathā mṛdi ghaṭa ākāraḥ pūrva ākāreṇa pratibaddhaḥ tasya pūrvasya ākārasya protsāraṇam ghaṭa abhivyaktiḥ abhivyakti viśeṣaḥ eva ayam utpatti śabdaḥ brāhmaṇa viśeṣaḥ iva kaṭha ādi śabda upacāraḥ iti anavadyam syāt matam abhivyakti sattvāt na prasaṅga parihāraḥ iti na asattvāt yaḥ manvīta satkārya vādinaḥ hi bhāva antara vat abhivyaktiḥ api sati iti kāraka vyāpāra ānarthakya prasaṅgaḥ duṣpariharaḥ iti sa vaktavyaḥ 
ŚVK_2.34^7	 na asattvāt syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi abhivyaktiḥ api satī ghaṭa ādi vat iṣyate sā tu asatī kāraka vyāpāreṇa bhāvyate iti kim anupapannam tat asattve atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced na prasaṅga sāmyāt tatra etat syāt yadi kila abhivyaktiḥ asatī kulālena kriyate kim aparāddham ghaṭena yat na kriyate iti tat ca na evam tulyaḥ ayam āvayoḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ tava api andhaka ara tirohitasya ghaṭasya abhivyaktau abhivyaktiḥ asatī ghaṭaḥ tu san= ā iva iti siddhāntaḥ tatra śakyam prasañjayitum abhivyakti vat ghaṭaḥ api janyeta tadvat vā abhivyaktiḥ api satī syāt iti prasaṅga sādha araṇyena anyataraḥ aparyanuyojyaḥ 
ŚVK_2.34^8	 atas siddham eva upādāneṣu santaḥ eva sarve bhāvāḥ kāraka vyāpāraiḥ abhivyajyante iti prāmāṇya aprāmāṇye svatassatī eva iti satkārya vādinām siddhānte iti mata antaram upanyasyati aparaḥ iti evam hi manyate sarvam khalu api kāraṇa adhīna ātma lābham kāryam tad kāraṇa guṇa doṣābhyām śuddham aśuddham ca bhavati tat yāvat indriya ādi jñāna kāraṇa vaśāt utpannau guṇa doṣau na jñānasya svatas avadhāryete na tāvat prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ anyatarat niścīyate nacā niścitayoḥ vyavahāra aṅga tvam tad artham ca pramāṇa anusaraṇam atas kāraṇa utpanna guṇa doṣa avadhāraṇāt eva dvayam āhuḥ iti sambandhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.35^1	 svatas dvayam iti tāvat nirākaroti svatas iti kāraṇam āha virodhāt iti idam atra ākūtam yat tāvat uktam asataḥ śaśa viṣāṇāt vyāvṛttam sādhya tvam ghaṭe dṛśyamānam sattām gamayati iti tat ayuktam abhāva virodhāt asannikṛṣṭa artha viṣayam hi anumānam tat kutas mṛdi yogyā anupalambha nirākṛta sadbhāva viṣayam ghaṭam viṣayīkariṣyati upādāna niyamaḥ tu śakti bhedāt upapannaḥ eva kiñcid eva hi mṛd tantu ādi kasyacid eva ghaṭa ādeḥ utpādane śaktam na sarvam sarvasya iti yaḥ yat arthī sa tat upādattaḥ iti kim na upapadyate yadi matam na kārya kāraṇa antarāla patitām parām śaktim īkṣāmahe iti na śakti siddhim arthāpatti granthe vakṣyāmaḥ yat tu uktam vikārāḥ eva śakti ātmanā santaḥ tad utpatti śaktiḥ vā upādāneṣu asti iti na āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti tat na mahān ayam viśeṣaḥ yat vikāra sattām abhāvaḥ bādhate śaktim tu sūkṣmām arthāpattiḥ sādhayati iti te api hi śakti ātmanā santaḥ na yogyā anupalabdhyā nirākartum śakyante iti ced kā iyam śakti ātma tā yatas te asantaḥ api janiṣyante iti ced tat iṣṭam 
ŚVK_2.35^2	 anabhivyaktiḥ iti ced na sākṣasya api āloke anupalambhāt nanu āloke api na āvṛtam upalabhyate kim idānīm āvṛtaḥ mṛdi ghaṭaḥ satyam kena na tāvat upādānam kāryam āvṛṇoti nitya āvaraṇa prasaṅgāt mṛdā ākāraḥ āvṛṇoti iti ced kaḥ ayam mṛdākāraḥ yadi tad jātiḥ sa upariṣṭāt api anuvartate iti nitya āvṛtiḥ eva prāpnoti prācyaḥ mṛd piṇḍa sanniveśaḥ iti ced sa vā kim upariṣṭāt na bhaviṣyati yat na ghaṭam āvariṣyati hanta saḥ api anutpatti avināśa dharma asadvā ādibhiḥ iṣyate iti anivārya eva nitya āvṛtiḥ sūkṣmāḥ ca mṛdavayava sanniveśa viśeṣāḥ na mahāntam ghaṭam ācchādayitum utsahante iti yat kiñcid etat yat tu tribhyaḥ api kāraṇebhyaḥ sat utpattau kiṃkṛtaḥ vidhāni yamaḥ iti śakti bheda kṛtaḥ eva kiñcid eva tathā nāma śaktam yat vikāra bhāvam anubhavati kiñcid tu bahis eva sat tad utpattau vyāpriyate sa ca ayam śakti bhedaḥ kārya darśana samadhigamyaḥ eva iti na apramāṇakaḥ bheda abhedau tu na kvacid ātyantikau iti na aprasaṅga atiprasaṅgau yat tu pṛṣṭam upādāna nimitta asamavāyinām kā śaktiḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.35^3	 tad ati dūram apabhraṣṭam śaktiḥ hi śaktiḥ eva na kāraṇam tadvataḥ dravyasya kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa vat ca kāraṇa śaktiḥ api kārya siddhim anudhāvatī iti pramāṇa balāt upapatsyate kāraka vyāpāra ānarthakyam ca duṣpariharam eva abhivyakti arthaḥ vyāpāraḥ iti atra tu uktaḥ doṣaḥ api ca abhivyakti sattve tulyam ānarthakyam asattve ca sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ śakyam anumātum sarvam hi vimati padam kāryam asat kāryatvāt abhivyakti vat kāryam ca abhūtvā bhavanāt tadvat eva abhūtvā bhavati upalabdhi yogya tve sati anupalambhāt abhivyakti vat eva yat tu abhivyaktau prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam pratyabhijñānam hi balavat abhūta prādurbhāvam ghaṭasya vārayati viparītam ca tat satkārya vādinām iti kim anena ati nirbandhena bhrānta bhāṣitena prakṛte ca virodhāt katham hi eka jñāna jāti anubandhinī pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tve bhaviṣyataḥ viruddha dharma āveśasya bheda nibandhana tvāt atas yathā na ekasya agneḥ śīta uṣṇa tvam evam na jñānasya pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tvam iti 
ŚVK_2.35^4	 saḥ ayam prakṛta aprakṛta gocare tantreṇa virodhaḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya ātmaka dvayam na svatas svabhāva virodhāt kārya kāraṇa ātmaka tvam ca dvayam na svatas siddham kārya sattāyāḥ abhāva virodhāt iti paratas dvayam iti nirākaraṇa artham āha paratas iti kāraṇam āha niḥsvabhāva tvam iti evam ubhaya para adhīna vādī vaktavyaḥ kim khalu kāraṇa utpanna guṇa doṣa avadhāraṇāt prāk jñānam na jāyate eva jātam api vā rūpa antareṇa avatiṣṭhate iti na tāvat jñānaṃjāyate saṃvid dhi rodhāt jātam tu kena ātmanā avasthāsyate na hi etad rāśi dvaya atiriktam asti rāśi antaram yena avatiṣṭheta anyatara dharmakam eva tat utpannam prāk anavadhṛta tathā bhāvam upariṣṭāt avadhāryate iti ced na guṇa avadhāraṇa adhīna niścaya abhyupagamāt tad avadhāraṇāt dhi prāk niścayaḥ eva na āsīt katham prāmāṇyam āsīt iti śakyate vaktum atha pūrvam api niścita ākāram eva jñānam kim guṇa avadhāraṇena doṣān āśaṅkamānaḥ tu tad nirākaraṇa artham eva yatataḥ iti yuktam etat ca vakṣyate eva iti sūktam niḥsvabhāva tvam iti 
ŚVK_2.36	 svatas na dvayam virodhāt iti yat uktam tat prakṛta gocare vivṛṇoti katham iti uktam idam asmābhiḥ na ekasyām jñāna jātau paraspara viparītayoḥ prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya ātmanoḥ sambhavaḥ samāveśaḥ sambhavati iti ekaḥ tu svabhāvaḥ upādhi antara sannidhānāt abhibhūtaḥ bhavati apsu iva agni saṃyoge śaityam tad apekṣaḥ ca tāsu auṣṇya bhramaḥ svābhāvika ubhaya vādinaḥ tu na anya anapekṣasya jñānasya ubhaya ātmaka tā sambhavati iti paratas na dvayam nissvabhāva tva prasaṅgāt iti etat vivṛṇoti kim ātmakam iti sarvam hi jagat rāśi dvaye śakyam antar bhāvayitum pramāṇam apramāṇam ca iti tat atra ubhaya para adhīna tva vādinaḥ jñānam unmukta ubhaya rūpam kena rūpeṇa nirūpyate iti 
ŚVK_2.37^1	 svatas na dvayam virodhāt iti atra kiñcid āśaṅkate vijñāna iti evam hi manyate yadi jñāna jāteḥ eva ayam svabhāva bhedaḥ abhyupeyate ekasmāt eva vā jñāna vyaktau tatas syāt api virodhaḥ yadā tu śīta uṣṇa svabhāva toya tejaḥ dravya vat pramāṇa apramāṇa jñāna vyakti bheda abhyupagamaḥ tad ā ubhayoḥ vyadhikaraṇayoḥ kasya kena virodhaḥ iti pariharati tathā api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ toya tejasoḥ hi bhinna jātīyayoḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ yuktaḥ jñāna vyaktayaḥ tu eka jātīyāḥ tatra na tāvat āsām jāti anubandhī svabhāva bhedaḥ nyāyyaḥ vyakti anubandhī tu tad kāraṇāt bhavati iti yuktam vaktum tad anapekṣa tve tu prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥkim kutra bhaviṣyati iti duradhigamam samānam hi dvayoḥ api jñāna tvam svābhāvike ca ubhayasmin na bāhya cihna apekṣā asti iti durbhaṇaḥ pramāṇa apramāṇa vivekaḥ iti sādhu uktam svatas na dvayam virodhāt iti 
ŚVK_2.37^2	 kim punar ubhayoḥ para adhīna tvam svābhāvika tvam vā codanā prāmāṇya paripanthi yena prayasyatā nirasyate nanu evam api codanānām svatas eva prāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati prathama pakṣe dvitīye api para adhīnaḥ ubhayasmin doṣa abhāvāt apauruṣeyāḥ vedāḥ pramāṇam iti kim ubhaya nirākaraṇena aprāmāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam paratas iti etat eva tu veda prāmāṇya paripanthi iti tat nirākartum ucitam tat ca nirākariṣyate eva satyam ādyayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ aprāmāṇyam āpadyate eva tathā hi svābhāvike tāvat ubhayasmin anyatara nirṇaya kāraṇam bāhyam apaśyatām na ekatra api viśvāsaḥ bhavet vyavahāra artham ca pramāṇa anusaraṇam aviśvāse ca tad abhāvāt phalatas apramāṇa tvam evam ubhaya para adhīna tve api asati api aprāmāṇya kāraṇe prāmāṇya kāraṇasya api abhāvāt tad vyavahāraḥ na jāyate iti apramāṇam eva iti sādhu eva ubhaya nirākaraṇam iti 
ŚVK_2.38	 evam ubhayam svatas paratas vā iti nirākṛte pūrva pakṣa antaram āha tasmāt iti kṣamantena teṣām jñānānām svābhāvikam apramāṇa tvam para apekṣam ca prāmāṇyam ayam ca atra abhiprāyaḥ dṛṣṭa vyabhicāraḥ hi jāte api vijñāne na tāvat nirvicikitsam vyavaharamāṇaḥ dṛśyate yāvat guṇavat indriya ādi karaṇa tvam saṃvādaḥ vā na dṛṣṭaḥ vyavahāra phalam ca prāmāṇyam atas svatas apramāṇam eva para adhīnam prāmāṇyam iti eṣa ca atra svatas apramāṇa tve paratas ca pramāṇa tve nyāyaḥ abhidhīyate iti āha atra iti 
ŚVK_2.39^1	 svatas aprāmāṇye tāvat nyāyam darśayati aprāmāṇyam iti nyāyaḥ tarkaḥ sa ca anumānam eṣa ca atra prayogaḥ bhavati aprāmāṇyam na kāraṇa vat avastu tvāt yat yat vastu tat tat na kāraṇa vat yathā śaśa viṣāṇam kāraṇa doṣataḥ iti ca kāraṇa doṣāṇām eva paraiḥ aprāmāṇya kāraṇa tvena āśrayaṇāt uktam yat eva mīmāṃsakāḥ manyante kāraṇa doṣebhyaḥ aprāmāṇyam jāyate iti tat na akāraṇaka tvāt avastunaḥ iti para apekṣam prāmāṇyam iti atra prayogam āha vastu tvāt iti teṣām kāraṇānām guṇaiḥ prāmāṇyam janyate iti arthaḥ prayogaḥ ca bhavati prāmāṇyam kāraṇa vat vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat na ca akāryam nāma kiñcid bauddhānām vastu asti yena anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ bhavet 
ŚVK_2.39^2	 nabhasaḥ api āvaraṇa abhāva mātrasya avastu tvāt guṇaiḥ iti ca anuvāda mātram kāraṇa guṇāḥ hi prāmāṇye kāraṇam iti manyante na punar ete vyāptau anupraveśanīyāḥ ke punar amī guṇāḥ nāma ye prāmāṇyasya kāraṇam na hi indriyā ādi vyatiriktāḥ guṇāḥ kecid upalabhyante yadi matam bheṣaja bhedaiḥ āhita atiśaya viśeṣāḥ guṇāḥ iti tat na evam hi taiḥ anāhita atiśaya viśeṣāṇām na prāmāṇyam jāyeta atas vaktavyāḥ guṇāḥ te ucyante viśuddhiḥ indriya ādīnām guṇa padārthaḥ vāta ādi dhātūnām sāmyam iti yāvat sāmyena hi te indriyeṣu vartamānāḥ guṇāḥ ucyante tathā sthitāḥ ca prāmāṇyam janayanti 
ŚVK_2.39^3	 viṣamam tu vartamāneṣu dhātuṣu tad doṣa samutthāḥ timira ādayaḥ doṣāḥ jāyante śabde api vaktuḥ āśaya viśuddhiḥ guṇaḥ vipralambha abhiprāya ādayaḥ doṣāḥ teṣām ca prāmāṇya abhāva ātmani avastuni aprāmāṇye kāraṇatva asambhavān na tat janyam aprāmāṇyam prāmāṇyam tu artha niścayaḥ vastu ātmakaḥ iti yuktam yat guṇebhyaḥ jāyate jñāyate ca iti sarvam utpattau aniścaya ātmakam apramāṇam eva jñānamāḥ guṇa saṃvāda jñāna udayāt paratas tu tad vaśena prāmāṇyam jāyate tasya nanu idānīm asat eva ativṛttam jñānam iti kim pramāṇībhaviṣyati yadā tāvat tadā āsīt tadā sahajena aprāmāṇyena abhibhūtam uttara kālam ca tat asat eva iti kim anyatas prāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati 
ŚVK_2.39^4	 satyam evam anyat eva guṇa saṃvāda jñāna uttara kāla bhā vi pramāṇam avagate hi kvacid arthe prāk dṛṣṭa vyabhicāraḥ jñāna svabhāva ālocanena ajāta viśvāsaḥ na tāvat nirvicikitsam vyavaharati yāvat indriya ādi guṇa avadhāraṇa purassaram evam eva etat iti na niścinoti guṇa avadhāraṇāt saṃvāda jñānāt vā pramāṇe jāte avagate ca tasya prāmāṇye vyavahārāḥ pravartante tasya api na jñāna svabhāva ālocanena prāmāṇyam tad rūpasya aprāmāṇya pratibandhāt kin tu guṇa avadhāraṇāt eva atas sūktam guṇaiḥ prāmāṇyam janyate iti yat āhuḥ niścaya ātmaka prāmāṇya utpādanam tu vastu rūpa tvāt saṃvāda kāraṇa guṇa jñāna kārya tvena svadhyavasānam iti tat eva āśrīyate iti 
ŚVK_2.40	 kiñ ca itas ca na svatas prāmāṇyam iti āha prāmāṇyam hi iti ayam arthaḥ yadi jñāna svabhāva anubandhyausargikam prāmāṇyam evam sati prāmāṇya abhāvasya avastunaḥ akṛtrima tvāt na para adhīna tvam iti sarva jñānānām api pramāṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ svapna ādi jñānānām api jñāna tva aviśeṣāt tanmātra anubandhi tvāt ca prāmāṇyasya aprāmāṇyasya ca avastunaḥ akārya tvāt iti 
ŚVK_2.41	 katham nāma aprāmāṇyam akṛtrimam doṣa bhāve hi tasya bhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca abhāvaḥ dṛśyate kāmilī pītam idam iti śaṅkham jānāti tad apagame śuklam atas jānīmaḥ yathā doṣa bhāva bhāvya prāmāṇyam tat kāryam iti atas āha mad pakṣaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na atra doṣaiḥ aprāmāṇyam janyate satsu tu doṣeṣu asantaḥ guṇāḥ na sva kāryam prāmāṇyam janayanti iti na avastunaḥ aprāmāṇasya hetumat tva prasaṅga doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.42	 kim punar prāmāṇye kāraṇam yad abhāvāt tasya anutpattiḥ atas āha indriya ādi iti kāraṇam antena ādi śabdena artha puruṣa ādīnām grahaṇam indriya puruṣa guṇāḥ ca vyākhyātāḥ eva arthasya api sthūla tva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ sūkṣma tva ādayaḥ doṣāḥ iti samadhigatam tāvat indriya ādi guṇāḥ prāmāṇyekāraṇam iti katham tu tad abhāvaḥ atas āha tat asat iti te eva vidhe darśayati duṣṭa tvāt iti doṣāḥ hi āgantavaḥ guṇān utsārayanti indriya ādīnām anyatamasya abhāve nirāśrayāḥ guṇāḥ na bhavanti yathā nitya veda vādinām asati kartari tad guṇāḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.43–2.44	 yatas eva doṣaiḥ guṇāḥ nirākriyante atas eva mīmāṃsakānām ayam bhramaḥ doṣaiḥ mithyā tva dhīḥ janyate iti parama arthena tu guṇa virodhinaḥ doṣāḥ tān eva nivārayanti atas kāraṇa abhāvāt asati prāmāṇye svābhāvikam aprāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate iti āha atas eva iti atas siddham śuddhi paryāya guṇa avadhāraṇa adhīnam prāmāṇyam svabhāvataḥ ca jñānānām aprāmāṇyam śuddhi abhāvena tat lakṣyate asati hi śuddha tve kāraṇa abhāva nirākṛtena prāmāṇyena anapoditam aprāmāṇyam lakṣyate iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_2.45–2.46	 itas ca doṣataḥ na aprāmāṇyam iti āha anvaya iti asya arthaḥ trividham aprāmāṇyam ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayaiḥ tatra ajñāna ātmakam tāvat aprāmāṇyam kāraṇa abhāva mātra samadhigamyam eva na doṣān apekṣate iti mīmāṃsakaiḥ abhyupagantavyam atas doṣa vyatireke api kāraṇa abhāva mātra anvaye aprāmāṇya darśanāt na doṣataḥ aprāmāṇyam iti evam ca guṇa adhīna prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt nitya veda vādinām ca puruṣa abhāvāt anāśraya guṇa asambhavāt kartṛmat veda vādinām api kartṛ guṇa iṣu pramāṇa asambhavāt asat mūla bhūteṣu kartṛ guṇeṣu na codanānām prāmāṇyam avakalpate iti āha tatas ca iti 
ŚVK_2.47^1	 evam tāvat paratas prāmāṇyena kṛtaḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ siddhāntam idānīm ārabhate svatas iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat guṇa jñānāt saṃvāda jñānāt vā prāk jñānam na jāyate eva nava utpannam api saṃśaya ātmakam avabhāsate na hi syāt vā ghaṭaḥ na vā iti indriya sannikṛṣṭam ghaṭam budhyāmahe api tarhi ghaṭaḥ eva ayam iti niścaya ātmakam eva jñānam utpadyate atas eva jñāna utpatteḥ anantaram eva sarva pramātṝṇām vyavahāra pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate bhrānti saṃvidita rajataḥ api hi samyak rajata bodhaḥ iva artha kriyāyai ghaṭamānaḥ dṛśyate tat asya saṃśayān asya na upapannam 
ŚVK_2.47^2	 atas jātaḥ niścayaḥ kim anyat prāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati sati api saṃvāde guṇa jñāne vā tāvat eva prāmāṇyasya tattvam na adhikam kiñcid iti kim naḥ tad upekṣaṇena tādṛśasya eva vyabhicārāt asti para apekṣā iti ced na evam api jñānasya anapekṣa tvāt vipralabdha pūrvasya api nirapekṣam eva niścaya ātmakam jñānam utpadyate pramātā tu vipralambhaka buddhi sādṛśyāt tathātvam āśaṅkate sa āśaṅkasya api na prāmāṇya śaktiḥ avasīdati pūrvavat prameya paricchedāt pramātuḥ tu āśaṅkā doṣa darśana prabhavāḥ tat asau tad bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyatara niścaye nivartate na saṃvāda jñānam apekṣate 
ŚVK_2.47^3	 sati eva hi ghaṭa jñāne jāta āśaṅkaḥ kim ghaṭa jñāna antareṇa kariṣyati na hi asyāḥ tat nivartakam tasmin sati eva bhāvāt atas svābhāvikam eva sarva saṃvidām niścaya ātmaka tvam āśaṅkā tu yadi nāma jātu jāyate evam api tad nirākaraṇa artham apavāda sadbhāva abhāvau anusartavyau na saṃvāda guṇa jñāne tad upekṣāyām hi prāmāṇyam eva na avatiṣṭheta guṇa saṃvāda jñānayoḥ api evam eva sa apekṣa tvena prathama jñāne prāmāṇya śakti ādhāna aśakteḥ api anavasthāpātāt iti etat parastāt prapañcayiṣyate iti evam tāvat prakṛta abhiprāyaḥ vyākhyātaḥ api ca sarva bhāvānām eva sva kārya janana śaktiḥ asatī na anyena kriyeta 
ŚVK_2.47^4	 abhivyakti mātra karaṇāt nanu āturasya roga apahṛta śakteḥ asati eva bhojana ādi śaktiḥ bheṣaja bhedaiḥ ādhīyate mā evam tirohita abhivyakteḥ itarathā pūrva śakti vināśa apūrva utpāda dharmi kalpanābhiḥ ati gauravam bhavet atas eva naṣṭa śaktīnām bheṣaja bhedaiḥ api na pratīkāraḥ asatī tu śaktiḥ teṣām api janyeta eva aviśeṣāt atas sarve bhāvāḥ sva hetubhyaḥ śaktimantaḥ jātāḥ eva kutaścid āgantukāt dhetoḥ tirohita śaktayaḥ sāmagrī viśeṣaiḥ abhivyakta śaktayaḥ kāryam ārabhante na ca evam jñāne api abhivyakti apekṣā sambhavati artha avagrahāt rūpa antareṇa jñānasya anirūpaṇāt utpattau eva artha paricchitteḥ avaśyambhāvāt iti 
ŚVK_2.48	 nanu svatas prāmāṇya vādinā api guṇavat indriya ādi kāraṇikā eva pramāṇa utpattiḥ āstheyāḥ tat yadi guṇāḥ pramāṇa utpattau kāraṇam evam sati tad kārye api artha niścaye tad adhīna tā eva yuktāḥ tad āyatta prāmāṇya āśrayaṇāt atas āha ātma lābhaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pramāṇa utpattau api na guṇāḥ guṇāḥ iti eva apekṣyante kin tu doṣa nirākaraṇa aupayika tayā doṣāḥ hi pramāṇa utpattim vighnanti te guṇaiḥ utsāritāḥ na tām vihantum utsahante iti atas eva asatsu api vaktṛ guṇeṣu kāruṇika tva ādiṣu vede doṣa abhāva mātrāt eva prāmāṇyam sidhyati api ca kāraṇam nāma guṇaḥ pramāṇa utpattau na etāvatā pramāṇa kārye api artha niścaye tad apekṣā yuktāḥ ātma lābha mātre eva hi bhāvāḥ kāraṇam apekṣante na kārya niṣpattau na hi mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādi kāraṇa apekṣaḥ janmani ghaṭaḥ iti udaka āharaṇe api tasya tad apekṣā dṛṣṭāḥ labdha ātmanaḥ tu svayam eva kāraṇa nirapekṣā pravṛttiḥ avagatā atas sarvathā tāvat artha vyavasthāpanāyām anyān apekṣam eva pramāṇam iti siddham iti 
ŚVK_2.49–51	 svatas asatī śaktiḥ anyena kartum na śakyate iti yat uktam tat prapañcayati jāte api iti tribhiḥ ayam abhiprāyaḥ prāmāṇyasya hi anya anapekṣa tvam eva nibandhanam yadi jāte api vijñāne kāraṇa guṇa avadhāraṇa adhīnam prāmāṇyam bhavet tatas śuddhi jñāna utpādaḥ kāraṇa antarāt pratīkṣitavyaḥ tasyāḥ śuddheḥ aparicchinnāyāḥ asat sama tvāt tasya api śuddhi jñānasya kāraṇa śuddhau satyām tasyāḥ śuddheḥ jñāne ca sati pramāṇatā bhavati evam eva mūla kāraṇa śuddhi jñānasya apara apara śuddhi jñāna apekṣāyām anavasthā pātāt na kathañcid prāmāṇyam āpadyate iti 
ŚVK_2.52	 svatas tu prāmāṇye na anavasthā iti āha yadā iti kāraṇam āha nivartate iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ artha niścayaḥ tāvat jñāna svabhāvāt eva siddhaḥ mithyā tva śaṅkā tu tad hetu bhūta doṣa ajñānāt ayatnena eva nivartate na hi doṣāṇām ajñānam prāc abhāvaḥ yatna sādhyaḥ nanu na ajñāna mātrāt abhāvaḥ sidhyati sati api tasmin bhāvāt na ca doṣa abhāva avadhāraṇam antareṇa prāmāṇyam sidhyati satyam tat api tu ayatna sādhyam eva prāyeṇa tāvat pramātṝṇām anāśaṅkaḥ eva jñāna utpattau vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate jāta āśaṅkasya api prasiddhāḥ eva śaṅkā nirākaraṇa upāyāḥ dāha= cheda ādayaḥ svarṇa ādau iti tāvatā eva niścaya utpādāt na ati dūra gamanam etat ca upariṣṭāt vakṣyate eva iti 
ŚVK_2.53	 tasmāt bodha svabhāva anubandhi jñānānām autsargikam prāmāṇyam kāraṇa doṣa arthān yathā tva jñānābhyām apodyate iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti arthānyathā tva jñānaṃca dvedhā na etat evam iti pūrva avagata rūpa upamardanena tattva prakāśanena vā hetavaḥ jñānānām indriya ādayaḥ teṣu vāta ādi samutthāḥ timira ādayaḥ doṣāḥ tad jñānena utsargataḥ prāpnuvatī pramāṇa tāpa udyate iti 
ŚVK_2.54	 yat punar aprāmāṇyam avastu tvāt na kāraṇaiḥ janyate iti uktam tat pariharati aprāmāṇyam iti yadi nāma tredhā bhinnam aprāmāṇyam tatas kim jātam atas āha vastu tvāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ trividham khalu aprāmāṇyam jñāna abhāva saṃśaya viparyayaiḥ tatra saṃśaya viparyayau prati avastu tvāt iti hetuḥ asiddhaḥ jñāna ātmaka vastu tvāt tayoḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.55–2.56	 jñāna prāc abhāvaḥ tu avastu tayā siddhaḥ eva na ca asmākam api asau doṣaiḥ janyate jñāna kāraṇa abhāvāt eva tvad ukti vat tad siddheḥ atas tasmin akāraṇake sādhyamāne siddha sādhya tā eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha avijñānaḥ iti na ca aprāmāṇya śabda vācya tā mātreṇa saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ api akāraṇaka tvam śakyam anumātum ajñāna vat vācaḥ api go śabda vācya tayā viṣāṇi tva āpatteḥ iti nanu iyam anavasthā prāmāṇyaḥ iva para āśraye aprāmāṇye apīṣyamāṇe āpadyate eva pāratantryam hi anavasthām āpādayati atas kaḥ viśeṣaḥ atas āha doṣate iti asya arthaḥ svatas prāmāṇya vādinām mīmāṃsakānām doṣataḥ apramāṇa tve na anavasthā bhavati doṣeṣu jñātavyeṣu yathā guṇa jñāne anavasthā pāditā iti 
ŚVK_2.57^1	 svatas prāmāṇya vādinām iti ca anavasthā parihāra bījam uktam tat uddhāṭayati sākṣāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ sajātīya apekṣāyām hi anavasthā bhavati yathā prāmāṇyasya pramāṇa apekṣāyām uktam aprāmāṇyam tu svatas pramāṇena na etat evam iti sākṣāt viparyaya jñānena yatra tāvat avagamyate tatra laghutaram eva gṛhītam iti na para āśraya tva mātram anavasthām āpādayati iti nanu svatas prāmāṇye pūrvam api jñānam utpannam asandigdham iti kim apramāṇam bhaviṣyati yena pareṇa pūrvam bādhyate tena eva tu kim na param bādhyate atas āha pūrva iti 
ŚVK_2.57^2	 ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam utsargataḥ pūrvasya api prāmāṇyam prāptam eva apavāda bhūtena tu uttareṇa bādhyamānam tat apramāṇam bhavati yat tu tena eva kim na uttaram bādhyate iti tat na na hi icchā mātreṇa bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate yat dhi yat bādhakam avabhāsate tat tasya bādhakam abhidhīyate naca anāgata uttara bādhaka rūpeṇa pūrvam avabhāsate iti naca anāgata bādhena iti atra eva vakṣyati uttarasya tu pūrva jñāna bādham antareṇa utpattiḥ eva na sambhavati utpannam ca tat atas tat eva pūrvasya bādhakam tat ca svatas eva pramāṇam iti na kācid anavasthā iti 
ŚVK_2.58^1	 nanu astu sākṣāt viparyaya jñānena pareṇa pūrvasya bādhaḥ ubhayoḥ api samāna viṣaya upanipātāt yatra tu uttaram kāraṇa doṣa viṣayam bhavati tatra viṣaya bhedāt na bādhaḥ yuktaḥ iti duruktam hetu uttha doṣa jñānāt prāmāṇyam apodyate iti atas āha duṣṭa iti bādhaḥ antena ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi api duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe viṣaya bhedaḥ pīta śaṅkha ādi vibhrameṣu tathā api arthāt tulya artha tām prāpya bādhaḥ bhavati eva śaṅkhe hi pītaḥ iti vidite paratas ca jñāna kāraṇa doṣe avagate arthāt pītimā śaṅkhasya pratikṣiptaḥ bhavati yad kāraṇa adhīna ātma lābham hi yat kāryam tat tad doṣe duṣyati 
ŚVK_2.58^2	 eṣa ca jñānasya doṣaḥ yat anyathā sthitasya anyathāprakāśanam atas kāraṇa doṣe avagate arthā anyathātvam eva avagatam bhavati evam ca sākṣāt viparyaya jñānena tulya tvam iti atra eva vaidika nyāyam udāharati go dohana ādi vat iti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kratu arthena camasena apām praṇayane vihite bhavati aparaḥ guṇa phala sambandha vidhiḥ yathā go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti asya arthaḥ go dohanena paśūn bhāvayet iti tat idam puruṣa abhilaṣita paśu artha tayā puruṣa artham eva sat go dohanam kratu arthasya camasasya bādhakam iṣyate
