ŚVK_2.58^3	 tatra api ca sphuṭaḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ kratu upakāraḥ hi camasasya sādhyaḥ paśavaḥ go dohanasya arthāt eva tulya artha tayā tatra api bādhaḥ vakṣyate go dohanam hi dravyam na tat kriyām anāśritam udāsīnam phalam bhāvayitum alam iti yāṃkāñcid kriyām āśraya tayā samīhamānam sannihitam kratu artham apām praṇayanam gṛhṇāti iti tad āśritena paśavaḥ bhāvayitavyāḥ iti śāstra arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate evam ca tena eva kratu artham apām praṇayanam siddham iti camasaḥ nivartate nanu asau eva kratau viniyuktaḥ iti katham tad parityāgena go dohanena kratu upakāraḥ bhāvyate satyam paśu kāma prayoge tu kratuḥ api go dohanam eva sva upakāra sādhana tayā anujānāti kārya arthaḥ hi sva guṇam pratyādaraḥ na svīyatayā tat ca kāryam phala artha tvāt eva go dohanāt āsāditam kratunā iti kim ādareṇa sva guṇe āha ca sarvasya eva hi kārya arthaḥ sva guṇa grahaṇa ādaraḥ anya artha guṇa siddhe tu kārye asyāḥ sva guṇena kim iti tat iha yathā puruṣa arthena eva guṇena bhinna viṣayaḥ api kratu arthaḥ camasaḥ arthāt tulya artha tayā bādhyate evam atra api iti na doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.59	 kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ yat sarvadā pareṇa pūrvam bādhyate na iti āha tatra iti yadi tatra duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe na etat evam iti viparyaye vā parā bādha dhīḥ na bhavati kāraṇa doṣa jñānam vā tadā pūrvasya bādhaḥ bhavati na tu anyathā iti atha ubhayoḥ anyatara udbhūtau kim nāma bhaviṣyati atas āha tad udbhūtau iti tadā bādhake sa apavāde prathamam eva nirapavādam autsargikam prāmāṇyam labhate iti 
ŚVK_2.60^1	 nanu pramāṇena satā tṛtīyena bādhakam bādhyate tat eva tu katham pramāṇam atas āha svatas iti sarvam khalu vijñānam jātam svatas eva pramāṇam avijñāyamāna doṣam tathā ca tṛtīyam atas tena bādhaka bādhane kṛte bhavati ādyasya mānatā iti nanu asatsu api doṣeṣu doṣa āśaṅkā yathā ādime jātāḥ evam antime api iti prāmāṇyam na avatiṣṭhate atas āha doṣā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ jāte doṣa jñāne sambhāvitāḥ doṣāḥ prāmāṇyam vighnanti tṛtīye tu doṣa jñānam na tāvat utpannam śaṅkā tu na utprekṣā mātreṇa kartum ucitā sarva vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt 
ŚVK_2.60^2	 atas eva ca gītāsu naram nārāyaṇaḥ abravīt na ayam lokaḥ asti kaunteya na paraḥ saṃśaya ātmanaḥ iti yasya tu tṛtīye vijñāne doṣa jñānam bādhaka jñānam vā jāyate tasyāḥ tu caturtha jñāna avasānaḥ nirṇayaḥ na tu etat evam prāyeṇa hi prathama jñāna janmani eva nirapavādaḥ nirṇayaḥ dṛśyate kvacid tu bādhaka avasānaḥ tṛtīya jñāna udayaḥ api na ati pracuraḥ natarām carurtha jñāna janma sati api tu tasmin na svatas prāmāṇyam vihanyate iti evam para tayā eva idam asmābhiḥ uktam astu caturtha jñānāt nirṇayaḥ iti vārttikakāraḥ api atas eva evam tri catur ajñāna janmanaḥ iti vakṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.60^3	 kim punar kāraṇam anutpanne doṣa jñāne na āśaṅkā iti na hi prayojana anuvartīni pramāṇāni dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya hi pramātuḥ ekatra api na āśvāsaḥ bhavet yadi ca evam ucchidyante vyavahārāḥ kāmam pramāṇataḥ hi te parinistiṣṭhanti na tebhyaḥ pramāṇam atas āha niṣpramāṇikā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yāvat dhi doṣāṇām abhāvaḥ na avadhāryate tāvat pramāṇa itara sādhāraṇa dharma darśinaḥ bhavati āśaṅkā pramāṇavatī doṣa abhāva avadhāraṇe tu jāte tān āśaṅkamānasya abhāva virodhaḥ eva artha indriya ādayaḥ hi jñāna kāraṇam tad doṣāḥ dūra tva timira ādayaḥ 
ŚVK_2.60^4–2.61	 tat yathā dūre santaḥ taravaḥ vanam iti eka ākāratayā parigṛhītāḥ sannikarṣe nānā dṛśyante tadā dūra tva doṣāt ekatva buddhiḥ upajātā iti niścīyate nānātva buddheḥ tu na kaścid doṣaḥ dṛśyate iti katham āśaṅkyate evam santamase gavya śva bhrame saḥ eva doṣaḥ divā tu go jñāne na kaścid doṣaḥ sambhāvyate iti tad pramāṇam evam cakṣuḥ ādi doṣāṇām timira ādīnām abhāve avagate niṣpramāṇikā eva doṣa āśaṅkā yatra api sādṛśya cala tva ādayaḥ viṣaya doṣāḥ bhrānti hetavaḥ tatra api bhedaka dharma avadhāraṇe niścala tve avagate ca na kācid doṣa āśaṅkā iti na tad samaya bhāvinaḥ jñānasya aprāmāṇyam iti evam tricaturaiḥ eva jñānaiḥ doṣa abhāva siddheḥ na tatas adhikā matiḥ prārthanīyā prāmāṇya siddhaye yena anavasthā bhavet yāvat eva tu tṛtīyam caturtham vā jñānam utpannam tāvat eva ekam pūrvam uttaram vā nirapavādam svatas prāmāṇyam āpadyate iti āha evam iti 
ŚVK_2.62	 samadhigatam tāvat sarva pramāṇānām svatas pramāṇa tvam doṣataḥ ca apramāṇa tvam iti prakṛtam idānīm vedānām prāmāṇyam yathā sidhyati tathā pratipādanīyam tad artham ca vaktṛ a dhīnāḥ eva śabde doṣāḥ na svābhāvikāḥ iti āha śabdaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadā vaktra dhīnāḥ śabde doṣāḥ iti samadhigatam bhavati tadā vede vaktuḥ abhāvāt nirāśrayāḥ doṣāḥ na sambhavanti iti nirapavādam prāmāṇyam upapannam bhavati vedānām sthitam ca idam yat para adhīnaḥ śabde doṣaḥ iti sa hi na artha saṃsparśi iti pūrvam upapāditam puruṣaḥ eva bhrāmyan anyat anyathā buddhvā tathā eva parasmai pratipādayan śabdam dūṣayati kvacid ca anyathā eva jñātvā vipralipsayā anyathā vadati tatra api tad adhīnā eva śabde doṣa avagatiḥ sthāna karaṇa ādi doṣāt vā kalā ādhma ātāmbū kṛta aiṇīkṛta ādi doṣa duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ lakṣyate sarvathā para adhīnaḥ eva śabde doṣa avagamaḥ na punar asurabhi gandha vat svabhāva duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ iti saḥ idānīm vaktra dhīnaḥ doṣaḥ guṇavat vaktṛ prayukte vā kvacid pauruṣeye vākye na bhavati iti āha tad abhāvaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.63	 nanu vaktṛ guṇāḥ vaktari eva doṣān utsārayanti katham taiḥ nirastaiḥ śabdaḥ nirdoṣaḥ bhavati atas āha tad guṇaiḥ iti uktam vaktṛ doṣāḥ eva śabdam dūṣayanti iti sa ced guṇaiḥ utsāritaḥ doṣaḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ śabde doṣāṇām na hi vaktari anāśritānām eva doṣāṇām śabde saṅkrāntiḥ sambhavati iti phalatas saṅkrānti vācaḥ yuktiḥ iti vaktra bhāvāt eva vā nirāśrayāḥ doṣāḥ na utsahante bhavitum nitya veda vākyaḥ iti āha yat vā iti doṣa abhāvāt ca na svatas prāmāṇyam vedānām vihanyate iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_2.64	 nanu aṅgīkṛtam tāvat bhavatā api puṃvākyeṣu guṇebhyaḥ doṣa abhāvaḥ iti evam ca kutas ayam vivekaḥ doṣa nirākaraṇaḥ eva guṇāḥ vyāpriyante na tu prāmāṇyaḥ iti atas āha pauruṣeye iti ayam arthaḥ satyam pauruṣeya vākyeṣu doṣa abhāva guṇa ātmakam ubhayam dṛśyate eva yathā tu guṇataḥ na prāmāṇyam tathā prāmāṇyam prāk uktam eva anavasthā hi tathā syāt iti atas doṣa abhāva mātraupayikāḥ guṇāḥ na sva rūpeṇa prāmāṇya upayujyante iti 
ŚVK_2.65	 etat eva upasaṃharati tasmāt iti aprāmāṇyasya hi dvayam kāraṇam kāraṇa doṣa jñānam bādhaka pratyayaḥ vā guṇa nirākṛteṣu ca doṣeṣu puṃvākyeṣu na ubhayam api sambhavati na hi asanataḥ doṣāḥ grahītum śakyante na ca aduṣṭa kāraṇa janitasya jñānasya bādhakaḥ pratitiṣṭhati atas aprāmāṇyasya yat kāraṇa dvayam tat asattvāt utsargataḥ prāmāṇyam anapoditam iti 
ŚVK_2.66	 asati ca apavāde na pratyaya janaka tvena utsargataḥ prāptam prāmāṇyam puṃvākyānām apanīyate iti āha pratyaya utpattiḥ iti atra codayati doṣa abhāvaḥ iti yadi āpta vākyeṣu guṇa nibandhanaḥ doṣa abhāvaḥ evam tarhi guṇa jñāna adhīnaḥ iva prāmāṇye anavasthā eva kaḥ khalu atra viśeṣaḥ guṇa jñāna adhīnam vā prāmāṇyam tad adhīnaḥ vā doṣa abhāvaḥ iti yat eva hi doṣa abhāvam grahītum guṇa jñānam apekṣyate tasya eva hi guṇa jñāna adhīnaḥ doṣa abhāvaḥ tasya api evam iti sā eva pūrva ukta anavasthā tathaḥ ca prāmāṇya utkhātiḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.67–2.68	 pariharati tadā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi jñātāḥ eva guṇāḥ doṣān utsārayeyuḥ evam anavasthā bhavet na tu etat evam iti katham nāma vyāpriyante atas āha doṣa abhāve iti sat mātra tayā guṇāḥ doṣān utsārayanti atas asantaḥ doṣāḥ na jñātāḥ iti sahajam prāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate iti tat evam tāvat guṇa nirākārya doṣeṣu api puṃvākyeṣu doṣa parihāraḥ uktaḥ akartṛ sandṛbdhe tu vede nirāśrayāḥ doṣāḥ śaṅkām api na adhirohanti iti aprāmāṇyaśaṅkā api na asti eva iti āha tatra iti prāmāṇyasya autsargikasya aprāmāṇyam apavāda bhūtam tat nirmuktiḥ vede laghīyasī na puṃvākya vat guṇa apekṣitayā gurvī iti bhāvaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.69	 yatas puṃvākyeṣu api na guṇa apekṣam prāmāṇyam atas na śabdānām pramāṇa tā vaktṛ adhīnā tad guṇa apekṣāyām tu tad adhīna tā bhavet na ca etat evam iti varṇitam eva atas yat naiyāyika ādibhiḥ prāmāṇya siddhi artham vede vaktuḥ upāsanam kṛtam maheśvareṇa vedāḥ praṇītāḥ iti āśritam tat ayuktam doṣa abhāvāt eva teṣām svatas prāmāṇya siddheḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha atas iti na yuktam antena apramāṇa tva anuguṇā eva doṣa āśaṅkām upajanayantī kartṛ kalpanā iti āha apramāṇa tva iti 
ŚVK_2.70^1	 atas eva ca yat api nāstikaiḥ āpta apraṇīta tvena aprāmāṇya prasañjanam kṛtam tat api atra nitye vede doṣāya na jāyate iti āha tatas ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pauruṣeya vākyam āpta apraṇīta tvena duṣyati tat dhi tad apraṇītam arthāt anāpta praṇītam bhavet tatas ca tad doṣa duṣṭam apramāṇam bhavet nityam tu yadi nāma āpta apraṇītam evam api nirdoṣam eva iti na tasya āpta apraṇīta tvena prāmāṇyam vihanyate pauruṣeyam api hi na āptā praṇīta tvena apramāṇam api tu anāpta praṇīta tayā sā ca nitye na asti iti kim apramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.70^2	 nanu vyāpti balena paraiḥ āptā praṇīta tvena aprāmāṇyam sādhitam bāla ādi vākya nidarśanena yat vā āptena apraṇīta tvāt iti atra atas hetu doṣāḥ eva viruddha asiddha ādayaḥ abhidhīyantām kim sva gotra anusāriṇā vacanena atas āha prayogāṇām iti na paramasya prayogasya sarveṣām eva prayogāṇām uttaratra pratisādhanam vakṣyāmaḥ eva codanā janitā buddhiḥ ityādinā atas pratihetu viruddhāḥ aprāmāṇya hetavaḥ saṃśaya janakatayā na aprāmāṇyam niścāyayanti yadi tulya balāḥ atha tu prāmāṇya hetavaḥ balīyāṃsaḥ tatas tad bādhitāḥ natarām ā ātmānam aprāmāṇya hetavaḥ labhante iti 
ŚVK_2.71	 katham punar āpta apraṇīta tvam na doṣāya āptaḥ hi pramāṇena artham pratipadya vākyam āracayati tat ca māna antara saṃvādāt eva hi pramāṇam bhavati āpta apraṇītam hi asat mūla pramāṇa antaram katham pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha pauruṣeya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ veda vākyam mūla antara anapekṣam eva sva arthe pramāṇam kim tasya pramāṇa antareṇa pauruṣeye tu vacasi pramāṇa antaram mūla kāraṇam iti tat tad abhāve duṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.72	 yat tu asat mūla antarāṇām asambhavat saṃvādānām katham prāmāṇyam iti tat ayuktam yena eva hi kāraṇena pramāṇa antara mūlāḥ na codanāḥ tena yā iyam asaṅgatiḥ tāsām pramāṇa antaraiḥ sā eva sutarām prāmāṇya kāraṇam atas eva arthe anupalabdhe iti vakṣyati aprāpte śāstram arthavat iti ca pramāṇa antaramū latve anuvāda tvam eva āsām āpadyate na prāmāṇyam na hi naḥ gantṛ mātram pramāṇam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tena iti 
ŚVK_2.73^1	 yat api tāvat pramāṇa antara gocara artham puṃvacanam tasya api prāmāṇye na saṃvādaḥ kāraṇam kim aṅga punar pramāṇa antara agocara arthānām veda vākyānām iti abhiprāyeṇa āha anyasya api iti tat api svatas eva pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ nanu ekaḥ eva arthaḥ anekebhyaḥ āpta vākyebhyaḥ avagamyate sarvāṇi ca tāni pramāṇāni yathā aṣṭa varṣam brāhmaṇam upanayīta garbha aṣṭame abde kurvīta brāhmaṇasya upanāyanam iti ca atas katham ucyate pramāṇa antara agocara artha tvam eva prāmāṇye kāraṇam iti atas āha tulya arthānām iti eka artha upanipātinām hi vrīhi ādīnām vikalpaḥ vakṣyate eka arthāḥ tu vikalperan iti 
ŚVK_2.73^2	 atas atra api pramātṛ bhedāt vyavasthita vikalpaḥ eva pramāṇānām śākhā ādi vikalpa vat na punar anyonya saṃvādaḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam tathā hi gautamīya gobhilīye chandogānām yājñavalkīyam vājasaneyinām pramāṇam vikalpya tvāt vikalpanīya tvāt ekaikam smṛti vākyam ekaikasya pramātuḥ bodhakam na tu anyonya saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam dharma droṇa adhyāyinām api na anyonya saṃvādaḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam ekasmāt dhi tam artham viditavataḥ anyat anuvādaḥ eva anyasya eva tu tat pramāṇam evam bhiṣagvidyāsu api darśayitavyam iti 
ŚVK_2.74–2.75	 yatra tarhi pramātuḥ ekasya eva eka artha gocarāḥ nānā pramāṇaiḥ paricchedāḥ jāyante tatra katham yathā kaścid dūre santam agnim prathamam āpta vākyāt avagacchati punar ca upasarpan dhūmāt anuminoti tatas punar atyantam āsīdan pratyakṣayati tatra hi sarvāṇi eva pramāṇāni paraspara saṅga tā arthāni ca atas katham na saṃvādaḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam iti atas āha yatra api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi tāvat anadhika viṣayāṇi eva tāni sarvāṇi tatas ekam eva tatra ādyam pramāṇam itarāṇi tu anuvāda bhūtāni naca etāni anadhika viṣayāṇi na hi asau arthaḥ pūrveṇa pramāṇena tathā avagataḥ yathottaraiḥ avagamyate uttarottara kāla sambandha atirekāt api ca āpta vākyāt parvataḥ agnimān iti sāmānyatas avagamyate punar tad eka deśa viśeṣaḥ dhūma anumānāt avagamyate asādhāraṇa dhūma darśanāt ca kāṣṭha ādi bheda bhinnaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ca samunmīlita akhila viśeṣaḥ viśadatara mayam iti aparokṣam avasīyate iti adhika adhika viṣayāṇām na saṃvādataḥ prāmāṇyam iti saṃvāda nibandhane ca prāmāṇye anavasthāpadyate iti āha saṅgatyā iti 
ŚVK_2.76^1	 nanu avisaṃvādi jñānam pramāṇam artha kriyā sthitiḥ ca avisaṃvādaḥ iti jātāyām artha kriyāyām kim pramāṇa antara apekṣayā yathā āhuḥ pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisaṃvādanam iti pratyakṣam anumānam ca dve eva pramāṇe iti pratijñāya na hi ābhyām artham paricchidya pravartamāṇaḥ artha kriyāyām visaṃvādyate iti ca atas artha kriyā avasānā eva pramāṇa sthitiḥ iti na jñāna antara apekṣāyām anavasthā atas āha kasya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ artha kriyā jñānam api na tāvat apramāṇam artha kriyām vyavasthāpayitum alam iti tad prāmāṇya artham apara apara artha kriyā anusaraṇena anavasthā eva yadi tu anapekṣita jñāna antaram eva tat pramāṇam evam sati prathamam artha jñānam eva kim anapekṣam na pramāṇam iṣyate na hi anayoḥ avabodha rūpa tve asaṃśaya ātmaka tve ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate api ca pramāṇena artham paricchidya pravartamānaḥ artha kriyāyām avisaṃvādam manyate tatra artha kriyā sthiteḥ prāc avi saṃvāda anavagateḥ na prāṃāṇya niścayaḥ iti katham pravṛttiḥ 
ŚVK_2.76^2	 apravṛttasya vā katham artha kriyā sthitiḥ tat iha ubhayasmin anyonya adhīne duruttaram itaretara āśraya tvam atha sandehāt eva pravṛttaḥ artha kriyā sthityai avisaṃvādam buddhvā prāmāṇyam manyate kṛtam tarhi pramāṇena artha kriyā artham eva hi tat arthyate sā ced sandehāt eva jātāḥ saḥ eva sādhīyān tasya eva vyavahāra aupayika tvāt atas yat api uktam hita ahita prāpti parihārayoḥ niyamena samyak jñāna pūrvaka tvāt aviduṣām tad vyutpādana artham pramāṇa niścaya praṇayanam iti tat api ayuktam atat pūrvaka tvāt tayoḥ api ca asmin mate sakṛt jāta vinaṣṭeṣu vidyut ādi bhāveṣu na kācid artha kriyā jātā iti tat jñānam pramāṇam na syāt atha tatra api śabda prayogaḥ artha kriyā iti ucyate tarhi nirvikalpake aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt avisaṃvādi pramāṇam iti manyāmahe eva artha kriyā sthitiḥ tu avisaṃvādaḥ iti na mṛṣyāmahe arthānyathātva hetu uttha doṣa jñānābhyām eva tu utpannasya jñānasya visaṃvādaḥ tad abhāvāt ca avisaṃvādaḥ tāvatā ca prāmāṇyam iti siddham na saṃvāda apekṣam prāmāṇyam iti 
ŚVK_2.78	 api ca saṃvāda apekṣiṇi prāmāṇye śrotra jā buddhiḥ indriya antara janyābhiḥ buddhibhiḥ asaṃvādāt apramāṇam āpadyate iti āha śrotra iti yadi tu asyāḥ śrotra jñāna antara saṃvādāt eva prāmāṇyam iṣyate tathā sati vede api tad tad vākya uccāraṇa anugāminī śata kṛtvas buddhiḥ utpadyate iti sā api na apramāṇam iti āha syāt ced iti pramāṇa antara janyā tu saṃvāda buddhiḥ na param vede śrotre api pratyakṣe ca na asti iti uktam eva iti āha pramāṇa iti 
ŚVK_2.79–2.80	 tat evam sthite yadi eka indriya adhīna jñāna saṃvādāt śrotram pramāṇam iti ucyate evam sati vede api tad tad vākya udbhāvita buddhi saṃvādāt durvāram prāmāṇyam iti āha yathā iti paunaruktyam tu atra anavahitāḥ manyante iti kim tad ākṣepa parihārābhyām iti yatas ete saṃvāda apekṣiṇi prāmāṇye doṣāḥ tasmāt vimucya saṃvāda grahaṇam yat utpannam dṛḍham asandigdham jñāna antareṇa ca na etat evam iti na visaṃvādyate vijñānam viśiṣṭa viṣayam jñānam adhika viṣayam iti yāvat etena smaraṇam vyavacchinatti tat dhi pūrva jñānāt aviśiṣṭam anadhika viṣaya tvāt tat eva pramāṇam iti āha tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_2.81–2.82	 kva punar pramāṇa antara asaṅgatā artham vacaḥ pramāṇam dṛṣṭam yena veda vākyānām prāmāṇyam āśrīyate pauruṣeyam hi sarvam pramāṇa antara pratipanna artham eva atas āha na ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na anumāna sādhya prāmāṇyāni pramāṇāni yena kva dṛṣṭam iti paryanuyu jyāmahe anumāne hi dṛṣṭānta apekṣā bhavati svatas eva ca pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam iti na teṣām anumānena prāmāṇyam sādhanīyam iti anumānena ca prāmāṇya sādhane tasya api anumāna antara apekṣāyām anavasthā iti āha sarvasya iti atra codayati nanu iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yathā apramāṇam apramāṇa tayā na avasīyate iti para apekṣam evam pramāṇam api pramāṇa tayā na prakāśate iti tat api para apekṣam āpadyate na hi pramāṇa tvena agṛhītam pratyakṣa ādi vyavahārāya kalpate tad artham ca pramāṇa anusaraṇam na vyasanena iti 
ŚVK_2.83	 parihārati pramāṇam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yathā avidita svarūpa śaktīni api cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇi para anapekṣāṇi eva kṛta kāryāṇi kāryāni atha anupapattyā paścāt avasīyante na ca eteṣām jñānam kāryam pratyupayujyate tasya nirapekṣaiḥ eva indriyaiḥ kṛta tvāt evam pramāṇam api pratyakṣa ādi pratyaya antara grahaṇāt pūrvam sva kārye viṣaya paricchede nirapekṣam eva saṃsthitam atikrāntam sva rūpeṇa eva kadācid gṛhyeta api yadi jighṛkṣyate na tu tasya grahaṇam prāmāṇya upayujyate yādṛśam hi rūpam asya pratyaya antareṇa api grahītavyam tena eva rūpeṇa tat prāk api āsīt eva ghaṭa pratyakṣeṇa hi ghaṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ ayam iti niścita ākāraḥ praveditaḥ tāvat eva ca tasya pramāṇa tvam pramāṇa antareṇa api ghaṭaḥ amunā paricchinnaḥ iti eva pravedanīyam na adhikam kiñcid iti jāyamānam api kṛta karam eva tat pramāṇa antaram apramāṇe tu pūrva anavagata rūpa jñānāya artha vat pratyaya antaram iti vakṣyati saṃsthitam iti pramāṇa paryavasānam darśayati kārya antara niṣpattyā hi pramāṇam santiṣṭhate saṃsthite ca anarthakam pratyaya antaram iti 
ŚVK_2.84	 yatas ca svarūpeṇa pratyaya antaraiḥ pramāṇam avasīyate tat ca svarūpam avagata pūrvam eva atas asya pramāṇasya pratyaya antareṇa jñāyamāna tvam na prāmāṇya aupayujyate idam hi tasya prāmāṇyam yat sva viṣaya prakāśanam tat ca pūrvasmāt eva svasmāt labdham iti anarthakam pratyaya antaram iti uktam eva artham vyaktīkartum āha tena iti 
ŚVK_2.85	 apramāṇe tu pratyaya antaram arthavat iti yuktā eva tatra tad apekṣā iti āha apramāṇam iti ayam arthaḥ apramāṇam hi sva rūpeṇa artham gṛhṇāti yādṛśam hi jñānasya svarūpam tādṛśam eva arthe adhyāropayati iti yāvat idam rajatam iti hi śuktau rajata ākāram apramāṇam tām api tad ākāratayā gṛhṇāti atas eva ca tat mithyā bhavati tat ca etat mithyā tvam eva ātmanaḥ na tena ātmanā praveditam iti tad pravedanāya yuktā eva anya apekṣā asati hi mithyātva grāhiṇi pratyaya antare na sva arthe jñāna svarūpa āropaḥ mithyātvam nivartate asatyām ca tad nivṛttau apramāṇāt eva prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ pratāyeta atas tad nivṛttaye arthavat pratyaya antaram iti 
ŚVK_2.86	 kasmāt punar pratyaya antaraiḥ agṛhītam mithyātvam na nivartate atas āha na hi iti yādṛśam jñānam tathā arthaḥ na bhavati iti yaḥ ayam arthasya ātathā bhāvaḥ na ayam pūrveṇa apramāṇena upāttaḥ aparicchinnaḥ iti yāvat pramāṇena eva hi tathātvam tasya hi tathātvam arthasya kāryam tat ca tena eva prakāśitam iti na tatra para apekṣā anyathātvam tu arthasya apramāṇāt asiddham iti tatra pramāṇa antaram sa avakāśam iti āha astu paratas mithyātvam evam api na prāmāṇyam codanānām anumānena mithyātva avagamāt uktam hi svarga yāga ādi sambandha viṣayāḥ codanā mṛṣā iti atas āha tatra api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na yatas kutaścid parasmāt mithyātvam api tu tatra api artha ātathā abhāve mithyātve anyathātva viṣaya evayā dhīḥ na idam rajatam iti vā śuktiḥ iyam iti vā sā kāraṇam duṣṭa kāraṇa viṣayāḥ vā yathā vakṣyati yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti bhavati pratyayaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.87^1	 kim eṣa mantraḥ anumānāt api mithyātvam avasīyamānam na kadācid api nigraha sthānam āpādayati iti atas āha tāvatā iti cakāraḥ hetau na ayam mantraḥ kin tu anumānāt mithyātvam avagantum eva na śakyate pratihetu viruddha tvāt anumānānām nāstikānām api ca abhyupetasva āgamā prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt ca śakyate hi tad āgamānām api vākya tva ādinā mithyātvam anumātum codanā janita asandigdha aviparyāsita jñāna viruddhāḥ ca hetavaḥ na prāmāṇyam ācchādayitum utsahante codanānām iti tāvatā eva kāraṇa dvayena mithyātvam gṛhyate na punar para ukta durukta hetu saṅghātena iti nanu yat api tad arthānyathātva jñānam duṣṭa kāraṇa jñānam vā tat api na apramāṇam mithyātvam pratiṣṭhāpayati 
ŚVK_2.87^2	 prāmāṇyam ca pūrva jñāna virodhāt tasya api duradhi avasānam iti katham pūrvasya mithyātvam atas āha utpatti avastham iti tat idam ubhayavidham mithyātva grāhi jñānam utpatti avasthitam pramāṇam iti mīyate yathā pramāṇam bhavati tena ātmanā mīyate iti arthaḥ tat khalu utpatti daśām adhirūḍham iti na tāvat anutpatti lakṣaṇena aprāmāṇyena paribhūyate niścaya tva ātmaka tvāt ca na saṃśaya rūpeṇa na ca asya bādhaka antaram upalabhyate iti pramāṇam eva atas tena śakyate pūrvasya mithyātvam āpādayitum tasya api bādhaka udaye pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ bhaṇitaḥ eva iti sūktam dvedhā eva mithyātvam iti 
ŚVK_2.88–2.89	 yatas ca dvedhā eva mithyātvam avagamyate na pramāṇa antareṇa atas parasmai api mithyātvam pratipādayitu kāmena etat eva mithyātva hetu dhvayam vaktum ucitam na tu apramāṇa sādharmya mātra prayojakam yathā paraiḥ kṛtam iti āha atas iti āgama virodhaḥ ca anumānena aprāmāṇyam sādhayatām iti āha codanā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ codanā janitam jñānam trividhā prāmāṇya rahitam svatas ca pramāṇam iti sthitam atas tena eva aprāmāṇya pratijñā bādhyate tasmin paripanthini na vākya tva ādīnām aprāmāṇyena sambandhaḥ eva grahītum śakyate iti 
ŚVK_2.90	 atra kiñcid āśaṅkate tat mithyā tvāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pramāṇam sat codanā janitam jñānam anumānam upamṛd gāti tat eva tu tad pratihatam mithyā sat katham tat bādhāya prabhavati iti pariharati prāptam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ mithyā satā codanā jñānena anumānam na bādhyate tad abādhitena labdha pratiṣṭhena anumānena mithyā kriyate atas tat mithyā tvāt anumāna pramāṇa tā tad prāmāṇyāt ca tat mithyātvam iti iteḥ atara āśrayam iti yadi codanā jñānasya bādhaka antaram bhavet evam tad āpādita mithyātvam na anumāna bādhāya prabhavati iti itaretara āśrayam ca na āśaṅkyeta na tu atas bhavat uktāt anumānāt anyat kiñcid bādhakam asti iti āha na iti 
ŚVK_2.91	 nanu pramāṇa antaraiḥ codanā arthasya aparigrahāt saṃvāda abhāvāt eva codanā janitasya jñānasya siddham mithyātvam iti na itaretara āśrayam atas āha na ca iti uktam idam na saṃvāda nibandhanam prāmāṇyam iti mā bhūt rasa ādi jñāna aprāmāṇyāt abhāvaḥ rasa ādīnām iti katham punar teṣām saṃvādataḥ prāmāṇye abhāvaḥ rasa ādīnām iti atas āha teṣām iti teṣām rasa ādīnām jihvā ādibhiḥ eva grahaṇam niyatam atas indriya antara saṃvāda abhāvāt rasa jñāna aprāmāṇye rasa ādīnām abhāvaḥ bhavet iti 
ŚVK_2.93^1	 yadi tu sajātīya jñāna antara saṃvādāt rasa jñānam pramāṇam iṣyate tathā sati dharme api tādṛś veda utthāpita jñāna saṃvādaḥ sambhavati iti āha tat hiyā iti idam ca saṃvādataḥ prāmāṇya nirākaraṇa artham prāk uktam idānīm itaretara āśraya prasañjanāya ucyate iti tātparyabhedāt apaunaruktyam iti yadi tu ucyate asiddham eva naḥ codanā prāmāṇyam katham tayā prāmāṇya pakṣaḥ bādhyate iti tat ayuktam utpadyate khalu api veda vacana śrāviṇām nāstikānām api dharma adharma viśeṣa viṣaya avabodhaḥ na ca sandihyate syāt vai agnihotrāt svargaḥ nava iti na ca viparyayaḥ tat idam teṣām api codanā janitam jñānam pramāṇam eva jñāna apahnavaḥ tu satya vādinām ayuktaḥ eva na hi tat sambhavati vidita pada padārtha sambandhaḥ codanā vākyāt na artham budhyate iti anṛtam tu vadantaḥ na anṛtam vadet iti pratiṣedham atikrāmantaḥ mahāntam anartham prāpnuyuḥ atas na pradveṣa mātreṇa asiddha vacanam yuktam tat etat āha mama iti 
ŚVK_2.93^2	 yaḥ tu āha satyam utpadyate jñānam dveṣāt eva tad apramāṇam ācakṣmahe paraspara viruddha siddhāntāḥ prāyeṇa hi tārkikāḥ dveṣāt eva kiñcid apramāṇam ātiṣṭhante kiñcid ca asmadīyam idam darśanam iti anurāgeṇa pramāṇam iti atas dveṣāt codanānām prāmāṇyam bādhyate anyatas ca paricchedāt na itaretara āśrayam iti tam pratyāha dveṣāt iri na apramāṇa tā iti sambandhaḥ na dveṣa mātreṇa apramāṇa tā sidhyati tathā hi na kiñcid pramāṇam nāma avakalpate sarve hi vādinaḥ paraspareṇa siddhāntān vigarhayantaḥ dṛśyante tatra katamat pramāṇa tayā adhyavasīyate atas yathā ukta lakṣaṇam eva sarvam pramāṇam iti syāt matam mā bhūt dveṣāt aprāmāṇyam yāvat tu vādi prativādinoḥ sammatiḥ sampratipattiḥ na bhavati na tāvat prāmāṇyam pratitiṣṭhati na ca apratiṣṭhita prāmāṇyam pramāṇam para bādhanāya prabhavati na ca naḥ codanā prāmāṇye sampratipattiḥ asti iti katham anumāna bādhaḥ atas āha asammata tvāt iti saḥ eva anvayaḥ śeṣam pūrvavat iti 
ŚVK_2.94	 yathā ca dveṣa asammatibhyām na aprāmāṇyam evam prāmāṇyam api na ātma icchā abhyanujñābhyām bhavati yena ubhayatha api prasiddha prāmāṇyena aprāmāṇya anumānena codanā eva bādhyate iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ca iti aprāmāṇya anumānasya hi prāmāṇyam nāstikaiḥ iṣyate apramāṇeṣu hi vedeṣu duḥkha prāyaḥ veda vādinām siddhāntaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati iti prāk bhavīyāt dharma anugrahāt ca teṣām iyam abhyanujñā vedā prāmāṇya vādāḥ pramāṇam iti ubhayam ca idam na prāmāṇye kāraṇam uktam eva tu tatra kāraṇam iti dveṣāt aprāmāṇyam na iti atra udāharaṇam āha agni iti yadi dveṣāt aprāmāṇyam syāt agni dāha ādi duḥkham apratyakṣam bhavet tasya jñānasya apratyakṣa tvāt apratyakṣa viṣayasya ca apratyakṣa śabda vācya tvāt na ca iyam dāha duḥkhasya apratyakṣata iṣyate kaiścid dveṣataḥ tu aprāmāṇye sā prasajet iti 
ŚVK_2.95	 ātma icchayā na prāmāṇyam iti etat darśayati na ca iti ābhilāṣika jñānasya sarvaḥ hi prāmaṇyam abhilaṣati tathā sati hi sarve eva aśāma udakaiḥ api tṛptāḥ bhaveyuḥ na tu tasya prāmāṇyam kaiścid iṣyate iti atas siddham codanā viruddham aprāmāṇya anumānam apramāṇam iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tavyam antena nanu evam bauddha ādayaḥ api sva āgamān gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭheran atas āha bauddha ādeḥ iti bauddha ādeḥ āgamāt vedānām antaram viśeṣaḥ vakṣyate iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_2.96	 vakṣyamāṇam eva antaram anāgata avekṣaṇa nyāyena sūcayati puruṣa iti bauddha ādi a āgameṣu prāmāṇya apavādaḥ aprāmāṇyam sambhavati atīndriyam artham draṣṭuṃpuruṣāṇām aśakteḥ svayam eva ca taiḥ svāgamānām pauruṣeya tvam āśritam iti buddhvā ātmānam samarpitavantaḥ katham adhunā atikrāmanti apauruṣeyāḥ tu vedāḥ iti veda adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ tatas ca doṣa abhāvāt evam uktena prakāreṇa svatas pramāṇa tā vedasya siddhā bhavati iti pauruṣeya tvam apauruṣeya tvam ca antaram bauddha ādi a āgamānām vedasya ca iti 
ŚVK_2.98^1	 evam tāvat apauruṣeya tvāt nityāḥ vedāḥ svatas pramāṇam iti uktam ye tu naiyāyika ādayaḥ prāmāṇya siddhi artham kartṛmat tvam vedānām kalpayanti ye ca mithyātva vādinaḥ mithyātva siddhi artham eva teṣām na tāvat asmaryamāṇa kartṛ kalpanā pramāṇavatī api ca adṛṣṭa kalpanā api bahvī vinā yuktyā prāpnoti iti āha kartṛmat tve iti kalpyam antena samyak vādibhiḥ tāvat īśvaraḥ kartā tasya ca apratighāta jñāna ādayaḥ guṇāḥ jñānam apratigham yasya vairāgyam ca jagatpateḥ aiśvaryam ca eva dharmaḥ ca saha siddham catuṣṭayam iti kalpitāḥ na ca tad kalpanāyām yuktiḥ api sādhīyasī dṛśyate iti sambandha parihāre vakṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_2.98^2	 evam mithyātva vādinām api doṣavat kartṛ kalpanā niṣpramāṇikā eva tathā sati hi na adya yāvat veda sampradāyaḥ anuvarteta mahatā khalu prayatnena śiṣya ācārya paramparayā vedān dhārayantaḥ dṛśyante tad artham ca anutiṣṭhantaḥ tad anāpta sandṛbdhānām anupapannam tathā sati hi jāta bādhaiḥ acirāt eva hīyeran atas asmān mahā jana parigrahāt avagacchāmaḥ na kartṛmantaḥ vedāḥ iti natarām doṣavat kartṛkāḥ iti mīmāṃsakaiḥ tu na kiñcid dṛṣṭāt adhikam iṣyate śiṣya ācārya paramparayā pratatāḥ hi idānīm vedāḥ dṛśyante īdṛśam eva sarva kālemīmāṃsakaiḥ iṣyate atas na kācid mīmāṃsakānām adṛṣṭa kalpanā iti āha mīmāṃsakaiḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.99	 tat asya evambhūtasya nityasya vedasya jñānam ca utpādayataḥ sva rūpa viparīta tvam viparyayaḥ saṃśayaḥ ca bhāṣya kāreṇa eva vyaktam nirākṛtau iti āha evambhūtasya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ etāvat eva hi prāmāṇyam yat utpannam asandigdham abādhitam ca pratyaya antareṇa jñānam iti codanā janitam api jñānam utpannam tāvat saṃśaya viparyayau api bhāṣya kāreṇa asya vāritau evam hi āha na ca svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti vacanāt sandigdham avagamyate bhavati vā svargaḥ na vā iti na ca eṣa kāla antare deśa antare puruṣa antare avasthā antare vā viparyeti tasmāt avitatham iti atas trividhā prāmāṇya virahāt prāmāṇyam codanā janita jñānānām iti 
ŚVK_2.100	 nanu evam api kāraṇa doṣa āśaṅkāyām aprāmāṇyam eva atas āha nivārayiṣyate iti abhāvataḥ antena puruṣa āśrayāḥ hi śabde doṣāḥ iti uktam te ca apauruṣeya tva pratipādanena eva veda adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyante eva tat ca evambhūtasya iti anena sūcitam iha vivṛtam vakṣyamāṇaḥ eva arthaḥ pūrvam evambhūta śabdena uktaḥ iti veditavyam iti evan ca sākṣāt anupajātau api saṃśaya viparyayau kāraṇa doṣa āśaṅkayā api na vede śaṅkitavyau iti āha tena iti 
ŚVK_2.101^1	 evam tāvat ākṣiptam bhāṣyam upekṣya eva tad upoddhāta bhūtam svatas prāmāṇyam prasādhya vedāḥ pramāṇam iti siddhāntitam idānīm yat tu bravīti ityādi bhāṣyam ākṣiptam tasya abhiprāyam āha tathā iti ayam bhāṣya abhiprāyaḥ atathābhūta pratijñayā codanānām aprāmāṇyam prasādhyate tat ca trividham iti uktam tat iha tāvat saṃśaya viparyaya lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam na asti iti anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ pāriśeṣyāt buddhi anutpatti lakṣaṇam eva aprāmāṇyam āśritya ātathā bhāvaḥ pratijñātaḥ iti āpatati tatra idam uttaram vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate bravīti ca vitatham ca ityādi 
ŚVK_2.101^2	 yad artham jñāpayati tat bravīti iti ucyate tat yadi codanā bravīti katham asau ajñāna ātmakena vaitathyena abhibhūyate evan ca vyākhyāyamāne na buddha vākyānām prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ na hi utpatti mātreṇa jñānasya prāmāṇyam āśritam yena ayam upālambhaḥ bhavet tebhyaḥ hi jñānam utpannam api pauruṣeya vākya janita tvena kāraṇa doṣa āśaṅkayā apramāṇam bhavati na ca iha tathā apauruṣeya tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt iha api ca bravīti iti ca kartṛ vibhaktyā codanā svātantryasya sūcita tvāt codanā hi svatantra eva artham bravīti na tu tayā kaścid puruṣaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.102^1	 aparam api yat tu laukikam vacanam tat ced pratyayitāt puruṣāt indriya viṣayam vā avitatham eva tat atha apratyayitāt puruṣāt anindriya viṣayam vā tat puruṣa buddhi prabhavam apramāṇam iti bhāṣyam atra pratyayita padam tāvat vyācaṣṭe tathā iti ayam arthaḥ atra bhāṣye pratyayita padena yathā dṛṣṭa artha vādi tvam abhidhīyate iti indriya viṣayam vā iti anena tu tasya eva mūla sadbhāvaḥ pratipādyate iti āha indriya iti tat ayam atra bhāṣya arthaḥ bhavati yat tu pauruṣeya vākyam nidarśitam tatra vikalpya dūṣaṇam abhidhīyate dvedhā hi pauruṣeyam vākyam pratyayita vākyam apratyayita vākyam ca pratyayita vākyam ca dvividham pramāṇa mūlam bhrānti mūlam ca pratyayaḥ asya saṃjātaḥ iti etasmin arthe hi tāraka ādi smṛta īrita jantam pratyayita śabdam abhiyuktāḥ smaranti dvedhā ca pratyayaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam ca tat evam etāvat eva pratyayita rūpam avatiṣṭhate yat asau vadati tatra avaśyam pratyayaḥ asya san jātaḥ yathā adṛṣṭa artha vādī iti yāvat 
ŚVK_2.102^2	 atas eva indriya viṣayam vā iti sambhava vyabhicārābhyām viśeṣaṇam arthavat bhavati indriya śabdena ca pratyakṣa dvāreṇa sarva pramāṇāni upalakṣayati iti pramāṇa viṣaya viṣayam iti lupta madhyama padaḥ ca ayam uṣṭra mukha vat bahuvrīhiḥ tat yadi pramāṇa pratipanna viṣayam āpta vacaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tadā sādhya vikalaḥ tasya avaitathyāt atha apramāṇa mūlam anāpta vākyam vā tat yadi nāma vaktṛ doṣa duṣṭam apramāṇam na tena upamānena nityam veda vākyam vitatham mithyātva hetoḥ puruṣa doṣasya tatra asambhavāt puruṣa buddhi prabhavam iti ca aprāmāṇya bīja kathanam puruṣa buddhi prasūtam hi tat atas yādṛśam puruṣeṇa buddham na tad anurūpam tena vākyam prayuktam anāptena vā vipralipsunā vipralambha abhiprāya eva hi tasya buddhiḥ āptasya api bhrāntiḥ anāpta vākyam ca vaktuḥ pramāṇa mūlam api śrotuḥ apramāṇam eva visaṃvāda bāhulyāt anāśvāsāt atas eva ca tasya sat api dvaividhyam na upadarśitam asmābhiḥ anyataravidha anupātinaḥ api anāpta vākyasya aprāmāṇyāt atas eva vakṣyati śakye api asatye mithyātvam iti 
ŚVK_2.103	 anye tu draṣṭṛ tva satya vādi tve pratyayita padārthaḥ iti āhuḥ iti āha draṣṭṛ tva iti yathā avasthita artha darśī yathā dṛṣṭa artha vādī ca puruṣaḥ pratyayita padena abhidhīyate iti evam ca pratyayitasya apramāṇa jñāna asambhavāt anarthakam indriya viṣayam vā iti viśeṣaṇam iti apratyayita vacana viśeṣaṇa artham eva prayuktam tatas ca ayam arthaḥ bhavati anāpta uktiḥ api satyā bhavati yadi dṛśyamāna artha vādī anāptaḥ bhavati iti āha dṛśyamānā iti 
ŚVK_2.104	 idam tu vyākhyānam anupapannam iti āha evam iti ayam arthaḥ atra hi avaitathye pratyayita vākyam indriya viṣayam ca itarasya udāhṛtam yathā āhuḥ pratyayitasya vacanam avyabhicāri pramāṇa antara pūrvakam yat ca upalabhyamāna viṣayam anāptasya iti tat atra pratyayita indriya viṣaya pratyudāharaṇe eka aṅga vaikalyāt yā pratyudāharaṇa sthitiḥ sāptatvā aindriyaka tvayoḥ ekaika abhāva mātraḥ eva bhavet ubhaya abhāve tu dvi aṅga vikalam pratyudāharaṇam āpadyeta 
ŚVK_2.105	 yadi ekaika abhāva mātre pratyudāharaṇam tatas kim jātam atas āha apratyayitā iti asya arthaḥ pratyayita pratyudāharaṇe atha apratyayitāt iti ucyamāne pratyayita abhāva mātreṇa pratyudāharaṇam deyam tatra aindriyakasya indriya viṣayasya arthasya yat pratipādakam vākyam tasya api asatya tā bhavet pratyayita abhāva mātreṇa hi asatya tā darśanīyāḥ indriya viṣayam api ca anāptasya apratyayita vākyam eva iti kim nāsatyam yadi tu anindriya viṣayam eva apratyayita vākyam pratyudāhriyate tat na indriya viṣayam vā iti asya anindriya viṣayam vā iti anena eva pratyudāharaṇāt ubhaya pratyudāharaṇe ca dvi aṅga vaikalya prasaṅgāt evam indriya viṣaya pratyudāharaṇe api anindriya viṣayam vā iti atra indriya viṣaya abhāva mātreṇa asatya tā darśanīyāḥ tatra pratyayita bhāṣitam api tathāvidham sat asatyam prāpnoti tasya api anindriya viṣaya tvāt apratyayitasya api anindriya viṣayam iti ucyamāne pūrvavat dvi aṅga vikala tā anindriya tva pakṣaḥ iti yadā pratyayita vākyasya anindriya tvam anindriya viṣaya tā bhavati tadā tasya api asatya tvam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_2.106^1	 kim atas yadi evam atas āha vyāhata iti ayam arthaḥ evam hi pūrva apara viruddha artha abhidhānena granthaḥ vyāhataḥ bhavati udāharaṇa velāyām hi pratyayita vākyam anindriyam eva śrotuḥ pramāṇam iti udāhṛtam āpta pratyayāt tat idānīm indriya viṣaya pratyudāharaṇe apramāṇa tayā ucyate iti vyāghātaḥ evam anāpta vākyam api śrotuḥ indriya viṣayam sva pratyaya āśrayaṇena satyam iti uktam tat pratyayita pratyudāharaṇe mithyātvena ucyate iti pūrva apara virodhāt agrantha tā āpattiḥ ayam ca atra vārttikakārasya abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat pratyayita śabdena tathābhūta artha darśi tvam ucyate 
ŚVK_2.106^2	 yaugikaḥ hi ayam na sāṃvijñānikaḥ pratyabhijñāyamāna avayava artha anvaya parityāge kāraṇa abhāvāt pratyayaḥ asya san jātaḥ iti hi prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgam abhiyuktāḥ smaranti dvedhā ca pratyayaḥ samyak mithyā ca iti atas na yathārtha darśī pratyayitaḥ kin tu yathā dṛṣṭa artha vādī satya vādī iti yāvat eṣā eva hi satya vādi tāḥ yaḥ vāc manasayoḥ visaṃvāda virahaḥ atas eva satya niyame sākṣiṇām satyam sākṣye bruvan sākṣī lokān āpnoti puṣkalān iti phalam darśayitvā vyatireke doṣam darśayantaḥ mānavāḥ paṭhanti sākṣī dṛṣṭa śrutāt anyat vibruvan= ārya saṃsadi 
ŚVK_2.106^3	 avāk narakam āpnoti pretya svargāt ca hīyate iti atra hi dṛṣṭa śruta abhidhānam satyam itarat asatyam iti gamyate atas satya vādi tā eva kevalam pratyayita padena ucyate na sādhu draṣṭṛ tvam iti tasya eva indriya viṣayam vā iti viśeṣaṇam na apratyayita vacasaḥ tat dhīndriya viṣayam api apramāṇam eva na ca idam avaitathya mātra pradarśana artham aprāmāṇya anumānasya dṛṣṭānte sādhya vaikalya pradarśana artha tvāt tasya ca prāmāṇya pratipādanam antareṇa kartum aśakya tvāt atas eva bhāṣya ante tat puruṣa buddhi prabhavam apramāṇam iti āha evam hi tat upapadyate yadi pūrvam pramāṇa tā uktā āsīt anāpta vākyam ca śrotuḥ pramāṇa antara saṅgatā artham api apramāṇam prāc aniścayāt upariṣṭāt anuvādāt āpta vākyam api na arthe pramāṇam iti ced ayam aparaḥ asya doṣaḥ na kvacid puṃvacaḥ pramāṇam kva sādhya vikala tā pratipādyate na ca dṛṣṭānta dūṣaṇāt artha antaram asya bhāṣyasya manoharam upalabhāmahe tat evam tāvat na samudāya śaktyā pratyayita śabdaḥ sādhu draṣṭari vartate iti uktam syāt etat san jāta pratyayaḥ eva pratyayitaḥ 
ŚVK_2.106^4	 pratyayaḥ eva tu na samyaktvam vyabhicarati sarva dhiyām yathārtha tvāt atas yathārtha vid eva pratyayitaḥ iti tat na vakṣyate hi vṛtti kāra grantha vārttike yathā artha ayatha artha jñāna vibhāgaḥ evam tāvat pratyayita padārtha anusāreṇa na ayam arthaḥ bhāṣyasya yadi tu vikalpa vāci vā śabda anupapattyā evam vyākhyāyate pratyayita viśeṣaṇe hi indriya viṣayam vā iti asmin samuccaya arthaḥ vā śabdaḥ bhavet iti tat na aneka artha tvāt nipātānām dṛṣṭam hi nipātānām aneka artha tvam na tu pratyayita śabdasya sādhu darśi vacana tvam api ca samānaḥ ayam āvayoḥ anuyogaḥ 
ŚVK_2.106^5	 tava api hi pratyudāharaṇa gataḥ vā śabdaḥ samuccaya artha ā iva na hi apratyayita vākya mātram anindriya viṣaya mātram vā mithyā bhavat siddhānte apratyayita indriya viṣayān indriya viṣaya pratyayita vākya samyaktvā abhyupagamāt atas na kaścid viśeṣaḥ pūrva apara virodha mātram adhikam evaṃvādibhiḥ svīkṛtam yadi tu ucyate na pratyayita pratyudāharaṇam atha apratyayitāt iti kin tu pratyayita vākyam anapekṣam pramāṇam iti uktam itarat ca sva pramāṇa apekṣam tat eva tu anindriya viṣayam apramāṇam iti atha apratyayitāt ityādinā ucyate iti tat ayuktam 
ŚVK_2.106^6	 yadā eva hi indriya viṣayam anāpta vākyam pramāṇam iti uktam tadā eva arthāt idam uktam bhavati viparītam apramāṇam iti kim tad pradarśanena yasya tu pramāṇa udāharaṇe viśeṣaṇa dvayam upāttam tasya eva tad vyatireketat kathanam arthavat pratyayita abhāva mātraḥ eva tāvat aprāmāṇyam apratyayitasya hi apratīta vādi tayā avadhṛtasya vacanāt na etat evam iti viparyayaḥ kathañcid vā saṃśayaḥ bhavati ubhayathā api ca aprāmāṇyam eva yadi api ca atra na śabdaḥ sva mahimnā saṃśaya hetuḥ tathā api vaktari kvacid vyabhicāra darśanāt yathāyatham saṃśaya viparyayau bhavataḥ tāvatā ca apramāṇam anāpta vacaḥ 
ŚVK_2.106^7	 pratyayitasya tu anindriya viṣayam apramāṇam eva tasya hi niścaya janakam vacaḥ svatas prāpta prāmāṇyam eva apavāda darśanāt apramāṇam bhavati evaṃcobhaya pratyudāharaṇa upapattiḥ atas sūktam para mate grantha vyāghātaḥ iti yatas idam vyākhyānam anupapannam atas pūrva vyākhyā sādhīyasi iti āha tasmāt iti asya arthaḥ pūrveṇa tat ced pratyayitāt iti anena pratyayita vākyasya satyatā ucyate pareṇa tu indriya viṣayam vā iti anena mūla sadbhāvaḥ darśitaḥ pratyayitasya vacaḥ vaktuḥ eva pramāṇa mūlam pramāṇam na śrotuḥ indriya viṣayam anuvāda prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.108	 nanu evam pratyayita tvena prāmāṇyam vadatā bhāṣya kāreṇa guṇataḥ eva prāmāṇyam uktam bhavati guṇaḥ hi pratyayita tvam atas āha aprāmāṇya iti doṣa abhāvaḥ eva atra pratyayitatva upanyāsena upavarṇitaḥ na tu guṇāt eva prāmāṇyam iti kasmāt evam vyākhyāyate atas āha guṇāt iti varṇitam idam doṣa abhāva mātraupayikāḥ guṇāḥ na guṇa tayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti atas tad anusāreṇa eva bhāṣya vyākhyānam ucitam iti 
ŚVK_2.109	 nanu yadi indriya viṣaya tvam pratyayita vākyasya viśeṣaṇam eva na rāśi antarasya katham tarhi vikalpa artha vācī vā śabdaḥ atas āha samuccaya iti pūrvasmin= antena pūrvam tāvat samuccaya arthaḥ eva vā śabdaḥ iti uttaraḥ tu vikalpa arthaḥ eva iti āha uttaratra iti ubhayoḥ pratyayita indriya viṣaya viśeṣaṇayoḥ vikalpena pratyudāharaṇe darśayati iti 
ŚVK_2.110^1	 te eva pratyudāharaṇe darśayati śakye api iti asatye asatya vādini puruṣe śakye api arthe yat vākyam tasya mithyātvam śakyate grahītum iti śakye anatīndriye dṛṣṭa arthaḥ iti arthaḥ dṛṣṭa satyaḥ api pratyayitaḥ yadā aśaktikaḥ bhavati pratyāyyamānam artham grahītum asambhāvita śaktiḥ iti yāvat tadā tad vākyam api mithyā iti kim punar tathāvidhe arthe pratyayitaḥ vākyam praṇayati bāḍham yadā bhrāmyati yathā śruti virodha bādhya smṛti siddhānte smṛti nibandhana kāraḥ yathā ca dṛṣṭa artha saṃvyavahāraḥ eva āptaḥ kutaścid bhrama nimittāt kam api saṃsargam āracayati tat asambhavat pramāṇam vacaḥ mithyā bhavati vipralipsā tu tasya na sambhavati na ca na bhrāntiḥ api brahmarṣīṇām api bhrāntiḥ āśaṅkyate kim aṅga punar arvācīnānām āptānām iti atra aparam bhāṣyam aśakyam hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt iti 
ŚVK_2.110^2	 tatra na vidmaḥ kim tad vṛttena parāmṛśyate iti vākyam hi prakṛtam na tat jñātum aśakyam su jñāna tvāt viṣayaḥ tu samāsa antargataḥ na tāvat tadā niṣkṛṣya parāmarśam arhati viliṅga tvāt ca put liṅgaḥ hi viṣayaḥ na asā onapuṃsa kaliṅga tad śabda parāmarśa arhaḥ tasmāt vyākhyeyam idam tat ucyate jñātum iti sāmānyatas jñāna sambandha upasthāpitam jñeyam tat iti nirdiśati etat uktam bhavati yat tad indriyāṇām aviṣaya bhūtam jñeyam tat puruṣeṇa na ṛte vacanāt jñātum śakyam iti samāsāt niṣkṛṣṭaḥ eva viṣaya arthaḥ jñeya tayā parāmṛśyate idam ca sarvajña nirākaraṇa para tayā kaiścid vyākhyātam tān nirākaroti na anena iti asya abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat iha sarva śabdaḥ śrūyate sarve arthāḥ jñātum na śakyante iti na ca sarvajña nirākaraṇam kvacid upayujyate dharma adharma jñāna niṣedha mātreṇa codanā eva iti pratijñā siddheḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.111^1	 api ca na jñātum śakyate iti uktvā vacana āt ṛtaḥ iti punar apavādaḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa āśritaḥ atas avagamyate atīndriya jñānam eva bhāṣya kāraḥ vārayati na tu sarva jñānam atīndriyam hi vacanāt ṛte jñātum aśakyam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha vacanāt iti api ca bhāva abhāva ātmakasya jagataḥ pūrvaḥ bhāgaḥ bhāva pramāṇaiḥ uttaraḥ bhāgaḥ abhāva pramāṇena avagamyate iti ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ ṣoḍhā bhinnam sarvam prameyam avagamyate eva iti na ayam īdṛśaḥ sarvajñaḥ nirākārya eva iti āha yadi iti nanu avagatam tāvat na anena sarvajñaḥ nirākriyate iti kim nāma anena kriyate pūrveṇa tāvat pauruṣeya apauruṣeya vākyayoḥ mithyātve hetu sadasadbhāvaḥ darśitaḥ aṃśe ca sādhya vikalatā 
ŚVK_2.111^2	 tat etāvatā eva paryavasite kim aśakyam ityādinā āśaṅkya nirākriyate iti na jñāyate ucyate pratyayita vākyam atīndriya viṣayam apramāṇam iti uktam tatra idam āśaṅkyate kim idam pratyayita vacanam atīndriya viṣayam iti apratihata darśana śaktiḥ eva hi āptaḥ sa khalu kāṣṭhā prāpta jñāna prakarṣaḥ dharma adharmau api aparokṣam īkṣate eva atas ca na codanā eva iti avadhāraṇam upapadyate tatra idam uttaram aśakyam hi iti na ayam etāvān atiśayaḥ kasyacid puruṣasya yat atīndriyam viṣayam draṣṭum vacanam antareṇa śaknoti iti idam ca sūtrakāreṇa eva pratyakṣa sūtrevakṣyamāṇam anāgata avekṣaṇena bhāṣya kṛtā pratijñā samarthana artham uktam tat eva tu nyāya kathāyāḥ kṣetram iti tatra eva vistareṇa sarvajñam nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_2.112	 nanu astu ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ ṣaṣ prameya vid sarvajñaḥ ekena eva tu cakṣuṣā sarva gocaram jñānam janyate iti nirākāryam atas āha ekena iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ divyena cakṣuṣā sarvam buddhaḥ jānāti iti ye vadanti te nūnam svayam api cakṣuṣā rasa ādīn pratipadyante katham aparathā svabhāva niyamam jānantaḥ buddhacakṣuṣaḥ sarva gocara tām ātiṣṭhante evam ca santu svayam eva sarva saṃvidaḥ kim para pratyaya āśrayaṇena iti upālabhamānaḥ ati tuccha tayā na ayam pakṣaḥ nirākaraṇam prayojayati iti darśayati eṣa ca anirākaraṇa= chalena nirākaraṇa mārgaḥ eva vārttika kṛtāḥ darśitaḥ śiṣyān vyutpādayitum itarathā tu kriyamāṇaḥ asaṅgataḥ eva bhavet iti 
ŚVK_2.113	 āha yadi api arvācīnānām cakṣuḥ na sarva gocaram tathā api buddhacakṣuḥ sa atiśayam divyam āsīt sarva gocaram iti kim anupapannam atas āha yat jātīyaiḥ iti asya arthaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi jātīyaiḥ hi pramāṇaiḥ rūpa ādi jātīyasya sambandhasya vartamānasya ca adya tve darśanam upalabhyate atas kāla antare api tathā eva abhūt iti yuktam evam hi dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī kalpanā kṛtā bhavati prayogaḥ ca bhavati buddhacakṣuḥ na atīta ādi viṣayam cakṣuṣṭvāt asmad ādi cakṣuḥ vat acakṣuḥ vā atīta ādi viṣaya tvāt śabda vat iti 
ŚVK_2.115.1^1	 nanu avagatam tāvat pramātṛ bhedāt dūre dūratare ca cakṣuḥ prakāśayati iti tat kāṣṭhā prāpta prakarṣam sarvam prakāśayiṣyati jñānasya api yathottaram lokaśāstrayoḥ atiśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat kvacid āśraye samāsādita para prakarṣam sarva gocaram bhaviṣyati bhavati ca atra sa atiśayam kāṣṭhā prāptam avagatam yathā viyati parimāṇam sa atiśayam ca jñānam atas tena api kvacid āśraye pariniṣṭhātavyam eṣā ca jñānasya pariniṣṭhitiḥ yā sarva viṣaya tā mahā viṣaya tayā eva yathottaram atiśaya āgamāt iti atas āha yatra api iti sāmarthyam antena 
ŚVK_2.115.1^2	 ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam ca cakṣuṣaḥ prakarṣaḥ jñānasya ca na tu sva artham atikramya unmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ hi pratiyataḥ yadi api nīla pīta ādi bheda bhinnam anekam api rūpam prakāśate iti na ekatra rūpe cakṣuḥ niyamyate nānā deśa parimāṇa artha paricchedāt ca na deśa parimāṇābhyām tathā api tu na sva artham atikramya cakṣuṣā kiñcid prakāśyate iti asti niyamaḥ kaḥ ca asya sva arthaḥ yena sat nikṛṣyate yathā rūpī rūpam rūpa eka artha samavāyinaḥ ca rūpiṇā tāvat dravyeṇa saṃyujyate bhautikam hi tat iti pratyakṣa sūtre vakṣyate 
ŚVK_2.115.1^3	 rūpa tad eka artha samavāyibhiḥ ca saṃyukta samavāyāt sannikarṣaḥ na ca etāvatā rasa ādiṣu prasaṅgaḥ yogya tā sahitā prāptiḥ sannikarṣaḥ iti tatra eva vakṣyate yogya tā ca kārya darśana anusāreṇa yathākāryam avatiṣṭhate atas eva ati dūra vartinaḥ api bhāvāḥ na cakṣuṣaḥ sva arthāḥ evam ajāta ativṛtta ādayaḥ tat eteṣu eva sva artheṣu cakṣuḥ prakarṣam anubhavet na para viṣaye śabda ādau evam śrotre api darśayitavyam etāvān ca sva arthe dṛśyate prakarṣaḥ yat anatidūrān ati sūkṣma bhāva prakāśanam tat iha sva artha avyabhicārāt tad avacchinnā eva vyāptiḥ avagatā iti na sarva viṣaya prakāśana anumānāya ghaṭate pratihetuḥ varṇitaḥ eva jñānasya api ca ayam sva arthaḥ yatra asya kāraṇam asti ṣoḍhā api ca pramāṇa jñāna kāraṇam vibhaktam tat yatra asti tatra yathāyatham abhyāsa vaśāt jñānam prakṛṣyate eva iṣyate ca ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ saṃkṣiptaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti uktam eva vistareṇa tu sarve arthāḥ pratyakṣam īkṣyante iti na eṣa jñānasya prakarṣaḥ sambhavati pratyakṣa kāraṇānām sva viṣaya prakāśa prakarṣa niyamāt 
ŚVK_2.115.1^4	 tad adhīna tvāt tu jñānasya tad niyamāt eva niyamaḥ atas na sva artham atikramya pratyakṣasya sāmarthyam sambhavati bhaviṣyat grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati atīte vartamāne ca sa viśeṣa nikhila bhuvana avalambini bhāva bhede no khalu asti nāma bhājanam etāvataḥ a tiśayasya kaścid yaḥ dehasya eva ekasya kasyacid lomāni paramāṇūn vā saṅkalayitum alam nanu avartamānam api cakṣuṣā prakāśyate eva bhrāntau= idam rajatam iti na ca tat smaraṇam bāhya indriya apekṣa tvāt na ca śuktikā eva tatra prakāśyate iti yuktam vaktum anyatara prakāśasya ananya viṣaya tvāt itarathān āśvāsāt atas kvacid labdha prakarṣeṇa cakṣuṣā eva sarvam ajāta ādi prakāśayiṣyate astu vā saṃyukta saṃyogāt sarva artha sannikarṣaḥ yat eva hi kiñciccakṣuṣā sat nikṛṣyate tena eva praṇālyā saṃyuktam sarvam iti saṃyukta samavetānām iva anivāryaḥ tad saṃyoginām sannikarṣaḥ mā evam evam hi na kaścid asarva jñaḥ bhavet sarvasya tathāvidha sannikarṣa avyabhicārāt yat tva vartamānam api cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayaḥ iti tat na 
ŚVK_2.115.1^5	 śuktiḥ eva hi bhrāntau cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayaḥ prāpya kāri tvāt asat nihita rajata prāpti asambhavāt itarathā tu anapekṣita arthāḥ eva asat nihita rajata ādi vibhramāḥ bhaveyuḥ naca evam asti niradhiṣṭhāna vibhrama adarśanāt katham tarhi taimirikasya keśa darśanam na hi tat kiñcid grāhyam apekṣate asat keśāra upapravṛtteḥ na tatra api āloka aṃśānām tathā pratibhāsāt sūkṣma tvāt ca teṣām anyat anya ākāra tayā gṛhītam iti na lakṣyate katham idānīm anya ākāra tayā vedanam doṣebhyaḥ iti bhāṣya kāraḥ vakṣyati samānam ca idam itarasya api 
ŚVK_2.115.1^6	 tava api hi avartamānam rajatam vartamāna tayā avagamyate iti samānaḥ anuyogaḥ yadi doṣataḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ śuktau rajata anubhavasya śuktiḥ eva rajata anubhavasya doṣaḥ iti ced hantā evam artha apekṣitā ca upapāditā bhavati na idam rajatam iti ca prasakta tā drūpya nivāraṇena bādhaka jñānam iti idam eva sādhu manyāmahe yat vartamānam avartamāna rajata ākāreṇa avasīyate naḥ vartamānam eva rajatam vartamāna tayā tasmāt siddham sannihita vartamāna viṣayam eva cakṣuḥ rajata ādīn prakāśayati iti na tāvat cākṣuṣam pratyakṣam anāgata ādīnām īkṣaṇāya kṣamate iti 
ŚVK_2.115.2^1	 syāt etat astu cakṣuṣaḥ viṣaya niyamaḥ prāpya kāri tvāt manaḥ tu sakala atīta ādi viṣayam kim na iṣyate iti mānasa pratyakṣa gocarāḥ bhaviṣyat ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti tat na manasaḥ bahis asvātantryāt itarathā tu andhādya bhāva prasaṅgāt tasya api manasaḥ bhāvāt katham tarhi prathama jñāna prakṣayiṇī indriya vyāpāredvitīya kṣaṇa upalabdhiḥ na ced manaḥ bahis svatantram na tatra api indriya vyāpāra avirāmāt tad jñāna āvirāma upapatteḥ kā kathā svapne tatra khalu vartamāna tayā vividhān saṃsargāt manaḥ darśayati na smṛti tvāt 
ŚVK_2.115.2^2	 tatra ca manasaḥ asvātantryasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt katham vartamāna ābhāsaḥ doṣāt vyaktaḥ ca doṣaḥ nidrā yathā vakṣyati nidrā mithyā bhāvasya hetuḥ iti katham ananubhūte smṛtiḥ iti ced vakṣyati atra janmani ekatra iti nanu avagatam pratibhāsu manasaḥ svātantryam keṣām yadi arvācīnānām na tāsām liṅga ādi ābhāsa ja tvāt prāyas sahacarita hṛdaya prasāda udvega prabhāvitā hi pratibhā na tu aikāntika hetukāḥ atas eva aniścaya ātmikā buddhiḥ atha loka uttarāṇām na tāsām asmad ādi pratibhāsvabhāvān ativṛtteḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_2.115.2^3	 vimati padam ca lokottara tvam na asmad ādibhiḥ kvacid āśrayiṣyate bāhya liṅga ādi nirapekṣe ca bahis manāsi vartamāne sarvasya anapekṣita upāya antaraḥ manaḥ mātra nibandhanaḥ prasajan sarva bodhaḥ kena apavartayitum śakyate adṛṣṭa viśeṣāt liṅga ādi anapekṣam bahis vṛttiḥ iṣyate iti ced na indriya antara ārambha vaiyarthyāt tatas eva tad tad adṛṣṭa viśeṣa āhita saṃskārāt sarva pratīti siddheḥ tat api vā vyartham akaraṇasya eva vā ātmanaḥ adṛṣṭa viśeṣāt eva pratīti kriyā siddheḥ atha na adṛṣṭam anupāyam artham sādhayati iti mā abhūt śarīra ārambha vaiyarthyam iti evam tarhi na liṅga ādi anapekṣam api manaḥ kvacid vartamānam upalabdham iti astu tat api bahis bāhya apekṣam atas na mānasam api pratyakṣam bhaviṣyat ādau samartham iti siddham bhāvanā bala jam api sarvajña nirākaraṇa kṣetre nirākariṣyāmaḥ avagata viṣaya tvāt bhāvanāyāḥ tathā sati ca bhāvanā vaiyarthyāt adhikasya ca tatas api asiddheḥ api ca bhāvanā bala jam akṣa jam vā na vā na tāvat akṣajam iti uktam sarva akṣa śakti parikṣayasya anantaram eva ukta tvāt 
ŚVK_2.115.2^4	 anakṣa jam tu na pratyakṣam anvartha tvāt pratyakṣa śabdasya atas eva na bhaviṣyati pratyakṣasya sāmarthyam dṛṣṭam iti āha bhaviṣyati iti pratyakṣasya hi na bhaviṣyat viṣaya tā tad viṣayasya vā na pratyakṣata iti abhiprāyaḥ bāhya antaḥkaraṇa ja pratyakṣa nirākaraṇe api ayam eva bhāgaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ na cākṣuṣasya mānasasya vā bhaviṣyat ādau sāmarthyam iti arthaḥ api ca yogi jñāna gocaram sarvam abhyupayatā katham yoginā sarvam anubhūyate iti vācyam yat atīta ādi api vartamāna tayā yogibhiḥ avasīyate iti evam tarhi atasmin tad grahaḥ mithyā yogi jñānam 
ŚVK_2.115.2^5	 atha tu yathā avasthitam eva sarvam yoginā anubhūyate iti ucyate evam tarhi na atīta ādi viṣayasya pratyakṣa ta upapattiḥ anumāne api prasaṅgāt evan ca vartamāna āvarta māna viṣayam jñānam pratyakṣam iti ardha vaiśasam syāt matam kalpanā virahaḥ pratyakṣa tvam atīta ādi viṣayam api yoginaḥ tat rahitam atas pratyakṣam iti tat na pūrva apara kāla sambandhasya avikalpena grahītum aśakya tvāt kā ca iyam kalpanā yadi abhilāpinī pratītiḥ śrautram apratyakṣam bhavet 
ŚVK_2.115.2^6	 atha abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsā pratītiḥ kalpanā sāmānya sva saṃvedanam apratyakṣam bhavet yat api āhuḥ na enam iyam abhilāpena saṃsṛjati tathā nṛtteḥ ātmani virodhāt iti tat ayuktam asati api abhilāpa saṃsarge tad saṃsarga yogyasya sāmānya ātmanaḥ tatra nirbhāsāt tāvatā ca kalpanā tvānapāyāt kalpanā apoḍha tva anupapattiḥ atha anya rūpa āropaḥ kalpanā yogi jñānam api ajāta ādiṣu vartamāna rūpa āropeṇa eva vartate iti na kalpanā apoḍham api ca anyathā sthitasya anyathā ābhānāt bhrāntam eva yogi jñānam abhrānta padena vyāvartitam katham pratyakṣam yathā hi timira ādi doṣa vaśa prabhavam keśa jñānam bhrāntam iti abhra anta padena vyāvartyate evam yoginām api sarvasmin vartamāna avabhāsam bhrāntam eva iti abhrānta padena vyāvartitam na pratyakṣam bhavet sākṣātkāritā tu na anindriya jasya jñānasya sambhavati iti pratyakṣa sūtre vakṣyāmaḥ api ca artha sāmarthya samudbhavam pratyakṣam yogi jñānam ca asat ajāta ādi artha samudbhavam katham pratyakṣam etat api bhaviṣyat tva pratipādanena eva sarvam darśitam iti anusandhātavyam 
ŚVK_2.115.3^1	 syāt matam sarvam eva pratyakṣam asannihita avabhāsam jñāna arthayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena ayaugapadyāt atas na anena yogi jñānam duṣyati iti yadi evam kim tarhi prakāśate jñāna ākāraḥ eva arthena ahitaḥ etāvat eva arthasya grāhya tvam yat jñāna ākāra arpaṇa hetu tvam yadi evam artha eka deśaḥ api na avasīyate iti dūre sarva jñānam atha jñāna ākāra vedanaḥ eva artha vedanā adhyavasānāt na artha hāniḥ katham anya vedane anya vedana adhyavasāyaḥ avidyayā iti ced aho mahā anubhāvaḥ sarvajñaḥ yasya iyame tāvatī mahā viṣayāḥ avidhyā varam eka deśa darśinaḥ eva eṣām avidyā api tāvat alpīyasī kiñ ca idam sarvam krameṇa avasīyate yugapad vā na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ anantānām utpādavatām pūrva apara koṭi virahiṇām ca krameṇa anubhavitum aśakya tvāt 
ŚVK_2.115.3^2	 atas eva na yaugapadyam anantānām ajāta ādi vṛtta pratyutpannānām yaugapadya asambhavāt api ca kim idam sarvam nāma yat vidvān sarvajñaḥ bhavati ekena kenacid upādhinā avacchinna m odana ādi sarva śabda vācya tayā prasiddham na ca evam ajāta ādayaḥ arthāḥ iti katham sarva padārthaḥ ānantyam sarva tā iti ced nanu iyam iyattā an avadhāraṇa ātmikā eva iti katham tad vidaḥ sarva vittāḥ atas siddham na kiñcid kasyacid sarva gocaram pratyakṣam iti yat api prakarṣavatām kāṣṭhā prāptiḥ avagatā yathā viyati parimāṇasya iti jñānam api kvacid pariniṣṭhām gatam sarva viṣayam bhavati iti tat ayuktam prakarṣam khalu kāñcid kāṣṭhām adhiṣṭhāya saṅgirāmahe yat viramati iti 
ŚVK_2.115.3^3	 asambhāvanīya para avasthā tu kāṣṭhā iti hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ na khalu kārya dravyam ghaṭa maṇika ādi sa atiśaya parimāṇam viditam api imām daśām anubhavati yatas parama sambhāvanīyaḥ eva mahimā evam tena eva niravaśeṣa brahmāṇḍa udara paripūraṇāt anavakāśam itaram atha guṇa dharmaḥ ayam iti ucyate tat na evam api pūrva doṣān ativṛtteḥ guṇaḥ hi garimā na tasya etāvantam atiśayam paśyāmaḥ yatas param aparam na sambhavati iti yadi khalu sarva gurubhiḥ sambhūya ekam kiñcid kāryam ārabhyate evam etat sambhavet api na ca etat asti yat api nabhasi parimāṇam nidarśitam tat ayuktam parimāṇam nāma avacchedaḥ tat yadi api asti ākāśe tatas tat api na asambhāvanīya para avastham iti sādhya vikalatā 
ŚVK_2.115.3^4	 atha anantam eva nabhaḥ abhyupagamyate katham tarhi tatra parimāṇam nidarśyate parimāṇa abhāvaḥ eva asya ānantyam atas viruddham eva idam parimitam anantam ca iti sūktam bhaviṣyati pratyakṣam asamartham iti iha ca pūrva bhāgaḥ indriyāṇām sarva viṣaya tvena atiśayaḥ vāritaḥ uttarasmin pratyakṣa jñānasya iti vivekaḥ iti pratyakṣa agocare bhaviṣyat ādau sarvasmin tad vyāpta liṅga darśana asambhavāt anumānam api na sambhavati sādṛśya ani athā anupapadyamāna artha darśana asambhavāt ca na upamāna arthāpattī abhāvaḥ api na sarvasya kasyacid eva avagamyate dṛśya adarśana ātmakaḥ hi abhāvaḥ na tu sarvam kadācana dṛśyam śabdena api vistareṇa sarva artha avadhāraṇam asambhāvanīyam eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na anumāna ādeḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.116	 atra paraiḥ uktam nanu iyam asambhāvanā nitya veda abhyupagame api samānāḥ na hi sambhavati akṛtrimam nāma vākyam bhavati iti sarva āgamānām kṛtaka tvena avagateḥ tat yathā idam āgama nitya tvam asambhāvanīyam āśritya abhyudaya niḥśreyasa artham ārambhaḥ veda vādinām evam itareṣām api adṛṣṭa pūrva sarva vid prāmāṇyena iti na viśeṣaḥ atas āha sarvajñā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam idam uktam paraiḥ kin tu sampradhāraṇīyam idam asti anayoḥ kalpanayoḥ tulya tvam na vā iti yena kāraṇena paraiḥ tulya tvam āpāditam tena kāraṇena idam tulya tvam asti na asti iti sampradhāraṇīyam asmābhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.117^1	 tām idānīm sampradhāraṇām avatārayati sarvajñaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa tulya tve hi tulya tvam bhavati na ca iha tat asti sarvajñaḥ hi na tāvat asmad ādibhiḥ upalabhyate atas eva na asmad jātīyaiḥ svabhāva niyamāt etat eva abhipretya ādi śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ anyeṣām api asmadvidhānām asarva vidām na sarva vijñānam sambhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ etat ca upariṣṭāt vivariṣyate eva vedānām ca na tāvat kartā adya tve dṛśyate pūrva koṭeḥ anavagamāt na ca sambhāvyate atīndriya artha tvāt vakṣyati etat loke sat niyamāt iti na ca anumīyate abhāva virodhāt asannikṛṣṭa artha viṣayam hi anumānam vedeṣu ca adṛṣṭa artha nirmiteṣu avaśyam eva nirmātā smaryeta atas adarśanāt asmaraṇāt ca avadhṛta abhāvasya na kartuḥ anumānam sambhavati eṣā eva ca nitya tā vedānām yaḥ kartuḥ abhāvaḥ atas pramāṇavatī nitya tva kalpanā vedānām sarvajña kalpanā tu na tathā iti sādhaka bādhaka tulya tva abhāvāt katham tulya tā iti 
ŚVK_2.117^2	 nanu na adarśana mātrāt abhāvaḥ sidhyati satsu api viprakṛṣṭeṣu sambhavāt anekāntāt api ca vyāpaka nivṛtteḥ vyāpya nivṛttyā vyāpta tvāt tathā vyāpya nivṛttiḥ avadhāryeta api arthāḥ pramāṇasya vyāpakāḥ na ca pramāṇam arthānām vyāpakam ahetu tvāt atādātmyāt ca atas na pramāṇa nivṛtti mātreṇa abhāvaḥ sarva vidaḥ avagantum śakyate atas āha nirākaraṇa vat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pramāṇa adhīnāḥ hi vastu vyavasthitayaḥ na kenacid pramāṇena sarvajñaḥ idānīm tāvat avagamyate na ca kāla antare abhūt iti kalpayitum śakyate yathā nirākartum anumānena kāla tvāt idānīn tana kāla vat iti kāraṇa abhāvasya ca kārya abhāvena niyata tvāt sarva jñāna kāraṇa abhāvena tad gocara jñāna kārya abhāva anumānāt jñāna kāraṇa abhāvasya ca anantaram ukta tvāt atas na pramāṇa nivṛttyā sarvajñe saṃśayaḥ api darśayitum śakyate nirākaraṇa hetu balīyaḥ tu ena abhāva avagamāt iti 
ŚVK_2.118	 syāt etat na āgama gamyasya abhāvaḥ sarva vidaḥ avagamyate tad virodhāt eva atas āha na ca iti kasmāt āgamena na avagamyate atas āha tadīyaḥ iti āgamaḥ hi tadīyaḥ vā tasmin pramāṇam nara antara praṇītaḥ vā na tāvat tadīyaḥ anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ siddhe hi buddhasya sarva vid tve tad āgamaḥ pramāṇam tad prāmāṇyāt ca tad siddhiḥ iti nara antara praṇītaḥ tu pramāṇa tvena anabhimataḥ eva iti āha narāntarā iti 
ŚVK_2.119	 syāt etat nitya āgama gamyaḥ eva sarvajñaḥ śrūyate hi sarva vid sarvasya kartā iti atas āha na ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ tātparye hi śabdaḥ pramāṇam na ca evamparaḥ nitya āgamaḥ labdhum śakyate iti kim paraḥ tarhi ataāha nityaḥ ced iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yāvān kaścid siddhānuvādaḥ vedaḥ dṛśyate asau vidhi antara arthaḥ iti artha vāda adhikaraṇe vakṣyate tat ayam api ātma jñāna vidhi śeṣaḥ eva iti na svarūpe pramāṇam iti tātparye kaḥ doṣaḥ atas āha tad paraḥ iti na hi nityaḥ vedaḥ nara vigraham anityam sarvajñam pratipādayitum arhati nitya anitya saṃyoga virodhāt tat asau evamparaḥ anityaḥ eva syāt iti 
ŚVK_2.120	 ayam ca nitya āgama gamya tve doṣaḥ iti āha āgamasya iti yadi aṅgīkṛtaḥ nityaḥ āgamaḥ kim sarvajña kalpanayā iti vṛthātve kāraṇam āha yatas iti nityaḥ eva āgamaḥ dharme pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti kim sarvajña kalpana antara āśrayaṇena iti idam tu nitya āgama gamya tā nirākaraṇam veda vādinām eva bhrāntim apanetum na nāstikaḥ veda vedyam sarvajñam icchati iti 
ŚVK_2.121	 yaḥ tu vadati kim naḥ sarvajña graheṇa buddha āgama satyatā hi naḥ sādhyāḥ sā ca evam api sidhyati eva indriya ādi sambandha viṣaye hi jñāna mātra kṣaṇika tva ādau buddhaḥ satya vādī dṛṣṭaḥ atas tena eva dṛṣṭāntena śraddheya arthe atīndriya artha viṣaye api buddha vacasaḥ satya tvam anumīyate evam caitya vandana ādīnām api dharma tvam sidhyati iti tat etat upanyasyati yaḥ api iti 
ŚVK_2.122–2.123	 etat api dūṣayati tena iti indriya ādi sambandha viṣaye hi pramāṇa antara pāratantryeṇa satya tā dṛṣṭā iti vyāpti balena atīndriya arthe api pāratantryeṇa pramāṇatā bhavati iti pāratantrye kāraṇam āha prāmāṇyam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ indriya ādi sambandhe viṣaye satya tā iti bruvāṇena arthāt idam uktam bhavati indriya ādi tantram prāmāṇyam iti svatas prāmāṇye tad apekṣāyāḥ vaiyarthyāt etat uktaṃbhavati na atra māna antaram atantrīkṛtya buddha vacana mātrasya satya tā avagatā pramāṇa antara apekṣāyāḥ sarvatra avyabhicārāt atas na kvacid api svātantryeṇa pramāṇa tā sidhyati iti pāratantryam eva vivṛṇoti yathā eva iti saḥ ayam dharma viśeṣa viruddhaḥ hetuḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.124	 na kevalam dharma viśeṣa viruddhaḥ viruddha avyabhicārī cāya hetuḥ iti āha yathā ca iti śakyate hi vaktum buddha vacanam atīndriye anyān avabuddhe arthe na pramāṇam buddha vākya tvāt kṣaṇikā ādi vākya vat eva tāni hi atīndriye arthe apramāṇāni eva ayam ca ekaḥ eva hetuḥ viruddham artha dvayam na vyabhicarati iti idam eva eka vacana anta viruddha avi abhicāri pada udāharaṇam hetu dvayam tu na eka vacana anta pada vācyam iti anumāne varṇayiṣyāmaḥ iti na ca vācyam satya tvam api tāvat ayam hetuḥ sādhayati iti siddhaḥ naḥ pakṣaḥ iti na hi vaḥ satya tā mātram sādhyam śraddheya artha satyatāyāḥ sādhya tvāt atas eva uktam śraddheya arthe api kalpayet iti 
ŚVK_2.125	 tat ayam aśraddheye satyatām śraddheye ca asatyatām sādhayan na iṣṭa sādhanāya vaḥ prabhavati asmākam eva tu śraddheye sisā dhayiṣatām asatya tām buddha vacasaḥ sādhayan ayam hetuḥ anuguṇaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha aśraddheyā iti viśeṣa viruddha tām eva pūrva uktām vivṛṇoti pūrva iti dṛṣṭānta anusāreṇa hi hetuḥ gamakaḥ bhavati tatra vaḥ pūrva jñāna anuvāditā dṛṣṭā iti tat vyabhicārāt śraddheya arthasya api buddha vacasaḥ pūrva jñāna anuvādi tvam eva ayam sādhayet svātantryam tu pramāṇa tāyāḥ viśeṣam virundhyāt iti 
ŚVK_2.126	 api ca yaḥ eva kaścid veda bāhyaḥ pāṣaṇḍaḥ anena hetunā pauruṣeya āgamānām satya tvam sisādhayiṣati tasya eva sa pratisādhanaḥ ayam anyonya dṛṣṭānta upadarśanena hetuḥ bhavati iti āha api ca iti buddha vacanam atīndriya artham mithyā alaukika artha tve sati puṃvākya tvāt digambara āgama vat saḥ api tatas eva mithyā buddha āgama vat iti anyonya sa pakṣatā iti 
ŚVK_2.127–2.128	 aviśeṣitena eva vā puṃvākya tvena hetunā dharma adharma atirikte arthe prāmāṇyam prasajyate iti āha dharma iti atra ca dharma adharmayoḥ prāmāṇya abhāvaḥ eva sādhyaḥ na atirikta arthe prāmāṇyam tasya siddha tvāt iti yat api kṣaṇika ādi vākyam dṛṣṭāntatayā uktam tat api sāṃkhya ādiṣu pratipakṣiṣu jīvatsu sādhya vikalam iti āha sāṃkhya ādiṣu iti sarva nitya tva vādinaḥ hi sāṃkhyāḥ te yāvat na nirjitāḥ tāvat katham kṣaṇa bhaṅga vākyam satyatayā upanyasyate yathā ca idam asat tathā śabda adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ iti alaukika artha vādi tā vā puṃvākya tva viśeṣitā satya tva anumānam pratihanti paraspara āgama dṛṣṭāntena eva iti āha alaukikā iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva vyatyayaḥ atirekaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.129–2.130	 pratihetu prasaṅgena idānīm yat api sarvajña prasādhana artham paraiḥ anumānam uktam sarvajñaḥ a smi iti buddhena yat uktam satyam eva tat tad ukta tvāt yathā jyotiḥ uṣṇam āpaḥ dravāḥ iti tat api pratihetu viruddham iti sarvajña dūṣaṇam eva upasaṅkramya āha vadet iti yaḥ vādī pūrvam asaṅgataḥ eva āgatya evambhūtam vakṣyamāṇam yat vadati tasya api eṣa vakṣyamāṇaḥ eva bhavat ukta hetu sadṛśaḥ bhavantam prati mukta saṃśayam hetuḥ bhavati prathama saṅgatiḥ anaikāntika āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa arthāḥ cira saṅgataḥ hi kadācid mithyā bhāṣate iti pratihetum eva prayogeṇa darśayati buddha ādīnām iti 
ŚVK_2.131	 katham punar ayam mukta saṃśayaḥ atas āha pratyakṣam iti buddhaḥ asarvajñaḥ iti vacasaḥ mad ukta tvam pratyakṣa siddham asandigdham eva dṛṣṭānte ca agni uṣṇa tva ādi vākye tat pratyakṣa siddham eva iti sūktam asaṃśayam iti sarvajñaḥ asmi iti vacanam buddha uktam na vā iti na niścetum śakyam na khalu etāvat ati uddhata anṛtam prekṣā pūrva kārī bhāṣate iti sambhāvayāmaḥ sā iyam asya vacasaḥ dṛṣṭāntānām ca kṣaṇikā ādi vākyānām buddha ukta tā na asādhitā sidhyati iti bauddhena sādhya iti āha tvayā sādhyeti kim atas yadi evam atas āha tena iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na anayoḥ hetvoḥ tulya tayā saṃśaya hetu tvam kin tu asmadīyaḥ hetuḥ svayam siddhaḥ prasiddha vyāptikaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca na hetu vikalaḥ iti siddhaḥ naḥ pakṣaḥ tava tu sandigdha asiddhaḥ hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sandihyamāna hetu sadbhāvaḥ iti aprasiddha aṅgakam anumānam na sādhya siddhaye prabhavati iti ayam āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ sampadyate iti 
ŚVK_2.132	 kiñ ca atisthavīyān ayam sarvajña vādaḥ yena atyanta prasiddhaiḥ api prameya tva ādi hetubhiḥ śakyate nirākartum iti āha pratyakṣā iti prameya tva ādayaḥ hipramāṇa antara aviruddhāḥ buddhe siddhāḥ śaknuvanti tasya sarvajña tām vārayitum na ca atra vipakṣe bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt asiddhā vyāptiḥ iti vācyam sarva jñāna kāraṇa abhāvena sarvajñā sambhavasya ukta tvāt iti 
ŚVK_2.133^1	 nanu asti iyam cira pravṛttāḥ buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti dṛḍhā smṛtiḥ tat asyāḥ eva buddheḥ dra ḍhimnaḥ sarvajña pramāṇam anumāsyāmahe atas āha na ca iti kim iti na anumīyate atas āha vigānāt iti avigītā hi smṛtiḥ mūlam upasthāpayati sarvajña smṛtim tu nāstikāḥ eva parasparam vigāyanti sarva vid bhedān āśrayantaḥ veda vādinaḥ tu atyantāya sarvajñam nirākurvanti iti nanu samānam idam vigānam manu ādi smṛtiṣu api tāḥ api nāstikāḥ vigāyanti atas āha chinnā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ smṛtiḥ hi pūrva jñāna kārya tayā avagatā kāraṇa bhūtam pūrva vijñānam anumāpayati 
ŚVK_2.133^2	 asat nikṛṣṭa artha gocaram hi anumānam bhavati iha ca sarva jñāna kāraṇa abhāvāt chinnam pūrva vijñānam smṛti mūla tayā asambhāvitam iti vaiparītya paricchedāt na anumāna avakāśaḥ veda saṃyogaḥ tu traivarṇikānām sambhavati iti sa śakyaḥ manu ādi smṛti mūla tayā kalpayitum iti vigānam vivṛṇoti kaiścid iti idam ca anvāruhya vacanam yadi hi sarva avigānam bhavet evam api yā kācid kalpanā syāt na ca evam asti kaiścid eva mahā jana eka deśa bhūtaiḥ buddha ādibhiḥ sarvajña tāyāḥ parigrahāt iti 
ŚVK_2.134	 chinna mūla tām vivṛṇoti sarvajñaḥ iti smṛti draḍhimnā hi ekena sarvajñaḥ jñātaḥ iti kalpanīyam saḥ eva tu sarvajñam jñātum samarthaḥ yaḥ sarva vid vedyam jānāti yāvat dhi etāvat eva sarvam idam ca buddhaḥ jānāti iti na jāyate na tāvat asau sarvajñaḥ iti avadhārayitum śakyate na ca buddhāt arvācīnaḥ sarva vid iti na asya sarva jñāna kāraṇam asti na ca anavagatam smartum śakyate atas asambhāvita mūlā evan jātīyām smṛtiḥ apramāṇam eva iti 
ŚVK_2.135–2.136	 yadi tu buddhāt anyaḥ api kaścid ekaḥ sarvajñaḥ tena ca sarvajñaḥ buddhaḥ iti jñātvā smṛtam tatas eṣā smṛti paramparā pravṛttā iti ucyate evam sati tat sarvajña tā vinā sarvajñena na avagantum śakyate iti sarvajñānantyam iti āha kalpanīyāḥ iti atra kāraṇam āha yaḥ eva iti evam tāvat sārvajñyam durjñānam iti uktam tad anavagame ca sarvajña āgama prāmāṇyam api na sidhyati iti āha sarvajñaḥ iti sarvajña praṇīta tā hi tad āgama prāmāṇya mūlam tad anavagame ca na yādṛśa tādṛśa puruṣa vākya vat sarvajña āgama prāmāṇyam adhyavasātum śakyate iti 
ŚVK_2.137^1	 dūṣaṇa antaram āha rāga ādi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ āgama praṇayanam hi rāgāt vā kiñcid anugrahītum dveṣāt vā nigrahītum sambhavati buddhaḥ tu prakṣīṇa akhila rāga dveṣaḥ iti na asya āgama praṇayane kiñcid kāraṇam upalabhyate iti anya praṇītā eva dharma atideśanā iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ nanu ayam parama kāruṇikaḥ tad vaśaḥ eva duḥkha uttarān prāṇinaḥ dṛṣṭvā dūram dūyamāna mānasaḥ hita ahita prāpti parihāra upāya upadeśān praṇayati iti kim anupapannam atas āha nirvyāpāraḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pratyakṣam hi tat yoginaḥ sarva viṣayam jñānam iṣyate tat ca kalpanā apoḍham 
ŚVK_2.137^2	 atas yadā dhyāna stimita locanaḥ jagat akhilam avikalpena vilokayamānaḥ avatiṣṭhate tadā asya asmṛta śabda ādi sambandhasya vivakṣā prayatna tālvādi vyāpārā sambhavān na kathañcid api asmṛtasya deśanā praṇayanam sambhavati iti kāruṇikaḥ api upekṣeta eva eti anya praṇītā eva deśanā bhavet iti api ca yāvat idaṃvṛttam idam vartiṣyate iti na pratyavekṣate na tāvat āgamaḥ nirmātum śakyate na ca etat api anutthitasya sambhavati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha ṛtaḥ iti tat iha kāraṇa trayam api anya praṇīta tve deśanānām uktam iti anusandhātavyam syāt etat vyutthāya upadekṣyati iti tat na vyutthitasya abhilāpinī pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ iti bhrānta bhāṣitam apramāṇam bhavet iti 
ŚVK_2.139	 syāt etat buddha anubhāvāt asati eva tad prayatna viśeṣe kuḍya ādibhyaḥ api deśanā dharma upadeśāḥ nirgacchanti iti tat idam na aśraddadhānāḥ veda vādinaḥ budhyāmahe vayam hi vastu svabhāvam anatikrāmantaḥ yat jātīyaḥ yatas siddhaḥ tatas tad siddhim anujānīmahe granthasandarbhaḥ ca vivakṣā prayatna vāyu īraṇa tālu ādi saṃyoga vibhāga pūrvakaḥ eva avagata iti na dhyāna stimita antaḥkaraṇa yogi sannidhānāt eva sidhyati iti sambhāvayāmaḥ tat etat āha sānnidhya iti sārdhena api ca āpta pratyaya anusārī śabdān nirṇayaḥ iti na kuḍya ādi nissṛtābhyaḥ deśanābhyaḥ āśvāsaḥ bhavet iti āha kuḍya ādi iti 
ŚVK_2.140	 kiñ ca buddha praṇīta tve api na āśvāsaḥ evam ca saṃśemahe kim buddha anubhāvāt nismṛtāḥ imāḥ deśanāḥ āhosvit piśāca ādibhiḥ durātmabhiḥ adṛśyaiḥ īritāḥ iti āha kin tu iti adṛśya ati vāhikā yoni ja dehāḥ piśācāḥ iti purāṇeṣu gīyate tad matena idam uktam iti evam ca saṃśayānebhyaḥ deśanā na pramāṇam bhaveyuḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_2.141	 anyat darśanam bodha svabhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ bhava antarīya karma arjita deha indriya ādi vaśaḥ kvacid eva kiñcid ca jānāti niravaśeṣita aśeṣa karma āśayaḥ tu vigalita nikhila karaṇa kalebara ādi prapañcaḥ kevalībhūtaḥ viśvam eva sūkṣma atīta ādi bheda bhinnam aparokṣam īkṣate tat ca kevale jīve jātam kevala jñānam ācakṣate evaṃvādibhiḥ ca mukta ātmanām eva sarva gocara jñānam āśritam tat etat upanyasyati evam iti 
ŚVK_2.142	 etat api dūṣayati nartaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ subhāṣitam idam muktaḥ viśvam jānāti iti sā khalu jīvānām tādṛśī daśā saḥ eṣa na iti na iti iti sakala bheda prapañca vilayanena eva tāvat upalabhyate vedānteṣu iti tad atirikta atīta ādi jñātavya abhāvāt katham sarvajña tā yadi tu avadhīrya vedāntān sva āgama prāmāṇya āśrayaṇena muktānām tathāvidham jñānam iṣyate tat nāsa tyāgam aprāmāṇye sidhyati na ca asarvajña praṇītaḥ āgamaḥ pramāṇam sambhavati iti sarvajña siddhau= āgama prāmāṇyam tad siddhau ca sarvajña siddhiḥ iti itaretara āśrayam bhavati iti yadi tu kvacid tathāvidhena jñānena vyāptam liṅgam upalabhyate evam anumānena jñāna siddhau itaretara āśraya parihāraḥ bhavet na tu tasya jñānasya loke kaścid dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati iti āha dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.143^1	 evam tāvat yaiḥ puruṣa atiśayam āśritya tad pratyayena āgama prāmāṇyam āśritam tān pratyuktam idānīm ye vadanti nityaḥ eva ayam āgamaḥ kasyacid prathamam ārṣa jñānena avabuddhaḥ bhavati iti tān pratyāha nitya āgamaḥ iti kim punar ayam nitya āgama vādaḥ eva nirākriyate atra api śabda eka pramāṇakau eva dharma adharmau etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ yat ekasya eva kasyacid ṛṣeḥ apagata sakala kalmaṣasya abhraṣṭa bhava āntarīya saṃskārasya ādau eva vedāḥ prādurbhavanti te ca tena aparebhyaḥ pratipādyante taiḥ api anyebhyaḥ iti evam śiṣya ācārya paramparayā ābhūtasaṃplavam tiṣṭhanti evam eva punar sṛṣṭau api ārṣa darśanena eva veda saṃvyavahāraḥ pravartata iiti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tasmāt vācyaḥ nirākaraṇa abhiprāyaḥ saḥ ucyate tat khalu sṛṣṭi ādau ṛṣeḥ jñānam grahaṇam smaraṇam vā 
ŚVK_2.143^2	 grahaṇam api pramāṇam apramāṇam vā na tāvat apramāṇāt artha tathā tva niścayaḥ pramāṇam tu nā pratyakṣam sambhavati iti kim tad nirākaraṇena yadi tu sākṣātkāri pratyakṣam etat ṛṣīṇām āśrīyate tathā sati anuccārita śabda śravaṇāt atīndriya darśanam eva apatitam atas eva āhuḥ atīndriyāna saṃvedyān paśyanti ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā ye bhāvān vacanam teṣām kaḥ atikrāmitum arhati iti atas nirākārya eva ayam siddhāntaḥ evam hi tulya nyāyatayā dharma adharmau api kaścid aparokṣayet tatas ca codanā eva iti pratijñā hāniḥ atas eva uktam anayā diśā iti sarvajña nirākaraṇa diśā iti arthaḥ etena tulya tām anayoḥ darśayati ayam api siddhānta paripanthi iti smaraṇam tu parastāt nirākariṣyate iti api ca idam ārṣa darśanam kṛta ka āśaṅkām api āpādayati iti nirākāryam iti āha na hi iti 
ŚVK_2.144–2.145	 nanu tad vacanāt eva niścayaḥ bhaviṣyati atas āha sarvadā iti śrūyate khalu anṛta vādinī vāc iti jaiminiḥ api prāya anṛta vādi tām vācaḥ vakṣyati prāyāt iti atra atas adya tve anṛta vādi bāhulyāt kāla antare api avisrambhaḥ iti api ca etat akasmāt pratibhānam svapna vat bhrāntiḥ iti api vaktum śakyate iti āha svapna ādi iti artha grahaṇam tulya nyāyatayā artha pratibhāsasya api śaṅkyamāna tvāt sa śaṅkānām prāmāṇyam na yujyate iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_2.146.1^1	 ayam aparaḥ asmin darśane doṣaḥ iti āha puruṣa iti puruṣasya tāvat atīndriya darśana śaktiḥ abhyupagatā eva yat anuccarita śabda grahaṇam aṅgīkṛtam sā ced aṅgīkṛtā kim āgama nitya tā graheṇa evam hi varam yat paraiḥ uktam puruṣa pratyayāt eva āgama prāmāṇyam iti tat eva āśritam iti evam tāvat anuccarita śabda darśanam nirākṛtam smaraṇam idānīm nirākaroti kalpitam iti asya atiśayavataḥ puruṣasya ādyatana jñāneṣu adṛṣṭa pūrvam janma antarīya jñāna nibandhanam vedānām sṛṣṭi ādau smaraṇam iti kalpanā mātram na tu prāmāṇikam janma antare nibandhanam kāraṇam asya iti arthaḥ kaḥ punar atra doṣaḥ yat janma antara anubhūtāḥ vedāḥ smaryante iti grahaṇam hi anuccarita śabda gocaram na sambhavati na tu smaraṇam adya tve api hi tāvat ciratara anubhūtānām āntara likā aneka antarāya paramparā ati rohitānā bhāvānām nānāvidha an eka gada vedanābhiḥ dūram dūyamāna mānasaiḥ api smaraṇam dṛṣṭam 
ŚVK_2.146.1^2	 tat bhava antarīya smṛtau kim anupapannam deha dhvaṃse saṃskāra an avasthānam iti ced na atad ādhāra tvāt tatra etat syāt adhriyamāṇeṣu deheṣu kim āśrayāḥ saṃskārāḥ bhavanti na vā bhavanti katham bhava antare phalam bhāvayitum utsahante iti tat na atad ādhāra tvāt no khalu api bhava antarīya paṭutara anubhava prabhāvitam bhāvanā bījam śarīra adhikaraṇam yat asya nāśe naśyet jñāna samāna adhikaraṇa tvāt ātmanaḥ ca jñāna ādhāra tvāt ātmā api parigṛhīta deha antaraḥ api saḥ eva avatiṣṭhate iti na āśraya anupapattiḥ api ca idānīm api pūrva jāti smaraḥ kaścid upalabhyate eva yaḥ bhava antarīya rahaḥ vṛtta vṛttāntam sampādayati deha nāśāt ca saṃskāra nāśe tad anupapattiḥ jarā maraṇa garbha vāsa janma vedanāḥ ca saṃskāra uccheda hetavaḥ tasya api tulyāḥ eva atas avaśyam āśrayaṇīyaḥ kaḥ api prāk bhavīya dharma anugrahāt tasya nāma bhājanam atiśayasya yaḥ atra amutra vā viditam api aśeṣeṇa smarati iti 
ŚVK_2.146.2^1	 api ca itihāsa purāṇa veda vādāḥ api jāti smaraṇa sadbhāve pramāṇam bhavati hi gītāsu vāsudeva vacanam bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava ca arjunaḥ tāni aham veda sarvāṇi na tvam vetsi parantapaḥ iti paurāṇikāḥ api prathamam sarva śāstrāṇām purāṇam brahmaṇā smṛtam anantaram ca vaktrebhyaḥ vedāḥ tasya vinismṛtāḥ iti paṭhanti smaraṇa abhiprāyam eva idam veda vinissaraṇam purāṇeṣu tad kṛta ka tva anabhyupagamāt veda vādāḥ ca bhavanti deha antara pratipatti kāle tam vidyā karmaṇī samanvārabhete pūrva prajñā ca iti mānave api viśiṣṭa karma phala tayā eva jāti smara tvam darśitam smaryate hi veda abhyāsena satatam satyena tapasā eva ca adroheṇa ca bhūtānām jātim smarati paurvikīm iti tatra etat syāt anya artha tva avadhṛta veda abhyāsa ādi samabhivyāhārāt parṇa mayī ādi phala artha vāda vat artha vādaḥ eva ayam na phala kalpanāyai prabhavati tathā hi veda abhyāsaḥ tāvat dhāraṇa arthaḥ eva pratyakṣam hi guṇyamānam na bhraśyati iti 
ŚVK_2.146.2^2	 yaḥ api ca aharahar svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti viśiṣṭa iti kartavya tā yuktaḥ brahma yajña vidhiḥ saḥ api yāvat jīva darśa pūrṇamāsa agnihotra ādi vidhivat upātta durita kṣaya ākaraṇa nimitta pratyavāya parihāra prayojana eva iti na asamīhita phala antara sambandham anubhavati satyam api śabda artha bheda bhinnam svarga ādi mahā phala artham avagatam eva iti na phala antareṇa sambadhyate tapāṃsi api nānāvidha enonibarhaṇa arthāni svarga ādi śreyaḥ ntara arthāni ca cāndrāyaṇa ādīni avadhāritāni iti anapekṣāṇi eva iti na jāti smaraṇa phalakāni bhavanti adrohaḥ api ahiṃsā bhūtānām tad tad kāla bhedena phala arthaḥ eva vihitaḥ 
ŚVK_2.146.2^3	 yadi vratam yadi niṣedhaḥ kasya jāti smṛtiḥ phalam bhavet tasmāt veda abhyāsa ādīnām artha vādaḥ eva phala śrutiḥ na phala kalpanāyām pramāṇam iti tat na pratyekam hi veda abhyāsa ādīnām phala antaram avagatam na samuccitānām iha tu krayaḥ iva aruṇa ādīnām satya ādīnām ekatra phalaḥ upādīyamānānām sāhityam vivakṣitam iti na samuditānām phala antara sambandha unā upapadyate atas eva samuccaya vacanam upapannam bhavati syāt etat ekena smaryamāṇāḥ vedāḥ kṛta ka āśaṅkām janayeyuḥ iti tat na anekeṣām api tathāvidha atiśaya bhājām ṛṣīṇām bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ prabhṛtīnām paraspara saṃvāda āśaṅkā nivṛtteḥ 
ŚVK_2.146.2^4	 na ca evam veda arthe prasaṅgaḥ tasya atīndriyasya bhava antare api ananubhūtasya smṛti anupapatteḥ syāt etat bhava antara anubhūta smṛtau janma antare kṛta karmāṇaḥ iha phalam labhamānāḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām eva karma phala sambandham jānīyuḥ atas codana eka pramāṇa tā vyāhanyeta iti tat ayuktam anādau khalu saṃsāre viparivartamānānām anantāni karmiṇām karmāṇi tatra jātismaraḥ api na etāvat vivektum śaktaḥ amuṣya nāma idam karmaṇaḥ phalam iti na ca avaśyam ānantara bhava anuṣṭhita karma phala upabhogaḥ eva saṃsāriṇām nānā janma sañciteṣu śubha aśubha phaleṣu ānantyāt anavadhṛta parimāṇeṣu duradhigamaḥ karma phala sambandha vivekaḥ tasmāt na āgama smaraṇe kaścid virodhaḥ dṛśyate iti kim tad nirākaraṇena atra ucyate yadi nāma itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇya āśrayaṇena ayonija dehāḥ eva kṛta ādi yuga bhedeṣu kecid ṛṣayaḥ smaranti vedān iti saṅgirante tat astu na evam api naḥ kācid siddhānta hāniḥ ekasya kasyacid smaraṇam eva asmābhiḥ nirasyate tat dhi kṛtrima tvam eva āpādayati iti atas eva vakṣyati ekasya pratibhānam iti 
ŚVK_2.146.2^5	 iha api ca asya iti ekavacanena ekasya eva smaraṇam nirākaroti bahavaḥ api ayonija dehāḥ smartāraḥ iti duṣpratipādam eva na khalu ayonijam nāma narāṇām śarīram sambhavati svabhāva niyama avisaṃvādāt visaṃvāde vā sakala dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt yoni ja dehāḥ tu sa atiśayāḥ api sa aṅgān caturaḥ vedān smaranti iti na evam sambhāvayāmaḥ janma jarā maraṇa vedanā paribhavaḥ hi mahān saṃskāra nāśanidānam iti katham mahān ayam grantha sandarbhaḥ mātrayā api anyūna anatiriktaḥ kenacid smaryeta 
ŚVK_2.146.2^6	 kiñcid eva bhavān tarīyakam api kecid smarante dṛśyante iti yathādarśanam astu jātismaraḥ kalpyatām vā mānava anumita jāti smara śruti anyathā anupapatti balāt viśiṣṭaḥ yoni ja vigraha parigrahaḥ bhṛgu ādīnām ṛṣīṇām svarga kāma śruti anyathā anupapatti kalpita asādhāraṇa atiśaya deha indriya ādi parigraha vat śāstra sthāḥ hi vayam yathāśāstram āśrayāmahe na ca śāstra sāmarthyāt āyātaḥ atiśayaḥ anumānena nirākartum śakyate āgama virodhāt eva janma antara anubhūtam ca na smaryate ititu atīndriya artha abhiprāyam eva tat astu sarvathā siddham idam ekasya āgama smṛti kalpanā na sādhīyasi iti 
ŚVK_2.147–2.148	 punar api grahaṇa pakṣam eva upasaṅkramya dūṣaṇam āha grāhya tvaḥ iti nanu āgamasya atīndriyaḥ arthaḥ na tu āgamaḥ iti katham tulya tvam atas āha yaḥ hi iti anuccaritaḥ hi āgamaḥ atīndriyaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ nanu tulya tve api tāvat asmad ādibhiḥ āgama grahaṇam āśritam kaḥ doṣaḥ atas āha pumān tāvat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na atra tulya tvam artha pratibhāne hi puruṣaḥ svatantraḥ bhavati tad anusāri tvāt artha niścayasya āgama pratibhāne tu puruṣaḥ artham pratyāgama paratantraḥ āgamaḥ api svarūpa sthitayetat paratantraḥ iti sa apekṣa tvāt ubhaya aprāmāṇyam iti 
ŚVK_2.149	 nanu idam āgama pāratantryam tava api samānam na hi puruṣa pratyayāt ṛte tasya yāthātmyam śakyam śraddadhātum atas āha anekaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ eka puruṣa pāratantryam doṣāya bhavati anekadhā saṃśaya upajananāt evam hi tatra saṃśayaḥ bhavati kim ayam anena āgamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kṛtaḥ vā dṛṣṭaḥ api yathā avasthitaḥ anyathā vā iti evam saṃśayānāḥ na kvacid āśvāsayeyuḥ aneka puruṣa ādhāre tu vede na tāvat kṛta ka āśaṅkā na api anyathātvam iti vakṣyati atas avyāhata svātantryaḥ vedaḥ prāmāṇyam labhate iti api ca yā iyam bhava antareṣu anubhūtānām bhava antare niravaśeṣa smṛti kalpanā sā api vedānām pāratantryam āpādayati eva evam hi tatra śaṅkyate katham khalu ayam mahān grantha sandarbhaḥ niśśeṣa saṃskāra= chidā maraṇena antaritaḥ anena smṛtaḥ tat ayam asmān vipralabdhu kāmaḥ eva svayam nirmitam āgamam smṛtam apadiśati evam ca śaṅkamānāḥ na svātantryeṇa āgama prāmāṇyam adhyavasyeyuḥ asmākam tu grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ eka bhava bhāvi tvāt na ayam doṣaḥ bhavati iti āha ekatra iti 
ŚVK_2.150	 atha aneka puruṣa stha tve kaḥ guṇaḥ atas āha anyathā iti bahuṣu hi sampradāya pravartakeṣu yā tasya vedasya anyathā karaṇa āśaṅkā sā nivartate ekena hi vināśitam vedam anyaḥ na etat evam iti nivārya anyathā darśayati atas bahu saṃvādāt vedasya yathā avasthita svarūpa avadhāraṇam bhavati iti ekasya pratibhānam tu kṛtaka veda kalpanāyāḥ na viśiṣyate ubhayatra api aviśvāsa tulya tvāt iti āha ekasya iti 
ŚVK_2.151–2.152	 atas na yathā vedānām ekaḥ kartā evam sampradāya pravartakaḥ api na ekaḥ puruṣaḥ iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti adyatva vat eva tu purā api bahavaḥ sa brahmacarya ādi paratantrāḥ narāḥ āsan iti āha bahavaḥ iti etat ca prayogeṇa darśanīyam iti evam tāvat puruṣa atiśaya kalpanā na apauruṣeya kalpanayā tulyā iti sampradhāritam atas yat paraiḥ anayoḥ kalpanayoḥ tulya tvam āpāditam tad eka kalpanīya hāna upādānābhyām eva iti sa apahāsam āha evan ca iti
