ŚVK_2.247–2.248	 api ca yadi sati api para upakāre kartuḥ udvega darśanāt guru aṅganā gamanam adharmaḥ tarhi yasya atas mleccha ādeḥ udvegaḥ na jāyate tasya adharma utpattiḥ na syāt iti āha evamādau iti śāstra jñasya eva śāstra anusāri udvegaḥ jāyate tad anabhijñasya tad abhāvāt apramāṇakaḥ adharma yogaḥ iti atas vimucya anugraha pīḍe tad abhāvam ca dharma adharma jñāna arthibhiḥ vidhi niṣedhau eva anusartavyau iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti ayam arthaḥ na anugrahaḥ dharma tve kāraṇam pīḍā vā adharma tve anugraha abhāvaḥ vā pīḍā bhāva mātram vā dharma adharma tvaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.251	 atra vadanti na anumānena hiṃsā ādīnām adharma tvam sādhyate kin tu śāstra anusāreṇa eva niṣedha śāstreṇa hiṃsāyāḥ pratyavāya śaktiḥ avagatā sarvā catīrthātīrtha gatāḥ hiṃsā eva atas katham hiṃsā satī kācid pratyavāyam na janayiṣyati na hi daikṣa paśu hiṃsā vidhānam vastunaḥ śaktim utsārayitum utsahate vidyamāna dravya guṇa ādi śakti mātra upadeśi tvāt śāstrāṇām na eṣām śakti āvāpa udvāpayoḥ vyāpāraḥ atas tat eva idam na hiṃsyāt iti śāstra upadarśita pratyavāya hetu tvam daikṣa paśu hiṃsā karmaṇi iti śāstra anudhā= anena eva hiṃsā ādīnām adharma tvam kalpyate iti tat etat upanyasyati kvacid iti trayeṇa kvacid bāhya hiṃsāyām niṣiddha tvāt pratyavāya hetu tve hiṃsāyāḥ śaktiḥ bodhitā na vidhānāt apagacchati iti sambandhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.253	 evam upanyasya nirasyati evam iti dvayena evaṃvādinaḥ hi na surām pibet iti niṣedha śāstrāt surā pānasya pratyavāya śaktiḥ avagatā iti śūdraḥ api tām piban pratyaveyāt tathā vaiśya stomena vaiśyasya yajamānasya vidhinā abhyudaya siddhiḥ darśitā iti vaiśyaḥ toma śakti anusāreṇa vipra rājanyayoḥ api tad phalam bhavet na ca etat iṣyate tathā kāla bhedena śakti bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iṣṭyoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ parvaṇi śakteḥ pañcamyām ca aśakteḥ agnihotrasya sāyaṃprātar anuṣṭhitasya phala sādhana tvāt madhyāhne ca tad abhāvāt atas yathāśāstram eva śakti sadbhāvaḥ abhyupeyate iti 
ŚVK_2.254–2.256	 tasmāt śāstra anusāreṇa eva karmaṇām phala śaktiḥ āstheya iti upasaṃharati  tasmāt iti evam sādhana upāya aṃśa dvaya atiriktāyām hiṃsāyām na hiṃsyāt iti pratiṣedhāt jātam pratyavāya hetutva jñānam anyatra tīrtheṣu yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabheta ityādi vidhinā vāryatas iti āha hiṃsā iti yat tu uktam na vastu śakti āvāpa udvāpayoḥ śāstrasya vyāpāraḥ iti tat iṣyate eva kevalam śāstra anusāreṇa eva tad tad kriyā bheda vyavasthitāḥ eva śaktayaḥ avagamyante atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha jñānam iti 
ŚVK_2.257–2.258	 katham ekasya karmaṇaḥ śakti bhāva abhāvau iti ced laukikāni karmāṇi vidāṅ kurvantu bhavantaḥ yathā tāvat ekam eva bhojanam sva sthātuḥ akartṛkam bhinna śaktikam dṛṣṭam svasthena hi tat kriyamāṇam rasa lohita māṃsa pariṇāma paramparayā śarīram vardhayati ātureṇa tu kriyamāṇam asamyak dhātu pariṇāmāt kṛśī karoti evam adṛṣṭa artheṣu api karmasu bhaviṣyati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha vyavasthā iti yathā bhojana tva abhede api sva sthātuḥ akartṛ bheda nibandhanam vyakti bhedam āśritya tatra śakti bhedaḥ samādhīyate evam iha api hiṃsā tvena abhede api rūpasya iyam aṅga hiṃsā iyam bāhya hiṃsā iti vyakti bheda avagateḥ upapannaḥ śakti bhedaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha rūpa abhedaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.259	 yadi tu avāntara bhedam anaṅgīkṛtya rūpa abheda mātreṇa eka phala tvam iṣyate evam sati sarva laukika vaidika kriyāṇām kriyā tvāt eka phala tvam syāt tatra idam svarga phalam idam putra phalam iti ādya saṅkaraḥ na sidhyati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tathā api iti āstām tāvat mahā sāmānyena eka tvāt phala saṅkaraḥ bhavati iti yajitvādyavāntara sāmānya abhedāt api citra ādīnām karmaṇām phala tulya tā bhavet iti āha yajitvā iti 
ŚVK_2.261	 yadi tu tatra vyavasthāva antara bheda āśraya abhidhīyate sa iha api samāna iti āha bhedāt iti nanu vihitā nāma aṅga hiṃsā tathā api kim na anarthaḥ na vidhinā anartha phalena na bhavitavyam iti rājā ājñā atas āha vidhīnām iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na iyam rājā ājñā śabda śaktiḥ eva vidhiḥ hi kartavyatā buddheḥ hetuḥ iṣṭa abhyupāyam ca kartavya tayā lokaḥ budhyate atas avaśyam eva sākṣāt vyavahitaḥ api vā vidheyānām puruṣa arthaḥ phalam iti avasīyate sākṣāt pradhānānām vyavahitaḥ aṅgānām tasmāt na atas vidheḥ anartha phala tvam avasīyate vidhi balāt avagamyamānam vidhīnām phalam iti āha iti api ca anartha kari aṅga hiṃsā iti na idam sāndṛṣṭikam na ca anartha samabhivyāhāraḥ asyāḥ śrūyate atas katham anartha sādhanam iti āha na ca eṣu iti nanu aśrūyamāṇaḥ api kalañja bhakṣaṇa ādi vat kalpayiṣyate atas āha niṣedhāt iti tatra niṣedhaḥ kalpanāyām kāraṇam na asau iha sambhavati abhāvāt eva vidhāna darśanāt iti 
ŚVK_2.262	 api ca aṅga hiṃsānām puruṣa artha tve siddhe kadācid anarthaḥ api phala tayā kalpyate na ca tāsām puruṣa arthaḥ phalam prakaraṇe pāṭhāt prakaraṇa vidhi viniyogena kratu artha tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ca iti kim nāma tat kalpyam atas āha karma upakāraḥ iti yat khalu prakaraṇa stham tatas pradhāna karma upakāraḥ eva kalpyate dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭaḥ vā yathā avaghātasya vrīhīṇām vituṣībhāvaḥ vidhi apekṣitaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭaḥ vā yathā prayāja ādi janyaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.263	 atas na atra anartha kalpanā avasaraḥ asti iti āha kalpanā iti na aṅga hiṃsāsu phalam apekṣitam kratu upakāreṇa nirākāṅkṣa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ kratu arthe api ca ayam viśeṣaḥ yat ayam paśu saṃskāraḥ eva na tu prayāja ādi va dārāt upakāraḥ aṅga hiṃsā tat purassaram viśasana ādi saṃskāra anuṣṭhānāt atas eva saṃjñapane paśuḥ vrīhi vat pradhāna tayā śrutaḥ paśum saṃjñapayati iti tat etat āha kratu arthaḥ iti sannipatya upakāra pradarśanena kratu artha tā eva balīyasi iti darśitam bhavati ārāt upakāraka tve yāvān kleśaḥ bhavet na ca tāvān api asti iti 
ŚVK_2.264	 saṃskāra tve api ca asya ayam viśeṣaḥ yat ayam dṛṣṭa arthaḥ eva avaghāta ādi vat na tu prokṣaṇa ādi vat adṛṣṭa arthaḥ kratu apekṣita ekādaśa avadāna niṣpatteḥ daikṣe hi paśau hṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ atha vakṣasaḥ ityādibhiḥ ekādaśa avadāna sādhyaḥ yāgaḥ uktaḥ na ca asati hiṃsā saṃskāre paśoḥ ekādaśa avadāna niṣpattiḥ sambhavati atas dṛṣṭa artha tvāt aṅga hiṃsāyāḥ na anartha kalpanā avasaraḥ asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dṛṣṭā iti evam tāvat jyotiṣṭoma upāya aṃśa sthā hiṃsā na adharmaḥ iti uktam ye ca abhicāra yajñāḥ śyena ādayaḥ tatra api eka ahānām jyotiṣṭoma prakṛti tvāt ca udaka prāpta aṅga hiṃsā na adharmaḥ iti āha abhicāraḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.265	 atas anaṅga bhūtāyām eva phala aṃśa sthāyām hiṃsāyām etat anartha tvam iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti nanu ca phala aṃśa sthā api hiṃsā śyena ādi uddeśena vidhīyamāṇā katham anarthaḥ atas āha uddeśāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na atra śyena uddeśena phalam vidhīyate phala tvena hiṃsāyāḥ eva uddeśāt phalam hi uddiśya sādhanam vidhīyate na tu viparyayaḥ nanu uddeśyayoḥ api deśa kālayoḥ vidhānam iṣyate eva satyam anyatas tayoḥ aprāpteḥ phale tu rāgataḥ pravṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ na vidhinā pravartyate iti uktam eva iti 
ŚVK_2.266	 katham punar tri aṃśa bhāvanā vidhāne vidheya avidheya bhedaḥ śakyate vaktum atas eva bhāvanā antargata tvāt anartha tva ākṣepaḥ nidarśitaḥ tatra uttaram āha bhāvanā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ vidhiḥ hi haṃsaḥ iva udakāt kṣīram vivicya prāpta parihāreṇa aprāptam gṛhṇāti tathā ca vakṣyati tad guṇāḥ tu vidhīyeran avibhāgāt vidhāna arthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ iti atas viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhau api sādhana iti kartavya tā mātra paratvāt phala aṃśāt nivartate iti atas siddham na sva rūpeṇa śyenaḥ dharmaḥ na api adharmaḥ phalasya eva tu anartha anubandhi tvāt tad dvāreṇa anarthaḥ iti upacaryate iti upasaṃharati atas iti 
ŚVK_2.268	 nanu ca vidhīnām puruṣa artha phala tvāt śyenasya ca vidhi viṣaya tvāt tad balena artha ātmakam eva phala antaram viśva jit ādi vat kim na kalpyate atas sva rūpeṇa dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti āha nirākāṅkṣasya iti ayam arthaḥ bhrātṛvya vadhena ekena svargāt api priyatareṇa nirākāṅkṣasya śyenasya na phala antara kalpanā sambhavati bhāvanā kāṅkṣā hi tad kalpanā bījam ekā ca bhāvanā ekena eva bhāvyena nirākāṅkṣa iti na bhāvya antara sambandham labhate tathā ca vakṣyati ekam vā codana eka tvāt iti atas siddham anartha phalasya tad dvāreṇa anartha tvam iti āha tasmāt iti kim punar kāraṇam phala anartha anubandhi tvāt śyenaḥ na dharmaḥ iti atas āha phalate iti īdṛśe karmāṇi loke dharma śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.269	 atra codayati nanu ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ kim punar kāraṇam svatas na dharma tvam śyena ādeḥ na api adharma tā iti iṣṭa abhyupāyaḥ hi codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ tathā śyenaḥ phalasya anartha anubandhi tve api atas dharmaḥ iti eva ayam vaktavyaḥ iti atra ubhaya rūpa rahitaḥ śyenaḥ iti abhipretya sampradhāraṇām avatārayati phalam iti sthitam tāvat śyena phalam hiṃsā hiṃsā ca na dharmaḥ iti śyena ādi svarūpam idānīm loka prasiddhi anusāreṇa avadhārayāmaḥ dharmaḥ adharmaḥ vā iti 
ŚVK_2.271	 tatra anyatara nirdhāraṇāya pakṣa dvayam upanyasyati yadi iti dvayena loka prasiddhiḥ hi naḥ sarva śabda artha avadhāraṇe mūlam tat asau eva nirūpaṇīyāḥ tatra yadi aniṣṭa anubandha rahita iṣṭa abhyupāyaḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti lokena ucyate tatas śyena ādīnām adharma tvena varjanam paramparayā anartha anubandhi tvāt yadi tu anādṛtya paramparayā anartha anubandhi tvam āhatya prīti phalam laukikāḥ dharma śabdena upacaranti codanā samadhigamyam tathā sati śyenaḥ api tādṛśa tvāt dharmaḥ bhavet kārya akāryān apekṣayā iti yat eva hi prīti mātra anubandhi tat kāryam iti vivekinaḥ budhyante viparītam akāryam iti bhāvaḥ prasiddhi vibhāga kathanena eva ca atra nirdhāraṇam uktam yathāprasiddhi tāvat dharma śabdaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ iti sthitam prasiddhiḥ ca aniṣṭān anubandhi iṣṭa sādhana viṣayā eva dharma śabdasya iti śyena ādi varjanam eva avasīyate iti 
ŚVK_2.272	 nanu evam adharmaḥ eva aniṣṭa anubandhi tvāt śyenaḥ phala dvāreṇa atas āha yadi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ adharma pada prayogaḥ api laukikānām sampradhāraṇīyaḥ kiṃviṣayaḥ iti tat yadi codanā arthaḥ api sākṣāt vyavadhānena vā aprīti hetuḥ adharmaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ tatas śyenaḥ api adharmaḥ atha veda vihite na adharma śabdam aprīti kare api paramparayā lokaḥ prayuṅkte tatas na adharmaḥ na ca veda vihita gocaraḥ adharma śabda prayogaḥ laukikānām dṛṣṭaḥ iti na adharmaḥ sva rūpeṇa śyena ādayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_2.273–2.274	 yaḥ tu vadati vihitā nāma aṃśa dvaya gāminī hiṃsā tathā api pratibaddha liṅga darśanena tasya anartha hetu tvam anumāsyāmahe tathā hi hiṃsā tvam anartha tvena pratibaddham bāhya hiṃsāsu avagatam tat dhi vihitāsu api dṛśyamānam anartha tvam anumāpayayati iti tat etat upanyasya dūṣayati yaḥ tu iti ayam ca āgama bādhaḥ anumāne prapañcayiṣyate iti āgamānādare tu anavasthā bhavati iti āha tam iti 
ŚVK_2.275	 nanu āgama anusāreṇa kratu gatānām api hiṃsānām adharma tvam avagamyate tathā hi santi hi kecana mantra artha vāda itihāsa ādayaḥ ye kratu vartinīm api hiṃsām nindanti yathā japa stutau vidhiyajñāt japa yajñaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ daśabhiḥ guṇaiḥ iti hiṃsā aṅga tvena eva vidhiyajña nindā smaryate atas āha gītā iti asya arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ atra śruti bādhaḥ kratau vidhāna darśantāt anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ iti ca śruteḥ yajña artham paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayambhuvā yajñāḥ hi bhūtyai lokasya tasmāt yajñe vadhaḥ avadhaḥ iti ca anya para tayā arthavādaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ yathā vakṣyati na hi nindā nindyam ninditum kim tarhi ninditāditaram praśaṃsitum iti 
ŚVK_2.276	 atra aparam bhāṣyam nanu aśaktam idam sūtram imau arthau abhivaditum codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ na indriya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ ca dharmaḥ na anarthaḥ iti bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam iti evam vākya bheda paricodanām kṛtvā parihāra bhāṣyam ucyate yatra vākyāt eva arthaḥ avagamyate tatra evam tat tu vaidikeṣu na sūtreṣu anyatas avagate arthe sūtram evam artham iti avagantavyam iti tadā ākṣipati śiṣyān iti asya arthaḥ anyatas vidita veda arthebhyaḥ jijñāsubhyaḥ sūtrāṇi jaimininā na praṇītāni atas tāni teṣām veda vākya tulyāni ubhayam ca vedasūtra ātmakam vākya bheda ādi doṣāt asamartham na ca aśaktam artha pratyāyane pramāṇam atas na vedasūtrayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti na sūtreṣu iti bhāṣya uktam anuttaram iti 
ŚVK_2.277	 atra parihāram āha prāk uktā iti asya arthaḥ satyam vākya bheda ādinā sūtrāṇām api aśaktiḥ śiṣyān ca pratyaviśeṣaḥ kin tu yā pūrvam sati sambhavaḥ iti parisaṃkhyā uktā tasyāḥ phalam etat bhāṣya kāreṇa pratipādyate evam hi nyāya ābhāsa bhrāntāḥ śiṣyāḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa śikṣitāḥ yat vivakṣita asambhave vākya bheda ādibhiḥ api sūtrāṇi gamayitavyāni iti tat iha eva tāvat codanā sūtre pradarśyate yat vākya bhedena api codanā sūtra arthaḥ bodhyate iti anayā iti bhāṣya uktayā pramāṇa antara pratipanna artha viṣaya tayā yuktyā iti arthaḥ eṣā iti api ca bhāṣya uktā eva vākya bheda gatiḥ pratyavamṛśyate yathā āha bhinnayoḥ eva vākyayoḥ imau eka deśau iti tat anena śiṣyān pratyaviśeṣe api vyākhyātṝṇām eva vyākhyā prakāraḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa uktaḥ iti darśitam vyākhya ākārāḥ hi cira paricita nyāya sāmastya smaraṇa kṣamā nyāya balena vākya bheda ādibhiḥ api sūtrāṇi vyācakṣate iti 
ŚVK_2.278^1	 yatas ca pramāṇa antara anusāreṇa vākya bheda ādibhiḥ api sūtreṣu avagatiḥ sambhavati tasmāt āvṛttyā vā tantreṇa vedam sūtram vyākhyeyam iti āha tasmāt iti āvṛttau tāvat sakalam eva sūtram dvis paṭhitavyam tatra ekasya codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti atra tātparyam aparasya ca arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti atra anya paratve anyatara sambandhaḥ anuvādaḥ sūtra bhedena ca ubhaya vidhānāt tad siddheḥ ubhaya anuvāda upapattiḥ tantram codanā lakṣaṇa ādīnām trayāṇām anyatamam tad upariṣṭāt vakṣyate tasmin pakṣe na vākya bhedaḥ tathā hi tri padam idam sūtram pada trayasya api ca itaretara sambaddhaḥ arthaḥ vākya arthaḥ tat yat eva trayāṇām ubhaya sandhāna artham āvartyate tat eva vākyam bhinatti 
ŚVK_2.278^2	 tantreṇa tu ubhaya sambandhe na vākya bhedaḥ sakṛt vacanāt sakṛt uktasya eva yogyatayā ubhaya sambandhe śakti bhedāt tat iha dharma padam vā tantra uccaritam ubhābhyām sambadhyate sidhyati ca ubhayam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti ca madhya padam vādyantābhyām evam api ca iṣṭam sidhyati arthaḥ dharmaḥ sa codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti ādyam eva vā uttarābhyām codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ saḥ eva ca dharmaḥ iti idam ekam eva vākyam trayāṇām anyatamasya tantreṇa ubhaya sambandhāt dvi artham iti avagantavyam āha ca codanā lakṣaṇa ādīnām tantreṇa ekasya saṅgatau dvābhyām saha artha vāci tvāt dvi artham ekam bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_2.279	 bhāṣya kāreṇa bhinnayoḥ eva vākyayoḥ imau eka deśau iti vadatā sūtra dvayam eva idam darśitam tat upanyasyati eka deśa iti arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti ekam sūtram aparam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti tena codanā lakṣaṇa avayavena anumitena anantara sūtra sthena dharma padena ekam niṣpadyate codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti tat idam uktam eka deśa anumānāt iti nanu arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti codanā lakṣaṇa ācodanā lakṣaṇayoḥ anyatarasya anupādānāt tad apekṣāyām acodanā lakṣaṇaḥ api upatiṣṭhamānaḥ kena vāryate evam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti atra api anartha prasaṅgaḥ darśayitavyaḥ atas āha itaretarā iti etau eva codanā lakṣaṇa artha śabdau itaretara samīpyāt parasparam sūtra dvaye api viśeṣaṇa tvena vākya śeṣa tayā kalpyete atas na acodanā lakṣaṇa anartha avayava kalpanā iti anuvāda tvena ca atra codanā lakṣaṇa artha avayava sambandhaḥ bhinnayoḥ sūtrayoḥ darśayitavyaḥ yad arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti eka sūtreṇa uktam tat codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti yat codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti atra uktam tad arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_2.281	 aparam api athavā arthasya sataḥ codanā lakṣaṇasya dharma tvam iti eka artham eva iti bhāṣyam tadā ākṣipati viśiṣṭa iti eva antena artha viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa codanā lakṣaṇa anuvādena dharma vidhānam darśitam evam api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ubhaya paratvena vākyam bhidyate eva yathā ekatva viśiṣṭa graha anuvādena sammārga vidhau atas kena viśeṣeṇa athavā iti parihāra antaram uktam iti yatas ca ayam aparihāraḥ tasmāt pūrva uktam eva pada traya tantra tvam vākya bheda paricodanāyām uttaram iti āha iti iti artha śabdayoḥ antena etat ca tantra trayam vyākhyātam eva saṃjñā śabdena dharma padam ucyate tat dhi codanā lakṣaṇasya arthasya alaukikī saṃjñā bhūva ādīnām iva dhātu śabdaḥ pūrva ācāryāṇām matena ca etat uktam yadi avaśyam vākya bhedaḥ parihartavyaḥ tatas tantreṇa dvi artham ekam vākyam vyākhyeyam na ca prakāra antareṇa vākya bheda paricodanā parihartum śakyate iti 
ŚVK_2.282^1	 atra codayati dharmaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ dve kila atra vacana vyaktī codanā lakṣaṇa anuvādena dharma vidhānam viparītam vā tatra ādye tāvat pakṣe codanā lakṣaṇa tvasya artha tva vyabhicārāt yuktam eva viśeṣaṇam yadā tu sāmānyatas siddha dharma anuvādena pramāṇam anena kathyate tadā artha tvam prāptam eva arthasya eva śreyassādhanasya dharma tva prasiddheḥ sarve hi vādinaḥ prīti sādhanam dharmaḥ iti atra avipratipannāḥ tad viśeṣeṣu eva vivādaḥ mīmāṃsakāḥ hi iṣṭāpūrtayoḥ dharma tvam icchanti saṅghaṭṭa vandana ādau saugatāḥ sāmānyam tu prīti sādhanam dharma svarūpam sarva vādinām avivāda siddham eva 
ŚVK_2.282^2	 eṣā eva ca prāk api sāmānya siddhiḥ uktāḥ atas eva ca viśeṣa siddhi jijñāsāyām pramāṇa viśeṣa vidhānam tatas eva tad siddheḥ veda āgame hi pramāṇe yāga ādayaḥ dharmāḥ buddha āgame tu ca eti avandana ādayaḥ kaḥ dharmaḥ iti atra api viśeṣa jijñāsayā eva praśnaḥ vakṣyati ca viśeṣasya ca jijñāsā iti tasmāt eṣā eva atra vacana vyaktiḥ mukhyāḥ atas eva ādye prathamam uktvā sat sūtreṇa ca pratyakṣa ādi nirākaraṇāt eṣā eva vacana vyaktiḥ sūtrakāra abhimatā lakṣyate yaḥ dharmaḥ sa codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti pratijñāte anya lakṣaṇa nirākaraṇam saṅgacchate na anyathā tasmāt eṣā eva atra vacana vyaktiḥ asyām ca artha avyabhicārāt artha viśeṣaṇam anarthakam iti 
ŚVK_2.283	 pariharati codanā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam eṣā eva ca atra vacana vyaktiḥ iyam eva tu na asati artha viśeṣaṇe sidhyati iti phalavat artha grahaṇam asati hi tasmin vacana vyakti antara sandehaḥ bahvet evam hi tadā sambhāvyate yaḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ iti atra tu vakṣyamāṇaḥ doṣaḥ nitya anuvāda bhūte tu artha grahaṇe na evam vacana vyaktiḥ sambhavati artha grahaṇasya vidhi anuvādayoḥ asambhavāt vidhau tāvat vākya bhedāt asambhavaḥ anuvādasya ca aprāpteḥ na hi codanā lakṣaṇam artha sambandham na vyabhicarati anarthasya api tad lakṣita tvāt atas na anuvādaḥ na ca etat parityāgena vākya artha tvam anarthaka tvāt vākya eka deśasya atas yatarasmin pakṣe artha pada anvayaḥ ghaṭate tataraḥ pakṣaḥ avadhāryeta dharma anuvādena pramāṇa vidhau sambhavati nitya anuvāda bhūtaḥ artha śabdaḥ iti saḥ eva pakṣaḥ niścīyate atas vidhi anuvāda sūcana arthaḥ eva artha śabdaḥ na viśeṣaṇam viśeṣaṇāt vinā ca etat iti ca spaṣṭam eva sūtra arthaḥ iti darśayiṣyati 
ŚVK_2.284	 syāt etat sambhāvita vacana vyakti parigrahe kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha tathā iti codanā lakṣaṇa anuvādena dharma vidhau= adharmāṇām api niṣedha codanayā anartha sādhana tvena lakṣitānām brahmahatyā ādīnām codanā lakṣaṇa tvāt dharma tvam bhavet na ca etat iṣṭam atas na vidheya artham api vidhi phalam arthavat artha pada grahaṇam atas na iyam vacana vyaktiḥ sādhīyasi iti 
ŚVK_2.285	 atas tad parityāgena atra sā nāma vacaḥ bhaṅgi āśrayaṇīyā yasyām arthaḥ ca dharma tayā na tyajyate ekaḥ ca vākya arthaḥ bhavati sā ca dharma anuvādena pramāṇa vidhiḥ tasyām hi dharmasya artha tva avyabhicārāt arthaḥ na tyajyate ekaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ bhavati sāmarthya lakṣya tvāt arthasya iyam ca artha anuvādāt eva sidhyati na anyathā iti uktam eva iti āha tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_2.286^1	 yadi eṣā eva atra vacana vyaktiḥ katham tarhi bhāṣya kāraḥ ubhayam iha ityādi granthena artha padasya viśeṣaṇa tām darśayati vispaṣṭam hi tatra uktam tatra anarthaḥ dharmaḥ uktaḥ mā bhūt iti evam artham artha grahaṇam iti yat api ca idam athavā ityādi bhāṣyam ākṣiptam tasya api adyayāvat na kiñcid samādhānam upalabhāmahe atas āha viśeṣaṇāt iti anena bhāṣya dvayam api samāhitam yat tāvat ubhayam iha iti uktam tad artha viśeṣaṇāt vinā eva artha sāmarthya kāritam eva bhāṣya kāreṇa kathitam kim idam artha sāmarthya kāritam iti etat uktam bhavati yat dharma anuvādena pramāṇa vidhānāt eva anarthānām hiṃsā ādīnām adharma tvena varjanam bhavati pramāṇa anuvādena ca dharma vidhau teṣām api dharma tā āpadyeta 
ŚVK_2.286^2	 tat iha anarthaḥ dharmaḥ uktaḥ mā bhūt iti evam artham artha grahaṇam iti vadatā vacana vyakti viśeṣa parigraha arthaḥ artha śabdaḥ iti darśitam ākṣipta bhāṣya samādhāne api ayam eva granthaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ na idam athavā iti śabda sāmarthya kāritam bhāṣya kārīyam uttaram tathā hi vākya bhedaḥ bhavati iha tu vinā eva viśeṣaṇāt artha sāmarthya kāritam eva idam ucyate tat ca vacana vyakti viśeṣa āśrayaṇena darśitam na ca arthāt āpadyamānaḥ vākya bhedam āpādayati aśabda pramāṇaka tvāt vākya bhedasya ca śabda doṣa tvāt atas athavā ityādinā dharma uddeśena pramāṇa vidhānam atra bhāṣya kṛtāḥ darśitam tatra ca artha śabdasya anuvāda tvāt vākya bhedaḥ su pariharaḥ eva yat etat anarthānām hiṃsā ādīnām varjanam idam dharma anuvādena pramāṇa vidhāna vacana vyakteḥ eva artha sāmarthya kāritam phalam bhāṣya kāreṇa kathyate iti arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_3.1^1	 tasya nimitta parīṣṭiḥ iti sūtram tasya ayam arthaḥ tasya dharmasya yat nimittam pramāṇam codana abhidhānam tat parīṣṭiḥ kartavyā iti pākṣikī ca pari iṣṭi pada rūpa siddhiḥ tathā hi iṣu gatau iti asmāt dhātoḥ iṣeḥ anicchā arthasya iti yuci vihite pareḥ vā iti ktinyucoḥ vikalpaḥ smaryate tena yujvidhau paryeṣaṇa iti bhavati ktini tu parīṣṭiḥ iti atra vadanti kim idam anavasaraḥ eva parīkṣā pratijñānam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti hi pratijñātam atas tad upapādana samartha hetu vacana avasare kim aparam nimitta parīkṣā pratijñāyate 
ŚVK_3.1^2	 na hi naiyāyikāḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti pratijñāya tat etat parīkṣāmahe iti parīkṣām avatārayanti api tarhi sahasā eva kṛtaka tvāt iti hetum abhidadhati tat iha api codanā sūtra pratijñāta avadhāraṇa dvaya upapādanāya sadautpattika sūtrābhyām hetu vacanam ucitam kim antarā parīkṣā pratijñānena yadi matam para artha pratijñāsvayam nyāyaḥ yat pratijñā anantaram eva hetu abhidhānam sva pratipattau tu na hetu dharmā yojayitavyāḥ iti tat na na hi jaimineḥ api sva pratipattaye śāstra nirmāṇam anyatas vidita veda arthaḥ śiṣya hita arthāya sūtrāṇi praṇītavān atas atra api para artha eva pratijñā atha ucyate dvedhā hi paraḥ vyutthita avyutthita bhedāt 
ŚVK_3.1^3	 tatra vyutthita pratipādane pratijñā anantaram eva hetuḥ abhidhīyate iti nyāyyam uttare tu parīkṣā purassaram eva hetu abhidhānena pratipādyante iti tat na lakṣaṇa antareṣu api prasaṅgāt bheda ādi lakṣaṇeṣu api yathāsvam artham pratijñāya parīkṣā pratijñānam āpadyate na ca tathā dṛśyate kaḥ ca eṣa nyāyaḥ yat vipratipannāya pratijñā anantaram eva hetuḥ ucyate na śiṣyebhyaḥ iti pratyuta tān eva prati lāghavāya pratijñā anantaram eva hetuḥ vaktum ucitaḥ kim antarā vyākṣepa karī pratijñā nikṣipyate iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt ayam atra samādhiḥ iha ādyena sūtreṇa śāstrasya prayojanam pratijñātam 
ŚVK_3.1^4	 dvitīyena ca samasta vakṣyamāṇa tantra artha saṃkṣepa pratijñānam anena tu sukha grahaṇa artham ādya adhyāya artha pratijñānam atha atas śeṣa lakṣaṇam atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti vat ṛṣiṇā praṇītam etat uktam bhavati iha adhyāye dharma pramāṇam parīkṣiṣyāmahe iti yadi api codanā sūtreṇa api samasta tantra artha saṃkṣepe kriyamāṇe pramāṇa lakṣaṇa arthaḥ api codanā eva pramāṇam eva iti pratijñātḥ tathā api saṅkīrṇe pratijñāte punar anena niṣkṛṣya adyādhyāya arthaḥ pratijñāyate aniṣkṛṣyamāṇe hi pratijñā saṅkareṇa na jñāyate kasya pratijñā bhāgasya sadautpattika sūtrābhyām hetuḥ abhidhīyate iti bahu eva hi tatra pratijñātam dharma svarūpa ādi 
ŚVK_3.1^5	 atas tatra api hetu abhidhānam idam iti kaścid bhrāmyet atas tat bhrama apanuttaye svayam eva nirdhāraṇam darśayati yaḥ ayam tantra arthaḥ saṃkṣipya asmābhiḥ pratijñātaḥ tasmin vyākhyāsyamāne nimitta parīkṣā eva tāvat iha adhyāye vartiṣyate pramāṇa purassara tvāt prameya siddheḥ tat iha tāvat caturvidhā parīkṣā vartiṣyate kim codanā eva uta anyat eva iti niyamaḥ codanā vā anyat vā iti vikalpaḥ ubhayam vā iti samuccayaḥ na ca ubhayam iti ubhaya apalāpaḥ āha ca nimitta anveṣaṇā ca iha caturdhā eva kariṣyate codanā eva anyat eva iti yat vā anyat codanā api vā athavā codanā anyat ca na ca anyat na api codanā iti 
ŚVK_3.1^6	 tat ete niyama vikalpa samuccaya ubhaya apalāpaiḥ catvāraḥ pakṣāḥ bhavanti bhavati ca pramāṇa vikalpaḥ yathā ārāt avasthitam agnim kadācid liṅgāt avaiti kadācid āpta upadeśāt na ca samuccaye anyatara vaiyarthyam īśvara mahā ṛṣayaḥ hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmam avayanti āgamena itaraḥ iti pramātṛ bhedāt ubhaya upapattiḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa tu pradarśana artham kim codanā eva uta anyat api iti darśitam parīkṣamāṇasya hi caturdhā eva pratibhā jāyate tat iha pratyakṣa sūtre tāvat pratyakṣa ādi niṣedhena pratipakṣa niyama vikalpa samuccayāḥ pratyuktāḥ ubhaya apalāpaḥ tu codanā prāmāṇya samarthanena autpattika sūtre nirasiṣyate tat pramāṇam anapekṣa tvāt iti 
ŚVK_3.1^7	 tat ayam nimitta parīkṣā saṃkṣepaḥ bhavati pratyakṣa ādi vyudāsena codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa siddhaḥ abhāva āśaṅkā nirākaraṇena ca pramāṇam eva iti śabda artha sambandha vākya racanā pauruṣeya tva pratipādanena ca puruṣa anupraveśa sambhāvitā prāmāṇya vyudāsaḥ tad bhūta adhikaraṇena ca vākya artha saṃvid mūla upapādanam upariṣṭāt tu mantra artha vāda prāmāṇya prakāra kathanam smṛti pādena ca manu ādi a āpta smṛta ācarita āgṛhyamāṇa kāraṇaka aṣṭakāḥ holāka ādi padārthānām mūla veda sadbhāva upapādanam nāmadheya pādena ca udbhida ādi nāmnām guṇa parāṇām eva nāmadheya tayā eva kriyā upayoga kathanam iti kṛtsnaḥ eva adhyāye dharmasya nimitta parīkṣā iti sūktam tasya nimitta parīṣṭiḥ iti 
ŚVK_3.1^8	 atra bhāṣyam uktī madam asmābhiḥ codanā nimittam dharma jñāne iti tat pratijñā mātreṇa uktam ityādi tat ayuktam sa upapattika pratijñā abhidhānāt tathā hi codanā hi bhūtam ityādinā codanā prāmāṇya upapattiḥ uktā eva na anyat kiñcana indriyam iti ca anyā prāmāṇya upapattiḥ atas katham ucyate tat pratijñā mātreṇa uktam iti atas āha pratijñā iti sārdhena asya arthaḥ yadi api bhāṣya kāreṇa anāgata avekṣaṇena sadautpattika sūtrābhyām vakṣyamāṇā sva pakṣasya yuktiḥ pratijñā vyatiriktā darśitāḥ tathā api na sūtrakāreṇa kācid upapattiḥ uktā iti tad mata anusāreṇa pratijñā mātra abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_3.2	 samarthana antaram āha vṛtti kāraḥ iti asya arthaḥ yat tu codanā hi ityādinā bhūta ādi artha prakāśana sāmarthyam codanāyāḥ kṛtam tat prāmāṇya dvāra mātram eva kathitam pāramārthikī yuktiḥ upariṣṭāt vakṣyate sūtrakāreṇa eva atas vakṣyamāṇa yukti adhikam eva tat prāmāṇya sambhāvanā mātram abhihitam sambhāvitaḥ hi pratijñāyām pakṣaḥ hetunā sādhyate na tu asambhāvitaḥ iti sva abhiprāyeṇa api pratijñā mātra abhidhāna upapattiḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.1	 atra anantaram parīṣṭi sūtra pratijñātām nimitta parīkṣām avatārayitum sūtram sat samprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam animittam vidhyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti tat idam vṛtti antare animittāt avacchidya tat pratyakṣam iti evam antam lakṣaṇa param vyākhyātam tat etat upanyasya dūṣayati varṇyate iti asya arthaḥ dharmasya nimittam parīkṣitavyam iti hi pratijñātam anantaram ca pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam ucyamānam na pūrva pratijñayā saṅgacchate iti 
ŚVK_4.2	 na parama saṅgatiḥ anupayogaḥ api iti āha laṣaṇasya iti loka prasiddha pramāṇa vyavahāriṇaḥ hi mīmāṃsakasya kim tad lakṣaṇa karaṇena iti bhāvaḥ dvi aṃśā hi pūrva pratijñā codanā eva pramāṇam pramāṇam eva codanā iti tantra artha saṃkṣepa pratijñānam punar ca parīṣṭi sūtreṇa niṣkṛṣya ādi a lakṣaṇa viṣaya tayā na ca anyatara aṃśa prasādhanena api lakṣaṇa abhidhānam upayujyate iti yadi tu naiyāyika ādi prasthānam anuvidadhatā pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam praṇīyate tadvat eva hi tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam ityādi vat anumāna ādeḥ api lakṣaṇa praṇayanam āpatitam iti āha kimartham iti 
ŚVK_4.3	 syāt etat apramāṇam eva anumāna ādi pratyakṣāt anya tvāt tadābhāsa vat iti tad lakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti tat ayuktam iti āha na tāvat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat eva kiñcid tad aprāmāṇya siddhaye pramāṇam upanyasyate tat tena eva bādhyate api ca anumāna aprāmāṇya siddhaye anumānam upanyasyate iti sva vāc virodhaḥ tat alam na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti pāṣaṇḍa jalpitena iti syāt etat sambhava etihyayoḥ iva anumāna āgamayoḥ pratyakṣa antarbhāvāt itareṣām lakṣaṇān abhidhānam iti tat na lakṣaṇa vailakṣaṇyāt iti āha na api iti vaktumantena syāt etat lakṣaṇa vailakṣaṇyam eva asiddham sarveṣām sati eva indriya artha sannikarṣe jāyamāna tvāt iti tat na na hi cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣṭa dhūmaḥ api avidita asmṛta vyāptiḥ anumimānaḥ vahnim upalabhate atas indriya liṅga śabda sādṛśya ananyathā siddha buddhi samupalambhaka pramāṇa abhāvāḥ eva yathākramam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa udaye sādhanam iti sādhana bhedāt lakṣaṇa vailakṣaṇye sati na anyonya antarbhāva upapattiḥ tat idam āha na ca iti 
ŚVK_4.4–4.5	 na ca vācyam sarva ādau pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt eva tad pūrvaka tvena itarāṇi lakṣitāni iti pṛthak lakṣaṇānabhidhānam iti tad pūrvaka smṛti ādīnām aprāmāṇya darśanena ābhāsa saṅkara prasakteḥ iti āha na ca api iti na ca sāmānya atideśa lakṣaṇam iva viśeṣa atideśa lakṣaṇam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa uktiḥ anumāna ādīnām pārama arthimam lakṣaṇam ākṣipati tena vinā tad upapatteḥ sāmānyam tu nānā kṣipta viśeṣam ātmānam labhate iti ākṣipati artha viśeṣam tat etat āha pratyakṣā iti 
ŚVK_4.6–4.7	 tad pūrvaka tva siddhi abhyupagamena ca asmābhiḥ pūrvam smṛtyā vyabhicāraḥ uktaḥ tat api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ukteḥ ananyathā siddhi abhāvāt na sidhyati iti āha tat atat iti tat ca atat ca tad atadī te pūrve yasya iti bahuvrīhiḥ tat ayam arthaḥ tat vā pratyakṣam anyat vā pūrvam anumāna ādīnām iti na pratyakṣa lakṣaṇāt avagamyate iti yadi tu vinā eva kāraṇena pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ukteḥ itareṣām tad pūrvaka tvam āśrīyate hanta atat pūrvaka tvam api vāc mātreṇa śakyam āśrayitum iti āha tad ukteḥ iti tad apūrvam yasya iti vigrahaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti sidhyatu vā pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ukteḥ anumāna ādīnām tat pūrvaka tvam yaḥ tu eṣām avāntara lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ svarūpam ca saṃkhyā ceyanti pramāṇāni iti tat sarvam na sidhyati iti āha na ca iti 
ŚVK_4.9	 syāt matam prasiddhāni eva anumāna ādīni pramāṇāni kim amīṣām lakṣaṇa karaṇena iti tat pratyakṣe api samānam iti āha prasiddha tvāt iti atas bahuṣu pramāṇeṣu yat eka lakṣaṇa karaṇam tat anya parisaṃkhyā artham eva syāt tat etat āha tena anyā iti sūtram antena abhimata pramāṇa parisaṃkhyānam ca ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ mūḍhena vā jaimininā pratyakṣa mātram lakṣitam iti abhyupagantavyam āpadyeta evam ca ātmīyam ajñānam ṛṣeḥ āropitam bhavet iti āha mūḍhena vā iti na antena api ca vākya bhedaḥ nāma āgatyā kvacid āśrīyate yathā agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt iti atra vakṣyate na ca iha sūtre kiñcid anupapannam dṛśyate yat bhittvā vyākhyāyate iti āha sambhavati iti 
ŚVK_4.10	 lakṣaṇam api etat ati vyāpteḥ ayuktam iti āha na ca api iti ati vyāptim eva darśayati tad abhāseṣu iti sarve hi mṛga tṛṣṇā ādi vibhramāḥ sūrya raśmi tapta uṣara ādi saṃyukta nayana janyāḥ saṃśayāḥ ca sthāṇu ādi saṃyukta nayana janmānaḥ iti pratyakṣatām aśnu vīran sā iyam ati vyāptiḥ iti alpam ca idam asmābhiḥ uktam tad ābhāseṣu tulya tvāt iti ekam tu svapna jñānam varjayitvā sakala pramāṇa apramāṇa sajātīya vijātīya jñāna mātra sādhāraṇam idam lakṣaṇam iti āha svapna iti liṅga śabda sadṛśa ādi sambaddheṣu eva indriyeṣu anumāna ādi pramāṇa pañcaka utpattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_4.11	 svapna jñāna varjane kāraṇam āha tat hi iti bāhya indriya samprayoga abhāva abhiprāyeṇa ca idam uktam svapne tu ātma manaḥ dehaiḥ saṅgatiḥ asti eva iti tat api anena lakṣaṇena vyāpyate iti darśayitavyam iti svapna jñāna atiriktam tu yat kiñcid bhrānti ādi tat kenacid samprayoge sati eva jāyate iti pratyakṣam āpadyeta iti āha kenacid iti yathā kenacid samprayoge bhrānti ādiḥ bhavati tathā pūrvam eva asmābhiḥ vivṛtam ādi śabdena pramāṇa saṃśayayoḥ upādānam iti 
ŚVK_4.12	 nanu kenacid samprayoga mātram na pratyakṣa kāraṇam abhipretam api tarhi grāhyeṇa na ca bhrāntyādayaḥ grāhya saṃyukta nayanasya jāyante kim tarhi anya saṃyukta indriyasya anya artha viṣayāḥ na ca idam grāhya viśeṣaṇam asmābhiḥ eva kevalam āśritam api tu vṛtti kāreṇa api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa param sūtram vyācakṣāṇena tat matam ca bhavadbhiḥ upariṣṭāt vakṣyate eva iti na āvayoḥ viśeṣam upalabhāmahe atas āha grāhyeṇa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam abhimatam viśeṣaṇam bhavataḥ api tat tu anupāttam na labhyate vṛttikāra mate tu vyatyastena tad vṛttena tat upādāsyate yadābhāsam hi vijñānam tad saṃyoge tat iṣyate iti vakṣyate atas bhavat mate grāhya viśeṣaṇa anupādānāt grāhya samprayoga jam anya samprayoga jam vā jñānam pratyakṣam āpadyeta atas asti mahān vakṣyamāṇena viśeṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.13–4.15	 yatas eva yathā avasthitam idam sūtram na pratyakṣam lakṣayitum kṣamate atas eva vṛtti kāreṇa api prāsaṅgika lakṣaṇa karaṇe vyatyayena paṭhitam iti āha asāmarthyam ca iti prakṛtam ati vyāpaka tvam lakṣaṇasya upasaṃharati tena iti paraḥ idānīm sat samprayoga viśeṣaṇa upādāna sāmarthyāt eva grāhya viśeṣaṇa ākṣepam manvānaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate tat āha sat samprayoga nirdeśaḥ iti evam hi manyate sambhava vyabhicārau hi viśeṣaṇa karau ubhautat yadi samprayoga mātra jam jñānam sūtrakārasya abhimatam abhaviṣyat tadā viśeṣaṇa upādānam anarthakam āpatsyata na hi asamprayoga jam pramāṇam apramāṇam vā jñānam asti atas viśeṣaṇa upādāna sāmarthyāt eva grāhya viśeṣaṇam avagamyate atas na kiñcid dokṣyati iti etat eva dūṣayati etat eva hi iti evam hi manyate na evaṃvidhena uttareṇa vyutthitaḥ bodhayitum śakyate tasya hi etat eva pratipādyam yat tvad mate viśeṣaṇa ānarthakyam lakṣaṇasya ca ati vyāpti ādibhiḥ asiddhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.16	 upetya vā brūmaḥ iti āha svapna ādīnām iti uktam etat bāhya indriya vyāpāra ādi nirapekṣam svapna jñānam iti tanmātram varjayitvā sarvam eva pratyakṣam prāpnuyāt iti ādi śabdena ca adṛṣṭa mātra udbodhita saṃskāra kāraṇikā smṛtiḥ abhipreta iti tasmāt anupāttam eva atra samagram pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam iti na tat vidhātum anuvaditum vā śakyam iti āha tasmāt iti yat pratyakṣam tat evaṃlakṣaṇakam iti lakṣaṇa vidhiḥ yat evaṃlakṣaṇakam tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇa anuvādaḥ na ca anuktaḥ arthaḥ vidhi anuvāda bhāj bhavati ubhayoḥ api sādhāraṇa tvāt abhidhānasya iti 
ŚVK_4.18	 evam lakṣaṇa para tām pratyākhyāya anabhimata vacana vyakti nirākaraṇa purassaram abhimatām sūtrasya vacā ubhaṅgim āha tena iti dvābhyām etat uktam bhavati yat evaṃlakṣaṇakam tat pratyakṣam iti na eṣa sūtra arthaḥ kim tarhi yat loka prasiddham pratyakṣam tasya sat samprayoga ja tvam nāma dharmaḥ asti tad dharmaka tvāt ca vidyamāna upalambhana tvam bhavati tatas ca bhaviṣyati avidyamāne dharme animitta tā iti 
ŚVK_4.19–4.20	 nanu śābare api pratyakṣam animittam evam lakṣaṇakam hi tat iti ucyate tad alakṣaṇa paratve sūtrasya anupapannam atas āha evam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ śābarāḥ api ye loka prasiddha lakṣaṇa anuvādena animitta tvam vidadhati tān api na mṛṣyāmahe sampūrṇa lakṣaṇa abhidhāne sūtrasya aśakteḥ atas lakṣaṇa uktiḥ iha liṅga vivakṣayā eva yathā dhūmaḥ lakṣaṇam agneḥ evam vidyamāna upalambhana tvam animitta tvasya lakṣyate hi tat tena iti bhāṣya kārasya abhimatam iti yat liṅgam yasya ca tat ubhayam api vyanakti yatas iti vidyamāna upalambhana tvam nāma dharmaḥ liṅgam animitta tā tu liṅgi yadi tu tad liṅgam asiddham iti kaścid brūyāt tam prati sat samprayoga ja tu a hetu antara prasiddhena tena animitta tā adhigantavyā iti prasiddhena iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_4.21.1^1	 kutas punar hetu antarasya eva prasiddhiḥ atas āha pratyakṣa tvam iti etat uktam bhavati trayaḥ ete prayogāḥ pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt vidyamāna upalambhana tvam ca sat samprayoga ja tvāt sat samprayoga ja tvam ca pratyakṣa tvāt atra ca vidyamāna upalambhana tvasya vyaktam eva pañcamyā hetu tvam upāttam itarayoḥ tu upādānena eva hetu tvam sūtritam iti draṣṭavyam iti ayam ca pratyakṣam yat jane siddham iti asya eva prapañcaḥ veditavyaḥ tathā hi tatra eva vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt animitta tvam evaṃdharmaka tva upātta sat samprayoga ja tvāt vidyamāna upalambhana tvam pratyakṣam yat janaḥ iti ca pratyakṣa tvāt evaṃdharmaka tvam uktam idam hi tatra ākūtam pratyakṣam sa devaṃdharmakam bhavati iti idam tu iha vaktavyam kim anayā prayoga prapañca racanayā vimati pada āspadam hi pratyakṣam animitam pratyakṣa tvāt iti etāvatā api iṣṭam sidhyati eva 
ŚVK_4.21.1^2	 tat tu śuṣka tarka hetoḥ udbhāvaka tvāt na tathā āśritam iti samādhātavyam evam hi śruti sādha araṇya mātreṇa animitta tvam uktam iti manvīran na ca śruti sāmānya mātreṇa eva sarva sādharmyam bhavati na hi bhavati go padāḥ padam vāc iti viṣāṇavatī vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt animitta tvam ucyamānam cittam bhāvayati katham ca vidyamāna upalambhanam anāgate nimittam bhavati katham ca sat samprayoga jam avidyamāna upalambhanam vartamāna samprayoga jam hi sat samprayoga jam abhidhīyate sat śabdasya vartamāna vacana tvāt na ca anāgatena dharmeṇa vartamānaḥ samprayogaḥ sambhavati sambandhi dvaya ādhāraḥ hi sambandhaḥ na asau anyatarasmin avartamāne vartate iti yuktam abhidhātum evam pratyakṣa śabdaḥ api pratyutpanna indriya samprayoga adhīna vṛttiḥ na āvartamāna samprayoga je vartitum arhati iti yuktam krama abhidhānam prapañca rūcayaḥ ca mīmāṃsakāḥ iti yuktam prapañca abhidhānam 
ŚVK_4.21.2^1	 idam tu vācyam anaikāntikam sat samprayoga ja tvam vidyamāna upalambhana tve sati eva hi nadī pūra nayana sannikarṣe atīta ādi vṛṣṭi vijñānam bhavati vartamānaḥ eva ca megha cakṣuḥ sannikarṣaḥ bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭi viṣayam vijñānam janayati atas na ayam ekāntaḥ yat sat samprayoga jam jñānam vidyamāna upalambhanam iti api ca aparokṣa nirbhāsam api jñānam vartamāna samprayoga jam avidyamāna viṣayam dṛṣṭam bhavati hi vartamāne śukti nayana sannikarṣe atīta anāgata vyavahita rajata avagrahaḥ uktam ca bhavadbhiḥ api bhava dāsa dūṣaṇa avasare sakala pramāṇa apramāṇa jñāna sādha araṇyam sat samprayoga ja tvasya syāt matam na tāvat atīta anāgata gocaram anumānam sat samprayogeṇa janyate avidita asmṛta vyāpteḥ abhāvāt asti hi tasya api nadīpūra jalada cakṣuḥ sannikarṣaḥ 
ŚVK_4.21.2^2	 na ca atīta anāgata vṛṣṭi paricayaḥ bhavati śukti rajata vedane api puras varti dravya grahaṇaḥ eva sannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam rajata anubhavaḥ tu doṣa sāhāyyāt prācīnajñāna janmanaḥ saṃskārāt yat kāraṇam sat nikṛṣyate khalu asya nānā arthaiḥ indriyam na ca asatsu doṣeṣu avidyamāna prakāśanam upakalpayati atas viṣaya ādi doṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ vibhramāḥ tam eva sva ātmani kāraṇīkārayanti iti tat na kāraṇa kāraṇasya api kāraṇa tvānapāyāt śukti nayana sannikarṣaḥ eva hi saṃskāra udbodhe kāraṇam bhrāntau anumāne ca liṅga sannikarṣaḥ vyāpti smaraṇe atas śakyam tat ubhayam api paramparayā sat samprayoga jam iti vaktum aviśeṣitam ca iha sat samprayoga ja tva mātram hetuḥ uktaḥ atas duṣpariharam anaikāntika tvam tādṛśasya 
ŚVK_4.21.3^1	 atra ucyate uktam idam loka prasiddhasya pratyakṣasya ayam dharmaḥ yat sat samprayoga ja tvam nāma vidyamāna upalambhana tva siddhau hetuḥ uktaḥ loke ca grāhyeṇa eva sati samprayoge pratyakṣam iti siddham na hi anya samprayukta cakṣuṣaḥ anyat pratyakṣam iti dṛṣṭam tat iha grāhyeṇa eva vartamāna samprayoga ja tvam vidyamāna upalambhana tve hetuḥ uktaḥ na ca tat anumāna ādiṣu sambhavati na hi tatra grāhyeṇa vṛṣṭi ādinā indriya sannikarṣaḥ vartate lakṣaṇa pakṣe tu yāvat śruta mātra paratantra tvāt āpadi eta eva bhrānti ādi pratyakṣam 
ŚVK_4.21.3^2	 tatra api tu lokapāratantrye vṛthā lakṣaṇa karaṇam iti nanu pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti atra kaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ yadi pratyakṣam eva tat na pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ abheda āpātāt tat ca ayuktam siddha sādhyayoḥ bhedāt sādhyaḥ hi pakṣaḥ siddhaḥ ca sa pakṣaḥ na ca ekam eva siddha sādhya svabhāvam iti upapadyate siddham ca asmad ādi pratyakṣasya dharme animitta tvam kim tad sādhanena atas āha asmad ādau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ pratyakṣa viśeṣam pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣa antaram sa pakṣīkriyate iti na pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ ekatā na api siddha sādhyatā iti 
ŚVK_4.22	 evam sva matena sūtram vyākhyāya idānīm para pakṣa uktān doṣān iha pariharati prakṛtena iti para pakṣe hi prakṛta asaṅgatiḥ uktāḥ sā iha na asti codanā eva pramāṇam iti hi pratijñātam tat ca pratyakṣā nimitta tva pratipādanena eva śeṣāṇām api anumāna ādīnām aprāmāṇya darśanena avadhārita rūpam sidhyati iti katham punar pratyakṣā nimitta tve satya numāna ādīnām api animitta tvam na hi pratyakṣam anāgata ativṛttayoḥ asamartham iti anumānena api tathā bhavitavyam megha unnati nadī pūrābhyām anāgata ativṛttāyāḥ vṛṣṭeḥ ananumāna prasaṅgāt atas āha tat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ vyāpti saṃvedana adhīna janma tvāt anumānasya nitya parokṣeṇa ca dharmeṇa vyāpti saṃvedanā sambhavāt anumāna udaya abhāvaḥ na ca vṛṣṭi ādau prasaṅgaḥ teṣām dṛṣṭa pūrvaka tvena vyāpti saṃvedana upapatteḥ ādi śabdena dharma sādṛśyam upādatte etat ca upariṣṭāt prapañcayiṣyate eva iti 
ŚVK_4.23	 nanu evam api pratyakṣa vat itareṣām api animitta tvam kim sūtraiḥ na nibaddham atas āha śakyam iti eka lakṣaṇa karaṇe hi itara lakṣaṇa asiddheḥ sarveṣām lakṣaṇa karaṇam āpāditam animitta tve tu pratyakṣasya ukte tad pūrvaka tvāt itareṣām api animitta tvam śakya avagamam iti na pṛthak nibadhyate yathā vakṣyati pratyakṣa dvāra tvāt anumāna ādīnām api akāraṇa tvam iti lakṣaṇa anupayoge api yaḥ paryanuyogaḥ dattaḥ saḥ api atra lakṣaṇa anabhyupagamāt eva na asti iti āha na ca iti 
ŚVK_4.25	 tathā grāhya viśeṣaṇa anupādānāt anumāna ādi anupasaṅgrahāt ca nyūnam lakṣaṇam sarva saṃvidām ca sat samprayogeṇa avi abhicārāt sat samprayoga nirdeśaḥ a tiricyata ityādi api yat uktam tat api atra na āśaṅkyate iti āha na ca iti lakṣaṇa karaṇasya hi nyūna atireka ādayaḥ doṣāḥ na alakṣaṇe prasajanti iti etat dhi atra sarvathā pratipādyam yat loka prasiddham pratyakṣam tat evaṃdharmakam iti sampūrṇam tu pratyakṣasya svarūpam anena abhidhīyatām mā vā na naḥ tatra tātparyam atas ca anya paratvāt sūtrasya lakṣaṇa pakṣa uktā mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi saṃvidām api pratyakṣatā na āpadyate iti āha sarvathā iti 
ŚVK_4.28.1	 nanu yadi loka prasiddha dharma upadarśanena animitta tva mātram atra sādhyam evam tarhi pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti etāvat eva vaktavyam kim sat samprayoga ja tu ādi upanyāsena atas āha atīta iti sārdha dvayena ayam arthaḥ satyam etāvatā api animitta tā pratipāditā eva kin tu vidyamāna upalambhana tvam eva asiddham yoginām mukta ātmanām ca atīta anāgata ādi viṣaya jñāna utpatteḥ iti ye manyante tān prati hetu siddhi artham sat samprayoga ja tvam api hetu antaram upanyastam na punar pratyakṣa svarūpa vivakṣayā tathā vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt iti hetum abhidadhatā avidyamānaḥ bhaviṣyat dharmaḥ bhaviṣyat tvāt eva na pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyate iti yaḥ hetuḥ antarṇītaḥ tasya api yogim ukta ātmanām grāhyaiḥ artha antaraiḥ bhaviṣyadbhiḥ vyabhicāritā mā bhūt iti etat artham api sat samprayoga ja tu asya upādānam etat dhyanena ucyate sarvam eva pratyakṣam sati eva indriya samprayoge jāyate atas na kiñcid bhaviṣyat viṣayam iti na asti vyabhicāraḥ asiddha tā vyabhicārite samāhṛtya mā bhūtām iti dvivacana abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_4.28.2^1	 idam tu iha vaktavyam nirākṛtam eva aśakyam hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt iti atra yogi pratyakṣasya anāgata ādi viṣaya tvam atra kim punar upanyāsena iti tatra eke vadanti tatra hi vacanāt ṛte puruṣāṇām atīndriya anubhava śaktiḥ nirākṛtāḥ atra punarvacanāt eva pratītya ciram bhāvayataḥ dharma adharmau pratyakṣau bhaviṣyate iti pratyavasthānam nirākriyate iti tat ayuktam sarvam hi tad anāgata avekṣaṇena bhāṣya vārtti kakārābhyām uktam iha eva sūtrakāreṇa svayam ukta tvāt na ca eṣa pareṣām api siddhāntaḥ yat akasmāt eva buddhasya vā anyasya vā tat bhūmim adhirūḍhasya ajāta ativṛtta pratyutpanna sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa ādayaḥ sākṣāt bhāvāḥ bhāsante iti 
ŚVK_4.28.2^2	 api tarhi āgamāt eva sāmānyatas viditān dharmān ciram bhāvayataḥ sphuṭam avikalpakāḥ ca prakāśante iti bhāvanā bala jam eva jñānam divyam cakṣuḥ iti ācakṣate yat tu bhautikena eva cakṣuṣā sarvam aparokṣīkriyate iti tad atisthavīyaḥ prauḍhi pradarśana para tayā taiḥ uktam tādṛśam api ca atra eva nirākāryam iha eva sūtrakāreṇa nirākṛta tvāt tasmāt atratyam eva anāgata avekṣaṇena tatra uktam iti uktam eva nanu ca pūrva pūrva hetu asiddhi āśaṅkayā uttara uttara hetu pradarśanam iti yatas asti tatra dharmaḥ ayam ityādinā pratyakṣa tvam adohetuḥ iti evam antena uktam iti gata artham idam 
ŚVK_4.28.3^1	 atra ucyate pratyavasthāna bījam idānīm pareṣām abhidhīyate avidyamāna upalambhanam eva hi yoga ja dharma balena yoginām pratyakṣam iti hi te pratipannāḥ atas eva atīta anāgate api arthe ityādinā hetu asiddhi bījam upadarśitam pūrvam tu asiddhi āśaṅkayā hetu krama āśrayaṇam iti etāvat eva uktam katham asiddhiḥ iti atra na kiñcid uktam yogi artham abhidhīyate iti atra api yoginām atiśaya viśeṣaḥ antarṇītaḥ saḥ eva atīta anāgata ityādinā prakaṭīkṛtaḥ kaḥ punar atīta anāgata ādi viṣaya tve pratyakṣasya teṣām abhiprāyaḥ śrūyatām evam hi manyante yat vidyamāna upalambhanam asmad ādi pratyakṣam tena mā nāma dharmaḥ anubhūyatām bhāvanā bala bhuvā tu sakala atītāḥ na āgata ādi viṣayeṇa kim na anubhūyate tat asiddheḥ anupapannam iti ced na anumānāt upapatteḥ 
ŚVK_4.28.3^2	 tatra etat syāt na tasya bhāvanā bala bhuvaḥ pratyakṣasya asmad ādau adṛṣṭa carasya sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam asti iti tat ca na evam anumānāt upapatteḥ vijātīya antarāya parihāreṇa bhāvyamāneṣu bhāveṣu prajñā prasādāt atiśayaḥ dṛśyate tathā hi kim anyat iha khalu nitānta duradhi gamam ātmānam eva nirdhūta nikhila kāya karaṇa uparāga upaplavam vigalita sakalam iti mātṛ meya māna vibhāga udgrāha mayam aham iti viśadataram avalokayante kṛtinaḥ kecid iti vedānta vādinaḥ vadanti na hi tat asmad ādi vedyam na iti yoginaḥ api na budhyante tadvat vā vayam api vijānīmaḥ bhavati ca atra kāraṇa prakarṣaḥ hi kārya prakarṣeṇa vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ citrakāra ādi śilpa prakarṣaḥ iva citra ādi karma prakarṣeṇa prakṛṣyate ca kasyacid yoginaḥ bhāvanā bala bhuvaḥ pratyakṣasya kāraṇam iti svabhāva hetuḥ atha api syāt kutas kāraṇa prakarṣaḥ avagamyate iti 
ŚVK_4.28.3^3	 svabhāva hetoḥ eva yaḥ yat abhiniviśamānaḥ abhyasyati sa tasya prakarṣa kāṣṭhām āsāda yati citrakārasya iva śilpam abhyasyati ca kaścid avahitaḥ dhyānam iti sādhya anvita hetu pradarśanam atas dhyāna prakarṣāt tad balabhuvaḥ jñānasya prakarṣaḥ kaḥ ca jñānasya aparaḥ prakarṣaḥ sphuṭa avikalpaka prakāśāt yathā āhuḥ tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā yat yat eva atibhāvyate bhāvanā bala niṣpattau tad sphuṭa akalpa dhīḥ phalam iti nanu jīvanāya śilpinām śilpa abhyāsaḥ yuktaḥ na tu dhyāna abhyāsasya kiñcid nibandhanam asti katham na asti karuṇā hi dhyāna abhyāse nibandhanam kaścid khalu bhava antarīyāt saṃskārāt kāruṇikaḥ bhavati sa karuṇām eva abhiniviśate abhyāsa atiśayāt ca sā tasya prakarṣa kāṣṭhām āsādayati sa kāṣṭhā prāpta prakarṣa karuṇaḥ duḥkha uttarān saṃsāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā dūram dūyamāna mānasaḥ cintayati katham etān uddhareyam iti 
ŚVK_4.28.3^4	 tatas sa puruṣa artha sādhanam anvicchan dhyānāya prayasyati tatas cira abhyāsān niṣpanna dhyānaḥ dharma adharmau api aparokṣam īkṣate anyat matam saṃsāriṇaḥ hi indriya adhīna jñāna janmānaḥ prāk bhavīya karma arjita deha indriyāḥ hi te atas yuktam yat deha indriya anuvidhāyi saṃvedanāḥ bhavanti iti yadā punar amī yoga abhyāsāt eva prakṣīṇa nikhila jñāna karma āśayāḥ bhavanti tadā deha indriyaiḥ vimucyante tadā niyāmaka abhāvāt svayam ca prakāśa svabhāva tvāt sarvam atīta ādi budhyante atas tān prati vidyamāna upalambhana tvam asiddham iti tad pratibodhanāya loka prasiddham sat ityādi ayam jaiminiḥ āha iti tān indānīm pratibodhayati na loka vyatiriktam iti ayam arthaḥ teṣām api pratyakṣam na loka uttaram bhavitum arhati iti 
ŚVK_4.29.1^1	 atra kāraṇam āha pratyakṣa tvena iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ tat yoginām jñānam pratyakṣam navāḥ yadi apratyakṣam na tarhi pramāṇam pratyakṣa anumāna vyatirikta pramāṇa anabhyupagamāt anumāna lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ca na ca apramāṇam artha vyavasthāpanāya alam atas kim tat abhyupagamena atha pratyakṣam anvartha tvāt pratyakṣa śabdasya avaśyam eva tena indriya janmanā bhavitavyam na hi anindriya jam pratyakṣam iti laukikānām upacāraḥ dṛśyate nanu na indriya ja tvam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam api tarhi kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam pratyakṣam iti abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsā pratītiḥ kalpanā 
ŚVK_4.29.1^2	 tayā rahitam timira āśu bhra maṇa nauyāna saṃkṣobhaṇa ādi anāhita vibhramam abhrāntam jñānam pratyakṣam iti idam ca lakṣaṇam yoginām api jñānam vyāpnoti eva tat dhi nirvikalpakam abhra antam atas eva pratyakṣam caturdhā vibhajante tat caturvidham indriya jam indriya ja samanantara pratyaya udbhavam mānasam sarva citta caittānām ātma saṃvedanam yogi jñānam ca iti yadi hi indriya ja tvam eva pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam syāt tritayam apratyakṣam syāt mānasam ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ api pratyakṣam iṣyate eva atas sarva anugata aparokṣa avabhāsi tva mātra vacanaḥ eva pratyakṣa śabdaḥ niścīyate 
ŚVK_4.29.1^3	 yathā gameḥ ḍoḥ iti ḍopratyaya antaḥ vyutpāditaḥ go śabdaḥ agacchati api prayoga darśanāt sarva anugata gojāti mātra vacanaḥ niścīyate evam naṣṭa avayava artha vibhāgaḥ pratyakṣa śabdaḥ aparokṣa avabhāsini samudāya śaktyā eva vartate iti tat na avayava anvaya avi abhicārāt avayava anvaya vyabhicāre hi samudāya śaktiḥ ātmānam labhate na ca pratyakṣa śabda vācyam indriya anvayam vyabhicarati mānase vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na manasaḥ api indriya tvāt atha na asti manaḥ nāma indriyam indriya jam eva tu jñānam dhārāvāhikeṣu santanyamāneṣu utta rakṣaṇa grāhiṇaḥ jñānasya kāraṇam manaḥ iti gīyate uttaram ca mānasam iti 
ŚVK_4.29.1^4	 tat ayuktam atīte hi indriya jajñānaḥ uttarakṣaṇaḥ anubhūyate sa katham asambaddhena tena avabhāsayitum śakyate akṣa vat iti ced na prāpya kāri tvasya akṣāṇām iha eva vakṣyamāṇa tvāt atas dvitīya kṣaṇa grahaṇam api indriya jam eva iti na asti vyabhicāraḥ tasya api indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt na hi nimīlita nayanasya rūpa buddhiḥ anuvartamānā dṛśyate atas avayava anvaya avi abhicārāt na samudāya śakteḥ ātma lābhaḥ atas anindriya jam sat yoginām mukta ātmanām vā jñānam na pratyakṣam pratyakṣam sanniyatam vidyamāna upalambhanam apratyakṣam tu pramāṇa antara anabhyupagamāt eva nirastam 
ŚVK_4.29.2^1	 yat ca bhāvanā balam yogi jñāna janmani kāraṇam uktam tat na avagata viṣaya tvāt bhāvanāyāḥ na ca akasmāt eva avagateḥ utpattiḥ sambhavati sarva utpattimatām kāraṇavat tvāt atha pramāṇa antara avagatam bhāvyate kim bhāvanayā tatas eva tad siddheḥ kiñ ca tat pramāṇam na tāvat anumānam dharma adharmayoḥ pūrvam agrahaṇena tad vyāpta liṅga darśana abhāvāt jagat vaicitrya artha āpatteḥ api kim api kāraṇam asti iti etāvat unnīyate na tu kaścid viśeṣaḥ na ca anirdiṣṭa viśeṣa viṣayā bhāvanā bhavati yoga śāstreṣu api viśeṣāḥ eva dhyeyatayā upadiśyante dhyeyaḥ ātmā prabhuḥ yaḥ asau hṛdaye dīpa vat sthitaḥ ityādibhiḥ 
ŚVK_4.29.2^2	 tarhi āgamāt avagatam bhāvayiṣyate yadi pramāṇāt tatas eva avagateḥ kim bhāvanayā hāna upādāna artham hi vastu jijñāsyate te ca tatas eva siddhe iti vyarthāḥ bhāvanā kāruṇikaḥ api dharma āgamān eva prayatnataḥ śiṣyebhyaḥ vyācakṣīta na bhāvanā parikhedam anubhavet atha vipralambha bhūyiṣṭha tvāt āgamānām pramāṇam āgamaḥ na vā iti vicikitsamānaḥ bhāvanayā jijñāsate tat na tatas api tad asiddheḥ bhāvanā bala pariniṣpannam api jñānam anāśvāsanīya artham eva abhūtasya api bhāvyamānasya aparokṣa vat prakāśāt tathā taiḥ eva uktam tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā iti 
ŚVK_4.29.3^1	 api ca bhāvanā bala jam apramāṇam gṛhīta grahaṇāt yāvat eva hi gṛhītam tāvat eva hi bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate mātrayā api tu adhikam bhāvanayā na gocarayati yoga abhyāsa āhita saṃskāra pāṭava nimittāḥ hi smṛtiḥ eva bhāvanā iti abhidhīyate sā ca na pramāṇam iti sthitam eva na ca tad uttara kālam sākṣātkāri jñānam udeti iti pramāṇam asti indriya sannikarṣam antareṇa artha sākṣātkārasya kvacid api adarśanāt bhavati ca atra prayogaḥ yoginām dharma adharmayoḥ aparokṣa avabhāsi jñānam na asti indriya sannikarṣa abhāvāt asmad ādi vat yat ca kāraṇa prakarṣāt kārya prakarṣaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam kāraṇa prakarṣa anupapatteḥ 
ŚVK_4.29.3^2	 bhāvanā prakarṣa anupapattiḥ ca varṇitā eva prayojana abhāvāt anālambana tvāt anadhika viṣaya tvāt ca na ca tathāvidha atiśayavataḥ kasyacid adya tve darśanam yena dṛṣṭa tvāt abhyupagamyeta nitya nirdoṣa vedānta pramāṇake tu brahma atiśaye na kiñcid anupapannam tatra api tu na anindriya jam pratyakṣam upapadyate samucchinna sakalam iti mātṛ meya māna prapañcāḥ hi sā avasthā yatra api ca abhyāsāt prakarṣaḥ dṛśyate tatra api smṛtiḥ eva prakṛṣyate na punar abhyāsataḥ anindriya sannikṛṣṭam api ca vastu aparokṣam bhavati na hi abhra antasya asat nihitam avartamānam ca puras sthita vat ava bhāsate iti utprekṣitum api śakyam iti alam anena iti 
ŚVK_4.29.4	 nanu ca śeṣa hetu prasiddhaye pratyakṣa tvam hetuḥ iti pūrvam uktam katham idānīm tena vidyamāna upalambhana tvam sādhyate atas āha sat samprayoga ja tvam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na ayam śāstrīyaḥ hetu kramaḥ yena tad atikrame doṣaḥ bhavati atas vyāpti balena śakyam anena asmad ādi pratyakṣa vat ubhayam sādhayitum iti yathā iṣṭa abhidhānam iti 
ŚVK_4.30–31	 atra sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣa tvā abhyupagamena yogi pratyakṣasya animitta tām pratipādayatā nimitta tva abhyupagame vā na pratyakṣa tvam iti arthāt āveditam tad prayoga dvayena darśayati teṣām iti dvayena tatas tu eva iti avartamāna viṣaya tvāt eva iti arthaḥ yadi tu nirākṛta sva pakṣaḥ bauddhaḥ apratyakṣa śabda vācyam eva tat pramāṇa antaram iti brūyāt tad artham pramāṇa tva nirākaraṇam etat ca sūtrakāreṇa eva sat samprayoga grahaṇa sāmarthyāt eva upāttam iti sat iti etena kathyate iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_4.32	 anyat matam siddhānām khalu dharma anugraha vaśena anāgata ādi viṣayā pratibhā eva jāyate sā ca adya tve kvacid asmad ādīnām api utpadyate yathā śvas me bhrātā agantā iti prāyeṇa tu ṛṣīṇām tat jñānam utpadyate iti ārṣam iti ucyate yathā āhuḥ ārṣam siddha darśanam ca dharmebhyaḥ iti tat nirākaroti laukikī iti ayam arthaḥ yoginām ṛṣīṇām vā pratibhā na artha niścayāya prabhavati pratibhā tvāt asmad ādi pratibhāvat asmad ādīnām hi visaṃvāda bhūyiṣṭhā pratibhā upalabhyate iti 
ŚVK_4.33	 evam tāvat vidyamāna upalambhana tvasya hetoḥ asiddhim āśaṅkya sat samprayoga ja tvāt iti yat uktam tat vivṛtam idānīm bhaviṣyat tvasya hetoḥ anaikāntika śaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham yat uktam tat vivṛṇoti avidyamānā iti ayam arthaḥ yadi sat samprayoga jam pratyakṣam iti na ucyeta tatas avidyamāne api saṃyoge yoginām kvacid pratyakṣam jāyate iti tasya bhaviṣyati api dharme śaktiḥ anivāritā syāt tatas ca bhaviṣyat tvasya hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam iti sat ityādi jaiminiḥ āha iti 
ŚVK_4.34^1	 nanu bhaviṣyat tvāt dharmaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat yadā asau bhaviṣyan tadā mā nāma pratyakṣaḥ bhavatu yadā tu pravartate tadā kid nāma na pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyate atas āha pratyakṣaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ anuṣṭhāna artham hi pramāṇam anviṣyate tad anuṣṭhānāt prāk eva anveṣyam na ca anuṣṭhānāt prāk dharmaḥ asti iti katham pratyakṣaḥ bhavet iti kim idānīm anyena anuṣṭhitaḥ vidyamānaḥ pratyakṣaḥ dharmaḥ na iti āha anuṣṭhitaḥ iti na pratyakṣaḥ iti sambandhaḥ iti atra kāraṇam āha phala sādhana rūpeṇa iti 
ŚVK_4.34^2	 bhavet etat evam yadi dravya ādayaḥ sva rūpeṇa dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ phala sādhana rūpeṇa ca ete dharmāḥ iti tādrūpyeṇa ca dharma tvam iti atra uktam tat ca rūpam anuṣṭhāna kāle na asti āmuṣmika phaleṣu atra phalasya abhāvāt aihika phaleṣu api cireṇa nirantarayoḥ hi sādhya sādhanayoḥ sādhanam pratyakṣam bhavati mardana sukhayoḥ iva iha tu phala kāle sādhanam cira ativṛttam sādhana kāle phalam ajātam iti na phala sādhanam pratyakṣam śaktiḥ tu sarva bhāvānām nitya parokṣa eva tena na tad viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavati iti 
ŚVK_4.35	 prakṛtam idānīm vidyamāna upalambhana tvena pratyakṣasya dharme animitta tvam upasaṃharati asmat iti dharmentena dhyāyinām pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhanam sat dharme na pramāṇam asmat pratyakṣa vat vakṣyamāṇa hetu apekṣayā caśabdaḥ na iṣyate iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti ayam ca sūtrakāreṇa upapatti krama uktyā sarveṣām cittam bhāvayitum hetu kramaḥ darśitaḥ śakyate ca pratyakṣa tva mātreṇa eva animitta tā sādhayitum iti āha pratyakṣa tvāt iti 
ŚVK_4.36	 evam sūtra tātparyam vyākhyāya idānīm avayavān anusandhatte tatra api sat śabdam ādau cintayati atra bhikṣuṇā uktam sat viśeṣaṇam anarthakam asatā samprayoga abhāvena avyabhicārāt yathā uktam sat iti asat vyudāsāya na niyogāt sa gaṃsyate samprayogaḥ hi niyamāt sataḥ eva upapadyate iti etat anabhyupagamena nirākṛtya karma dhāraya samāsam eva darśayati avidyamānā iti asya arthaḥ na ayam arthaḥ sūtrasya satā samprayogaḥ sat samprayogaḥ iti kim tarhi san ca asau samprayogaḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ ayam sat śabdaḥ ca vidyamāna vacanaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ bhavati vidyamāna samprayoga jam pratyakṣam iti tatas ca yat teṣām avidyamāne arthe ityādinā yogi jñānasya pratyakṣa tu a nirākaraṇam uktam tat evam labhyate vartamāna artha vācinaḥ hi sat śabdasya asat vyudāsaḥ sa katham asati tasmin sidhyet ayam ca sūtra arthaḥ sati indriya artha sambandhe iti vyācakṣāṇena bhāṣya kāreṇa uktaḥ iti draṣṭavyam iti 
ŚVK_4.37	 nanu ayam arthaḥ nimitta saptamyā eva atra labhyate na hi asat samprayogaḥ nimittam bhavati atas āha sa samyā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam avartamānaḥ samprayogaḥ na akṣa je jñāne kāraṇam api tu tam api kecid kāraṇa tayā manyante tat iha samprayogaḥ iti etāvati śrute sati bhāvinī atīte ca iti yatheṣṭam kalpayeyuḥ atas tad kalpanā nirākaraṇa artham vyaktam eva jaimininā sat viśeṣaṇam upāttam iti 
ŚVK_4.38	 vyākhyātaḥ sat śabdaḥ saṃśabdam idānīm anusandhatte samyak iti samyak prayogaḥ samprayogaḥ tena duṣprayogaḥ nivāritaḥ bahvatī iti āha viśekṣyati bhavān samā prayogam prayogam eva tāvat ādau bhavān vyākurutām atas āha prayogaḥ iti rūpa ādi saṃvid kārya unneyam indriyāṇām vyāpāram prayoga apara paryāyam ācakṣate iti 
ŚVK_4.39	 kaḥ punar atra duṣprayogaḥ yaḥ saṃśabdena vyāvartyate atas āha duṣṭa tvāt iti katham punar asau duṣṭaḥ prayogasya hi atyāsatti ādayaḥ doṣāḥ na ca te śukti samprayukta cakṣuṣaḥ bhrāmyataḥ doṣāḥ bhavanti viṣayaḥ eva tu tatra sādṛśyat ūṣitaḥ viparīta khyāti hetuḥ atas āha rajata īkṣaṇāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ jñāna kāraṇam hi samprayogaḥ sa duṣṭaḥ anyadanya ātmanā bhāsayati kāraṇa doṣa āvinā abhāvāt kārya doṣasya aduṣṭaḥ tu samyak jñānam janayati sarva kāraṇa doṣa abhāvena ca tasya samyaktvam bhavati yadā punar indriya arthayoḥ anyatarat api duṣyati tadā tad āśritaḥ saṃyogaḥ api duṣṭaḥ bhavati atas saṃyogasya sva doṣāḥ atyāsatti ādayaḥ viṣaya doṣāḥ ca sādṛśya ādayaḥ dūṣakāḥ bhavanti tat iha śuktau rajatam iti gṛhyamāṇāyām kārya doṣāt śuktikā yogaḥ duṣṭaḥ iti avagamyate atas asau samyak artha vācinā saṃśabdena vāryatas iti evan ca avayava vyākhyāyām āśrīyamāṇāyām loka siddha lakṣaṇa anuvādena api animitta tva vidhiḥ na duṣyati iti āha evam iti 
ŚVK_4.40–4.41–42^1	 tathā yat api bauddhaiḥ prāpti vacanam prayoga śabdam manvānaiḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ aprāpya kāri tvāt avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti uktam tat api vyāpāra mātra vacanam prayoga śabdam vyācakṣāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ parihṛtam iti āha tatas ca iti vyāpāra mātra vāci tvāt aviruddham iti uparitanena sambandhaḥ iti śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ aprāpya kāri tve bauddhānām abhiprāyam āha prāpya iti na untena evam hi taiḥ uktam sa antara grahaṇam na syāt prāptau jñāne adhikasya ca iti yadi cakṣuḥ śrotre viṣayam prāpya gṛhṇītaḥ yat idam dūre śabdaḥ dūre arthaḥ iti sāntara grahaṇam yat ca su mahatām mahī mahīdhara ādīnām adhiṣṭhāna adhika parimāṇānāṃgrahaṇam tat kila ubhayam api na syāt prāpya kāriṣu tvac ādiṣu adarśanāt 
ŚVK_4.40–4.41–42^2	 tat etat uktam bhavati yat prāpya kāri na tat sāntaram adhikam ca vedayati yathā kāyaḥ na ca tathā śrotra cakṣuṣī iti āvīta hetuḥ upālambhe kila śabdaḥ ubhayasya api samādhāsyamāna tvāt iti ārjava avasthānam vā samprayogaḥ abhimataḥ iti āha yadi vā iti ārjava avasthitasya hi rūpa ādi jñānam utpadyate tatra eva samprayoga śabda upacāraḥ tvac ādiṣu samprayoga śabda arthaḥ jñāna hetuḥ upalabdhaḥ tat idam ārjava avasthānam api tad hetu tayā tathā vyapadiśyate evam eva vyāpāre api darśayitavyam iti 
ŚVK_4.43	 kārya lakṣita yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ vā yaḥ śabda arthayoḥ iva rūpa ādi cakṣuḥ ādyoḥ sambandhaḥ samprayogaḥ iti āha yogyatā iti athavā astu sāṅkhya ādi siddhānta siddhaḥ prāpti rūpaḥ eva sambandhaḥ na atra api kiñcid duṣyati iti āha sāṅkhya ādīn iti nirjitya hi sāṅkhya ādīn prāpti pakṣaḥ atra dūṣyate na ca te nirjetum śakyāḥ aprāpyakāri pakṣe hi sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa ādīnām aprāpta tva aviśeṣeṇa grahaṇa prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_4.44	 anumānena api śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ prāpya kāri tvam avagamyate iti āha tayoḥ iti tayoḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ iti arthaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotre prāpya kāriṇī bāhya indriya tvāt tvac indriya vat iti nanu ca karṇaśaṣkulī cakṣuḥ golakam ca śarīra stham eva upalabhyate katham tat prāpya kārī iti ucyate tat etat eteṣām tāvat prāpya kāri vādinām sāṅkhyānām matena samādadhāti kecid iti evam hi sāṅkhyāḥ manyante āhaṅkārikayoḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ vṛttiḥ śarīrāt bahis bhavati artha deśam prāpnoti sā ca kārya darśana unneyāḥ yathākāryam avatiṣṭhate iti 
ŚVK_4.45	 nanu adhiṣṭhānam eva indriyam tatra uddharaṇa pūraṇa ādi nigraha anugraha darśanāt itarathā tad asambhavāt yadi hi adhiṣṭhāna atiriktam akṣam bhavet tarhi adhiṣṭhāna saṃskāraḥ anarthakaḥ syāt atas āha cikitsā ādi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi indriyam adhiṣṭhāne na sambaddham bhavet tatas adhiṣṭhāna saṃskāraḥ tasya upakārakaḥ na syāt adhiṣṭhāna ādhāram tu tat atas tasya eva ādhāra bhūtasya adhiṣṭhānasya saṃskāraḥ ādheyasya indriyasya upakārakaḥ bhaviṣyati gaja aśva paryāṇa saṃskāraḥ iva ārohakasya iti 
ŚVK_4.46	 nanu evam api golaka adhikaraṇasya eva tad saṃskāraḥ upakārakaḥ bhavatu tasya tu asambaddhasya bhāgasya golakena golaka saṃskāraḥ na upakārakaḥ syāt tena ca saṃskṛte na prayojanam tasya eva prāpta tvena prakāśaka tvāt atas yat prakāśakam tat saṃskartum aśakyam asambandhāt yat ca śakyam na tena saṃskṛtena prayojanam asambaddhasya hi bhāgasya prakāśayitum aśakteḥ atas āha tad deśaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ekā eva indriya vṛttiḥ anugata adhiṣṭhāna deśa sambandhāḥ artha deśam yāvat prāptā atas adhiṣṭhāna deśaḥ eva saṃskāraḥ sarva upakārakaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā pādayoḥ prayuktaḥ saṃskāraḥ dūra sthasya api cakṣuṣaḥ upakārakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_4.48	 atas na ayam ekāntaḥ yat adhiṣṭhāna deśe saṃskārāt tad varti ā iva indriyam iti iti āha tasmāt iti nirantara adhika grahaṇam upapādayati bahis iti syāt antena kārya darśana balena hi tad vṛttiḥ kalpyamānā yathākāryam avatiṣṭhata eti uktam atas adhiṣṭhāna adhika parimāṇa artha darśanāt pṛthu agrā kalpayiṣyate nirantara darśanāt ca santatā atas yatra yādṛśam vṛtti bhāge pārthavam pṛthutvam bhavati tad anurūpam eva adhiṣṭhāna adhikam mahīdhara ādi gṛhyate amūrtāyāḥ api vṛtteḥ aupādhikaḥ vyomnaḥ iva bhāga vyapadeśaḥ yat eva tayā prakāśyate tad aupādhikam eva bhāga vyapadeśam labhate iti na ca vācyam yadi vṛttiḥ gatvā artham prakāśayati kim iti tarhi nitānta dūra vartinaḥ api bhāvāt na prakāśayati iti yāvati hi dūre kāryam upalabhyate tāvantam eva adhvānam asau sarpati iti adhika darśana vat kalpanīyam iti āha dūre api iti 
ŚVK_4.49–4.50	 nanu evam api yadi indriya vṛttyā arthāḥ prakāśyante sā tarhi nirgatya gatā asti eva iti kim na pihita indriyasya api bhāvāḥ bhāsante atas āha dīpa prabhā iti na avaśyam pihita indriyasya vṛttiḥ asti kārya abhāvāt tu sā dīpa nāśe prabhāvat nimīlayataḥ api naṣṭa iti unnīyate iti astu vai adhiṣṭhāna pidhāne api vṛttiḥ ātma prayatna anugṛhītā tu sā ātmani artham upanayati adhiṣṭhāna pidhāne hi ātmanaḥ prayatna ucchedāt prayatna an adhiṣṭhitayā tayā anupanītaḥ arthaḥ na ātmanā anubhūyate iti āha adhiṣṭhānā iti 
ŚVK_4.51.1	 vicchinna bodham idānīm upapādayati vicchinnaḥ iti iti vibhoḥ api ātmanaḥ prāc bhavīya karma arjitam sakala bhoga āyatanam śarīram iti tad apekṣayā viccheda buddhiḥ kāya indriye tu śarīra viccheda abhāvāt aviccheda bodhaḥ yuktaḥ iti śabde tu viccheda adhika bodhaḥ bhrāntiḥ eva iti kim tad upapādanena tathā hi sva deśaḥ eva śabdaḥ śrotreṇa prakāśyate kutas tasya vicchedaḥ kutas vibhoḥ amūrtasya vṛddhi hrāsau iti āha śabde tu iti etat tu sva matena uktam sāṅkhya mate tu śrotra vṛttiḥ śabda deśam gacchati eva tatra śarīra apekṣayā eva viccheda bodhaḥ vaktavyaḥ asambhavam ca śabda adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.51.2^1	 ayam ca sāṅkhya siddhānta siddhaḥ vṛtti gamana pakṣaḥ vārttikakāreṇa prāpti sādha araṇya mātreṇa uktaḥ na punar abhipretaḥ na hīndriyavṛttiḥ nāma kācid pramāṇena avagamyate tathā hi āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi iti kāpilāḥ manyante yathā āhuḥ sāttvikaḥ ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtāt ahaṅkārāt iti kaḥ ca ayam ahaṅkāraḥ yadi yaḥ ayam ātmānam prakāśayati sa tarhi jñānam iti indriyāṇām katham prakṛtiḥ bhaviṣyati ātma ādhāram āntaram jñānam katham tena bāhya indriyāṇi ārabdhum śakyante atha matam tattva antaram ahaṅkāraḥ iti tat na pramāṇa abhāvāt api ca tattva antaram api tat kāpilaiḥ vibhuḥ saṅgīryate tatas tad mayāni indriyāṇi api vibhūni bhaveyuḥ 
ŚVK_4.51.2^2	 na ca vibhūnām vṛttiḥ upapadyate vṛttiḥ nirgamanam na ca tat vibhūnām sambhavati syāt matam na ca brūmaḥ vibhūni indriyāṇi gacchanti iti kim tarhi tad ādhārā vṛttiḥ iti kā iyam vṛttiḥ iti vaktavyam yadi śrotra ādīnām śabda ādi grahaṇa yogya tā sā tarhi amūrtā śaktiḥ katham gacchet api ca trīṇi antaḥkaraṇāni mahān ahaṅkāraḥ manaḥ iti kāpilāḥ manyante na ca karaṇam karaṇa antarāṇām prakṛtiḥ upapadyate karaṇa tvāt manaḥ vat atas na ahaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi na ca tad vṛttiḥ amūrtā prāpya kāriṇī iti pramāṇavatī kalpanā tathā śabda adhikaraṇe vakṣyati śrotra āgamana pakṣe ca iti atra vṛtti gamana pratiṣedham atas bhautikāni eva indriyāṇi prāpya kārīṇi iti vaktavyam 
ŚVK_4.51.3^1	 kim punar bhautika tve pramāṇam indriyāṇām dṛṣṭa anusāraḥ tathā hi bahis bhūtānām eva yathāyatham rūpa ādi abhivyañjaka tvam upalabdham tejasā hi rūpam prakāśyate yathā dīpena rasaḥ adbhiḥ śuṣkāṇām api dravyāṇām san api rasaḥ na vyaktam upalabhyate yathā ārdrāṇām na ca śuṣkeṣu rasaḥ na asti yāvat dravya bhāvi tvāt atas adbhiḥ rasaḥ abhivyajyate pārthivam ca kiñcid dravyaṃgandhasya abhivyañjakam dṛṣṭam yathā nimba tvac candana gandhasya tad kaṣāya pariṣiktasya hi candanasya sphuṭataram gandhaḥ abhivyajyate na ca adbhiḥ asau abhivyajyate kevalānām anabhivyañjaka tvāt 
ŚVK_4.51.3^2	 vāyunā api bahis sparśa abhivyaktiḥ upalabdhā yathā hemanta śiśirayoḥ viyati vitatānām apām sūkṣma tvāt anupalakṣyamāṇānām vā api vāte śīta sparśaḥ avagamyate na ca asau vāyoḥ anuṣṇa aśīta sparśa tvāt vāyoḥ atas rūpa abhivyañjakam cakṣuḥ taijasam āpyam rasanam abhivyañjakam ca rasasya ghrāṇam pārthivam gandhasya vāyavīyam tvac indriyam sparśasya śrotram idānīm kiṃprakṛtikam tat api bhautikam indriya tvāt kim punar bhūtam tasya prakṛtiḥ ākāśaḥ iti vadāmaḥ tathā hi dvividham kāryam sarva bhūtānām śarīram indriyam ca ākāśasya api avakāśa dānena śarīra upakāraka tvāt kārya kāraṇa tvam 
ŚVK_4.51.3^3	 atas tasya api indriyeṇa kāryeṇa bhavitavyam tatra indriya antarāṇām bhūta antara prakṛti tvāt ākāśam eva śrotrasya prakṛtiḥ iti niścīyate api ca sva guṇam eva bhūta antarāṇi vyañjayanti na ca teṣām śabdaḥ guṇaḥ ākāśa guṇa tvāt atas ākāśam eva tasya abhivyañjakam iti yuktam evan ca dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī kalpanā kṛtā bhavati santi hi deheṣu pṛthivī ādi bhūta bhāgāḥ kpta gandha ādi abhivyakti śaktayaḥ ca bahis iti śarīre api vartamānānām teṣām eva vyañjakatva anumānam yuktam evan ca prāptiḥ api samarthitā bhavati tvac ghrāṇa rasanānām hi sthitam eva prāpya kāri tvam 
ŚVK_4.51.3^4	 śrotrasya api karṇa= chidra parimita nabhasaḥ dharma adharma upagṛhītasya sva deśaḥ eva vibhum śabdam prakāśayataḥ prāpya kāri tvam eva tejasaḥ hi visaraṇa svabhāvasya cakṣuṣaḥ nirgatasya artha deśa prāptiḥ upapannā eva anudbhūta rūpa tvāt ca tasya rūpa anupalambhaḥ atas eva agni tejasaḥ pṛthu agrā ādi kalpanā ca tasya kārya darśana anusāreṇa mūrta tvāt upapattimatī sarvatra ca yathākārya darśanam yogya tāsanāthā prāptiḥ indriya arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti darśayitavyam atas na kācid ati prasaktiḥ vaktavyāḥ yathā vakṣyati prāpti mātram hi sambandhaḥ iti atas siddham indriyāṇi bhautikāni prāpya kārīṇi ca iti 
ŚVK_4.52	 evam tāvat sat samprayoga śabdāḥ vivṛtāḥ pada anvayam atas param anusandhāsyāmaḥ atra kila puruṣasya samprayogaḥ indriyāṇām buddhi janma iti ucyate tat ca ayuktam vibhoḥ puruṣasya sarva bhāvaiḥ eva samprayoga avyabhicāreṇa viśeṣaṇa upādāna vaiyarthyāt indriyāṇām ca bhautikānām acetana tvāt cetanā hi buddhiḥ iti sarva laukikāḥ parīkṣakāḥ ca manyante na punar indriya vyāpāraḥ buddhiḥ iti sāṅkhyāḥ hi indriya vṛttau buddhi śabdam upacaranti tatra teṣām eva paribhāṣā mātram atas atra vaktavyam kīdṛśaḥ atra pada anvayaḥ iti atas āha puruṣa indriya śabdau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ kim atra vaktavyam bhāṣya kāreṇa puruṣa indriya śabdau vyavahita kalpanayā vyākhyātau yena evam āha sati indriya artha sambandhe puruṣasya yā buddhiḥ jāyate tat pratyakṣam iti kaḥ punar ayam puruṣaḥ yasya buddhi janmanā sambandhaḥ atas āha puruṣaḥ iti na atra tātparyamanya paratvāt sūtrasya paramārthataḥ tu puruṣaḥ atra ātma abhipretaḥ yaḥ ātma vāde prasādhayiṣyate na śarīram tasya bhautika tvena acetana tvāt iti 
ŚVK_4.53^1	 nanu evam api yat nityam ātmānam mīmāṃsakāḥ manyante tat na sidhyet jñāna janmani vikāra āpattyā carma vat anitya tva prasakteḥ jñāna janmanā tu avikṛtasya pūrva avasthāyām iva apramātṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ atas āha vikriyā iti evam hi manyante na kiñcid vikāḥ mātreṇa vastu naśyati tad pratyabhijñānāt etat ca ātma vādaḥ eva bhāṣya kāreṇa vakṣyate atas duruktam paraiḥ buddhi janmani puṃsaḥ ca vikṛtiḥ yadi anitya tā atha avikṛtiḥ ātmā ayam pramātā iti na yujyate iti atra buddhi janma pratyakṣam iti ucyate tasya kaḥ arthaḥ kim buddheḥ janma atiriktam anatiriktam vā yadi atiriktam tat vācyam kīdṛśam iti 
ŚVK_4.53^2	 na ca sva mate janma svarūpam abhihitam yadi vaiśeṣika ukta sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ janma abhidhīyate tasya nitya tvena akṣa an adhīna tvāt pratyakṣa śabda abhidheya tva anupapattiḥ anatirikta tve tu punarukta tā eva doṣaḥ atas āha buddhi janma iti ayam arthaḥ na ayam buddhi janma iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ kin tu buddhiḥ ca asau janma ca iti karmadhārayaḥ janma śabdaḥ ca kartari manin pratyaya antaḥ tena jāyamānā buddhiḥ pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati na punar vaiśeṣikāt i vat nityam atyanta bhinnam samavāyam ācakṣmahe kāraṇa daśā viśeṣaḥ eva kārya janma iti ucyate na asau atyantam kārya kāraṇābhyām vyatiricyate atas kim anya doṣa udbhāvanena iti 
ŚVK_4.55^1	 jāyamāna viśeṣaṇa upādāne prayojanam āha vyāpāraḥ iti kāraka antarāṇi janitvā kiyan tañcit kālam sthitvā sva kāryeṣu vartamānāni dṛṣṭāni tat buddhau api pramāṇe mā bhūt iti janma vivakṣā sūtrakāreṇa kṛtā iti kim punar kāraka antara sādharmye duṣyati atas āha na hi iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na kiñcid duṣyati kin tu na indriya ādi vat jātā satī buddhiḥ kṣaṇa mātram api āste atas katham tadvat eva sthitvā pravartate iti na kevalam jātāḥ na āste kin tu jāyamānā api na udāste sā hi utpadyamānā eva sva artham prakāśayanti eva utpadyate iti na kṣaṇa antaram pratīkṣate na hi artha prakāśanāt anyat buddhe rūpam upalabhyate iti āha jāyate iti 
ŚVK_4.55^2	 kāraka antara vaidharmya pratipādanena atra nitya buddhi vādinaḥ nirākartum buddheḥ anaticira vināśi tvam uktam tatra ca ayam hetuḥ yadi iyam utpattimatī tasyāḥ vināśena avaśyam bhavitavyam na ca ahaitukaḥ vināśaḥ sambhavati utpattimat tvāt eva na ca prahāra ādiḥ asyāḥ vināśa hetuḥ amūrta tvāt atas jñāna antareṇa vā nāśyate tad janmanā vā saṃskāreṇa tat ca ubhayam api sahasā eva niṣpannam asti hi indriyā ādikā sāmagrya pratibandhāḥ sā kim aparam vijñānam na janayati smṛti hetuḥ api saṃskāraḥ anayā eva jāta mātrayā janitaḥ iti karma vat kārya virodhi tvāt api tādātvikaḥ vināśaḥ buddheḥ iti yuktam na ca sā eva iti buddheḥ pratyabhijñānam asti na ca bheda anadhyavasāya mātrāt ekatva siddhiḥ 
ŚVK_4.55^3	 api ca artha antara darśane sphuṭaḥ eva aśutara vināśaḥ buddheḥ evan ca vyavasthita eka darśane api tadvat eva tad anumānam api ca tatra api vyavahite jñānam nivartate tad cira avasthāyi tve anupapannam evam hi vyavahite kumbhe pratyakṣa jñānam anuvarteta na ca evam smṛtiḥ tu parastāt dṛśyate sā pratyakṣa jñāna vyāpta tvena syāt parokṣa aparokṣayoḥ eka gocarayoḥ ekadā virodhāt syāt etat avyakta grahaṇam anavasthāyi tvāt vidyut sampāte rūpa avyakta grahaṇa vat iti na pratiṣeddhavya abhyanujñānāt yadi manyate buddheḥ anaticira anuvṛttau prakāśasya gatvara tvāt vidyut sampātaḥ iva na vyaktam bhāvāḥ prakāśeran atas na aśutara vināśinī buddhiḥ iti tat na pratiṣeddhavya abhyanujñānāt 
ŚVK_4.55^4	 evam hi vidyut prakāśa janite avyakta bodhaḥ utpanna mātra apavargi tām buddheḥ bruvāṇaḥ niṣedhyam eva aśutara vināśam abhyanujānāti api ca viśeṣa agrahaṇe sāmānya mātra grahaṇam avyakta grahaṇam na tu sva gocare kiñcid avyaktam nāma asti viṣaya abhirūpa tvāt grahaṇānām viśeṣa agrahaṇam ca tad grahaṇa nimitta abhāvāt eva na tu buddheḥ anavasthānāt vidyut prakāśe api yāvat āśutara vināśinyā dhiyā viṣayīkṛtam tat vyaktam eva viśeṣāḥ tu tatra grahaṇa hetu abhāvāt agṛhītāḥ eva na punar avyakta paricchinnāḥ na hi gṛhītam avyaktam nāma sambhavati iti na anavasthāyi tve api dhiyām avyakta grahaṇa āpattiḥ nitya buddhi vādinaḥ ca ayam abhiprāyaḥ śabda adhikaraṇe bhāṣya kāreṇa vakṣyate iti 
ŚVK_4.56	 nanu pramāṇam nāma kāraka viśeṣaḥ na ca akurvat kriyām kārakam bhavati yadi tu buddhiḥ janitvā na vyāpriyate katham asau kārakam pramāṇam iti ca sāmānya viśeṣa śabdābhyām abhidhāsyate atas āha tena iti satyam na vyāpāra sambandham antareṇa kāraka tvam bhavati janma eva tu buddheḥ vyāpāraḥ vyāpāra antara asambhavāt tat eva ca vivakṣā vaśāt pramā iti upacaryate janmanā hi tasyāḥ pramāṇa tvam bhavati atas tayā eva kriyayā kārakam pramāṇam iti ca sāmānya viśeṣa śabdābhyām abhidhāna siddhiḥ caśabdāt pramāṇam ca iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_4.57–4.58	 ayam ca janma avyatireka pakṣaḥ yā buddhiḥ jāyate iti vadatā bhāṣya kāreṇa eva varṇitaḥ iti āha jama ca iti aparam api jāyamāna avasthā viśeṣaṇa upādānasya prayojanam āha tat ca iti buddhiḥ pramāṇam iti etāvatī ukte bhūtā bhaviṣyantī vā pramāṇam iti api kecid sambhāvayeyuḥ yathā sat viśeṣaṇa upādāne varṇitam atas tad ā āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham jāyamāna viśeṣaṇa upādānam bhūta bhaviṣyat tvāt itya āpādane pañcamī iti astu vā vaiśeṣika siddhānta siddhaḥ sva kāraṇe kārya samavāyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ eva janma tathā api na kiñcid duṣyati iti āha yadā tu iti sa khalu nityaḥ api indriya adhīna abhivyaktiḥ iti pratyakṣam apekṣyate iti 
ŚVK_4.59	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa buddhiḥ vā janma vā ityādinā pramāṇa aniyamaḥ darśitaḥ tatra abhiprāyam āha pramāṇa phala bhāvaḥ tu iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ bhāṣya kārasya ekam idam sūtram na ubhayam utsahate kartum yat pramāṇam ca niyacchati animitta tām ca vidadhāti iti bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam tat atra animitta tā mātram eva vidyamāna upalambhanāt pratipādyam pramāṇam tu vivakṣā vaśena buddhi ādīnām anyatamam bhaviṣyati karaṇam hi pramāṇam sādhakatamam ca karaṇam vivakṣā adhīnaḥ ca sādhakatama bhāvaḥ atas yat eva tu bāhya apekṣayā phalam pratyāsannam iti vivakṣyate tat eva pramāṇam bhaviṣyati tatas param ca abhyarhita tva vivakṣayā phalam iti 
ŚVK_4.60	 yathā iṣṭa kalpanām eva darśayati yat vā iti asati indriye jñāna udaya abhāvāt tat eva pramāṇam sat api ca indriyam asaṅgatam arthena na jñānam janayati iti tad artha saṅgatiḥ pramāṇam sambaddham api ca indriyam arthena manasā anadhiṣṭhitam na pramāṇam iti tad manassaṃyogaḥ pramāṇam sarvasmin api ca satya satya ātma manassaṃyoge jñāna anudayāt sa ca pramāṇam athavā sarveṣām ekatara apāye api na jñānaṃjāyate iti sarve eva saṃyogaḥ pramāṇam ātmanā vā manasaḥ yogaḥ iti yojanīyam iti 
ŚVK_4.61	 eṣu pramāṇeṣu phalam darśayati tadā iti indriya ādi prāmāṇya pakṣe jñānam phalam iti arthaḥ nanu yadi indriya ādi pramāṇam tena tarhi sadā jñānam janayitavyam eva na ca tat asti asti khalu pihita cakṣuṣaḥ api cakṣuḥ na ca tat jñāpayati saṃyuktam jñāpayati iti ced na vyabhicārāt saṃyujyate khalu asya nānā arthaiḥ na ayanam tejaḥ kiñcid eva tu jāpayati atas vyabhicārāt akāraṇam indriya ādi jñāna janmani iti atas āha tatra iti uktam idam asmābhiḥ vyāpāra vacanaḥ prayoga śabdaḥ iti phala anumeyaḥ ca asau vyāpāraḥ atas yatra eva phalam upalabhyate tatra eva vyāpāravat tvāt teṣām pramāṇa tvam iti asati tu vyāpāre na phalam utpadyate iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti āha vyāpāraḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.62	 nanu astu vyāpāra vāci prayoga śabda pakṣe ati prasaṅga parihāraḥ prāpti vacana tve ati prasaṅgaḥ duṣpariharaḥ asti hi cākṣuṣasya tejasaḥ nānā arthaiḥ samprayogaḥ na ca tāvat jñāpayati kiñcid eva tu kadācid api ca kā ca iyam prāptiḥ yadi saṃyogaḥ sa ca dravyeṇa eva iti rūpa saṃvid na syāt atha tena api saṃyukta samavāyāt asti sannikarṣaḥ iti ucyate samānaḥ asau rasa ādiṣu api iti te api cakṣuṣā anubhūyeran iti sarva ātmaka artha grahaṇam iti indriya saṃyoga pramāṇa pakṣe paraiḥ uktam yat tat pariharati na ca iti 
ŚVK_4.63	 kaḥ punar sarva ātmanā sambandhaḥ na asti iti vadataḥ abhiprāyaḥ yadi guṇaiḥ saṃyogaḥ na rasa ādibhiḥ sambhavati iti sa tarhi rūpeṇa api guṇa tva aviśeṣāt na syāt eva saṃyukta samavāyaḥ tu aviśiṣṭaḥ sarveṣām iti uktam eva atas āha prāpti iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ bhavet ayam doṣaḥ yadi prāpti mātram eva indriya arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ pramāṇam āśrīyate iti sa tu yogyatā sahāyaḥ yogya tā ca kārya darśana unneyāḥ atas yat eva yat indriya saṃyoga anantaram anubhūyate tatra eva tad samprayogasya yogya tvam na itaratra pramāṇa abhāvāt atas eva jighṛkṣita sūkṣma rūpa ādi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ api parihartavyaḥ iti kim iti na abhyupeyate atas āha mā bhūt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yaḥ hi jñānam pramāṇam iṣṭvā sat samprayogam pramāṇa kāraṇam ātiṣṭhate na tu pramāṇam tena api prāpteḥ aviśeṣāt tvacā rūpa avadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti na prāpti mātram sambandhaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.64	 atha tu pramāṇa niṣpattau yogya tā sahitā prāptiḥ iṣyate śakyam tat phala niṣpattau api vaktum iti doṣa prasaṅga parihāra tulya tvāt na ekaḥ paryanuyojyaḥ bhavati iti āha yathā iti niyatāḥ hi kācid eva sva viṣayeṇa rūpa ādinā cakṣuḥ ādīnām saṅgatiḥ iti yogya tvāt iti tatra eva kārya darśana yogya tvāt iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_4.65	 evam tāvat indriya artha sambandha pramāṇa pakṣe ati prasaṅga parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ idānīm dvi āśrayaḥ yogaḥ katham akṣeṇa eva vyapadiśyate iti ca udyam pariharati yogasya iti asya arthaḥ na idam adṛṣṭa pūrvam yat anekaiḥ api sambaddham ekena eva vyapadiśyate iti bhavati hi ḍitthaḍavitthayoḥ mātuḥ ḍittha mātā iti vyapadeśaḥ iti āha astu anyatara āśrayaḥ vyapadeśaḥ iha tu niyamena eva akṣeṇa vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate na arthena mātuḥ tu ḍavitthena api kadācid vyapadeśaḥ bhavati atas āha athavā iti asādhāraṇena hi vyapadeśaḥ bhavati jñānasya asādhāraṇam akṣam tad artham eva akṣāṇām nirmāṇāt arthaḥ tu kārya antara sādhāraṇaḥ na asau vyapadeśa hetuḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.66	 atra ca indriya artha sambandha pramāṇa pakṣe viṣaya bhedaḥ api pramāṇa phalayoḥ na asti eva sambandhasya artha āśraya tvāt jñānasya api tad viṣaya tvāt iti ātma manassambandha pramāṇa pakṣe tarhi viṣaya bhedaḥ bhavet sa hi ātma manaa āśrayaḥ jñānam ca artha viṣayam iti śaṅkate tāvat saṃyoge tu iti phalayoḥ antena pariharati na iti kāraṇam āha arthe hi iti asya arthaḥ yadi api ātma mana ssambandhaḥ na artha āśrayaḥ tathā api arthe vyāpriyate jñānam api tad viṣayam eva utpadyate iti vyāpārataḥ samāna viṣaya tvam iti 
ŚVK_4.67–4.69	 atha punar āśrayaḥ viṣayaḥ abhipretaḥ tad ubhayoḥ api ātma stha tvāt sutarām samāna viṣaya tvam iti āha atha api iti ayam eva ātma mana ssaṃyogaḥ jñāna utpatteḥ pratyāsanna tayā kāraka antarebhyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ iti ayam eva pramāṇam iti āha prakṛṣṭa sādhana tvāt iti sarva saṃyoga pramāṇa pakṣe api pūrva ukta samasta doṣa parihāraḥ anusandhātavyaḥ iti āha pramāṇaḥ iti indriya prāmāṇya pakṣe api tasya artha prāptyā jñānasya ca tad viṣaya tvena sphuṭam viṣaya sāmyam iti āha pramāṇam iti 
ŚVK_4.70	 evam tāvat indriya ādi prāmāṇya pakṣe pramāṇa phalayoḥ viṣaya sāmyam uktam idānīm jñāna prāmāṇya pakṣe api evam eva darśayitavyam iti āha pramāṇa iti sarva savikalpaka jñānāni viśeṣaṇa jñāna pūrvakāṇi yathā daṇḍī ayam gauḥ ayam śuklaḥ ayam gacchati ayam ḍitthaḥ ayam iti tat iha viśeṣaṇa jñānam pramāṇam viśeṣya jñānam ca phalam viśeṣya jñāna siddhi artha tvāt ca viśeṣaṇa jñānasya tatra api vyāpārataḥ samāna viṣaya tvam iti 
ŚVK_4.71	 yadā tu viśeṣaṇam eva boddhavyam pramitsitam bhavati tadā tarhi kaḥ pramāṇa phalayoḥ vivekaḥ katham vā samāna viṣaya tvam atas āha viśeṣaṇe tu iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ tatra api vijñāna dvayam upalabhyate ālocana ajñānam hi tatra viśeṣaṇe niścayam prasūte tādarthyāt ca samāna viṣaya tvam iti vivekaḥ iti 
ŚVK_4.72	 ālocana ajñāna mātra paryavasāne tarhi kaḥ vivekaḥ atas āha niścayaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ālocana ajñāne api hi tat idam iti pratyabhijñāna ātmakam īdṛśaḥ ayam iti vā niścaya ātmakam jñāna antaram śabda yojana aśūnyam asti eva yathā tiraścām anyeṣām vā asmṛta śabdānām vācaka rahitam asādhāraṇam vastu pratipadyamānānām atas asti eva jñāna dvaya pradarśanāt pramāṇa phala vivekaḥ yadā punar ālocite arthe niścayaḥ na jāyate eva tadā pramāṇa tvam eva na asti iti āha na asau iti artha avadhāraṇa phala tvāt pramāṇa tvasya tasya ca tadānīm abhāvāt iti
