ŚVK_5.1	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa pratyakṣa ādi a nimitta tve pratipādite sat uplambhaka pramāṇa pratyasta mayāt abhāva prameya tām dharmasya āśaṅkya tad nirākaraṇa para tayā autpattika sūtram avatāritam abhāvaḥ api na asti yatas autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ tasya jñānam upadeśaḥ avyatirekaḥ ca arthe anupalabdhe tad pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti tat ca codanā eva iti avadhāraṇam ca ākṣipati pratyakṣa ādau iti ayam arthaḥ bhāva gocara nikhila pramāṇa abhāve hi abhāvaḥ pramāṇam na ca iha tathā loka prasiddheḥ eva abhāvāt na ca sā na pramāṇam brāhmaṇa ādi varṇa vivekasya tad adhīna tvāt itarathā tad abhāvāt na khalu su nipuṇam api vilokayamānāḥ vayam kṣatriya ādi vilakṣaṇam brāhmaṇa śabda vācyam piṇḍa anugatam aparam rūpam aparokṣam īkṣāmahe tat avaśyam varṇa vivekāya loka prasiddhiḥ svatantrā pramāṇam āstheyāḥ api ca sakala śabda artha avadhāraṇam eva tadāyattam tām antareṇa pramāṇa antara asambhavāt atas niṣiddhe api pratyakṣa ādau na abhāva śaṅkā na ca codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa upapattiḥ iti 
ŚVK_5.3	 prasiddhim eva darśayati dhārmikā iti hi antena anugraha kāriṇi hi laukikāḥ dhārmika śabdam prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante pīḍā kāriṇi ca adhārmika śabdam yaḥ ca dharmam ācarati sa dhārmikaḥ tat yadi anugrahaḥ dharmaḥ tat evam upapadyate na anyathā iti etat eva bhagavataḥ vyāsasya api abhimatam iti darśayati tathā iti prayojanam antena nirviṣaya prayoga asambhavāt tad viṣayam idamā pratinirdiśati tat ayam arthaḥ viśiṣṭa viṣaye puṇya pāpa pada dvaye ācaṇḍālam manuṣyāṇām vidyamāne tena eva dharma adharma pramiti siddheḥ anarthakam śāstram iti nanu evam puṇya pāpa pramāṇakau dharma adharmau uktau na loka pramāṇakau na evam tad prayogasya eva loka āyatta tvāt tasmāt ayam anupālambhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_5.4	 evam ākṣipya samādadhāti nirmūlā iti iti antena ayam arthaḥ prasiddhiḥ hi prajñānam tat ca jñāna draḍhimā na ca nirmūlam jñānam ātmānam labhate prāk eva jñāna draḍhimā tat evam nirmūlāyāḥ prasiddheḥ abhāvāt kutas sā pravṛttā iti pramāṇaiḥ anviṣyate iti nanu ca kārya draḍhimnā mūlam kalpayiṣyate smṛti draḍhimnā iva śrutiḥ atas āha pratyakṣa ādi iti satyam sa mūlā prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣa ādi mūla tayā pratyakṣa sūtre nivāritā codanā mūlam bhaviṣyati eva iti 
ŚVK_5.6	 nanu sannikṛṣṭa artha gocaram eva sarvam pramāṇam atas prasiddheḥ pramāṇa antara agocara artha tvam guṇaḥ na doṣāya atas āha na ca iti na ca pratyakṣa ādīni parityajya lokaḥ nāma pramāṇa gaṇe pramāṇam upasaṃkhyāyate varṇa viveka sambandha avadhāraṇayoḥ tu pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa tvam vana sambandha parihārayoḥ abhidhāsyāmaḥ iti api ca bhavet api prasiddhiḥ pramāṇam yadi vyavasthitā eva prasiddhiḥ syāt sā tu avyavasthitā tathā hi saṃsāramocakāḥ nāma nāstikāḥ bāhya hiṃsām eva dharmam āhuḥ anye tu tapaḥ prājāpatya ādi pīḍā ātmaka tvāt para pīḍā vat adharma stu vidhi niṣedha pramāṇakau tad viparītau dharma adharmau saṅgirante tat evam mleccha āryāṇām paraspara vigānāt na loka prasiddha tvam dharma adharmayoḥ upapadyate iti āha saṃsāra iti sārdhena 
ŚVK_5.7	 nanu anumāna ābhāsa saṅkareṇa pramāṇam apramāṇībhavati na hi pratyakṣa ābhāsa saṅkarāt pratyakṣam apramāṇam bhavati atha tatra kāraṇa doṣa sadasadbhāva nibandhanaḥ pramāṇa tad ābhāsa vivekaḥ saḥ atra api aviśiṣṭaḥ atra api smṛti kāraiḥ viveka upāyaḥ darśitaḥ eva ācāraḥ ca eva sādhūnām ityādinā sādhavaḥ ca āryāḥ svābhāvika kṛṣṇa mṛga caraṇa upalakṣita ārī āvarta nivāsinaḥ ca ārya śabda vācyāḥ atas tad ācāraḥ dharmaḥ anyaḥ adharmaḥ iti vivekaḥ bhaviṣyati atas āha na ca iti śāstra sat asadbhāva nibandhanaḥ hi ārya mleccha vibhāgaḥ tad anāśrayeṇa tu ārya mleccha vibhāgaḥ durbhaṇaḥ atas eva śāstra sthā vā tad nimitta tvāt iti vakṣyati iti astu tarhi śāstra mūla artha prasiddhiḥ pramāṇam atas āha tad mūlā iti na svatantrāyāḥ prasiddheḥ eva prāmāṇyam sidhyati iti abhiprāyaḥ 
ŚVK_5.8–5.9	 atas sakala bhāva pramāṇa nirākaraṇāt śaṅkita abhāva nirākaraṇena codanā eva dharma adharmayoḥ pramāṇam iti upapannam iti āha tasmāt iti paśyatām iti ṣaṣṭhī ca anādare iti anādare ṣaṣṭhī iti atra bhāṣya kāreṇa aupattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ tasya agnihotra ādi lakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittam iti uktvā katham iti praśna anantaram upadeśaḥ hi bhavati iti sautram upadeśa padam vyākhyātam tatra na jñāyate kena asya sambandhaḥ iti yogya pada anvayam darśayati upadeśaḥ iti tasya dharmasya upadeśaḥ jñānam pramāṇam iti nanu upadeśaḥ grantha sandarbha ātmā jñānam ca artha avagrahaḥ katham anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam atas āha jñāyate iti bhāva sādhanaḥ hi jñāna śabdaḥ na upadeśa śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam labhate ayam tu jñāyate anena iti karaṇa sādhanaḥ iti yuktam sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti 
ŚVK_5.10	 katham punar upadeśaḥ dharme pramāṇam atas āha autpattikā iti bādha kāraṇa doṣa adhīnam hi aprāmāṇyam tatra sambandha autpattika tva pratipādanena tad dvārā puruṣa anupraveśa abhāvāt puruṣa āśraya tvāt ca śabde doṣāṇām kāraṇa doṣa nivāraṇam tāvat kṛtam tad nirākaraṇena saha aprāmāṇyam anapoditam iti avyatireka pada prayojanam āha abādhaḥ iti avyatireka padena ābādhaḥ pratipādyate na hi deśa kālayoḥ ubhayoḥ api codanā janitam jñānam viparyeti iti tat evam bādha kāraṇa doṣa nirākaraṇe kṛte anapoditam autsargikam prāmāṇyam iti tat pramāṇam iti anena uktam iti darśayati svatas iti 
ŚVK_5.11^1	 atra ca arthe anupalabdhaḥ iti ucyate tat ayuktam upalabdha artha viṣayam api pramāṇam bhavati eva anubhūtiḥ hi pramāṇam pratyutpanna indriya liṅga ādi janitā ca saṃvid anubhūtiḥ atas eva unmīlita akṣasya eka bhāva gocarāṇām dhārāvāhika saṃvidām prāmāṇyam upapannam bhavati anyathā tat na syāt na hi tatra anavagatam kiñcid anubhūyate deśa kāla antara sambandhaḥ anubhūyate iti ced na eka deśa sthe api bhāvāt kālaḥ tu parokṣaḥ na ca parokṣa aparokṣa sambandhaḥ aparokṣaḥ bhavati taru marut saṃyoga vat atas avagata artham anadhika artham api grahaṇam iti vācyam 
ŚVK_5.11^2	 na ca evam smṛtitva āpātaḥ smṛtiḥ hi pūrva anubhava prabhāvita bhāva nāvaśa labdha siddhiḥ na adhikam apekṣate na indriya sāpekṣam iti uktam atas eva gṛhītam api punar gṛhyamāṇam dṛśyate iti laukikāḥ vyapadiśanti na tu smaryate iti atas na vidmaḥ kim arthe anupalabdhaḥ iti anena nirasyate iti atas āha sarvasya iti ayam arthaḥ anupalabdha artha viṣayam eva sarvam pramāṇam anyathā smṛti tva āpātāt na hi grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ gṛhīta agṛhīta gocarayoḥ gṛhīta agṛhīta gocara gataḥ viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate yat tu kāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ iti uktam satyam sva rūpa bheda aupayikaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ 
ŚVK_5.11^3	 svarūpam tu gṛhīta agṛhīta viṣaya tvāt eva bhinnam anubhūtiḥ grahaṇam iti ced yadi api saḥ anubhūtiḥ anumāna ādiṣu smṛti tva prasaṅgaḥ atas aavaśyam gṛhīta agṛhīta agocara tvam eva grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ bhedaḥ kim idānīm dhārāvāhika saṃvidaḥ na pramāṇam na hi kā ktam atra ucyate tatra api uttarottara kāla ākalita bhāva pratyākalanāt upapannam eva adhika gantṛ tayā prāmāṇyam na ca vaiśeṣika ādi vat parokṣam kālam ācakṣmahe pratyakṣam eva hi vartamāna kāla sambandhān bhāvān upalabhāmahe katham arūpam pratyakṣam iti ced ākāśa vat bhaviṣyati 
ŚVK_5.11^4	 na hi rūpi pratyakṣam iti naḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam api tarhi saṃvid eva parokṣa aparokṣa nirbhāsa udīyamānā idam pratyakṣam idam apratyakṣam iti vibhajate tat evam visphārita akṣasya vyakta anupalakṣita uttara uttara sūkṣma kṣaṇa bheda bhinna eka bhāvavi kā aparokṣa nirbhāsa avabhāsā udayāt upapannā pratyakṣatā pramāṇa tā ca atas pramāṇa antara anupalabdha sva gocara pratyākalanāt upapannam upadeśa prāmāṇyam iti sūktam arthe anupalabdhaḥ iti atra bhāṣyam upadeśaḥ iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasya uccāraṇam iti tatra codanā vidhi pada paryāyaḥ śabda viśeṣaḥ bhāṣya kārasya abhimataḥ iti āha codanā iti etat uktam bhavati vidhāyaka śabdaḥ upadeśaḥ iti 
ŚVK_5.13^1	 atra codayati vākya antaraḥ iti dvayena ayam arthaḥ yat idam śabda viśeṣasya vidheḥ dharme pramāṇa tvam āśritam anena vākya antaram api hivartamāna upadeśakam dharma pramitau pramāṇam eva śreyaḥ sādhanam hi dharmaḥ sa ca śreyasaḥ svarga ādeḥ sādhanena yāga ādinā sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ sarva ākhyāteṣu sambhavati svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atas api hi yāgena svargaḥ sidhyati iti gamyate eva yathā loke odanam pacati iti pāka odanayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha buddhiḥ syāt etat ākhyātam antareṇa sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ na siddhyet tad arthaḥ vidhiḥ iti tat na anākhyāta vākya prayoga asambhavāt prayojanāya hi vākyam uccāryate nirākāṅkṣam ca vacaḥ prayojana kṣamam ākāṅkṣā nivartanam ca ākhyātāt ṛte na sambhavati 
ŚVK_5.13^2	 itarathāḥ vidheḥ api asambhavāt stutyā api hi ākhyātam eva khādira ādi vākyeṣu vidhāyakam parikalpyate atha ucyeta anuṣṭhitaḥ yāga ādiḥ dharmaḥ na ca anuṣṭhānam pravartakāt ṛte sambhavati na ca vidhim antareṇa anyaḥ pravartayati iti tat na icchā nibandhana tvāt pravṛtteḥ aniṣṭeṣu vidhi śatena api apravṛtteḥ atas anena idam sidhyati iti saṃvidi vā upāya arthī sa tatra pravartate iti na ca adharma varjana arthaḥ vidhiḥ pratiṣedhāt eva nañaḥ tad siddheḥ rāga ādi prāpta kartavyatā anuvādena nan eva niṣedha adhikāre nivartakaḥ eṣā hi tatra vacana vyaktiḥ yat hanyāt tat na iti atas anarthakaḥ vidhi prāmāṇya pratipādana prayāsaḥ apauruṣeyaḥ śabdaḥ dharme pramāṇam iti etāvat eva vacanīyam iti 
ŚVK_5.14	 pariharati vidhau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam icchātaḥ pravṛttiḥ icchā eva tu prekṣāvatām puruṣa artha sādhana viṣayāḥ na ca vidhinā vinā puruṣa artha sādhana tvam yāga ādīnām śakyate avagantum atas eva audumbara ādīnām sati api phala pada sambandhe vidhi virahāt phala artha tvam na iti audumbara adhikaraṇe vakṣyate nanu laukika pāka odana ādi vat sādhya sādhana sambandha siddhiḥ uktāḥ satyam uktāḥ ayuktā sā loke pramāṇa antara avagateḥ sidhyati api na tu vede pramāṇa antara abhāvāt nanu svarga kāma pada samabhivyāhāraḥ pramāṇam na tasya śrutyā bādhāt iha hi yajate iti sādhya ākāṅkṣiṇī bhāvanā avagatā satī samāna pada upādāna śruti upanītayaḥ rdhātu artha sambandha nirākāṅkṣā satī na vyavahita kartṛ viśeṣaṇa tva upayukta svarga ādi bhāvya sambandham anubhavati sannikṛṣṭa alābhe hi viprakrṣṭaḥ api vaidikaḥ bhavati na sannikṛṣṭaḥ  cyate labhyate ca iha dhātu arthaḥ sannikṛṣṭaḥ iti na viprakṛṣṭa phala pada sambandhaḥ yuktaḥ iti 
ŚVK_5.15.1	 kṛti vidhau tarhi katham puruṣa artha sādhya siddhiḥ atas āha vidhau iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ vidhiḥ hi cetana pravartana ātmaka arthe phale vyāpāre śakyate puruṣam pravartayitum atas samāna pratyaya upātta vidhi avaruddhā bhāvanā vidheḥ pravartana aśaktiḥ mā vyāghāni iti sannihitam api apuruṣa artha tva ādayaḥ rvam atikramya vyavahitena api puruṣa arthena svarga ādinā sādhyena sambadhyate dhātvarthaḥ tu sādhya tvāt pracyāvitaḥ bhāvanāyām eva sādhana ākāṅkṣiṇyām sādhana tayā niva tamāvākya arthaḥ bhavati yāgena svargam kuryāt iti atas puruṣa artha sādhanasya yāga ādeḥ dharma tva siddhiḥ iti yuktam upadeśa prāmāṇya pratipādanam iti 
ŚVK_5.15.2^1	 idam tu iha vaktavyam kārya vidhau puruṣa arthaḥ sādhyaḥ labhyate vidhiḥ hi śabda bhedaḥ vā liṅā ādiḥ tad vyāpāra atiśayaḥ vā kaḥ api tad artha bhedaḥ vā sarvathā ca na yujyate śabde hi pravartayitari puruṣa artha sambandhe pramāṇam asti āpte hi buddhi pūrva kāriṇi pravartake hita kārī ayam mām aphale na pravartayati iti buddhvā bhavati pravṛtti viṣaya vyāpāra phala vat tā adhyavasāyaḥ śabdaḥ tu acetanaḥ na asmin pravartayati api puruṣa artha phala pratilambhaḥ na hi prabala pavana abhihataḥ avaṭe nipatat phalam pratilabhate api ca pramāṇam śabdaḥ pramāṇānām prameya upadarśanāt anyatra vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣam hi rūpa ādīn upadarśayati na tu pravartayati tredhā hi prāmāṇikāḥ pramāṇa phalam vibhajante hānam upādānam upekṣā ca iti tat idam pramāṇānām pravartaka tve na upapadyate 
ŚVK_5.15.2^2	 tadā hi upādānam eva ekam pramāṇa phalam āpadyeta kaṇṭaka pratyakṣeṇa hi kaṇṭakeṣu pravartyamānaḥ jihāsan api tān mṛdnīyāt syāt etat śabda pramāṇa dharmaḥ ayam na pramāṇa antarāṇām iti na pramāṇa tva aviśeṣāt evam hi prayogaḥ bhavati śabdaḥ na pravartakaḥ pramāṇa tvāt pratyakṣa ādi vat astu vā pravartakaḥ niyamena pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ na ca liṅā ādi śrāviṇaḥ niyamena pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante prathama śrutāt apravṛtteḥ avidita samaya tvāt apravṛttiḥ iti ced kim idānīm sambandha saṃvid apekṣayā yadi śabdaḥ pravṛtteḥ kārakaḥ na hi kārakāṇi svarūpa saṃvidam api apekṣante mṛd salila pracchannam hi bījam avidita svarūpa sāmarthyam api sva kāryam aṅkuram ārabhamāṇam dṛṣṭam evam eva śabda vyāpāraḥ vidhiḥ iti api nirasanīyam 
ŚVK_5.15.3^1	 syāt matam abhidheyaḥ eva liṅā ādīnām vyāpāraḥ vidhiḥ atas na pūrva ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti na anirūpaṇāt sa khalu preṣaṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vā syāt anyaḥ vā na tāvat preṣaṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ śabde sambhavati acetana tvāt na ca anyaḥ tad samartha ācaraṇa lakṣaṇaḥ tasya kārīṣa ādi vat anirūpaṇāt kārīṣasya hi vahneḥ śīta apanodanaḥ adhyayane dṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ na śabde tathā sambhavati pramāṇa antara abhāvāt śabdasya ca agṛhīta sambandhasya apratyāyaka tvāt yadi brūyāt vyāpāra antara kalpane syāt ayam doṣaḥ kptaḥ eva tu liṅā ādīnām abhidhā abhidhāna lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ śabda antarāṇām iva sva artha prakāśanāni atha anupapatti pramāṇakaḥ pravṛtti hetu tva pratilabdha pravartana apara nāmā vidhiḥ iti pratibrūyāt enam 
ŚVK_5.15.3^2	 sa khalu vyāpāra bhedaḥ abhidheyaḥ vā syāt anabhidheyaḥ vā syāt anabhidheye aśabdāḥ syabhāvanā samabhivyāhāra anupapattiḥ kiñ ca sarva śabdānām eva anumānena sva artha gocaraḥ vyāpāraḥ unnīyate na ca tathā avagataḥ pravṛtti hetu bhāva pārāḥ pravartayanti iti ced viśeṣa hetuḥ vācyaḥ yadi artha viśeṣa gocara tā viśeṣa hetuḥ sa tarhi artha bhedaḥ vidhiḥ tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt pravṛ vartha bhedaḥ yadi bhāvanā na tasyāḥ vartamāna apadeśeṣu api aviśeṣāt anyaḥ ced na enam upalabhāmahe pramāṇa abhāvāt abhidhīyate eva liṅa ādibhiḥ ātmīyam abhidhānam iti ced sarva śabdebhyaḥ pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ śakyate vārayitum 
ŚVK_5.15.3^3	 na ca kārya unneyam abhidhānam abhidhīyate iti sāmpratam ananya labhyam hi śabda abhidheyam upāgaman dhīrāḥ kiñ ca yadi vyāpāra svarūpa abhidhānam sa pravartaka tva prasaṅgaḥ sa upaśleṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced na svarūpa abhidhāna prasakteḥ na hi anabhidhāya viśeṣaṇam viśeṣya abhidhānam sambhavati apicā abhidha abhidhāna abhyupagamena paḥ viśeṣa hetoḥ abhāvāt astu tarhi artha bhedaḥ vidhiḥ kaḥ kāryam kim punar kāryam kāryam eva hi kāryam na hi idam rūpa antareṇa anubhūyate nanu na kriyā atireki kāryam pramāṇa antaraiḥ avagamyate satyam atas eva śabda prāmāṇya siddhiḥ anyathā pramāṇa antara gocara tvena sa apekṣa tvāt aprāmāṇyam codanāyāḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.3^4	 api ca kāla traya viparivṛtti artha gocarāṇi māna antarāṇi kāryam ca parāmṛṣṭa kāla bhedam sva pramāṇāt avagamyate iti na pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ hi yāga ādiḥ kāla traya avacchedyaḥ na adhikāraḥ yadi evam asat kāryam kāla traya aparāmarśāt śaśa viṣāṇa vat āpadyeta na kālena anekāntāt kālaḥ hi na tāvat kāla antara paricchinnaḥ na ca na asti kālaḥ kāla antara avacchede tu anavasthāpātaḥ alabdha kāla antara sambandhaḥ api kālaḥ pramāṇa sāmarthyāt asti iti ced samānam hi kārye api tat api sva pramāṇebhyaḥ liṅā ādi śabdebhyaḥ kālān avacchinnam avagamyamānam katham asat bhaviṣyati pramāṇa sambandhaḥ hi sattā na kāla sambandhaḥ kāryam eva tu manasi vartamānam niyuṅktaḥ iti niyogaḥ iti ucyate 
ŚVK_5.15.4^1	 nanu niyogaḥ niyuktiḥ sa ca niyoktṛ vyāpāraḥ na ca vede niyoktā asti apauruṣeya tvāt śabdasya ca aniyoktṛ tvāt na tad vyāpāraḥ niyogaḥ adūra viprakarṣeṇa tu niyoga ādi pada prayogaḥ yāthātmya vedanāyām tu liṅ eva paṭhitavyaḥ sā hi asya pramāṇam kim ātmakaḥ tarhi ayam uktam kārya ātmā iti na ca dravya ādi anā ātmaka tvāt abhāvaḥ tadvat eva kāryam api tad vibhaktam eva deśa kāla nara avastha antara aviparyayāt sva saṃvid saṃvedyam na asti iti śakyate avagantum udīyate khalu api liṅā ādi śrāviṇām kārya saṃvid na ca iyam anālambanā na ca sva aṃśa ālambanā iti vijñāna vāde varṇitam atas nirviṣayā saṃvid ātmānam alabhamānā sva viṣaya bhūtam kāryam upakalpayati 
ŚVK_5.15.4^2	 na ca pratibhā mātram idam iti vācyam aniyata nimittā hi pratipattiḥ pratibhā na ca iyam aniyata nimittāḥ śabda nimitta tvāt tad anantaram utpatteḥ katham ananya gocare kārya ātmani vyutpattiḥ tad abhāve vā śabdāt pratipattiḥ kalpyatām liṅā ādīnām sakala itara śabda vilakṣaṇaḥ kaḥ api mahimā yat avidita samayāḥ api sva artham gamayanti athavā sarvasya akumāram āsthaviram ca kārya avagatiḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ iti prasiddhiḥ tad anyam api liṅā ādi śabda śravaṇa anantaram ceṣṭā viśiṣṭam upalabhya akalayati nūnam itas sakāśāt asya kārya saṃvid āsīt katham aparathā pravartate iti nanu evam kriyām eva kārya tayā ajñāsīt iti parasya api tad gocarām eva kārya dhiyam unnayati na 
ŚVK_5.15.4^3	 vartamāna apadeśeṣu sati api kriyā jñāne pravṛtti adarśanāt kriyā ātmanaḥ kāryasya vyabhicārāt pravṛttau= ahetutvāt etat eva phale api darśayitavyam atas nirmukta akhila phala ādi vikalpam avyabhicarita pravṛtti sambandham kārya mātram liṅa ādibhyaḥ prayojya vṛddhena avagatam iti vyutpadyamānaḥ jānāti na hi kārya avagatiḥ bhavati pravṛttiḥ ca na iti sambhavati atas kāryam eva kārya vidhiḥ iti ācāryāḥ pratipedire nanu ca preṣaṇa ādayaḥ liṅarthāḥ na sva santāne pravṛtti hetu tvena teṣām anupalabdheḥ vede ca vyabhicārāt nanu tarhi iṣṭa abhyupāya tā liṅā ādīnām arthaḥ bhaviṣyati sarvaḥ hi samīhita upāyam ākalayya tatra tatra pravartate iti param api ceṣṭamānam upalabhya jānāti nūnam iṣṭaḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.4^4	 mavya apāraḥ śabda śravaṇa anantaram ca ayam ceṣṭataḥ iti śabdena iṣṭā abhyupāya tā pratipāditā bhavati saḥ eva vidhiḥ pravartanā rūpaḥ hi saḥ pravṛtti hetum dharmam ca pravadanti atas preṣaṇa adhyeṣaṇa abhyanujñātiriktam apravṛtta pravartanam niyojya artha karma gocaram loka vedasādhāraṇam codana upadeśa paryāya pada vācyam liṅā ādīnām arthaḥ vidhiḥ iti yuktam hi tya jaimininā uktam upadeśaḥ iti bhāṣya kāreṇa ca upadeśaḥ iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasya uccāraṇam iti vivṛtam puruṣa artha upāyam kila anavagatam avagamayan śabda antare dūram utkrṣṭaḥ liṅā ādi śabdaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ iti uktam atas loka veda tantra antara anugataḥ ayam eva siddhānte iti kaiḥ cit unnītam 
ŚVK_5.15.5^1	 tat idam anupapannam tathā hi saṃvid eva tāvat paripanthinī na hi liṅā ādi śravaṇa samanantaram iṣṭa abhyupāyaḥ ayam vyāpāraḥ iti bhavati matiḥ api tarhi pravartana avagatiḥ nanu ceṣṭā abhyupāya tā eva pravartanā pravṛtti hetu tvāt tat na evam sati yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti atra api vidhi tva prasaṅgaḥ tarati mṛtyum iti atra api bhavati hi tatra api parṇa maya tā apāpa śloka śravaṇasya aśvamedhaḥ vā brahmahatyā taraṇasya sādhanam iti pratipattiḥ yadi matam asya idam bhavati iti anvaya mātram atra avagamyate na vyatirekaḥ na ca tam antareṇa sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ avagamyate iti katham tarhi svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra api svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana saṃvid na hi tatra api sati yoge svargaḥ bhavati asati na iti matiḥ yāgena iti hi tṛtīyā sādhana bhāvam avagamayati iti ced na tṛtīyā śravaṇāt 
ŚVK_5.15.5^2	 vidheḥ ayam mahimā yat atṛtīya antaḥ api yajiḥ karaṇa tayā nirdiśyate sa ced anyaḥ na abhyupagamyate katham svabhāva sādhyaḥ yajiḥ karaṇa tayā nirdiśyate api ca yatra spaṣṭam iṣṭa abhyupāya tvam avagamyate yāgasya yatheṣṭa abhyupāyaḥ ayam yāgaḥ yāgena svargaḥ sidhyati iti vā tatra api vidhi tva prasaṅgaḥ kiñ ca tat dveṣī iti tad kāri ca ayam evam bruvāṇaḥ dṛśyate tathā hi pratibhā vidhiḥ iti nirasyata etat uktam na nirālambanam jñānam kriyā sādhana yoginī samāni asmin iti tat idam tava api samānam iti varṇitam api ca evaṃvādinā sādhu samarthitam vidhau anāśrite iti atra hi vidhi adhīnā yāga ādeḥ iṣṭa abhyupāya tā na tu sā eva vidhiḥ iti darśayati tasmāt ati kuśalaiḥ upadeśa apadeśayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ eva upapāditaḥ iti nirmukta akhila upādhi vidhi tattvam atīndriyam anyat eva iti pūrva uktam eva sādhīyaḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.6^1	 atra vadāmaḥ na evam api yāga svargayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha siddhiḥ niyogaḥ hi tadā sādhyaḥ na ca sādhya dvayam ekatra samavaiti sama tvāt asambandhāt nanu niyoga siddhinā antarīyakī svarga siddhiḥ atas eva sādhya vivṛddhiḥ iyam na tu svargaḥ api svatantra tayā sādhyaḥ nirapekṣam ca sādhya dvayam ekatra virudhyate na anuguṇam yathā āha niyoga siddhau sarvam tad anuguṇam iti kena na iṣyate tasmāt avirodhaḥ iti tat asat kim hi svarga siddhim antareṇa niyogasya na sidhyati na hi nitya adhikāreṣu niyogaḥ sādhya antaram ākāṅkṣati kāma adhikārāḥ kāmya paryantāḥ iti ced kaḥ hetuḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.6^2	 kami sādhya tva āgavatiḥ tathā hi svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti sādhya svarga viśiṣṭa adhikāri sādhyaḥ niyogaḥ avagamyate sa katham asidhyati svarge sidhyet atas svarga siddhiḥ avagamyate iti naḥ sādhya svarga viśiṣṭaḥ adhikārī kaḥ tarhi kāmya svarga viśiṣṭaḥ atas svargam kāmayamānaḥ puruṣaḥ niyogam sādhayiṣyati anyat icchataḥ anyatra kriyā na upapadyate iti ced na niyoga sāmarthyāt upapatteḥ niyogaḥ hi pradhāna bhūtaḥ sādhya tayā avagataḥ svargam api kāmayamānam ātmani ākarṣati iti kim anupapannam api ca sidhyan api svargaḥ yāgāt sidhyati iti na naḥ pramāṇam 
ŚVK_5.15.6^3	 svarga yāgau hi yugapad aruṇa eka hāyanīvat eka pradhāna kārya anvayinau na anyonya anvayam anubhavataḥ na ca aruṇimnaḥ iva dravya avacheda śaktiḥ yajeḥ api svarga sādhana śaktiḥ avadhṛtā pramāṇa antareṇa nanu kim atra pramāṇa antareṇa svarge yāgaḥ eva pramāṇam sa hi svarga kāmam yāge niyuṅkte na ca akāma upāye kāmī niyoktum śakyate ukta uttaram idam kim hi bhagavataḥ niyogasya alaukikasya asadṛśa mahimnaḥ duḥkha tayā phale api naram pravartayati tasya hi anupāye kāminam niyuñjānasya kim iva hīyeta yāge niyogaḥ niyuṅkte iti vadatā nūnam idam avadhīritam 
ŚVK_5.15.6^4	 ārambhe hi puruṣaḥ niyujyate na karmaṇi iti tasmāt na svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha siddhiḥ yat api ca kriyā ādi kārye vyabhicārāt anupādhike vyutpattiḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam pratīta viṣaya tvāt vyutpatteḥ na hi kriyā ādi vyabhicārāt śaśaviṣāṇam liṅā ādi arthaḥ iti śakyate vaktum yat api manyate kriyā kāryaḥ eva loke vyutpannaḥ phala sama bhivyāhārāt vede anyat avināśi kāryam liṅā ādi arthaḥ iti pratyeṣyate loke tu saṃmugdhena api vyavahāra siddheḥ na śabda artha tattva nirūpaṇam bahavaḥ eva gauṇala akṣaṇika śabda nibandhanāḥ loke vyavahārāḥ dṛśyante 
ŚVK_5.15.6^5	 vede tu svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti kriyā ātmanaḥ kāryasya bhaṅgura tvāt āmuṣmika svarga ādi phala sādhana aśakteḥ kāla antara sthāyi kriyā atas bhinnam kāryam upeyate vākya śeṣāt ca ekatra samunnītaḥ śabda arthaḥ yava varāha ādi arthavat anyatra asati api vākya śeṣe avagamyate nitya adhikāreṣu asati api phala pada samabhivyāhāre tathāvidham eva kāryam liṅā ādīnām arthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tat idam anyat eva abhyastam anyat ca upanipatitam kriyā kārye sthāyi kāryam pratipadyate na ca kriyāyāḥ phala sādhana tā śakteḥ aśabda arthaḥ san yuktaḥ kalpayitum 
ŚVK_5.15.6^6	 kāmam karmaṇaḥ eva aphala niṣpatteḥ samasti rūpam iti kalpayitum ucitam na ca pūrva avagata śabda arthānyatha akaraṇam na hi karmaṇi anuśiṣṭā dvitīyā saktuṣu tad asambhavāt viparivartya karaṇam abhidhattaḥ iti yuktam abhidhātum sarva śabdeṣu anāśvāsa praṅgāt atas eva tatra tatra yathāśruta artha samanvaya anupapatteḥ kvacid guṇavādaḥ kvacid lakṣaṇā kvacid viniyoga bhaṅgaḥ iti tantre vyavahāraḥ na tu viniyoga bhaṅgāt abhidhānam eva śabdānām anyathā nīyate api ca śrutakarma phala sambandha anupapatteḥ anavagata pūrvam apūrvam kāryam liṅartham upayatā sādhu śrutam upapāditam 
ŚVK_5.15.6^7	 kim hi liṅā aparāddham yat tasya alaukikam artham atikramya karma phala sambandhaḥ upapādyate nanu na adya api liṅarthaḥ niścīyate ayam eva hi nirṇaya samayaḥ atra ca śruta phala pada antara samabhivyāhāra upapattaye atīndriyam eva kāryam iti niścīyate atas na kiñcid virotsyate iti kim idānīm svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śruteḥ apratītiḥ eva liṅarthe saṃśayaḥ vā apratītau kriyā ātmanaḥ kāryasya phala sambandha anupapattiḥ iti etat eva durbhaṇam saṃśayaḥ tu pakṣa dvaya avalambī na ca ālaukike kriyā atirekiṇi kārye liṅā ādayaḥ nirūpita prayogāḥ na ca atyanta aparidṛṣṭa apūrva artha gocaraḥ saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭa caraḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.6^8	 yava ādiṣu tu ārya mleccha prayoga nibandhanaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrva artha gocaraḥ saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ eva atas eva atra na vākya śeṣān nirṇayaḥ sandigdhe hi sa varṇitaḥ na ca liṅarthe saṃśayaḥ kin tu loke vyutpatti anusāreṇa kriyā ātmani eva kārye niścayaḥ yat api ucyate karma phala sambandha upapattaye anyat kāryam upalabhyate iti kena vā karma phala sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ na hi ayam vainiyogikaḥ niyogaḥ eva atra pramāṇam sa ced tad adhīna siddhiḥ duruttaram itaretara āśrayam siddhaḥ hi niyogaḥ viṣayībhūtasya bhāva arthasya karaṇa tām āha tad siddhyā ca niyoga ātma lābhaḥ iti alam anena api 
ŚVK_5.15.7^1	 yathāvārttikam anusandhāsyāmaḥ evam hi vārttika kṛtāḥ bhāva artha adhikaraṇe uktam liṅā ādi śabdānām puruṣam prati prayojaka vyāpāraḥ abhidhā ātmikāḥ bhāvanā vidhiḥ iti dve kila bhāvane mīmāṃsakāḥ saṅgirante śabda ātmikām artha ātmikām ca tatra artha ātmikā sarva ākhyāta sādhāraṇī svarga ādi phala dharmikā yāga ādi dhātu artha karaṇikā sva vākya prakaraṇāni aprakaraṇānārabhya vāda smṛti loka ācāra prāpta tat tat iti kartavya tāvatī tatra tatra sidhyati śabda ātmikā tu liṅa ādi śabdānām prayojakānām prayojya puruṣa karmikā abhidhā sambandha jñāna kāraṇika artha vāda udita prāśastyeti kartavya tāvatī iti vivecanīyam katham punar abhidhā śabda ātmikā śabda vyāpāraḥ hi saḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.7^2	 na vyāpāra tadvatoḥ anatibhedāt upapatteḥ dravyam eva hi pūrva avasthātaḥ pracyutam parām avasthām aprāptam pūrva aparībhūtam vyāpāra śabda vācyam katham liṅā ādīnām abhidhā puruṣa karmikā na hi te puruṣam abhidadhati bhāvanā vacana tvāt satyam bhāvanā eva taiḥ abhidhīyamānā na sva rūpa mātreṇa vartamāna apadeśa vat abhidhīyate kin tu kuryāt iti pravṛtti viṣaya tayā na ca śabda śaktayaḥ anuyoktum arhanti tathā hi liṅā ādi śravaṇa anantaram prayojya vṛddham ceṣṭamānam upalabhya tatas pravṛtti hetu pratyayaḥ prayojyasya avagamyate iti tāvat sarva vādi siddham avivādam pravṛtti hetu svarūpe tu bahudhā vivādaḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.7^3	 tatra kriyā phala ādīnām vyabhicārāt apravṛtti hetu tvāt pramāṇa antara agocare tu pravṛtti hetau vyutpatti asambhavāt karma phala sambandha anupapatteḥ ca sakala itara prakāra asambhavāt avivāda siddham abhidheya pratyaya bala unnīya māna svarūpam liṅā ādīnām abhidhānam eva pravṛtti hetuḥ iti sāmpratam sā ca pravartanā iti sthitam sā ca pravartyakarmikā pravartyaḥ ca puruṣaḥ iti yuktam puruṣa karma tvam abhidhāyāḥ liṅā ādi vyāpāraḥ api abhidheya pratyaya hetutvāt abhidhā iti ucyate puruṣam ca pravartayan pravartanā iti gīyate na ca sarva abhidhāsu prasaṅgaḥ śabda śakti vaicitryāt iti uktam śaktiḥ hi kārya darśana samadhigamyāḥ tat yatas pravṛtti darśanam tad vyāpāraḥ pravartanā pravṛtti hetu tvāt 
ŚVK_5.15.7^4	 na ca śabda antarebhyaḥ pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate iti na tad abhidhāyāḥ tathā tva prasaṅgaḥ yaḥ ca abhidhāyāḥ anabhidhāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ saḥ abhidhāna pakṣa abhyupagamena eva parihṛtaḥ yat tu kārya unneya tvāt anabhidhāna tvam uktam tat api ayuktam kim hi kāryam anupapadyamānam pravartanām avagamayati na tāvat bhāvanā avagatiḥ vartamāna apadeśeṣu api prasaṅgāt atas ananya pramāṇa tvāt upapannam abhidheya tvam abhidhāyāḥ yat tu ananya pramāṇake vyutpatti asambhavaḥ iti uktam na arthāpatti pramāṇaka tvāt nanu arthāpattyā pravartana apadeśa sādhāraṇam abhidhāyāḥ rūpam unnīyate na ca tāvat mātram pravartanāḥ laḍa ādibhyaḥ api pravṛtti saṃvedana prasaṅgāt asādhāraṇaḥ tu kaḥ api viśeṣaḥ liṅpra vṛtteḥ pramāṇa antara agocaraḥ eva iti duṣpariharaḥ vyutpatti virahaḥ mā evam 
ŚVK_5.15.7^5	 pravṛtti hetu tvena arthāpattitaḥ tad avagamāt tathā hi yatra tāvat liṅa ādibhyaḥ pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate tatra mayā pravartitavyam iti antar saṅkalpa mūla ātmā liṅpra vṛtti viśeṣaḥ unnīyate apravartamānāḥ api pravartasva iti mām ayam āha iti liṅśrāviṇaḥ vaktāram nirdiśanti tat avasīyate pravṛtti hetuḥ abhihitaḥ liṅā sa ca na ṛte vāpārāt sidhyati iti uktam eva na ca kim ātmakaḥ liṅvyā pāra eti vācyam antar saṅkalpa mūla ātmā hi asau iti vakṣyati na asau udāsīnaḥ kadācid avagamyate pravṛtti jananaḥ eva hi bhāva bhede vyutpattiḥ āsīt iti svayam api pravartitavyam iti pratipadyamānaḥ eva hi liṅartham pratipadyate na udāsīnam ākhyāta antara vat no hi phala ādayaḥ svarūpeṇa avagatāḥ pravartayanti 
ŚVK_5.15.7^6	 asya tu ayam eva ātmā yat pravṛtti dhiyam janayati aparyanuyojya tvāt vastu svarūpāṇām nāma ākhyāta vibhāga vat upapatteḥ saḥ ayam evam ātmani liṅarthe vyutpannaḥ sva pratipatti kāle na śabdāt ṛte tam artham budhyate iti ananya pramāṇaka tvam na tu pravartana asvarūpam eva anyatas na avagatam yena mata antara vat vyutpatti virahaḥ codyeta samprati tu na jāteḥ iva vyaktim anyatas pravartanām pratipadyāmahe iti śābdīm abhidadhmahe na ca abhidhā na abhidhīyate iti vācyam abhidhā śabda vat upapatteḥ yat eva hi śabda śravaṇa anantaram ananya labhyam buddhau viparivartate tad abhidheyam tathā ca liṅā ādīnām abhidhānam iti kim na abhidhīyate uktam hi liṅa ādibhyaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ upalabhyate iti 
ŚVK_5.15.7^7	 na ca liṅā ādīnām abhidhā ātmanaḥ vyāpārāt anyaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ śakyate nirūpayitum iti atas eva na anavasthā na hi pravartanā vat tad abhidhānam api śabdāt avagamyate yat tad gocaram aparam abhidhānam upeyate na ca liṅā ādi svarūpa abhidhāna prasaktiḥ svayam eva tad vyāpāra vailakṣaṇyāt liṅupa śleṣe hi viśeṣake viśeṣaṇa abhidhānam āpāditam sva gate tu viśeṣe tad anavakāśam eva sarve śabda vyāpārāḥ khalu api sva rūpeṇa eva vyatibhidyante atas eva vilakṣaṇa abhidheya pratyaya hetu bhāva bhājaḥ ekasyāḥ api vidhi vibhakteḥ kriyā kāla ādi vat na abhidhā abhidhānam anupapannam atas liṅā ādīnām abhidhā pravartanā saḥ ayam vidhiḥ āha ca abhidhām bhāvanām āhuḥ anyām eva liṅa ādayaḥ 
ŚVK_5.15.7^8	 iti tat anena evam ātmanā vidhinā sambaddhā bhāvanā pravṛtti viṣaya tayā avagatā phalavat tayā niścīyate sva santāne phalavataḥ pravṛtti viṣaya tayā avagateḥ tathā ca avagatā anuṣṭhīyate iti vidhi śaktim upakrāntām avasīdantīm uttabhnāti phalavat tā na tu sā eva vidhiḥ iti atas eva apuruṣa artheṣu sāgaram taret iti evamādiṣu vidhi avagatiḥ tathā tatra na syāt itarathā tatra na syāt apuruṣa artha tvāt liṅvyā pāraḥ tu tatra api aviśiṣṭaḥ nirvāhikāyāḥ tu phalavat tāyāḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt na nirvahati tad abhāvaḥ ca anāpta vākya tvāt vede tu apauruṣeya tvāt na puruṣa doṣa āśaṅkā api iti upapāditam vidhau tu tam atikramya iti prapañcitaḥ ca vidhiḥ api manāk iti uparamyate iti 
ŚVK_5.16	 anapekṣa tvāt iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe sva pratyaya iti anāpta vākye hi dṛṣṭa vyabhicāri tvāt tad janitāt pratyayāt pratyaya antaram svīyam artha avadhāraṇāya apekṣate na ca tatra api anāpta vacaḥ pramāṇam anuvāda tvāt āpta uktīnām tu pramāṇa viṣaya gocarāṇām prāmāṇyāt tasya eva āptasya narasya apekṣā kim ayam arthaḥ anena pramāṇena upalabdhaḥ na vā iti na ca iyam ubhayī api apekṣā codanāṃsu sambhavati apauruṣeya tvasya veda adhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tatas upapannam codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iti 
ŚVK_5.17^1	 atra anantaram vṛtti kāra mata ārambha bhāṣyam vṛttiāraḥ tu anyathā imam grantham varṇayān cakāra tasya nimitta parīṣṭiḥ iti evamādim iti tatra ādi śabde tāvat dvaividhye sādhu asādhu viveka artham āha ādi śabdaḥ iti makāra antaḥ ayam ādi śabdaḥ na luṅante iti kāraṇam āha likī iti sāmānya vivakṣāyām tu napuṃsa kaliṅga tā atra ca prathamam eva grantha ātmake viśeṣe avagate na sāmānya vivakṣā yuktā iti bhittvā tu vākyam sāmānya vivakṣāyām kleśaḥ bhavati iti aparam api vṛtti kāra matena parīṣṭi sūtra vyākhyāna artham bhāṣyam na parīkṣitavyam nimittam iti tat ayuktam sūtre nañaḥ aśruta tvāt atas āha nan iti idam hi sūtram vidhi niṣedha śūnyam aparipūrṇam nañadhi āhāreṇa paripūryate 
ŚVK_5.17^2	 prasiddhasya dharma nimittasya parīkṣā vidheḥ ayogya tvāt iti vyākhyāte tu nañadhi āhāreṇa parīṣṭi sūtre pratyakṣa sūtram avatārayitum bhāṣya kṛta uktam nanu vyabhicārāt parīkṣitavyam nimittam śuktikā hi rajata vat prakāśate yatas iti evam hi atra paricoditam na prasiddha tvam nimitta aparīkṣāyām hetuḥ prasiddhatarasya pratyakṣasya śukti rajata vedane vyabhicārāt iti tat ayuktam na hi pratyakṣam vyabhicarati api tarhi tad ābhāsam na ca ābhāsa vyabhicāre pramāṇa vyabhicāra paricodanā yujyate atas āha saṅkarāt iti pratyakṣa tad ābhāsayoḥ akṣaja tvena sādṛśyāt mohāt ābhāsavyabhicāre api pratyakṣa vyabhicāram codayati iti 
ŚVK_5.18	 tat eva prapañcayati pramāṇa iti vakṣyamāṇa pāramārthika pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ajñānāt vyabhicārāt parīkṣā kāryā iti codayati etat paricodana uttara tayā pratyakṣa sūtram upavarṇitam na etat evam yat pratyakṣam na tat vyabhicarati yat vyabhicarati na tat pratyakṣam kim tarhi pratyakṣam tad samprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat viṣayam jñānam tena indriyāṇām puruṣasya samprayoge yat buddhi janma tat sat pratyakṣam na ca īdṛśasya vyabhicāraḥ asti tat idam vārttikakāraḥ darśayati na etat iti parīṣṭi sūtreṇa aparīkṣā pratijñātā pratyakṣa sūtreṇa upapādya upasaṃhṛtā iti 
ŚVK_5.19.1^1	 katham punar evaṃlakṣaṇake aparīkṣā sidhyati iti atas āha tatra iti tatra hi pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe yat anevaṃlakṣaṇakam tat ayathārtham pratyakṣam tu yathārtham eva ayathārtha āśaṅkā tu parīkṣāyām hetuḥ iti yuktam aparīkṣya tvam iti kim punar ayathārtha jñānam śuktau rajatam iti sā khalu doṣa vaśāt anya ākāreṇa avabhāsate iti bhavati tad gocara jñānam ayathārtham tat idam ayuktam na hi śuktiḥ rajatam iti bhāsate kim tarhi idam iti śukti rajata sādharaṇa ātmanā purovarti dravyam gṛhyate 
ŚVK_5.19.1^2	 anantaram ca sadṛśa darśana udbodhita prācīna rajata anubhava prabhāvita bhāvanā bīja janmā doṣa vaśāt lupta tad avamarśāḥ rajatam iti smṛtiḥ udeti tat ete dve eva grahaṇa smaraṇa ātmake vijñāne tad gocarayoḥ ca doṣa vaśāt eva bhedaka dharmān avadhāraṇam bheda agrahaṇāt eva vibhrama vyavahāraḥ na punar anyasya anyathā ābhāsanāt idam iha bhāsate iti pratīti sākṣikam atas katham rajata rūpa rūpitasya śuktiḥ ālambanam idam eva hi ālambanasya ālambana tvam yat ātma ākāra jñāna jananam atas na atad ākārasya tad ālambanam iti jñānam eva sa ākāram iti balāt āpatitam 
ŚVK_5.19.1^3	 na khalu rajatam iti śukteḥ ākāraḥ rajatam tu na asat nihitam akṣaja jñāna ālambanam iti yuktam atas bāhya rahitam nirālambanam eva jñānam iti balāt āpannam evan ca mudhā eva nirālambana anumāna pratyākhyāna prayāsaḥ api ca doṣa nibandhanaḥ vibhramaḥ doṣāḥ ca sva kārye śakti vighāta hetavaḥ atas yuktam tad vaśena bhedaka dharmānavadhāraṇam na punar anyasya anyathā bhānam api ca evam ayam viparīta khyāti vādī vaktavyaḥ rajata dhiyaḥ śukti gocarāyāḥ kim nibandhanam iti na tāvat indriyam prāpya kāri tvāt asat nihita rajata prāpti asambhavāt anya prāptau ca anya prakāśane ati prasaṅgāt pramāṇa antaram tu asambhavāt anupanyasanīyam atas grahaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt smṛtiḥ iyam iti niścīyate asti hi smṛteḥ kāraṇam pūrva anubhava prabhāvita ubhaya vādi siddhā bhāvanā nanu asati tad parāmarśe smaraṇam api na upapannam na na upapannam anubhūta viṣayam hi jñānam smṛtiḥ na tat iti parāmarśaḥ tasmāt idam rajatam iti grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yathārtha tvāt yathā artha ayatha artha jñāna vibhāgaḥ durbhaṇaḥ 
ŚVK_5.19.2^1	 atra vadāmaḥ yadi dve api ete yathārthe na tarhi bhrāntiḥ ayathārtha jñānam bhrāntiḥ iti laukikāḥ manyante smarāmi iti agrahaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ced tat na bhāṣya kāraḥ hi saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ iti pratyayam asamīcīnam darśayati api ca kaḥ ayam agrahaḥ grahaṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced abhāvaḥ nāma na kaścid āyuṣmatām yaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ucyate nanu smaraṇam eva smarāmi iti ullekha śūnyam agrahaṇam ācakṣmahe na tattva antaram evam tarhi rajatam iti smṛtiḥ bhrāntiḥ na ca tat yuktam mithyā bhrāntiḥ iti paryāyau na smṛtiḥ mithyā yathā avasthita artha viṣaya tvāt pūrva anubhūta deśa kāla āgrahaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ced 
ŚVK_5.19.2^2	 na anya anava bhāsaḥ avabhāsa antaram mithyā karoti sarva mithyā tva prasaṅgāt na hi ekasmin bhāsamāne sarvam bhāsate atas yadi api rajatasya deśa kālau na smaryete rajatam tu yathā avasthitam smṛtyā viṣayīkṛtam iti na bhrāntiḥ atha sa apekṣa tvāt smṛteḥ aprāmāṇyam atas bhrāntiḥ iti ced yadi evam sarva smṛtīnām bhrāntitva āpātaḥ aviśeṣāt na ca smaran bhrāmyati iti ucyate atha matam gṛhyamāṇa smaryamāṇayoḥ viveka āgrahaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti uktam asmābhiḥ na agrahaḥ nāma kaścid ṛte grahaṇa smaraṇābhyām tayoḥ ca na grahaṇam bhramaḥ pramāṇa tvāt na ca smṛtiḥ vyabhicārāt atiprasaṅgāt ca 
ŚVK_5.19.2^3	 viveka agrahe ca vibhrame sarva saṃvidām bhrānti tva prasaṅgaḥ avaśyam hi yena kenacid vivekaḥ na gṛhyate syāt matam vyavahāra visaṃvādaḥ mithyātvam iti tat na tad hetoḥ abhāvāt yadi khalu idam iti grahaṇam rajatam iti deśa kālān avacchinnam rajata smaraṇam kaḥ vyavahāra hetuḥ no khalu rajata padāt anadhiṣṭhānam rajatam smaran rajatam iti vyavaharati atra idam iti tad vidvān yaḥ yat arthī sa tad upāditsayā ceṣṭate anadhiṣṭhānam tu rajatam jānataḥ na vyavahāra hetum upalabhāmahe api ca kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ smṛta rajataḥ tad arthī śuktau eva pravartate iti 
ŚVK_5.19.2^4	 yadi hi ayam tām eva rajatam jānīyāt tatas tatra pravartate iti yuktam itarathāḥ loṣṭa ādau api pravarteta na hi ayam śukteḥ iva rajatam tatas api vivinakti avaśyam sthūlaḥ api vivekaḥ jighṛkṣataḥ na anubhūyate atha ucyeta jñāna dvayam api etat viveka agrahaṇāt satya rajata saṃvidaḥ bhinnam iti na avabhāsate sā ca vyavahāra hetu tayā avagatā tatas atra api pravartate iti aho durūham idam ūhitam idam tu brūmaḥ kim iha satya rajata saṃvidaḥ vivekaḥ na avabhāsate tad abhedaḥ vā bhāsate iti pūrvasmin kalpe pūrvavat pravṛtti abhāvaḥ uttarasmin viparīta khyāti vādaḥ saṃvittī bhinne abhinne bhāsete vastunī ca iti na viśeṣaḥ 
ŚVK_5.19.2^5	 atha satya rajata bodha tulya tām manyate na tattvam na tarhi tadvat bhāve tad vyavahāraḥ na hi gavā sadṛśam gavayam jānan gauḥ ayam iti vyavaharati vyavahāra visaṃvāde ca bhrānti hetau atad arthinaḥ vyavahāra abhāvāt bhrānti abhāvaḥ tasya api śabda prayogaḥ asti iti ced na nirvikalpaka bhrāntau tad adarśanāt svatantra smṛtam ca rajatam aprasaktam katham śuktau niṣidhyate na idam iti prāpti pūrvakaḥ hi pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati sa katham asatyām prāptau= ātmānam labhate nanu na atra kiñcid bādhyate kin tu anavagataḥ vivekaḥ avagamyate na idam rajatam iti kaḥ arthaḥ śukteḥ viviktam rajatam iti 
ŚVK_5.19.2^6	 aho vyākhyāna kauśalam tatrabhavatām yat saṃvidaḥ api anyathā vyavasthitāḥ anyathā vyākhyāyante rajata vyavahāraḥ bādhyate iti ced na tasya api aprasakteḥ ukta tvāt aprasakta vyavahārasya bādha viraha prasaṅgāt vyavahāra bādhaḥ api na rāja ājñayā api tarhi prasakta tā drūpya nivāraṇena atas anyat anya ākāreṇa prasaktam bādhyate iti sāmpratam api ca spaṣṭīkṛtā tādrūpya prasaktiḥ idam rajatam iti nanu anālambanatā prāpnoti iti uktam satyam yat anyathā asantam anyathā pratipadyate tad nirālambanam jñānam iṣyate kim iha adbhutam bāhya anālambanatā hi yatnataḥ naḥ pratiṣedhyāḥ sarvatra deśa antara ādi gata bāhya ālamba nata abhyupagamāt 
ŚVK_5.19.2^7	 katham asannihitam jñānam utpādayati iti ced kim ayam pratyakṣa dharmaḥ sarva jñāneṣu āropyate pratyakṣam hi sannihita vartamāna gocaram na jñāna antarāṇi na ca idam pratyakṣam ābhāsa tvāt yat api uktam katham anya samprayuktam indriyam anya ākārasya jñānasya hetuḥ iti uktam atra bhāṣye doṣaḥ mithyājñānasya kāraṇam iti tad bhāve hi mithyājñānam bhavati asati tasmin samyak jñāna darśanāt nanu doṣāḥ kāryam vighnanti na kārya antaram janayanti na svapne manaḥ doṣāt avartamānasya api vartamāna vat bhānāt kāraṇa adhīna ātma lābham hi kāryam tad doṣe duṣyati iti na anupapannam 
ŚVK_5.19.2^8	 eṣa ca jñānasya doṣaḥ yadi anya gocarasya anya ākāra tvam atas sannihitam asat nihita rajata ākāreṇa avalambate duṣṭa kāraṇa jam jñānam iti ubhaya ālambanasya jñāna ālambana tvam ātma indriya manortha sannikarṣaḥ hi jñānasya hetuḥ saḥ asatsu doṣeṣu samyak jñāna hetuḥ satsu tu viparīta jñāna hetuḥ iti su uktaḥ yathā artha ayatha artha jñāna vibhāgaḥ iti kim punar pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam yena tat yathārtham atas āha yadābhāsam iti yat ākāram jñānam tena indriyāṇām samprayoge yat puruṣasya buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iṣyate katham tat ayathārtham bhaviṣyati iti 
ŚVK_5.20^1	 nanu lakṣaṇa paratve sūtrasya atiprasaktiḥ uktā na ca api etena sūtreṇa pratyakṣam lakṣyate iti vadatā katham idānīm lakṣaṇa para tayā sūtram varṇyate atas āha sampūrṇā iti yathā avasthitam sūtram ābhāsa saṅkarāt alakṣaṇam vṛttikāra mate tu vyatyastam śaknoti lakṣaṇam lakṣayitum iti katham punar sampūrṇam atas āha tad satoḥ iti yathāśrute hi sūtre indriya samprayoga ja tva mātram pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam tat ca ābhāse api aviśiṣṭam iti ati prasajyate vyatyastena tu tadā buddhi ākāra parāmarśanāt bhāsamāna ākāra indriya samprayoge yā buddhiḥ sā pratyakṣam iti upaskāre śukti rajata jñāne bhāsamāna indriya samprayoga abhāvāt na pratyakṣam ati prasajyate iti utkṛṣṭasya sat śabdasya artham āha śobhana arthaḥ iti 
ŚVK_5.20^2	 nanu pūrvaṃvartamāna artha tayā samprayoga viśeṣaṇa arthaḥ sat śabdaḥ vyākhyātaḥ katham idānīm śobhana arthaḥ iti ucyate yuktam ca samprayoga viśeṣaṇam aviśiṣṭe hi tasmin anāgata ādi samprayoga jam yogi pratyakṣam anirākṛtam syāt iti prāk eva uktam tad vṛttena api vyavahita praṭhitena samāsaḥ duṣpratipādataraḥ punar api ca īdṛśam yat tad samyak pratyakṣam iti tad apekṣā vidyate eva iti vyatyaye aparituṣyan prakāra antaram āha yat vā iti dvayoḥ api tad satoḥ atra adhyāhāraḥ tatra bhāsamāna ākāra parāmarśa arthaḥ adhyāhṛtaḥ tad śabdaḥ paraḥ tu pratyakṣa rūpa parāmarśa arthaḥ sat śabdaḥ tu samprayoga sannidhi paṭhitaḥ tad viśeṣa arthaḥ eva adhyāhṛtaḥ tu śobhana arthaḥ iti vivecanīyam iti 
ŚVK_5.21	 nanu ca ābhāsa lakṣaṇā kathanāt na pratyakṣa tad ābhāsa vivekaḥ darśayitum śakyate atas āha arthāpattyā iti īdṛśam pratyakṣam iti ukte arthāt anīdṛśam ābhāsam bhavati iti atra bhāṣya kāreṇa katham tad atad yoga ja tva vivekaḥ avagamyate iti āśaṅkya uktam bādhakam hi yatra jñānam utpadyate na etat evam iti tad anya samprayoge viparītaḥ tad samprayoge iti tat ayuktam kim hi kāraṇam yat uttareṇa pūrvam bādhyate pūrveṇa eva jaghanyam uttaram bādhyate iti yuktam atas āha bādhaka iti tat dhi bādhakam yat anya ābādhakam ātmānam eva na labhate tathā ca uttaram atas tat pūrvam bādhataḥ iti yuktam jaghanyam api pūrva anapekṣam balavat iti ṣaṣṭhe vakṣyate yatra pūrva apekṣam uttaram tatra pūrvam balavat iti tṛtīyaḥ uktam iti 
ŚVK_5.22	 kim punar uttareṇa mithyā sataḥ pūrvasya bādhaḥ pramāṇasya vā pramāṇasya bādhe ati prasaṅgaḥ mithyātvam tu na ṛte bādhāt sidhyati tad adhīnaḥ bādhaḥ iti itaretara āśrayam atas āha sa ca iti na khalu pūrva mithyā tva avadhāraṇāt uttarasya janma api tarhi tad nirapekṣam uttaram sva kāraṇāt eva utpannam atas na utpattau anya apekṣa tvam na ca kārya kptau avabodha rūpa tvāt avabodhasya tasya ca sva gocara prakāśane anya anapekṣaṇāt atas na anyonya āśraya tvam iti yadi tarhi pūrva anapekṣam uttaram iti tat bādhakam pūrvam vā kim uttaram apekṣate yena bādhyate tat api hi nirapekṣam eva atas āha na ca iti yadi api tad uttara anapekṣam tathā api anāgata uttara bādhaka ātmaka tvena anavabhāsāt na bādhakam iti 
ŚVK_5.23	 yatra tarhi na etat evam iti na bādhaka udayaḥ api tarhi nimittedāṣa jñānam tatra itaretara āśrayam aparihāryam nimitta doṣeṇa tatra utthāpyaḥ bādhaḥ sa ca pūrva apramāṇa tve śakyataḥ utthāpayitum tad utthāpanāt ca tad apramāṇam iti na avakalpate atas āha nimittā iti prāyeṇa hi śaṅkha ādiṣu pīta ādi vibhramāḥ pitta ādi doṣebhyaḥ samutpannāḥ paścāt bādhyante na idam pītam śuklaḥ ayam iti hi sampratipattiḥ sambhavati atas na tatra nimitta doṣa bodha mātrāt mithyātvam yatra tu jñāte api nimitta doṣe tad rūpa pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ paścāt abādhanam eva yathā diś mūḍhasya jānataḥ api nimitta doṣāt diś mohaḥ na nivartate tatra api nara antara viparyayāt anyatas paricchedāt na itaretara āśrayam iti 
ŚVK_5.24	 yatra tarhi na nara antara ādiṣu viparyayaḥ tatra katham yathā jāti ādi vijñāne na ca tat satyam teṣām vyatireka avyatireka vikalpa akṣama tvāt atas āha sarveṣām iti yat dhi deśa antara ādiṣu na viparyeti tat abādhyam samyak eva iti nanu tatra api anupapatteḥ bādhikā dhīḥ utpādyāḥ katham samyaktvam atas āha na hi iti pratyakṣaḥ hi avikala karaṇasya piṇḍāt piṇḍa antareṣu pūrvarūpa avamarśaḥ sa katham yauktikena bādhena bādhyate yasya hi avyutpadyamānasya balavatā mukham nirudhyate na tadā ātmānam labhate uktam ca sva yūthyaiḥ api na pratyakṣa viruddha kāraṇa viṣayam anumānam ātmānam labhate agnau iva śaitya anumānam iti 
ŚVK_5.25^1	 ayam asau itaretara āśrayasya vyaktaḥ viṣayaḥ iti āha jāti ādiṣu iti atra hi jāti ādi jñāna mithyā tvāt bādhaka buddhi udayaḥ tad udaye tat mithyātvam na ca vyakta uditā śukti rajata jñāna ādiṣu iva bādhikā dhīḥ asti iti yadi tarhi bādhaka jñānam antareṇa na kāraṇa doṣa mātrāt mithyātvam avagamyate katham ucyate yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ iti bhedena tadā hi mithyātva pratyayaḥ eva asamīcīnatāyām hetuḥ uktaḥ syāt tasmāt vaktavyaḥ viṣayaḥ saḥ ucyate yena tarhi prāk ekaḥ candraḥ avadhāritaḥ samprati aṅgulī nipīḍita locanaḥ dvau paśyati 
ŚVK_5.25^2	 tasya prācīna jñāna anusāreṇa jāta vicikitsasya adhunā ca vyaktam kāraṇa doṣam avagatavataḥ bhavati nirṇayaḥ yathā pūrva jñānam aduṣṭa kāraṇa jam idam ca vyakta avagata kāraṇa doṣa prabhavam kāraṇa doṣa niyataḥ ca kārya doṣaḥ tasmāt asamīcīnam tat iha pūrva anubhavaḥ vicikitsā udaya hetuḥ kāraṇa doṣa avadhāraṇāt eva mithyātva avadhāraṇam evam bāhya āgamānām api kāraṇa doṣa avadhāraṇāt eva mithyātva avadhāraṇam na hi tad arthāḥ sākṣāt bādhyante pauruṣeya tvāt kāraṇa doṣa aśaṅkayā eva mithyātvam bhavati iti yuktam eva dvaividhyam 
ŚVK_5.26	 nanu mā bādhi jāti ādi jñānam pramāṇa tvam tu tasya katham pramāṇa tad ābhāsa sādhāraṇam hi jñāna tvam atas vyabhicāra darśanāt saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ vṛtti ādi vikalpāḥ ca aprāmāṇyam anāpādayantaḥ api tadvat prāmāṇyam vighnanti atas āha svatas iti yadi jñāna tva anubandhinī pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tve dve api syātām syāt eva anirṇayaḥ svatas tu pramāṇam iti upapāditam atas jāti ādi astitva bodhāt anapoditaḥ nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ sa ca ayam bodhaḥ na param asmākam eva ye api tu jāti ādīn apalapanti teṣām api asti te api hi na tad bodham anapalapantaḥ jāti ādīn apalapitum arhanti iti 
ŚVK_6.4.1^1	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa nanu sarve eva nirālambanaḥ svapna vat pratyayaḥ iti ākṣepa pura ssaram jāgrataḥ hi buddhiḥ su pariniścitā katham viparyasiṣyati iti bāhya artha sadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ tasya prakṛta veda artha vicāra upayogam darśayati pramāṇa tva iti caturbhiḥ sarvaḥ hi ayam mīmāṃsā prapañcaḥ bāhya artha āśrayaḥ eva yathā tāvat codanā eva dharme pramāṇam yogi pratyakṣa buddha āgama ādya pramāṇam iti codanā sūtre pratijñātam tat asati bāhye codanā padārthe duḥsthitam eva pramāṇa tva upanyāsena eva tad parikara prathama pāda ukta sambandha autpattika tva śabda nitya tva vākya artha pratipatti mūla sadbhāva apauruṣeya veda vākya racanā ādi parigrahaḥ apramāṇa tva upanyāsena ca pratyakṣa sūtra nirdiṣṭa ani a apramāṇa tva kāraṇa upādānam iti darśayitavyam tathā yat api codanā sūtraḥ eva śrutyā arthena ca puṇya pāpa apara nāmnoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ sva rūpam pratijñātam tat api na asati bāhye arthe śakyam darśayitum 
ŚVK_6.4.1^2	 tatra hi vidhi niṣedha ātmaka codanā pramāṇakam puṇya pāpayoḥ svarūpam iti varṇitam ādi śabdena puṇya pāpa ubhaya rūpa rahitam aśubhebhyaḥ nivartanam upādatte yad artha sādhanam vastu tad viparītam vā tat puṇya pāpa padayoḥ aspadam aśubhebhyaḥ nivartanam tu na sukhāya na duḥkhāya iti ubhaya rūpa rahitam etat api codanā sūtra sthena artha padena pratipāditam tad phalam iti ca trividhasya puṇya pāpa udāsīn ātmanaḥ veda prameyasya iṣṭā aniṣṭa ātmakam phalam upādatte etat api svarūpa pratijñā antargatam eva na hi anāśrita phala sambandham dharma ādi svarūpam anubhavitum śakyam iti tat evaṃtāvat bāhya artha siddheḥ asti prathama pāda ukta samasta upayogaḥ tathā vakṣyamāṇa upayogaḥ api na hi vidhi artha vāda mantrāṇām sādhya sādhana sambandha vidhi vidheya stutu vihita smṛti rūpa arthā arthavāda pāda gocarāḥ bāhya artham vinā sidhyanti 
ŚVK_6.4.1^3	 audumbara adhikaraṇe hi audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ bhavati ūrjā uparudhyāḥ iti atra vidhi abhāvāt na phala pada smbandhaḥ sidhyati audumbara tvasya iti vakṣyate tathā artha vāda adhikaraṇe artha vādānām stuti upayogaḥ darśitaḥ evam hi tatra uktam āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam atad arthānām iti asya arthaḥ yāni hi kriyām kriyā sambaddham vā kiñcid artham pratipādayanti tāni santu pramāṇam yāni tu akriyā arthāni saḥ arodīt yat arodīt ityādīni tāni na kañcid dharmam pramimate iti pūrva pakṣite uktam vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt stuti arthena vidhīnām syuḥ iti asya ayam arthaḥ vidheyānām stuti rūpeṇa arthena arthavādāḥ pramāṇam syuḥ iti katham punar stuti artha tā na hi anapekṣitā stutiḥ artha vādānām arthaḥ bhavitum arhati na apekṣita tvāt apekṣyate khalu api śabda bhāvanā para nāmadheyena vidhinā stutiḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.1^4	 sa hi puruṣam pravartayan pravṛtti viṣaya prāśastyajñānam apekṣate artha vādāḥ ca svādhyāya vidhi adhyāpitāḥ tad balena eva aprayojana sampadaḥ na paryavasyanti tatra eva kim kartavyam iti apekṣite tad śaktinirūpaṇāyām akṣara grahaṇa ādi krameṇa kathañcid prarocanāyām buddhau utpannāyām tad kārya tvam artha vādānām niścīyate vidhiḥ hi prarocanām apekṣate te ca tām śaknuvanti kathañcid utpādayitum iti ananya prayojana tayā manasi viparivartamānāḥ te eva tad prayojana tayā niścīyante tat eṣa śāstra arthaḥ bhavati artha vādaiḥ eva prarocitam karma abhyudayāya ghaṭataḥ iti vidhi svarūpam ca prāk eva uktam iti na iha pratanyate mantra arthaḥ api mantra adhikaraṇe vakṣyate tatra barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi ityādi mantrān udāhṛtya vicāritam kim amī uccāraṇa mātrā t eva adṛṣṭa arthāḥ uta artha prakāśana arthāḥ iti 
ŚVK_6.4.1^5	 tatra tad artha śāstrāt ityādi upapattibhiḥ adṛṣṭa artha tayā pūrva pakṣitam yam eva hi artham mantraḥ prakāśayati tatra eva ayam brāhmaṇena viniyujyamānaḥ dṛśyate yathā prathama mantraḥ uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti yadi ca ayam artha paraḥ liṅgena eva tatra viniyoge siddhe viniyoga ānarthakyam atas avivakṣita vacanāḥ mantrāḥ iti pūrva pakṣite abhihitam aviśiṣṭaḥ tuvākya arthaḥ iti yathā hi brāhmaṇa vākyānām arthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ na avivakṣitaḥ bhavati tathā mantrāṇām api te api hi anuṣṭhān a aupayikam artham prakāśayantaḥ kim avivakṣita vacanāḥ mantrāḥ bhaviṣyanti darśa pūrṇamāsa ādayaḥ hi anuṣṭhāna kāle asmṛta anuṣṭhāna asambhavāt anutiṣṭha asita sva padārtha smṛti hetum apekṣante mantrāḥ ca arthavāda vat eva svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi bala pratilabdha adhyayana saṃskāra sambandhāt kiṃsvid asmābhiḥ kartavyam iti apekṣamāṇāḥ vilambante 
ŚVK_6.4.1^6	 tatra aśaktike viniyoga asambhavāt tad śakti nirīkṣaṇāyām kratu apekṣita ananya sādhita vihita smṛti prayojanāḥ niścīyante yathā āhuḥ anuṣṭhāne padārthānām avaśyambhāvinī smṛtiḥ ananya sādhana ananya kāryaiḥ mantraiḥ niyamyate iti yat tu viniyoga ānarthakyam uktam tat na arthavāda artha tvāt vākyasya prathanam hi tatra śrūyate īdṛśam idam prathanam praśastam yat kriyamāṇam anena mantreṇa kriyate iti saḥ ayam vidhi artha vāda mantrāṇām arthaḥ na asati bāhye arthe sidhyati tathā udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti udāhṛtya vicāritam kim ayam guṇa vidhiḥ uta karmanām adheyam iti saṃśayya pravṛtti viśeṣa karatayā guṇa vidhiḥ iti pūrva pakṣitam guṇam hi vidadhatām pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvam itarathāḥ nāma mātram anarthakam 
ŚVK_6.4.1^7	 śaknuvanti ca udbhedana kriyā yoga vaśena kiñcid khanitra ādi artham abhidhātum iti guṇa vidhayaḥ iti prāpte uktam na guṇa vidhayaḥ karma samāna adhikaraṇāḥ hi ete tṛtīyā nirdeśāt karma khalu iha udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti paśu bhāvanā karaṇa tvena abhihitam yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti kim uktam yāgena paśūn bhāvayet iti atas udbhidā yāgena iti vyaktam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam guṇa vidhau tu yāgasya udbhittvā abhāvāt udbhidvatā yāgena iti matu artha lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt tatra ca lakṣaṇā eva doṣaḥ nanu evam vrīhibhiḥ yajeta iti evamādau api bhāvanā karaṇena yajinā samabhivyāhṛtāḥ vrīhi ādi śabdāḥ karmanām adheyatām pratipadyeran na teṣām nirūḍha artha tvāt ajñāta sandigdha arthasya hi padasya prasiddha sāmānā adhikaraṇyāt eva arthaḥ niścīyate nirūḍham tu sva arthāt na pracyāvayitum śakyate 
ŚVK_6.4.1^8	 āha ca padam ajñāta sandigdham prasiddhaiḥ apṛthak śruti nirṇīyate nirūḍham tu na sva arthāt apanīyate iti atas paśūnām udbhedanam prakāśanam anena karmaṇā kriyate iti yogāt udbhid śabdena karma abhidhīyate guṇa phala sambandha vidhānena āmnātānām api upayogaḥ asti iti na ānarthakyam atas siddham karmanām adheyatayā evan jātīyakānām kriyā upayogaḥ iti citra ādi śabdānām nāmadheya tva hetavaḥ vistara bhayāt na anukramyante kvacid karmaṇaḥ prāpaka śabda antara abhāvāt guṇa vidhi tvam eva yathā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti āgneyaḥ iti sa guṇa karma vidhāyinaḥ śabdasya na hi tatra dravya devatā sambandha vidhānāt prāk karmaṇaḥ rūpam avagamyate yasya āgneya śabdaḥ nāmadheyam bhavet iti evamādi nāmadheya pāda uktam ādi śabdena anukrāntam veditavyam adhyāya antam yāvat smṛti pāda ukta arthaḥ api anena eva anukta antaḥ veditavyaḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.2^1	 pratyakṣa veda upayoga pratipādana prasaṅgena ca arthavāda ādi upayoga anantaram nāmadheya pāda arthaḥ anukrāntaḥ tatra ādi śabdena anukrāntaḥ smṛti pāda arthaḥ tathā hi aśrūyamāṇa vedān aṣṭaka ādīn udāhṛtya teṣām dharma adharma tva saṃśaye dharmasya śabda mūla tvāt aśabdam anapekṣyam syāt iti pakṣam parigṛhya veda mūla tayā siddhāntitam sarvāḥ smṛtayaḥ hi na asati pūrva jñāne ātmānam labhante pūrva jñānam ca mūla bhūtam vibhramaḥ vā syāt pratyakṣa anubhavaḥ vā pauruṣeya āgama janyam vā vipralambhaḥ vā codanā janitam vā tatra tāvat bhrāmyatām āptānām manu ādīnām smṛti nibandhana praṇayanam ayuktam te hi tāvat ṛṣayaḥ bhrāmyanti iti etat eva durbhaṇam 
ŚVK_6.4.2^2	 bhrāmyatām tu yat mahā prabandha racanam tat smṛtibhyaḥ ca adyayāvadāryaiḥ paśyadbhiḥ parigṛhyate iti na etat utprekṣitum api śakyam anubhavaḥ ca atīndriya gocaraḥ pratyakṣa sūtre nirākṛtaḥ puruṣa vākyam api asambhavat mūlam apramāṇam eva vipralambhaḥ api bhrānti vat nirākāryaḥ codanā tu sambhavat veda saṃyoginām traivarṇikānām smṛti mūlam bhavati iti tad kalpanā eva laghīyasi iti nanu evam agnihotra ādi coda nāvat aṣṭaka ādi codanāḥ api kim na upalabhyante na idam anupapannam viprakīrṇa aneka śākhā āśrayāḥ hi śrutayaḥ kratu puruṣa artha upadeśa saṅkīrṇāḥ pramādyadbhiḥ adyatanaiḥ na vivicya upalabhyante iti kim na upapadyante 
ŚVK_6.4.2^3	 atas yat aśrūyamāṇam api aṣṭaka ādi dharmasya nimittam codanā iti siddham aṣṭaka ādayaḥ dharmāḥ iti tat evam pratyakṣa śruti aviruddhābhyaḥ śruti anumānam pratyakṣa śruti virodhe tu na śrutiḥ anumātum śakyate iti virodha adhika raṇa īuktam upariṣṭāt ca ācāra prāmāṇyam smṛtyā ca saha bala abala parīkṣā ityādi darśayitavyam sarveṣu ca bheda ādi lakṣaṇeṣu sva pramāṇa gaṇaiḥ śabda antara ādibhiḥ siddhānta sthitiḥ asati bāhye arthe na sambhavati somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyam ātreyāya dadāti iti yāga homa dāna bhāvanānām śabda bhedāt eva bhedaḥ vakṣyate 
ŚVK_6.4.2^4	 tathā ca samidhaḥ yajati iti evamādīnām pañcānām prayājānām asati api śabda bhede abhyāsānarthakya prasaṅgāt bhedaḥ darśitaḥ tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti pṛthaktu a niveśi tvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ āhutīnām bhedaḥ darśitaḥ atha eṣa jyotiḥ etena yajeta iti jyotiṣṭomāt jyotiḥ iti saṃjñā antareṇa karma bhedaḥ vaiśvadevyām ikṣā vājibhyaḥ vājinam iti ca utpatti śiṣṭa śrautām ikṣā virodhāt vājinam vaiśvadeve karmaṇi niveśam alabhamānam sva āśrayam yāga antaram upakalpayati saḥ ayam vājina guṇāt bhedaḥ kuṇḍapāyinām ayane māsam agnihotram juhoti iti naiyamika agnihotrāt prakaraṇa antareṇa kauṇḍapāyinahomasya bhedaḥ tat evam ṣoḍhā karma bhedaḥ dvitīye anyat upoddhāta ādinā 
ŚVK_6.4.3	 tṛtīye tu pārārthya lakṣaṇasya śeṣa tvasya ṣoḍhā eva viniyoga siddhiḥ uktāḥ yathā tāvat aruṇimnaḥ tṛtīyā śrutyā kriyā aṅga bhāve sāmānyatas avagate aruṇayā krīṇāti iti kriyā viśeṣa lābhaḥ vākyāt liṅga viniyogaḥ tu yathāprakaraṇa āmnānasāmarthya avadhṛta sāmānya aṅga bhāvasya bahis mantrasya sāmarthya apara nāmnaḥ liṅgāt barhiḥ lavane viniyogaḥ prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ tu iṣṭi prakaraṇa āmnātānām prayāja ādīnām sādhya ākāṅkṣiṇām upakāra ākāṅkṣiṇyā tayā saha sambandhaḥ ubhaya ākāṅkṣā lakṣaṇam eva hi prakaraṇam ācakṣmahe krama viniyogaḥ tu prākṛta upakāra nirākāṅkṣāyām vikṛtau sannidhi samāmnātānām aṅgānām na hi tatra prakaraṇa viniyogaḥ sambhavati ubhaya gāminī hi ākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam anākāṅkṣā ca iha vikṛtiḥ prākṛta upakāra dvāra pariprāpta padārtha pariṣvaktā vaikṛtam eva tu aṅgānām sannihita samāmnānam anarthakam mā bhūt iti tad sannidhi pāṭhāt eva teṣām tatra viniyogaḥ niścīyate samākhyā viniyogaḥ tu ādhvaryavasam ākhyāteṣu padārtheṣu adhvaryoḥ anena amī kartavyāḥ iti 
ŚVK_6.4.4^1	 caturthe api śruti ādibhiḥ eva avadhṛta aṅga aṅgi bhāvānām dadhi ānayanām ikṣa ādīnām prayojya prayojaka tve vakṣyete yat dhi śruti ādibhiḥ yat śeṣa tayā avagamyate tat tena prayujyate iti sthāpitam tat iha prayukti lakṣaṇe api śruti ādiḥ eva pramāṇa gaṇaḥ śeṣa lakṣaṇe api śeṣiṇām śeṣāṇām ubhayeṣām vā krama niyamaḥ kiñcit mātra viśeṣa bhinna śruti ādibhiḥ eva kriyate yathā tāvat adhvaryuḥ gṛhapatim dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇam dīkṣayati iti ktvā aśrutyā krama niyamaḥ agnihotram juhoti yavāgūm pacati iti pāṭhāt anyādṛśe api krame avagamyamāne arthāt krama niyama viparyayaḥ homa uttara kālam hi pākaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt homaḥ api na asati haviṣi saṃpravartate iti arthāt pāka uttara kālam eva niścīyate tat idam liṅgam eva arthaḥ iti nāma mātra bhinnam sāmarthyam eva hi bhāvānām liṅgam iti niścīyate iha api dravya kriyayoḥ śakti nirīkṣaṇāt eva krama niyama avadhāraṇam 
ŚVK_6.4.4^2	 pañcānām tu prayāja ādīnām samidhaḥ yajati iti evamādīnām pāṭhāt krama niyamaḥ bahūnām hi padārthānām yugapad ekena kartrā anuṣṭhātum aśakteḥ avaśyambhāvini krame avagama adhīna tvāt anuṣṭhānasya krameṇa tu ucyamāneṣu tathā eva avagamāt anuṣṭhāne krama apekṣāyām saḥ eva kramaḥ niścīyate pratīta hāna apratīta upādānayoḥ anupapatteḥ ayam api pāṭhā para nāmnā sthānena eva krama niyamaḥ sthānāt krama niyamaḥ yathā sādyaske karmaṇi saha paśūn ālabhate iti agnīṣomīyasavanīya anubandhyānām savanīya sthāne saha upalambhe codite kaḥ prathamam prayujyatām iti apekṣāyām sthānāt savanīyaḥ buddhaḥ bhavan prathamam niyamyate tasya tad anuṣṭhāna sthānam saḥ ayam anuṣṭhāna sādeśya lakṣaṇaḥ kramaḥ pūrvam tu pāṭhasādeśya lakṣaṇaḥ dvedhā ca tārtīya kramaḥ vibhaktaḥ yathā uktam tatra kramaḥ dvidhā eva iṣṭaḥ deśa sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ pāṭhā anuṣṭhānasādeśyāt viniyogasya kāraṇam iti 
ŚVK_6.4.4^3	 pravṛttyā ca krama niyamaḥ yathā saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate iti ca uditeṣu paśuṣu ca udaka prāptānām prokṣaṇa ādīnām yatra kvacid ekasmin ekasya anuṣṭhāne dvitīya ādiṣu kim prathama pravṛttyā eva atha aniyamaḥ iti saṃśaye niyama kāraṇa abhāvāt prathama pravṛtteḥ ca aniyam ātmaka tvāt aniyamaḥ iti pakṣam parigṛhya prathama pravṛttyā eva niyamaḥ darśitaḥ prayoga vacana balena hi paśūnām yaugapadyam avadhāritam tat ca āvarjanīyāt vilambanāt na vyavadhāna antaram aṅgānām anujānīte sa aṅgeṣu hi paśuṣu yugapad anuṣṭhātavya tayā coditeṣu api īśvareṇa api tathā sambhāvayitum aśakteḥ avarjanīya vyavadhānam tu vidheḥ anumatam bhavati tatra ca vaiṣamya kāraṇa abhāvāt sarveṣām sadṛśam eva aṅga vyavadhānam prathama padārtha kartrā anuṣṭhite tadā eva aṅga antara anuṣṭhānāya tena eva pradhānena codyamāne kartari prayoga vacana pramāṇaka yaugapadya balena paśu antaraiḥ ākṛṣyamāṇe tad padārtha mātrasya paśu antareṣu anuṣṭhānam sa paśuḥ pratīkṣate 
ŚVK_6.4.4^4	 tad ante ca dvitīya padārtha anuṣṭhānāya kartāram ākarṣati evam saptadaśānām paśūnām ṣoḍaśabhiḥ ekaikasya vyavadhānam vidhi anumatam vyavadhāna viśeṣaḥ tu viśeṣa agrahaṇāt na āśrayitum śakyam atas dvitīya ādīnām api anuṣṭhānam tatas eva ārabhya iti siddhāntāt krama niyamaḥ ayam ca prakaraṇa antargataḥ eva ākāṅkṣa eka pramāṇaka tvāt ekaikaḥ api paśuḥ avyavadhānena padārtha anuṣṭhānam ākṣipati padārthaḥ ca tad sannidhau= ātmanaḥ anuṣṭhānam atas ubhaya ākāṅkṣayā krama niyamaḥ jāyamānaḥ prākaraṇikaḥ bhavati mukhya krameṇa ca aṃśānām krama niyamaḥ yathā sārasvatau bhavataḥ iti yugapad utpannayoḥ strī puṃdevatayoḥ karmaṇoḥ yājyā krameṇa anuṣṭhāne avagate aṅgeṣu krama apekṣāyām mukhya krameṇa eva kramaḥ niyamyate na hi aṅgānām pradhāna kālāt bahirbhāvaḥ asti sāṅgam pradhānam aika śabdyāt iti vakṣyati saḥ ayam vākyena eva krama niyamaḥ sāṅgam hi pradhānam eka vākya coditam eka upakrama avasānam iti pradhāna krameṇa eva aṅgānām krama niyamaḥ jāyate atra api śruti ādiḥ eva pramāṇa gaṇaḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.5^1	 evam adhikāra vicāra ādau api śeṣa śeṣi prapañca artha tvāt śeṣa lakṣaṇa uktāni eva śruti ādīni siddhānta sthiti hetu tayā darśayitavyāni iti yathā tāvat ādyaḥ eva svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti yāga svargayoḥ kaḥ śeṣaḥ kaḥ vā śeṣī iti cintāyām dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisambandhaḥ iti svargasya yāga śeṣa tayā liṅga balena pūrva pakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ tat dhi bhūtasya dravyasya sāmarthyam yat bhāvyam karma niṣpādayati dravyam ca svarhaḥ sraj candana vāsassu tad prayogāt sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svargaḥ iti yathā atas dravyam eva karma artham kāmapada sambandhaḥ ca sādhana viṣaya tayā darśayitavyaḥ yaḥ hi yat arthī sa tad sādhanam api kāmayataḥ eva iti liṅga balena pūrva pakṣite vidhi śruti balāt siddhāntitam vidhiḥ hi cetana pravartana ātmakaḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.5^2	 na ca anarthe puruṣaḥ pravartayitum śakyate iti yāga arthe svarge karma asādhakam āpadyate yathoktam asādhakam tu tādarthyāt iti atas vidheḥ pravartana aśaktiḥ mā vyāghāni iti karma eva svarga artham na ca dravyam svargaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām prīti vacana tva avagamāt tat eva hi dravyam aprīti karam na svarga śabdena upacarantaḥ dṛśyante iti prīti anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt svarga padam tat vacanam iti niścīyate na ca sarvasya iṣṭatamā prītiḥ anya niṣpattaye bhavati iti sāmpratam atas yat eva kiñcid prītyā samabhivyāhṛtam tat tad artham eva iti liṅgam api viparītam atas siddham yāgaḥ svarga arthaḥ iti siddhaḥ ca adhikāraḥ iti parastāt api śeṣa bhūtasya eva kartuḥ tatra adhikāraḥ darśayiṣyate iti śruti ādi balena eva adhikāra lakṣaṇe api siddhānta sthitiḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.6^1	 uttara ṣaṭke tu śeṣāḥ eva kim sarvatra upadeśena eva sambadhyante atha yathā prakṛti vyavatiṣṭhante iti śruti ādi balena eva nirṇeṣyante aupadeśike hi dharma sambandhe na ati deśaḥ sidhyati pāriplavāḥ hi tadā dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ tat iha atideśa upoddhātena eva saptama ādye yajya pūrva prayukta tvam vicāritam yaji uddeśena dharma vidhānāt yajeḥ ca sāmānya vacana tvāt sarvatra iti prāptam na ca darśa pūrṇamāsa padam niyāmakam parisaṃkhyānāt viśiṣṭa uddeśena viśiṣṭa anuvādāt iti prāpte nirūpitam na atra darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti yāga uddeśena aṅgāni vidhīyante kim tarhi sāṅga pradhāna viśiṣṭā pūrva bhāvanā eva codyate paścāt tu eka bhāvanā parigṛhītānām aṅgānām pradhānānām ca aruṇā eka hāyanīvat paraspara anvaya siddhiḥ bhidhyante ca śabda antara ādibhiḥ pratiprakaraṇam apūrva bhāvanā iti kutas dharma saṅkaraḥ sā iyam śruti ādi pramāṇaka viniyoga parāmarśāt eva vyavasthā sidhyati yadā hi apūrva bhāvanā anvaya garbhaḥ viniyogaḥ dharmāṇām na yāga sāmānya uddeśena iti siddham bhavati tadā vyavasthā sidhyati 
ŚVK_6.4.6^2	 tad siddhyā ca aśruta iti kartavya tākeṣu saurya ādiṣu vidhyanta apekṣāyām sāmānya atideśa siddhau pratyakṣa vacana nāma avyakta codanā tad ava yava dravya devatā sāmānya bāhulyena viśeṣa atideśa siddhiḥ yathā iṣṭau samānam itarat śyenena iti śyena vaiśeṣikāṇām vācanikaḥ ati deśaḥ māsam agnihotram juhoti iti kuṇḍapāyinām ayane homa nāmnā nitya agnihotra dharma atideśaḥ eka ahā hīna satrāṇām avyakta codanā codita tvena soma sādṛśyāt tad dharma atideśaḥ ityādi darśayitavyam sarvaḥ ca ayam atideśaḥ śrutyā viniyoga anusāreṇa eva śeṣāṇām sidhyati iti tad pramāṇa gaṇa kāritaḥ eva ūhaḥ api ṣoḍhā vibhaktaḥ prākṛta upadeśa anusāreṇa eva mantra ādīnām sidhyati iti saḥ api śruti ādi pramāṇakaḥ eva saḥ api hi apūrva arthaḥ dharma viniyogaḥ iti siddhe setsyati ataeva apūrva prayuktiḥ ādye sādhitāḥ bādhaḥ api śruti ādi pramāṇa anusāreṇa eva tatra api prākṛta śāstra atideśāt sarva anuṣṭhānena pūrva pakṣite upakāra pradhāna tvāt atideśasya tad abhāve anyatas vā tad lābhe pratiṣedhena vā bādhaḥ vakṣyate yathā kṛṣṇala carau avaghātasya khaleva ālī śarābhyām yūpa barhiṣoḥ ityādi darśayitavyam 
ŚVK_6.4.6^3	 etat api prakṛtau eva upakāra paryanta śruti ādi viniyogaḥ iti nirṇīyate sidhyati etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ prakṛtau padārtha parigraha purassarī upakāra kalpanā prāk tad asiddheḥ vikṛtau tu prakṛti parikalpita upakāra sandarśanena tad parigraha purassaram padārtha parigrahaḥ saḥ eva hi vidhinā apekṣyte sa tu prakṛtauvasiddhaḥ api kalpayitvā gṛhyate vikṛtau ca prakṛti siddhaḥ eva upādīyate iti atas eva śāstra padārthayoḥ anatideśaḥ tayoḥ vidhi anapekṣita tvāt iti tantra āvāpa lakṣaṇe api viśeṣāḥ eva pradhānānām kim tantreṇa upakārakāḥ uta āvṛttyā iti śeṣāṇām eva vicāryamāṇa tvāt tad pramāṇa gaṇa anusārī nirṇayaḥ darśayitavyaḥ tatra hi deśa kāla phala ādīnām tantra sambandhaḥ āgneya ādīn prati prayāja ādīnām tantra anuṣṭhāne hetuḥ bhaviṣyati sa ca śruti ādi pramāṇakaḥ eva iti tatra api saḥ eva pramāṇa gaṇaḥ prasaṅga lakṣaṇe api paśu artha anuṣṭhitānām prayāja ādi śeṣāṇām paśu tantra madhya pāti puroḍāśa upakāraka tvam deśa ādi tantra nibandhanam eva iti pūrvavat pramāṇa gaṇaḥ atas eva bhāṣya kāreṇa prathama sūtre daśa adhyāyaḥ eva śeṣa lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 
ŚVK_6.4.6^4	 yaḥ api vacana vyakti bhedena pūrva pakṣa siddhānta vibhāgaḥ yathā svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti svarga kāmaḥ yāgam kuryāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yāgena svargam kuryāt iti siddhānte iti saḥ api na artha śūnyāsu buddhiṣu sidhyati karmabhyaḥ ca darśa pūrṇamāsa kārīryādibhyaḥ para loke ihaloke bhavat svarga vṛṣṭi ādi phala sambandhaḥ bāhya āśrayaḥ eva asati tasmin dvaividhya anupapatteḥ atas sarvam idam bāhya artha siddhau asatyām ayuktam āpadyeta iti tad upapādanāya dharma arthibhiḥ mīmāṃsakaiḥ loka prasiddhaiḥ pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pūrva uttara pakṣa vibhāgena arthasya sat asat bhāvayoḥ yatnaḥ kāryaḥ pūrva pakṣa viśuddhā hi buddhiḥ siddhānta karī bhavati atas anumānena eva artha apahnava pūrva pakṣam kṛtvā pratyakṣeṇa tad sadbhāva siddhāntaḥ darśayitavyaḥ sarvaḥ ca ayam prayāsaḥ sakala laukika vaidika kriyāṃprati tad siddhi artham iti yāvat anyathā sarva artha kriyāṇām ucchedaḥ bhavet atas prayojana vat bāhya artha pratipādanam akriyā aṅgasya tu pratipāditasya api anartha tvam eva iti kriyām prati iti yuktam eva iti 
ŚVK_6.5	 atra codayati yadā iti jñāna mātra pakṣe hi bauddhānām iva sarvaḥ ayam pramāṇa ādi vyavahāraḥ sidhyati eva te hi vadanti dve satye samupāśritya buddhānām dharma deśanā loke saṃvṛti satyam ca satyam ca paramārthataḥ iti atas tadvat eva vyavahāra siddhau kim pāramārthika artha pratipādana vyasanena iti 
ŚVK_6.6	 atra dūṣaṇam āha saṃvṛteḥ iti satyam saṃvṛti satyena sarvam idam bauddhaiḥ āśrīyate na tu etat yuktam satyabheda anupapatteḥ yaḥ khalu ayam satyabhedaḥ bauddhaiḥ āśritaḥ saṃvṛti satyam parama artha satyam iti na ayam upapadyate saṃvṛteḥ satya tva abhāvāt mithyā paryāyaḥ hi saṃvṛti śabdaḥ katham tasya satya śabda samabhivyāhāraḥ na hi ayam akṣa śabdaḥ iva vibhītaka ādīnām saṃvṛti parama arthayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ satya śabdaḥ atas satya bheda anupapattiḥ iti virodham eva vyanakti satyam ced iti 
ŚVK_6.7	 virodhāt eva ca mṛṣā artha parama arthayoḥ sāmānyam api satya tvam na abhyupagantum śakyam samānānām bhāvaḥ sāmānyam kutas tasya virodhinoḥ avakāśaḥ na hi bhavati dharma adharmayoḥ dharma tvam adharma tvam vā sāmānyam iti āha satya tvam iti virodhāt antena anya mātrayoḥ api tad parāmarśa abhāvāt durupagamam sāmānyam vṛkṣa siṃhayoḥ iva vṛkṣa tvam kim punar virodhinoḥ tat syāt iti āha na hi iti atra ca akṣa ādi vat sādhāraṇa śabda tā pūrvam satya śabdasya nirākṛtāḥ iha gavā ādi vat sāmānya śabda tā iti vivecanīyam iti 
ŚVK_6.9	 atas lokam vañcayitum mithyā paryāyaḥ api saṃvṛti śabdaḥ bauddha vidagdhaiḥ anudvega karatayā mithyātvaḥ eva vivakṣite sva nāstikya parijihīrṣayā prayuktaḥ lālāyām iva vaktra āsava śabdaḥ iti āha tulya artha tvaḥ iti saṃvṛtiḥ antena vakṣyamāṇena itikaraṇena sambandhaḥ iti kalpanā vācaḥ yuktiḥ api sva nāstikya parihāra artham eva taiḥ āśritā iti āha kalpanā iti ca iti kalpanā mātra kalpitena bāhyena sarva laukika vyavahāraḥ iti api nirvastuke jagati abhinnasya cit mātrasya kalpanāyāḥ bhettum aśakya tvāt durbhaṇam kvacid dhi bhinnam eva kiñcid rūpa antaram kalpanāḥ padam bhavati śuktau iva rajata rūpam yasya tu na kiñcid bhinnam asti tat kena rūpeṇa kalpyatām tat etat āha kalpanā api iti 
ŚVK_6.10	 nanu tridhā eva tattvam vibhajāmahe satyam asatyam saṃvṛti satyam ca iti saṃvṛtam hi na atyantam asat bhavati vyavahāra avisaṃvādāt na api sat eva pramāṇa antara virodhāt jāti ādi vat atas na saṃvṛtiḥ pramāṇam na apramāṇam iti vidha antaram eva idam iti yuktaḥ tad āśraya tayā vyavahāraḥ iti atas āha tasmāt iti yatas khalu saṃvṛtiḥ mithyājñānam na vastu kptyai prabhavati tasmāt yat paramārthataḥ na asti iti nirūpyate na tat saṃvṛtyā tad rūpam bhavitum arhati na asti eva tat yat tu tāvat vyavahāra avisaṃvādi tat asti eva na hi asataḥ sarvadā vyavahāra hetu bhāvaḥ sambhavati yat eva artha kriyā kāri tat eva ca parama artha sat iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ atas katham artha kriyā kāritve sati api jāti ādīnām asatya tvam tasmāt yadi vyavahāra aṅga tayā bāhyam asti tat tarhi paramārthataḥ eva asti tat eva satyam iti ucyate anyat tu saṃvṛtiḥ mithyā iti na tu satya dvaya kalpanā ātmānam labhate tantreṇa tad vṛttasya pūrva aparābhyām sambandhaḥ paramārthataḥ iti ca na asti iti pūrveṇa sambadhyate iti 
ŚVK_6.11–6.13	 api ca svapna avagatāḥ api arthāḥ kecid śoka harṣa ādi vyavahāra hetavaḥ dṛśyante atas te api sāṃvṛtāḥ eva tadvat ca bāhya artha abhyupagame svapna ādi bhoga tulyaḥ eva śubha aśubha karma phala upabhogaḥ bhavet atas tad nivṛtti artham api parama artha satye bāhye prayasyate iti āha svapna ādi iti kaḥ punar svapna tulya tve doṣaḥ atas āha na hi iti kim iti na pravartate atas āha yādṛcchika tvāt iti na hi svapna sukham me bhavati iti vidvāṃsaḥ prayasyanti yādṛcchikam hi svapna sukham agaṇita sāmparāyi kaihika nimittam na tat prayasyataḥ bhavati iti buddhvā vidvadbhiḥ tūṣṇīm udāsīnaiḥ eva asya ita na kvacid prayatnaḥ kriyeta iti arthaḥ atas avaśyam pāramārthikīm phala prāptim icchadbhiḥ upapattyā bāhya vastu viṣayā pratipattiḥ vidhātavyā iti asti vicārasya prayojanam iti upasaṃharati paramārtha iti 
ŚVK_6.16	 atra bhāṣya kāreṇa bāhya artha sadbhāvaḥ eva pūrva pakṣa purassaram pratipāditaḥ na tu jñāna sadbhāvaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ asti hi tad sadbhāva vipratipattiḥ api mādhyamikāḥ hi jñānam api apalapanti atas tad nirākaraṇam api yuktam yat punar tad upekṣya eva bāhya artha apalāpaḥ nirākriyate tatra kāraṇam vaktavyam atas āha tatra iti trayeṇa asya arthaḥ yoga ācārāḥ hi jñāna mātram artha śūnyam pāramārthikam manyante mādhyamikāḥ tu jñeya abhāvāt akarmaka jñāna anutpatteḥ jñānasya api abhāvam icchanti tatra dvayoḥ api vādinoḥ tāvat bāhya artha śūnya tvam sādhāraṇam artha nivṛtti adhīna tvāt jñāna nivṛtteḥ atas dvayoḥ api sādhāraṇaḥ bāhya artha apalāpaḥ iti saḥ eva nirākriyate api ca tad mūlaḥ jñāna apahnavaḥ tatas tasmin nirākṛte nirākṛtaḥ eva iti bāhya artha sadbhāve pūrva uttara pakṣa vibhāgena bhāṣya kṛtā prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ ādyaḥ tatraśabdaḥ vākya upanyāsa arthaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu pūrva ukta darśana bheda parāmarśa arthaḥ tatra mata bhede iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_6.17	 nanu bāhya artha apahnavaḥ dvidhā eva bauddhaiḥ āśritaḥ pramāṇataḥ prameyataḥ ca tathā hi evam taiḥ uktam na tāvat aṇavaḥ atīndriyāḥ pramāṇa viṣayāḥ na tad samūhaḥ tasya tat atirekiṇaḥ abhāvāt na avayavī tasya avayava vyatirekeṇa anupalambhāt avyatireke ca tanmātra āpātāt evam āntya avayavebhyaḥ vikalpya avayavī nirākāryaḥ te tu atīndriyāḥ eva atas na kiñcana grāhyam avatiṣṭhate iti tat etat parityāge kim kāraṇam yat pramāṇataḥ eva bāhya apahnavaḥ upanyasyate nirasyate ca iti atas āha bāhya artha iti sārdhena ayam arthaḥ yadi api dvedhā bāhya artha apahnavaḥ bauddhaiḥ āśritaḥ tathā api pramāṇa āśritaḥ eva mūla bhūta tvāt iha vicāryate pramāṇa mūlā hi prameya sthitiḥ tat yadi pramāṇam anuguṇam kim vastu vikalpaiḥ na tad balena tad anupapattim parihṛtya arthaḥ vyavasthāpyate atha tupramāṇam eva artham pratyācaṣṭe kim prameya vikalpaiḥ kṛta karaiḥ iti iha śābare tantre idānīm asmin avasare pramāṇa sthaḥ eva bāhya apahnavaḥ vicāryate iti 
ŚVK_6.18	 nanu yadi pramāṇa sthaḥ vicārayitavyaḥ tatas pratyakṣasya mukhya tvāt tad anusāreṇa eva vicāraḥ yuktaḥ bauddhaiḥ api pratyakṣa sāmarthyāt eva ekam tattvam āśritam na ekasmin ākāre bhāsamāne dvaitam ātmānam labhate iti hi manyante anumānam tu bhrāmyataḥ pratyuktam iti kim tat purassarīkriyate atas āha prastutaḥ iti evam hi manyate yadi api pratyakṣa śakti nirūpaṇam eva bāhya artha sat asadbhāvayoḥ pradhānam tathā api paraiḥ anumānam api bāhya apahnave darśitam iti tat api nirākāryam anirākṛte hi tasmin tatra eva kecid āsthām pratibadhnīyuḥ atra ca ayam eva upanyāsa kramaḥ yuktaḥ yat prathamam anumānam upanyasyate tatas tasya pratyakṣeṇa bādham upanyasya tasmin ca ukte punar pratyakṣa śakti apekṣaṇena pūrva uttara pakṣā= ādaḥ eva pratyakṣa śakti nirūpaṇena nirṇaye kṛte anumānasya upanyāsaḥ anavasaraḥ eva syāt iti 
ŚVK_6.21	 anumāna bhāṣyam idānīm prakṛta saṅgati darśana artham avatārayati tatra iti iti antena saṅgatim āha asya iti durlabhaḥ iti antena ayam arthaḥ yat sūtrakāreṇa tad saṃyoga jam pratyakṣam uktam tad ākṣepeṇa eva saṅgacchate kālpanikaḥ hi ayam indriya artha samprayogaḥ indriya ādeḥ abhāvāt kālpanikaḥ ca sakala mithyā jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ iti tad atad yoga ja tva vibhāgaḥ na yuktaḥ iti sūtra ukta ākṣepaḥ iti 
ŚVK_6.22–6.23	 sva ukta ākṣepeṇa vā saṅgatiḥ iti āha mithyātvam iti yat etat vṛtti kāra grantha antaḥ uktam yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīna pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ iti tat anena ākṣipyate sarva mithyā tve viśeṣaṇa upādāna vaiyarthyam iti bhāṣyatirohitam anumānam idānīm vispaṣṭam upanyasyati stambha ādi iti stambha ādi pratyayaḥ iti dharmi nirdeśaḥ mithyā iti dharma vacanam pratyaya tvāt iti hetuḥ tathā hi iti dṛṣṭānta vacanam iti 
ŚVK_6.25	 atra bhāṣyam sarve eva nirālambanaḥ svapna vat pratyayaḥ iti tat yathāśrutam sarveṣām anālambana tvam sādhayati tatra ca aṃśe siddha sādhana tā syāt vibhramāṇām anālambana tvāt yat vijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate artham tat nirālambanam iṣyate eva tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapna jñānasya api tad antar bhāvāt dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ sarve eva iti ca eva śabda anupapattiḥ ca sa hi vibhakta pratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ yathā idam devebhyaḥ idam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti vibhakte bhavati vacanam sarvam eva idam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti tatra vibhāga pratiṣedha paraḥ eva kāraḥ dṛśyate sarvasmin tu pakṣe sarve iti ācakṣīta na eva kāram prayuñjīta atas jāgrat buddhi vivakṣayā eva bhāṣyam vyākhyātavyam iti āha siddha sādhana iti sārdhena nanu evam api aviśeṣita nirālambanatva upādāne abhyupagama virodhaḥ sva aṃśa ālambana tvam jñānānām bauddhaiḥ iṣyate eva atas āha svāṃśa iti atas eva kāraṇāt bāhya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam anālambana tvam sādhanīyam iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_6.26^1	 aparam api bhāṣyam pratyayasya hi nirālamba natā svabhāvaḥ upalakṣitaḥ svapne jāgrataḥ api stambhaḥ iti vā kuḍyaḥ iti vā pratyayaḥ eva bhavati tasmāt saḥ api nirālambanaḥ iti tasya artham āha pratyayasya iti pratyayasya hi nirālamba natā svabhāvaḥ upalakṣitaḥ svapne iti etāvatā bhāgena tāvat sādhyena nirālambana tvena vyāptam pratyaya tvam hetuḥ nirdiśyate dṛṣṭānta vacanam iti yāvat iti nanu na pratyaya tvāt iti hetuḥ upāttaḥ kasya vyāptiḥ nirdiśyate atas āha hetuḥ ca iti yadi api pratyaya tvasya na vyaktam pañcamyā hetu tvam upāttam tathā api upanayana ākhyena sādhana vākya avayavena jāgrataḥ api ityādinā hetuḥ pradarśitaḥ eva 
ŚVK_6.26^2	 yadā eva hi sādhya anvitam pradarśitam pratyaya tvam punar pratijñā arthaḥ upanīyate tadā eva tat atra hetuḥ iti pradarśitam bhavati eva sādhya anvitasya eva pakṣa sthasya hetu tvāt iti kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ sādhana vākya avayava viśeṣaḥ pañca avayavam hi sādhana vākyam pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanam ca iti tatra sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti hetuḥ utpatti dharmakam sthālī ādi dravyam anityam dṛṣṭam iti udāharaṇam tathā ca utpatti dharmakaḥ śabdaḥ iti upanayaḥ sa hi udāharaṇa apekṣan tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ iti varṇitam kim uktam bhavati 
ŚVK_6.26^3	 dvedhā hi hetuḥ sādhyam sādhayati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt vaidharmyāt vā tatra sādharmyam pradarśitam vaidharmyam tu yathā tasyām eva pratijñāyām tasmin eva utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti hetau anutpatti dharmakam ātma ādi dravyam nityam dṛṣṭam na ca tathā śabdaḥ anutpatti dharmakaḥ iti tatra yaḥ ayam dvividha udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ sādharmya udāhṛte tathā iti vaidharmya udāhṛte na tathā iti sādhyasya śabdasya sambandhitayā utpatti dharmaka tvasya upasaṃhāra vacanam upanayaḥ sa ca udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ eva udāharaṇa dvaitāt eva tad upasaṃhāra dvaitam bhavati vaidharmya udāharaṇena ca viruddha nivṛttyā sādhya sambandhi tvena hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ 
ŚVK_6.26^4	 yathā ātma ādi dravyam nityam anutpatti dharmakam na ca tathā śabdaḥ iti anutpatti dharmaka tva pratiṣedhena utpatti dharmaka tvam upasaṃhriyate prakṛte tu sādharmya udāharaṇetathā eva iti hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ veditavyaḥ nigamanam tu hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam tasmāt utpatti dharmaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti nigamyante anena pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayāḥ ekatra arthaḥ iti nigamanam samarthyante sambadhyante iti yāvat asati hi tasmin anabhivyakta sambandhānām artha pratipādaka tvam na syāt sati tu tasmin sarveṣām avayavānām tātparya darśanāt paraspara sambandhaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhavati nigamanam saṅgamanam sambandhanam iti yāvat iti 
ŚVK_6.27	 nanu na avyāvṛttaḥ vipakṣāt dhetuḥ bhavati iti vaidharmya darśanena hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ darśayitavyaḥ na ca atra tathā darśitaḥ sādharmya mātra vacanāt atas āha vipakṣa iti nirālambana tve hi sādhyamāne sa ālambana tvam vipakṣaḥ na ca sarva anālambana tva vādinaḥ tat asti iti kim tad vyatireka pradarśanena iti nanu pratyaye pakṣīkṛte tasmin eva hetau pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ atas āha sāmānyasya iti sāmānya viśeṣa ātmakāḥ hi pratyayāḥ tatra viśeṣe pakṣīkṛte sāmānyam hetuḥ iti na pratijñā artha eka deśa tā iti 
ŚVK_6.28–29	 atra siddhānta bhāṣyam jāgrataḥ hi buddhiḥ su pariniścitā katham viparyasiṣyati iti anena kila su pariniścita tvena jāgrat dhiyām sa ālambana tvam sādhyate na ca su pariniścita tvam bāhya ālambana sambaddham parān prati prasiddham atas nānena asiddha avayavena anālambana anumānam parāṇudyate sa pratisādhanam vā bhavati tasya ubhaya prasiddha avayava tvāt asya ca tad viparīta tvāt atojāti uttaram eva idam bhāṣya kāreṇa dattam iti ākṣipati jāgrat jñānaḥ iti dvayena vaidharmya vikalpa samayoḥ ca svarūpam śabde vakṣyāmaḥ sati eva pratyaya tve su pariniścita asu pariniścita dharma antara vikalpanāt sādhya dharma vikalpa āpādanena vikalpa sama tā tathā sādharmye vādinā prayukte nirālambanānām svapna jñānānām asu pariniścita tva darśanāt sādhyeṣu jāgrat jñāneṣu su pariniścita tvena vaidharmyāt pratyavasthānena vaidharmya sama tā prapañcaḥ tu paścāt bhaviṣyati iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_6.30^1	 evam ākṣiptam bhāṣyam ekena matena samādadhāti duṣṭa tvāt iti evam hi manyante duṣṭa sādhana prayoge duṣṭam eva uttaram deyam iti evam hi tadā vādī pratibodhitaḥ bhavati yathā bhavān madīyam dūṣaṇam duṣṭam manyate tathā aham api tvad sādhanam atas asau sva sādhanāt nivartate iti idam tu samarthanam na upapadyate nigraha sthāna dvaya prasakteḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇa niranuyojya anuyoga ātmaka nigraha sthāna dvayam evaṃvādinaḥ bhavet yaḥ santam doṣam anuktvā anyam asantam jalpati na ca evaṃvādinaḥ sva sādhana dūṣaṇa avagamaḥ bhavati param eva tu duṣṭa dūṣaṇa prayogeṇa upālabhate atas pāśupata uttara tulyam eka jātīyakam varjanīyam iti anyathā samādhānam āha pratijñā iti na anena anumānam upanyasyate kin tu paroktā anumānasya pratyakṣa virodhaḥ varṇyate asat nikṛṣṭe arthe anumānam pramāṇam iha tu su pariniścitābhiḥ jāgrat buddhibhiḥ niścita sadbhāvasya bāhyasya pratyākhyāna anumānam pratyakṣeṇa mukha nirodhāt na jāyate eva agnau iva śaitya anumānam 
ŚVK_6.30^2	 yadi param bāhyasya prayoga mātra paryavasitam eva sādhana vacanam anumimānasya api sphutaḥ bahis viṣaya bodhaḥ jāyate eva tathāvidhasya api mithyātve kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ nanu evam anumānam anāśvāsanīyam eva na tad abhāvāt uktam etat pratyakṣe paripanthini na tad pratipakṣam anumānam ātmānam labheta śrautaḥ iva viniyoge laiṅgikaḥ sādhana vākye tu ayogya anvaya pada sannikarṣāt vandhyā suta vākya vat saṃsarga jñānam bhrāntiḥ eva na tu kasyacid laiṅgikam stambha ādiṣu abhāva jñānam utpadyate nanu vyāptam pratyaya tvam anālambana tvena vyāpyāt ca jñāta sambandhasya vyāpaka jñānam na utpadyate iti haṭhaḥ eva ayam na vyāpti bhaṅgāt saṃvidan eva hi vyāptim abādhitena pratyakṣeṇa sarva deśa kāla ādi bhāvinā na pratyaya tva prayuktam mithyātvam api tu pūrva ukta hetu dvaya prayuktam iti niścinoti tat idam uktam anyatas tu svapna pratyayasya mithyā bhāvaḥ visaṃvādāt avagamyate iti
