ŚVK_7.17^4	 na anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ tathā hi vāsanā bhedāt jñāna bhedaḥ tad bhedāt vāsanā bhedaḥ iti duruttaram itaretara āśrayam iti atas āha anyonya iti ayam arthaḥ na idam itaretara āśrayam anādiḥ ayam vāsanā jñānayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bīja aṅkurayoḥ iva na atra anyatarasya api pūrva koṭiḥ prasaṅkhyāyate atas vāsanātaḥ jñānam tatas vā āsanā iti kim anupapannam śaktiḥ iti vāsanām apadiśati sā hi jñāna śaktiḥ iti prasiddhā ayam ca anāditayā itaretara āśraya parihāraḥ anādau saṃsāraḥ iti atra sūtritaḥ atra vivṛtaḥ iti anusandhātavyam iti 
ŚVK_7.19^1	 evam tāvat upapāditam jñānam ākāra vat iti idānīm tatra eva kāraṇa antaram āha aneka iti dvayena kalpanā gauravam hi dvaita vādinām āpadyate na asmākam ekatva vādinām iti bhāvaḥ nanu tava api śakti kalpanayā dvaitam eva asatyām hi tasyām pūrva ukta vibhāga anupapattiḥ atas āha śakti mātrasya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na vāsanā nāma kācid vastutas jñāna atirekiṇī asti yā dvaitam āvahati saṃvṛti satya kalpitā hi sā na ca kālpanikam vastu dvaitm āpādayati api ca bahis vastu vādinām api tat upetya tad samavāyi anyaḥ śakti bhedaḥ kalpanīyaḥ eva tad tad kārya bheda upapādanāya 
ŚVK_7.19^2	 tat iyam śakti kalpanā sādhāraṇī jñāna vādinaḥ tu jñāna śakti kalpanā eva kevala iti asti viśeṣaḥ etat ca pāramārthikam śakti bhedam abhyupetya uktam na ca tathā saugatāḥ manyante cit mātram tu sat iti abhyupagamāt iti itas ca jñānam ākāra vat iti āha tasmāt iti jyāyasyantena ubhayoḥ api dvaitādvaita vādinoḥ siddham jñānam atas tasya eva ākāra kalpanā nyāyyā siddhāśraya tvāt iti tasmāt vastu bhedāt ākṛṣya iti arthaḥ tava tu asmākam artha asiddheḥ āśraya antara kalpanā purassarī tad ākāra kalpanā syāt iti āha bhavataḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.20^1	 atra kāraṇam āha tat asiddhau= aśakta tvāt iti nīla ādiḥ hi idam nīlam iti kvacid āśritaḥ dṛśyate na asau āśrayam antareṇa upapadyate tat yadi jñāna āśrayaḥ iṣyate siddhāśrayaḥ bhavati itarathā sādhya āśrayaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ iti api ca evam artha ākāra āśrayaṇe tena vijñānena viprakṛṣṭa tā nīla ādeḥ ākārasya āpadyeta tatas ca tena tad prakāśa ayogaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha tena iti anena ca saṃvedanāt iti bauddha uktaḥ hetuḥ antarṇītaḥ evam hi tena uktam nānā ātmanaḥ saṃvedanam bhavati nīla vittau pīta vat ātma bhūtasya tu sva ātma vat eva prakāśaḥ na anupapannaḥ 
ŚVK_7.20^2	 tat idam uktam anartha antara tve tu nīla ādeḥ anubhavāt tad ā ātma bhūtaḥ prakāśate tathā nīla ādi anubhavaḥ syāt iti tathā iti yathā jñāna ātmā iti uktam bhavati atas saṃvedanāt eva tu bhāsamānasya nīla ādeḥ tad saṃvidaḥ ca avivekaḥ siddhaḥ iti aparam api grāhya lakṣaṇa yogāt iti bāhya apalāpe bauddha uktam hetum upanyasyati pratyāsannam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ mama hi jñāna ātma bhūtam ekānta pratyāsannam nīla ādi yuktam yat grāhyatām pratipadyate asambaddhasya tu grāhya lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ nanu iyam eva arthasya grāhyatā yat tatas jñānasya utpattiḥ tat sārūpyam ca 
ŚVK_7.20^3	 bāhya nīla ādi ābhāsam hi jñānam tad svarūpam tāvat tatas ca utpadyate kadācid jñāna kārya vyatirekāt yathā uktam satsu samartheṣu anyeṣu hetuṣu jñāna kārya anutpattiḥ kāraṇa antara vaikalyam sūcayati sa bāhyaḥ arthaḥ syāt iti sautra antika mate santi khalu āloka indriya manaskāra ādayaḥ te ca jñāna hetavaḥ na ca jñānam jāyate iti dṛṣṭam tat idam bāhya artha sannikarṣāt eva utpadyate iti tad siddhiḥ evam ca utpatti sārūpyābhyām eva artha vedanam iti ucyate arthaḥ gṛhyate iti ca atas utpatti sārūpyayoḥ eva grāhya lakṣaṇa tvāt grāhyaḥ arthaḥ na apahnotum śakyate mā evam 
ŚVK_7.20^4	 evam sati anantaram eva vijñānam tulya viṣayam viṣayaḥ prāpnoti jñānānām tad sārūpyāt tad utpatteḥ ca samanantara pratyaya adhīna janma tvāt uttareṣām api ca na artha jñānayoḥ sārūpyam jñāna pratibhāsinaḥ sthūla ākārasya paramāṇuṣu abhāvāt ekaḥ ca ayam ākāraḥ jñāna sanniveśī bahūni ca sañcitāni rūpa ādīni katham anayoḥ sārūpyam na ca api sthūlaḥ ekaḥ viṣayaḥ avayavi asti tasya avayavebhyaḥ avyatirekāt tat nānā tve nānātva āpattiḥ eka avayava kampe ca sarva avayavi kampa prasaṅgaḥ ekāvṛttau ca abhedāt sarva āvṛttiḥ na vā kasyacid iti avikalpa upalambha prasaṅgaḥ 
ŚVK_7.20^5	 avayavasya āvaraṇam na avayavinaḥ iti ced na abhede tad anupapatteḥ bhede vā tad āvaraṇe api anāvṛta tvāt prāgvat asya darśana prasaṅgaḥ kasmāt ca bhinnaḥ avayava jñāna adhīna jñānaḥ na khalu ghaṭa saṃvid paṭa saṃvidam apekṣate vastu svabhāvāt iti ced na anyatama anupalambhe anupalambha prasaṅgāt katipaya avayava pratipattauvāḥ darśane aṅgulī agra darśane api sthūla upalambha prasaṅgaḥ atas na asti kaścid sthūlaḥ ekaḥ arthaḥ yaḥ jñānam sarūpayati kiñ ca idam ekena vā kenacid ātmanā jñāna arthayoḥ sārūpyam sarva ātmanā vā 
ŚVK_7.20^6	 eka deśa sārūpye nīlam api pīta saṃvidaḥ sarūpam ubhayoḥ kṣaṇika tvāt asādhāraṇa tvāt ca iti tat api grāhyam bhavet evam ca sarvaḥ sarva vid syāt atad utpatteḥ agrāhya tvam iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt nīla buddhiḥ nīla patītābhyām sadṛśī nīlāt eva utpadyate iti na naḥ pramāṇam kramate api ca nīlāt api utpattau na pramāṇam iti anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ samam ca sārūpyam iti na grāhya itara vivekaḥ sarva ātmanā tu sārūpyam ātiṣṭhamānaḥ jaḍa tvam api arthasya buddhā= ādadhyāt evam ca andhyam eva jagataḥ yathā āhuḥ eka deśena sārūpye sarvaḥ syāt sarva vedakaḥ sarva ātmanā tu sārūpye jñānam ajñāna tām vrajet 
ŚVK_7.20^7	 iti na ca tad adhīnā jñāna utpattiḥ upādāna viśeṣa abhāvāt eva kārya vyatireka siddheḥ kārya darśana balena hi vayam samanantara pratyayam eva vāsanā para nāmānam uttara buddhīnām kāraṇam ācakṣmahe tad kārya vyatireke tad abhāvam unnayāmaḥ na hi samagram ca kāraṇam kāryam ca na bhavati iti sambhavati atas upādānam eva tad nāma daśām anupagatam yat na kāryam ārabdha vat iti kim artha grahaṇena yathā uktam yathā kathañcid tasya artha rūpam uktvā avabhāsinaḥ artha grahaḥ katham satyam na jāne aham api īdṛśam iti siddhaḥ satsu api hetu antareṣu kārya vyatirekaḥ 
ŚVK_7.20^8	 tasmāt na utpatti sārūpye grāhya lakṣaṇam na ca agṛhyamāṇaḥ arthaḥ sidhyati iti siddham na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ buddhyā asti tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate iti grāhya lakṣaṇa ayogāt tāvat na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ asti atas eva tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ tena api tad grahaṇa anupapatteḥ atas sva prakāśā dhīḥ eva ekā modate iti siddham yaḥ tu asambaddhasya eva jñānena arthasya prakāśyatām ātiṣṭhate saḥ asambaddhena api dīpena ghaṭasya prakāśyatām ātiṣṭhate iti vivṛtam hetu dvayam saha upalambha niyamaḥ upariṣṭāt vivariṣyate iti 
ŚVK_7.21–7.22	 aparam api jñānasya eva ākāravat tāyām kāraṇam āha itas ca iti yuṣmākam mīmāṃsakānām tat jñānam prakāśakam iti siddhānte iti kasya prakāśakam atas āha svayam iti bāhyasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ svayam prakāśa hīnasya tad upāya tayā sammatam anyathā tad prakāśa ayogāt kim atas yadi evam atas āha na ca iti yat dhi yasya prakāśakam tat gṛhītam eva prakāśayati tat yadi jñānam arthasya prakāśakam etat api na agṛhītam tat prakāśayet atas avaśyam grahītavyam na ca tad anākāram grahītum śakyam na ca artha jñānayoḥ ākāra bheda upalambhaḥ atas avaśya abhyupagantavyam grahaṇasya jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti sāmpratam iti abhiprāyaḥ iti tad adhīna prakāśa tvāt iti jñāna adhīnaḥ prakāśaḥ pratibhāsaḥ yasya iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_7.24	 evam tāvat avaśya grāhya tayā jñānasya eva ākāraḥ avaśya grāhyatā ca prakāśakatayā iti uktam itaraḥ ca avaśya grāhyatā iti āha utpanneṣu iti dvayena dvedhā hi utpannam vastu na gṛhyate prakāśaka abhāvāt pratibandhāt vā yathā andhaka aratirohitaḥ ghaṭaḥ kuḍya ādi pratibandhāt vā yathā loke saḥ eva ca etat ubhayam api jñāne sambhavati atas grahaṇa kāraṇā sambhavāt utpadyamānam eva grahītavyam evam ca tasya eva sa ākāra tva āpattiḥ iti uktam eva iti 
ŚVK_7.25–7.26	 yadi tu artha prakāśāt prāk jñānam na utpadyeta eva tatas asataḥ grahaṇa asambhavān na gṛhyeta na tu evam bhavadbhiḥ api iṣyate utpannāyām eva buddhau arthasya jñāta tva abhyupagamāt tatas prāk utpannasya agrahaṇa kāraṇa abhāva ādau aśyakam tādātvikam grahaṇam iti āha prāk ca artha iti asya antena yadi tu utpanna pratibandham ca kena api na gṛhyate iti ucyate nitya asaṃvedya tā eva tarhi āpadyeta tatas ca abhāvaḥ eva jñānasya bhavet iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ced iti kim punar kāla antare na grahaṇam iti atas āha kim iti agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣe prāc agrahaṇam parastāt ca grahaṇam iti anupapannam iti 
ŚVK_7.27	 nanu utpannasya api saṃvid antara apekṣayā grahaṇam iti kim na upapadyate atas āha jñāna iti yuktam yat aprakāśakaḥ arthaḥ prakāśāya jñāna antaram apekṣate jñānam tu svayam eva prakāśa rūpam iti kim tasya prakāśa antara apekṣayā atas sahasā eva prakāśeta iti tulya jātīya antara apekṣāyām anavasthā yathā āhuḥ jñāna antareṇa anubhave hi iṣṭāḥ iti na ca jñānam na jñāyate eva iti sāmpratam abhāva prasaṅgāt uttara kālam ca smṛti darśanāt saha eva hi vijñānena pūrva dṛṣṭam artham smarantaḥ dṛśyante jñātaḥ asau arthaḥ mayā iti na ca ajñātasya jñānasya smṛtiḥ upapadyate uktam ca paraiḥ tatra api ca smṛtiḥ iti evam ca apara apara jñāna apekṣāyām eka viṣaya saṃvittau eva āyuḥ paryavasyet na viṣaya antara sañcāraḥ jāyeta tatra ca dṛṣṭam jñānam yathā āhuḥ viṣaya antara sañcāraḥ tathā na syāt sa ca iṣyate iti tat etat sarvam abhipretya āha tasya iti 
ŚVK_7.29^1	 itas ca prāk jñānam jñāyate jñāna ākāraḥ ca nīla ādiḥ yena jñāna purassaram eva avagata pūrvam niruddham artham smarantaḥ dṛśyante jñātaḥ mayā atikrāntaḥ amukaḥ rājā iti yadi hi arthasya ākāraḥ bhavet asati arthe satā katham dhīḥ anurajyeta atas buddhiḥ eva tat ākāram artham ālikhya upajāyate iti yuktam yadi ca atīte kāle jñāna purassaram arthaḥ na upalakṣitaḥ bhavet katham idānīm tathā smaryeta yathā avagata grāhiṇyaḥ hi smṛtayaḥ katham mātrayā api pūrva anubhūtam atikrāmanti tasmāt jñāna ākāraḥ nīla ādiḥ jñāna pūrvakaḥ ca artha anubhavaḥ iti āha jñāna iti dvayena tat punar idam paraspara viruddham iva ubhayam sādhyam upalabhyate tathā hi 
ŚVK_7.29^2–7.30	 jñāna pūrvam arthaḥ anubhūyate iti artham aṅgīkaroti iti lakṣyate jñāna ākāra sādhanena ca nirākaroti iti tad viṣayam anṛtam mā evam na atra jñāna purassaram arthaḥ avasīyate iti tātparyam evam tu manyate aṅgīkārayāmi tāvat enam śrotriyam anubhava anubhava purassarīm artha sthitim eṣa hi chāndasaḥ dvaita siddhim evam api aviguṇām manyamānaḥ abhyanujānāti tāvat prathamam jñāna saṃvedanam tatas anākāra upalambha asambhavāt eka ākāra upalambhāt ca anāyāsam eva arthāpalāpam vakṣyāmaḥ iti ca tathā bhāṣya kāreṇa api nanu utpannāyām eva buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti ucyate iti chadmanā eva artha abhyupagamaḥ darśitaḥ vārttikakāreṇa api tathā eva anuvihitam atas na doṣaḥ iti itas ca jñāna anuvidhāyi arthaḥ tathā hi bhavanti vaktāraḥ nīlaḥ ayam arthaḥ tad rūpa anubhavāt iti jñāna nirapekṣe tu artha niścaye na etat upapadyate tat etat āha vaktāraḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.31^1	 atas siddham buddhi jñāna purassaram artha jñānam iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti atra eke vadanti kim idam aniṣṭam āpādyate jñānam anubhūyate iti pratīmaḥ hi vayam ekasyām saṃvidi tritayam pramātā pramitiḥ prameyam ca iti nīla ādi ākāram prameyam pramitim anākārām pramātāram ca tathā hi īdṛśī iyam pratītiḥ nīlam aham jānāmi iti tat iha nīla pada āspadam prameyam mitiḥ jñāna ādi upāttā pramātā tu uttama puruṣeṇa upāttaḥ kim punar atra tritaye pramāṇam pratyakṣam sākṣātkāriṇī hi pratītiḥ pratyakṣam asti ca asyām artha vittau tritayasya sākṣātkāraḥ tatra api mātṛ meyayoḥ para adhīnaḥ prakāśaḥ na miteḥ svayam prakāśa tvāt itarayoḥ tu na svayam prakāśa tvam satoḥ api svapna ādau tad adarśanāt asti khalu ayam puruṣaḥ svāpe jāgarāyām ca pratyabhijñānāt evam eva viṣayāḥ na ca tadā prakāśante tat kasya hetoḥ yadi viṣayāṇām ātmanaḥ ca svayamprakāśa tā saṃvidaḥ tu svāpa ādau asambhavāt eva aprakāśaḥ na aprakāśa tvāt 
ŚVK_7.31^2	 api ca meya mātṛ gocarā phala bhūtā saṃvid avagamyate na tu tasyāḥ api bhinnā saṃvid aparāḥ yat asau api parāyatta prakāśa āśrīyate tat iha sva prakāśā saṃvid tad gocarau mātṛ meyau saṃvid gocara tva aviśeṣe api na ātmanaḥ karma bhāvaḥ gantṛ vat upapatteḥ yathā khalu samāne api triyā phala saṃyoga vibhāga bhāgi tve grāma ādeḥ karma bhāvaḥ na gantuḥ evam pramāṇa phala saṃvitti sambandha aviśeṣe api ātmanaḥ kartṛ tā tat kasya hetoḥ para sama vāyi kriyā phala bhāgitāḥ hi karma tā sa avayavānām gantavyānām ca dehe gati samavāyāt ātmani jñāna samavāyāt tatra asau grāmaḥ karma tathā ca viṣayāḥ iti te tathā atas nirākārā eva saṃvid sva mahimnā sidhyantī mātṛ meyau api vyavasthāpayati kim idānīm pramatta vacassatyam pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate na tu pūrvam jñāyate iti na buddhi apadeśāt tasyāḥ ca anumeya tvāt asti vā buddhi saṃvidoḥ bhedaḥ asti iti brūmaḥ kā tarhi buddhiḥ kā ca saṃvid ātma manassaṃyogaḥ buddhiḥ buddhiḥ jñānam iti anartha antaram phala bhūtā saṃvid anubhava ādi pada āspadam 
ŚVK_7.31^3	 tayā ca ātma mana ssaṃyogaḥ kāraṇa bhūtaḥ anumīyate iti kim anupapannam adūra viprakarṣāt anyataratra anyatara pada prayogaḥ nanu evam saṃvidisaṃvedyeṣu ca saṃvedyamāneṣu saṃvedya dvaya upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ na ca evam eka ākāra saṃvedanāt uktam atra ekaḥ eva ākāraḥ saṃvedyaḥ anākārā saṃvid prakāśate iti kim idānīm asaṃvedya eva saṃvid na brūmaḥ asaṃvedyā iti saṃvid tayā eva hi saṃvid saṃvedyate na saṃvedya tayā kā iyam vācoyuktiḥ iyam iyam na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate iti svayam prakāśa tvāt na ca evam asaṃvid na atanmūla tvāt saṃvedya bhāvasya sarva bhāvānām sā hi sarva bhāvānām siddhiḥ na ca āsan cetītā sidhyati iti katham te api sidhyeyuḥ atas saṃvid prakāśaḥ eva dvaitam sādhayati iti kim siddha sādhanena saṃvid upārūḍhaḥ hi nīla ādiḥ advaitam āpādayati saṃvid ā eva tu anākāra saṃviditayā vyatirecitaḥ nīla ādiḥ na advaitāya ghaṭataḥ iti siddham pramātā pramitiḥ prameyam ca iti tān pratyāha na ca iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ śrotriya dṛṣṭyā eva tāvat buddhiḥ anumeyā iti lakṣyate 
ŚVK_7.31^4	 yat evam āha jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti yat tu jñāna abhiprāyam tat na saṃvid abhiprāyam iti tat na paryāya tvāt anayoḥ cetanā buddhiḥ jñānam saṃvid iti anartha antaram iti laukikāḥ budhyante na ca ātma manasoḥ saṃyogaḥ cetanā rūpa ādi tulya guṇa tvāt tat cetanā tve ca manasaḥ caitanya prasaṅgaḥ tasya ātma manasoḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt acetanā buddhiḥ iti alaukikam yathā āhuḥ buddhiḥ cetanā eva hi gamyate iti atas yā eva asau anākārā saṃvid bhavatā abhimatā sā eva tāvat buddhiḥ tat abhiprāyam eva buddhi anumeya tva abhidhānam na tu anākārā saṃvid aparokṣam anubhūyate buddhiḥ ca anumīyate iti sāmpratam tat ayam arthaḥ yā asau laukikī buddhiḥ na asau anākārāḥ aparokṣam upalabhyate tasmāt pratyakṣa buddhi vādinā ayam ākāraḥ jñāna sanniveśī vācyaḥ yathā asmābhiḥ uktam yathāvārttikam vā siddhāntaḥ arthaḥ eva pratyakṣaḥ na buddhiḥ iti tatra ca uktā buddhi anumāne liṅga anupapattiḥ atas asiddham anirākārāyāḥ buddheḥ anupalambhāt saṃvid eva dvaitam sādhayati iti 
ŚVK_7.32^1	 api ca evam saha upalambha niyamāt trayasya abheda āpattiḥ iti āha viveka buddhi abhāvāt ca iti trayāṇām viveka buddhi abhāvāt ekasya eva jñānasya ākāravat tayā bodhaḥ prasajyate iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ jñāna grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham ekam eva tattvam ākāra vat bhavet iti vivakṣitam yaḥ hi meya mātṛ pramāsu saha upalambham ātiṣṭhate tasya anyatara vivikta anyatara buddhi abhāvāt abhedaḥ eva trayasya āpadyeta bhede niyama ayogāt bhinnānām hi ghaṭa ādīnām aniyataḥ saha upalambhaḥ te hi sahabhāvena vivekena ca upalabhyante atas aniyam avyāptaḥ bhedaḥ na arhati vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhau bhavitum dhūmaḥ iva agninā vyāptaḥ anagnau bhinna avabhāsāt bhedaḥ iti ced na anekāntāt 
ŚVK_7.32^2	 tatra etat syāt ekadā api hi tritayam anubhūyamānam bhinnam eva avabhāsate ghaṭa kuḍya ādi vat ataḥ bhidyate iti tat na anaikāntika tvāt bheda upalambhasya bhede upalabhyate khalu dvi candra ādi bodhe abhinnaḥ candraḥ na ca ekasmāt bhidyate tat kasya hetoḥ saha upalambha niyamāt eva sa hi mukhyena niyata saha upalambhaḥ tat na tatas bhidyate tat aniyata saha upalambhāḥ eva bhāvāḥ bhedena avasīyamānāḥ bhidyante na itare yathā āhuḥ na bhinna avabhāsi tve api anartha antara rūpa tvam nīlasya anubhavāt tayoḥ saha upalambha niyamāt dvi candra ādi vat iti nanu bhinnayoḥ api rūpa ālokayoḥ saha upalambha niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ anāloka upalambhā na rūpa buddhiḥ yatas tat na kevalasya api kvacid ālokasya darśanāt rūpasya ca prāṇi viśeṣeṣu anālokasya 
ŚVK_7.32^3	 santi hi kecid prāṇinaḥ ye andhakāraḥ eva rūpam ālokayante āloke tu pratihanyante mātṛ meya saṃvedanāni tu saha eva upalabhyante iti na bhedam arhanti na hi nīlāt bhinnam pītam tena saha niyamena upalabhyate atas saha upalambha niyamāt abhinnam trayam āpadyate iti nanu ca ayam upālambhaḥ astu saha upalambha niyama vādinām ekeṣām mīmāṃsakānām ye tu viṣaya vitti purassarīm buddhi saṃvidam ātiṣṭhante teṣām asiddhaḥ saha upalambha niyamaḥ sadā eva hi viṣaya saṃvedana uttara kālam eva saṃvid upalabhyate yathā āhuḥ pūrvam saṃgṛhyate paścāt jñānam tad jñāta tā vaśāt iti tān pratyāha sā iti te iti antena ayam abhiprāyaḥ idam tāvat avivādam sa ākāram vastu dṛśyate iti 
ŚVK_7.32^4	 sa ākāra darśanam ca idam apratyakṣe saṃvedane na upapadyate viṣayaḥ sat mātra tayā na prakāśate yatas tathā sati nitya prakāśa āpatteḥ atas viṣaya upalambha sat tayā eva viṣaya prakāśaḥ na tad svarūpa sattayā viṣaya upalambha sattā ca asiddhā na sattā nibandhana vyavahārāya ghaṭataḥ iti tad siddhiḥ āstheyāḥ na ca vitteḥ anyā siddhiḥ bhāvānām tat yadi upalambhaḥ viditaḥ asiddhaḥ tad asiddhau viṣaya asiddhiḥ yena saḥ eva tad siddhiḥ iti viśvam astamitam atas asmāt sa ākārasya eva vastunaḥ darśanāt anupapadyamānāt avagamyate yat asti saha upalambhaḥ iti anyathā tad darśana ayogāt yathā āhuḥ apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti atas siddham saha upalambha niyamāt jñānasya ākāravat tayā bodhaḥ na asti tattvataḥ bhedaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.33^1	 āha yadi upalambha asiddhau upalabhyaḥ api na sidhyati astu upalambha asiddhiḥ upalambha antareṇa tu siddhaḥ upalabhyam sādhayiṣyati evam api saha upalambha niyama asiddhiḥ iti upalambha siddhi pūrvaka tvāt upalabhya siddheḥ upalabhya siddhi purassarī tu upalambha siddhiḥ pratikṣiptā siddheḥ asiddhau sādhya asiddheḥ siddhi siddhi pūrvikā tu sādhya siddhiḥ kim na iṣyate atas asiddhaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ atas āha na hi iti asya arthaḥ na iyam īdṛśī kalpanā sambhavati yat anākārā saṃvid ādau anubhūyate tatas ca paścāt sa ākāraḥ arthaḥ iti nirākāra buddhi anupalabdheḥ ukta tvāt itas ca na evam kalpanā yuktāḥ 
ŚVK_7.33^2	 katham hi sva upalambha kāle saṃbhinnaḥ arthaḥ sva upalambha upalambha avasare saṃvedyeta yaḥ hi upalabhyamānaḥ eva na siddhaḥ saḥ anya upalambha avasare anupalabhyamānaḥ eva setsyati iti su vyāhṛtam api ca anyena saṃvedana upalambhe saḥ api asiddhaḥ tad sādhanāya na prabhavati iti apara apara apekṣāyām anavasthā ekā siddhau sarva asiddhiḥ kvacid vā sva prakāśe anye api tathā syuḥ aviśeṣāt atas sva ātmānam viṣaya ākāram ca yugapad jñānam upalabhate iti siddhaḥ saha upalambha niyamaḥ eka vyāpāre krama ayogāt ekaḥ khalu ayam saṃvidaḥ sva ātmani viṣaya ākāre ca vyāpāraḥ prakāśa ātmā na ayam krama bhāvī na sambhavati iti 
ŚVK_7.34	 nanu mā bhūt anākārāyāḥ buddheḥ upalambhaḥ sā api tu ākāravatī eva upalapsyate arthaḥ ca tasmāt dvayoḥ ākāravat tvam bhaviṣyati tatas ca upalabhyate iti kim anupapannam atas āha ākāra iti asya arthaḥ yaḥ ayam jñāna arthayoḥ ākāravat tva bhedaḥ yadi ayam jñātaḥ syāt tathā asati jñātvā bhāṣitum api śakyeta nīla pīta bheda vat na ca evam bhāṣitum śakyam īdṛśaḥ jñāna ākāraḥ īdṛśaḥ artha ākāraḥ iti nīla ādi ākāra mātra jñānāt iti evam hi sarvam samañjasam bhavati yadi buddhi grahaṇāt prāk eva sa ākāraḥ arthaḥ sidhyati tatas hi tad siddhi anyathā anupapattyā jñānam api kadācid sidhyet iti sidhyati dvaitam atra punar agṛhītāyām buddhau arthaḥ na sidhyati iti sa ākārasya ca darśanāt iti atra sādhitam atas na kathañcid dvaita siddhiḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha prāk iti 
ŚVK_7.35	 anyat matam satyam ākāra vat jñānam kin tu arthena ayam ākāraḥ jñānaḥ ādhīyate ayam eva artha jñānayoḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ yat arthasya jñāne su a ākāra samarpaṇam katham aparathā kṣaṇika tvāt atītaḥ asamasamaya bhāvi arthaḥ jñāna ālambanam bhavet yathā āhuḥ bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhyatām viduḥ hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam iti etat dūṣayati na ca iti kim iti na evam atas āha na hi iti artha ākāraḥ hi artha dharmaḥ na ca dharmaḥ sva āśrayam hātum āśraya antaram vā upagantum prabhavati svarūpa hāna āpatteḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.36	 api ca pramāṇa antara prasiddhe arthasya akāravat tve bhavet api evam na ca tasya ākārasya ittham bhāve artha dharma tve pramāṇam asti hetu antara sambhave api kārya aniṣpattiḥ kāraṇa antara vaikalyam sūcayati iti tu nirākṛtam upādāna viśeṣāt eva kārya siddheḥ ukta tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha ittham iti ye tu vadanti mā nāma artha ākāraḥ artham hātum āśraya antaram vā upagantum prabhavati arthasya eva pratibimbam idam śuddha ādarśa pratīkāśe svacche jñāna ātmani dṛśyate iti tān pratyāha tadīyā iti etasmāt eva iti artha ākāra tve pramāṇa abhāvāt iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_7.37–7.39	 tān eva prasiddha pratibimba udāharaṇena pratibodhayati niścandra iti tam iti yogyatayā candraḥ pratinirdiśyate khe ca jale ca iti arthaḥ na ca eṣa nyāyaḥ atra sambhavati iti āha vijñāna iti api ca astu rūpavatsu pratibimba kalpanā arūpāṇām tu śabda ādīnām pratibimba kalpanā na kathañcid sambhavati iti āha śabda iti api ca nīla ādi ākārā saṃvid upalabhyate tat kim aparāddham anayā yat tām anādṛtya ayam ākāraḥ artha dharma tayā abhyupagamyate pratibimba vat ca darśanam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha jñāne ca iti 
ŚVK_7.40	 yaḥ tu vadati na artha ākāraḥ jñāne saṅkrāmati na ca artha sthaḥ pratibimbaḥ dṛśyate kin tu jñānam arthena ayaḥ golakam iva agninā saṃspṛṣṭam atas ayasi iva bhāsvara ākāraḥ mohāt artha ākāraḥ jñāne dṛśyate iti tam pratyāha bahya iti ayaḥ tejasoḥ hi sannikarṣāt yuktaḥ mohāt aviveka bhramaḥ bāhya abhyantara deśau tu jñāna arthau asampṛktau tatas katham anayoḥ mohāt aviveka bhramaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.41	 api ca kaścid ekaḥ sammūḍhaḥ bhavati jagataḥ tu sammoha kalpanā sammohaḥ eva na ca atra kaścid kadācid asammūḍhaḥ dṛśyate sarvasya viveka adarśanāt atas na sammoha kalpanā yuktā iti āha asammūḍhasya iti yadi tu jñāna arthayoḥ viviktayoḥ adarśane api sammohaḥ kalpyate tarhi dvayoḥ eva na avatiṣṭeta evam hi yatheṣṭam eva tattvāni prasaṅkhyāya sammohaḥ abhidhīyatām kim viśeṣāt iti āha kalpyamānaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.42	 anyat darśanam na artha ākāraḥ mohāt jñāne avagamyate kin tu sāṃsargikaḥ ayam ākāraḥ cūrṇa haridrayoḥ iva aruṇim eti tat api atas eva bāhya abhyantara deśa tvāt anupapannam iti āha saṃsarga iti tat eva prakaṭayati deśa bhedāt iti api ca amūrtam jñānam mūrtaḥ arthaḥ katham anayoḥ saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ bhavet ghaṭākāśa ādau adarśanāt iti āha mūrta amūrta tayā tathā iti 
ŚVK_7.43	 nanu asati api eka deśa tve eka kāla tayā saṃsargaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha trailokyena iti trailokyam hi jñānena sama kāla tayā saṃspṛṣṭam saṃsarga janma ākāram pratibhāsayet na ca evam asti tasmāt ati vyāpteḥ na eka kāla tayā saṃsargaḥ iti nanu ārjava avasthānam jñāna arthayoḥ saṃsargaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca iti nirmukhasya ārjava abhāvāt na jñānena arthasya ārjava avasthānam sarvatodiś padārtha bodhena sarvatomukha tve vā sarva artha saṃsarga prasaṅgāt sarva ākāra upalabdhiḥ na hi sarvatomukham kasyacid ekasya abhimukham yuktam iti 
ŚVK_7.44–7.45	 api ca yena eva arthena jñānasya saṃsargaḥ kalpyate sarvathā eva tena saṃsargaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ nirbhāga tvāt evam ca cakṣuṣā ekatra bhāve anubhūyamāne tena eva tad gata rasa ādi upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ tad gata sūkṣma ākāra upalabdhiḥ ca iti āha sarvathā iti nanu yat eva tad arthasya jñānam prati viṣaya tayā avasthānam saḥ anayoḥ saṃsargaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca iti atra kāraṇam āha viṣaya tvam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ saṃsarga ākāra vādinā hi prāk eva ākāra upalambhanāt saṃsargaḥ vaktavyaḥ na ca viṣaya tvam ākāra upalambhanāt prāk asti atas katham tat nibandhana ākārā saṃvid bhavati 
ŚVK_7.46	 kim iti na syāt atas āha na hi iti saṃvedyamānaḥ eva hi bhāvaḥ viṣayaḥ iti viṣaya vidaḥ atas upalambha uttara kālam eva viṣaya bhāvāt na tad nibandhanaḥ ākāra bodhaḥ śakyate aṅgīkartum iti evam tu kalpyamānaḥ itaretara āśrayam prāpnoti iti āha viṣaya iti nīlatva viṣaya tvena saṃsargāt tad ākāraḥ niṣpadyate tad ākāra niṣpattyā ca tasya viṣaya bhāvaḥ iti duruttaram itaretara āśrayam iti 
ŚVK_7.47–7.48	 dūṣaṇa antaram āha dvayoḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi jñāna arthayoḥ dvayoḥ api ākāra śūnyam sva rūpam avagatam syāt punar ca kadācid saṃspṛṣṭa tvena ākāra saṃvittiḥ tadā bhavet api saṃsarga dharma ākāra kalpanā na ca evam asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ na ca arthasya jñānāt viviktasya sadbhāvaḥ gṛhīta pūrvaḥ na ca jñānasya upari gṛhyate yena cūrṇa haridrayoḥ iva vivikta gṛhītayoḥ anayoḥ saṃsargaḥ kalpyate iti āha na ca iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti saṃsarga dharma tve hi ākārasyaprathamam dvayoḥ api anākāra bodhena bhavitavyam na ca ākāra śūnyam grāhyam asti iti pūrvam uktam iti 
ŚVK_7.49	 upasaṃharati tasmāt iti kim punar idam arthasya sadbhāvaḥ na gṛhītaḥ iti jñāna vaicitrya anupapattiḥ eva hi arthasya sadbhāve pramāṇam svaccha ākārasya hi jñānasya na kāraṇa antaram antareṇa ākāra sambandhaḥ tad vaicitryam ca upapadyate atas asti kaścid jñāna atiriktaḥ hetuḥ yena idam vaicitryam ādhīyate iti abhyupagantavyam na ca indriyāṇi eva tatra kāraṇam iti yuktam teṣām eka rūpa tvena kārya vaicitrya anupapatteḥ na ca samanantara pratyayāt eva kevalāt vicitra ākāra darśanam ucitam visadṛśa pratyaya anantaram eva hi vayam ekānta visadṛśam pratyayam upādīyamānam upalabhāmahe tat tad hetuka tve anupapannam yathā kārya darśanam tu vicitrāḥ eva hetavaḥ kalpyante iti yuktam te ca artha śabda vācyāḥ evan ca prasiddha sadbhāvaḥ arthaḥ jñānam ca avivāda siddham eva iti prasiddha sadbhāvayoḥ nyāyyaḥ eva saṃsargaḥ atas āha jñāna vaicitryā iti 
ŚVK_7.50^1	 kim iti na kalpanā atas āha tat iti yadi vaicitryam artha adhīna tayā vidita pratibandham bhavet evam artham anumāpayet atyanta aparidṛṣṭa pūrveṇa tu arthena na kvacid vaicitrya ādhānam dṛṣṭam iti na tad darśanena tad anumānam yuktam kārya darśana balena kutaścid eva samanantara pratyaya viśeṣāt kiñcid ākāram jñānam jāyate iti na na upapannam vilakṣaṇā hi te upādāna viśeṣāḥ vilakṣaṇa śaktayaḥ iti na kiñcid duṣyati iti kārya darśana bala anusāriṇyām eva ca kāraṇa vyavasthāyām suṣvāpa ādau api ākāra abhāva siddhiḥ kārya abhāvena kāraṇa abhāva anumānāt bhavati tu tāsu api daśāsu svaccha saṃvid santānaḥ parastāt jñāna darśanāt anupādāna kāraṇasya tasya anupapatteḥ katham anākārāt ākāravataḥ niṣpattiḥ iti ced katham visadṛśāt visadṛśasya utpattiḥ tatra api śakti bhedaḥ eva kārya darśana bala anumeyaḥ nibandhanam 
ŚVK_7.50^2	 kaścid eva iha mūrdhādau= ante pratyaya bhedaa āvirasti yaḥ parastāt mūrcchā ucchede nīla ādi ākāra pratyayam upajanayati sa tasya ayam acintanīyaḥ mahimā kārya darśana pramāṇakaḥ na mīmāṃsyate iti sūktam artha sadbhāvaḥ na gṛhītaḥ iti api ca yadi sa ākāraḥ arthaḥ tad adhīnam ca jñānānām vaicitryam katham tarhi mūrchā ādau antimena nirākāreṇa jñānena parastāt bhāvinaḥ jñāna jātasya ākāraḥ vaicitryam vā upapadyate na hi tat ubhayam api artha janyam sati eva tasmin abhāvāt mūrchāyām api hi arthaḥ āsīt eva na ca tena asau ākāraḥ darśitaḥ atas vyabhicāriṇaḥ samanantara pratyaya viśeṣāt eva nirākārāt api vaicitrya ākārayoḥ utpattiḥ abhyupagantavyā evan ca sarvatra eva tathā abhyupagantum ucitam kim artha graheṇa paṭhanti ca artha grahaḥ katham satyam iti tat etat āha nirākāreṇa iti 
ŚVK_7.51	 api ca sa ākārāḥ nīla ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ jñānam sarūpayantu nirākāraḥ tu gagana kusuma śaśa viṣāṇa vandhyā suta ādi viṣayaḥ katham buddhau= ākāram ādadhyāt na hi tatra viṣaya ākāraḥ nāma kaścid asti balāt tatra buddhiḥ eva sa ākāra iti vaktavyam tat vyāpakam astu kim ardha jaratīyena iti abhiprāyeṇa āha nirākārāt iti api ca pūrva anubhūteṣu smaryamāṇeṣu asambandha svabhāveṣu svapna ādi bodhe ca atyanta anantān anubhūta sva śiraḥ cheda ādi viṣaye viṣaya ākāra abhāvāt anākāraḥ tad vādinām jñānam āpadyate iti āha smṛti iti 
ŚVK_7.52	 atra kāraṇam āha na hi iti satā satā iti bhāvaḥ katham tarhi tatra ākāra asambandhaḥ atas āha kevala iti vāsanā iti samanantara pratyayam eva upādāna apara nāmānam upādatte na tu jñāna atireki pūrvam cirantana bauddha matena vāsanā bhedaḥ varṇitaḥ iti veditavyam iti evan ca jāgrat buddhiṣu api vāsanā hetukaḥ eva ākāra pratibhāsaḥ yuktaḥ āśrayitum kim ardha jaratīyena iti abhiprāyeṇa āha iti iti 
ŚVK_7.54	 kiñ ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāna ākāra kalpanā eva sādhīyasi iti darśayati anvaya iti evaṃśabdaḥ yukti antara upanyāsaḥ iti katham avagamyate atas āha na hi iti vadantena asya arthaḥ asati api bāhye svapna ādau jñāna mātra anvayāt eva ākāra anvayaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ jñāna prabhāvitaḥ eva avasīyate na tu evam artha vādinaḥ jñāna apetam arthasya ākāra anvayam darśayitum śaktāḥ asati jñānaḥ ākāra pratibhāsā yogāt iti atas siddham tāvat vāsanā nimittaḥ eva ayam jñāna ākāraḥ na artha saṃsarga dharmaḥ iti yadi tu avaśyam sāṃsargikaḥ ayam ākāraḥ vaktavyaḥ paramaḥ tu svabhāva nirākārāṇām jñānānām vāsanā saṃsarga nibandhana tvena ākārasya saṃsarga vāc pravṛttiḥ iti āha tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_7.55	 pratyūḍhaḥ saṃsarga dharma pakṣaḥ anyat matam nīla ādiḥ ākāraḥ bhāsate na ca ayam jñāna arthayoḥ anyatara āśraya tayā nirdhārayitum śakyate tat ayam agṛhyamāṇe viśeṣe ekaḥ eva dvayam sā ākārayati iti āśrīyate lākṣā rāgaḥ eva sannihitam maṇi yugalam tat etat upanyasya dūṣayati dvayoḥ iti katham apramāṇam atas āha deśa bhedāt iti antaḥstham hi jñānam bahis arthaḥ na anayoḥ sannikarṣaḥ asti iti na idam ubhayam ekam ākāram upajīvitum utsahate maṇi yugalam tu sannihitam ekaḥ lākṣā rāgaḥ anurañjayati iti na na upapannam iti nanu bhinna deśayoḥ api kutaścid saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ eka ākāra upajīvanam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha asaṃsargāt iti uktam idam na anayoḥ kadācid saṃsargaḥ gamyate maṇeḥ iva pramāṇa abhāvāt iti api ca pṛthak avadhārita sadbhāvasya dvayasya sādhāraṇaḥ ākāraḥ bhavet na tu atra vibhakta ākāram dvayam upalabhyate sarva dā eva eka ākāra upalambhāt uktam ca artha jñānayoḥ ākāra bhedam na upalabhāmahe iti tat etat āha dvayoḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.56	 anyat darśanam vibhakta ākāram eva idam ubhayam atyanta su sadṛśa tvena tu ākāra vivekaḥ na lakṣyate nīlotpala vanaḥ iva kādambakānām iti etat upanyasya dūṣayati evam iti sādṛśyāt avibhakta tā na syāt iti anvayaḥ iti kāraṇam āha bhedaḥ iti nirjñāta bhedayoḥ hi indīvara kādambayoḥ sādṛśyāt aviveka abhidhānam yuktam pṛthak anavagata pūrvasya tu arthasya khapuṣpa tulyasya sādṛśyāt avivekaḥ iti mahān ayam avivekaḥ iti sarve ca ete bāhya arthavādi bauddha eka deśi pakṣāḥ upanyasya dūṣitāḥ iti veditavyam iti 
ŚVK_7.57–7.58	 itas ca jñānasya ākāraḥ iti āha tathā iti dvi candra ādi vibhrameṣu anyathā arthe vyavasthite anya ākārā buddhiḥ upajāyate tat ca artha nibandhana tve tu ākārasya na upapadyate katham hi anya ākāraḥ arthaḥ hi anya ākārām dhiyam upajanayet tat avaśyam asati api arthe bhāsamānaḥ ākāraḥ jñānasya eva vaktavyaḥ atas sarvatra eva tathā avadhāraṇam yuktam iti abhiprāyaḥ kiñca yat etat viruddha an eka liṅga tvam ekasya nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ dārāḥ ityādiṣu tad artha ākāra tve na upapadyate viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda nibandhana tvena artha bheda āpatteḥ bhinnāni eva tu vicitra vāsanā nibandhanāni vicitra artha jñānāni jāyante iti yuktam tat etat āha nakṣatram iti 
ŚVK_7.59	 yathā ekasyām eva pramadā tanau yā iyam parivrāj kāmu kaśunām kuṇapam kāminī bhakṣaḥ iti kalpanā bhavati sā api eka ātma tvāt ekasya arthasya artha vādinām na upapadyata eti āha parivrāj iti atra na artha nibandhanā iti anuṣañjanīyam iti idam ca aparam bāhya artha vādinām na upapadyate iti āha dīrgha iti ekā eva hi pradeśinī aṅguṣṭha madhyama aṅgulī apekṣayā dīrgha hrasvatayā avagamyate tat ca etat ekātmye tasya artha vādinām na upapadyate pūrvam ca pramātṛ apekṣayā aneka ākāra saṃvid uktā atra tu na kevalam bhinnānām pramātṝṇām ekatra aneka ākāra buddhiḥ ekasya api tu upādhi bhedāt aneka ākāra bodhaḥ dṛśyate iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_7.60	 na kevalam aupādhikaḥ nānā ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ kin tu ghaṭaḥ ayam pārthivaḥ ayam ityādiḥ ekatra eva arthe yugapad anekeṣām grāhakāṇām vikalpaḥ dṛśyate tat ca idam pāramārthika artha sadbhāve na upapadyate tasya eka ātma tvāt ekaḥ arthaḥ eka ātmakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ eva sa tathā avagamyate na ca evam atas buddhi mātra vilasitam eva idam aneka ākāra tvam iti sāmpratam tat etat āha ghaṭa tvā iti atra ca prātilomyena antya sāmānyāt prabhṛti para sāmānyam yāvat upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ iti anusandhātavyam jñeya tā tu na sāmānyam jñāna sambandha upādhika tvāt ayam api ca pratīti prakāraḥ dṛśyate iti pradarśana artham uktam yadi api ca atra ghaṭa tva ādīnām dīrgha tva ādīnām iva virodhaḥ na dṛśyate tathā api eka ātmaka tvāt ekasya nirbhāgasya artha ātmanaḥ nānā ākāra pratibhāsaḥ anupapannaḥ iti uktam iti 
ŚVK_7.61–7.62	 kim iti na syāt atas āha na iti na tāvat ekatra arthaḥ eka ātmani aneka ākāra tvaḥ evam nyāyyaḥ yathā āhuḥ anyathā ekasya bhāvasya nānā rūpa avabhāsinaḥ satyam katham syuḥ ākārāḥ tad eka tvasya hānitaḥ iti natarām viruddha ākāra sambhavaḥ sa ca prāk eva uktaḥ anusandhātavyaḥ iti jñāna vādinaḥ tu nānā pratyayāḥ nānā prakārāḥ bhavanti iti yuktam iti āha pratyayānām iti kim punar eṣām tathā tve kāraṇam atas āha śakti anusārataḥ śaktiḥ iti samanantara pratyayam eva apadiśasti tad adhīna tvāt jñāna kārya niṣpatteḥ tat atiriktā tu śaktiḥ apramāṇikā eva iti na bauddhaiḥ iṣyate eva iti atas siddham tāvat bhāsamānaḥ ākāraḥ jñānasya eva na tu artha apekṣaḥ artha nirapekṣam eva tu svarūpeṇa yādṛśam jñānam yadi tad anusārī arthaḥ abhyupagantum iṣyate saḥ astu nāma na punar yathārtham jñānam nāma kiñcid asti iti āha nirapekṣam iti 
ŚVK_7.63	 astu tarhi jñāna anusārī eva arthaḥ na evam api dvaita hāniḥ iti atas āha ittham iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ gala jihvikayā idam asmābhiḥ uktam tathā arthaḥ iti na tu jñāna ākāra tve arthaḥ nāma kaścid sidhyati ākāra bhedānupalambhāt atas na vijñāna tantra tve artha kalpanā śakyate kartum arthena anāropita ākārā dhīḥ eva sva ātmani eva upayokṣyate sva ātmānam eva prakāśayati na tu artha viṣayāḥ yadi evam sarva saṃvidām anarthaka tvāt kiṃkṛtaḥ pramāṇa itara vivekaḥ artha kriyā kāri pratyaya sat asat bhāva kṛtaḥ iti jñātvā śāmyatu bhavān vyavahāra saṃvāda apekṣayā hi pramāṇam tad visaṃvādāt apramāṇam iti sāṃvyavahārikī pramāṇa sthitiḥ pāramārthikam tu pramāṇam cintā mayīm eva prajñām anuśīlayantaḥ kecid eva kṛtinaḥ nirdhūta nikhila nīla ādi uparāgam abhimukhīkurvanti itiii tat turīyam pratyakṣam ācakṣate 
ŚVK_7.64.1^1	 siddhāntam idānīm ārabhate na iti asya arthaḥ ekam hi jñānam grāhya grāhakam iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ na ca ekasya ubhaya ātmaka tve kaścid dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tat punar idam pūrva aparayoḥ anavahitasya iva bhāṣitam tathā hi na tāvat grāhya grāhaka ākāram jñānam iti bauddhaiḥ iṣyate api tarhi pralīna grāhya grāhaka udgrāham cit mātram eva svayaṃprakāśam iti uktam hi grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate iti bauddha gandhimīmāṃsakaiḥ api uktam saṃvid tayā eva hi saṃvid saṃvedyate na tu saṃvedya tayā na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate iti dṛṣṭānta abhāva vacanam api ca asamartham na hi idānīm anumānataḥ bauddhasya pratyavasthānam yena dṛṣṭānta abhāva vacanena upālabhyate nirālambana anumānasya pratyakṣa bādhaḥ ukte samprati pratyakṣa śakti parīkṣayā eva pratyavasthitam na jñānam bahis arthe pravartitum śaktam grāhya lakṣaṇa ayogāt itya ādibhiḥ atas kim dṛṣṭānta abhāva vacanena upālabhyate atra ucyate evam hi manyate avaśyam ayam grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ saṃvidaḥ bauddhaiḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ katham anyathā sā eva sidhyati 
ŚVK_7.64.1^2	 na hi agrahaṇa karmaṇaḥ kasyacid siddhiḥ asti nanu sva prakāśaḥ prakāśaḥ kim asya prakāśa antareṇa sva prakāśaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ svayam eva prakāśate na tu prakāśa antaram apekṣate iti kim punar idam prakāśate iti prakāśāt artha antara vacanam na vā yadi artha antara vacanam asti tarhi saṃvidaḥ api aparaḥ prakāśaḥ anyathā prakāśate iti anadhika artham avacanīyam eva svarūpam hi saṃvid padena eva upāttam atas pratīti karma tā eva saṃvidaḥ prakāśa tepadārthaḥ ghaṭaḥ prakāśate iti vat syāt etat kartṛ pratinirdeśaḥ ayam na atas karma bhāvaḥ avasīyate iti na evam evam api prakāśa tepadārthasya kartṛ bhāvaḥ vācyaḥ na asau asati prakāśa bhede sidhyati advitīyasya bhettum aśakya tvāt atas na aprāptasya siddhiḥ asti na ca api karmaṇaḥ prāptiḥ asti iti satyāḥ saṃvidaḥ avaśyam prāpya karmatā bhāva antara vat vaktavyā na anyā gatiḥ asti nanu arthaḥ karma ātmā kartā saṃvid tu phalam tat katham karma iti ucyate na phalasya api apratīti karmaṇaḥ siddhi asambhavāt 
ŚVK_7.64.1^3	 anyathā mātṛ meyayoḥ api sva prakāśa āpātāt kim tad siddhi artham saṃvid abhyupagamena na prayojanataḥ saṃvidam saṅgirāmahe api tu pratītitaḥ pratīmaḥ hi vayam mātṛ meya gocarām phala bhūtām saṃvidam na tatas api bhinnām aparām iti tāvatī eva vyavatiṣṭhāmahe mā evam nirākṛtam idam nānā ākārā dhīḥ upalabhyate iti na hi naḥ saṃvid prakāśa vat artha prakāśaḥ api bhāsate nīla ādi ākāra mātra prakāśāt nanu aprakāśa ātmānaḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ prakāśa antaram apekṣantām saṃvidaḥ tu tad rūpāyāḥ kim iti prakāśa antara apekṣayā na atad rūpa tvāt saṃvidaḥ api hi na sva ātma prakāśa ātma tvam artha prakāśaḥ hi asau vakṣyati ca īdṛśam vā prakāśa tvam tasya iti atas avaśya abhyupagantavyaḥ saṃvid siddhaye prakāśa bhedaḥ kim idānīm asiddhā eva saṃvid saṃvedyam sādhayati saṃvid antara siddhā vā na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ aprasiddhā hi asatī na saṃvid vyavahārāya ghaṭataḥ iti uktam saṃvid antara adhīnāyām tu siddhau avyavasthāpātaḥ iti uktam satyam na saṃvid antara adhīna siddhiḥ saṃvid saṃvedyam sādhayati svarūpa sati eva tu 
ŚVK_7.64.1^4	 katham adhīviṣayā sati iti ced na dhī viṣaya bhāvaḥ sattā kin tu sāmānyam utpatti uttara kāla bhāvi tadvatām atas mṛd salila pracchanna bīja ādi vat avidita svarūpa sāmarthya eva saṃvid viṣayam vyavasthāpayati sa ca vyavasthitaḥ satyām jijñāsāyām saṃvidam saṃvid antara ādhānena sādhayati nanu iyam viṣaya sāmarthyena saṃvid siddhiḥ pratyuktā vastu antaram prakalpyam syāt iti atra yathā na pratyucyate tathā anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ yāvat jijñāsita jñānāt avyavasthā api na apatet iti atas eva saha upalambha niyamaḥ api paraiḥ uktaḥ asmān pratyasiddhaḥ eva 
ŚVK_7.64.1^5	 viṣaya vitti kāle saṃvidaḥ anupalambhāt viṣaya mātram eva hi idam nīlam iti naḥ cakāsti na aham nīlam iti saṃvid prakāśe ca tathā prakāśa anupapattiḥ na hi sva gocarā saṃvid para nirūpaṇa ātmikā bhavati sva para vedyayoḥ idam ahaṅkārayoḥ aviśeṣa āpatteḥ ayam sva ātmānam aham iti pratinirdiśati param idam iti na tu abhedena idaṅkāram ahaṅkāram ca ubhayam ekatra prayuṅkte atas na asti idam nīlam iti atra saṃvid upalambhaḥ iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ sva prakāśa saṃvid vādinām eva tu ayam upālambhaḥ iti uktam 
ŚVK_7.64.2^1	 syāt etat ajñātaḥ jñāpaka hetuḥ katham jñāpayati iti na ayam doṣaḥ ajñātasya api cakṣuṣaḥ jñāna janana upalabdheḥ nanu cakṣuḥ aṅkurasya iva bījam jñānasya kārakam eva iti yuktam ajñātasya api janaka tvam mā evam jñāna hetoḥ eva jñāpaka tva samākhyānāt api ca na jñānam jñāpaka hetuḥ jñāna tvāt jñānasya hi janakāḥ dhūma ādayaḥ jñāpakāḥ na jñānam eva iti katham ajñāpakasya jñāpaka dharmāḥ āpādyante svarūpa satya eva saṃvidā viṣayaḥ sādhyate sā tu paścāt jñāna antareṇa sādhyate iti asati tu grāhya tve saṃvid eva na siddhyet iti āpādya grāhya grāhaka tvam eka tve dūṣaṇam ucyate na ekatra advitīye tat sidhyati iti yat api ca saṃvedanam asatya bhede nīla saṃvedanayoḥ anupapannam iti 
ŚVK_7.64.2^2	 tat api anena eva nirākṛtam viparītam idam ucyate aikātmye saṃvedanam iti bheda āśraya tvāt grāhya grāhaka bhāvasya sva prakāśa tva niṣedhāt ca ekam hi tattvam avibhāgam na ātmani vartitum arhati sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt na hi aṅgulī agram ātmanā ātmānam spṛśati sūcī agram vā vidhyati karma kartāraḥ hi tad dharma bheda āśrayaṇena eva ubhayathāḥ vivakṣyante kedāra ādayaḥ lavana ādau na tu ekāntam eka ātmānaḥ ātmanaḥ api grāhya grāhaka bhāvam anantaram eva samādhāsyati iti siddham na ekasya grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ iti yat tu bhede grāhya lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ iti tat yadi utpatti sārūpya abhiprāyeṇa tad anumanyāmahe eva ukta doṣa tvāt evaṃvidhasya grāhya tvasya 
ŚVK_7.64.2^3	 yat tu jñāna utpattau sañcetyate tat grāhyam katham anātma bhūtam asambaddham sañcetyate evam hi ekam eva jñānam viśvam gocarayet asambandha aviśeṣāt asti vā aikātmye nīla saṃvedanayoḥ sambandhaḥ nanu asau bheda adhiṣṭhānaḥ katham ekatra avibhāgaḥ āspadam labhate syāt etat aikātmye api kim sambandhena sa hi eka ātmā sva prakāśaḥ eva iti mā evam uktaḥ hi sva ātmani vṛtti virodhaḥ tasmāt bhinnam eva saṃvedanāt nīlam grāhya lakṣaṇam upanipatati iti tad grahe bhedam ātiṣṭhāmahe abhedaḥ eva tu uktena prakāreṇa grāhya lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ yadā tu jñāna arthayoḥ sārūpya nirākaraṇa artham sthūla anupapattiḥ cala acala upalambha ādibhiḥ āpāditā tām vana upanyāsa avasare parihariṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_7.64.2^4	 sārūpyeṇa tu grāhyatām anātiṣṭhantaḥ na iha sthūla siddhau ādriyāmahe tat eka prakāra abhihatam eva hetu trayam katham idānīm asambaddham prakāśate tad prakāśe vā na ati prasaṅgaḥ na asambaddham prakāśate indriyāṇi hi prakāśakāni tāni ca prāpya kāri tvāt arthena sambaddhāni eva artha viṣayam ātmani jñānam janayanti taiḥ ca asat nihitam avartamānam vā na prāpyate iti na ati prasaktiḥ jñānam tu na prakāśakam prakāśa tvāt prakāśakam ca na asambaddham prakāśakam pradīpa vat iti tad prakāra juṣām indriyāṇām iṣṭaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tat kim asambandhaḥ eva jñāna arthayoḥ yadi evam katham ghaṭasya jñānam na asambandhaḥ 
ŚVK_7.64.2^5	 viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ api sambandhaḥ eva sa ca asti jñāna arthayoḥ saṃyogaḥ tu na iṣyate samavāyaḥ vā kaḥ ayam viṣaya arthaḥ yā iyam pratīti karma tā pratītiḥ iti hi kriyā asyām ātmā kartā indriya aṇi karaṇam arthaḥ karma tat yā iyam arthasya pratītau karma kāraka tā tat eva tasya viṣaya tvam tat ca rūpam pratīteḥ prāc abhūtam parastāt niṣpadyate iti avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam anyathā jñāta ajñātayoḥ aviśeṣa āpatteḥ tat eva jñāta tā ādi pada āspadam jñāna jñāne liṅgam katham punar tad apratītāyām pratītau pratīyate jñāna viśiṣṭa tā hi jñāta tā sā katham ajñāte viśeṣaṇe jñāyate ajñātā vā liṅgam anupapadyamānāḥ vā na jñānam gamayati 
ŚVK_7.64.2^6	 na hi ajñātam liṅgam anupapadyamānam vā liṅginam upapādakam vā upasthāpayati tat itaretara āśrayam jñāna jñāta tayoḥ itaretara adhīna siddhi tvāt sva rūpa mātreṇa tu arthaḥ na liṅgam atiprasaṅgāt iti uktam eva bhavet evam yadi jñāna pratītau jñātaḥ pratītaḥ bhavet tad utpattau tu sa pratītaḥ iti ucyate atas svayam siddhaḥ jñānam sādhayati yat tu jñāna viśiṣṭa tā jñāta tā iti tat na tad karmatā hi sā iti uktam eva tad karma bhāvaḥ ca arthasya na tad pratītau sambhavati kin tarhi tad utpattau tat ayam utpattyā eva jñānasya aprāpta pūrvaḥ viṣayaḥ samprati prāptaḥ jñānam upakalpayati eṣa hi prāk jñāna utpatteḥ su svāpa ādau= andhaḥ iva āsīt na kañcid viṣayam ajñāsīt 
ŚVK_7.64.2^7	 tat kā iyam ākasmikī viṣayāṇām prāptiḥ iti cintayati na hi kadācid bhuvām akasmāt bhāvaḥ sambhavati ahetu sāpekṣasya gagana vat nityabhāva āpatteḥ abhāvaḥ vā tad kusuma vat iti bhavitavyam asya kadācid bhavataḥ artha sannikarṣasya kena api kāraṇena na hi asau tathāvidhaḥ sva rūpeṇa eva nitya tathā tva āpatteḥ na indriya vaśena teṣu api satsu su svāpa ādau= adarśanāt artha tathā tvasya jāgarāyām ca avyāpriyamāṇeṣu astu tarhi tad vyāpāraḥ eva tathā tve hetuḥ arthasya na sati api abhāvāt asti khalu asya nānā arthaiḥ sannikṛṣyamāṇānām indriyāṇām asādhāraṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ kiñcid eva tu kadācid jñātam bhavati 
ŚVK_7.64.2^8	 evam eva ātma manasoḥ api satoḥ artha tathā tva adarśanāt ahetu tvam tathātvena nanu avyabhicārī manasaḥ yogaḥ tad bhāve hetuḥ bhaviṣyati iti kasya indriyāṇām ātmanaḥ vā tat na tāvat indriyāṇām yat eva hi kiñcid bahis indriyam cakṣuḥ ādi kārya darśana vaśāt manasā saṃyuktam iti avagatam tat eva kiñcid jñāpayati na itarat tad indriya manaḥ yoga hetuka tvena yujyate jñāta tvasya iti tad yogaḥ na hetu tvena kalpyate ātmani api manaḥ yukte kasya hetoḥ kiñcid eva jñātam na aparam yena indriyam sat nikṛṣyate cakṣuḥ ādi tad ātma manaḥ yogāt jñātam bhavati iti ced na ukta vyabhicāra tvāt cakṣuḥ sannikṛṣṭam api hi kiñcid eva kadācid jñātam bhavati na aparam tat asati viśeṣe na avakalpate 
ŚVK_7.64.3^1	 api ca jñāna karma tā jñāta tvam cetanā jñānam iti ca anartha antaram iti loka siddham tat yadi ātma manaḥ yogaḥ cetanā tasya ubhaya sādhāraṇyāt manaḥ caitanya prasaṅgaḥ varṇitaḥ na jñānam cetanā api tu saṃvedanam iti ced asti vā anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ nanu evam nīlam jānāti saṃvetti iti ca saha prayujyeta artha bhedena aparyāya tvāt iti na ātma mana ssaṃyogaḥ jñānam atas na tad prabhāvitam bhāvānām jñāta tvam saḥ ayam ahetukaḥ prāpya karma bhāvaḥ arthasya jñāta tā ātmā janyaḥ na avakalpate hetu abhāvena kārya abhāva pratibaddhena tad anumānāt sā iyam pratyakṣa ādīnām anumāna virodha anupapattiḥ tāni hi artham prāpayanti 
ŚVK_7.64.3^2	 hetu abhāva anumānam ca tad prāptim pratikṣipati sā iyam anupapattiḥ jñāna kalpanayā samādhīyate asti kaścid ātma samavāyī jñāna saṃvedana ādi pada paryāya vācyaḥ jānāti dhātu upādānaḥ kriyā bhedaḥ yasmin arthānām prāpya karmatā iti nanu jñānam guṇaḥ guṇa kāṇḍeḥ pāṭhāt na tu kriyā atas katham tasya arthaḥ karma iti ucyate na hi vibhoḥ ātmanaḥ spanda samavāyaḥ sambhavati na ca aparispanda ātmikā kriyā pañcānām api karmaṇām spanda ātmaka tvāt na dhātu artha mātrasya kriyā tvāt vakṣyati ca kriyā dhātu artha mātram syāt iti budhyate ityādibhyaḥ ca śabdebhyaḥ kriyā pratyayaḥ eva upajāyamānaḥ dṛśyate pūrva aparībhāva avagateḥ 
ŚVK_7.64.3^3	 atas yuktā eva jñāna karmatā viṣayāṇām jñāna ākāra vādinām api ca avaśyam aprāpta pūrvasya nīla ādeḥ prāptiḥ vaktavyā anyathā prāk iva uttara kālam api apratibhāsamāne viṣaya ākāre āndhyam eva jagataḥ bhavet bhāsate viṣaya ākāraḥ na kenacid prāpyate iti ced kasya bhāsate yadi na kasyacid kiṃkṛtaḥ vyavahāra bhedaḥ ekaḥ hi nīlam vidvān tad upādadānaḥ dṛśyate na aparaḥ vidvān saḥ ayam svatantre nīle kiṃkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ na hi svatantraḥ bhāsamānaḥ sarvasya syāt na vā kasyacid vana vahniḥ iva anupalabhyamānaḥ kena api atas avaśyam asya kvacid santāne prāptiḥ vaktavyā tathā ca yadābhāsam prameyam tat iti paṭhanti 
ŚVK_7.64.3^4	 na ca apramākarmaṇaḥ prameya tā sambhavati asti ayam prameya ādi vibhāgaḥ kin tu bhrānti parikalpitaḥ tathā ca uktam avibhaktaḥ api buddhi ātmā iti satyam uktam ayuktam tu tat evam hi na kiñcid pāramārthikam nāma bhavet cit mātra tā api hi pratīti vaśāt eva āśrīyate tadvat eva tu viṣaya ākāraḥ api bhāsamānaḥ katham apāramārthikaḥ bhavet tad viparyasta tve vā katham saṃvid svarūpam aviparyastam bhavet ubhayatra api bādhā darśanāt atas saṃvid eva ātmanaḥ bhinnam artham idam iti darśayantī na anyathā vaktum śakyate iti siddham idam iti bahis prasiddhaḥ viṣayaḥ jñānam sādhayati iti 
ŚVK_7.64.4^1	 yat tu uktam artha sthaḥ dharmaḥ pareṇa api jñātaḥ jñānam gamayet iti tat ayuktam arthaḥ hi jñātaḥ anupapadyamānaḥ jñāna kalpanāyām hetuḥ uktaḥ na ca asau sarvasya tathā bhavati yasya eva tu jñānam utpannam tasya asau jñātaḥ iti pratīti sākṣikam eva yathā yasya eva gamanam tasya eva deśa antara prāptiḥ bhavati asati api gati jñāne kim ātmakaḥ punar artha sthaḥ dharmaḥ uktam karmakāraka tā iti nanu karma śaktiḥ apratyakṣa siddhā katham jñānam gamayati na karma śaktyā jñānam kalpayāmaḥ karmaṇā tu arthena sa tu pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva tasya ca apratyakṣāyām api śaktau kāraka antara vat pratyakṣa ta upapattiḥ kāraka antara śaktayaḥ api hi apratyakṣāḥ eva na ca etāvatā teṣām apratyakṣa bhāvaḥ atas pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prāptaḥ viṣayaḥ jñāna kalpanāyām hetuḥ 
ŚVK_7.64.4^2	 prāptiḥ ca arthasya abhūta pūrva avasthā sarvasya sva saṃvedya iti eke anye tu hāna ādi vyavahāra yogya tā eva arthasya prāptiḥ iti āhuḥ sā eva hi jñāta tvam tat eva hi jñāna phalam kriyā phala bhāgitā ca karma tvam sarvathā siddham jñātāt arthāt jñāna anumānam ye api pratyakṣā eva saṃvid sva ātmānam viṣaya vat avasthāpayati iti manyante taiḥ api jñāna utpatteḥ prāc abhūtaḥ parastāt bhāvi artha gataḥ dharma bhedaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ na tu jñāna pratyakṣatā eva artha pratyakṣa tā na hi anyasmin pratyakṣe anyat pratyakṣam bhavati atiprasaṅgāt yadi saṃvid pratyakṣatā eva artha pratyakṣa tā bhavet anumeya ādīnām api āpadyeta anumāna saṃvidaḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt atas avaśyam svagataḥ eva arthasya viśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ yena pratyakṣa itarate vyavatiṣṭhete 
ŚVK_7.64.4^3	 atas siddham na apramāṇikā jñeya siddhau jñāna kalpanā iti dvaita siddhiḥ sarva saṃvidām tu ānarthakye viṣaya ākāra pratyabhijñāḥ nirnibandhanā eva bhavet eva hi pūrvedyus dṛṣṭam artham aparedyus pratyabhijānāti tad jñānena saha niruddhasya ākārasya na upalabhyate anyaḥ khalu ayam adya bhuvaḥ jñānasya ākāraḥ anyaḥ ca asau yaḥ prāk nirūpita niruddhaḥ katarat atra pratyabhijānīmaḥ pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ api sarva saṃvidām ānarthakye anupapannaḥ na ca artha kriyā kāri jñāna sat asadbhāva nibandhanaḥ asau iti yuktam svapna paridṛṣṭeṣu api artheṣu kvacid artha kriyā kāri jñāna udaye prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt bādhyate svapna jñānam anantaram atas na pramāṇam iti ced jāgrat jñānam api yogi avasthāyām bādhyatas eva iti katham pramāṇam 
ŚVK_7.64.4^4	 atha tat cireṇa bādhyate iti ucyate na etāvatā viśeṣeṇa satyam itthyātve bhavataḥ na hi māyā suvarṇa jñāne cireṇa visaṃvādaḥ dṛśyatā eti tat pramāṇam atas yat pramāṇam tat pramāṇam apramāṇam ca apramāṇam na tu ardha jaratīyam upapadyate atas siddham jñānāt bhinnaḥ eva arthaḥ grāhya lakṣaṇa anuyāyī jñānam ca sādhayati iti dṛṣṭānta abhāva vacanam api na anumāna dūṣaṇa artham kin tu sva abhipreta anumāna dūṣaṇa parihārāya evam hi atra anumānam antarṇītam na avibhāgam dvi ātmakam avibhāga tvāt anyatara aṃśa vat iti yadi ca kaścid kadācid agni ādiṣu darśanāt anaikāntika tām brūyāt tad artham idam uktam na ca ekasya evam ātma tve dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid asti te iti tat ca etat upariṣṭāt prapañcayiṣyati iti 
ŚVK_7.65	 nanu agni ādīnām eka ātmanām eva prakāśya prakāśaka tā dṛṣṭāḥ atas anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ atas āha agni iti ayam arthaḥ ye agni ādayaḥ prakāśaka tayā prasiddhāḥ te ghaṭa ādīnām na sva ātmanaḥ iti na prakāśa rūpāḥ prakāśa ātmanaḥ svarūpasya iti kim punar sva ātmanaḥ prakāśasya na te prakāśakāḥ na hi te aprakāśitāḥ sidhyanti na ca tad siddhi artham aparasa jātīya apekṣā dṛśyate na hi pradīpaḥ pradīpa antaram apekṣate atas āha anapekṣaṇāt iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na te sva prakāśāya sva ātmānam apekṣante sva ātmani vṛtti virodhāt svasya svasmin prakāśa ayogāt iti 
ŚVK_7.66	 kim idānīm aprakāśitāḥ eva prakāśante na evam api kena tarhi prakāśyante iti atas āha grāhya tvam iti cākṣuṣeṇa hi tejasā prakāśitāḥ te gṛhyante tat teṣām grāhayitṛ na grahītṛ indriya caitanya prasaṅgāt nanu evam tejasaḥ tejontara apekṣāyām sa jātīya apekṣā iti anavasthā mā evam uktā atra na ayanasya tejasaḥ kārya darśana anusāriṇī rūpa siddhau śakti siddhiḥ bahis tejasaḥ rūpa prakāśaka tva darśanāt dehe api vartamānam tat eva rūpasya prakāśakam bhūta antarāṇām taijasasya ca na ca iha sajātīya apekṣā avāntara jāti bhedāt atas eva andhasya pradīpa ādayaḥ na buddhi viṣayāḥ sva prakāśa tve ca teṣām andhasya api dhī gocarāḥ bhaveyuḥ iti akṣam api rūpa rūpi rūpa eka artha samavāyinā prakāśakam na sva ātmanaḥ tad grahaṇa kāle buddheḥ eva anyathā anupapatti pramāṇikāyāḥ grāhaka tvam iti āha akṣa iti 
ŚVK_7.67–7.68	 buddhiḥ tu buddhi antara vedyā iti anantaram eva upapāditam iti āha tasyām iti atra codayati nanu iti ātmanaḥ hi grāhaka antara abhāvāt avaśyam ekasya ubhaya rūpa tā vaktavyā na hi asau anyena gṛhyate grāhaka ānantya prasaṅgāt atas tadvat eva ekasya eva jñāna ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ na anupapannaḥ iti pariharati kathañcid iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ nirbhāgam hi jñānam iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ na ca evaṃvidhasya dvairūpyam upapannam ātmā tu kenacid ātmanā grāhakaḥ kenacid ātmanā grāhyaḥ iti kim na upapadyate tathā hi asya artha saṃyukta indriya saṃyukta manassaṃyoginaḥ pratyayaḥ nāma dharma bhedaḥ jāyate sa ca asmāt kathañcid dharma rūpeṇa bhinnaḥ tena ca ayam grāhakaḥ yat tasya pṛthivī ādi dravya antara sādhāraṇam dravya ādi rūpam tat grāhyam jñānasya tu na evaṃvidhaḥ kaścid vibhāgaḥ bauddhaiḥ iṣyate atas katham tasya dvairūpyam iti 
ŚVK_7.69	 nanu evam api tāvat atyanta bhedaḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ aniṣṭaḥ eva abhedasya api dharma dharmiṇoḥ iṣṭa tvāt atas āha yaḥ tu iti atyanta bhedaḥ hi ghaṭa agni ādīnām api asmābhiḥ na iṣyate eva dravya ādi rūpeṇa abhedāt atas kathañcid bhinnayoḥ eva sarvatra prakāśya prakāśaka tvam iti ātmanaḥ api na anupapannam iti yadi tarhi pratyaya aṃśa ugrākahaḥ dravya aṃśaḥ grāhyaḥ katham tarhi bhāṣya kāraḥ pratyagātmani ca etat bhavati na paratra iti pratyagātma vṛtti tām ātmanaḥ manyate nanu evam para gocaraḥ eva ahaṃpratyayaḥ bhavet param hi pratyaya ātmanaḥ dravya ādi rūpam atas āha pratyāsatti iti yā iyam ātmanaḥ pratyagātma vṛtti tāḥ bhāsate na ayam doṣaḥ sarvam eva hi naḥ aneka antena paratra pravartate ātmā tu atyanta pratyāsanna grāhya grāhaka dharmakaḥ pratyagātma vṛtti tayā bhāsate atyanta pratyāsannau hi narasya jala ajala ātmānau tayoḥ asau sādhāraṇaḥ grāhya grāhakaḥ iti abhidhīyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.70.1^1	 api ca aham iti yaḥ ayam asmad prayogaḥ tad sambhinnā viśadataram ātma gocarā saṃvid utpadyamānā dṛśyate jñānam tu na sva gocaram jātu jāyamānam upalabdham atas na ātma drṣṭa antena jñānasya ubhaya rūpa tā vaktum śakyā na hi tat aham nīlam iti kadācid utpadyamānam dṛśyate sarvadā idam prayoga sambhinna bodhāt atas upapanna eva ātma kartṛka ātmani saṃvittiḥ na tu jñānaḥ iti āha asmad prayoga sambhinnā iti atra eke vadanti kumāra svāmi vādinaḥ na ātmā asmad prayoga sambhinna bodha vedyaḥ na hi vayam kārya kāraṇa saṅghāta atirekiṇam ayam asmi iti puruṣam budhyāmahe pṛthivī ādi dravya anubhavaḥ eva sva prakāśaḥ svam ātmānam sva prakāśyam ātmānam meyam ca dravya ādi avasthāpayati na hi viṣaya vittau apratisaṃhite puruṣe sva para vedyayoḥ atiśayaḥ sidhyati atas viṣayāḥ na boddhari anava bhāsamāne bhāsante 
ŚVK_7.70.1^2	 na asau teṣu atas eva viṣaya vedanā uparame jaḍa ākāśa ādi vat ātmanaḥ avasthānam saṅgirante yadā khalu ayam puruṣaḥ prakṣīṇa aśeṣa karma āśayaḥ mucyate tadā jñāna kāraṇānām indriya ādīnām abhāvāt asati viṣaya vedane cit ra hitaḥ kha vat avatiṣṭhate niśśeṣa vaiśeṣika ātma guṇa uccheda lakṣaṇam eva hi mokṣam manyante na ca evam apuruṣa artha tvam duḥkha uparamasya api puruṣeṇa arthyamāna tvāt saṃsāriṇaḥ hi duḥkhena udvignāḥ atyantāya tad ucchedam abhisandadhānāḥ gṛhebhyaḥ pravrajantaḥ dṛśyante na nu sukham api ātmanaḥ vaiśeṣikaḥ guṇaḥ tasya ucchedāt apuruṣa artha tvam api bhavet mā evam sukham api saṃsāriṇaḥ nānāvidha aneka duḥkha saṅkulam na ati ciram anuvartata iti mahāntaḥ tat api duḥkha pakṣaḥ eva nikṣipantaḥ mokṣāya uttiṣṭhante atas nāsti viṣaya vedanā uparame narasya caitanyam 
ŚVK_7.70.1^3	 atas eva ayam aharahar sukhāpe sat mātra tayā avatiṣṭhate na punar kiñcid jānāti tatra ca anubhave svapna paricitānām iva arthānām upariṣṭāt smaraṇam bhavet na ca etat asti atas na anavabhāsamāneṣu viṣayeṣu boddhā prakhyāyate na ca viṣaya vittau asmad prayoga sambhedaḥ idam prayoga sambhedāt iti na asmad sambhede viṣayān avagrahāt ātma grahaḥ na api viṣaya vittau ātma grahe asmad prayoga sambhedaḥ iti asamañjasam asmad prayoga sambhinnā iti atas āha jñānasya iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ asmad prayoga sambhinnaḥ asti bodhaḥ na vā yadi na asti jitam anuttarāḥ guravaḥ sataḥ tu kim ālambanam iti vaktavyam śarīram indriyāṇi vā na tāvat śarīram jñātṛ gocara tvāt aham jānāmi iti jñātāram ahaṃpratyayaḥ avalambate na ca śarīram cetayate bhautika tvāt bhūtānām ca acetana tvāt kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvāt ca kārya guṇānām 
ŚVK_7.70.1^4	 atas eva na indriyāṇi jñātṝṇi na ca jñānam pratyabhijñānāt ayam hi pūrvedyus dṛṣṭam artham uttaredyus pratyabhijānānaḥ pūrva aparasādhāraṇam ātmānam anusandadhāti aham idam adarśam iti tat tu jñāna gocara tve anupapannam anyaḥ hi tadā yaḥ pūrvedyus dṛṣṭavān anyaḥ ca ayam yaḥ adya paśyati kṣaṇika tvāt jñānānām atas buddhīndriya śarīrebhyaḥ bhinnaḥ ahaṅkāra gocaraḥ saṃvid sāmarthya siddha tvāt na jahāti ukta rūpa tām iti tat idam uktam jñānasya eva ca kartarī iti jñāna kartuḥ hi iyam asmad prayoga sambhinnā saṃvittiḥ na ca anyaḥ jñānasya kartā iti uktam atas saṃvid balādeva ubhaya rūpa tā ātmanaḥ sidhyati na tu evam ātmā eva ātmānam jñānam jānāti jātucit tat dhi idam nīlam iti yat sarvadā para gocaram 
ŚVK_7.70.2^1	 yat tu na kārya karaṇa saṅghāta atirekiṇam pratipadyāmahe iti kim evam deha ādi ālambanaḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ tat tāvat pratyuktam eva na ca anālambanaḥ ayam atratya siddhāntāt tat ayam anālambanam ātmānam alabhamānaḥ sva gocaram jñātāram ākarṣati sa pratīti bala siddha ubhaya rūpaḥ puruṣaḥ na na upapadyate deha indriya ādi saṅkīrṇaḥ tu na vivicya upalakṣayitum śakyate ayam nāma asau puruṣaḥ iti na ca etāvatā na gṛhītaḥ bhavati na hi kṣīra udaka saṃsarge vivekena agṛhīte itinaḥ gṛhītam ubhayam evam iha api saṃmugdha buddhaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyāhāra ādikam yogam abhyasyadbhiḥ nitya naimittika mātra anuṣṭhāyibhiḥ akurvadbhiḥ niṣiddham bhoga prakṣīṇa aśeṣa karma āśayaiḥ ayam asmi iti vivicya aparokṣīkriyate 
ŚVK_7.70.2^2	 na tu ayam viṣaya vittau api ayam nāma iti vivicyate ye api viṣaya vedanā avasaraḥ eva naraḥ gṛhyate iti āsthitāḥ taiḥ api asya vivekaḥ darśayitum aśakyaḥ eva atas na ayam doṣaḥ vivekaḥ na avagamyate iti na tu ayam viṣaya vedanā avasare jñāyate na hi tadā tad atirekiṇaḥ kasyacid pratītiḥ asti iti anantaram eva vakṣyate na tu atra iti anena saṃvid eva tāvat tadā na avabhāsate yat ā āyattaḥ bhāvānām bhedaḥ prāk eva saṃvettā yat tu evam sva para vedyayoḥ anatiśayaḥ iti tat na yasya hi jñānam utpannam tasya viṣayāḥ bhāsante iti uktam eva atas katham utpanna jñānena saṃviditam anyaḥ anubhavet tena vā jñātam tad anyaḥ na hi boddhṛ saṃvedana kṛtaḥ sva para vedyayoḥ bhedaḥ yena evam āpadyeta 
ŚVK_7.70.2^3	 etāvatā eva hi ekasya asau vedyaḥ na aparasya yat tasya jñānam utpannam evam api bhavet etat yadi asatyām boddhṛ vittau viṣayāḥ na viditāḥ bhaveyuḥ tad vittiḥ eva vā viṣaya vedanam bhavet na tu evam kevala viṣaya avagrahāt anya gocara jñānasya anya viṣaya tva asambhavāt evam ca asatyām viṣaya vittau puruṣaḥ na prakāśate iti api duruktam evam hi uparata karaṇa grāmasya mokṣaḥ maraṇam eva śabda antareṇa anujñātaḥ bhavet na khalu api jñāna ātmanaḥ puruṣasya sat asat tvayoḥ asti viśeṣaḥ tat ayam apavarga daśāyām prakāśataḥ eva kena punar ayam tadā prakāśyate na kenacid sva prakāśaḥ eva iti eke na tu evam sva prakāśa tva niṣedhāt avibhāgasya 
ŚVK_7.70.2^4	 tadā api tu ayam dharma dharmitva vibhāga āśrayaṇena pratyaya ātmanā grāhakaḥ dravya ādi rūpeṇa grāhyaḥ iti vācyam kim asti tadā dharma dharmi bhedaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ śruti virodhaḥ śrūyate hi ekam advitīyam iti na vyatirikta grāhya niṣedhāt anyathā hi ātma bhedaḥ api na sidhyet na ca asau na iṣyate mukta itara avibhāga āpatteḥ api ca artha avagraha nivṛtti arthāḥ evam visaṃvādāḥ iti tatra tatra uktam atas apavarge api grāhya grāhaka ākāraḥ eva ātmā śrūyate ca jānāti eva ayam puruṣaḥ jñātavyam tu na veda iti na hi tadā jñātuḥ jñapteḥ viparilopaḥ vidyate na tu vibhaktam asti anyat yatas dvitīyam jānīyāt iti tasmāt jānātipada prayogāt avagacchāmaḥ yat asti mokṣe api karma bhāvaḥ puruṣasya iti jānāteḥ akarmakasya aprayogāt 
ŚVK_7.70.2^5	 iyān tu viśeṣaḥ yat ayam bhūta indriya vaśaḥ viṣaya uparāgāt tad śaya abhedān pratipadyamānaḥ avibhakta jñāna śaktiḥ ābhāsate nija eva tu asya citi śaktiḥ sā asati viṣaya uparāgaḥ ātma gocara eva avatiṣṭhate katham akaraṇikā jñāna utpattiḥ iti ced mā evam tadānīm api manasaḥ bhāvāt nityam hi tad ātma vat upeyate āha ca pratyāhāra ādikam yogam abhyasyan vihita kriyaḥ manaḥ karaṇakena ātmā pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate iti na ca evam viṣaya vedana prasaṅgaḥ manasaḥ bahis asvātantryāt viṣaya vittīnām ca sukha duḥkha hetu tvena karma janya tvāt asati karma saṃskāre anupapatteḥ ātma jñānam ca na karma janyam iti vigalita nikhila karma āśayasya eva niṣpadyate kevala jñāna nirākaraṇe api viṣaya vedanāni eva pratyuktāni na ātma jñānam 
ŚVK_7.70.2^6	 āha ca nijam yat tva ātma caitanyam ānandaḥ adhyakṣyate ca yaḥ yat ca nitya vibhuti ādi tena ātmā na eva mokṣyate iti susvāpe api tu ātma saṃvid asti eva iti kecid atas eva suṣupta pratibuddhaḥ sukham aham asvāpsam iti ātmānam pratisandhatte atha vā tatra karma āśaya anuvṛtteḥ tatparatantram manaḥ na kevalam ātmānam prakāśayati na viṣaya vitti virahāt atas na viṣaya saṃvedanaḥ eva ātma saṃvedanam api ca evam meya mātṛ gocarāyām ekasyām saṃvidi bhāsamānayoḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ karma kartṛ bhāvaḥ evam hi tat dvi karmakam jñānam bhavet yat tu uktam para sama vāyi kriyā phala bhāgitā karma tā iti tat ayuktam yat eva hi jñāna utpattā a= āpyate tat prāpyam karma tathā aca ātmā iti katham asya akarma tvam 
ŚVK_7.70.2^7	 api ca kā iyam kriyā yat samavāyāt tad phala bhāgi tayā ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam kim punar tat uktam ātma manaḥ yogaḥ iti nanu asya manasi api samavāyāt tasya api kartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ tad phala sambandhaḥ ca ubhayoḥ api aviśeṣāt āpadyate tatra ca uktaḥ manaḥ caitanya prasaṅgaḥ iti siddham na viṣaya vitteḥ eva traya siddhiḥ iti yat ca asmin darśane duḥkha uparatiḥ eva mokṣaḥ iti uktam tat api ayuktam ānanda śruteḥ śrūyate hi vijñānam ānandam brahma ānandam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam iti ca tat etat preyaḥ putrāt iti ca na ca duḥkha nivṛttiḥ eva ānandaḥ aśma ādau prasaṅgāt syāt etat pratyak vṛttiḥ upalabhyamānā duḥkha abhāva ātmanā sukham na ca ātmā kiñcid pratyak jānāti acetana tvāt iti na asau duḥkhāyate sukhāyate vā mā evam 
ŚVK_7.70.2^8	 evam api dehinaḥ bhinna avayava saṃyogī sukha duḥkha sādhana janma ayugapad sukha duḥkha bhogaḥ na syāt duḥkhāyamānaḥ eva hi ekatra bhāge paratra sukhāyate tat duḥkha nivṛttau sukhe anupapannam pradeśa antare duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham iti ced na sva saṃvedya tvāt āhlāda viśeṣasya pradeśa antare duḥkha abhāve ca sukhe naraka antare duḥkha abhāvāt naraka antare sukhitva prasaṅgaḥ tat tāvat duḥkha nivṛttiḥ sukham na ca asyām ānanda vādaḥ gauṇaḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi ānanda śruti arthe mukhye gṛhyamāṇe kiñcid anupapannam yena gauṇa tayā vyākhyāyate atas vijñānam ānandam brahma iti pratijānīmahe asañcetitaḥ tu ānandaḥ api asat kalpaḥ eva iti siddham antareṇa eva viṣaya vedanam asmad prayoga sambhinnāyām saṃvittau= ātmā prakāśate iti 
ŚVK_7.71	 yathā ca asmad prayoga sambhinna saṃvid saṃvedyaḥ ātmā dvi rūpaḥ na evam jñānam na hi idam nīlam iti jñāne karaṇānām indriyāṇām grāhakasya ātmanaḥ jñānasya vā ākāraḥ upalabhyate nīla mātra prakāśāt iti na pūrvavat ātma vat abhinna tve api nīla jñāne tad buddheḥ grāhya tvam nīlam eva tu tayā gṛhyate sā tu tatas jñātāt avagamyate iti upapāditam eva tat etat āha na tu iti dṛṣṭānta artham karaṇa grāhakayoḥ upādānam yathā idam nīlam iti atra karaṇam indriyam grāhakaḥ puruṣaḥ na jñāyate evam jñānam api karma eva tu kevalam atra avagamyate na ca kartṛ karaṇa kriyam iti 
ŚVK_7.77^1	 syāt etat jñāna saṃvittiḥ eva iyam idam nīlam iti para rūpa nirūpaṇa ākāra tvam tasyāḥ vāsanā nibandhanam anādiḥ hi vāsanā saṃsāriṇām tad vaśena sva ātmānam api param iva nirūpayati pareṣām iva param deham ātma tayā aham iti atas āha anya ākāra iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ saṃvid niṣṭhāḥ hi naḥ vastu vyavasthitayaḥ saṃvid ca idam iti bahis viṣaya prakāśa ātmā jāyamānā dṛśyate yadi tu iyam evaṃrūpā api anya viṣayā jñāna viṣaya iṣyate evam tarhi jñāna ākārā saṃvittiḥ artha viṣaya asmābhiḥ kasmāt na kalpyate na ca asati bādhake para gocara tvam bhrāntiḥ iti yujyate kalpayitum vāsanā ca prācīnajñāna janma ātma āśrayaḥ saṃskāraḥ abhidhīyate na asau asti nāstikānām nairātmya siddhāntāt 
ŚVK_7.77^2	 na api jñānam ādhāraḥ vāsanāyāḥ kṣaṇika tvāt na api samanantara pratyayaḥ vāsanā tasya tathā tvena aprasiddheḥ asau api sva gocaraḥ na param para gocara tayā darśayitum śaknoti atad rūpa tvāt tādrūpya niṣpatti ayogāt itaratha anubhava rūpa tā api tasya na syāt anubhava ākāra tām hi uttarasya samanantara pratyayaḥ vitanute tat kasya hetoḥ svarūpa anurūpa kārya ārambha sthiteḥ atas eva na ātma gocarāt idam iti para saṃvedana utpatti upapattiḥ paratra aham māna kalpanā tu bhrāntiḥ jñātṛ gocara tvāt ahaṅkārasya iti uktam eva na tu iha bāhya ālambana tve jñānasya kiñcid anupapannam yena ātma gocara ta avaśyam kalpyate iti siddham bāhya ālambanam eva jñānam iti 
ŚVK_7.78	 evam tāvat anyatara agrahaṇe anyataraḥ na gṛhyate iti uktam tadvat eva dvayoḥ api agrahaṇam iti samāhṛtya darśayati yathā ca iti asya arthaḥ yathā grāhya grahaṇe grāhakaḥ na gṛhyate grāhaka grahaṇe ca grāhyaḥ evam ca dvayoḥ api agrahaṇam bhavet na tu grāhaka mātrasya vā grāhya mātrasya vā pūrvam tu anyatara agrahaṇa dṛṣṭāntena itarasya agrahaṇam āpāditam idānīm samāhṛtya ubhayoḥ ucyate iti prayoga bhedaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.79–7.80	 etat ca grāhya mātrasya grahaṇam grāhaka rahitam sa bahis deśa sambaddhaḥ ityādinā bhāṣyeṇa uktam iti āha saḥ iti ayam ca bhāṣya arthaḥ saḥ eva kevalaḥ bāhya arthaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate na punar grāhakaḥ iti āñjasyena tu artha ākāraḥ nīla ādiḥ iti etad siddhaye bahis deśa sambandhaḥ hetu tayā lakṣyate tat na anum anyāmahe iti āha param iti na hi parasya bahirdeśaḥ nāma kaścid siddhaḥ yaḥ arthasa ākāra tve hetutayā upanyasyeta sarvasya jñāna ākāra tvena abhyupagamāt atas bahis deśaḥ tad sambandhaḥ ca bauddham prati sādhyaḥ eva na hetuḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.81–7.82	 tasmāt yathā uktaḥ eva bhāṣyasya arthaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti asya arthaḥ bahis iti ādau bhāṣye idaṃśabdena idam nīlam iti vikalpa sthena niṣkṛṣṭam grāhaka aṃśāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇa gaṇasya saṃvedyam udāhṛtam nīla ādi mātram etat uktam bhavati na sva gocaram jñānam bahis prakāśāt idam iti para nirūpaṇāt sva gocare hi na idam iti prakāśaḥ bhavet kin tu aham iti tat iha bahis deśa sambandha upanyāsena para gocara tā eva saṃvitteḥ ucyate iti tathā kevala grāhaka saṃvittiḥ api satyam pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate na tu pūrvam jñāyate iti atra uktā iti āha na iti atra hi pūrvam utpannā api buddhiḥ na prāk avagamyate kin tu paścāt iti vadatā grāhya ākāra vinirmuktasya eva grāhakasya saṃvittiḥ uktā iti 
ŚVK_7.83	 prāk buddheḥ agrahaṇa siddhi artham bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam bhavati hi kadācid etat yat jñātaḥ arthaḥ san= ajñātaḥ iti ucyate iti tasya arthaḥ jñāta pūrvaḥ arthaḥ kadācid asmaryamāṇaḥ ajñāta vat abhidhīyate jñāna mātram tu tad gocaram smaryate evam hi vaktāraḥ bhavanti asyāḥ śruteḥ arthaḥ mayā guruṇā vyākhyāyamānaḥ jñātaḥ idānīm prasmṛtavān asmi jñānam tu etat gocaram pūrvam jātam smarāmi iti yathā ca asyāḥ buddheḥ agrahaṇe hetu tvam tad phala abhiprāyeṇa parastāt vakṣyati phalatvāt grantha varṇane iti atra tasmāt api kevalam grāhaka smaraṇāt grāhya ākāra vivikta grāhaka bodhaḥ setsyati iti āha na iti 
ŚVK_7.84–7.85	 abhede tu grāhya grāhakayoḥ grāhaka vat grāhyasya api smaraṇam bhavet iti āha tasmāt iti tasmāt grāhakāt iti arthaḥ yatas tu grāhaka mātrasya eva smṛti ātmakaḥ nirbhāsaḥ bhavati na grāhyasya atas avagacchāmaḥ yat anubhava kāle api eṣā buddhiḥ eva kevalā gṛhītā katham anyathā kevalā smaryeta tat etat āha grāhaka iti grāhaka mātrasya smṛti nirbhāsāt kāraṇāt tatra grāhaka grahaṇa kāle kevalā buddhiḥ gṛhyate iti arthaḥ kasmāt evam atas āha tat iti tat smaraṇam atyanta āvinā abhāvāt grāhya grāhakayoḥ eka ākāram na jāyate iti arthaḥ tat evam anyatara aṃśa anvaye anyatara vivekāt siddhaḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ bhedaḥ iti āha anvaya iti 
ŚVK_7.86	 atra codayati grāhyā iti ayam arthaḥ yat etat bhavatā grāhya grāhakayoḥ abhedam abhyupetya anyatara grahaṇe anyatara grahaṇam āpādyate tat ayuktam na hi yat yatas na bhidyate tat avaśyam tad grahaṇe gṛhyate na hi śabdāt abhinnāḥ nityān ityādayaḥ dharmāḥ śabda grahaṇe gṛhyante abhede api tu yasya aṃśasya yadā yogyatā sa tadā gṛhyate na itaraḥ iti kim anupapannam grāhya aṃśaḥ ca grāhaka aṃśa sadbhāvāt grahaṇa yogyaḥ na grāhaka aṃśaḥ tad atirikta grāhaka antara abhāvāt atas na grāhya grahaṇe grāhaka grahaṇa prasaktiḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.87	 syāt etat grāhya aṃśaḥ eva asya grāhakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tat na karmaṇaḥ kartṛ bhāva anupapatteḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha grāhyā iti api ca grāhya grāhaka bhāvam ekasya jñānasya abhyupetya bhavatā ubhaya grahaṇam āpādyate yadi ca grāhya aṃśaḥ api grāhakaḥ bhavet dvairūpyam eva hīyeta grāhaka eka svabhāva tva āpatteḥ iti āha grāhaka iti 
ŚVK_7.88–7.89	 atha vā grāhya aṃśaḥ tāvat grāhyaḥ eva yadi ca grāhakaḥ gṛhyeta tatas grāhya eka ātma tvam bhavet iti āha grāhakaḥ iti ati alpam ca idam asmābhiḥ ucyate ubhaya grahaṇe eka rūpa tā iti sā api tu na sidhyati eva grāhya abhāve grāhaka abhāvāt tad abhāve grāhya abhāvāt iti āha na syāt iti evam tāvat grāhaka antara varjanāt grāhakaḥ na gṛhyate iti uktam api ca udbhava abhibhavau bhāvānām grahaṇa agrahaṇa kāraṇa tayā siddhau atas yaḥ eva aṃśaḥ yadā udbhūtaḥ bhavati tadā saḥ eva gṛhyate iti na na upapannam iti āha udbhava iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti 
ŚVK_7.90^1	 rātrau hi dīpa prabhā ādīnām rūpa mātram upalabhyate na sparśaḥ abhibhūta tvāt iti āha divā iti sparśa rūpayoḥ ca naktan divam abhibhave candramasaḥ śīta sparśaḥ prabalam ca tāraṇam tejaḥ kāraṇam iti evam tāvat abhibhave kāraṇa antara sannidhānāt abhibhūtasya agrahaṇam uktam idānīm svayam api sūkṣma tvāt abhibhūtam na gṛhyate iti udāharaṇena darśayati gandha vat iti yadā khalu vāyunā preryamāṇāḥ sūkṣmāḥ dravya bhāgāḥ ghrāṇa indriya gocarāḥ bhavanti tadā teṣu vartamāneṣu api gandha mātram eva upalabhyate na dravyam abhibhūta tvāt sā punar iyam dravya saṅkrāntiḥ ayuktā iti manyante 
ŚVK_7.90^2	 yadi khalu tila ādiṣu campaka ādi dravyam eva saṅkāmet evam mṛdyamāneṣu teṣu campakagandhaḥ naśyet puṣpa sthaḥ iva campaka ādi dravyeṣu mṛdyamāneṣu tad gandhasya nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam tila stha kusuma avayava mardane api bhavet yaḥ khalu sthūleṣu eva kusumeṣu mṛdyamāneṣu naśyati sa katham sūkṣma avayava stham na naṅkṣyati iti utprekṣyate atas campaka ādi sannidhānāt gandha antaram eva tila ādiṣu jāyate iti manyate evam apsu agni saṃyogāt guṇa antara āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ na agni saṅkrāntiḥ anupalambhanāt sparśa mātram eva hi tatra agneḥ vayam upalabhāmahe na agnim 
ŚVK_7.90^3	 api ca ayam tapasvī dravya saṅkrāntim ātiṣṭhamānaḥ surā ghrāṇe patet surātrasa reṇūnām ghrāṇa udareṇa vaktra sañcārāt atas ātma vadhāya eva iyam dravya saṅkrāntiḥ āśritā bhavet atra abhidhīyate na tāvat sva āśraya parityāgena āśraya antaram gandhaḥ gacchati iti sambhāvayāmaḥ guṇānām asvatantra tvāt āśraya pāratantryam eva hi tad lakṣaṇam guṇa antaram api na tāvat sannihiteṣu ākāśa anila ādiṣu kusuma samparkāt jāyate iti vācyam teṣu gandhasya atyanta abhāvāt na api nāsikāyām eva gandha antaram jāyate iti vaktavyam ati dūra tvena kusuma asaṃsargāt 
ŚVK_7.90^4	 atas kusuma avayavāḥ eva dṛṣṭa tad gandha sambandha avāyunā preryamāṇāḥ ghrāṇa udaram yāvat āgatā gṛhyante iti pramāṇavatī kalpanā yaḥ api mardane gandha nāśaḥ uktaḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ sūkṣmāḥ hi tatra kusuma avayavāḥ saṅkrāntāḥ na te mṛdyante atas gandhaḥ na naśyati iti uktam yaḥ api gandha āghrāṇe surā pāna doṣaḥ abhihitaḥ na asau pānam hi surāyāḥ niṣiddham na āghrāṇam alpaḥ tu tad āghrāṇe doṣaḥ na ca surām jighran pibati iti ucyate atas na sūkṣma avayavānām nāsikā sannidhāna mātrāt surā pāna āpattiḥ iti siddham gandha vat eva dravyam tatra vartate sūkṣma tvāt tu na upalabhyate iti 
ŚVK_7.91–7.92	 evam dṛṣṭānteṣu abhibhūtasya agrahaṇam uktvā prakṛte yojayati na iti yathā dīpa prabhā ādiṣu guṇa antara saṃvittiḥ na asti yathā ca gandhavat dravya vṛttau dravyasya evam grāhya aṃśa buddhau grāhaka aṃśa buddhau vā ākāra antara saṃvittiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti idam ca aparam grāhyāt abhinnam eva na gṛhyate iti āha grāhyāt iti asti kaścid dharma bhedaḥ yaḥ grāhyāt śabdāt abhinnaḥ api na upalabhyate nitya tva ādayaḥ iva śabda grahaṇaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.93^1	 idam tu cintanīyam kasya idam pratyavasthānam grāhya aṃśaḥ grāhaka aṃśena ityādi na tāvat bauddhasya sa hi avibhaktasya eva buddhi ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bheda bhinnasya grahaṇam ātiṣṭhate yat āha avibhaktaḥ api buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iha lakṣyate iti atas tri ākārasya eva jñānasya anubhavāt katham anyatara aṃśa agrahaṇena pratyavatiṣṭhate bhrānti kalpitam tu grāhya ādi vibhāgam bauddhāḥ manyante na tu apratibhānam eva teṣām atas kasya idam pratyavasthānam iti satyam na atra bauddhaḥ codayitā pārśva stha vacanam idam evam hi kaścid atra pārśva sthaḥ vadati kim idam grāhya grāhaka bhāvam abhyupetya eva bhavatā dvi rūpa grahaṇam āpādyate 
ŚVK_7.93^2	 na hi grāhakasya grāhaka antaram vidyate tad grahaṇe ca dvairūpya hāniḥ tat ca abhyupetam eva iti katham tad viparīta abhidhānam mīmāṃsakasya dṛṣṭā ca abhede api udbhava abhibhava ādi kṛtā grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā iti saḥ eva idānīm bauddha abhiprāyeṇa āha abhedam iti grāhya grāhakayoḥ hi pāramārthikaḥ bhedaḥ neṣyate eva eka rūpasya eva tu buddhi ātmanaḥ tathā prakāśa abhyupagamāt atas yaḥ ayam buddhi ātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ saḥ eva tayoḥ iti kim iti tad grahaṇe na gṛhītam bhavati api ca abhedam abhyupetya asmān prati prasaṅgaḥ gīyate katham abhede grāhya grāhaka vyavasthā iti tat ca ayuktam katham hi abhinnasya tattvasya kiñcid agṛhītam nāma sambhavati yadi tu abhedaḥ na abhyupeyate na ayam prasaṅgaḥ gātum śakyate bhinna tvāt eva agrahaṇa upapatteḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.94–7.95	 pūrva paricodanām idānīm upasaṃharati tasmāt iti yat dhi grahaṇa yogyam tat gṛhyate yasya ca grāhaka sadbhāvaḥ udbhavaḥ vā tat grahaṇa yogyam atas pūrva upanyastasya grāhya grāhaka ātmanaḥ dvayasya kiñcid eva grahītum śakyam na itarat iti grahaṇa śakti abhāvāt na ubhayam codanīyam iti atra parihāram āha kutas iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat bhrānti kalpitaḥ grāhaka ādi vibhāgaḥ bādha virahāt tathā api vā bhrānti tve saṃvid rūpe api tad prasaṅgāt abhāva ātma tā āpattiḥ tat ayam vāstavaḥ grāhya ādi vibhāgaḥ na ekasmin advitīye jñāna ātmani sambhavati iti prathamam uktam na etat asti ityādinā punar ca abhinna tvam yadā ca iṣṭam ityādinā ekasya eva dvairūpyam aṅgīkṛtya ubhaya grahaṇa prasaktiḥ āpāditā tatra na eṣa parihāraḥ ghaṭate ayogya tvāt abhibhūta tvāt anyat na gṛhyate iti na hi ekasmin jñāna ātmani yogya ayogya tva vibhāgaḥ udbhava abhibhava ātma tvam vā sambhavati atas avaśyam abhinnatve iṣṭe anyatara saṃvittau dvi ākāra grahaṇena bhavitavyam iti 
ŚVK_7.96	 kim punar ekasya udbhava abhibhava ātma tvam na sambhavati iti atas āha ekā iti evam hi grāhya grāhaka abhidhānam tattvam tatra yadi grāhaka aṃśaḥ abhibhūtaḥ katham tat abhinnaḥ grāhya aṃśaḥ na abhibhūtaḥ iti śakyate vaktum viruddha dharma adhyāsena bheda āpatteḥ iti evam ca ubhaya abhibhave grāhya aṃśasya api grāhya tvam na syāt iti na kiñcid tattvam sambhavet iti āha tathā iti 
ŚVK_7.97	 evam ayogyatā api vikalpanīyā kim ubhayam ayogyam ekam vā yadi ubhayam na kiñcid gṛhyate iti śūnyatā eva āpadyeta yadi tu ekam ayogyam itarat na iti ucyate tat ekatra advitīye na upapannam iti āha ayogyata iti ye punar atra dṛṣṭāntāḥ uktāḥ pradīpa prabhā ādiṣu rūpa ādayaḥ tatra udbhava abhibhava abhidhānam yujyate rūpa ādīnām paraspara bhedena tatra udbhava abhibhava upapatteḥ bhinnam hi sparśāt rūpam tad rātrau rūpa udbhave abhibhūta sparśaḥ na gṛhyate iti kim anupapannam tat etat āha dṛṣṭāntāḥ iti ādi śabdāt yogya ayogya bhedaḥ api iti sva rūpa bheda anuvidhāyi udbhava abhibhava ādi bhedaḥ api iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_7.98^1	 nanu na asti rūpa ādīnām pāramārthikaḥ bhedaḥ mahān khalu ayam kleśaḥ yat dravyāt eva teṣām bhedaḥ abhidhīyate paraspara bhedāḥ tu kleśatareṇa upapādyante atas ekam eva dravya ādi rūpam grāhaka bhedāt rūpa ādi bheda bhinnam ābhāsate mukham iva ādarśa bhedāt iti manyante atas tatra api abhedaḥ eva udbhava ādi vyavasthā dṛṣṭā iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ atas āha yadā api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi tāvat asmad siddhāntaḥ rūpa ādau āśrīyate tatas te dravyāt parasparataḥ ca bhidyante eva atha mata antareṇa tathā api na tāvat ekasya udbhava abhibhavau api sidhyataḥ atas asmad mate api hi yathā ekam eva mṛd rūpam ghaṭa śarāva ādi pariṇāma bheda bhinnam evam ekam eva dravya rūpam rūpa ādibhiḥ pariṇāma bhedaiḥ bhidyate iti āśrayaṇīyam yat tu ekasya eva dravya rūpasya grāhaka bhedāt bhedaḥ iti tad atisthavīyaḥ 
ŚVK_7.98^2	 yuktam hi mukheṣu pratyabhijñānāt aupādhika bheda āśrayaṇam ādarśa bheda āśrayaṇena na tu iha tathā iti varam pariṇāma vādaḥ eva tatra ca na ekasya udbhava ādi vyavasthā loke dṛśyate yaḥ tu ayam ākasmikaḥ rūpasya sparśa ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ punar tasya eva rūpa ātmanā sa nirnimittaḥ na vaktum ucitaḥ ekasya eva ca dravyasya ekam rūpam divā guṇa antara udbhavena abhibhūtam yat naktam punar budhyate tat na upapannam pariṇāme na hi dadhi ātmanā pariṇatam kṣīram punar kṣīra ātmanā pariṇatam dṛśyate atas svabhāvāt eva dravyāt parasparam ca rūpa ādayaḥ bhidyante iti etat eva sāmpratam yathā ca asati api deśa ādi bhede bhedaḥ sidhyati tathā anantaram eva vakṣyati tad upekṣya eva tāvat pariṇāma vādam abhidadhmahe na evam api ekasya udbhava abhibhavau iti 
ŚVK_7.99–7.100	 yat api idam aparam uktam grāhyāt abhinnam api kiñcid na anubhūyate śabda ādau nitya tva ādi iti tat anubhāṣya dūṣayati abhinna iti yathā hi buddhi bheda nibandhanaḥ rūpa ādīnām bhedaḥ evam kṛtaka tva ādi dharmāṇām śabdāt dharma antarebhyaḥ ca dhī bheda kṛtam bhedam abhidadhānāḥ na daṇḍena vārayitum śakyāḥ iti kim punar eṣām bhede kāraṇam atas āha na hi iti dravya guṇa karmāṇi eva tāvat bhidyante iti kim atra kāraṇam anyat atas pratyaya bhedāt sa ca ayam aviśiṣṭaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi dharma bhede api iti tad kāraṇakaḥ teṣām bhedaḥ iti nanunā amīṣām deśa bhedaḥ vā mūrti bhedaḥ vā dṛśyate atas katham te bhinnāḥ atas āha na ca iti na naḥ pāribhāṣikaḥ bhāvānām bhedaḥ saṃvid eka śaraṇāḥ hi vayam sā ca bhinnā bhedam abhinnā ca abhedam vyavasthāpayati na tu deśataḥ mūrtitaḥ vā bhedaḥ iti iyat tā eva paribhāṣyate iti 
ŚVK_7.101	 kīdṛśī punar iyam kṛtaka tā yā buddhi bheda bhinna avagamyate atas āha kārakāṇām iti yaḥ ayam kārya dravyāṇām ghaṭa ādīnām kārakaiḥ kulāla ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ sā kṛtaka tā kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam tu atalbhyām iti smṛteḥ sā iyam īdṛśī kṛtaka tā katham śabdāt abhinna iti ucyate anyaḥ hi tadā śabdaḥ gakāra ādi ākāraḥ anyā ca iyam kṛtaka tā tasya tad kārakaiḥ sambandhaḥ iti anitya tā tu sa avayavānām ghaṭa ādīnām tāvat avayava vibhāga ātmikā iti āha vibhāgaḥ iti 
ŚVK_7.102	 niravayavānām tu buddhi ādīnām avayava viśleṣa ātmaka anitya tva asambhavāt yaḥ ayam ātmanaḥ apariṇāma rūpeṇa avasthānam tad nāśi tvam iti āha buddhi iti nāśitvam anitya tā iti nityatāyāḥ svarūpam darśayati nitya tvam iti vastu tvasya sattātaḥ kecid bhedam manyante tat tu na iṣyate iti āha vastu tvam iti sattā eva vastu tvam na aparam kiñcid iti ākṛti granthe vakṣyate iti 
ŚVK_7.103–7.104	 prameya tā ajñeyate api pramāṇa jñāna sambandha ātmike śabdāt bhinne eva iti āha pramāṇa iti jñāna tvam pramāṇa itara jñāna sādhāraṇam iti bhedena jñāna sambandha prabhāvitā jñeyatā uktā iti sarvatra ca atra asati api deśa ādi bheda avasāye kena api sva saṃvedyena ātmanā bhedaḥ avasīyate iti āha sarvatra iti atas yathā eva asmad mate buddhi bheda mātra prabhāvitaḥ rūpa ādīnām bhedaḥ iṣyate asati api deśa ādi bhede tathā eva eteṣu api śabda ādi dharma bhedeṣu bhedaḥ asti iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_7.105	 nanu evam api tāvat atyanta bhedaḥ na eṣām iṣyate kathañcid bhedāt atas siddham abhinnasya udbhava ādayaḥ iti na siddham atyanta bhinna tā hi na asmābhiḥ kasyacid iṣyate sarvasya sadādi a ātmanā bhedāt asti tu kena api rūpeṇa bhedaḥ iti tad āśrayaṇena eva viruddha dharma sambandhaḥ samādhīyate na ca etat bauddha siddhānte jñānasya sambhavati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha atyantā iti 
ŚVK_7.106	 kim punar kāraṇam abhinnasya api śabdāt kṛtaka tva ādeḥ agrahaṇam iti bhedasya api vidyamāna tvāt iti ced hantā evam abhedaḥ api vāstavaḥ iti kid na śabda grahaṇe gṛhyate atas āha sarvam ca iti yat etat kṛtaka tva ādi dharma jātam upanyastam tat sati api śabda abhede kriyā hetu ādi apekṣayā gṛhyate na hi vastu asti iti eva grahaṇam bhavati api tu grahaṇa iti kartavya tāsāpekṣam kṛtaka tvasya ca kriyā kulāla ādi vyāpāraḥ tad hetuḥ ca kulāla ādiḥ jighṛkṣā ca grahaṇa kāraṇam atas tad asaṃvittau= abhede api śabdāt na grahaṇam kṛtaka tva ādīnām atyanta abhede tu grahaṇa ādi vyavasthā na sidhyet na ca asau asmābhiḥ iṣyate iti 
ŚVK_7.107	 na ca ayam dharma dharmi kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ jñāne sambhavati advitīya tvāt tasya na api kriyā hetu ādi tulyam apekṣaṇīya antaram asti yad kṛtā grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā abhavet jñāna atirikta vastu antara abhāvāt iti āha jñānaḥ iti anyatra anapekṣā iti asahamānaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate paraspareṇa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ apekṣā arthaḥ eva tāvat duṣpratipādaḥ abhinne tattve kim kena apekṣyate upetya api brūmaḥ yaḥ eva kaścid apekṣiṣyate grāhakaḥ vā grāhyaḥ vā saḥ eva sannihitaḥ atyanta abhedāt tayoḥ atas na agrahaṇa kāraṇam anyatarasya api iti dvi ātmaka grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
ŚVK_7.108–7.109	 atra codayati nanu iti yat etat apekṣām abhyupetya bhavatā ucyate sannihitaḥ iti tat ayuktam na hi naḥ nīla ādi grahaṇe grāhyam idam grāhakaḥ vā ayam iti buddhiḥ utpadyate atas grāhya grāhaka tvena anavagamāt katham tayoḥ sannidhānam apekṣā katham ucyate iti apekṣa abhyupagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ pariharati mā bhūt iti yadi api grāhyaḥ ayam grāhakaḥ ayam iti vā na vikalpyate tathā api tāvat eka ātmanaḥ sarveṇa eva ātmanā gṛhīta tvāt yat eva apekṣitam tat eva labhyate iti yuktam eva vaktum anyaḥ ayam grāhyaḥ ayam grāhakaḥ ayam iti śabda vikalpaḥ anyat ca jñāna rūpam tat ced samagram gṛhītam kim aparam apekṣaṇīyam yat agrahaṇāt ubhaya aṃśa bodhaḥ na bhavet iti evam api ced ubhaya ātmakam na gṛhyate katham dvi ātmakam bhaviṣyati atas siddham na dvi ātmakam jñānam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha evam iti
