ŚVK_8.1.1^2	 evam itareṣu api yathāsvam avasare vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt anumāna ādi api loka prasiddham na parīkṣitavyam iti iyam ca sarva vakṣyamāṇa pramāṇa lakṣaṇa bhāṣya tātparyavyākhyā sādhāraṇī vārtikakāreṇa kṛtā sarva vakṣyamāṇa pramāṇa prapañcasya hi idam eva sādhāraṇam sthānam anena ca ślokena samarthita ārambha avasaraḥ prapañcaḥ viśeṣataḥ vyākhyāsyate iti tat etat uktam bhavati na atra naiyāyika ādi vat alaukikam pramāṇānāṃsvarūpam upadarśayitum lakṣaṇāni praṇītāni loka prasiddha pramāṇa avi abhicāri tvāt mīmāṃsakānām kin tu śaṅkita vyabhicāra āpādita parīkṣā pratyākhyāna artham loka prasiddham eva svarūpam upadarśyate atas na pramāṇa lakṣaṇe saṅgatiḥ pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇasya āśaṅkitavyā iti 
ŚVK_8.1.2^1	 idānīm lakṣaṇa bhāṣya vyākhyāna avasare prāthamyāt anumāna lakṣaṇam anusandhāsyati tatra ca jñāta sambandhasya iti ucyate tatra na vidmaḥ kaḥ jñāta sambandha samāsa arthaḥ iti na tāvat puruṣaḥ sambandhī samudāyaḥ vā anupādānāt na hi anupātta anyapadārthakaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati nanu buddhi sambandha upasthāpitaḥ puruṣaḥ samudāyi dvaya ākṣiptaḥ samudāyaḥ vā viśeṣyate buddhiḥ hi sva śabdāt avagatā tadvantam antareṇa ātmānam alabhamāna upasthāpayati sva āśrayam iti na anupādāna doṣaḥ na etat evam gamyamānasya aviśeṣaṇāt na khalu dhūma śabda arthau= inā abhāvāt avagataḥ agniḥ jvalati iti viśeṣyate vakṣyati ca gamyamānasya ca arthasya na eva dṛṣṭam viśeṣaṇam iti syāt matam satyam anupāttam na viśeṣyate upāttaḥ eva tu iha sambandhī tathā hi ayam atra pada anvayaḥ anumānam eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare buddhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.1.2^2	 atas kasya eka deśasya iti ākāṅkṣāyām saḥ eva eka deśaḥ jñāta sambandhasya iti viśeṣyate nanu darśana upasarjana tvāt eka deśaḥ na viśeṣaṇam arhati na hi upasarjanam padam pada antareṇa sambadhyate na hi bhavati puruṣam pratyupasarjanībhūtasya rājñaḥ ṛddhasya rāja puruṣaḥ iti viśeṣaṇam ucyate na upasarjana tvāt asambandhaḥ ākāṅkṣitam hi pūraṇa samartham upasarjanena api sambadhyate eva atra eka deśa darśanāt iti ukte asti kasya eka deśasya iti ākāṅkṣā artha sambandhe api ākāṅkṣā eva hetuḥ upasarjana saṃjñā tu upasarjanam pūrvam iti pūrva prayoga siddhi arthā eva atas eva hi kasya guru kulam iti vyavahāra upapattiḥ tatra hi kula upasarjanasya eva guroḥ kasya iti viśeṣaṇam api ca darśana kriyā karmaṇaḥ dṛśyasya eka deśasya prādhānyam apradhānasya sa apekṣasya api pada antareṇa sambandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā rāja puruṣaḥ śobhanaḥ iti atas upapannam jñāta sambandhasya eka deśa darśanāt iti 
ŚVK_8.1.2^3	 na upapannam uktam hi guruṇā eva na upasarjanam padam pada antareṇa sambadhyate ṛddhasya rāja puruṣaḥ iti vat iti na ca parihṛtam upasarjana viśeṣaṇa ihi ṛddhiḥ rājānam viśiṣyāt yat tu uktam ākāṅkṣā sambandhe hetuḥ iti tat ayuktam ākāṅkṣāvataḥ api ayogyasya pada antarān anvayāt iha ca darśana upasarjana tvāt anvayā yogya tvam uktam atha ucyeta eka vākyatāyām ayam doṣaḥ eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare buddhiḥ anumānam atas paryavasite vākye kasyeika deśasya iti ākāṅkṣāyām vākya gatam eka deśasya iti padam jñāta sambandhasya iti viśeṣyate iti tat na ākāṅkṣā vākyasya aśravaṇāt saḥ eva anupātta anya padārtha doṣaḥ yatra tu upādānam tatra upasarjana tvāt ayogya tvam uktam api ca vākya bhedaḥ eva atra doṣaḥ yat ca darśanam dṛśya pradhānam iti uktam tat api ayuktam uttara padārtha pradhāna tvāt tatpuruṣasya 
ŚVK_8.1.2^4	 na ca vāstavam guṇa pradhāna bhāvam āśritya pada antara sambandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ rāja puruṣe adarśanāt nanu śābdam eva eka deśasya prādhānyam gamyate kṛdyoga lakṣaṇā hi iyam karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na aśravaṇāt na hi samāse ṣaṣṭhī śrūyate na ca aśrūyamāṇā sva artham abhidhatte kin tu niṣāda stha pati vat lakṣaṇayā tad arthaḥ avagamyate śrutyā tu dṛśya avacchinnam darśanam eva pradhāna tayā avagamyate uttara padārtha pradhāna anuśāsanam api atas eva samāsāt tathā eva avagateḥ na ca vāstavam prādhānyam upasarjanasya pada antara sambandhe sa apekṣa samāse vā hetuḥ kasya guru kulam iti nitya sāpekṣa tvāt guru śabdasya na asāmarthyam doṣaḥ na hi anantarbhāvya pratisambandhinam guru arthaḥ avagamyate sambandhi śabda tvāt tasya atas apekṣita artha antaraḥ eva asau vṛttau anupraviśati iti na doṣaḥ na tu evam eka deśa śabdaḥ iti vaiṣamyam atas duradhigamaḥ jñāta sambandha samāsa arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.1.3^1	 atas āha pramātā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam eka deśaḥ na anya padārthaḥ kin tu pramātā eva buddhi sambandha upasthāpitaḥ jñāta sambandhaḥ iti nirdiśyate gamyamānam api ca avyabhicāriṇā cihnena upasthāpitam viśeṣyate eva na hi namaḥ pinākapāṇayaḥ iti anya padārtha anupādānam doṣāya api ca aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti iti bahu vrīhi samāsa arthaḥ devatā tad hitaḥ katham āhṛtya anupātte soma rase vartate atha somam krīṇāti abhiṣuṇoti pāvayati dhārayā gṛhṇāti iti prakaraṇa avagataḥ soma rasaḥ anya padārthaḥ iti ucyate iha api buddhi avinā abhāva avagatasya pramātuḥ bahu vrīhi artha tvam na anupapannam 
ŚVK_8.1.3^2	 pūrva pakṣa sthitena vārtika kṛtā gamyamānam na viśeṣyate iti yat uktam tat eva durlabha labdham iva manvānaiḥ kaiścid valgitam iti upekṣaṇīyam eva siddhānte hi gamyamānāyāḥ eva vyakteḥ gāvau śuklaḥ gauḥ iti ca vibhaktyā śabda antareṇa ca viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati mañcāḥ krośanti iti ca āha ca jāteḥ astitvanā astitve na hi kaścid vivakṣati nitya tvāt lakṣyamāṇāyāḥ vyakteḥ te hi viśeṣaṇe iti dhūmaḥ ayam jvalati iti na bhavati anabhidhānāt na hi lokaḥ paryanuyoktum arhati yaḥ tu vaiyātyāt dhūma śabdena agnim lakṣayitvā tathā prayuyuṅkṣati na tam nivārayāmaḥ nanu evam pramātari jñāta sambandhe sati na eka deśaḥ viśeṣitaḥ iti vyāpaka eka deśa dṛśaḥ vyāpya smṛtiḥ anumānam āpadyeta 
ŚVK_8.1.3^3	 na tu etat iṣṭam vyāpyāt dhi vyāpaka jñānam anumānam jñāta sambandhasya eka deśasya iti sambandhe syāt api viśiṣṭa eka deśa lābhaḥ tatra hi jñāta sambandhasya iti ṣaṣṭhyā vyāpyaḥ eva sambandhī pratipādyate sarvatra hi vyāpyaḥ eva hi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭāḥ ucyate uktam asmābhiḥ na idam alaukikam kiñcid pramāṇānām svarūpam upavarṇyate loka prasiddham eva tu aparīkṣā pratipādana artham svarūpam anūdyate loke hi niyāmya eka deśa darśanaḥ eva niyāmaka eka deśa jñānam anumānam iti prasiddham iti asti api hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa eka deśaḥ labhyate api ca āsat nikṛṣṭe arthaḥ iti vadati na ca vyāpaka dṛśaḥ sāhacarya mātrāt vyāpya smṛtiḥ asannikṛṣṭa viṣayāḥ 
ŚVK_8.1.3^4	 pūrva pramāṇān adhika artha aviṣaya tvāt smṛteḥ vyāpyāt eva tu anubhūta pūrva niyamāt vyāpaka viśiṣṭaḥ parvata ādiḥ avagamyate atas upapannaḥ viśiṣṭa eka deśa lābhaḥ iti yat tu jñāta sambandhasya eka deśasya iti atra ṣaṣṭhyā viśeṣa pratipādanam uktam tat ayuktam vyāpakāt api ṣaṣṭhī utpatteḥ bhavati hi kṛtaka tvam anitya tāyāḥ hetuḥ iti vyavahāraḥ vyāpikā ca anitya tā kṛtaka tvasya tasmāt aviśeṣita upādāne api vyākhyānataḥ sambandha viśeṣāt eka deśa viśeṣa lābhaḥ na anupapannaḥ bhavati hi vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣa pratipattiḥ na tu sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti sūktam pramātā jñāta sambandhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.1.4^1	 vyākhyāna antaram āha eka deśī iti eka deśau hi na eka deśinam antareṇa syātām iti ākṣiptasya eka deśinaḥ yuktam anya padārtha tvam nanu evam jñāta sambandhasya eka deśinaḥ yaḥ eka deśaḥ tasya eka deśasya darśanāt iti ucyamāne saḥ eva darśana upasarjana tvāt eka deśasya eka deśinaḥ sambandhaḥ sambandhi viśeṣa apekṣasya vā samāsa doṣaḥ prasajyate bhavet etat evam yadi eka deśa vyatireka janitā ṣaṣṭhī syāt iyam tu eka deśa darśana vyatireka janitā ṣaṣṭhī tat api paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpaḥ itivat eka deśinaḥ bhavati eva kaḥ punar atra eka deśī jñāta sambandhaḥ pakṣaḥ sa pakṣaḥ vā na tāvat pakṣaḥ jñāyamāna sambandha tvāt 
ŚVK_8.1.4^2	 na ca sa pakṣaḥ siddha tvena ananumeya tvāt na eṣa doṣaḥ vyāptiḥ hi na sakṛt darśana nirgrāhyāḥ bhūyobhiḥ tu darśanaiḥ pūrva pūrva avagata sakala deśa kāla vivikta dhūma vat mātrasya agni mattayā vyāptiḥ avadhāritā na punar atra ayam idānīm vā dhūmavān agnimān iti atas pakṣa eka deśinaḥ api sāmānyatas dhūmavat ta aupādhika sambandhaḥ jñātaḥ iti saḥ eva jñāta saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyatas gṛhīte api deśa ādi bhedena pratyakṣa pratyabhijñāna vat na anumāna pratyabhijñānam anupapannam iti na prameya abhāvaḥ eka deśya eka deśau ca āśraya āśrayiṇau abhimatau na punar avayava a= ayavinau iti draṣṭavyam iti 
ŚVK_8.2	 karmadhāraya samāsaḥ vā ayam iti āha karmadhāraya iti ayam arthaḥ jñātaḥ ca asau saṃbandhaḥ ca iti karmadhārayaḥ ayam atra ca pakṣe saṃbandhini gamye gamake ca eka deśa tā katham sambandhya ādhārasya sambandhasya sambandhinau eka deśau na hi bhūdhara ādhārasya dhūmasya eka deśaḥ giriḥ ādheyam eva tu dhūmaḥ tad eka deśa tayā manyate ucyate bhavati ādhāra aṃśe api eka deśa vācaḥ yuktiḥ yathā avayavi ādhāreṣu avayaveṣu ca samūhiṣu iti niravadyam 
ŚVK_8.3.1	 dvayam vā anya padārthaḥ iti āha dvayam vā iti sambandha garahaṇa kāle paraspara sambandham upalabdham vyāpya vyāpaka dvayam jñāta sambandham ucyate tasya ca sa mudāyinau eka deśau yathā ca etat evam tathā prāk eva uktam iti kiṃpunaḥ karma dhāraya pakṣe dvaya ani apadārtha tve vā prameyam na tāvat sambandha samudāyau eva tayoḥ pūrvam eva avagata tvāt adhunā ca dharma dharmi vibhāgena anavagamāt na ca anyaḥ eka deśī tasya anupādānāt na ca eka deśābhyām ākṣepaḥ sambandha samudāya nirākāṅkṣa tvāt na ca svatantra eka deśa darśanāt svatantra eka deśa antare jñānam anumānam siddha tvāt vakṣyati hi na dharma mātram siddha tvāt iti atra abhidhīyate ayam atra arthaḥ jñātasya sambandhasya jñāta sambandhasya vā dvayasya kvacid eka deśa darśanāt tatra eva eka deśa antare buddhiḥ anumānam iti kutas etat asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇāt na hi svatantra eka deśaḥ asannikṛṣṭaḥ kvacid eva parvata ādau eka deśaḥ asat nikṛṣṭaḥ bhavati tatra anavagata pūrva tvāt iti kim anupapannam iti 
ŚVK_8.3.2	 kaḥ punar atra sambandhaḥ anumāna aṅgam iṣyate avinā abhāvaḥ tādātmya tad utpatti nimittakaḥ iti kecid evam hi taiḥ uktam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā niyāmakāt avinā abhau= a niyamaḥ adarśanāt na na darśanāt iti na hi vipakṣa sapakṣayoḥ adarśanāt darśanāt vāvinā abhāva siddhiḥ tena aniyatasya api tatra vṛtteḥ sambhavāt kiñci d vipakṣa vyāvṛttyā ca sarva vipakṣa vyāvṛtti a siddheḥ sarva vipakṣāṇām ca yugapad grahītum aśakteḥ kin tu agni ādau sati dhūma ādeḥ bhāvāt asati ca abhāvāt tad āyatta svabhāvaḥ dhūma ādiḥ iti vidite tad avinā abhāvaḥ siddhyati tad kāryasya tam antareṇa ātma lābha abhāvāt tat atra agnau darśanam itaratra adarśanam tad utpattau hetuḥ tatas avinā abhāva siddhiḥ tādātmye api tad siddhiḥ tam vinā bhavataḥ tādātmya anupapatteḥ 
ŚVK_8.3.3^1	 nanu evaṃvidha anvaya virahiṇaḥ gandhān na rūpa rasa ādayaḥ anumīyeran na ca khalu tasya rūpam ātmā na ca kāraṇam iti katham tatas tad siddhiḥ śrūyatām yathā siddhyati rasāt eva hi sva hetau agnau iva dhūmāt anumīyamāne samasām agrīka indhana vikāra vat rūpa avagatiḥ iti na anupapattiḥ yathā āhuḥ eka sāmagrī adhīnasya rūpa ādeḥ rasataḥ gatiḥ hetu dharma anumānena dhūma indhana vikāra vat iti nanu yukta indhana vikāre tasya dhūmasya ca eka agni kāraṇa tvāt avagatiḥ na tu rūpa rasau eka kāraṇakau kāraṇa rasāḥ hi kārye rasam ārabhante kāraṇa rūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam tat kutas samāna kāraṇa tā na eka kāraṇa tayā eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam kin tu rasāt rasa hetuḥ anumīyamānaḥ pravṛtti rūpa janana śakti rūpa upādāna kāraṇa saha kṛtaḥ anumīyate tathāvidhasya eva kāraṇa tvāt pravṛtti śaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpam janyate iti rūpa siddhiḥ tat idam anupapannam yat tāvat kāryam kāraṇena vinā na bhavati iti tatas tat jñānam uktam tat ayuktam katham hi kāraṇena vinā kāryam eva na bhavati iti etat eva avaseyam 
ŚVK_8.3.3^2	 tat vinā bhavataḥ nityam sattvam asattvam vā syāt tatas ca kārya tā eva hīyeta uktam hi taiḥ nityam sattvam asattvam vā hetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt apekṣātaḥ hi bhāvānām kādācid ka tva sambhavaḥ iti apekṣātaḥ kādācid ka tvam anapekṣam tu sat asat vā syāt gagana śaśa viṣāṇa vat iti ced yadi evam anyaḥ ayam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt svabhāva niyamaḥ yat anapekṣam tat nityam sat asat vā bhavati iti yat ca rasāt rūpa avagatiḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt iti uktam tat api ayuktam yadi api pravṛtti śakti rūpa upādāna kāraṇa saha kṛtaḥ rasa hetuḥ avagataḥ sva kāryāt rūpam tu kutas aavagamyate pravṛtti sāmarthyāt kāraṇāt iti ced nanu nādaḥ rūpasya kāryam na ātmā iti katham tad avagame hetuḥ pravṛtti śakteḥ kāraṇasya kārya avyabhicārāt iti ced na tarhi kārya tad ātmanoḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ kāraṇe api bhavet bhavatu iti ced na agneḥ api dhūma anumāna prasaṅgāt astu iti ced atantram tarhi kāryatvam anumāne syāt matam na pravṛtti sāmarthyāt kāraṇāt rūpa anumānam 
ŚVK_8.3.3^3	 api tarhi rūpa vat rūpa kāraṇa sahakāriṇā rasa kāraṇena rasaḥ janyate sahakāri kāraṇam api sa viśeṣaṇam kāraṇam eva iti rasāt itaretara anugṛhītam kāraṇa cakram anubhāsyate iti tat na kārya kāraṇayoḥ ayaugapadyāt rūpa kāraṇasya tadvat ta anupapattiḥ pāriśeṣyāt dūṣyāt rūpam eva sahakārī iti vācyam tatra ca vṛthā tad kāraṇa anumāna pariśramaḥ rūpam sahakārī iti api na anirṇīta rūpa rasa āvinābhāvaḥ anubhavitum utsahate prāk eva tu tat nirṇaye vṛthā rūpa tad hetvoḥ sahakāri tva kalpanā api ca anubhava viruddham eva idam na khalu rasam upalabhya tad hetu anumāna mukhena rūpa avagatiḥ laukikānām api tarhi rūpa rasayoḥ sāhitya niyamāt sahasā eva rasāt rūpam anumīyate api ca kārya kāraṇa bhūtayoḥ eva bahulam anumāna vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate iti anādṛtyam kāryatvam avyabhicāre tādātmyam api meyā bhāva prasaṅgāt dheyam eva kim hi vṛkṣa ātmani śiṃśapā tve vidite meyam avaśiṣyate nirbhāga tvāt aikātmye api vastunaḥ kālpanikaḥ bhedaḥ iti ced na tāvat nirbhāgam vastu bhāga avagrahāṇām deśa ādi bhede api abādhitānām samyaktvāt 
ŚVK_8.3.3^4	 kālpanika bheda āśraya tvāt ca anumānasya vāstavam aikātmyam anaṅgam vṛkṣa vyavahāraḥ anumīyate iti ced katham anātma vyavahāraḥ śiṃśapā tvāt anumīyate tādātmye vṛkṣa vat ana numāna prasaṅgāt vyavahāra yogya tāyām api evam eva iti yat kiñcid etat evam eva vaiśeṣika ādi samaya siddhāḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādayaḥ sambandha prakārāḥ pratyuktāḥ veditavyāḥ te api hi aniyatān anumāna utpatti kāraṇam astu tarhi niyamaḥ vā anumāna aṅgam na pramāṇa abhāvāt anavagateḥ na tāvat āpāta jam pratyakṣam asya avadhāraṇa kṣamam īkṣate khalu ayam visphārita akṣaḥ sahasā mahānase dhūmam agninā sahitam na tu jānāti niyataḥ ayam anena iti duradhigamaḥ hi sarva bhāvānām svabhāva niyamaḥ na tam unnetum utsahante jhaṭ iti mahāntaḥ api na hi nirvikalpaka agocare vikalpaḥ pramāṇam tad purassara tvāt tasya syāt etat deśa ādi bhedeṣu avyabhicārāt svabhāva niyamaḥ avadhāryate iti kena avadhāryate sarva darśanānām anvaya mātre vyāpārāt 
ŚVK_8.3.4	 atha pūrva pūrva jñāna janita bhāvanā sacivam antimam anena ayam niyataḥ iti bhavati ālocana ajñānam tatas vikalpāḥ pravartiṣyante iti na etat evam indriya vyāpāra sāpekṣam hi pratyakṣam na ca saha bhāva darśanāt anyatra bahis indriya vyāpāraḥ na ca bahis viṣaya vedane tad nirapekṣam antaḥkaraṇam pravartate api ca nirūpita rūpāḥ api bhāvāḥ deśa ādi bhedeṣu anyathā abhavantaḥ a nubhūyante iti na svabhāva niyamam pratyāśrayitum ucitam prāmāṇikānām tat āhuḥ deśa kāla ādi rūpāṇām bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā iti tasmāt vaktavyaḥ anumāna aṅga bhūtaḥ sambandhaḥ atas āha sambandhaḥ iti vyāptiḥ hi sāhitya niyamam apadiśati tad darśinaḥ hi eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare buddhiḥ utpadyate atas sāmānya vacanaḥ api sambandha śabdaḥ uparitana samabhivyāhārāt atra anumāna lakṣaṇa granthe viśeṣa paraḥ bhavati upari ca asya avadhāraṇe pramāṇam vakṣyate iti 
ŚVK_8.4–8.6^1	 yadi jñāta sambandhasya anumānam sa tarhi sambandhaḥ dvi āśrayaḥ iti ubhaya anumāne liṅgam syāt atas āha vyāpya iti atra kāraṇam āha yaḥ yasya iti dvayena saḥ samanyūna deśa kālaḥ hi vyāpyaḥ bhavati pūrvam tāvat yatra ubhayoḥ api dharmayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka tvam yathā parastāt udāhariṣyate uttaraḥ tu yathā dhūma ādiḥ sa hi prāyeṇa agnideśa kāla varttī bhavati sati api ca agnau= abhavan tatas deśa kālābhyām nyūnaḥ bhavati yāvantau agneḥ deśa kālau tāvantau na asya iti nyūna tvam atas eva ca asau agneḥ vyāpakaḥ na bhavati sakala tadīya deśa kāla avyāpteḥ vyāpakaḥ tu sama adhika deśa kālaḥ atra api pūrva uktaḥ eva pūrvaḥ uttaraḥ tu yathā agneḥ eva dhūmasya sa hi tasya deśa kālau tāvat vyāpnoti eva asati api dhūme bhavan deśa kālābhyām adhikaḥ api abhidhīyate 
ŚVK_8.6^2	 yatas ca anayoḥ īdṛśam svarūpam na anyathā vyāpya vyāpaka tā ātmaka tā tena kāraṇena vyāpyaḥ eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇam bhavati yat asau tam vinā api na bhavati eva na hi asau agniḥ iva dhūmasya agneḥ deśa kālau atikramya api bhavati yena tam vinā api bhavaḥ tam na gamayet agniḥ tu anevaṃvidhaḥ iti na asau dhūmasya gamakaḥ bhavati nanu ca ayam viśeṣojñāta sambandha śabdān na avagamyate sa hi sambandha jñāna mātram aṅgatayā darśayati na vyāpyatām iti kutas viśeṣa lābhaḥ uktam atra laukika lakṣaṇa anuvādena aparīkṣā pratipādana artham idam bhāṣyam loke ca vyāpya eka deśa darśinaḥ eva vyāpaka jñānam anumānam iti siddham na hi anyathā iti ca apakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā tena iti tat upajīvanena vyākhyeyam iti 
ŚVK_8.7	 nanu vyāpakāt api vyāpya saṃvittiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ anitya tvāt iva kṛtaka tvasya bhavati hi bhāvānām anitya tvāt kṛtaka tva anumānam vyāpakam ca anitya tvam kṛtaka tvasya atas vyāpakam gamyam vyāpyam gamakam iti avyāpakam atas āha vyāpaka tvā iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam vyāpakasya gamaka tvam na tu vyāpaka tva gṛhītasya tena hi rūpeṇa gṛhītaḥ asau vyāpyāt deśa kāla ādhikye api na virudhyate na ca adhika deśa kālaḥ pratipādakaḥ bhavati tam vinā api bhāvāt iti uktam eva nanu vyāpyatā api tasya asti astu nāma vastutas tat tu rūpam na gṛhītam iti katham gamaka tvam avagate tu tādrūpye tena eva gamaka tvam na vyāpaka tayā atas vyāpyatā eva anumāna aṅgam na vyāpaka tā iti sūktam iti 
ŚVK_8.8–8.9	 vyāpya tvam aṅgam na vyāpaka tvam iti etat eva asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇena darśayati vispaṣṭa iti yatra vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ na saṅkīryate tatra vispaṣṭam eva etat upalakṣitam yathā vyāpyam gamakam vyāpakam gamyam iti go viṣāṇi tvayoḥ hi vyāpyam go tvam vyāpakam viṣaṇi tvam anumāpayati na tu viṣāṇitāḥ go tvam vyāpikā hi sā mitau anumāne go viṣāṇi tvayoḥ ayam gamya gamaka vivekaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ evam asaṅkare gamya gamaka vivekāt yatra api vyāpti saṅkaraḥ bhavati tatra api vyāpya tvam eva gamaka tve kāraṇam iti niṣkṛṣyate iti āha tena iti 
ŚVK_8.11^1	 nanu vyāptiḥ anumāna aṅgam iti uktam kasya punar iyam saṃyoginaḥ samavāyinaḥ sambandhi sambandhinaḥ vā na hi atra vyavasthām upalabhāmahe sarveṣām api anumāpaka tvāt tat yadi saṃyogī vyāpyaḥ rasāt rūpa anumānam na syāt atha samavāyī dhūmāt agni anumānam sambandhi sambandhinaḥ ca pitroḥ brāhmaṇa tvāt putrasya brāhmaṇa tva anumānam ityādi darśayitavyam api ca vyāptiḥ iti anvayaḥ abhidhīyate upaśleṣaḥ iti yāvat na ca asau bhūmau pratiṣṭhitena agninā gagana gatasya dhūma agrasya sambhavati 
ŚVK_8.11^2	 na ca bhūmiṣṭhām śaṅku= chāyām divi vartamānaḥ ṛkṣa udayaḥ anveti vyāptiḥ ca kasyacid kenacid bhavantī deśataḥ vā syāt kālataḥ vā pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvinaḥ savituḥ udayasyāt yatana arkasya eva udayāt aṣṭau yāmān atikramya anumānam na syāt parasmin dhūmāt agni anumānam ityādi paryanuyoktavyam atas āha tena iti dvayena yena khalu api vivakṣita avāntara vibhāgam vyāpya tā mātram anumāna aṅgam tena kāraṇena yasya eva saṃyoga ādīnām anyatamasya yena eva teṣām anyatamena yādṛśī upaśleṣṭena itareṇa vā vyāpya tā prāc avagatā sā eva anumāne kāraṇam bhavati 
ŚVK_8.11^3	 na hi upaśleṣaḥ vyāptiḥ uktam hi sambandha niyamaḥ asau iti sa ca anupaśliṣṭena api bhavati yaḥ hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tena niyamyate iti ucyate kim atra upaśleṣeṇa na ca atra deśa ādīnām anyatama vivakṣā yāvati hi deśe kāle vā vartamānasya yasya vyāpya tā nirūpita pūrvā yāvat deśa kāla bhāvinā vyāpakena tasya vyāpaka aṃśasya tāvatī eva deśa ādau vartamānasya sa vyāpya aṃśaḥ tādṛś eva gagana ādi vaṛtti dharmi antare dṛṣṭānta dharmī apekṣayā sādhya dharmiṇi dṛṣṭaḥ san pratipādakaḥ bhavati niyamaḥ hi anumāna aṅgam sa ca sarveṣām aviśiṣṭaḥ eva kim avāntara vibhāgena deśe yāvatī iti anatidūram adhirūḍhasya dhūma ādeḥ dūratara varttinaḥ api nadī pūrasya vyāptim darśayati śaṅku= chāyāyāḥ ca nitānta dūra vartinā ṛkṣa udayena yāvati kālaḥ iti ca bhāvinaḥ savituḥ udaya anumāna ādau api vyāptim darśayati iti 
ŚVK_8.12.1^1	 nanu asyām vyāptau na kiñcid pramāṇam asti iti uktam atas āha bhūyas darśana iti katham punar bhūyas darśana gamyā vyāptiḥ kim hi tatra pratyekam eva bhūyāṃsi darśanāni pramāṇam āhosvit darśana saṅghātaḥ pūrvatana darśana āhita saṃskāra sacivam antimam pramā antaram vā bhūyas darśana prabhavam tatra na tāvat pratyeka sandarśana samadhigamyā vyāptiḥ iti avasitam eva no khalu asya sahasā agni dhūmau agni śaraṇe vilokayamānasya agninā vyāptaḥ dhūmaḥ iti matiḥ āvirasti na ca ananubhūtam avikalpakena sa vikalpakena api viṣayīkriyate 
ŚVK_8.12.1^2	 na ca aneka darśana ārabdhaḥ darśana samudāyaḥ kaścid asti tasya darśana atirekeṇa abhāvāt niruddha anāgata pratyutpannānām ca asaṃhanyamāna tvāt pura stana aneka darśana āhita saṃskāra sahāyam antimam tu darśanam katarat pramāṇam iti cintanīyam na tāvat pratyakṣam tat dhi dvedhā vibhaktam ālocana ajñānam tat prabhavam ca vikalpa sambhinnam na tāvat pūrvam vyāpteḥ avadhāraṇe samartham apratisandhānāt vyāpteḥ ca ayam anena pratibaddhaḥ iti pratisandhāna ātmaka tvāt na ca tad anapekṣam uttaram ātmānam labhate 
ŚVK_8.12.1^3	 yat ca idam saṃskārāṇām sācivyam idam api na caturaśram saṃskārāḥ khalu yat vastu rūpa upalambha sambhāvita ātmānaḥ bhavanti tatra eva smṛti mātram ādadhati na punar artha antara grahaṇāya kalpante pratyakṣe ca vyāpti pramāṇe katham atad viṣayāṇām vyāpti siddhiḥ bhavati hi yathāyatham dṛṣṭa anumita śrutebhyaḥ karma phalebhyaḥ puṃviśeṣeṣu vaidika karma anumānam na ca tad tad karma niyamaḥ tasya tasya paśu ādeḥ phalasya aparokṣam īkṣyate atīndriya tvāt yat ca idam adhvarevitate vaidikāt aṅgāt pradhānāt ca apūrvā anumānam tat api na syāt 
ŚVK_8.12.1^4	 vyāpti avadhāraṇe pramāṇa abhāvāt megha abhāvāt ca vṛṣṭyabhāva anumānam ityādi darśayitavyam atas na tāvat pratyakṣā vyāptiḥ na ca anumānikī pramāṇa abhāvāt eva tad adhīna ātma lābhasya tasya anupapatteḥ śabdaḥ tu anāgata utpādya bhāva viṣayaḥ na siddha vyāpti kptaye prabhavati upamānam api pramāṇa antara prasiddha vastu sādṛśya mātra viṣayam na vastunaḥ sattām pramiṇoti arthāpattiḥ api anyathā anupapadyamāna artha viṣayā darśana prabhavāḥ na ca sahita avadhāritayoḥ asatyām vyāptau kiñcid anupapannam nāma 
ŚVK_8.12.2	 nanu kārya tā na upapadyate katham hi kāryam asati kāraṇe bhavati bhūyas darśana samadhigamyam ca kāryatvam iti bhūyas darśana prasūta kāryatva avagamāni atha anupapatti pramāṇikā kāraṇa vyāpti siddhiḥ katham idānīm akārya kāraṇa bhūteṣu vyāptiḥ setsyati bhūyāṃsi darśanāni eva asatyām vyāptau na upapadyante iti ced kim hi teṣām vyāptim antareṇa na sambhavati svarūpam tāvat ca kāraṇa sāmagrīkam hi vaḥ siddham sva gocara prakāśanam api svatas eva viṣayasya api sva pramāṇa paricchinnasya na kiñcid anupapannam paśyāmaḥ na ca asau pramāṇa antareṇa pratihanyate yat na upapadyeta na ca bhāva svarūpā vyāptiḥ abhāvena pramīyate iti sāmpratam tatra asau abhāva pramāṇikāḥ na syāt eva 
ŚVK_8.12.3^1	 syāt matam kā iyam anyā dhūmasya agninā vyāptiḥ anagni nivṛtteḥ sā ca abhāva rūpa tvāt abhāvena pramīyate iti yuktam eva tat na vastu rūpa tvāt vastu rūpaḥ hi svabhāvaḥ dhūma ādeḥ kenacid niyataḥ itarayā vyāvartate khalu ayam śaśa viṣāṇa abhāvāt api iti śaśaviṣāṇena api niyamyeta katham asatā niyamyate iti ced kaḥ doṣaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ hi niyamaḥ sā ca asti iti kim śaśa viṣāṇasya sattva asattvābhyām yadi matam vipakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ niyamaḥ iti kaḥ yam vipakṣaḥ nāma yaḥ hi yena niyamyate tasya tad paripanthī vipakṣaḥ vyāpyate ca śaśa viṣāṇena tad abhāvāt nivṛttaḥ dhūmaḥ iti anagniḥ iva tad abhāvaḥ api vipakṣaḥ eva api ca aśeṣa vipakṣāṇām upalabdhi ayogya tvāt na tebhyaḥ nivṛttiḥ abhāvena śakyate avagantum yogya pramāṇa abhāva uhi abhāve pramāṇam iti vakṣyate atas na kiñcid vyāptau pramāṇam mānasam iti ced na bahis asvātantryāt 
ŚVK_8.12.3^2	 tatra etat syāt yadi api bahis indriyāṇi atīta anāgata ādibhiḥ bhāva bhedaiḥ vyāptim grahītum asamarthāni manaḥ tu sakala atīta ādi viṣaya pariccheda sādhāraṇam pratibaddha sāmarthyam kvacid iti tad bala bhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptiḥ grahīṣyate iti tat ca na evam bahis asvātantryāt manasaḥ no khalu api bahis viṣaya bodhe manassvatantram iti varṇitam tathā hi manasaḥ sārdham iti atra svatantre hi bahis iṣyamāṇe manasi sarvas sarva darśī syāt saṃskārataḥ vyavasthā iti ced na smṛti hetu tvāt 
ŚVK_8.12.3^3	 tatra etat syāt yadi api kevalam asvatantram manaḥ bahis viṣaya avadhāraṇe tathā api pūrva pūrva anubhava janita saṃskāra sanātham bahis api vartīṣyate cakṣuḥ ādi anugṛhītam iva rūpa ādau atas na avyavasthā tat ca na evam smṛti hetu tvāt smṛti mātra hetavaḥ hi pūrva anubhava prabhāvitāḥ saṃskārāḥ na utsahante manasaḥ bahis avagrahe anugraham ādhātum smṛti viṣaya antarāṇām api grahaṇa prasaṅgāt asti hi tatra api smṛti hetuḥ saṃskāraḥ sa ced grahaṇe kvacid manasaḥ sahāyī bhavati iti kim na smṛti viṣaya antarāṇi api grāhayati iti yat kiñcid etat 
ŚVK_8.12.4^1	 yaḥ tu vadati sāhityam agni dhūmayoḥ sambandhaḥ sa ca prathama samadhigama samayaḥ eva saṃviditaḥ anavacchinna deśa kālaḥ ca agni dhūmayoḥ sambandhaḥ bhāsate na hi idānīm atra vā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti bhavati matiḥ api tarhi sannihita vartamānayoḥ eva īdantayā pratibhā samānayoḥ deśa kālau sambandhaḥ ca tayoḥ viśeṣaṇam imau sambaddhau iti na idānīm atra vā sambandhaḥ iti tat evam anavacchinna rūpaḥ svābhāvikaḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati svābhāvika tve ca na vyabhicāra āśaṅka upapattimatī 
ŚVK_8.12.4^2	 kim idānīm anaṅga bhūtam eva bhūyas darśanam na anaṅgam aṅgam tu aupādhika āśaṅkā nirākaraṇena vahniḥ hi dhūmena saṃyuktaḥ saṃveditaḥ api kadācid vidhūmaḥ dṛśyate tatra ārdra indhana ādiḥ upādhiḥ anupraviśati na tu svābhāvikaḥ agneḥ dhūmena saṃbandhaḥ iti niścīyate tad darśanāt ca dhūme api bhavati śaṅkā kadācid aupādhikaḥ pāvakena asya api saṃbandhaḥ iti sā bhūyas darśanena nivartyate bahuśas api dṛśyamānasya dhūmasya na agni saṃbandhe kaścid upādhiḥ upalabhyate prayatnena api ca anviṣṭaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ upādhiḥ na asti iti niścīyate 
ŚVK_8.12.4^3	 tat evaṃdhūma mātra anubandhi agniḥ iti siddham bhavati tatas ca anaupādhikasya na vyabhicāra āśaṅkā iti sa vaktavyaḥ kim idānīm sāhitya mātram anumāna aṅgam tat niyamaḥ vā yadi sāhitya mātram tat tarhi prathama darśanaḥ eva samadhigatam iti punar dhūma darśinaḥ avidita vyāpteḥ api anumānam syāt atha tat niyamaḥ tasya eva idam pramāṇam anusriyate kutas sidhyati iti na hi prathama darśinaḥ ayam anena niyataḥ iti matiḥ āvirbhavantī dṛśyate anavacchinna deśa kāla tayā avagataḥ saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ bhavati tatas niyamaḥ iti ced 
ŚVK_8.12.4^4	 sa tarhi tathāvidhaḥ prathamam eva avagataḥ iti bhūyos darśanam na apekṣeta tathā dṛṣṭasya api agneḥ dhūma saṃbandhaḥ vyabhicarati tad darśanāt ca dhūme api vyabhicāra āśaṅkā jāyate tad nirākaraṇāya asakṛt darśana apekṣā iti ced yadi anavacchinnasya api deśataḥ kālataḥ vā kadācid kasyacid viyogaḥ dṛśyate kaḥ tarhi itaratra api samāśvāsaḥ nanu iyam āśaṅkā bhūyas darśanena nirākriyate iti uktam katham nirākriyate yadā śataśas api dhūmavān agniḥ avagataḥ vidhūmaḥ dṛśyate na ca atra pratiniyamaḥ iyadbhiḥ darśanaiḥ avyabhicāraḥ sidhyati iti 
ŚVK_8.12.5	 nanu dhūmasya api agni saṃbandhe na kaścid upādhiḥ upalabhyate agneḥ iva dhūma saṃbandhe atas katham asau sati api dhūme na bhaviṣyati na deśa ādeḥ eva upādhi tvena śaṅkyamāna tvāt agnau dhūma saṃbandha vyabhicāram upalabhya āśaṅkate kadācid dhūmasya api agni sambandhe deśa kāla ādi upādhiḥ syāt iti dṛṣṭam hi kvacid deśe kharjūrāṇām piṇḍa kharjūra phala tvam vṛścika daṃśanasya ca maraṇa kāraṇa tvam tad deśa antare na bhavati tadvat dhūmaḥ api jātu jāyeta antareṇa api hutāśanam kvacid iti śaṅkamānāḥ na tasya niyamam agninā adhyavasyanti śata aṃśena api vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ śaṅkyamānāḥ anumāna udayam pratibadhnāti iti katarat ca idam pramāṇam anaupādhikaḥ agniḥ dhūma mātrā anubandhī iti na tāvat pratyakṣam sāhitya mātra upakṣīṇa tvāt na anumānam tasya asatyām vyāptau= asambhavāt vyāpti siddhi artham ca apara apara anumāna kalpanāyām anavasthāpātāt pramāṇa antarāṇi nirākṛta pūrvāṇi eva atas vyākhyeyam anumāna aṅga sambandha avadhāraṇe pramāṇam tat vyākhyāyate 
ŚVK_8.12.6	 idam tāvat pramāṇa abhāva vādī vaktavyaḥ kim khalu vyāpti gocaram jñānam na jāyate eva sandigdham vā jāyate viparyeti vā tredhā hi parīkṣakaiḥ aprāmāṇyam vibhaktam prakāra antara asambhavāt na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃvid vyavahāra virodhāt dṛśyate hi bahulam dhūmam agnau upalabhamānaḥ ayam anena niyate iti avadhāraṇa purassaram tatas agnim anumāya tad anurūpam vyavaharamāṇaḥ tad nāsatyām vyāpti saṃvittau upapadyeta vyavahāra darśanāt eva saṃśaya viparyayau nirākāryau tābhyām evaṃvidha vyavahāra asambhavāt atas na tāvat aprāmāṇyam prāmāṇyam tu ṣoḍhā vibhajyate tat yathāyogyam kasyacid kasyāñcid vyāpti saṃvittau vyavasthāpayāmaḥ yathā eva tāvat dhūmasya agninā vyāptau pratyakṣasya na hi iha pramāṇa antarāṇi sambhavanti iti varṇitam eva 
ŚVK_8.12.7^1	 nanu prathama darśane anavagamāt pratyakṣā sambhavaḥ api uktaḥ eva atas eva bhūyas darśanau= agamya tvam nanu tāni api vikalpya dūṣitāni pratyeka sāhityayoḥ asambhavāt satyam na pratyekam vyāptiḥ avagamyate na ca darśanāni saṃhanyante prācīna aneka darśana janita saṃskāra sahāye carame darśane cetasi cakāsti dhūmasya vahni niyata svabhāva tvam ratna tattvam eva parīkṣamāṇasya śabda tattvam iva vyākaraṇa smṛti saṃskṛtasya brāhmaṇatam eva mātā pitṛ sambandha smaraṇa sahakṛtasya tailāt viviktam iva vilīna ājyam rasa gandha saha kṛta indriyasya 
ŚVK_8.12.7^2	 na hi etat sarvam āpātāt na pratibhātam iti parastāt api bhāsamānam anyathā bhavati na ca pramāṇa antara tvam āpādayati nanu uktam na smṛteḥ anyatra saṃskārāḥ vyāpriyante iti kena vā saṃskārāṇām smṛteḥ anyatra vyāpāraḥ upeyate smārayantaḥ eva tu te pūrva pūrva avagatam agni sambandham dhūmasya vyāpti saṃvidam janayitum abhipravṛttasya indriyasya sahāyībhavanti āntarālika smṛti vyavahitam api ca indriya sambandha anusāri pratyakṣam iti varṇitam indriya sambandha phala aparokṣau abhāsa anusārāt na ca yat sahasā na pratibhāti tad paśāt api pratibhāsamānam pratyakṣatām jahāti yathā udāhṛteṣu eva tāvat brāhmaṇa svam 
ŚVK_8.12.8^1	 nanu na tāvat āpāta jam pratyakṣam vyāptau pramāṇam iti bhaṇitam tad pūrvakam ca sa vikalpakam iti katham tasya api prāmāṇyam asti vā brāhmaṇa ādi pratyakṣe niḥ vikalpaka avasthāyām vṛddha ādau iva nara antara vivikta ākāra pratibhāsaḥ yena parastāt sa vikalpakam pravartate yathā tu tatra piṇḍa mātra darśinaḥ smṛta yoni sambandhasya brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti pratyakṣam jāyate evam iha api bahuśas agni dhūma darśinaḥ antime darśane nirvikalpakāḥ vṛtta dhūma sva lakṣaṇasya agninā niyataḥ ayam iti dhūma svabhāva gocaram pratyakṣam etāvat eva sa vikalpakasya nirvikalpaka pūrva tvam yat tad janma pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ saṃjñā ādi smaraṇa artham hi tat prathamam arthyate 
ŚVK_8.12.8^2	 tat ca iha vyakti darśanaḥ eva pūrva saṃskāra udbodhāt siddham iti na avaśya m anayoḥ samāna viṣaya tā atas eva taila vivikta vilīna ājya bodhe tailam idam iti viparyasyataḥ gandha saha kṛta indriyasya sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa tva siddhiḥ na hi tatra asaṅkīrṇā ghṛta ākārā saṃvid āsīt tailam idam iti viparyayāt atas parastāt eva sahakāri vaśāt nirvikalpa kopa darśita vyakti viṣayam ghṛtam idam iti sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam āvirasti 
ŚVK_8.12.8^3	 evam iha api iti na doṣaḥ kim punar iha sa vikalpakena viṣayīkriyate niyataḥ ayam anena iti niyamaḥ asya hi bahulam dhūmam agnau upalabhamānasya anagnau ca vyatirekam ante bhavati vimarśaḥ api syāt vyāptaḥ ayam anena iti katham aparathā jāṅgala ādi bheda bhinna aneka deśa parityāgena sāyama ādi bheda bhinna aneka kāla parihāreṇa ca tṛṇadāru gomaya indhana ādi samavadhāna viśeṣam pratyanādṛtaḥ agnim eva anudhāvati anagnau ca na bhavati tatas param ca yathā agniḥ dhūma bhāsvara tva ādi parityāgena api kukūla ālāta ādau vartamāna uṣṇa tvam ajahat tat niyataḥ bhavati 
ŚVK_8.12.8^4	 evam agninā dhūmaḥ iti aparokṣa niścayaḥ jāyate yat tu deśa antara ādau vyabhicāraḥ iti tat na tāvat dṛṣṭa pūrvam na api śrutam iti na āśaṅkām adhirohati evam api tu śaṅkamānasya sarva pramāṇeṣu anāśvāsaḥ kvacid vyabhicāra darśanāt yat tu avadhāritaḥ api svabhāva niyamaḥ deśa antara ādau anyathā bhavati vṛścika ādeḥ iti tat na avāntara jāti bhedāt na hi yat yena niyatam avagatam abādhitam ca tat anyathā bhavati avāntara jāti bhedāt tu śakti sadasadbhāva kṛtā kārya vyavasthā iti na kvacid vyabhicāraḥ 
ŚVK_8.12.9	 nanu anumānam eva kim na iṣyate yat aupādhikam tat vyabhicarati agniḥ iva dhūmam na ca tathā dhūmaḥ agnim iti anaupādhikaḥ iti bhavatu evam avyavasthā tu upasthitā arthāpattiḥ tarhi bhavatu idam eva ca agnau darśanam anagnau ca adarśanam anupapadyamānam agninā niyamam pratipādayati kim atra na upapadyate darśanam tāvat tatra bhavati iti etāvatā eva upapannam na hi yat ekatra bhavati tena anyatra na bhavitavyam anyatra bhavataḥ adarśanam anupapannam iti ced na viprakṛṣṭānām anyeṣām api asannikarṣāt adarśana upapatteḥ sannihiteṣu anagniṣu adarśanam anupapannam iti ced abhāvāt upapatteḥ teṣu hi asau na astu eva katham upalabhyeta tatra satā api anyatra api na bhavitavyam eva iti kim atra pramāṇam atas darśana adarśana saha kṛta indriyasya eva vastu svabhāva avadhāraṇam aparokṣam jāyate iti evam samarthanīyam nanu etat eva na vidmaḥ kīdṛśaḥ asau vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ avadhāryate iti uktam asakṛt dhūmaḥ agninā niyataḥ iti etat uktam bhavati yadā yatra dhūmaḥ tadā tatra agniḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.12.10	 nanu sannihita vartamāna deśa kāla mātra sambandhaḥ astu pratyakṣaḥ anāgata ādi sambandhaḥ tu katham atiprasaṅgaḥ hi tathā sati syāt na sannihita rūpa mātra upalambhāt rūpam eva tu tādṛśam dhūma ādīnām yat evam unnīyate sthiram iva rūpam kuḍya ādīnām asti hi teṣu vidhi udādi vilakṣaṇa kāla antara sthāyi rūpa prakāśaḥ sannihita avāntara sambandhaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ iti tad rūpam apratyakṣam bhavati apratyakṣe hi tasmin na idam rajatam iti pūrva anubhūta rajata bādhaḥ na syāt bhinna viṣaya tvāt sva kāle hi pūrva vijñānena rajatam viṣayīkṛtam na bhaviṣyat bādhaka jñāna kṣaṇaḥ iti katham tatra aprasaktam bādhyate kāla antara sambandhaḥ api tena rūpeṇa pūrva jñāna avadhāritam bhaviṣyat jñāna kālam api vyāpnoti iti bhavati samāna viṣaya tām āsādya bādhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.12.11^1	 nanu yat vastunaḥ rūpam tad para anapekṣam avagamyate agneḥ iva uṣṇa tvam na ca dhūmasya agṛhīta pratisambandhinā tad rūpam avagamyate iti katham vastu rūpa tvam mā evam sambandhaḥ hi asau katham anavagate pratisambandhini avasīyate yathā āha niyamaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ sva matena ucyate adhunā iti atas yat etat agninā dhūmasya niyata tvam bhāva ātmakam idam tad pratyakṣeṇa avagamyate iti kim anupapannam yathā ca anagni nivṛttiḥ na niyamaḥ tathā varṇitam eva vipakṣa vyāvṛttyā tu vidhi rūpaḥ eva niyamaḥ parīkṣakaiḥ vyākhyāya parebhyaḥ pratipādyate 
ŚVK_8.12.11^2	 nanu niyamya tvam api karma kāraka tvam tat ca śakti rūpam katham pratyakṣam na kāraka antara pratyakṣa vat upapatteḥ kāraka antara śaktayaḥ api hi na pratyakṣāḥ atas asati eva śakti pratyakṣa tve kārakam pratyakṣam eṣitavyam evam iha api niyamyaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati iti kim anupapannam atas siddham tāvat pratyakṣa tvam āgamikeṣu ca artheṣu tasya tasya phalasya tena tena veda vedyena karmaṇā samanvayāt karma antara anvayasya ca anavagamāt anena eva karmaṇā idam phalam vyāptam iti śāstrāt avagamyate 
ŚVK_8.12.11^3	 niyata sādhya tva avagamāt megha abhāva vṛṣṭi abhāvayoḥ ca svatantra abhāva pratīti asambhavāt bhāvayoḥ eva kathañcid vyāpti saṃvedanam meghābhāvaḥ nāma nabhasaḥ eva avasthā viśeṣaḥ jaladhara nirodha nirmuktasya nirvāta stimita mahā arṇava pratīkāśam ākāśasya vapuḥ saṃlakṣyate vṛṣṭi abhāvaḥ iti ca pṛthivyāḥ eva nibiḍa kaṭhora pāṇḍura ādi bhāvaḥ tat ca rūpam ubhayasya api pratyakṣa samadhigamyam eva iti tat eva tatra vyāpti pramāṇam evam anyatra api darśayitavyam iti bhavatu tāvat anyat vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti samadhigatam tāvat vyāpteḥ sva rūpam pramāṇam ca 
ŚVK_8.12.11^4	 idam tu cintanīyam kasya kena vyāptiḥ iti na hi ekatra viditau agni dhūma viśeṣau pradeśa antare dṛśyete yat tayoḥ ekasya ekena anvaya vyatireka samadhigamyā vyāptiḥ bhavet atas vācyam vyāpteḥ adhikaraṇam atas āha sāmānyā iti satyam na viśeṣayoḥ vyāptiḥ sāmānya ātmanoḥ eva tu kasyacid dharmiṇaḥ dharmayoḥ tad tad bheda parityāgena vyāptiḥ avagamyate dhūma ākṛtiḥ agni ākṛtyāḥ niyata iti atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti idam tu prāyikam sthāyinoḥ tu viśeṣayoḥ api kvacid vyāptiḥ bhavati eva iti āha kvacid iti 
ŚVK_8.14.1	 atra eva udāharaṇam āha kṛttikā udayam iti yatra hi kṛttika udayam dṛṣṭvā rohiṇī āsattiḥ kathyate anantaram udeṣyati rohiṇī iti tasmin anumāne viśeṣasya eva viśeṣeṇa vyāptiḥ na hi tayoḥ sāmānyam asti vyakti bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyabhijñāyate hi sā eva iyam kṛttikā sā eva iyam rohiṇī iti katham anyā bhaviṣyati atas siddham viśeṣayoḥ eva atra vyāptiḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.14.2^1	 yadi tarhi vyāptiḥ anumāna aṅgam asti khalu asau hiṃsā tu asya adharma tvena bāhya hiṃsāsu iti atas kratau api hiṃsā tvāt adharma tvam anumīyate tatra daikṣa paśu hiṃsā ādīnām adharma tvam prasajyeta iti atas āha vyāpteḥ ca iti dvayena ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam āpātāt bhavati bhramaḥ yathā kila hiṃsā tva mātra anubandhya dharma tvam iti na tu etat evam nirjñātena hi adharma tvena hiṃsā tvam vyāpyate na ca śāstrāt ṛte tad jñāna upāyaḥ sambhavati na ca hiṃsā tva mātram anartha sādhanam iti śāstram asti viśeṣa hiṃsāyāḥ vihita tvāt vidhi avaruddha viṣaye ca pratiṣedha an avakāśāt pratiṣedham antareṇa ca anartha sādhana tva jñāna upāya abhāvāt 
ŚVK_8.14.2^2	 atas parihṛtya apavāda viṣayam utsargaḥ abhiniviśataḥ iti hiṃsā antarāṇi na hiṃsyāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ avalambate evam ca yadi api bāhya hiṃsāsu hiṃsā tva adharma tvayoḥ sāhityam avagatam tathā api na hiṃsā tvam adharma tva prayojakam kin tu niṣiddha tvam asati api hiṃsā tve niṣiddha tva mātreṇa surā pāna ādau adharma tva siddheḥ atas yaḥ eva asmin sati eva asya bhavitum śaktiḥ asti iti anena rūpeṇa nirūpyate vyāpya tayā avagamyate iti yāvat saḥ eva dharmaḥ prayojakaḥ iti ucyate para prayukta vyāpti upajīvinaḥ tu hiṃsā tva ādayaḥ na taiḥ adharma tva ādi vyāpaka aṃśaḥ avadhārayitum śakyate na hi bāhya hiṃsā hiṃsā iti eva adharmaḥ kin tu niṣiddhā iti atas na kvacid vihitānām daikṣa paśu ādi hiṃsānām adharma tvam iti 
ŚVK_8.15	 ye tu evaṃjātīyakān api aprayojakān hetūn prayuñjate te sulabhaiḥ pratihetu ādi doṣaiḥ ciram bhrāmyanti śakyate hi pratihetuḥ darśayitum daikṣa paśu hiṃsā dharmaḥ vihita tvāt agni hotra ādi vat iti prayojake hi hetau evaṃjātīyakāḥ doṣāḥ na āspadam labhante aprayojake tu sulabhāḥ eva tat etat āha ye tu iti visrabdham iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam yathā viśvāsaḥ bhavati tathā prayuñjate iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.16–8.17	 pratihetu ādi doṣaiḥ bhrāmyanti iti uktam tān eva doṣān upanyasyati teṣu iti pratihetuḥ tāvat asmābhiḥ uktaḥ eva āgama virodhaḥ api evaṃvādinām āpadyate eva āgama eka pramāṇa tvāt dharma adharmayoḥ kvacid iṣṭa vighātaḥ kvacid alaukika vivādaḥ iti āgama virodha udāharaṇam tāvat āha niṣiddha tvena iti idam ca anāgata avekṣaṇa nyāyena prāk eva asmābhiḥ vyākhyātam iti 
ŚVK_8.18	 iṣṭa virodha udāharaṇam āha hetu dvaya iti bādha kāraṇa doṣa adhīnam hi sarvatra mithyā buddhīnām mithyātvam na ca jñāna tvena utpattimat tvena vā prayujyate satya mithyā tva sādhāraṇa tvāt anayoḥ jñāna tvāt eva tat mithyā tvam sādhayataḥ bauddhasya iṣṭa vighāta kārī hetuḥ dharma dharmi svarūpa sva viśeṣayoḥ api pratikṣepāt sarva loka prasiddha pṛthivī ādi a palāpāt ca ālokika vivādaḥ api atra eva darśayitavyaḥ na hi sarva vijñānāni mithyā iti evaṃvidham vivādam laukikāḥ sahante sahasā eva hi evaṃvidha vivāda śrāviṇām udvegaḥ jāyate yathā acandraḥ śaśī ityādau atas ayam alaukikaḥ vivādaḥ tathā ca uktam sarva loka prasiddhyā ca pakṣa bādhaḥ atra te dhruvam iti 
ŚVK_8.19^1	 aparam api āgama virodhasya udāharaṇam darśayati traivarṇikā iti santi khalu svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evam vihitāni soma ādīni karmāṇi teṣu kiṃcaturṇām varṇānām adhikāraḥ uta apa śūdrāṇām trayāṇām iti saṃśaye caturṇām iti prāptam catvāraḥ api hi varṇāḥ svargam kāmayantaḥ iti svarga kāma padena abhidhīyante svarga kāmaḥ ca atra adhikāri tayā jñāyate iti prāpte uktam apaśūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ iti vidyā agni sādhyāḥ hi te kratavaḥ anagniḥ avidvān ca antimaḥ varṇaḥ katham asau vaitānike karmaṇi adhikriyate nanu śruti artha avagata adhikāra sāmarthyāt eva śūdrasya api agni vidyayoḥ ākṣepaḥ bhaviṣyati na avidhānāt traivarṇikasya eva aṣṭa varṣam brāhmaṇam upanayīta vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agrīnāt adhītaḥ iti evamādibhiḥ agni vidye vihite na ca aniyamena eva te śūdrasya api bhaviṣyate iti śakyate vaktum 
ŚVK_8.19^2	 kaḥ hi pratilabdha vidyā agni sambandhaḥ traivarṇikā adhikāra sampāditāsu kāmaśrutiṣu niyata kāla vayaḥ vastham upanayanam ādhānam vā jadhanya varṇasya upakalpayitum utsahate atas traivarṇika tva prayuktam eva yāga ādīnām svarga hetu tvam na manuṣya tva mātreṇa śūdra samavāyinā prayujyate tat yadi kaścid anumāna kuśalaḥ prayuṅkte śūdra kṛtaḥ yāgaḥ svarga hetuḥ manuṣya kṛta tvāt traivarṇikā carita yāga vat iti tasya āgama virodhaḥ nanu āgama virodhaḥ udāhṛtaḥ eva kim punar tad udāharaṇena ucyate pūrvam adharma tva anumānasya vaidika hiṃsā viṣayasya sākṣāt āgama virodhaḥ varṇitaḥ vyaktam eva daikṣa paśu hiṃsā vidhīyamāna tvāt artha sādhanam iti etat avagamyate katham asau adharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti codanā lakṣaṇasya arthasya dharma tvāt iha tu śūdra kṛtasya yāga ādeḥ svarga hetu tā na sākṣāt āgamena pratikṣipyate kin tu traivarṇikā adhikāra lābhāt arthāt itara nirāsaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ 
ŚVK_8.21^1	 aprayojaka udāharaṇa= chalena idānīm para upālambhana artham udāharaṇa antarāṇi darśayati kṛtā iti dvayena prayatna anantara jñāna sadṛśāḥ pratyaya anavasthāna ādayaḥ abhimatāḥ taiḥ śabda gocaraiḥ tasya vināśitā na prayujyate kṛtaka tva ādi prayuktāḥ hi asau na ca kṛtaka tvam eva prayatna anantara darśanena sādhayitum śakyam ākāśa ādibhiḥ vyabhicārāt yadi tarhi sāvayava tva prayuktā vināśitā kim idānīm naśvarāṇi bhuvanāni bhuvana sanniveśāḥ ca mahī mahīdhara udadhi prabhṛtayaḥ satyam sarvam eva sa avayavam vināśa dharmakam mahī mahīdhara ādayaḥ api samāsādita sva avayava saṃyoga vibhāga viśeṣāḥ bhāgaśas naśyanti eva 
ŚVK_8.21^2	 niranvayam tu vināśam na kasyacid abhyupagacchāmaḥ evam mahā bhūmeḥ api āvāpa udvāpa bhedāt nāśaḥ darśayitavyaḥ tathā yat api vaiśeṣikaiḥ jātimat tvāt aindriyaka tvāt ca śabda anitya tvam anumitam tat api ayuktam etat dhi jātimattva ādi vastu sanmātra nibandhanam eva nitya anitya sādhāraṇam na anena anitya tā sādhyate kim idam vastu sanmātra nibandhanam iti parama artha sannibandhanam iti uktam bhavati parama artha santaḥ eva ghaṭa ākāśa ātma ādayaḥ indriya viṣayāḥ jātimantaḥ ca na bhrānti saṃviditāḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādayaḥ iva iti 
ŚVK_8.22	 evam aprayojakasya asādhaka tvam uktam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti ayam arthaḥ yaḥ eva niṣiddha tva ādiḥ arthaḥ yasya adharma tva ādeḥ sādhana śakti yukta tvena avagataḥ asmin sati amunā bhavitavyam iti īdṛśyā śaktyā avadhāryate iti yāvat niyamya śaktiḥ eva hi sādhana śaktiḥ iti ākhyāyate niyata avagataḥ hi niyāmakam śaknoti gamayitum na anyaḥ iti sa niyamya eva gamakaḥ na prasaṅga anvitaḥ hiṃsā tu a ādhiḥ niṣiddha tvena anvetum abhipravṛttena adharma tvena prasaṅgāt dhi hiṃsā tvam api anvitam iti prasaṅga anvitam hiṃsā tvam na adharma tvasya gamakam bhavati iti 
ŚVK_8.23A	 evam tāvat sarva prakāraḥ anumāna aṅga bhūtaḥ sambandha padārthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ idānīm eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare buddhiḥ iti vyākhyeyam tatra ca etat eva tāvat vaktavyam svatantra eka deśa darśanāt tathāvidha eka deśa antare jñānam anumānam iti āpadyeta tat ca ayuktam smaraṇam hi tat katham anumānam bhavet atha eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antara viśiṣṭaḥ eka deśī a numānasya viṣayaḥ iṣyate tat na anupātta tvāt na hi atra eka deśī kenacid śabdena upāttaḥ atas tad anupādānāt nyūnam lakṣaṇam iti āśaṅkya āha upāttaḥ iti yadi api sva śabdena na eka deśī upāttaḥ tathā api eka deśa śabdābhyām eva arthāt ākṣipyate iti na nyūna tva doṣaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.23B	 artha ākṣepe kāraṇam āha apara arthaḥ iti na hi dhūma ādi svarūpa mātram apara arthībhūtam eka deśa pada āspadam bhavati na ca paraspara apekṣayā eka deśa vācaḥ yuktiḥ upapadyate na hi agnya eka deśaḥ dhūmaḥ iti kasyacid pratipattiḥ asti na ca agṛhīte agnau tad eka deśa tayā dhūmaḥ avagantum śakyate gṛhīte ca tasmin anumeya abhāvaḥ atas eka deśa tva anupapattya eva tad āśrayaḥ kaścid eka deśī avagamyate iti siddham iti 
ŚVK_8.24	 nanu ākṣipyatām eka deśa śabdābhyām eka deśī tat eka tvam tu kutas vagamyate atas kvacid eva dhūmam dṛṣṭvā kvacid eka deśī antare anumānam na syāt aika ādhikaraṇyam tu eka deśayoḥ na sidhyati anupādānāt iti atas āha saḥ eva iti pūrva prakṛtam eka deśavān iti vivakṣita eka saṅkhyam eka deśinam pratyavamṛśati saḥ eva iti sa khalu ekaḥ eva eka deśī gamya gamaka rūpaḥ ubhaya ātmaka tvāt tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇa ātmānau staḥ yat dvi rūpa tvam arhati nanu eka tvam na eka deśinaḥ anupāttam labhyate iti uktam na jñāta sambandhasya iti eka vacanena eva upādānāt eka deśini hi anya padārthe ekatvam ekavacanena upāttam pramātṛ pakṣe api prathama uccaritena eka deśa śabdena sva āśrayaḥ eka deśinī ākṣipte dvitīya apekṣā akṣaṇe api saḥ eva buddhau viparivartamānaḥ tad āśraya tvena avagamyate na anyaḥ tad parityāge kāraṇa abhāvāt tathā vyutpatti darśanāt ca yathā devadattasya ekatra kare kaṅkaṇam aṅgulīyakam kara antaraḥ iti na bhinnaḥ kara āśrayaḥ avagamyate api tarhi devadattaḥ ekaḥ eva atas siddham ekaḥ eva eka deśī gamya gamaka rūpaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.25–8.26	 ubhaya ātmā san gamya gamakaḥ iti uktam tau eva ubhaya ātmānau darśayati asiddhena iti yadi hi asau eka deśya siddhaḥ eva syāt siddhaḥ vā tadā na dvi rūpa tām labhate sa tu dhūma vat ādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣa siddhaḥ agni madādinā ca asiddhaḥ iti dvi ātmaka tvāt ubhaya upapattiḥ iti āha astu arthāt upāttaḥ eka deśī sa ca ekaḥ gamyaḥ gamakaḥ iti sa tu katham pramātṛbhiḥ upādātavyaḥ iti na ca tad upādāna prakāraḥ kaścid bhāṣya kāreṇa upāttaḥ atas punar api nyūna tvam iti atas āha āttaḥ iti tatra nāma viśeṣa upādānam āśrīyate yatra viśeṣa vivakṣā na tu iha viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sa hi eka deśī pramātṛ vivakṣā vaśena pṛthak abhinnaḥ vā eka deśa śabdābhyām upāttaḥ bhavatu ubhayathā anumāna vyavahāra darśanāt iti tam eva ubhayathā vyavahāram darśayati anityaḥ iti nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.27^1	 eka deśī gamyaḥ gamakaḥ bheda abhedābhyām upāttaḥ iti darśitam kiyati punar anumānasya vyāpāraḥ iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ bhavati hi viśiṣṭa artha pratītau api viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi pramāṇam yathā śabdaḥ sa khalu ākṛti viśiṣṭāyām vyaktau dhiyam ādadhāti atha ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām ākṛti mātra paryavasāyī iti niścīyate tat iha api yadi tadvat eva viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyi pramāṇam iṣyate tatas siddha sādhya tvam siddham hi sambandha jñāna kāle agni mātram kim tad anumānena yadi tu dvi khaṇḍa daṇḍī a ādi śabda vat viśiṣṭam eva anumānam gocarayati itīṣyate tatra sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt ananumeya tvam na hi agnimat viśeṣeṇa parvata ādinā anvitaḥ dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca samasta agnimat sa ādhāraṇaṃsāmānyam kiñcid samasti 
ŚVK_8.27^2	 tad bhāve api punar api siddha sādhya tā eva atas eva āhuḥ anumā bhaṅga paṅke asmin nimagnāḥ vādi dantinaḥ viśeṣe anugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhya tā iti atas āha eka deśa iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ daṇḍyādi śabda vat viśiṣṭa viṣayam eva anumānam na ca sambandha grahaṇa abhāvaḥ sakala upādhi parityāgena dhūma vat mātrasya agni mattayā sambandha avagamāt iti uktam asmābhiḥ asati api sāmānye kenacid ekena upādhinā anantānām api bhāvānām sambandhaḥ gṛhyate eva yadi api dhūmavān agnimān iti sāmānyatas avagatam tathā api ayam asau iti viśeṣa rūpeṇa pratyabhijñānāt pramāṇa viṣaya tvam api upapannam iti uktam eva iti kasmāt punar viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyī eva pramāṇam na iṣyate atas āha na hi iti 
ŚVK_8.28–8.30	 asambhavam eva darśayati na dharma iti dharma mātram hi sambandha grahaṇa kāle siddham iti bhavatā eva uktam iti evam eva dharmi mātra anumāne svatantra ubhaya anumāne vā siddha sādhya tā darśayitavyā iti āha tathā iti dharma dharmī u bhayeṣu eva anumeyeṣu yathāsaṅkhyam dūṣaṇa antarāṇi āha eka deśasya iti etat eva vivṛṇoti anitya tva ādayaḥ iti pakṣa eka deśaḥ hi liṅgam bahvati na ca anitya tva ākhyasya dharmasya svatantra pakṣīkṛtasya kṛtaka tvam dharmaḥ iti katham apakṣa dharmaḥ liṅgam bhaviṣyati evam dhvani mātre api svatantre pakṣīkṛte na kṛtaka tvasya tena anugamaḥ śakyaḥ darśayitum na hi yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra tatra dhvaniḥ iti niyamaḥ sambhavati tathā ubhayasya dhvanya nitya tva ātmakasya ubhayena pakṣa dharma tva anugama ātmakena na sambandha iti anāgatam sambandha śabdam pūrva aparābhyām sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā iti samadhigatam tāvat dharma dharmī u bhayeṣām vyasta samastānām na sādhya tvam iti 
ŚVK_8.31	 atha kasmāt dharma dharmi sambandhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ na bhavati iti atas āha sambandhaḥ iti mitau iti sādhana vākyam apadiśati na khalu parīkṣakaḥ sādhana vākye sambandha vācinā kenacid nāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandhaḥ upādīyate na hi evam prayujyate agni parvatayoḥ asti sambandhaḥ dhūmavat tvāt iti na api parvatasya agniḥ iti deśam eva tu agni ādinā viśiṣṭam anumimānāḥ dṛśyante yat evam prayuñjate agnimān parvataḥ iti sambandhaḥ api na anumīyate iti atītena sambandhaḥ iti na param pratijñāyām na upādīyate udāharaṇe api na tena anugamaḥ liṅgasya nirdiśyate na hi bhavati darśanam yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agni sambandhaḥ iti bhavati tu yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa saḥ gnimān iti deśaḥ eva nidarśanam tat etat āha na ca api iti iha iti mitim pratyavamṛśati etat uktam bhavati na sādhana vākye sambandhaḥ sādhyatayā upādīyate na api dṛṣṭānta tayā nirdiśyate na ca ayathāpratibhāsam parīkṣakāṇām vaktum ucitam iti 
ŚVK_8.32–33.1^1	 api ca ayam sambandhaḥ sādhyamānaḥ sat mātra tayā vā sādhyate kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ na tāvat vastu sattā mātram anumānasya viṣayaḥ na ca parvata ādi vat siddha sādhya rūpam ākāra dvayam sambandhaḥ vahati yena anumānasya viṣayaḥ bhavet tasmāt na kathañcid sambandhaḥ sādhyaḥ iti āha na ca iti nanu asati sambandhe viśiṣṭaḥ eva sādhayitum na śakyate na asti nāma sa prakāraḥ yat asambandhyamānaḥ eva agninā parvataḥ tad viśiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti atas āha tasmāt iti vyāntena 
ŚVK_8.32–33.1^2	 nanu satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭaḥ na bhavati na tu etāvatā sambandha sādhyatā sidhyati viśiṣṭa sādhya tvānyathā anupapattyā eva tu artha gṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhya tā na punar svatantrasya iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ hi daṇḍa ādi viśiṣṭam eva abhidadhānāḥ sambandham api arthāt upādadate na tu abhidadhati tadvat iha api parvataḥ agnimān iti sādhyamāne artha gṛhītaḥ agni sambandhaḥ na punar saḥ eva sādhyate yathā daṇḍya ādi śabdataḥ viśiṣṭa artha pratītau satyām sambandhaḥ na antarīyakaḥ bhavati evam atra api viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne nuniṣpādī bhavati iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.32–33.2^1	 idam tu cintanīyam katham daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ viśiṣṭa vacanāḥ iti matu arthīya pratyaya antāḥ hi te sa ca asya asmin na asti iti sambandhe smaryate atas sambandhaḥ eva atra pratyaya arthaḥ sa ca pradhānaḥ prakṛti pratyayau pratyaya artham saha brūtaḥ prādhānyena iti smṛteḥ idam hi bhedena eva ubhayoḥ abhidhāne prādhānya pratipādana artham vacanam pradhānam ca śabda arthaḥ atas sambandha vacanāḥ eva daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ iti yuktam api ca na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣyate buddhiḥ utpadyate iti viśiṣṭa abhidhitsāyām avaśyam bhāvi prathamataram viśeṣaṇa abhidhānam āpatati tatas eva viśiṣṭa avagāha siddheḥ na tad yāvat śabdasya abhidhāna śaktiḥ upakalpayituṃśakyate 
ŚVK_8.32–33.2^2	 atas eva ākṛti viśiṣṭa vyakti abhidhānam ākṛti adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate kiñ ca kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam tu atalbhyām iti smarati katham ca tābhyām tad hita vṛttau sambandhaḥ abhidhīyate yadi tad hita abhidheyaḥ na syāt abhidheya niṣkarṣe hi tayoḥ smaraṇam yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśaḥ tad abhidhāne tu atalau iti tat yadi daṇḍa puruṣa sambandhaḥ daṇḍi śabdasya abhidheyaḥ tathā sati tad niṣkarṣe daṇḍi tvam daṇḍitā iti tvataloḥ anuśāsanam upapadyate yathā go śabda abhidheyam sāmānyam go tvam iti tu apratyayena niṣkṛṣyate atas sambandhaḥ eva daṇḍya ādi śabdānām abhidheyaḥ iti sāmpratam katham ucyate na antarīyakaḥ sambandhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.32–33.3	 atra abhidhīyate na tāvat smṛti anusāreṇa sambandha vācya tvam adhyavasātum śakyate śabda anuśāsana mātram hi tat asya asti asmin iti na punar artha anuśāsanam api ca vṛtti vigrahayoḥ anyathā anyathā guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ dṛśyate yathā citraguḥ iti citrābhiḥ gobhiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ devadatta ādiḥ eva vṛttau pradhāna tayā avagamyate vigrahe tu citrāḥ gāvaḥ yasya iti gavām eva devadatta ādiḥ viśeṣaṇa tayā guṇa bhūtaḥ tāḥ ca pradhānam vede api rathantara sāmā somaḥ iti tat yadi api smṛti kāreṇa tat asya iti vigrahe sambandhaḥ pradhāna tayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭaḥ tathā api gomada ādi tad hita vṛttau tadvān eva pradhānam bhavati tathā pratīteḥ gomat śabdaḥ hi puruṣa pradhānaḥ bhāsate na sambandha pradhānaḥ pāṇineḥ api bhagavataḥ sambandha abhidhāna dvāreṇa viśiṣṭa vācya tā eva pratipādayitum abhimatā vṛttau vigṛhyamāṇāyām avarjanīyaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhī prayogaḥ tāvatā ca tad arthaḥ pradhāna tayā vācya tvena nirdiṣṭaḥ iti bhrāntiḥ upajāyate atas na tāvat smṛti anusāreṇa sambandhasya vācya tā 
ŚVK_8.32–33.4^1	 yat tu prathamataram viśeṣaṇam abhidheyam iti satyam na tu iha sambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇam daṇḍaḥ hi daṇḍinaḥ viśeṣaṇam na sambandhaḥ sa ca prakṛtyā prathamam abhihitaḥ eva atas eva na aneka abhidhāna śakti kalpanā doṣaḥ nirbhāga śabdeṣu hi gavā ādiṣu viśiṣṭa pratītau api viśeṣaṇa mātram abhidhīyate iti yuktam tatra hi ekasya eva ubhaya abhidhāna śakti kalpanā doṣaḥ bhavati daṇḍya ādi śabdāḥ tu bhāgavantaḥ teṣu bhinnābhyām prakṛti pratyayābhyāṃ bhinnau viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyau abhidhīyete iti kim anupapannam atas prakṛti abhihita prathamatara avagata daṇḍa viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ daṇḍi śabdena abhidhīyate nanu asati sambandhe daṇḍaḥ viśeṣṭum eva naram na śaknoti satyam na tu etāvatā sambandhaḥ vācyaḥ bhavati na hi pṛthivyām anavasthitāḥ gāvaḥ na tadvantam viśiṃṣanti iti pṛthivī api abhidhīyate iti yuktam abhidhātum 
ŚVK_8.32–33.4^2	 yatas eva tu asati sambandhe viśiṣṭa avagatiḥ anupapannāḥ atas eva sambandhaḥ api arthāt antar bhāvyate na tu abhidhīyate yat tu sambandha abhidhāne tu ataloḥ anuśāsanam asati sambandha vācya tve anupapannam iti tat ayuktam na hi abhidheya niṣkarṣe gomada ādiṣu bhāva pratyaya anuśāsanam api tarhi abhidheya niṣkarṣe hi yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt iti tu abhidheya niṣkarṣa artham eva smaraṇam itarathā tu anena eva gata artha tvāt kṛt taddhita samāseṣu iti avacanīyam āpadyeta atas prāk pratīte eka nimitta sambandhi viśiṣṭe aparasmin sambandhini abhihite artha gṛhītaḥ sambandhaḥ na abhidheya pakṣe nikṣipyate sarva yaugikānām api ca eṣā eva diś darśayitavyā āha ca sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdaiḥ dravyam eva abhidhīyate na hi sambandha vācya tvam sambhavati ati gauravāt iti atas anumeya antara asambhavāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhūtau dharma dharmiṇau eva anumāna samadhigamyau iti 
ŚVK_8.34–35	 upasaṃharati viśeṣaṇā iti gamyau iti antena sa ca ayam aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ kaiścid vikalpena āśritaḥ evam hi manyante sarvathā hi dharma mātre dharmiṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddha sādhyatā ādi doṣaḥ bhavati na viśiṣṭa pramāyām viśiṣṭa tā tu kadācid kasyacid yathā abhiprāyam bhavatu nāma na kiñcid duṣyati sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇaḥ eva parvata ādeḥ agni ādi dharmaḥ tad dharmeṇa eva dhūma ādinā avagantavyaḥ sa tu dharmaḥ viśeṣaṇa bhūtaḥ viśeṣya bhūta uvā avagantavyaḥ iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ ubhayathā api svatantra anumāna abhāvāt iti āha aṅga iti avadhāryate antena 
ŚVK_8.36	 atra dūṣaṇam āha atra iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇa kāraiḥ api yathālokam eva anugantavyāni na tu viparītam na hi agniḥ parvata viśiṣṭaḥ iti lokaḥ budhyate api tu parvataḥ agnimān iti tathā svayam anumānena pratipannam artham tena eva param pratipādayantaḥ laukikāḥ dharmiṇā viśiṣṭam eva hetum prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante yathā agni anumānaḥ eva dhūmavat tvāt agnimān iti tat ca idam agnau deśena viśiṣṭe numīyamāne na upapadyate viśeṣaṇa tayā hi parvata viśiṣṭaḥ agniḥ iti dharmiṇi upātte dhūmavat tvāt iti hetu dharmeṇa tasya sambandhaḥ na sphuṭam prakāśate dharma dharmi tayā avagatasya hetu tvam na ca guṇa bhāva upāttaḥ dharmī hetu dharma sambandham arhati guṇānām paraspara asambandhāt atas asmāt para artha hetu prayoga viśeṣāt eva laukikānām īdṛśī pratipattiḥ unnīyate yat svayam api dharma viśiṣṭam eva dharmiṇam budhyate na viparītam iti 
ŚVK_8.37^1	 yadi tarhi dharmiṇaḥ hetu dharmeṇa sambandhaḥ na sphuṭaḥ kena tarhi prasajyate iti atas āha pradhāna tvāt iti dhvani viśiṣṭam anitya tvam kṛtaka tvāt iti ucyamāne anitya tva ākhyena dharmeṇa eva sādhya tayā pradhāna bhūtena kṛtaka tva ādi hetuḥ sambadhyeta na dhvaninā guṇa bhūtena sarvasya hi eka vākya gatasya pradhāna anvayaḥ eva yuktaḥ pradhāna sambandhe ca hetoḥ apakṣa dharma tvam na hi kṛtaka tvam anitya tvasya dharmaḥ kim tarhi dhvaneḥ atas dharmī eva dharma viśiṣṭaḥ svayam pramātṛbhiḥ avagamyate tathā eva parasmai pratipādyate iti yuktam iti 
ŚVK_8.37^2	 yadi tu ucyate satyam pradhāna tayā dharmeṇa hetoḥ sambandhaḥ vākyāt avagamyate liṅga balīyaḥ tvena tu vākyam bādhitvā dharmiṇā eva sambandhaḥ kalpayiṣyate hetu dharmasya hi dharmiṇā eva sambandha yogya tā na dharmeṇa atas dharma sambandha abhāvāt dharmiṇā eva sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha tatra iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam evam dharmiṇā sambandhaḥ sidhyati kim tu ayam eva kleśaḥ yad vākya svarasa bhaṅgaḥ nāma atas eva āha kalpyaḥ asau iti anyathā pratipannasya anyathā kalpanā eva doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_8.38^1	 dhvaneḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti vā punar dharmi upādānena hetuḥ viśeṣaṇīyaḥ na ca evam prayoktāraḥ prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dhvaneḥ iti yaḥ tu vadati dharmiṇī api viśiṣṭe sādhye anvaya upadarśana velāyām yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam iti ukte dhvaniḥ eva pradhāna tayā sambadhyeta na anitya tvam guṇa bhūta tvāt iti tam pratyāha anvayasya iti anvaya upadarśana kāle hi bhedena eva dharmam upādadate yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra tatra anitya tvam iti na tatra pradhāna sambandha āśaṅkā atas pratijñā avasthāyām dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yaḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ āsīt na asau dṛṣṭānta vākye duṣyati hetuḥ tu aviśiṣṭaḥ eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyate iti uktam 
ŚVK_8.38^2	 tatra aviśeṣitaḥ eva prayukte bhavati pradhāna bhūta dharma sambandha āśaṅkā iti yaḥ tu vadati ṣaṣṭhī antena dhvaninā anitya tvam viśeṣyate dhvaneḥ anitya tvam iti evam ca kṛtaka tvāt iti asya avipariṇata vibhaktikena dhvaninā eva sambandhaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhavati dharma sambandhaḥ eva yathāvat vibhakti vipariṇāmena syāt sa ca anyāyyaḥ iti sa vaktavyaḥ nirākṛtaḥ ayam pakṣaḥ vārtika kṛtā eva sambandhaḥ api anupādānāt nāmnā ṣaṣṭhī api vā mita auiti ṣaṣṭhī nirdeśe hi sambandhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ bhavet tasya ca sādhya tā nirākṛtā eva viśiṣṭa sādhya pakṣaḥ eva sthitvā dharmi viśiṣṭa tā adharmasya idānīṃnirākriyate kim atra sambandha sādhya tvam punar upakṣipyate tat alam anena bāla bhāṣitena iti 
ŚVK_8.39–8.40–41	 api ca agneḥ deśa viśiṣṭa tve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇa samasta pakṣa prakārāṇām asambhavaḥ api iti āha agneḥ iti dūṣaṇa antara samuccaye cakāraḥ etat iti vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇa pratinirdeśaḥ iti tān eva pakṣa prakārān vaktum saṃkṣipya pratijānīte viśiṣṭa iti idānīm vibhajya tān eva darśayati yaḥ agniḥ iti iti antena nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ vivekaḥ tu pakṣāṇām praṇihitaiḥ avagamyate iti ihaca ādyayoḥ dvayoḥ pakṣayoḥ siddha sādhya tā doṣaḥ siddhaḥ hi kvacid agniḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ api pūrva deśa adhikaraṇaḥ siddhaḥ eva kim tat prasādhānena pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ iti āha iha tu iti siddha sādhya tā su prakāśa eva 
ŚVK_8.42–8.43	 virodham prapañcayati vyāptiḥ iti yat tāvat yaḥ agniḥ saḥ anena yuktaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam na hi anena deśena sarva agnayaḥ vyāpyante deśasya avaibhavāt sarva agnīnām ca atra asannidhānāt tad bhāvaḥ hi atra abhāvena virudhyate iti yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ anena saḥ athavā iti yat uktam tat dūṣayati na api pūrvasya iti dṛṣṭasya api agneḥ anena deśena vyāptiḥ na vidyate iti arthaḥ yaḥ ayam sa deśa mātreṇa iti atra dūṣaṇam āha na api iti deśaiḥ antena na hi eṣa puras sthitaḥ vahniḥ sarvaiḥ deśaiḥ viśeṣyate sarvatra tasya abhāvāt iti pūrveṇa vā api ayam iti atra virodham āha pūrveṇa iti pūrveṇa deśena asya agneḥ viśeṣyatā na asti eva pūrva deśa sya atra abhāvāt asya ca tatra pūrva anubhūtasya tu agneḥ deśa mātreṇa sambandhaḥ puras sthita vahneḥ sarva deśa sambandha nirākaraṇena eva tulya nyāyatayā nirākṛtaḥ iti na pṛthak upanyasya dūṣitaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.44–45	 evam saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣu aṣṭamaḥ pakṣaḥ avaśiṣyate etat deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā yaḥ ayam agniḥ iti tat nirākaroti etat iti ayam puras sthitaḥ agniḥ anena deśena viśiṣṭaḥ iti na etat sādhayitum śakyam na hi apratyakṣa deśaḥ vahniḥ ayam iti nirdeṣṭum śakyaḥ nitarām viśiṣṭa tayā sādhayitum yaḥ tu vadati smṛtaḥ eva vahniḥ anena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyate iti sa vaktavyaḥ sva deśa kāla vartti eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham asau anena deśena viśeṣṭum śakyaḥ tat evaṃvādinā na api pūrvasya iti api na ālocitam anavacchinna smṛtau api ca dharmaḥ dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam iti na idam yukti sādhyam dharmāṇām dharmi viśeṣaṇa tayā eva sarvadā avagateḥ iti alam anena iti deśaḥ eva tu pūrva avagataḥ viśeṣyatām arhati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha agneḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.46–47	 yadi ca agniḥ viśeṣyaḥ bhavet tatas tasya eva ayam ādyaḥ jñāna kālaḥ bhavet prasiddhasya aprasiddhena viśeṣaṇāt iha tu ādau parvataḥ eva jñāyate katham asau paścāt pratyeṣyamāṇasya agneḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavati iti āha tad jñāna iti tad vṛttena agnim nirdiśati agneḥ jñāna kāle hi saḥ eva deśaḥ buddhaḥ na agniḥ atas kasya deśaḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavati pramitam hi vastu apramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitam bhavati kīdṛś dharmaḥ ayam iti tathā ca deśaḥ iti saḥ eva pramitsyate pramīyate ca na punar agniḥ iti nanu deśaḥ api pratyakṣa avagataḥ eva iti katham asau anumānasya viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha deśasya iti sva rūpa mātram eva hi deśasya pratyakṣeṇa avagatam anumānena tu pāvaka ādi viśiṣṭa tā tasya anumīyate iti na gṛhīta grāhi tvam iti atas dharmī eva dharma viśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ na dharmaḥ dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti 
ŚVK_8.48	 evam ca deśaḥ eva agni viśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ avatiṣṭhate sa hi dharmī tad āśraya tvāt agneḥ na tu agniḥ atad āśraya tvāt deśasya iti āha sā deśasya iti anye tu pūrva avagata dhūmam api agni viśiṣṭam anumānasya prameyam manyante tat api sādhu eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitā iti sā prameya tā iti sambandhaḥ atra codayati nanu iti viśiṣṭaḥ anumānasya viṣayaḥ iti uktam na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇa nyāyena liṅgam api śabda vat viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasāyī eva yuktam śabdaḥ hi viśeṣaṇa mātraḥ eva vartate iti ākṛti adhikaraṇe vakṣyate iti 
ŚVK_8.49–8.50	 pariharati na evam iti kāraṇam āha na hi iti aneka śakti kalpanā bhayena hi śabdasya viśeṣaṇa mātra paryavasānam iṣṭam liṅgam tu pūrva avagata pratibandha balena pratibandhaka dhiyam upakalpayati tat yāvatā eva pratibaddham avagatam tāvatī eva pratibandhake dhiyam ādadhāti sarva upādhi parityāgena agni mat mātreṇa dhūmavat tvam pratibaddham avagatam iti agnimat tvam eva anumāpayati iti na kaścid doṣaḥ iti na ca viśeṣaṇa mātram anumeyam siddha sādhya tvāt iti uktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha na ca iti viśeṣyaḥ api parvata ādi svarūpeṇa avadhāritaḥ saḥ api na anumeyaḥ iti āha viśeṣyaḥ iti atas viśiṣṭa tvena eva rūpeṇa ajñānāt tasya eva anumeya tvam iti āha viśiṣṭa tvena iti atra codayati nanu iti dhūmaḥ api agni viśiṣṭaḥ anumīyate iti uktam tat ayuktam pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt iti 
ŚVK_8.51^1	 pariharati na etat iti sāmānya viśeṣya ātmā hi dhūmaḥ tatra viśeṣa ātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānya ātmanā hetu tvam iti na pakṣa eka deśa tā iti samadhigatam tāvat anumānasya viśiṣṭaḥ viṣayaḥ iti svarūpam eva kim asya iti na jñāyate tat yadi dhūma tad jñāna ādīnām anumāna tvam iṣyate tatas pramāṇa phalayoḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ sa ca ayuktaḥ atas eva bhikṣuṇā ekam eva jñānam pramāṇa phala rūpam iti pratyakṣam uktvā tat eva anumāne api atidiṣṭam pūrvavat phalam asya iti yadi tu anumeya jñānam eva pramāṇam iṣyate tatas api atirikta phala abhāvaḥ atas vaktavyam anumānasya svarūpam iti atas āha dhūma tajjñāna iti yat tāvat bhikṣuṇā pramāṇa phalam eva phalam iti eka viṣaya tva lābhāt āśritam tat pratyakṣa vat iha api pratiṣeddhavyam na hi sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhedam laukikāḥ manyante kaḥ hi vṛkṣa= chidayā sārdham paraśoḥ ekatvam ātiṣṭhate 
ŚVK_8.51^2	 viṣaya bheda parihāraḥ tu pratyakṣa uktaḥ eva iha api anusandhātavyaḥ yathā hi indriyā ādi pramāṇa pakṣe yatra phalam niṣpadyate tad viṣaya vyāpārāt samāna viṣaya tvam upapāditam evam iha api dhūma ādi pramāṇa pakṣe tad vyāpārāt eva purā uditam viṣaya eka tvam atideṣṭavyam atas dhūmaḥ tat jñānam vā sambandhaḥ tad smaraṇam vā pramāṇam astu vivakṣā adhīna tvāt pramāṇa phala bhāvasya iti yat tu buddheḥ pramāṇa phala tve phala abhāvaḥ iti uktam bhāṣya kāraḥ hi buddhiḥ eva pramāṇam iti darśayati yat kāraṇam asat nikṛṣṭe arthe buddhiḥ iti vadati na ca phala abhāvaḥ hāna ādeḥ eva phala tvāt na ca sajātīyam eva phalam iti rājā ājñā upayogāt dhi sajātīyam asajātīyam vā phalam bhavati eva astu vā sajātīyam eva phalam hāna ādi buddhiḥ phalam bhaviṣyati upakāra ādi smṛtiḥ vā iti abhiprāyeṇa āha prameya dhīḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.52	 yadi bhāṣya kāraḥ prameya dhiyaḥ prāmāṇyam manyate katham tarhi dhūma ādi pramāṇa tva abhyupagamaḥ atas āha pratyakṣā iti uktam asmābhiḥ vivakṣā adhīnam pramāṇa tvam iti tat yadā dhūma ādīnām eva prakṛṣṭa sādhana tvam avagamyate tadā tat eva pramāṇam bhāṣya kāreṇa api buddhiḥ vā janma vā ityādinā pratyakṣa aniyamam darśayatā sarvatra eva aniyamaḥ tulyayā darśitaḥ eva atas na dhūma ādi prāmāṇya abhyupagame bhāṣya virodhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.53–54.1^1	 tat ca idam anumānam dvedhā bauddhāḥ vibhajante sva artham para artham ca iti yat āhuḥ anumānam dvidhā sva artham tri rūpāt liṅgataḥ artha dṛś para artham anumānam tu sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśakam iti tat idam dvaividhyam anupapannam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha anumāna iti asya arthaḥ guru śiṣya sahā dhyāyi virodhi prativādibhyaḥ parebhyaḥ anumāna gṛhītasya arthasya tena eva anumānena pratipādanam vāñchatā yathā pūrvam asmābhiḥ pratipāditaḥ pakṣaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pramīyate iti sa vaktavyaḥ idam atra ākūtam svayam anumānena gṛhītam artham param pratipādayitum sādhana vākyam eva prayujyate paraḥ tu tatas vākyāt trirūpam liṅgam anusandhāya svayam eva sādhyam vastu budhyate tat asya sva artham eva anumānam vaktuḥ api svayam artham pratipannavataḥ sva artha anumānam eva katarat atra para artha anumānam iti na vidmaḥ vacanam para artham iti ced na ananumāna tvāt vacanam para artham iti tu mṛṣyāmahe yat vadati darśanasya parārtha tvāt iti na tu tad anumānam atri rūpa liṅga janita tvāt anartha dṛś ca 
ŚVK_8.53–54.1^2	 tri rūpāt liṅgataḥ artha dṛś anumānam iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ atas katham vacanam anumānam atha anumāna gocarīkṛta artha pratipādana samartha vacana pārārthyāt anumānam para artham iti upacaryate tatas pratyakṣa pratipannam api artham bodhayat vacaḥ para artham iti pratyakṣam api para artham āpadyeta yadi tu sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt pratyakṣasya tasya ca aśabda gocara tvāt na pratyakṣam para artham iti ucyate tat ayuktam evam hi pratyakṣa gṛhīta artha viparīta abhidhāyinām tad virodha udbhāvana vacanam na yujyate yaḥ hi pratyakṣa viruddham artham pratijānīte na agniḥ uṣṇaḥ iti sa vacanena tam pratyakṣa viṣayam artham pratipādya nirākriyate pratyakṣa viṣaye tu śabda agocare tat na upapadyeta atas pratyakṣa viṣayam api śabdaḥ vadati iti abhyupagantavyam evam ca pratyakṣa viṣaya vacana para artha tayā kaḥ pratyakṣa para artha tām vārayati iti dvaividhya anupapattiḥ atas yathā uditaḥ pakṣaḥ eva vācyaḥ iti uktavān 
ŚVK_8.53–54.2^1	 idam tu vaktavyam kaḥ ayam pakṣaḥ nāma tat ucyate pratijñā arthaḥ pakṣaḥ kā pratijñā sādhya samarpakam vacanam yat āhuḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti atas sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti ācakṣmahe iti vācyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti uktam tat vacanam idānīm upanyasyati tatra iti tatra pakṣe dharmiṇam prathamam uddiśya sādhya dharmaḥ agni ādiḥ vidhīyate yaḥ ayam parvataḥ saḥ agnimān iti uktam bhavati idam tu pakṣa vacanam pratijñā para nāmānam eke na anumanyante vadanti ca kim anena anarthakena antareṇa api pakṣa vacanam apekṣitam sidhyati eva hetuḥ hi sādhya sādhakaḥ 
ŚVK_8.53–54.2^2	 na pakṣasya vacanam na hi ayam āgamikaḥ arthaḥ hetu vacana anarthakya prasaṅgāt āpta anusāreṇa pakṣa vacanāt artha niścaye hetu abhidhānam anarthakam syāt vaktṛ guṇa doṣa avadhāraṇa pravaṇaḥ eva prativādī bhavet hetu adhīne tu nirṇaye tad śaktiḥ eva nirūpayitum ucitā kim pratijñā vacanena hetoḥ ca sāmarthyam sādhya anvaya pradarśanena eva siddham atas yat kṛtakam tat anityam śabdaḥ ca kṛtakaḥ iti udāharaṇa upanaya mātrāt eva sādhya siddheḥ anarthikā pratijñā hetoḥ eva tu trairūpyam darśayitavyam tat ca dṛṣṭānta dvayena upanayena ca kathyate iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa 
ŚVK_8.53–54.3^1	 yadi tu vivādam āvedayitum pratijñā vacanam iti ucyate tat na avyāpaka tvāt yaḥ hi manyate yadā khalu ayam śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti pratijānīte tadā itaraḥ anitya vādī vyutthitaḥ bhavati tatas jalpaḥ pravartate iti tat ca na evam avyāpaka tvāt na idam pratijñā vacanasya vyāpakam prayojanam vāde asambhavāt śiṣya viṣayaḥ hi saḥ sa ca tattvam eva bodhayitavyaḥ atas hetu śaktim eva pratipādya tattvam bodhyate iti yuktam kim vivādaḥ ādriyate na hi tena saha vivaditavyam jalpe syāt iti ced na anyathā siddheḥ tatra etat syāt jalpe khalu vivādam ājihīrṣuḥ pratijñām praṇayati iti tat ca na evam 
ŚVK_8.53–54.3^2	 anyathā siddheḥ asati api hi pakṣa vacane lakṣyate eva yathā dhvanim anityam anuminoti iti yat kāraṇam yat kṛtakam tat anityam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti uktvā kṛtaka tvam dhvaneḥ upanayati śabdaḥ ca kṛtakaḥ iti tatas jalpaḥ pravartiṣyate eva vitaṇḍā tu yathā tathā vāde darśite pravartate eva na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcid para nigrahāt anyat sādhyam asti yat asau pratijñā vacanena kvacid arthe sādhyamāne sva viparīta siddhim manvānaḥ jāta udvegaḥ vivadet atas pratijñā vacanam kathā traye api anupayujyamānam upekṣaṇīyam iti ākṣipanti 
ŚVK_8.53–54.4^1	 atra abhidhīyate sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśanam para artham anumānam iti bhavadbhiḥ eva uktam svayam ca kutaścid dhetu viśeṣāt kiñcid kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭam avagatam iti parasmai api tathā eva kathyate iti yuktam asatyām tu pratijñāyām anāśraya hetu ādayaḥ ākāśa patitāḥ iva bhaveyuḥ nanu na ayam pakṣa vacana purassaram ajñāsīt sādhyam iti katham parasmai tathā kathayati mā evam yadi api śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti sva pratipattau na uccāritam tathā api sa vikalpaka tvāt asyāḥ buddheḥ asti eva atra pramātuḥ viśiṣṭaḥ vikalpaḥ uccāraṇam tu para artham iti tanmātram sva pratipattau na āsīt 
ŚVK_8.53–54.4^2	 paraḥ tu na anuccāritena śabdena pratipādayitum śakyate iti uccārya pratipādyate iti śabda uccāraṇa mātram adhikam yat tu vāde anupayogaḥ iti uktam tat na sutarām upayogāt jalpa vitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayoḥ dvayoḥ pravartate iti param bhrāmayitum pratijñā vacanam na prayujyeta avivāde tu śiṣyaḥ na vyāmohanīyaḥ iti viśadataram eva pratijñā vacanena sādhyate iti yuktam na hi na śabda dāridryam yat enam tattvam bubhutsamānam upasannam aviśat a vacanena parikleśayāma na ca eva jalpe anupayogaḥ iti uktam idam asati hi pratijñā vacane anāśrayāḥ hetu ādayaḥ na pravarteran iti 
ŚVK_8.53–54.4^3	 guṇa bhūtāḥ hi te pradhāna bhūta sādhya apekṣāyām sambadhyante tat ca na asati sādhya nirdeśaḥ upapadyate nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kutas iti apekṣāyām hetuḥ sambadhyate tatas katham ayam avyāptaḥ asya sādhakaḥ iti apekṣite vyāpti vacanam itarathā tu aikārthya abhāvāt eka vākya tā eva na saṃvarteta tathā hi yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti ukte kṛtaka tvam anitya tayā sambaddham iti anūditam punar ca śabdaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti śabdasya kṛtaka tayā sambandhaḥ anūditaḥ paraspara sambandhe tu na pramāṇam 
ŚVK_8.53–54.4^4	 asambaddham idam vākya dvayam iti āśaṅkyeta kṛtakam tāvat anityam śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti svarūpa anuvāda mātram ubhayoḥ iti śaṅkā jāyeta artha antaram vā āpadyeta yathā ca anitya tva dharmā kṛtakaḥ tathā śabda ātmakaḥ api iti tat atra sarve kṛtakāḥ śabda ātmānaḥ iti sādhu sampāditam āpadyeta atas pradhāna vākya avayava pratijñā yat apahnūyate tat nāstikānām eva sarvāpalāpa vādinām śobhate na itareṣām sā hi sarva vyavahārāṇām sāraḥ yat āhuḥ sāram tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā tad hānau hīyate vādī taran tām uttaraḥ bhavet iti su uktaḥ vādi vacana prakāraḥ dharmiṇam uddiśya sādhya dharmaḥ vidhīyate iti 
ŚVK_8.55–56^1	 nanu evam sādhya viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevala sādhya anvaya avagamāt dharma antara vyudāsaḥ bhavet tatas ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ukte anityaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇāt ambara guṇa tva ādayaḥ api tad dharmā na bhaveyuḥ evam ca hetoḥ api pratikṣepāt sādhya siddhiḥ api durlabhā eva asati avadhāraṇe nityaḥ api syāt iti na iṣṭa siddhaḥ atha katham ekaḥ nityaḥ anityaḥ ca iti arthāt pratipakṣa pratikṣepaḥ satyam atas eva tad nivṛtti artham avadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itara nivṛttiḥ api bhavet atas āha niyamaḥ iti sādhya dharma vivakṣā apekṣayā eva niyamaḥ kalpyate na punara virodhinaḥ api dharma antarāt atas agnimān iti sādhyamāne agni abhāva mātram eva nirākṛtam bhavati na punar dharma antaram yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti ukte tad virodhinaḥ tad abhāvasya eva nivṛttiḥ bhavati na avirodhinām sūkṣma tva ādi dharmāṇām iti atra ca āsat nikṛṣṭe arthaḥ iti ucyate tasya kaḥ arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.55–56^2	 yadi anavagata pūrvam eva artham anumānam gocarayati iti tat na sambandha jñāna kāle eva hi yāvat dhūma ādi bhāvitayā agni ādi sambandhaḥ avagataḥ eva anyathā niyamaḥ eva avadhāritaḥ na syāt na ca atra deśa kāla sambandhaḥ adhikaḥ iti vaktavyam dhūmasya hi deśa ādi sambandhaḥ bhāsate na agneḥ dhūma upalakṣita aśeṣa deśa sambandhasya sambandha samadhigamaḥ eva avasāyāt atas eva kaiścid smaraṇa abhimāna nirāsa artham asannikṛṣṭa padam vyākhyātam smaraṇam hi sannikṛṣṭa avamarśa ullikhitam eva prāyaśas bhavati saḥ iti hi tat pravartate na ca evam anumānam atas na idam smaraṇam nanu asati api tad ullekhe smaraṇam utpadyate eva yathā pramoṣe mā evam grahaṇa kāraṇa ābhāṣāt dhi tatra anubhava ākāra pravṛttam api jñānam smṛtiḥ iti āsthitam na hi asat nihita rajata ādi avabhāsa kāraṇa tvam indriyāṇām prāpya kāriṇām sambhavati 
ŚVK_8.55–56^3	 smṛti hetuḥ tu prācīna anubhava prabhāvitā bhāvanā samasti iti smṛtiḥ eva pramuṣita tad avamarśā sā iti āśritam idam tu pratyutpanna liṅga ādi kāraṇa balāt utpadyamānam laiṅgika jñānam anubhava ākāra pravṛttam na tad bhāvāt uttārayitum śakyam anubhūtiḥ ca naḥ pramāṇam atas pramāṇam anumānam iti ākhyāyate yadi evam astu tarhi idam eva āsannikṛṣṭa padasya prayojanam na phala abhāvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt adhika pariccheda phalam pramāṇam bhavati pariccheda mātrasya tu phalatve smṛtau api prasaṅgaḥ sā api hi sva gocara pariccheda ātmikā eva jāyate syāt matam anapekṣam hi naḥ pramāṇam apekṣate ca smaraṇam grahaṇam atas na pramāṇam iti tat na laiṅgike prasaṅgāt tat api hi eka deśa darśana ādi sāpekṣam eva sva viṣaya grahaṇa apekṣam smaraṇam na idam iti ced na iha api tad apekṣaṇāt laiṅgikam api hi prācīna agni jñāna sāpekṣam eva 
ŚVK_8.55–56^4	 na hi anavagata agneḥ avidita sambandhasya agniḥ atra iti matiḥ āvis asti na ca grahaṇam pramāṇam eva iti rājā ājñā bhrāntau api prasaṅgāt viparīta avagrahaḥ api grahaṇam eva na ca pramāṇam na ca asau na asti iti yathā artha ayatha artha jñāna vibhāgam vyācakṣāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ uktam eva api ca arthe anupalabdhaḥ iti sūtrayatā sūtrakāreṇa sarvam anupalabdha artha viṣayam eva pramāṇam iti sūtritam etat api tad vyākhyāna avasare varṇitam eva atas vyākhyeyam asannikṛṣṭa artha grahaṇam atas āha asannikṛṣṭā iti asya arthaḥ dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭam bhavati tad rūpa pramitam viparīta nirūpitam vā tat ubhaya jihāsayā iyam asannikṛṣṭa vāc iti kim punar tad nirākaraṇam atas āha pramitasya iti vyavahāra artham hi apramita paricchedāya pramāṇam apekṣyate na vyasanena sa ca sakṛt pramāṇa vyāpārāt eva siddhaḥ iti na pramāṇa antara apekṣā iti 
ŚVK_8.57^1	 kim punar pramitasya pramāṇa antara apekṣā na jāyeta atas āha tādrūpyeṇa iti varṇitam idam dvedhā hi pramitam bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyena iti tatra tāvat tādrūpya paricchede na param pramāṇam phalavat pūrva paricchedāt eva tad artha siddheḥ vaiparītya paricchede tu pramāṇa antaram anavakāśam eva iti tad ubhaya nirākaraṇa artham asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇam arthavat nanu evam apramāṇam eva anumānam sannikṛṣṭa viṣaya tvāt iti uktam eva na adhikāra viṣaya tvāt yadi api pūrva avagataḥ dharmaḥ smṛti viṣayaḥ 
ŚVK_8.57^2	 dharmī ca giriḥ anubhava siddhaḥ tathā api viśiṣṭam anumānena viṣayīkriyate iti varṇitam asakṛt nanu agni viśiṣṭaḥ api sambandha samayaḥ eva saṃviditaḥ evam hi anena vyāpti grahaṇa kāle avagatam dhūma vat mātram agnimat iti tat asya dhūma vat mātraḥ eva apekṣā vidite tu tasmin agni mattā pramita pūrvā eva anubhūyate satyam kin tu dhūmavān agni mat tayā pramita pūrvaḥ api samprati anumānena pratyabhijñāyate pratyabhijñānam ca idam pramāṇam eva pratyakṣa pratyabhijñāna vat pūrvam hi dhūmavat tva upalakṣitena rūpeṇa agni mattayā deśaḥ nirjñātaḥ 
ŚVK_8.57^3	 samprati ayam asau agnimān iti viśeṣataḥ anumānena pratyabhijñāyate iti kim anupapannam avaśyam ca evam abhyupagantavyam anyathā katham agnimān iti viditvā vyavahārāya ghaṭate eṣa hi paktu kāmaḥ agni mat tām anumāya agnaye dhāvati iti paśyāmaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ na yadi pūrva anubhavāt adya viśeṣaḥ avāgamat khalu ayam dhūmavān agnimān iti na ca agnaye dhāvati iti katham anāśraya pratipanne agnau vyavaharati iti ced na prāk api dhūma vat āśraya tvena avagamāt parvatam adhunā pratyakṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ avagamya agnaye vyavaharati iti ced 
ŚVK_8.57^4	 kim asya agni arthinaḥ parvata pratyakṣeṇa tat ayam agni mat tayā bodhaḥ eva pūrva bodhāt vilakṣaṇaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ yat kṛtaḥ vyavahāra viśeṣaḥ iti agṛhīta viṣaya tvāt anumānam pramāṇam iti vaktavyam tat idam asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇena uktam ye tu smṛtyā śaṅkā nirākaraṇam asya prayojanam āhuḥ teṣām bādhita viṣayam api anumānam āpadyeta na hi tad nirākaraṇam avayava antareṇa lakṣaṇa granthe kṛtam upalabhyate atas asannikṛṣṭa grahaṇam eva ubhayavidha sannikṛṣṭa artha nirākaraṇa artham iti sādhvī vyākhyā iti 
ŚVK_8.58–59^1	 vaiparītya paricchinne param anavakāśam iti uktam tatra kāraṇam āha mūlaḥ iti vyāpti smaraṇa ādi hi anumānasya mūlam tat yāvat uttaram tad tad vyāpāra vyagra tayā vilambate tāvat śīghra bhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣaya apahārāt viprakṛṣṭa sādhanasya utpattiḥ eva nirudhyate iti anantaram eva vakṣyate iti katham punar anumānam bādhyate tat api hi pramāṇam katham pramāṇa antareṇa bādhitum śakyate bādhe vā na kvacid āśvāsaḥ bhavet ābhāsaḥ bādhyate iti ced katham ābhāsa tvam yadi bādhāt eva itara āśrayam tarhi astu vā jyeṣṭha pramāṇena pratyakṣeṇa anumāna bādhaḥ na tu tatas api jaghanyaiḥ aparaiḥ bādhyate tat kasya hetoḥ atas āha pratyakṣa ādeḥ iti syāt antena ayam abhiprāyaḥ na pramāṇam nāma kvacid bādhyate avadhāraṇa ātmakam hi eva etat iti jñānam pramāṇam tat yatra kasyacid arthasya kenacid ātmanā avadhāraṇam bhavati tatra tena utpannasya utpatsyamānasya vā jñānasya bādhaḥ abhidhīyeta tat dvividhaḥ hi bādhaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ ca aprāpta bādhaḥ ca iti prāpta bādhaḥ hi yathā śuktikā rajata jñāne 
ŚVK_8.58–59^2	 tatra hi pūrva upamardanena eva uttaram ātmānam labhate iti tat tasya bādhakam uttaram ca deśa ādi bhede api abādhitam svabhāvataḥ ca pramāṇam pūrvam ābhāsīkaroti tat evam prāpta bādhe tāvat yena uttareṇa arthaḥ avadhāritaḥ trividham api aprāmāṇyam avadhārita padena vyudasyati na hi ajñātaḥ sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ vā arthaḥ avadhāritaḥ bhavati iti trividham api aprāmāṇyam yasya na asti iti uktam bhavati tat evam ātmanā jñānena pūrvam ābhāsīkṛtam iti tatra ābhāsaḥ eva bādhyate iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ aprāpta bādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭa sādhanam anumānam sva gocare sāmānya śāstram vā kvacid viśeṣa viṣaye pravartitum ārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā siddha sarva aṅgakena āgamena vā viśeṣa viṣayeṇa śīghra janmanā yena eva arthaḥ a vadhāritaḥ bhavati tena eva uttarasya utpatti pratibandha lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ bhavati na hi balavatā śīghra bhāvinā pramāṇena niruddha mukham utpattum arhati tat evam aprāpta bādhe param anutpannam eva prāpti sambhā vanayā tu bādhyate iti ucyate śruti eva liṅgam iti na kvacid pramāṇa bādhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.58–59^3	 yat tu jaghanyena mukhya bādhaḥ na yuktaḥ iti tat na na hi pratyakṣa ādīnām viniyoga pramāṇānām iva pāra daurbalya niyamaḥ yat eva tu śīghra bhāvi pūrva upamardena vā ātmānam labhate tat eva bādhakam abhidadhmahe itarat ca bādhyam atas eva tena eva tasya bādham brūmaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ iva pratyakṣasya tena eva anumānena ca siddhāṅgakena sādhya aṅgakasya viśeṣa śāstreṇa sāmānya śāstrasya atas sarva pramāṇa aviruddham eva pakṣam abhidhāsyāmaḥ na ca anāśvāsaḥ ābhāsa bādhāt svatas pramāṇena ca avadhāraṇa ātmanā jñānena itara ābhāsīkaraṇāt tat idam avadhārita padena uktam iti nanu ca balavatā api na avaśyam durbalam bādhyate asati hi sambhave bādhaḥ sambhavati atas viṣaya vyavasthāyāḥ vikalpena samuccayena vā ubhayam upapādayiṣyate vinā āti antika bādha āśrayaṇena atas āha vikalpa ādeḥ iti na atra uktāḥ vikalpa ādayaḥ sambhavanti na tāvat paraspara viruddham rūpa dvayam ekatra samuccīyate na hi śrāvaṇaḥ aśrāvaṇaḥ ca nityaḥ anityaḥ ca iti sambhavati na ca vikalpaḥ vidhi niṣedha viṣaya tvāt tasya siddhe vastuni asambhavāt
