ŚVK_8.58–59^4	 na ca viṣaya vyavasthā varṇa ātmanām eva nitya anitya tva sādhanāt atas asambhavāt eva bādham abhidadhmahe iti evam upapāditaḥ bādhaḥ udāharaṇaiḥ darśayitavyaḥ tatra pratyakṣa bādham eva tāvat darśayati agrāhyata iti imam tu pratyakṣa bādham na budhyāmahe sva gocara viparīta artham hi pramāṇaṃpratyakṣeṇa bādhyate iti yuktam na ca grāhyatā pratyakṣa viṣayāḥ grāhya grahaṇa sambandha viṣaya tvāt talaḥ tasya ca pratyakṣa agocara tvāt śabdaḥ hi pratyakṣaḥ na grāhyatā atas eva hi aśrāvaṇa tā pakṣaḥ api na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate iti vakṣyate atra ucyate satyam na indriya viṣayaḥ grāhyatā grāhyaḥ tu tad viṣayaḥ tat iha grāhyā palāpasya eva pratyakṣa virodhaḥ darśitaḥ nirālambana anumānasya iti yāvat pratyayaḥ tu agrāhya padāt upapannaḥ tasya eva abhāvam abhidhatte kaḥ ca grāhyasya bhāvaḥ anyat atas bhāvāt iyam hi śaśa viṣāṇasya agrāhyatā yat na bhavati tad abhāvāt eva tatra agrāhyata abhidhāna pratyayau tat anena prakāreṇa śabda abhāva pakṣasya eva pratyakṣa virodhaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti 
ŚVK_8.60A	 anumāna virodha udāharaṇam āha teṣām iti teṣām eva śabda ādīnām aśrāvaṇa tva ādi anumāna viruddham yaḥ hi aśrāvaṇam anityam vā śabdam pakṣam icchati tasya asau śīghra bhāvinā viparyaya anumānena bādhyate iti idam tu pratyakṣa virodham anye manyante tān nirākaroti na hi iti śabdaḥ hi pratyakṣaḥ na tad śrāvaṇa tā grāhya grāhaka sambandhaḥ hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tu atalbhyām ucyate kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam tu atalbhyām iti smṛteḥ sa ca na pratyakṣeṇa samadhigamyaḥ api ca atīndriyam śrotram katham tad sambandhaḥ śabdasya pratyakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati na hi aindriyānaindriya ādhāraḥ sambandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavati vāyu vanaspatyoḥ iva atas na ayam pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.60B^1	 kiṃpramāṇikā tarhi śrāvaṇa tā atas āha sā iti abadhiḥ ādiṣu śabda upalabdheḥ badhira ādiṣu ca anupalabdheḥ anvaya vyatirekau dṛśyete tathā hi śrotra upaghāta mātreṇa cakṣuḥ ādimataḥ badhirasya śabda buddhiḥ na dṛśyate śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣuḥ ādiṣu asambhave api śabda grahaṇam dṛṣṭam atas ābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām idam śrāvaṇa tvam gamyate iti nanu evam katham anumāna virodhaḥ na hi anvaya vyatirekau anumānam tad prabhavaḥ tu mānasaḥ śrāvaṇa tva vikalpaḥ atas mānasa pratyakṣaḥ eva ayam iti kaścid bhrāmyati sa vaktavyaḥ 
ŚVK_8.60B^2	 na bahis viṣaya bodhe manaḥ svatantram iti varṇitam asakṛt yat yadīyanvaya vyatirekau anuvidhatte tat tad kāraṇakam iti sarva kāryeṣu samadhigatam anuvidhatte ca śabda jñānam śravaṇam iti tat tad kāraṇakam iti idam eva ca śabdasya śrāvaṇa tvam yat tu jñānasya śravaṇa janya tvam atas anumānam eva idam nanu anyatra api anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ katham tat kāraṇaka tvam avagantavyam yat na mānasam pratyakṣam āśrīyate śrūyatām paśyāmaḥ hi vayam kumbhakāra vyāpāra anantaram kumbha sambhavam udīkṣamāṇāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvam cakṣuṣā eva 
ŚVK_8.60B^3	 idam hi kumbhasya tad kārya tvam yā tad anantara sambhūtiḥ sa ca kumbhaḥ tad sambhavaḥ ca ubhayam cākṣuṣam eva iti kim atra manasā atas yat yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tat tad kāraṇakam iti pratyakṣatas vidita vyāpteḥ anumānam upapannam eva evam ca prayogaḥ śravaṇa pramāṇa prakāśyaḥ śabdaḥ tasmin sati eva upalabhyamāna tvāt yat evam tat tat prakāśyam santamasaḥ iva ghaṭaḥ pradīpa prakāśya iti idam ca pratyakṣa pūrvaka arthāpatti pūrvakam anumānam tayā śrāvaṇa tva siddheḥ idam ca siddha sarva aṃga tvāt aśrāvaṇa tva anumānāt balavat 
ŚVK_8.60B^4	 yāvat dhi guṇa tvasya aśrāvaṇa tvena vyāptiḥ grahītum iṣyate tāvat śīghra janmanā śrāvaṇa tva anumānena vyāpti saṃvidam pratibandha tā tasya utpattiḥ eva nirudhyate evam eva anitya tva anumānam api yat kṛtaka tva ādi hetukam tat api asiddhi vyabhicāra ādi doṣāt na śīghram upajāyate iti siddha avayavaiḥ śīghra janmabhiḥ nitya tva anumānaiḥ bādhyate yathā deśa kāla ādi bhinnāḥ go śabda buddhayaḥ samāna viṣayāḥ gauḥ iti utpadyamāna tvāt samprati utpannago śabda buddhi vat hi astana uccaritaḥ vā go śabdaḥ adya api asti go śabda tvāt adya uccarita go śabda vat ityādibhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.61^1	 śabda virodha prakāram idānīm pratijānāti tridhā iti pratijñā virodha ādayaḥ hi śabda virodha tayā prasiddhāḥ iti te tathā abhidhīyante na tu ete śabda virodhāḥ yatra hi kvacid arthe pratiṣṭhitena śabdena pratijñā antaram bādhyate tatra śabda virodhaḥ bhavati na ca sva vāc virodhe śabdasya kvacid arthe pratiṣṭhā asti vyāhata abhidhānāt pūrva sañjalpa virodhe api pūrva apara nyāya bala abala anusārī eva nirṇaya eti na śabda virodhaḥ na hi tatra śabda pramāṇataḥ arthaḥ nyāya gamya tvāt loka prasiddhiḥ tu na śabdaḥ na pramāṇa antaram api atu pratyakṣa ādi antargatā eva iti tad viruddha pakṣa pradarśanena eva pradarśitā iti na śabda virodhe antar bhāvayitum ucitā 
ŚVK_8.61^2	 na hi acandraḥ śaśī iti pakṣaḥ śabdena virudhyate na hi candra śabdaḥ śāṅkayoḥ sambandham śabdaḥ vadati yena atad vācya pakṣasya śabda virodhaḥ bhavati sambandha vācya tve hi itaretara āśrayam bhavet abhidhānāt sambandhaḥ sambandhāt ca abhidhānam iti tasmāt na ete śabda virodhāḥ pūrva uttara śabda sāmarthya parāmarśena tu eka parityāgena itara parigrahāt śabda virodha tayā prasiddhāḥ iti tantra antara prasiddhi vibhāgaḥ tridhā śabda virodhaḥ iti ucyate parama arthena tu veda artha vacana viparīta artha pratijñā eva śabdena virudhyate tatra hi pratiṣṭhitam śabdasya prāmāṇyam śaknoti viparīta pratijñaḥ vārayitum tat ca anantaram iha eva vakṣyāmaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.62–63^1	 tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati pratijñā iti tatra pratijñā virodhaḥ eva ekaḥ tridhā bhidyate iti āha yāvat iti sārdhena ayam arthaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ hi sva vāc virodhaḥ sa ca tredhā bhidyate uccāraṇa dharma dharmi bhedāt yāvajjīvam aham maunī iti pakṣaḥ pratijñayā eva bādhyate na hi anuktā satī pratijñā bhavati ukti mātreṇa ca maunam bādhyate atas pratijñā śarīra antargatena ukti mātreṇa bādhāt bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ sarva vākyam ṛṣā tvapakṣaḥ tu dharma uktyā bādhyate sarva mṛṣātve hi pratijñā vacanam api mṛṣā iti na itarat mṛṣā bhavet tat amṛṣā tve vā na sarva mithyātvam tat iha pratijñā antargata dharma saṃsarga asambhava parāmarśāt pakṣa bādhaḥ iti dharma ukti virodha abhidhānam 
ŚVK_8.62–63^2	 pūrvatra tu aviśiṣṭa mukti mātram eva maunam bādhate iti ukti mātreṇa iti uktam ātma bādhanam iti dharma bādhanam iti arthaḥ dharmaḥ eva ayuktaḥ ātmānam bādhataḥ iti yāvat vandhyā me jananī iti pakṣaḥ dharmī uktyā bādhyate jananī tve hi uddiṣṭa mātre navandhyā tvam āspadam labhate na ca gauṇaḥ jananī śabdaḥ iti api vaktavyam aham yatas jātaḥ iti viśeṣaṇāt evam viśeṣite pakṣe dharmī ukti virodhaḥ iti uktam bhavati etat ca abhyupagama vādena uktam na tu śruti smṛti atirekīṇi jalpāka vacanāni gauṇa tva ādibhiḥ samīkartum śakyante sarva dūṣaṇa uccheda prasaṅgāt pramāda ajñāna jāni eva hi dūṣaṇāni bhavanti teṣu kathañcid samādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇam nāma bhavet iti 
ŚVK_8.64	 pūrva sañjalpa virodham udāharati bauddhasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bauddhena ukte katham kṣaṇikāt agṛhīta sambandhāt artha pratyayaḥ iti anuyuktena tena eva yadā punar ucyate nityaḥ tarhi iti tadā tasya pūrva abhyupagama virodhaḥ yadi api ca atra nyāya bala abala anusārī bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tathā api evaṃvidhā pūrva apara viruddhā pratijñā eva ātmānam na labhate iti na nyāya avatāram apekṣate sambhāvitaḥ hi pratijñāyām arthaḥ nyāyena sādhyate asambhāvite tu nāya apekṣā na asti eva sva rasa bhaṅgura tvāt atas śabda virodhaḥ eva enam antar bhāvayati śabda sandarbhaḥ eva hi tādṛśaḥ pūrva apara viruddhaḥ pakṣam vināśayati iti teṣām abhiprāyaḥ iti sarva loka prasiddhi virodhasya udāharaṇam āha candra iti atra api mahā jana viparīta arthaḥ śabda saṃsargaḥ svarasāt eva bhajyate na pramāṇam yāvat apekṣate iti śabda bādhaḥ udāhṛtaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.65–8.66	 upamāna virodha udāharaṇam āha jñātā iti yena hi nagare gavā ākāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ samprati ca araṇye gavaya ākāraḥ tam prati gauḥ gavaya sadṛśaḥ na bhavati iti pakṣaḥ upamānena virudhyate iti parokṣe gavi sādṛśyam upameyam pratyakṣe tu pratyakṣam eva atas eva jñāta goga vaya ākāram iti kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti arthāpatti virodham idānīm vivakṣan bhāṣya kāra anusāreṇa abhāva pūrvikāyāḥ tāvat udāharaṇam āha geha iti 
ŚVK_8.67A	 pratyakṣa pūrvikām udāharati agnau iti adāhakaḥ iti atad śakti yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ anumāna pūrvikām udāharati śabde ca anabhidhāyakaḥ iti śabda śravaṇa anantaram artha pratītim ceṣṭayā anumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam iti unnīyate atas sarva kārakāṇām kriyā vinā abhāvāt abhidhā abhidhānaḥ vyāpāraḥ tad anupapattyā ca artha āpattyā tad śakti siddhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.67B	 tathā indriya apalāpa pakṣaḥ api pratyakṣa pūrvikayā artha āpattyā virudhyate iti āha śrotra iti yadi api pratyakṣa pūrvikā udāhṛtā eva tathā api pakṣa doṣa udbhāvana= chalena indriyā palāpa pakṣasya api ayam doṣaḥ iti vivakṣatā punar tad virodhaḥ abhihitaḥ atra eva ādi śabdena upamāna pūrvikayā virodhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ yathā gavaya upamitāyāḥ goḥ tad jñāna grāhya śakti apahnavaḥ iti arthāpatti pūrvikayā virodham udāharati śabda iti artha abhidhānāni atha anupapattyā hi vācaka śaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punar tad anupapattyā artha apatti antareṇa śabda nitya tvam avagamyate iti 
ŚVK_8.68.1	 śabda pūrvikā arthāpatti virodham udāharati śruta arthāpatti bādhaḥ iti kim punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcena udāhriyate tad virodha pratipādanam hi yayākayācid ekayā api sidhyati eva tathā ca pramāṇa antara virodheṣu prapañcaḥ na darśitaḥ arthāpatti vat vā pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ api prapañcena vācyaḥ satyam ṣoḍhā bhinnaiḥ eva ṣaḍbhiḥ atra virodhaḥ vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ tad pradarśana artham eva ṣaṣ pramāṇa prasūta artha āpattiḥ udāhṛtā tena eva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇa antareṣu api prapañcaḥ darśayitavyaḥ yathā tāvat pratyakṣa bādhaḥ eva anubhūti smṛti anumāna ādibhiḥ ṣaṣṭha varjam ṣoḍhā bhidyate svedyamānasya vādinaḥ anuṣṇaḥ vahniḥ iti pratijñā anubhava sthena eva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate anāsanna agneḥ tu sā eva pratijñā smṛti sthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate yadā khalu ayam vāda kāle anuṣṇaḥ vahniḥ iti pratijānāti tadā enam itaraḥ smārayati kim na smarasi pūrva anubhūtam agneḥ uṣṇa tvam yat evam āttha iti sa tat smṛtvā tatas pratyakṣān nivartate iti bhavati smṛta pratyakṣa bādhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.68.2–8.68.3	 anumita pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu yatra āpta mukhe ceṣṭā viśeṣa adarśanena tad avagata tikta ādiḥ asa ni vāraṇam pratijñāyate mukha vairūpyeṇa hi tasya tikta anubhavaḥ anumīyate atas tad viparīta pakṣasya anumita pratyakṣa bādhaḥ śruta pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti sākṣi pratyakṣeṇa bādhaḥ abhidhīyate na ca eṣa śabda bādhaḥ na hi atra taiḥ arthaḥ abhidhīyate kin tu darśanam atas tad darśana anusārī eva nirṇayaḥ darśanam tu taiḥ sva śabdena pratyāyyate iti śabda avagata pratyakṣa virodhaḥ eva ayam 
ŚVK_8.68.4^1	 upamānam tu pramāṇa antara prasiddha vastu sādṛśya mātra viṣayam iti anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyam gocarayati yathā dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñāyām yādṛśī sva ātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tām paratra api dṛṣṭvā upaminoti mama iva asya api dātṛ ādi pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā katham anyathā pūrvedyus ardha kṛta karma samāpane paredyus pravartate iha ca ceṣṭayā tad anurūpam para gocaram anumāya sva jñāna sādṛśyam tatra upamīyate yadi api ca atra anumāna avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ eva śakyaḥ darśayitum tathā api sva jñāna sādṛśya paricchede śakyam darśayitum iti tad avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ abhidhīyate pratyakṣa satta eva upamānena pramīyate arthāpatti avagata pratyakṣa bādhaḥ tu evam darśayitavyaḥ 
ŚVK_8.68.4^2	 yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toya arthiṣu taṭākam ekaḥ tad āharaṇāya prasthitaḥ vilambate tadā tad vilambanāni atha anupapattyā tadīyam toya pratyakṣam arthāpattyā pramīyate tatra tad viparītaḥ nistoya taṭāka pakṣaḥ arthāpatti siddhena pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate abhāvena tu bhāva rūpam pratyakṣam na avagamyate iti tad anavagata pratyakṣa virodhaḥ na iha udāhriyate ṣoḍhā vibhaktam anumāna bādhamataḥparam anusandhāsyāmaḥ dhūma avagata vahni pratiṣedhe tāvat pratyakṣa pūrva anumāna bādhaḥ dhūma anumitāt eva bahneḥ uṣṇa tve anumite tad viparīta pakṣaḥ anumita anumānena bādhyate yatra tu devasya tvā iti nirvapati iti pratīta viniyogāt mantra śeṣe anumite tad viparītaḥ pakṣaḥ gṛhyate tatra āgama anumāna bādhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.68.5	 nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tad sadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣu upamiteṣu vrīhibhiḥ yajeta iti codanā nīvāra viṣaya tvena anumīyate vrīhi avayavāḥ hi tad viṣaya tayā jñāta sambandhāḥ tām anumāpayanti na hi tasyāḥ sva rūpeṇa vrīhayaḥ viṣaya bhūtāḥ tad avayavāḥ tu cūrṇībhūtāḥ vrīhi śāstra arthaḥ te ca nīvāreṣu api santi iti vrīhi avayava sāmānya upamita nīvāra gāminī vrīhi codanā anumīyate tat iha ātad gocara tva pakṣasya upamāna pūrvaka anumāna bādhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.68.6^1	 arthāpatti pūrvaka anumāna bādhaḥ tu śrāvaṇa tva pakṣe abhihitaḥ eva yatra dūrāt vṛkṣa abhāvam viditvā tad chāyā bhāvaḥ anumīyate tatra abhāva pūrvaka anumānena chāyā asadbhāva pakṣaḥ bādhyate pratyakṣa śabda bādhaḥ tu tridhā darśitaḥ eva anyaḥ api śruti smṛtibhyām darśayitavyaḥ aṣṭaka ādīnām adharma tva pakṣaḥ tu kartṛ sāmānya anumita śabda viruddhaḥ smṛti adhikaraṇe darśitaḥ śakyam hi aṣṭaka ādayaḥ śabda mūlāḥ śāstra sthārya āvarta nivāsi kartṛka tvāt agnihotra ādi vat iti anumātum āgamika śabda bādhaḥ tu yatra śākhā antara gata śruti viṣaya vivāde smṛti nibandhana kārāṇām vacanena śruti sadbhāvaḥ niścīyate tatra hi āpta āgama avagata nitya āgama virodhaḥ viparīta pakṣasya sambhavati 
ŚVK_8.68.6^2	 upamita śabda virodhaḥ tu manu ādi smṛtibhyaḥ arthāpattyā vaidikam kim api mūlam asti iti kalpite smārta vākya sadṛśaḥ eva mūlaḥ upamite rtha vāda mūla tva pakṣaḥ upamita śabdena bādhyate viśva jit aphala tva pakṣaḥ tu śruta arthāpatti siddha śabda viruddhaḥ abhāvena tu śabda bhāvaḥ avagantum na śakyate iti śabdeyat tāvadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāraḥ tatra abhāva avadhārita vidhi kārtsyne jyotiṣṭa āme prākṛta iti kartavya tā prāpti pakṣaḥ bādhyate yathā vakṣyati kṛtsna vidhānāt apūrvaḥ somaḥ iti vrīhi abhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhyatā pakṣaḥ pratyakṣa ja upamānaviruddhaḥ 
ŚVK_8.68.6^3	 anumāna pūrvaka upa māna bādhaḥ tu yadā hi ādityasya deśa antara prāptyā gatim anumāya saṃvatsara ādi madhya anteṣu tasyāḥ sādṛśyam upamīyate yādṛśī ekatra saṃvatsara ādau tad madhye vānte vā sūrya gatiḥ tādṛśī vatsara anteṣu iti tatra gati vaisādṛśya pakṣaḥ anumāna pūrvaka upamānena bādhyate pūtīkāḥ na soma sadṛśāḥ iti tu pakṣaḥ śabda pūrva kopa māna viruddhaḥ sāma pūtīkayoḥ hi sādṛśyam na pratyakṣam naca anumeyam śabdena eva tu soma aṃśu jāta tvam pūtīkānām pratipādayatā kārya kāraṇayoḥ aucityena sārūpyam pratipāditam iti śabda avagata kārya kāraṇa prabhava tvāt pūtīkānām soma sādṛśya upamānasya tad viparyayaḥ śabda pūrvakopa māna viruddhaḥ bhavati 
ŚVK_8.68.6^4	 jyotiṣṭomikāḥ hi dharmāḥ satrā hīneṣu na bhavanti iti pakṣaḥ upamāna upamānena bādhyate jyotiṣṭoma upamānena hi te dvādaśa aham gacchanti dvādaśa aha upamānena ca satra ahīnau iti yadā tu ātma indriya sādṛśya viśiṣṭāni para indriyāṇi upamīyante tatra tat niṣedhaḥ arthāpatti upamānena bādhyate vedakāra nāstitā śaśaśṛṅga ādi abhāva sadṛśī na bhavati iti pakṣaḥ abhāva pūrvaka upa mānena bādhyate dvayoḥ api abhāvena abhāve avagate sādṛśyam upamīyate arthāpatti virodhaḥ tu ṣaḍvidhaḥ varṇitaḥ eva abhāva virodham tu anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ 
ŚVK_8.69	 abhāva virodham idānīm udāharati śaśaśṛṅga ādi iti ayam ca pratyakṣa abhāva virodhaḥ yadā tu amum rāśim sūryaḥ gataḥ na vā iti cintyamāne gaṇita kuśalena gaṇita anumāna abhāvāt na gataḥ iti avagate bhrāntaḥ gataḥ iti vadati tatra anumāna abhāva virodhaḥ caitya vandana ādi dharma tva pakṣaḥ tu śruti ādi āgama abhāva viruddhaḥ pūrvavantaḥ darvīhomā iti tu upamāna abhāvena virudhyate na hi teṣām kenacid karmaṇā sādṛśyam kathañcid avagamyate iti palālakūṭa kuñjarayoḥ tu sādṛśya āstitāpakṣaḥ upamāna abhāvena virudhyate tathā śabde śrotra deśam anāgacchati śrotre ca śabda deśam dhvanyā gamana mātreṇa eva śabda śravaṇa upapatteḥ yaḥ artha apatyā śabdaḥ śabda antaram ārabhate tatas krameṇa antyaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyate iti anyathā anupapattyā pratijānāti tad pratijñā artha apatti abhāvena bādhyate abhāva abhāvaḥ tu evam darśayitavyaḥ yadā hi kartṛ abhāvena vedānām doṣa abhāvaḥ vagataḥ bhavati tadā doṣavat pakṣasya abhāva abhāvena bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.70	 evam tāvat dharma sambandha bādhaḥ ṣoḍhā prapañcitaḥ dharma dharmyu bhaya svarūpa sva viśeṣa bādham atas param vakṣyāmaḥ iti saṃkṣipya sukha grahaṇa artham śrotṛ buddhi samādhāna arthaṃca vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ saṅkīrtanam karoti evam iti sārdhena śruti artha ākṣiptayoḥ iti svarūpam tāvat sarvatra śruti arthaḥ eva tad viśeṣaḥ api artha ākṣiptaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ hi svarūpam yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptam tam ākṣipati tat ca anantaram eva vakṣyate iti śruti arthaḥ ca ākṣiptaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.71	 tatra dharma svarūpa bādhaḥ varṇitaḥ eva iti tam akṛtvā eva tad viśeṣaṇa bādham udāharati tṛṇa ādi iti yaḥ hi tṛṇa ādi vikāra darśanāt agni mat himam sādhayati tasya abhāvena tāvat dharma svarūpa bādhaḥ bhavati eva tad viśeṣaṇam api uṣṇa tvam artha ākṣiptam pratyakṣa avagatena śaityena bādhyate na ca vācyam anuṣṇaḥ api vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭaḥ iti katham artha ākṣiptaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti prabhāsu api evam vahniḥ uṣṇaḥ eva abhibhūta tvāt tu sparśaḥ na gṛhyate na punar uṣṇa tām jātu jahāti svābhāvikī hi sā tasya na ca hime api abhibhūta tvāt agrahaṇam iti vācyam tad viparīta śaitya upalmbhāt hetu upanyāsaḥ tu pakṣa doṣa abhidhāna avasare tad bīja mātra pradarśana artham saḥ ayam abhāvena dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.73	 dharmiṇaḥ tu dvi prakāraḥ api bādhaḥ anuktaḥ eva iti ubhayathā tad bādha udāharaṇam āha adharmaḥ iti sārdhena hiṃsā kila adharmaḥ iti sāmānyatas avagatam tat yadā vihitaḥ adharmaḥ daikṣa paśu hiṃsā ādiḥ yat duḥkham karoti iti anūdya tat alpam iti sādhyate tadā api vihita tvena adharma tā eva bādhyate tad viśeṣaḥ api duḥkha nimitta tvam yad artha ākṣiptam tat api tena eva bādhyate na hi vihitam nāma kim api duḥkhasya nidānam bhavati puruṣa artha eka sādhana tvāt vidheḥ saḥ ayam āgamena dharmi svarūpa sva viśeṣa bādhaḥ na ca atra śruti upāttaḥ eva sva viśeṣaḥ iti codanīyam artha ākṣiptasya alpatayā vidhāna artham anuvādāt iti 
ŚVK_8.74	 ubhayasya ubhaya virodham udāharati ayathārtha iti yadā hi sarva jñānāni mithyā iti sādhyate tadā dharma dharmi grāhiṇoḥ api jñānayoḥ mithyātvāt tad viśeṣaṇa grāhiṇoḥ ca mithyā tvāt bhavati ubhayasya eva ubhaya bādhaḥ iti ayam ca dharma uktyā ubhaya bādhaḥ iti śabda bādhaḥ eva niveśanīyaḥ iti samadhigatam tāvat ubhayoḥ svarūpa bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.75–76^1	 kau punar tad viśeṣau artha ākṣiptau bādhyete atas āha kṣaṇikā iti bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandhaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti tatra ca eka deśa darśanāt iti ucyate tatra ca darśana grahaṇam atiricyate eka deśāt iti eva vaktavyam tat dhi liṅgam na punar darśanam atas vyākhyeyam eka deśa darśanāt iti atas āha darśanāt iti ayam arthaḥ na eka deśaḥ sattā mātreṇa liṅgam kin tu sva pratipattau jñātaḥ para pratipādane ca jñāpitaḥ tat idam ubhayam upādātum darśana grahaṇam śaknoti ca ubhayam upādātum ṇijbhāva abhāvayoḥ api nirdeśa sādha araṇyāt 
ŚVK_8.75–76^2	 sva pratipattau tāvat eka deśe dṛṣṭe buddhiḥ anumānam iti arthaḥ para artha prayoge tu ṇijanta darśana padam eka deśam darśayitvā yā buddhiḥ jāyate sa anumānam iti uktam bhavati tat idam tatra uccarita darśana padam artha dvaye vyākhyeyam anena ca yatra eka deśe vādi prativādinoḥ akasya ubhayoḥ vā saṃśayaḥ a dhīḥ viparyayaḥ vā bhavati saḥ asiddha abhidhānaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ vyudasyate na hi asau tādṛśaḥ parasmai darśayitum śakyate svayam vā dṛṣṭaḥ bhavati adhīra jñānam iti arthaḥ tatra dvaya viparyasta udāharaṇam āha śaityāt iti vahni śabdayoḥ dvayoḥ api śaitya cākṣuṣa tve vādi prativādinoḥ viparyāt asiddhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.77	 anyatara asiddha udāharaṇam āha kṛtaka tvā iti yadā vaiśeṣikaḥ yājñikam prati śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt guṇa tvāt vā iti hetum prayuṅkte tadā asau sva rūpeṇa tasya asiddhaḥ bhavati yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāram hetum param prati vadati tadā tasya asiddhiḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti na hi vaiśeṣikāḥ śabdam dravyam abhyupagacchanti guṇa tva abhyupagamāt evaṃprakāraḥ iti parāsiddha prakāraḥ iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.78–8.79A	 sandigdhā siddham udāharati bāṣpa ādi iti syāt antena yadā hi dhūmaḥ bāṣpa ādi bhāvena sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kiṃsvid ayam rajasām udgamaḥ bāṣpaḥ vā dhūmaḥ vā iti tadā dvayoḥ api anyatarasa vā sandigdha asiddhaḥ bhavati evam tāvat sandeha viparyayābhyām asiddha toda āhṛtāḥ ajñānena tu aprasiddha artha pada prayoge darśayitavyā tridhā iti vādi prativādi u bhayaiḥ trayaḥ prakārāḥ iti evam tāvat svarūpataḥ hetuḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati iti uktam iti āha evam iti āśraya asiddha tā api etaiḥ eva jñāna ādibhiḥ vādi prativādi ubhaya apekṣaiḥ tridhā bhidyate iti āha ete eva iti 
ŚVK_8.79B	 nanu svarūpa asiddhyā hetuḥ duṣyet āśraya asiddhyā tu kaḥ tasya doṣaḥ atas āha jñāte api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na sva rūpeṇa hetuḥ gamakaḥ api tupakṣa dharma tayā jñātaḥ na ca aprasiddha āśrayaḥ tad dharma tayā jñātum śakyate śaitya cākṣuṣa tvayoḥ api pakṣa dharma tva asidhyā eva ahetutvam siddham hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityam rūpa rūpi rūpa eka artha samavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣa tvam śabda ādau hi pakṣa dharma tayā tu tayoḥ asiddhatvam iti tad dharma rūpa abhiprāyeṇa svarūpa asiddha vacanam atas āśraya asiddhau api pakṣa dharma tva asiddheḥ ahetu tvam yuktam eva iti 
ŚVK_8.80	 tām idānīm āśraya asiddhim udāharati sarvatra iti asiddhāntena yadā hi bauddham prati sarvatra kārya upalambhāt ātmanaḥ sarva gata tvam mīmāṃsakāḥ sādhayanti tadā anyatara asiddha āśrayaḥ hetuḥ bhavati bauddhasya ātmanaḥ asiddheḥ iti yaḥ tu pramāṇa gatim ajānānaḥ laukikaḥ kaścid ātmani saṃśete tasmin eva hetau ucyamāne sandigdha āśrayaḥ hetuḥ iti āha laukika ādeḥ iti ātmani saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ ādi śabdena sa tīrthikānām api yeṣām ātmani saṃśayaḥ te upādriyante evam saṃśaya viparyayābhyām āśraya asiddhiḥ uktāḥ ajñānena api āśraya asiddhiḥ aprasiddha pada prayoge darśayitavyā yasya hi pakṣa vacanaḥ śabdaḥ na prasiddhaḥ tam pratyevaṃjātīyake hetau ucyamāne ajñānena āśraya asiddhiḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.81	 nanu yadi anyatarā siddhyā hetuḥ duṣyati evam tarhi amūrta tvāt ātmā niṣkriyaḥ iti evamādeḥ api hetu tvam na syāt digambarāṇām ātmanaḥ amūrta tva asiddheḥ mūrtam hi te śarīra pariṇāmam ātmānam manyante akartṛka tvāt nityaḥ vedaḥ iti ca bauddhānām tad asiddheḥ ahetuḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti mīmāṃsakānām asiddheḥ tat eva hetuḥ nāma na kaścid vyavatiṣṭhate atas āha vāc mātrā iti ayam arthaḥ na asiddhaḥ mama iti vāc mātrāt dhetuḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati tathā sati na kaścid anumāna vyavahāraḥ prakalpeta dvābhyām tu vā ādi prativādibhyām asattvena avadhāritosiddhobhavati tasya eva tathāvidhasya asidh dhatā vacanam vādinaḥ dūṣaṇam bhavati na asiddhaḥ iti vāc pravṛtti mātrāt iti 
ŚVK_8.82^1	 nanu kim idam dvayoḥ asiddhaḥ asiddhaḥ iti na hi vivadamānayoḥ ekatra arthe sampratipattiḥ bhavati na hi janma sahasreṇa api bauddhaḥ vedānām akartṛka tvam manyate mīmāṃsakaḥ vā api kaṇṭha gata prāṇaḥ api kṛtaka tām śabdasya tat evamādau ubhaya sampratipateḥ abhāvāt na hetu bhāvaḥ avatiṣṭhate atas āha itarat iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na dvayoḥ asaṃpratipattiḥ iti etāvatā eva sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ anavakptiḥ yadi vādinā prayukte sādhane prativādinā ca asiddhatvaḥ udbhāvite vādinā tad sādhanam sādhyate tatas bhavati sādhanam yadi tu parama artha upapatti abhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatas tasya dūṣaṇam sidhyati 
ŚVK_8.82^2	 tad pramāṇatas siddhiḥ eva atra upayujyate na ubhaya abhyupagamaḥ dvābhyām yaḥ asattvataḥ jñātaḥ iti api pramāṇa siddhi abhiprāyeṇa uktam nābhyupagama mātra apekṣayā yat dhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇa ubhaya sampratipattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti asattvataḥ jñāta apekṣayā itarad śabdaḥ yat vādinā sattvena jñātam bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparītyena tad vādinā sādhyamānam sādhanam bhavati etat ca jalpa nyāye sthitvā uktam vāde tu dvayoḥ api sampratipattiḥ bhavati eva iti na ca evam anyatara asiddhiḥ adūṣaṇam yāvat tu yādī na sādhanam sādhayati tāvat anyatarā siddhyā nigṛhyate sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇam parihṛtam bhavati iti 
ŚVK_8.83^1	 darśitam tāvat asat nikṛṣṭa eka deśa śabdayoḥ vyāvartyam jñāta sambandha padasya idānīm vyāvartya darśayati sandeha iti vacana antena sandeha viparīta hetvoḥ hi na saṃbandhaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati na hi sādhāraṇaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ prameya tvam nitya tvena jñāta sambandham iti śakyate vaktum dhaṭa ādiṣu anitya tayā api jñāta sambandha tvāt na api kṛtaka tvam nitya tayā teṣu eva anitya tayā sambandha saṃvitteḥ atas tad jātīyam ubhayam na jñāta saṃbandham iti jñāta saṃbandha padena vyudasyati atra ca āsat nikṛṣṭa padāt prabhuti prātilomyena vārtika kṛtā lakṣaṇa granthe viśeṣaṇa upādāna phalam uktam u tat kasya hetoḥ 
ŚVK_8.83^2	 pratīti krama anusāreṇa prabhātā hi prathamam pakṣam pratyeti tatas hetum apekṣate tatas dṛṣṭānta vacanam atas asat pakṣa nirākaraṇa artham prayuktam asannikṛṣṭa padam eva tāvat upavarṇitam tatas hetu padam eka deśa darśanāt iti tatas jñāta sambandhasya iti dṛṣṭānta vacanam dṛṣṭānte hi hetoḥ sambandhaḥ jñāyate atas eva dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ api sādhya hetu vikala tva ādayaḥ anena nirākriyante tad vaikalye api svayam sambandhaḥ jñātum parasmai pratipādayitum śakyate iti kiyantaḥ punar saṃśaya hetavaḥ atas āha trayaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.84–8.85A	 tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati san iti sādhya tad abhāvayoḥ san sādhāraṇaḥ abhidhīyate yathā prameya tvam nitya anitya tvayoḥ dvābhyām sādhya tad abhāvābhyām vyāvṛttaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ kṣiteḥ eva gandhavat tvam vyāvṛttam hi tat sakala sajātīya vijātīya dravya antara guṇa karmabhyaḥ dvau viruddha artha sambandhau iti yau viruddha avyabhicārī iti paraiḥ abhihitau tau ca anantaram eva udāhāryau iti na iha vyākhyāyete iti tatra sādhāraṇam tāvat udāharaṇaiḥ prapañcayati prameya iti ete ca dharmāḥ sādhya tad abhāvayoḥ sādhāraṇāḥ iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.85B^1	 keṣu punar sādhyeṣu teṣām sādhāraṇyam atas āha nitya iti nityeṣu antena katham punar vaiṣamye yathāsaṅkhyam atas āha dvis anitya tā iti anitya tā sva sthāne dvis paṭhitavyā atas yathā saṅkhyā upapattiḥ tat ayam arthaḥ yadā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti prayujyate tadā prameya tvam sādhya tad abhāvayoḥ dṛṣṭam iti sādhāraṇa tvāt na ekāntāya prabhavati atas na aikāntikam iti ucyate atas eva ca saṃśaya hetuḥ saṃśayaḥ hi sāmānya pratyakṣāt viśeṣa apratyakṣāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca bhavati 
ŚVK_8.85B^2	 yathā sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ āroha pariṇāha sāmānya darśanāt bhedaka dharmān avadhāraṇāḥ ca viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ kiṃsvid ayam sthāṇuḥ āhosvit puruṣaḥ iti anavadhāraṇa jñāna ātmakaḥ saṃśayaḥ jāyate evam prameya tvam api nitya anityayoḥ sāmānyam viditavataḥ tad viśeṣaṇa smaraṇa apekṣaḥ tayoḥ eva anirdhāraṇa ātmakaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃśaya apara nāmā jāyate iti prameya tvam saṃśaya hetuḥ ayam ca kṛtsnā ubhaya vyāpī saṃśaya hetuḥ tathā āyatna utthaḥ śabdaḥ anitya tvāt iti ayam api sādhāraṇaḥ eva ayatna uttheṣu keṣucid vidyut ādiṣu gata tvāt yatna uttheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭa ādiṣu vṛtteḥ tat ayam sakala vipakṣa vyāpī sa pakṣa eka deśa gataḥ iti veditavyam 
ŚVK_8.85B^3	 tathā yatna utthaḥ śabdaḥ anitya tvāt iti yatna uttheṣu sarveṣu eva anitya tā dṛṣṭāḥ tad abhāve api kvacid megha ādau dṛṣṭāḥ na vyoma ādau iti sakala sa pakṣa vyāpī vipakṣa eka deśa vartī ca ayam sādhāraṇaḥ iti avasātavyam ubhaya eka deśa gataḥ tu yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt iti amūrta tā hi na sarva nitya vyāpinī vyoma ādiṣu bhāvāt aṇuṣu ca abhāvāt anityam api na sarvam vyāpnoti ghaṭa kuḍya ādiṣu abhāvāt karma ādiṣu bhāvāt sarvatra ca atra dvaya vṛtti tvam eva hetoḥ saṃśaye kāraṇam avṛtti aṃśaḥ tu san api na kāraṇam iti atantram 
ŚVK_8.85B^4	 atas eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhā vibhāgam vadanti ye teṣām asau anupayogi eva sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ iti upekṣaṇīyam na hi sādhana vacana kāle tathāvidham hetum parityajataḥ vādinaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ avṛtti aṃśaḥ kvacid upayujyate aṇvā api hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamānaḥ hetuḥ atyājyaḥ eva dūṣaṇa vādinaḥ api vipakṣa vṛtti mātram vacanīyam iti kim tat avāntara viśeṣa āśrayaṇena vārttikakāreṇa api sarva sādhāraṇeṣu dvaya vṛtti tvam eva saṃśaya kāraṇam iti darśayitum udāharaṇa prapañcaḥ darśitaḥ na punar cāturvidhyam abhipretya yathā āha na tu ekasya upayogaḥ asti dūṣaṇa udbhāvanam prati tyajyate sādhane ca evam sādhāraṇyāt viśeṣataḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.86	 prapañcitaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ asādhāraṇam idānīm saṃśaya hetum udāharati nityā bhūḥ iti gandhaḥ hi pṛthivyāḥ svāsa ādhāraṇaḥ guṇaḥ na tām vihāya nityam anityam vā bhāva antaram āśrayati iti asādhāraṇaḥ iti gīyate āha astu asādhāraṇam gandhavat tvam katham tu saṃśaya hetuḥ yuktam hi pakṣa dvayau alambī sādhāraṇaḥ dvayoḥ anavasthā ādhiyam ādadhānaḥ yat saṃśaya hetuḥ iti asādhāraṇaḥ tu dvābhyām vyāvṛttaḥ na ekatra api dhiyam upajanayitum alam iti katham asya saṃśaya hetu bhāvaḥ atas āha niścaya iti hetoḥ hi niścaya janane anyayavyatirekau aṅgam anyatarā apīye api na niścayāya hetuḥ paryāptaḥ bhavati tat yathā sādhāraṇaḥ anvayasana athaḥ api vinākṛtaḥ vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya prabhavati evam eva asādharaṇaḥ api niścayasya ekena anvaya nāmnā aṅgena vikalaḥ tam akurvan saṃśaya hetu tām pratipadyate iti 
ŚVK_8.88^1	 nanu uktam sādhāraṇaḥ dvaya gāmī dvaye buddhim janayan saṃśayae hetuḥ iti asādhāraṇaḥ tu na kiñcid jñāpayati iti na asau eka aṅga vikalatā mātreṇa saṃśaya hetuḥ iti yuktam atas āha sādhāraṇaḥ iti dvayena ayam abhiprāyaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ api na ubhayatra buddhi jananāt saṃśaya hetuḥ kin tu viruddha ubhaya pratipādana mukhena viruddhe hi ubhayasmin pratipādite tayoḥ ekatra samavāya asambhavāt vyāghātāt eva saṃśayaḥ bhavati tat ca asādhāraṇe api aviśiṣṭam asādhāraṇaḥ api hi ubhayasmāt vyāvṛtteḥ tad abhāvam gamayan dvaya abhāva asambhavāt eva saṃśayam janayati 
ŚVK_8.88^2	 na hi sambhavati nityam anityam ca vastu na bhavati iti dharma dvandvaiḥ eva hi nitya anitya tva ādibhiḥ sarvam jagat avasthitam atas ubhaya abhāvaḥ virudhyate na ca ubhaya bhāvaḥ virodhāt eva na ca anyatara parigrahaḥ aviśeṣāt tam imam saṅkaṭam āsādya prāmāṇikaḥ saṃśete ayam ca atra avayava arthaḥ yathā prameya tva ādiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ san buddhi dvaya nimittakaḥ buddhi dvayam saṃśaye nimittam asthā asti iti bahuvrīhiḥ nimitta śabdena ca buddhi dvayasya nimitta mātra tām kathayati sādhya tad abhāva viṣayam hi buddhi dvayam nimittīkṛtya viruddha eka anavāpteḥ eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayaḥ janyate 
ŚVK_8.88^3	 na hi paraspara viruddhābhyām nitya anitya tvābhyām ekaḥ śabdaḥ vyādhyate dharmi bheda nibandhanauhi viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā nityam vyoma anityam kārya dravyam iti atas asmāt prati iti  ātāt eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayaḥ janyate sa ca ayam asādhāraṇasya api samānaḥ saḥ api hi yatra nitye anitye vā na asti tad abhāvam pratipādya tad mukhena dvaya sattva virodham āpādayan saṃśaya kāraṇam bhavati iti idam ca asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam na anumanyante avyavasthayā hi ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayaḥ bhavati na ca asādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhau= ādhīyate tasya kenacid anvaya abhāvāt 
ŚVK_8.88^4	 api ca parimiteṣu eva bhāveṣu saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ nivṛtti mukhena tu saṃśaya janane sarvatas nivṛttena asādhāraṇena sarvatomukhaḥ saṃśayaḥ janyeta na ca sarva viṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭa caraḥ tasya buddhau anārohāt na ca kvacid nivṛtti mātreṇa sarvatra abhāvaḥ śakyate avagantum yad mukhena saṃśayaḥ bhavet na hi anuvṛttau adṛṣṭāyām vyāvṛttiḥ sidhyati agnau anuvartamānaḥ hi dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭa vyatirekaḥ agni niyata svabhāva tvena avagataḥ arthāt adṛśyamānebhyaḥ anagnibhyaḥ vyatiricyate iti avagamyate yaḥ tu na kenacid anvitaḥ tasya katham anupalabdhi yogyāt sarvatas vyatirekaḥ pratīyeta tatas na anena prakāreṇa asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam 
ŚVK_8.88^5	 yadi tu asādhāraṇa dharmāṇaḥ bhāvāḥ nitya anitya bhāva bhājaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti kṣitim api tad dharmikām upalabhya nityā vā syāt anityā vā iti saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate evam tarhi asādhāraṇa dharma tvāt eva bahu sādhāraṇāt saṃśayaḥ nāsā dhāraṇāt anyaḥ hi asādharaṇa dharmaḥ anyathā ca bahu sādhāraṇī tadvat tā tat yadi asau saṃśaya kāraṇam jātā kim jātam asādhāraṇasya hanta evam sādhāraṇaḥ eva saṃśaya hetuḥ abhyupagataḥ bhavati iti siddham nāsādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam anyat matam anadhyavasāya hetuḥ eva ayam iti asti kila anadhyavasāyaḥ nāma jñānasya prakāraḥ saḥ anena janyate bhavati hi tādṛś dharma dṛśaḥ kimbhūtasya asya dharmaḥ ayam iti anadhyavasitau abhāsa pratyayaḥ 
ŚVK_8.88^6	 na ca eva pramāṇam aniścaya ātmaka tvāt na ca saṃśayaḥ pakṣa dvaya asaṃsparśāt saḥ ayam evaṃvidhān adhyavasāyaḥ asādhāraṇena janyate iti na tu etat ghaṭate na hi anadhyavasāyaḥ nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāraḥ yam ayam janayet adhyavasāya abhāvaḥ anadhyavasāyaḥ sa ca prāc abhāva rūpa tvāt na janyaḥ atha anya mātra vacanaḥ nan agrāhyaṇa ādi vat iṣyate tatas adhyavasāyāt anyaḥ saṃśaya ā iva tad śabda vācyaḥ bhavet na ca tad hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti phaṇitam eva atha adharma ādi vat viparīta vacanaḥ nan evam sati viparyaya vācyaḥ anadhyavasāya śabdaḥ bhavet na ca viparīta avagrahaḥ asādhāraṇena janyate iti 
ŚVK_8.88^7	 yadi tu na me asmin vastuni adhyavasāyaḥ asti iti adhyavasāya abhāva avadhāraṇam eva anadhyavasāyaḥ sa tarhi pramāṇa abhāvena eva adhyavasāya abhāvaḥ avagamyate tatra hetoḥ na vyāpāraḥ atas jijñāsā mātra hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti samarthanīyam bhavati hi tad darśinaḥ kīdṛś dharmaḥ ayam itas dharmāt bhāvaḥ bhavet iti jijñāsā yadi api ca asa auśuddha dharmi darśanāt api kadācid bhavati eva tathā api dharma dvāreṇa api tāvat bhavati eva iti na tad hetu tvam anupapannam āha ca tena ajñānam asiddhebhyaḥ jijñāsā ananya gāminaḥ sāmānyāt saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ tathā sa pratisādhanāt iti 
ŚVK_8.88^8	 yat tu iha asādhāraṇasya saṃśaya hetu tvam uktam tat para matam jñāta sambandha padasya hi vyāvartanīyam atra darśayitum abhipretam tat saṃśaya hetu tve api asādhāraṇasya ghaṭataḥ eva bhavatu tāvat ayam yasya kasyacid dhetuḥ sarvathā jñāta sambandha padena vyudasyate iti tātparyam śākyāḥ tu saṃśaya hetum asādhāraṇam manyante udāharanti ca śabda anitya tve sādhye śrāvaṇa tvam yathā uktam anaikāntikam eva enam śākyāḥ prāyeṇa manvate ubhayasmāt nivṛtta tvāt ubhayatra anuvṛtti vat iti idam ca vārttika kṛtā eva pradeśa antare svayam upanyasya yathā ukta dūṣaṇaiḥ dūṣitam eva iti 
ŚVK_8.89–8.90B	 kim punar udāhṛtānām svābhāvikam eva saṃśaya hetu tvam na iti āha sandigdhā iti kāraṇam āha nirṇayasya iti labdhvā antena kva drṣṭam atas āha niṣkriyā iti amūrta tā hi nitya tve sādhye nitya anitya vyoma karma sādhāraṇī saṃśaya hetuḥ āsīt sā eva tu niṣkriya tve sādhye labdhvā anvaya vyatirekau hetu tāṃpratipadyate vyāptam hi amūrta tvam niṣkriya tvena na hi amūrtam gaganam ātmā vā parispandate na ca evam tadvatām ratha ādīnām amūrta tvam dṛṣṭam iti asādhāraṇasya nirṇaye hetu tvam darśayati kṣiti eka deśa iti gandha viśeṣa darśinaḥ hi vidita vyāpteḥ kṣiti eka deśa siddha tve bhavati ānumānikaḥ nirṇayaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.91^1	 dvau viruddha artha sambandhau ekatra eka deśini saṃśaye hetuḥ iti uktam tatra udāharaṇam āha yatra iti yatra hi na sākṣātkāri jñāna viṣayaḥ vāyuḥ arūpa tvāt iti ekaḥ sādhayati aparaḥ api sparśāt tad viparyayam tatra asau viruddha avyabhicāritā bhavati iti śākyaiḥ abhihitam tatra tulya bala ubhaya hetu sannipātāt saṃśayaḥ dvayoḥ api sādhanayoḥ prasiddha avayava tva aviśeṣāt arūpam hi arūpi samavetam apratyakṣam iti kāṇādāḥ manyante tathā ca vāyuḥ atas na pratyakṣaḥ karma svarūpam api rūpa eka artha samavāyāt cākṣuṣam ācakṣate evam sparśaḥ api vāyoḥ prasiddhaḥ eva 
ŚVK_8.91^2	 prasiddha vyāptikaḥ ca aparokṣa tvena atas tulya bala tvam tatas ca saṃśayaḥ viruddhayoḥ ekatra upāna pāta asambhavāt samuccaya anupapatteḥ siddhe ca vastuni vikalpa asambhavāt bādhya bādhakam āvasya api tulya kakṣya tvāt atas anavasthayā ubhayasmin pariplavamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ tādātmyāt tasya bala abala viśeṣe tu anumāna virodhaḥ varṇitaḥ eva yathā sarvajñaḥ asti iti buddha vacanam samyak tad ukta tvāt kṣaṇa bhaṅga ādi vākya vat iti ekena ukte aparaḥ prabravīti buddhaḥ asarvajñaḥ iti mad vacanam samyak mad ukta tvāt yathā jyotiḥ uṣṇaḥ 
ŚVK_8.91^3	 āpaḥ dravāḥ iti atra mad ukta tvam ubhayoḥ api siddham buddha ukta tā tu na naḥ prasiddhā atas aprasiddha aṅgaka tvāt pūrvam sādhanam balavatā prasiddha aṅgakena bādhyate yat tu viruddha avyabhicārī iti dvayoḥ eka vacana antam abhidhānam te    nyāmahe viruddha avyabhicārī saṃśaye hetuḥ iti śākyāḥ vadanti na kasya saṃśaya hetu tvam anyatara paricchedāt na ca samudāya abhiprāyam eka vacanam tasya viruddha tva avi abhicāripadānāḥ padatvāt sa hi aṃśābhyām vyabhicāri eva dvau tu viruddha avyabhicāriṇau iti vaktavyam na tu eka vacanena yadi pratihetu viruddham artham ekaikaḥ na vyabhicarati iti viruddha avyabhicāri iti ucyate tat astu na tu ekaḥ saṃśaye hetuḥ iti uktam atas eva vārtikakāreṇa dvau viruddha artha sambandhau saṃśaya hetū iti dvi vacana antena eva nāmnām saṃśaya hetu bhāvaḥ darśitaḥ iha api viruddha avyabhicāritā iti etāvat eva uktam na tu viruddha avyabhicārī saṃśaya hetuḥ iti tat atra yogyatayā anayoḥ viruddha avyabhicāritā iti vyākhyeyam dvau viruddha avyabhicāriṇau iti yāvat iti 
ŚVK_8.92^1	 imām ca viruddha avyabhicāritām saṃśaya hetum sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇābhyām jāti antaram eke varṇayanti apare punar samudāyasya aṃśābhyām sādhāraṇa pakṣa nikṣepam anye tu samastam idam militam ubhayam na ekatra api anugatam iti ananvayam asādhāraṇam eva asthiṣate iti āha kecid iti atra ca pradeśa antare vārtika kṛtā sādhāraṇya eva āsthā darśitāḥ yat āha sādhāraṇyāt na na etasya bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate aṃśābhyām samudāyaḥ hi sādhāraṇa pade sthitaḥ iti na ca vācyam dvayasya ananvayāt asādhāraṇaḥ eva ayam iti yadi hi ekena dvayam prayujyeta tatas bhavet api evam pratyekam anvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyām prayuktau na ananvitau iti śakyate vaktum api ca asādhāraṇa tve saṃśaya hetu bhāvaḥ na upapadyetam 
ŚVK_8.92^2	 tasya nirākṛta pūrva tvāt atas sādhāraṇaḥ eva ayam iti vayam tu jāti antaram eva sādhīyaḥ manyāmahe yathā hi na dvayam ekena prayuktam iti nāsādhāraṇa tvam evam sādhāraṇa tvam api na syāt eva kim khalu atra sādhāraṇam ekaikasya ekaikena vyāptasya ekaikena prayogāt aṃśataḥ sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasya aprayogāt atas eva ca atra sādhāraṇāt bhedena pratihetu viruddhayoḥ saṃśaya hetu tvam uktam itarathā tena eva gata tvāt na pṛthak upādīyeta saṃśaya janana prakāraḥ api ca atra bhidyate eva sādhāraṇaḥ hi ubhaya dṛṣṭaḥ tu pratītim āda dhānaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ imau tu ekaika śyena ubhayam upasthāpayantau saṃśaya hetū iti vārtikakāreṇa api sādhāraṇa pade sthitaḥ iti uktam na sādhāraṇaḥ eva iti 
ŚVK_8.93^1	 katham punar evaṃjātīyake viṣaye nirṇayaḥ atas āha pratijñā iti nirṇaya antena pakṣa bādha uktaiḥ pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ yasya sādhana vākya avayava pratijñā bādhyate tad parājayena itarasya nirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ yathā iha eva tāvat udāharaṇe tvac indriya vyāpāreṇa vāyau= aparokṣam anubhūyamāne tena eva anubhavena parokṣatā pakṣaḥ bādhyate na hi naḥ tvac indriya bhuvaḥ toya pratyakṣāt vāyu pratyakṣam viśiṣyate na hi iha an adhiṣṭhānam sparśa mātram anubhūyate api tu tad adhikaraṇam dravyam api na hi prabalena marutā abhihanyamānasya jalam vā śliṣyatas saṃvid viśiṣyate atas akṣa sambandha phala anusārāt pratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ iti niścīyate kvacid ca āgamena viṣaya apahāraḥ bhavati yathā śuci nara śiraḥ kapālam prāṇi aṅga tvāt śaṅkha śukti śakala vat iti pāśupatena ukte anyaḥ aśuci iti sādhayati prāṇi udbhūta tvāt uccāra ādi vat iti 
ŚVK_8.93^2	 tatra pūrva pratijñāyai āgamena viṣaya apahārāt uttareṇa artha nirṇayaḥ bhavati śuci itara viveke hi āgamaḥ eva śaraṇam tasmin paripanthini na śuci tva anumānam ātmānam labhate smaranti hi nāram spṛṣṭvā asthi sa sneham sa vāsāḥ jalam āviśet iti rudraḥ hi mahā vratam cacāra saḥ etat śava śīrṣam upada dhāra iti tu arthavāda mātram na śava śiraḥ dhāraṇa vidhiḥ atra ca pratyakṣa ādīni eva yathāsvam artham sādhayanti iti sādhana padena ucyante iti katham punar pratyakṣa ādīni eva pratijñābādhanāya utsahante teṣu api sāmānyatas darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamāna tvāt atas āha bādha varjanāt iti na tāvat teṣu bādhaḥ dṛśyate kadācid bādha sambhāvanā tu na teṣām prāmāṇyam utsārayati iti 
ŚVK_8.95^1	 atra bhikṣuṇā pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ iti eka vacanena vivakṣita eka saṅkhyaḥ ekaḥ eva hetuḥ iti darśitam atas eva viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ na hetu tvam aneka tvāt tayoḥ iti na ca etat ghaṭate na hi pratihetu viruddhayoḥ aneka tvam saṃśaya hetu tve hetuḥ api tarhi paraspara viruddha artha upaplāvaka tvam eva viruddhau hi dvābhyām dvau arthau ekatra upaplāvitau iti tatra saṃśerate na tu hetu aneka tvāt saṃśaya hetvoḥ api pratyekam avagatayoḥ ubhaya samāveśāt eva kvacid nirṇayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā ūrdhva tā kākavat tvayoḥ 
ŚVK_8.95^2	 kevalā hi ūrdhva tā sthāṇu puruṣa sādhāraṇī na anyatara nirṇayāya prabhavati kāka nilayana saha kṛtā tu sā eva sthāṇuḥ ayam iti niścāyayati tat atra ekasya eva saṃśaya hetu tvam dvābhyām eva tu nirṇayaḥ iti aprayojakam saṃśaya hetu tve dvi tvam viruddha aneka sādhya tvam eva saṃśaya hetuḥ yathā khalu ekaḥ eva sādhāraṇaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ vartamānaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati evam viruddha arthasya api hetu dvayasya aṃśābhyām ubhaya vṛttiḥ eva saṃśaye kāraṇam iti na tad dvi tvena hetu tva nirākaraṇam yuktam iti āha kvacid iti 
ŚVK_8.95^3	 nanu yuktam tāvat ūrdhvatayā sthāṇu puruṣa sandehaḥ bhavati iti kākavat tā mātreṇa na saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ satyam yaḥ tu kākavat tā mātreṇa sthāṇum siṣādhayiṣati tasya asau kevalā saṃśaya hetuḥ ūrdhva tāsanāthā tu nirṇāyikā iti etāvat eva vivakṣitam iti adoṣaḥ iti api ca avirodhinoḥ pratyekam saṃhatayoḥ api kvacid arthe sādhye hetu bhāvaḥ dṛśyate yathā ekasmin eva śābdasya jñānasya anumāna tve nu aya vyatireka ja tva pratyakṣa anya pramāṇa tvayoḥ śakyate hi tābhyām aikaikaśyena samastābhyām ca anumāna tvam sādhayitum dvi tve ca hetvābhāsa tva kāraṇe na ekasmin sādhye aneka hetavaḥ prayujyeran prayoktāraḥ tu ekam eva sādhyam kiñca anyat itas ca iti nānā sādhanaiḥ sādhayantaḥ dṛśyante tasmāt virodha nibandhanaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ na tu nānā tva nibandhanaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha pratyekam iti pūrvam tu pratyekam saṃśaya hetvoḥ eva militayoḥ nirṇaya hetu tvam uktam atra tu pratyekam gamakau api saṃhatau ca gamakau iti pratipāditam iti 
ŚVK_8.97^1	 tasmāt viruddha arthau eva bhinnau saṃśaya hetutvena darśanīyau yathā asmābhiḥ uktam na tu bhinna tā mātreṇa iti āha tasmāt iti vyākhyātaḥ tri prakāra upi saṃśaya hetuḥ viparīta prakārān pratijānāti ṣaḍhā viruddha tām āhuḥ iti dharma dharmi svarūpa sva viśeṣa ubhaya svarūpa sva viśeṣaiḥ ṣaṣ prakārām viruddha tām eke bruvataḥ iti arthaḥ anye tu ubhaya virodhayoḥ pratyeka pakṣān atirekāt cāturvidhyam pratipannāḥ iti āha caturdhā vā iti vayam tu iṣṭa vighāta mātreṇa ekam eva prakāram saṅgirāmahe iti āha ekadhā api vā iti pūrva ukta pakṣa dvaya nivṛttau api vā śabdaḥ api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt iti pakṣa bādhaḥ eva viruddha tve kāraṇam kim avāntara bheda upanyāsena iti triṣu api ca prakāreṣu śruti artha upāttasya pratijñāta arthasya bādhāyām viruddha tām āhuḥ iti āha śruti artha uktasya iti 
ŚVK_8.97^2	 dharma dharmyu bhaya svarūpam śruti uktam tad viśeṣāḥ tu prāyeṇa artha uktāḥ te ca svarūpa sva viśeṣāḥ pratijñā artha śabdena upādīyante sarve hi te vaktuḥ abhipretāḥ na tu dharma ādi viśeṣāḥ sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ tat asmin pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetoḥ viruddha tā bhavati iti tat punar idam vipratiṣiddham iva manyāmahe katham hi pratijñā arthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetuḥ viruddhaḥ bhavati sa hi pratijñā artham viruṇaddhi iti viroddhā iti vaktum ucitaḥ bādhakaḥ iti vā na ca ayam eva pratijñā arthena bādhyate yat viruddhaḥ bhavet prasiddha tvāt asya prasiddham hi ghaṭasya kṛtaka tvam na tad aprasiddhayā nitya tayā bādhitum śakyam atas bādhakaḥ iti eva ayam vaktavyaḥ vārtika kṛtā tu para prasiddhi mātreṇa viruddhaḥ iti uktam iti veditavyam iti tatra dharma svarūpa bādhena tāvat viruddha tām udāharati nitya tve iti 
ŚVK_8.99^1	 dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam prayukte bhavati iti āha bādhaḥ iti tam eva prayogam darśayati arthavat iti pāda trayeṇa svarūpa abhidhāna vādinaḥ hi āhuḥ gauḥ ayam iti śabda ākāra viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ avagamyate na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśiṣṭaḥ abhidhātum śakyate iti svarūpam eva tāvat ādau śabda ubhidhatte tatas viśiṣṭam api ca artha śabdaḥ vyabhicarati ajñāta sambandhasya tad anavagateḥ svarūpam tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāk api tad avagamāt avyabhicārī ca śabda arthaḥ iti yuktam atas svarūpam tāvat avaśya abhidheyam śabdānām tad abhidhāna uttara kālam tu viśiṣṭa abhidhānam api bhavatu nāma iti evam prasādhya ante prayogam āhuḥ śabda svarūpam sambandha avadhāraṇāt prāc arthavat vibhakti sambandhāt agṛhīta sambandhaḥ api hi svādi vibhakti yuktān śabdān avagacchati 
ŚVK_8.99^2	 yadā ca vibhakti yogaḥ tadā arthavat tvam dṛṣṭam yathā sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt iti katham punar evam prayujyamāne dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ bhavati atas āha svarūpeṇa iti ca āśritaḥ iti yadā hi sva rūpeṇa arthena arthavat tvam prathamam āśritya arthavat tā mātra viśiṣṭam sādhyate tadā arthāt idam avagamyate svarūpa arthavat tvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti evam ca bhavati artha ākṣiptasya dharma viśeṣasya bādhaḥ iti katham punar svarūpeṇa iti ca āśrite dharma viśeṣaḥ bādhyate atas āha asvarūpa iti vibhaktimat tvam hi svarūpa ati rekeṇa artha antareṇa arthavat tvam avinā abhāva balena śabdasya avagamayati sambandha grahaṇāt paścāt artha antarasya darśanāt atas vyāpti balena tat eva vibhaktimat tayā sādhyate atas arthavat tāyāḥ viśeṣam sva svarūpa arthavat tvam hetuḥ ayam viruṇaddhi iti bhavati dharma viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.100–8.101	 dharmi svarūpa bādha udāharaṇam āha ihapratyaya iti yadā hi samavāyam dharmiṇam kṛtvā tasya dravya ādi vyatirekaḥ sādhyate iha pratyaya hetu tvam ca hetuḥ ucyate iha ayam ghaṭaḥ iti saṃyogaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tadā dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ katham punar atra udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ atas āha atra api iti atra api udāharaṇe dharmi svarūpasya samavāya ātmanaḥ vaiparītya āpādanāt dhetoḥ viruddha tā bhāvati iha pratyaya hetu tvam hi asamavāya ātmanaḥ eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyam virundhyāt iti dharmi svarūpa bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.102–8.103	 asmin eva ca dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ api darśayitavyaḥ iti āha yat ca iti samavāyaḥ hi sattā sāmānya vat eka rūpaḥ iti kāṇādāḥ manyante saḥ api asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyoga vat bheda āpatteḥ bādhyate iti bhavati dharmi viśeṣa viruddhaḥ hetuḥ iti ubhaya svarūpa bādhāyām udāharaṇam āha nityam ātma astitā iti yadā kaścid sautra antikam pratyevam sādhayati ātmā nityaḥ niravaya tvāt vyoma vat iti tadā dharma dharmi dvayasya bādhanam bhavati sautra antikasya hi avayava abhāvaḥ vyomnyabhāvena eva sambaddhaḥ abhimataḥ iti ātmanaḥ api tadvat abhāvam gamayet āvaraṇa abhāva mātram hi nabhaḥ na punar tattva antaram iti bauddhāḥ manyante atas anavayava tvāt ātmanaḥ svarūpasya tad dharmasya ca nitya tvasya bādhāt ubhaya bādhaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.106A^1	 ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ tu evam sādhyamāne bhavati iti āha tadā iti yadā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt śayana ādi vat iti sādhyate tadā ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ katham punar atra ubhaya viśeṣa bādhaḥ atas āha śayanaḥ iti śayanīyehi khaṭvādau mahābhūta saṃhata śarīra pārārthyena saṅghāta tvāt iti hetuḥ vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti saṃhata pārārthyam eva sādhayet ātmānam ca prati pārārthyam sādhayitum abhimatam tat na sidhyet saḥ ayam tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yaḥ viśeṣaḥ abhimataḥ ātma pārārthyam sa tāvat bādhyate cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ āhaṅkārika tvam nāma saḥ api anena eva hetunā bādhyate 
ŚVK_8.106A^2	 saṃhata ātmaka tvam hi śayana ādau= anāhaṅkārika tvena vyāptam dṛṣṭam bhautikāḥ hi te atas tat nidarśanena cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ api bhautikāḥ bhaveyuḥ āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi iti kāpilāḥ saṅgirante teṣām ca ayam prayogaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ saṃhata pārārthya bhautika tvābhyām vyāptaḥ hetuḥ yasmin śayane tatra ātma pārārthyam asiddham iti dharma viśeṣa bādhanam tāvat bhavati dharmi viśeṣa bādhaḥ api bhautika vyāptyā sūtritaḥ anantaram eva vivariṣyate iti na kevalam ātma pārārthyam na sidhyati asaṃhata rūpa ātma pārārthye ca iṣṭe vyāpti balena ātmanaḥ api saṃhata tā prāpnoti iti āha asaṃhatā iti anena ca aniṣṭa antara āpattiḥ āpāditā iti veditavyam etat uktam bhavati na anena hetunā asaṃhata rūpa ātmā artha tā sidhyati pratyuta saṃhatatā eva ātmanaḥ bhavet iti 
ŚVK_8.106B–8.107	 dharmi viśeṣa bādham vivṛṇoti anāhaṅkārika tvam iti vyākhyāta caram ca idam evam tāvat jñāta sambandha pada vyāvartanīyaḥ viruddhaḥ prapañcitaḥ idānīm tad vyāvartyāḥ eva dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ darśayitavyāḥ taiḥ hi na anumāna aṅga sambandhaḥ jñāpayitum śakyate atas te api jñāta sambandha padena eva vyāvartyante idam ca asmābhiḥ prāk eva uktam anyatra api āha jñāta sambandha vācā ca trayaḥ atra aniyata ādayaḥ hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ doṣāḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa vāritāḥ iti atas tad nirākaraṇa artham dṛṣṭānta vacanam eva tāvat avatārayati gamakasya iti vyāpti pradarśanāya dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tāvat sādhana vākye darśayitavyaḥ sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ tad sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa pratipādyate iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.108	 tatra sādharyya dṛṣṭānta prakāram āha tatra iti asya arthaḥ udāharaṇa sādharmyāt liṅgasya prasādhaka tva vacanam hetuḥ yat āhuḥ udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sādhyasya prajñāpana vacanam iti yāvat tasya ca arthaḥ liṅgam eva tat ca uddiśya sādhya upādānam sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ iṣyate yaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān sa saḥ agnimān iti yāvat iti kim evam upādīyamāne sidhyati atas āha uddeśya iti uktam vyāpti pradarśanāya dṛṣṭānta vacanam iti evam ca upādīyamānaḥ uddeśyaḥ dhūma ādiḥ vyāpya tayā kathitaḥ bhavati itaraḥ ca upādeyaḥ agni ādiḥ vyāpaka tayā iti vyāptyā anuguṇyāt saphalam evam upādānam iti uddeśya upādeyayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka tvam bhavati iti uktam 
ŚVK_8.109	 kīdṛśam tu tayoḥ sva rūpam atas āha yat vṛttā iti yad vṛtta tad vṛttābhyām yat tat pariniṣpannānām yaḥ yaḥ ityādi śabdānām upādānam tat ayam arthaḥ bhavati yat yat yat vṛttena saṃyuktam prathamam prayujyate pradhānam ca tat uddeśyam tad tad vṛtta yuktam ca paścāt prayujyamānam sa saḥ agnimānā iva iti ca evakāreṇa yuktam tad upādeyam sarveṣu eva ca graha vrīhi ādi sammārga avaghāta ādiṣu uddeśya upādeyeṣu ayam eva vivekaḥ iti veditavyam iti 
ŚVK_8.110A	 kim punar evam prayoga niyame prayojanam vivakṣā paratantrāḥ hi śabdāḥ te yathā tathā vā prayuktāḥ yathā abhiprāyam vartiṣyantaḥ eva atas āha vadati iti na vaktrabhiprāya paratantrāḥ śabdāḥ svābhāvikya eva tu śaktyā kecid eva kvacid eva arthe vartante atas na vivakṣā anusāreṇa iṣṭa siddhiḥ bhavati iti vācyaḥ eva dṛṣṭānta vacana vinyāsa prakāraḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.110B	 yadi tarhi svatantrāḥ śabdāḥ atathā sthite api arthe śabda anusāriṇī iṣṭa siddhiḥ bhavet atas āha sādhya hetu tvam iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na artha śaktiḥ śabda śaktim anurudhya pravartate na ca śabda śaktiḥ arthaśaktim atas na yathā vaktṛ abhipreta artha anusāriṇī śabda śaktiḥ evam na śabda anusāriṇī artha vyavasthā iti artha ādīnām kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādīnām vyāpti śakti anurodhāt eva sādhya hetu bhāvaḥ bhavati na śabda anurodhāt iti 
ŚVK_8.113	 vaktra napekṣayā sva śaktyā eva śabde artham ācakṣāṇe yat tāvat āpadyate tat darśayati tatra ajñānāt iti sārdha dvayena yadā hi dṛṣṭāntam vaktum anabhijñaḥ vaktā sādhya hetvoḥ saha bhāva mātram vivakṣati yathā śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti prayoge yathā ghaṭe kṛtaka tva nāśi tveḥ te iti viparīta avagraheṇa vā na hetoḥ vyāpyatām vivakṣati satyām api vivakṣāyām kutaścid bhrama nimittāt na vyāpti yogyam śabdam vadati sahabhāva mātram eva tu pūrvavat vadet viparītam vā bhrāntaḥ yathā nāśitā kṛtaka tvena vyāptā iti tadā tāvat na kevalam iṣṭam na sidhyati aniṣṭam eva tu vyāpti viparyayāt āpadyate iṣṭasya kṛtaka tvasya hetu tvam na syāt aniṣṭasya eva tu nāśi tvasya bhavet iti evaṃjātīyaka aniṣṭa prayoga nivāraṇāya yuktaḥ dṛṣṭānta prayoga niyamaḥ iti etat eva upasaṃharati tasmāt iti hetu tva sammataḥ kṛtaka tva ādi vyāpya tva rūpeṇa vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.116	 arthānām śabda tantra tve yat bhavati tat darśayati yadā itipāda rahita dvayena asya arthaḥ yadā hi vyāpti śakti anusāreṇa eva arthānām sādhya hetu tvam tadā yadi api vaktrā na sahabhāva mātram darśitam kin tu samyak eva dṛṣṭānta vacanam arthāḥ tu na tad anurūpa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvena avasthitāḥ iti dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavet iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti yathā nityaḥ dhvaniḥ amūrta tvāt iti prayoge karma vat paramāṇu vat ghaṭa vat vyoma vat iti dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyam paramārthataḥ sādhya hetu ubhaya vyāpti śūnyatayā karma khalu anityam iti tat sādhya bhūtayā nitya tayā śūnyam hetuḥ tu amūrta tvāt iti tatra vidyate eva paramāṇavaḥ tu mūrtāḥ iti teṣu hetu śūnyatā sādhyam tu nitya tvam teṣu vidyate eva ghaṭe tu na sādhyam nitya tvam na api amūrta tvam hetuḥ iti ubhaya śūnyatā vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāpti śūnyatām uttaratra svayam eva vivariṣyati atra eva ca vyoma vat iti dṛṣṭānte tad asat vādinam sautra antikam prati prayujyamāne dharmya siddhyā dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavati iti āha tat asat vādinam iti 
ŚVK_8.117–8.119^1	 vyāpti śūnyatām vivṛṇoti tad sadbhāve api iti yadi api ca vyomnaḥ sadbhāvaḥ bhavet tat ca hetu sādhya dvaya yuktam nitya tvāt amūrta tvāt ca tathā api karma ādiṣu amūrteṣu anityeṣu ālocyamāneṣu hetoḥ vyāptiḥ na asti iti īdṛśasya api dṛṣṭāntasya varjanam eva ayam api na sādhya siddhaye samarthaḥ yatas iti vyākhyātaḥ sa ābhāsaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntam atas param vyākhyāsyati tatra etat eva tāvat prathamam vaktavyam kim sarvadā eva sādharmya vat vaidharmya vacanam kāryam na vā iti tatra tāvat vyatireka pradhāna vādinaḥ sarvadā vācyam iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha vyāptyā sādharmya uktaḥ iti evam hi manyate vyāpti prajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭānta vacanam sā ced sādharmya vacanena jñāpitā kim vaidharmya vacanena sādharmyam ca avaśyam eva vacanīyam anvaya prajñāpanāya tad pradhāna tvāt anumānasya vyatirekasya api tad mukhena eva siddheḥ itarathāḥ duradhigama tvāt atas yadi vyāptyā sahitam sādharmyam uktam alam vaidharmya vacanena iti 
ŚVK_8.119^2	 kadā tarhi vaidharmyam vācyam atas āha sahabhāvi tva dṛṣṭyā iti pāda trayeṇa yadā hi vaktrā samyak eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ ukte paraḥ śrotā jānāti yathā hetu sādhyayoḥ sāhitya mātram anena uktam na vyāptiḥ iti tadā sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvam jñāpayitum vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti yadā khalu abhyasta vaidharmyaḥ tam eva apekṣate na sādharmya dṛṣṭāntam tadā ca vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti āha tam vā na apekṣate yadā iti yadā vā vaktā su śikṣita vaidharmyaḥ sādharmyam vaktum ajānānaḥ tena sādharmya dṛṣṭāntena sahabhāva mātram eva śuddham vyāpti hīnam kathayati tadā api paryanuyuktena tena eva vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam kāryam iti āha vaktā vā iti 
ŚVK_8.120	 yadā vā bhrāntaḥ viparītam anvayam darśayati tadā api tad samādhāna icchayā pūrva viparīta jñāna upamardanena vaidharmyeṇa iṣṭa sādhanam iti āha viparīta anvayam iti nanu anvaya vaiparītye saḥ eva yathāvat pratipādyatām kim vaidharmya vacanena satyam evam api iṣṭam sidhyati eva kin tu bhrāntaiḥ idam asmābhiḥ uktam sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti vaidharmyeṇa api tāvat iṣṭa sādhanam bhavati eva iti yat tu tat pūrvam sāhitya mātram uktam tad vaidharmyaḥ eva upayujyate tasya eva iṣṭam sādhayataḥ anugrahe vartate iti āha sāhitya mātram iti 
ŚVK_8.121–8.122	 evam tāvat vaidharmya vacanasya avasaraḥ darśitaḥ tad vacana prakāram idānīm darśayati vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ hi iti vaiparītye kāraṇam āha dhūma bhāvaḥ iti yadā hi dhūma bhāvaḥ agni bhāvena vyāptaḥ bhavati tadā anagniḥ agni abhāvaḥ tatas dhūmāt pracyutaḥ sanna dhūme dhūma abhāvaḥ eva bhavati iti evam tāvat vyāptaḥ bhavati yaḥ hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tat niyataḥ tad vyāptaḥ iti ucyate yathā dhūmaḥ agnau eva bhavan= agninā vyāptaḥ iti siddhaḥ abhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyayaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.123	 yatas eva ca abhāvayoḥ īdṛśaḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ atas eva bhāvayoḥ abhimata vyāpti siddhiḥ iti āha tathā anagnau iti anagnau agni abhāve dhūma abhāvena vyāpte dhūmaḥ tatra virodhi vyāpteḥ alabdha avakāśaḥ agnau eva bhavati iti evam tat vyāpya tā tasya sidhyati tathā iti yathā bhāva vyāpti apekṣayā abhāva vyāptiḥ evam abhāva vyāpti apekṣayā bhāva vyāptiḥ iti arthaḥ na ca evam itaretara āśraya tā bīja aṅkura vat anāditayā upapatteḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.124–125	 kim punar abhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyaya āśrayaṇe prayojanam atas āha vyāpakau tu iti yadā hi yaḥ eva bhāvaḥ vyāpakaḥ tad abhāvaḥ eva vyāpaka tayā vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate tadā tatas vyāpyāt dhūma ādeḥ na eva vipakṣasya anagnyādeḥ pracyutiḥ kathitā bhavet tad kathana artham ca vaidharmya vacanam sa prayojanam bhavet na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti vat yatra dhūma abhāvaḥ tatra agni abhāvaḥ iti kathyamāne vyāpyāt dhūmāt anagneḥ vipakṣasya nivṛttiḥ darśitā bhavati iti atas dhūmena agnim siṣā dhayiṣatā vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntena agni dhūma abhāvayoḥ vyāpti viparyayaḥ vācyaḥ iti āha tasmāt iti vācyaḥ antena yatra agniḥ na asti tatra dhūmaḥ na asti iti evam yad vṛtta tad vṛttābhyām uddeśya upādeya bhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ iti arthaḥ sa ca anagniḥ adhūmena vyāptaḥ ucyamānaḥ na anyathā vācyaḥ kin tu sādharmya uktena eva uddeśya upādeya prakāreṇa iti āha na ca anyathā iti prakāraḥ ca anantaram eva uktaḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.126–8.127	 anyathā vacane doṣam āha anagnya dhūma sāhityaḥ iti yathā eva sādharmya dṛṣṭānte sva śaktyā śabdaḥ artham vadati na artha śaktim anurudhyate iti sāhitya mātra vacane vyāpti viparyaye vā na iṣṭam sidhyati iti uktam evam iha api bhavati iti bhāvaḥ evam tāvat iha api arthaḥ na śabdavaśavartī iti yatra arthaḥ dṛṣṭānta rūpaḥ dvābhyām hetu sādhya abhāvābhyām ekena vā tayoḥ śūnyaḥ bhavati tatra api na prastuta upakāraḥ bhavati anyat vā aniṣṭam prasajyate iti āha yatra api iti samyak prayukte api vākye arthasya atad āyatta tvāt na iṣṭa siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ atra udāharaṇam āha yat iti nityaḥ dhvaniḥ amūrta tvāt iti atra eva prayoge yadā evam vaidharmyam ucyate yat nityam na bhavati tat amūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇuḥ iti tadā sādhya abhāva śūnyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramāṇoḥ nitya tayā tad abhāvasya tatra darśayitum aśakya tvāt buddhi vat iti tu dṛṣṭānte hetvabhāva śūnyatā buddheḥ amūrta tayā tad abhāvasya vaktum aśakya tvāt kha vat iti tu ubhaya abhāva śūnyatā nitya amūrte tasmin ubhaya abhāvaḥ duradhigamaḥ yatas iti 
ŚVK_8.128–8.130^1	 evam sādharmya dṛṣṭānta vat vyāpti vaikalye api ābhāsatā darśayitavyā tad siddhi artham hi vipakṣāt dhetoḥ vyatirekaḥ kathyate yasya tu vipakṣa eka deśāt api vyatirekaḥ na asti na asau sādhyena vyāptaḥ bhavati iti asatyām vyāptau anarthakam tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha sādhyena iti yatas ca evan jātīyakaḥ na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacid abhāvayoḥ sāhitye dṛṣṭe api na sarvatra gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ bhavati iti āha tena iti yadi api yat nityam na bhavati tat amūrtam api na bhavati yathā ghaṭaḥ kuḍyam vā iti kvacid abhāvayoḥ sāhityam śakyate darśayitum 
ŚVK_8.128–8.130^2	 tathā api na sarvaḥ śabda ādiḥ nitya tayā viśiṣṭaḥ anena hetunā gamyaḥ iṣyate kiñcid dhi amūrtam nityam ākāśa ādi kiñcid anityam karma ādi iti bhāvaḥ kim iti na iṣyate atas āha saha dṛṣṭiḥ iti vipakṣa eka deśa nivṛttyā hi sahabhāva mātram hetoḥ sidhyati na ca tanmātra sambandhaḥ anumāna aṅgam kim tarhi vyāptiḥ na ca asau etāvatā sāhitya mātreṇa sidhyati iti etat eva udāharaṇena darśayati mūrta anitya tva yukte api iti idam ca prāk eva vyākhyātam iti 
ŚVK_8.132^1	 atra bauddhāḥ vadanti kim idam vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyam apekṣyate iti ucyate na hi śata aṃśena api hetoḥ vipakṣāt vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamaka tvam asti iti aśeṣa vipakṣaḥ anumātuḥ vyatirekam grahītum apekṣitaḥ na ca asau duradhigamaḥ eka deśa sthasya api sarva adarśana saukaryāt darśanam hi sarva vipakṣāṇām duṣkaram tad abhāvaḥ tu saukarya prāptaḥ eva na ca ayogyān upalambhāt na idam adarśanam hetoḥ vyatirekāya prabhavati iti vācyam na hi naḥ vipakṣa adarśanāt avinā abhauva niyamaḥ kin tu tādātmya tad utpatti nibandhanaḥ vipakṣa darśane tu hetoḥ paripanthini avinābhāvaḥ grahītum aśakyaḥ bhavati tat ca eka deśa sthasya api tāvat na asti eva iti paripanthini vṛtti mātre darśanam vyāpriyate atas yadā eva agni kāryaḥ dhūmaḥ iti avagatam tadā eva tadāyatta ātma lābhaḥ na asati tasmin bhavati iti jñāyate 
ŚVK_8.132^2	 na ca anvaya jñānam eva vyatirekabuddhau nibandhanam asādhāraṇeṣu tad asambhavāt na hi mahānasa paridṛṣṭayoḥ agni dhūma sva lakṣaṇayoḥ tatra eva niruddhayoḥ anyatra darśanam asti yena anvayaḥ anubhūyeta tat kutas anvayaḥ kutastarām ca tad nibandhanaḥ vyatirekaḥ na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyam nāma kiñcid anugatam svarūpam asti yat niyamya niyāmaka tayā avasīyeta vikalpa ākāra tvāt tasya atas viśeṣāḥ eva kecid kayācid vyāvṛttyā upalakṣitāḥ kañcid viśeṣam vipakṣa vyāvṛtti mukhena gamayanti iti tad pradarśana artham vaidharmya vacanam eva nyāyyam iti tān pratyāha aśeṣa iti yuktiḥ antena ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi api vyatirekaḥ anumāna aṅgam sa tu na adarśana mātrāt sidhyati tad deśa āgamanāt api ca tasya upapatteḥ na ca kāryatva avadhāraṇāt asati kāraṇe abhāvaḥ tasya eva asati vyatireke duradhigama tvāt 
ŚVK_8.132^3	 yat dhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tat tat kāryam atas asati abhāva uvagantavyaḥ tatas kārya tā tad adhīna iti tu tasmin itaretara āśraya tā astu vādarśana mātrāt vyatirekaḥ tasya ca saukaryam na etāvatā anumām prati yuktiḥ anaṅgam yuktiḥ yogaḥ sambandhaḥ anvayaḥ iti anartha antaram na anvayaḥ anaṅgam iti yāvat tad mukhena eva sarva pramātṝṇām anumāna utpatteḥ atas tad kathana artham sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ api vācyaḥ eva na asau ekāntena pratyākhyātum śakyate idam ca anvāruhya vacanam yathā uktaḥ eva siddhāntaḥ samyak sādharmya prayoge na vaidharmyam apekṣaṇīyam iti anvayasya eva prādhānyāt tam antareṇa vyatireka asiddheḥ avagate hi dhūmasya agninā sambandhe arthāt anagni nivṛttiḥ sidhyati atas sa tāvat vidhi mukhena prathamam darśayitavyaḥ avasare tu vaidharmyam api kadācid ucyate 
ŚVK_8.132^4	 anaṅga tvam iti tu paṭhatām iyam vyākhyā idam hi liṅgasya anumāyām aṅga tvam yat anvaya vi atirekau tābhyām hi tad aṅgam bhavati atas yathā vyatirekaḥ aṅga tvam evam anvayāpara nāmā yuktiḥ api iti nanu liṅge api śabda ātmake prati iti uttara kāla bhāvi anvayaḥ anaṅgam eva atas āha śābde abhidhāsyate iti śābde hi anumānāt bhinne prati itī uttara kāla bhāvinī yuktiḥ anaṅgam iti vakṣyate yathā vakṣyati na aṅgam artha dhiyām eṣā bhavet anvaya kalpanā iti anumāne tu sarvatra eva anvayaḥ prati iti aṅgam iti ye tu tāvatā na anaṅga tvam anvayasya iti adhyāhṛtya atra eva arthe śabde yuktiḥ vakṣyate iti vyācakṣate teṣām aśruta anvaya adhyāhāraḥ eva tāvat upālambhaḥ na ca anvayasya anumāna aṅga tve śābde yuktiḥ vakṣyate atra eva jñāta sambandha padena tasya ukta tvāt atas eva anvaya adhīna tvam anumānasya ca sthitam iti vakṣyati tasmāt yathā uktā eva vyākhyā iti 
ŚVK_8.133^1	 yat tu bhedānām eva anumāne gamya gamaka tvam teṣām ca anvayaḥ na sambhavati iti uktam tatra āha bodha prasaṅgaḥ iti na bhedānām anumāna bodhe gamya gamaka tāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ teṣām sarva deśa kāla avyāpteḥ eka ekatra niruddha tvāt na ca api avinābhāvena aparasya tathāvidhasya eva niyamaḥ śakyate anubhavitum na ca asati tasminna anumāna aṅgam sambhavati iti teṣām anvaya abhāvaḥ na doṣāya iti yadi na bhedānām bodha prasaṅgaḥ kasya tarhi darśitam idam na bheda anugatam ekam kim api pāramārthikam rūpam asti tasya vikalpa ākāra tvāt yadi api ca vyāpti samaya saṃvidita rūpa āropeṇa eva adhunā anumānam upajāyate tathā hi tasya nipuṇataḥ nirūpyamāṇasya asambhavāt vibhramaḥ eva ayam yadi evam asat rūpāra upapravṛttam anumānam apramāṇam eva satyam pratibandha balena tu kiñcid eva sva lakṣaṇam kena api vikalpa ākāreṇa sāmānya ātmanā samadhigatam yat aparam vikalpa ākāra ullikhitam eva sva lakṣaṇam pratilambhayati tad pramāṇam iti ākhyāyate 
ŚVK_8.133^2	 avisaṃvādaḥ hi naḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam artha kriyā sthitiḥ ca avisaṃvādaḥ yat āhuḥ pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisaṃvādaḥ iti bhavati ca anumāne artha kriyā samartha vastu lābhaḥ vastu nirbhāsa purassaraḥ api iti pramāṇam anumānam yathā uktam atasmin tad grahāt bhrāntiḥ avisaṃvādataḥ pramā iti atas bhedānām eva gamya gamaka tvam te ca na bhājanam anvayasya iti yuktam eva uktam atas āha asti iti asya arthaḥ bhavet evam yadi na bheda atiriktam kiñcid sāmānyam vastu bhavet asti tu tat iti ākṛti granthe sakala para ukta doṣa parihāreṇa upapādayiṣyate tasya ca aneka deśa kāla vyāpitā gamyate iti na abhājanam anvayasya na ca ātasmin tad grahaḥ pāramārthika tvāt tasya evam ca yat anumāna prāmāṇya siddhi artham paraiḥ kim api kāśam kuśam avalambyate tat api manda prayojanam eva iti 
ŚVK_8.134–8.135	 anyat matam vyāptyā api sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ ukte vaidharmyam api vācyam iti tad tāvat upanyasyati kecid iti pāda trayeṇa kim punar tad icchāyām kāraṇam atas āha vyāvṛtti niyama icchayā iti etat eva vivṛṇoti hetau iti evam hi manyante yadā hisādharmya dṛṣṭānte yatra dhūmaḥ iti uddiśya tatra agniḥ eva iti sā evakāram upādīyate tadā hetau sādhyena eva agninā avadhārite sarvatas agneḥ anya mātrāt vyāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti na ca etat sambhavati sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa ādeḥ api abhāva prasaṅgāt apakṣa dharma tva āpatteḥ pakṣa abhāva prasaṅgāt ca atas sādhya abhāvaḥ eva vyāvṛttim niyantum sarvadā eva vaidharmya vacanam arthavat sati hi tasmin agni abhāve dhūmaḥ na bhavati iti āveditam bhavati iti 
ŚVK_8.136–8.137	 etat api dūṣayati tat tu manda phalam iti tat idam vaidharmya vacanam evam kriyamāṇam manda phalam iti arthaḥ katham manda phalam atas āha yasmāt iti kim nirūpitam atas āha vyāpaka abhāva mātram hi iti agnimān parvataḥ iti pakṣa vacane nirūpitam idam yathā niyamaḥ tad vipakṣāt ca kalpyate na avirodhinaḥ iti atas sādharmya dṛṣṭānte api vyāpyāt dhūma ādeḥ vyāpaka abhāva nivṛtti mātram eva darśayitavyam na anya mātra nivṛttiḥ iti etat eva dṛṣṭānta vacanena upapādayan upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tat iha pratijñā hetu sādharmya dṛṣṭānta ākhyāḥ trayaḥ matāḥ vākyasya avayavāḥ prāyas mīmāṃsaka mate satām etat ca bhāṣya kāreṇa svayam eva upadarśitam dṛṣṭānta hetu sādhya artha pada traya nibandhanāt iti 
ŚVK_8.138^1	 atra bhāṣyam tat tu dvividham pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭa sambandham sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham ca tatra pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa sambandham yathā dhūma ākṛti darśanāt agni ākṛti vijñānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham ca yathā devadattasya gati pūrvikām deśa antara prāptim upalabhya āditye api gati smaraṇam iti anena prameya dvaividhyāt anumāna dvaividhyam uktam iti atra kecid nīti jñam manyāḥ avadhṛta sva lakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyatas gṛhyate iti manyante tat bhrama apanayāya bhāṣya kāreṇa idam uktam tat tu dvividham adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam api anumānam asti kriyā ādiṣu iti katham punar adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇena sambandha darśanam utpattimataḥ phalasya darśanāt yadi api anavadhṛta sva lakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣataḥ sambandhaḥ anavagataḥ sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate sarvam hi kādācid kam phalam kutaścid āgantukāt utpattimataḥ jāyamānam dṛṣṭam tantu saṃyogebhyaḥ iva paṭaḥ 
ŚVK_8.138^2	 atas devadattasya bhūta pūrva pūrva uttara deśa vibhāga saṃyogau kadācid upalabhya āgantukaḥ kaḥ api hetuḥ anumīyate tat idam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham anumānam ācakṣate pratyakṣa anupalakṣita pūrva sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt agni ādiṣu tu pratyakṣatas sva lakṣaṇa avadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa sambandham anumānam āhuḥ na ca dravyam eva saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam iti vaktavyam sati api tasmin abhāvāt na ca dravya antara āgamaḥ eva śakyate kalpayitum tasya pūrva dravya pratyabhijñayā bādhita tvāt na ca sadṛśa apara apara utpatti vipralabdhāḥ bhedam na budhyantaḥ iti sāmpratam deśa ādi bhede api tad buddheḥ aviparyayāt uktam ca vivaraṇa kāreṇa kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ tu pratyabhijñānāt nirākriyate eva atas dṛṣṭa kāraṇā sambhavāt adṛṣṭam kim api saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam anumīyate tat ca karma iti ākhyāyate atas eva pradeśa antareṣu api karma apratyakṣam eva iti 
ŚVK_8.138^3	 bhāṣya kāraḥ darśayati yathā vakṣyati na hi te pratyakṣe iti apūrva sadbhāva pratipādana avasare ca na karmaṇaḥ rūpam upalabhāmahe iti yad āśrayam deśa antaram prāpayati tat karma iti ucyate iti ca vyaktam eva deśa antara prāpti phala unnīyamāna tvam eva karmaṇaḥ darśayati iti siddham kriyā ādīnām sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa anumāna eka viṣaya tvam evam ca prameya dvaividhyāt anumāna dvaividhya upapattiḥ iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha dvaividhyam na upapannam iti idam ukta prakāram dvaividhyam anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ katham anupapannam atas āha yathā eva iti pāda trayeṇa yathā khalu agni dhūma akṛtyoḥ pratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ sambandhaḥ bhavati evam gati prāptyākṛtyoḥ tayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt pratyakṣam eva hi vayam deśa antaram prāpnuvantam deva dattvam gacchati iti manyāmahe na iyam jāti ādi vikalpanābhyaḥ karma kalpanā viśiṣyate 
ŚVK_8.138^4	 tadvat eva indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt aparokṣa nirbhāsāt ca nanu devadatte deśa saṃyoga vibhāga atiriktam aparam karmaṇaḥ kim api rūpam aparokṣam īkṣāmahe phala darśanena eva tat anumīyate jāteḥ vā vyaktitaḥ vyatiriktāyāḥ kim rūpam anubhūyate yat asau pratyakṣa viṣaya tayā avasīyate rūpam eva sā vyakteḥ kim asyāḥ rūpa antareṇa iti ced karma vā kim arūpam idam api hi tatas na bhidyate eva āgantukam tu kevalam atas jāti kalpanā vat karma kalpanām api pratyakṣa pakṣaḥ eva nikṣipantaḥ pañcadhā sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam vibhajāmahe āha ca na hi dṛṣṭi patham prāptam devadattam nirūpayan paṭhan kāvyam sva saṃjñā uktam parokṣam iva budhyate iti phala anumeye tu karmaṇi āditya vat devadatta vat pratīti prasaṅgaḥ na ca eṣa devadattam iva calantam spandamānam ādityam api paśyati iti dṛśyate sthiram hi sarvadā tat maṇḍalam avalokyate 
ŚVK_8.138^5	 saṃyoga vibhāgau tu tasya api pratīyete eva iti tulya tvāt tābhyām ubhayatra api ānumānikaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet api ca vibhāga upakrame saṃyoga avasāne ca karmaṇi tatas unnīyamāne gacchati iti vartamāna nirbhāsaḥ pratyayaḥ na bhavet atītam hi tat tadā katham vartamāna ākāra buddhi gocaraḥ bhavati jala pravāha niścaleṣu matsyeṣu nirantara utpadyamāna jala avayava saṃyoga vibhāga avagamāt ānumānikī gati saṃvid upajāyeta sthāṇau ca śyena viyukte śyenaḥ iva karma anumīyeta tatas ca saḥ api gacchati iti buddhi viṣaya tām āpadyeta yadi matam na vibhāga mātrāt karma anumānam api tarhi vibhāga pūrvakāt saṃyogāt iti evam tarhi yadā ekaḥ śyena viyuktaḥ sthāṇuḥ anyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅgaḥ calitvā avasthite ca devadatte yadi tu ucyate yaḥ ayam utpatataḥ śyenasya deśa antara saṃyogaḥ tasya sthāṇu samavetena karmaṇā niṣpatti asambhavāt na tatra karma anumānam iti 
ŚVK_8.138^6	 kalpyatām tarhi śyene api karma sthāṇau tu prasaṅgān ativṛttiḥ eva niyatam hi pratibaddha dṛśaḥ smṛta pratibandhasya pratibandhaka vijñānam asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇa pratibaddha phala darśanam iti na anumāna udayaḥ śakyateniroddhum śyena samavāyinā eva karmaṇā sthāṇau api saṃyoga vibhāga upapattau na tad gata karma anumānam iti ced tat na na hi prayojana anusāriṇī anumāna vyavasthā vyāptam hi liṅgam yatra yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati arthāpattiḥ hi anyathā upapattyā parihriyate na anumānam yadi tu avicchinna utpattayaḥ saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ kriyā anumāne kāraṇam evam tarhi na kācid gatiḥ anumīyeta bhaviṣyat saṃyoga vibhāgānām pramāṇa agocara tvāt prathamam ca katipayānām eva avagateḥ atha sva deśa saṃyoga vibhāga hetukam kriyā anumānam na ca sthāṇoḥ śyenaḥ deśaḥ iti ucyate evam api matsyeṣu prasaṅga an ativṛttiḥ eva teṣām hi jalam sva deśaḥ eva 
ŚVK_8.138^7	 parokṣa vyoma vādinām ca vihaṅgame gacchati iti kriyā pratyaya anupapattiḥ vyoma saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ apratyakṣa tvāt tābhyām tad anumāna anupapatteḥ na ca viyat vitata āloka avayava saṃyoga vibhāga avagama nibandhanaḥ vihaṅgame calati iti pratyayaḥ santamase api bhāvāt na ca tamaḥ nāma kiñcid vastu asti bhavat siddhānte bhāsaḥ abhāva mātra tvāt tasya atas tad saṃyoga vibhāga hetukaḥ api na kriyā vasāyaḥ śakyate samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhya upapattiḥ yā tu na hi te pratyakṣe iti apratyakṣata uktāḥ tām tatra eva anyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ rūpa śabda avibhāgam iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam eva karma iti āsthitam apūrva adhikaraṇe ca na karmaṇaḥ rūpam upalabhāmahe iti vacanam yathā codita vitata pūrva aparībhūta abhivyakta avasthita karma rūpa anupalabdhi abhiprāyam eva itarathāḥ hi upalabdhi mātra pratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅga ādi vat nitya abhāvaḥ eva karmaṇaḥ bhavet 
ŚVK_8.138^8	 na hi tatra pratyakṣa upalabdhi mātram eva pratiṣiddham yad āśrayam deśa antaram prāpayati iti ca na phala anumeya tva abhiprāyam kim tarhi āśrayasya deśa antara prāpaka tva rūpeṇa na svarūpataḥ karma asti iti apūrva ātmanā karmaṇaḥ avasthānam darśayati iha api devadattasya gati pūrvikām deśa antara prāptim upalabhya iti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gateḥ darśayati anyathā tu devadatta ādityayoḥ ubhayoḥ api karmaṇaḥ anumeya tvāt kena viśeṣeṇa āditye gati anumānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭatayā udāhriyate devadatte api hi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭāt eva gati siddhiḥ atas na evaṃvidham granthataḥ yuktitaḥ vā ghaṭataḥ iti sūktam anupapannam iti pratiyoginoḥ hi parasparam asaṅkare dvaividhyam bhavati iha tu yat pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa sambandhasya pratiyogitayā upāttam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham tatra api gati prāpti ākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti na pratiyoginoḥ asaṅkaraḥ iti 
ŚVK_8.139	 yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtāt iti agateḥ apratyakṣa tvāt na pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ sambandhaḥ iti ucyate tat etat āśaṅkate tāvat āditye anupalabdhiḥ ced iti idānīm dūṣayati na iti kāraṇam āha deśe api adhunātanaḥ iti deśe api adhunātane samprati pramīyamāṇe apratyakṣata upalabdhiḥ eva iti arthaḥ yadi tu agni dhūma akṛtyoḥ kvacid mahānasa ādau apratyakṣa upalabdhiḥ iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte api gateḥ pratyakṣa tvāt asti iti āha kvacid iti 
ŚVK_8.140	 evam tāvat pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa tā sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa tayā saṅkīryate iti uktam idānīm sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa tā api pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭa abhimata agni ākṛti anumāne saṅkīryate iti āha yadi iti pāda trayeṇa yadi hi devadatta ādi dharmi antara apekṣā eva āditye gati anumānasya sāmānyatas dṛṣṭatā iṣyate sā tarhi mahānasa ādi dharmi antara apekṣayā agni dhūmayoḥ api gamya gamaka tvena avasthitayoḥ prāpnoti eva sāmānyatas hi avivakṣita deśa ādi bhedam idam avagatam dhūmavān agnimān iti yathā deśa antara prāpti adhikaraṇam gati adhikaraṇam iti atas pratiyogi tva rahitam eva idam ubhayam iti dvaividhya anupapattiḥ iti ākṣepaḥ evam ākṣioya samādadhāti tasmāt evam pracakṣate iti yathā ukta dvaividhyāsambhavāt evam vakṣyamāṇa prakāreṇa dvaividhyam varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ 
ŚVK_8.143^1	 tatra pratyakṣa sambandham tāvat udāharati pratyakṣā iti yudhyate antena yadā hi yayoḥ eva agni dhūma viśeṣayoḥ gomaya indhanaḥ yam agniḥ gomayam indhanam asya iti bahuvrīhiḥ tat janyaḥ ayam dhūma viśeṣaḥ iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matim kṛtvā punar ca kiyatā vilambanena anyatra kvacid gatvā gataḥ san tad deśa sthena tena eva dhūma viśeṣeṇa tam eva agni viśeṣam budhyate tadā tad pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa sambandham anumānam bhavati iti arthaḥ anena ca viśeṣa dṛṣṭam eva pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa śabdena ucyate iti vyākhyātam pratyakṣa śabdena hi viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate pratyakṣeṇa hi ayam evaṃvidhaḥ avāntara viśeṣaḥ gomaya indhana tad janya tva ādi rūpaḥ śakyate avagantum na pramāṇa antareṇa 
ŚVK_8.143^2	 tad dvāreṇa tu anumānasya api tādṛśaḥ viśeṣaḥ viṣayaḥ bhavati iti yuktā eva pratyakṣa śabdena viśeṣa lakṣaṇāḥ viśeṣa dṛṣṭam ca sāmānyatas dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogi iti dvaividhya upapattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu viśeṣa dṛṣṭam nāma na pramāṇa bhedaḥ na ca idam pramāṇam gṛhīta viṣaya tvāt tad deśa sthitena eva hi dhūmena tasmin eva deśe saḥ eva gomaya indhana janyā agniḥ anumīyate atas deśa bheda abhāvāt aprāmāṇyam eva atas āha tasya iti pāda trayeṇa tasya evaṃvidhasya pratyakṣa dṛṣṭasya sandihyamāna sadbhāva vastu bodhāt pramāṇatā bhavati yadi api deśa bhedaḥ na asti kāla bhedāt tu saṃśayān asya saṃśaya uccheda dvāreṇa prāmāṇyam avihatam iti etat ca vindhya vāsinā api viśeṣa dṛṣṭa tvena udāhṛtam iti āha viśeṣa dṛṣṭam iti 
ŚVK_8.144	 yadi viśeṣa dṛṣṭa udāharaṇam idam katham tarhi bhāṣye ākṛti grahaṇam evam hi viśeṣaḥ eva darśayitavyaḥ bhavet atas āha ākṛtyoḥ eva iti ayam arthaḥ kenacid gomaya indhana tva ādināya antara viśeṣeṇa upadarśitayoḥ ākṛtyoḥ eva atra hetu sādhya tvam evam hi atra pratyayaḥ saḥ eva ayam adya yāvat anuvartamānaḥ gomaya indhana vikārasya dhūmasya ākāraḥ dṛśyate atas eva tad indhana yoniḥ agniḥ anuvartate iti atas na anupapannam ākṛti grahaṇam iti 
ŚVK_8.145	 yadi evam avivakṣita avāntara viśeṣam agni dhūma antaram eva sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa udāharaṇa tayā vācyam kim āditya udāharaṇena atas āha agni dhūma antara tve ca iti yathā hi agni dhūma akṛtyoḥ tṛṇadāru gomaya inthana ādi janmā su vyaktaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarva pramātṛ sva saṃvedyaḥ bhavati na evam gati prāptyākṛtyoḥ atas prāpti ākṛti mātrāt gati ākṛti mātra anumānam ādityaḥ ekāntataḥ sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sambandham iti yuktam eva āditya udāharaṇam iti 
ŚVK_8.146	 kim punar sāmānyatas sambandha grahaṇe pramāṇam na hi agṛhītayoḥ sambandhinoḥ sambandha grahaṇam asti na ca sāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣa grahaṇam sambhavati tasya sva lakṣaṇa eka viṣaya tvāt na anumānam anavasthāpātāt atas āha pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam iti bhavet anavasthā yadi anumānena sāmānya grahaṇam iṣyate tasya tu sa vikalpaka siddhau pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam upapādya ante upasaṃhṛtam pratyakṣa tvam atas siddham sāmānyasya iti nanu vastu eva na sāmānyam kiñcid asti nāma tasya bhinna abhinnasya anirūpaṇāt atas āha vastu tvam ca iti vastu tvam api ākṛti granthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate pratyakṣa viṣaya tā pratipādanena ca pratyakṣe api prasādhita prāyam eva atra ca asti sāmānya vastuṣu iti anvaya upapādanāya sāmānyasya vastu tvam upanyastam eva ayam tu hetu kathana arthaḥ punar upanyāsaḥ iti yaḥ tu haitukaḥ na hetum antareṇa pramāṇa antara siddhau ādriyate tam prati hetunā eva ubhayam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti āha atra iti 
ŚVK_8.147^1	 tatra vastu tva prasādhana artham tāvat hetum āha dhūmāt agni anumānasya iti bauddhā hi avastu sāmānya ālambanam anumānam ācakṣate sāmānyasya vikalpa ākāra mātra abhyupagamāt atas eva bhrāntiḥ eva anumānam sambandha balena sva lakṣaṇa rūpam upasthāpayati iti pramāṇam iti āhuḥ tān eva pratīdam ucyate vastu ālambanam anumānam abhāvāni apramāṇa tvāt yathā sva arthe śrotra ādi buddhiḥ yā hi sva viṣaye śrotra ādibhiḥ indriyaiḥ buddhiḥ janyate sā vastu ālambanā eva yena ca yat indriyam sat nikṛṣyate sa tasya sva arthaḥ prāpya kāri tvāt indriyāṇām tat iha mṛgatṛṣṇā ādi jñāna nirākaraṇa artham sva artha viśeṣaṇam aviśeṣeṇa upādāne tu na abhāva ani a pramāṇa tvasya vastu ālambana tayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet 
ŚVK_8.147^2	 bhrāntīnām ubhaya vikala tvāt na hi tāḥ pramāṇam na ca vastu ālambanāḥ anya samprayukta indriyasya hi tāḥ anya viṣayāḥ jāyante īdṛśam eva jñānam avastu ālambanam na punar atyanta asad artham evam vastu ālambana tve anumānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyam vastu iti uktam bhavati idam ca avastu ālambana tvam anumānasya artha padam prayuñjānena bhāṣya kāreṇa nirākṛtam anartha viṣayam anumānam iti bauddhāḥ manyante yadvat iti sva pratibhāse anarthe artha adhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhena pravṛtteḥ tad avyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti teṣām idam uttaram arthaḥ sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayaḥ bāhyaḥ eva na vikalpa ākāra mātram iti ākṛti granthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate iti 
ŚVK_8.148–8.149–153	 evam arthāt vastu tvam prasādhya āhratya prasādhayati sāmānyasya ca vastu tvam iti sāmānyam vastu abhāvāni aprameya tvāt asādhāraṇa vastu vat iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ iti pratyakṣa viṣaya tām idānīm prayogeṇa darśayati pratyakṣā iti pāda trayeṇa yat abhāvāni aprameyam tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate eva yathā saugatānām eva asādhāraṇam vastu iti bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumāna eka viṣayam manvānānām anavasthā prasajyate iti āha sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ nigada vyākhyātaḥ granthaḥ 
ŚVK_8.154	 yadi tu ucyate liṅga bhūta sāmānya grahaṇa artham anumāna apekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati na tad grahaṇa artham anumānam apekṣyate dhūma ādi sva lakṣaṇa darśana prabhava vikalpa vedya tvāt tasya na ca asau apramāṇam artha kriyā samartha vastu pratilambhāt na ca pramāṇam anartha viṣaya tvāt atas anirvacanīya vikalpa siddha tvāt liṅgasya na anavasthā bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha atha iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ na tāvat pramāṇam apramāṇam ca jñānam sambhavati viruddha svabhāvayoḥ ekatra pratiṣedhe anyatara āpatteḥ aparihārya tvāt apramāṇasya ca prameya vyavasthāpanā śakteḥ avaśyam pramāṇam eva tad jñānam abhyupagantavyam pratyakṣa anumāna anabhyupagamāt ca pramāṇa antaram eva āpadyeta pramāṇa antaram ca sat yathā tad liṅga saṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate evam liṅginī api prāpnoti evam ca vakṣyamāṇa prasaṅgaḥ bhavet pramāṇāt apramāṇāt vā iti vadan= anirdhārita ubhaya rūpa tām vikalpasya darśayati iti 
ŚVK_8.155–8.156	 astu tarhi liṅginaḥ api tathā eva avagamaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ atas āha evam api iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumāna uccheda āpādanam abhimatam pramāṇa antara abhyupagame api ca anumāna ucchedaḥ bhavati eva tat eva hi pramāṇam tadā sarvasya liṅga liṅgi sāmānyasya avabodhakam bhavet iti yadi tu eka rūpa abhyupagame apramāṇa tvam eva liṅga jñānasya iṣyate tatas apramāṇa avagatāt liṅgāt liṅgi jñānam api mithyā bhavet bāṣpāt iva dhūma saṃviditāt agni jñānam evam ca na anumānam iti saḥ eva anumānasya nitya ucchedam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha apramāṇa a= abuddhāt iti 
ŚVK_8.157–8.159	 atra codayati nanu iti yathā hi apramāṇam eva sambandha smaraṇam pramāṇa kāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅga jñānam api bhaviṣyati iti arthaḥ pariharati tatra iti smṛtiḥ hi pūrva jñānāt bhavantī tad upasthāpana dvāreṇa anumāyām upayujyate tat ca pramāṇam eva iti tad anusārī nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ iti na ca eṣa prakāraḥ liṅga gatau sambhavati iti āha na tu iti na hi atra prāk api liṅga avagame pramāṇam kiñcid upapadyate yat pramāṇa jñānena upasthāpyate iti na ca liṅga jñānam api smṛtiḥ eva iti vācyam pūrva pramāṇa abhāvāt eva iti āha tad abhāvāt iti
